Kar chakruok Nyasaye nochweyo polo gi piny.
Koro piny ne onge kido kendo ne onge gimoro amora e iye. Mudho mandiwa noimo ataro mangʼongo kendo Roho mar Nyasaye ne wuotho ewi atarono.
Eka Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Ler mondo obedie,” mi ler nobetie.
Nyasaye noneno ni ler ber, kendo ne opogo ler kuom mudho.
Nyasaye noluongo ler ni “odiechiengʼ” kendo mudho noluongo ni “otieno.” Piny noyuso, kendo noru ma en chiengʼ mokwongo.
Eka Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Gima pogo pi mondo obedie mondo opog pi gi pige.”
Omiyo Nyasaye noketo gima pogo pi mamalo gi pi ma piny. Kendo nobedo kamano.
Nyasaye noluongo gima nopogo pigno ni “polo.” Piny noyuso kendo noru, ma en chiengʼ mar ariyo.
Kendo Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Pi manie bwo polo mondo ochokre kaachiel, kendo lowo motwo obedie.” Kendo notimore kamano.
Nyasaye nochako lowo ni “piny” kendo pige mane ochokore nochako ni “nembe.” Kendo Nyasaye noneno ni mano ber.
Eka Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Buya nyaka nyag e piny, kothe manyago cham kod yiende manyago olembe man-gi kuthe eigi kaka kitgi obet kendo nobedo kamano.
Buya nonyak e piny: Cham nonywolo kothegi kaka kitgi nobet kendo yiende nonywolo olembe man-gi kodhi kaka kitgi nobet. Kendo Nyasaye noneno ni mano ber.
Piny noyuso kendo noru, ma en chiengʼ mar adek.”
Bangʼe Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Ler mondo obedie e kor polo mondo opog odiechiengʼ gi otieno, kendo gibed kaka ranyisi mag lokruok ndalo kod odiechienge, kod higni,
kendo ginibedi ler mae kor polo mondo gi chiw ler e piny.” Kendo nobedo kamano.
Nyasaye noloso gik moko ariyo madongo makelo ler; ler maduongʼ ne rito odiechiengʼ, to ler matin ne rito otieno. Sulwe bende noloso.
Nyasaye noketogi e kor polo mondo gi chiw ler e piny,
mondo girit odiechiengʼ gotieno, kendo gipog ler koa kuom mudho. Nyasaye noneno ni mano ber.
Piny noyuso kendo noru, ma en chiengʼ mar angʼwen.
Kendo Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Pi mondo opongʼ gi gik mangima, kendo winy mondo ofu ewi piny e kor polo.”
Kamano Nyasaye nochweyo gik madongo mag nam kod gik mangima duto kod gik malak mag pi, kaka kitgi obet kod winy duto man-gi bwombegi kaka kitgi obet. Nyasaye noneno ni mano ber.
Nyasaye nogwedhogi kendo owacho niya, “Nywolreuru kendo umedru kuom kwan kendo upongʼ pi mag nembe kendo winy bende omedre e piny.”
Kendo piny noyuso, kendo noru, ma en chiengʼ mar abich.
Kendo Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Piny mondo onywol gik mangima kaka kitgi obet: Jamni, kod gik moko duto mamol e lowo, kod le mag bungu, mana kaka kit moro ka moro obet.” Kendo nobet kamano.
Nyasaye noloso le mag bungu kaka kitgi obet; jamni kaka kitgi obet kendo gi gik mamol e lowo kaka kitgi obet. Nyasaye noneno ni mano ber.
Eka Nyasaye nowacho niya, “We wachwe dhano e kido machal kodwa kendo gibed gi teko ewi rech mae nam kendo gi winy mae kor polo, ewi jamni, ewi piny duto kendo ewi chwech duto mawuotho ewi lowo.”
Kuom mano Nyasaye nochweyo dhano e kite owuon, e kit Nyasaye nochweye; nochweyogi dichwo gi dhako.
Nyasaye nogwedhogi mi owachonegi niya, “Nywolreuru kendo kwanu omedre; pongʼuru piny kendo urite. Beduru gi teko ewi rech ma e nam kod winy mae kor polo kendo ewi gik mangima duto mawuotho ewi lowo.”
Eka Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Amiyou kothe duto manyago cham e wangʼ piny duto kod yiende duto man kod olemo gi kodhi eigi. Ginibed magu kuom chiemo.
To ne le duto mag piny kod winy duto mafuyo e kor polo kod gik moko duto mawuotho e piny, gimoro amora mangima; amiyo lum duto mondo obed chiembgi.” Kendo nobedo kamano.
Nyasaye nongʼiyo gik moko duto mane osechweyo kendo noneno ni gibeyo ahinya. Piny noyuso kendo noru, ma en chiengʼ mar auchiel.
Kuom mano chwech polo gi piny norumo gi gik mane ni eigi duto ka moro ka moro oket kare.
E odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo Nyasaye nosetieko tichne mane osebedo ka otimo; omiyo odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo noyweyo kuom tijene duto.
Kendo Nyasaye nogwedho odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo mi owale obedo maler, nimar odiechiengno ema noyweyoe bangʼ tieko duto.
Ma e nonro mar polo kod piny kane ochwegi. Kane Jehova Nyasaye ochweyo piny kod polo;
ne onge buya mane osetwi e piny kendo ne onge yien mane osedongo nikech Jehova Nyasaye ne pok ooro koth e piny kendo ne onge dhano mawuotho ewi lowo,
kata kamano achiya mar pi ne wuok koa ei lowo kendo ne omiyo piny duto obedo mangʼich.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nochweyo dhano gi lowo kendo nokudho muya mar ngima ei ume, mi dhano nobedo mangima.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye noloso puodho ma yo wuok chiengʼ mar Eden, kendo noketoe dhano mane osechweyo.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye noketo kit yien duto mondo onyagi ewi lowo, ne gin yiende malombo wangʼ kendo mag chiemo. E dier puodho ne nitie yath machiwo ngima kendo yath mamiyo ngʼato ngʼeyo ber gi rach.
Aora mamiyo puodho bedo mangʼich ne mol koa Eden; kendo koa kanyo to aorano ne pogore nyadingʼwen.
Bath aorano mokwongo iluongo ni Pishon; en omol koluwo piny Havila duto kama ne nitiere gi dhahabu mangʼeny.
(Dhahabu mar pinyno ber; duogo manyilni maber kod kite mabeyo miluongo ni oniks bende yudoree.)
Bath aorano mar ariyo iluongo ni Gihon; en omol koluwo piny Kush duto.
Bath aorano mar adek iluongo ni Tigris; en omol koluwo yo wuok chiengʼ mar Ashur. To bath aorano mar angʼwen iluongo ni Yufrate.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nokawo Adam kendo nokete e puoth Eden mondo olose kendo orite.
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo Adam chik niya, “In thuolo mar chamo olemb yien moro amora e puodho;
to kik icham olemb yath mamiyo ngʼato ngʼeyo ber gi rach, nimar chiengʼ ma inichame to initho.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Ok ber mondo Adam obed kende, abiro losone jakony mowinjore kode.”
Kuom mano, Jehova Nyasaye nokawo lowo ma ochweyogo le mae thim kod winy duto mafuyo e kor polo. Eka nokelogi ne Adam mondo ochakgi nying kendo nying mane Adam omiyo gik mangimago ema nobedo nying-gi.
Omiyo Adam nochako jamni duto nying, gi winy manie kor polo kod le duto manie thim. Kata kamano Adam ne onge gi jakony mowinjore kode.
Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo nindo matut otero Adam; kendo kane onindo, nogolo achiel kuom ngʼedene mi nodino kanyo gi ringʼo.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye noloso dhako koa kuom ngʼet mane ogolo kuom Adam kendo nokele ni Adam.
Adam nowacho niya, “Ma koro en chogo mar choka kendo ringʼo mar ringra; ibiro luonge ni ‘dhako,’ nikech nogole koa kuom dichwo.”
Kuom mano, dichwo nowe wuon kod min kendo nopadre gi chiege; mi gidok ringruok achiel.
Adam kod chiege ne niduge, to ne gionge wichkuot.
To thuol ne riek moloyo le duto mag bungu mane Jehova Nyasaye ochweyo. Omiyo nopenjo dhako niya, “Bende en adier ni Nyasaye nowacho ni, ‘Kik ucham olemb yien moro amora manie puodho?’ ”
Dhako nodwoko thuol niya, “Wanyalo chamo olembe mag yiende manie puodho duto,
makmana Nyasaye nosiemowa ni, ‘Kik ucham olemo mar yien man e dier puodhono, kendo kik umule nono to ubiro tho.’ ”
Thuol nowacho ne dhako niya, “Adier ok unutho.
Nikech Nyasaye ongʼeyo ni sa ma unuchame wengeu noyepi kendo unubed machal gi Nyasaye, kungʼeyo ber gi rach.”
Kane dhako oneno ni olemb yien-no ne ber kuom chiemo kendo moro wangʼ kendo nyalo miyo ibed gi rieko, nokawo moko mochamo, to bangʼe nomiyo chwore ma en bende nochame.
Eka wengegi noyepo kendo negifwenyo ni gin duge; kuom mano negikawo it ngʼowu kendo giumogo dugegi.
Eka Adam kod chiege nowinjo dwond Jehova Nyasaye kawuotho e puodho e seche mag angʼich welo kendo ne gipondo ne Jehova Nyasaye e kind yiende manie puodho.
To Jehova Nyasaye noluongo Adam mopenje niya, “In kanye?”
Nodwoko niya, “Ne awinji e puodho kendo luoro nomaka nikech ne an duk, koro ne apondo.”
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “En ngʼa manonyisi ni in duk? Dibed ni isechamo olemb yien mane akweri ni kik icham?”
Adam nodwoke niya, “Dhako mane imiya ema nomiya olemo moko moa e yien-no kendo achamo.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nopenjo dhako niya, “Ma en angʼo ma isetimo?” Dhako nodwoke niya, “Thuol nowuonda, mi achamo olemo.”
Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne thuol niya, “Nikech isetimo ma, “Okwongʼi moloyo le duto kendo gige buya duto! Ibiro lak gi bund iyi kendo ibiro chamo buru, ndalo duto mag ngimani.
Kendo anaket sigu e kindi gi dhako, kendo e kind kothe gi kothi; en noto wiyi, to in to nika ofunj tiende.”
Dhako to ne owachone niya, “Anamedni rem malich e kindeni mag nywol; adier ininywol nyithindo gi rem. Dwaroni nobed mana kuom chwori bende enobed gi teko kuomi.”
To Adam to ne owachone niya, “Nikech ne iwinjo chiegi kendo ichamo olemb yath mane akweri ni, ‘Kik icham olembe,’ “Okwongʼ lowo nikech in, kuom tich matek, ibiro chiemo koa kuom lowo, ndalo duto mag ngimani.
Enonyagni kit kuthe mopogore opogore kendo ibiro chamo alode manie thim.
Inicham chiembi mana kuom luchi, nyaka idog e lowo nikech kanyo ema ne ogolie, nimar in lowo kendo lowo ema nidogie.”
Adam nochako chiege ni Hawa nikech nobiro bedo min ji duto.
Jehova Nyasaye noloso lewni mag pien ne Adam kod chiege kendo noumogi.
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Dhano koro osebedo machal kodwa, kongʼeyo ber kod rach. Kik yiene mondo oter lwete kendo okaw olemb ngima kendo ocham madimi odag nyaka chiengʼ.”
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye noriembe e Puodho mar Eden mondo opur lowo kamane ogole.
Bangʼ kane oseriembo Adam oko, ne oketo kerubi gi ligangla mamil koni gi koni yo wuok chiengʼ mar Puodho Mar Eden mondo orit yo mochomo yadh ngima.
Adam nobedo e achiel gi chiege Hawa kendo nomako ich mi nonywolo Kain mowacho niya, “Kuom ngʼwono mar Jehova Nyasaye asenywolo wuowi.”
Bangʼe nonywolo owadgi miluongi ni Abel. Abel ne en jakwadh jamni to Kain ne en japur.
Bangʼ ndalo moko Kain nokelo nyak mag lowo kaka misango ne Jehova Nyasaye.
To Abel nokelo ringʼo machwe koa kuom achiel mag jambe makayo. Jehova Nyasaye noyie gi Abel kod misango mare,
to Kain kod misango mare to ne ok oyiego. Kuom mano Kain mirima nomako kendo wangʼe nojuol.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nopenjo Kain niya, “Angʼo ma omiyo in-gi mirima? Angʼo ma omiyo wangʼi ojuol?
Kitimo maber donge diyieni? To ka itimo marach to richo okichore e dhoodi, kendo ogomboni mondo okawi, to in nyaka iloye.”
Eka Kain nowacho ne owadgi Abel niya, “Wadhi waba e pap oko.” To kane gin e pap, Kain nogoyo owadgi ma Abel mi onege.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nopenjo Kain niya, “Ere owadu Abel?” Nodwoke niya, “Ok angʼeyo. An jakwadhe?”
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Isetimo angʼoni? Winji! Remb owadu ywakna koa e lowo.
Omiyo koro in e bwo kwongʼ kendo oseriembi e piny mosengʼamo dhoge mondo omwony remb owadu koa e lweti.
Ka ipuro lowo, to ok obi nyagoni cham. Ibiro bedo ngʼat maonge kar dak mabayo abaya e piny.”
Kain nowacho ne Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Kum mi miyano ohinga.
Kawuono iseriemba e lowo kendo ibiro pandona wangʼi; abiro bet ngʼat maonge kar dak mabayo abaya e piny kendo ngʼato angʼata moyuda nonega.”
To Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Ok kamano, ka ngʼato onegi, nochul ne kuor nyadibiriyo moloyo.” Eka Jehova Nyasaye noketo ranyisi kuom Kain mondo ngʼato moromo kode kik nege.
Omiyo Kain noa e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo nodak e piny Nod, mantie yo wuok chiengʼ mar Eden.
Kain nobedoe achiel gi chiege mi chiege nomako ich kendo nonywolo Enok. Noyudo Kain gero dala maduongʼ kendo nochako dalano nying wuode ma Enok.
Enok nonywolo Irad: Kendo Irad ema ne wuon Mehujael, kendo Mehujael nonywolo Methushael kendo Methushael nonywolo Lamek.
Lamek nokendo mon ariyo, achiel ne nyinge Ada to machielo Zila.
Ada nonywolo Jabal, mane wuon jokwath mane odak e hembe kendo ne nigi jamni.
Owadgi ne nyinge Jubal, ma en ema nokwongo chako goyo thumbe mag nyatiti gi asili.
Zila bende nonywolo wuowi ma nyinge Jubal-Kain, mane jatheth chumbe duto mag mula kod nyinyo. Nyamin Tubal-Kain nyinge ne Naama.
Lamek nowachone monde ariyo-ka niya, “Ada kod Zila, winjauru, un monda winjuru wechena. Asenego ngʼato, nikech nogoya, wuowi matin nikech nohinya.
Ka Kain ochulne kuor nyadibiriyo to kara Lamek to nochul ne kuor nyadi piero abiriyo gabiriyo.”
Adam nobedoe achiel gi chiege, kendo chiege nonywolo wuowi mi nochake ni Seth, mowacho niya, “Nyasaye osemiya nyathi machielo kar Abel mane Kain onego.”
Seth bende nonywolo wuowi, kendo nochake ni Enosh. E ndalono ema ne ji ochako luongo nying Jehova Nyasaye.
Ma e chenro mar tienge nyikwa Adam. Ka Nyasaye nochweyo dhano, nochweye e kite owuon.
Nochweyogi dichwo gi dhako kendo ogwedhogi kendo kane ochwegi, nochakogi ni “dhano.”
Ka Adam nosedak kuom higni mia achiel gi piero adek, nonywolo wuowi machal kode, kendo nochake ni Seth.
Bangʼ kosenywolo Seth, Adam nodak higni mia aboro kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Adam notho ka en ja-higni mia ochiko gi piero adek.
Ka Seth ne ja-higni mia achiel gabich, nonywolo Enosh.
Bangʼ kane osenywolo Enosh, Seth nodak kuom higni mia aboro gabiriyo kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Seth notho ka en ja-higni mia ochiko gi apar gariyo.
Enosh nonywolo Kenan kane en ja-higni piero ochiko.
Bangʼ Kenan, Enosh nodak higni mia aboro kod apar gabich kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Enosh notho ka en ja-higni mia ochiko gabich.
Ka Kenan ne ja-higni piero abiriyo nonywolo Mahalalel.
Kendo bangʼ ka Kenan noseyuolo Mahalalel nodak higni mia aboro kod piero angʼwen kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Kenan notho ka en ja-higni mia ochiko gapar.
Ka Mahalalel ne ja-higni piero auchiel gabich, nonywolo Jared.
Kendo bangʼ kane osenywolo Jared, Mahalalel nodak higni mia aboro gi piero adek kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Mahalalel notho kane en ja-higni mia aboro gi piero ochiko gabich.
Ka Jared ne ja-higni mia achiel gi piero auchiel gariyo, nonywolo Enok.
Kendo bangʼ nywolo Enok, Jared nodak higni mia aboro kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Jared notho kane en ja-higni mia ochiko gi piero auchiel gariyo.
Ka Enok ne ja-higni piero auchiel gabich, nonywolo Methusela.
Kendo bangʼ nywolo Methusela, Enok nowuotho gi Nyasaye kuom higni mia adek kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Enok nodak kuom higni mia adek gi piero auchiel gabich.
Enok nowuotho gi Nyasaye; bangʼe nobedo maonge, nikech Nyasaye nokawe.
Ka Methusela ne ja-higni mia achiel gi piero aboro gabiriyo, nonywolo Lamek.
Kendo bangʼ kane osenywolo Lamek, Methusela nodak higni mia abiriyo gi piero aboro gariyo kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Methusela nodak kuom higni mia ochiko gi piero auchiel gochiko kendo bangʼe notho.
Ka Lamek ne ja-higni mia achiel gi piero aboro gariyo, nonywolo wuowi moro.
Nochake ni Nowa mi owacho niya, “Wuowini biro hoyowa kuom tich kendo kuom tich malit mar lwetwa mobet nikech lowo ma Jehova Nyasaye osekwongʼo.”
Bangʼ kane osenywol Nowa, Lamek nodak higni mia abich gi piero ochiko gi abich kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri moko.
Lamek notho kane ja-higni mia abiriyo gi piero abiriyo gabiriyo.
Ka Nowa ne ja-higni mia abich nonywolo Shem, Ham kod Jafeth.
Kane dhano ochako medore e piny, kendo onywolonegi nyiri,
yawuot Nyasaye noneno ni nyi dhano beyo kendo negikendo moro amora mane chunygi ogombo.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Mucha machiwo ngima ok nodag kuom dhano nyaka chiengʼ, nikech en ringruok matow, ndalone nobed higni mia achiel gi piero ariyo.”
Jo-Nefilim ma gin joma robede miwuoro ne nitie e piny e ndalogo kendo kod ndalo maluwe, e kindeno ma yawuot Nyasaye kod nyi dhano nonywomore monywolo nyithindo. Nyithindogo ne thuondi kendo joma ne nigi huma e ndalogo.
Jehova Nyasaye noneno kaka richo dhano ogundho e piny kendo kaka paro duto mag chunye ne mana timo richo seche duto.
Jehova Nyasaye chunye nodoko malit kuom keto dhano e piny kendo chunye nopongʼ gi lit.
Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Abiro nego dhano duto masechweyo e wangʼ piny kaachiel gi le kod gik mamol duto kod winy mafuyo e kor polo nimar dine ber ka dine ok achweyogi.”
To Nowa noyudo ngʼwono e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye.
Ma e nonro mar Nowa. Nowa ne ngʼama kare, kendo malongʼo e kind oganda mane nitie kendo nowuotho gi Nyasaye.
Nowa ne nigi yawuowi adek: Shem, Ham kod Jafeth.
Koro piny nokethore e nyim Nyasaye kendo opongʼ gi timbe mahundu.
Nyasaye noneno kaka piny nosekethore, nikech ji duto mae piny nodak e richo.
Kuom mano, Nyasaye nowacho ne Nowa niya, “Abiro tieko dhano duto nikech piny opongʼ gi timbe maricho nikech gin. Adier abiro tiekogi kaachiel gi piny.
Omiyo los yie gi yien motegno, pog iye mondo owuog udi matindo kendo muone gi duogo, iye gi oko.
Ma e kaka ibiro gere: Borne en fut mia angʼwen gi piero abich, lachne en fut piero abiriyo gabich kendo tutne fut piero angʼwen gabich.
Ketne tado kiweyo thuolo mar fut achiel gi nus e kind tado kod kore. Ketne dhoot kendo ipog iye gorofa adek.
Abiro kelo pi mar nam e piny mondo oketh gik mangima modak e bwo polo, gimoro amora man kod muya mar ngima e iye. Gimoro amora mae piny biro tho.
To abiro timo singruokna kodi, kendo ibiro donjo e yie, in kaachiel gi yawuoti kod chiegi, kod mond yawuoti.
Ibiro kawo gik mangima duto, machwo kod mamon mondo gidonji kodi ei yie kendo iritgi gibed mangima.
Kuom kido duto mag winy, gi mag le, kod mag gik mamol e lowo ariyo ariyo nodonj kodi ei yie mondo ores ngimagi.
Kaw kit chiemo duto monego cham kendo ikan-gi kaka chiembi kod mag-gi.”
Nowa notimo gik moko duto mana kaka Nyasaye nochike.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Nowa niya, “Donj ei yie, in kaachiel gi joodi, nikech aseyudo ni in ngʼat makare e kind ogandani.
Kaw kit le duto maler michamo machwo abiriyo kod mamon abiriyo kod kit le duto mochido ma ok cham machwo ariyo kod mamon ariyo,
kendo gi kit winy duto machwo abiriyo kod mamon abiriyo mondo okan kitgi e piny ngima.
Bangʼ ndalo abiriyo koa sani abiro kelo koth e piny kuom ndalo piero angʼwen odiechiengʼ gi otieno, kendo abiro tieko gik moko duto mangima mane achweyo.”
Kendo Nowa notimo duto ma Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Nowa ne ja-higni mia auchiel kane pi opongʼo piny.
Kendo Nowa gi yawuote gi chiege kod mond yawuote nodonjo ei yie mondo otony ne pi mar ataro.
Le ka le madichwo kod madhako maler kod mochido, michamo kod ma ok cham, kaachiel gi winy kod gik mamol ariyo ariyo,
nobiro ir Nowa kendo nodonjo kodgi ei yie mana kaka Nyasaye nochike.
Kendo bangʼ ndalo abiriyo pi mar ataro nobiro e piny.
Tarik apar gabiriyo mar dwe mar ariyo noyudo ka Nowa ja-higni mia auchiel kendo sokni duto manie nam mangʼongo manie bwo piny nomuoch kendo dirisni mag polo noyawore.
Kendo koth nochwe e piny ndalo piero angʼwen odiechiengʼ gotieno.
Odiechiengʼno Nowa gi yawuote, Shem, Ham, kod Jafeth, kaachiel gi chiege kod mond yawuote adek, nodonjo e yie.
Negidonjo gi le duto mag buya kaka kitgi obet, jamni duto kaka kitgi obet, gik mangima duto mamol e lowo kaka kitgi obet, kod kit winy duto kaka kitgi obet, gimoro amora man-gi bwombene.
Gik moko duto mangima ariyo ariyo nobiro ir Nowa kendo negidonjo ei yie.
Gik moko duto mangima machwo kod mamon nodonjo ei yie mana kaka Nyasaye nochiko Nowa. Eka Jehova Nyasaye noloronegi ei yie.
Kuom ndalo piero angʼwen pi nomedo pongʼo piny kendo kaka pi ne medore, motingʼo yie kalewore ewi pi.
Pi nogingore kendo omedore ahinya e piny kendo yie ne lewore ewi pi.
Pi nomedo gingore ahinya e piny, kendo gode maboyo duto man e bwo polo noimore.
Pi noimo gode kendo omedo gingore moloyo fut piero ariyo
Gik moko duto mangima mane ni e piny kaka winy, jamni, le mag bungu, gik mamol duto e piny kod ji duto notho.
Gimoro amora mangima mane odak e lowo motwo kendo mayweyo gi ume notho.
Gik moko duto mangima mane ni e piny notho duto; dhano, jamni gi le, gik moko duto mamol e lowo kod winy mafuyo e kor polo notiek e piny. Nowa kende ema nodongʼ kod joma ne ni kode e yie.
Pi nopongʼo piny kuom ndalo mia achiel kod piero abich.
To Nyasaye noparo Nowa gi le mag bungu kod jamni mane ni kode ei yie, kendo notugo yamo mokudho e piny mi pi nochako dwono.
Koro sokni manie bwo lowo kod dirise mag ataro moa e polo nolor, kendo koth moa e polo nochok.
Pi noduono e piny mos mos. Bangʼ ndalo mia achiel gi piero abich pi noduono,
kendo odiechiengʼ mar apar gabiriyo mar dwe mar abiriyo yie nobiro mochungʼ ewi gode mag Ararat.
Pi nomedo dwono nyaka dwe mar apar, to chiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe mar aparno wi gode nochako neno.
Bangʼ ndalo piero angʼwen Nowa noyawo dirisa mane oloso ei yie,
kendo nooro agak kendo nosiko kohuyo koni gi koni nyaka pi notwo e piny.
Eka nooro akuru mondo ofweny ka pi osedok chien e piny.
To akuru ne ok nyal yudo kama opiyoe nikech pi ne pod okwako piny duto; omiyo noduogo ir Nowa ei yie. Nowa notero lwete oko kendo ogame mine odwoge ire ei yie.
Norito bangʼ ndalo abiriyo moko kendo nooro akuru koa ei yie.
Kane akuru odwogo ire godhiambo, notingʼo it yiend zeituni mangʼich mopon e dhoge. Mano nomiyo Nowa ongʼeyo ni koro pi oseduono e piny.
Norito ndalo abiriyo moko kendo nochako ooro akuruno, to ne ok odwogo ire kendo.
Chiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe mokwongo ka Nowa ne ja-higni mia auchiel gachiel, pi noduono e piny. Eka Nowa noelo wi yie kendo noneno ni piny osetwo.
Kane ochopo tarik piero ariyo gabiriyo ema ne piny otuoe.
Eka Nyasaye nowacho ne Nowa niya,
“Wuog oko ei yie, in kaachiel gi chiegi, kod yawuoti kod mond yawuoti.
Gol oko kit gik mangima duto man kodi kaka winy, le kod gik moko duto mamol e lowo mondo ginywolre e piny kendo ginyaa kendo kwan-gi omedre e piny.”
Omiyo Nowa nowuok oko, kaachiel gi yawuote kod chiege kod mond yawuote.
Le duto kod gik moko duto mamol e lowo kod winy duto; gimoro amora mawuotho e piny, nowuok ei yie moro ka moro kaka kitgi obet.
Eka Nowa nogero kendo mar misango ne Jehova Nyasaye kendo nokawo le maler kod winy maler moko michamo, motimogo misango miwangʼo pep ewi kendono.
Jehova Nyasaye nowinjo suya madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar kendo nowacho e chunye niya, “Ok anachak akwongʼ piny kendo nikech dhano, kata obedo ni paro ma aye chunye opongʼ gi richo nyaka aa e tin-ne. Bende ok anachak atiek gik mangima kendo kaka asetimoni.
“Chwoyo gi keyo, ngʼich kod liet, oro kod chwiri, odiechiengʼ kod otieno ok nobed maonge nyaka giko piny.”
Eka Nyasaye nogwedho Nowa gi yawuote kowachonegi niya, “Nywolreuru kendo umedru mi upongʼ piny.
Luoro kod kihondko nomak le duto manie piny kod winy ma huyo e kor polo, gik moko duto mamol e lowo kod rech duto modak e nam nikech ochiwgi duto e lwetu.
Gimoro amora mangima kendo wuotho nobed chiembu. Mana kaka asemiyou alode, koro amiyou gik moko duto.”
To kik ucham ringʼo ma pod nigi remo kuome.
Kendo kuom remb ngimau to anachul kuor. Anachul kuor ne le duto kendo ne ngʼato ka ngʼato anachul kuor nikech ngima wadgi.
“Ngʼato angʼata mochwero remb dhano, en bende nyaka rembe chwer koa e lwet dhano; nikech e kit Nyasaye nochweyo dhano.
To un, nyaguru kendo umedru; nywolreuru e piny kendo upongʼe.”
Eka Nyasaye nowacho ne Nowa gi yawuote niya,
“Koro aketo singruokna kodu gi nyikwau,
kod gik mangima mane ni kodu kaka winy, jamni kod le mag bungu; kod mago duto mane owuok ei yie ma gin gik moko duto mangima modak e piny.
Atimo singruok kodi ni: Ok nachak atiek gik mangima kod pi bende ok nachak aketh piny kuom pi.”
Kendo Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Ma e ranyisi mar singruok ma atimo e kinda kodi kod gik mangima duto maun-go nyaka tiengʼ mabiro.
Aseketo lihudu mara e boche polo, kendo obiro bedo ranyisi mar singruok e kinda kod piny.
E kinde moro amora ma amiyo piny odudo kendo lihudu ochungʼ e boche polo,
anapar singruok e kinda kodi kaachiel gi gik mangima duto, tiengʼ ka tiengʼ. Pi ok nochak oketh gik mangima duto.
E kinde moro amora ma lihudu nochungʼ e boche polo, ananene kendo napar singruok mosiko e kind Nyasaye kod gik mangima duto manie piny kaka kitgi obet.”
Kuom mano, Nyasaye nowacho ne Nowa niya, “Ma e ranyisi mar singruok ma asetimo e kinda kod gik mangima duto manie piny.”
Yawuot Nowa mane owuok e yie ne gin: Shem, Ham kod Jafeth. (Ham ne wuon Kanaan.)
Yawuot Nowa adekgi ema oganda duto manie piny owuokie.
Nowa, ne en japur kendo en ema nokwongo pidho mzabibu mi olosogo divai.
Kane omadho divai moko mowuok e mzabibuno, nomer kendo nonindo duk ei hembe.
Ham wuon Kanaan noneno dug wuon kendo nodhi mowachone owetene ariyo mane ni oko.
To Shem kod Jafeth nokawo nanga mi oketo e gokgi; eka negidonjo ei hema ka giwuotho gi ka ngʼegi mi giumo dug wuon-gi. Wengegi ne ngʼiyo komachielo mondo omi kik gine dug wuon-gi.
Kane Nowa kongʼo orumo e wangʼe, mi ofwenyo gima wuode matin notimone,
nowacho niya, “Okwongʼ Kanaan! Enobed misumba, e bwo wasumbini mag owetene.”
Nomedo wacho niya, “Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Shem mondo opaki! Kanaan obed misumba Shem.
Nyasaye mondo omed Jafeth; Jafeth mondo odag e hembe mag Shem, kendo Kanaan obed misumbane.”
Bangʼ ataro mangʼongono, Nowa nodak higni mia adek gi piero abich.
Duto Nowa nodak kuom higni mia ochiko gi piero abich kendo bangʼe notho.
Ma e nonro mar Shem, Ham kod Jafeth ma yawuot Nowa ma bende nonywolo yawuowi bangʼ ataro mangʼongo.
Yawuot Jafeth ne gin: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshek kod Tiras.
Yawuot Gomer ne gin: Ashkenaz, Rifath, kod Togarma.
Yawuot Javan ne gin: Elisha, Tarshish, jo-Kitim kod jo-Rodan.
(Kuomgi ema ogendini modak e dho nembe nowuokie kadhi e pinjegi, dhoot ka dhoot, e pinjegi ka moro ka moro wacho dhogi.)
Yawuot Ham ne gin: Kush, Mizraim, Put kod Kanaan.
Yawuot Kush ne gin: Seba, Havila, Sabta, Rama kod Sabteka. Yawuot Rama ne gin: Sheba kod Dedan.
Kush ne en wuon Nimrod, mane en jalweny maratego e piny.
Ne en jadwar maratego e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Mano ema omiyo iwacho “Jadwar maratego e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ka Nimrod.”
Pinje mokwongo mag pinyruodhe ne gin Babulon, Erek, Akad kod Kalne e piny Shinar.
Nowuok kuno modhi e piny Asuria kuma nogeroe Nineve, Rehoboth-Ir, gi Kala,
kod Resen, dala maduongʼ, man e kind Nineve kod Kala.
Mizraim ne en wuon jo-Lud, jo-Anam, jo-Lehab, jo-Naftu,
Jo-Pathrus, jo-Kaslu (ma jo-Filistia nowuok kuomgi) kod jo-Kaftor.
Kanaan nonywolo Sidon wuode makayo kendo jo-Hiti,
jo-Jebus, jo-Amor, jo-Girgash,
jo-Hivi, jo-Arki, jo-Sini,
jo-Arvad, jo-Zemar kod jo-Hamath. (Bangʼe anywola mar jo-Kanaan noke e piny,
kendo tongʼ piny mar Kanaan nochakore Sidon kadhi Gerar nyaka Gaza kendo kadhi Sodom, Gomora, Adma kod Zeboim nyaka Lasha.)
Magi e yawuot Ham kuom dhoutgi, kod dhogi e pinjegi kod ogandagi.
Shem mane owadgi Jafeth matin ma bende en kwar jo-Eber bende nonywolo yawuowi.
Shem nonywolo: Elam, Ashur, Arfaksad, Lud kod Aram.
Aram nonywolo: Uz, Hul, Gether kod Meshek.
Arfaksad nonywolo Shela, to Shela nonywolo Eber.
Eber nonywolo yawuowi ariyo: Achiel nochak ni Peleg, nikech e ndalono ema nopogie piny; owadgi to ne nyinge Joktan.
Joktan nonywolo: Almodad, Shelef, Hazarmaveth, gi Jera,
Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla,
Obal, Abimael, gi Sheba
Ofir, Havila kod Jobab. Jogo duto ne gin yawuot Joktan.
(Pinygi mane gi dakie nochakore Mesha kochomo Sefar e gode man yo wuok chiengʼ.)
Magi e yawuot Shem kuom dhoutgi ka moro ka moro wacho dhogi giwegi.
Magi e yawuot Nowa kaluwore gi anywolagi e pinjegi. Kuomgi ema ogendini mopogore opogore nochakore bangʼ ataro.
E kindeno ogendini duto manie piny ne wacho dhok achiel kod weche machal.
Kane gidhi yo wuok chiengʼ, negiyudo pap moro e piny Shinar mine gidak kanyo.
Negiwacho e kindgi giwegi niya, “Biuru walosuru matafare kendo wawangʼ-gi mochiek maber.” Negitiyo gi matafare kar kite kendo lowo kar simiti.
Eka negiwacho niya, “Biuru wager dala maduongʼ man-gi ohinga mabor machopo nyaka e polo mondo omi walos nyingwa kendo kik wabed moke e kor piny.”
To Jehova Nyasaye nolor piny mondo one dala maduongʼ kod ohinga mabor mane dhano gero.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Ka gin oganda achiel, mawacho dhok achiel ema gisechako timo ma, kara gimoro amora ma gichano timo ok nyal tamogi.
Biuru, kendo wadhi mondo wapog dhogi mondo kik giwinjre dhok ngʼato gi ngʼato.”
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye nokeyogi koa kanyo nyaka e piny duto kendo ne giweyo gero dalano.
Mano emomiyo ne iluongo dalano ni Babel, nikech kanyo ema Jehova Nyasaye nopogoe dho ogendini kendo okeyogi e pinje duto.
Ma e nonro mar joka Shem. Higni ariyo bangʼ ataro ka Shem ja-higni mia achiel nonywolo Arfaksad.
Bangʼ ka Shem nosenywolo Arfaksad, nodak higni mia abich mi onywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Ka Arfaksad ne ja-higni piero adek gabich nonywolo Shela.
Kendo bangʼ kane osenywolo Shela, Arfaksad nodak kuom higni mia angʼwen gadek kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Kane Shela ja-higni piero adek, nonywolo Eber.
Kendo bangʼ kane osenywolo Eber, Shela nodak higni mia angʼwen gadek kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Kane Eber ja-higni piero adek gangʼwen, nonywolo Peleg.
Bangʼ kane osenywolo Peleg, Eber nodak kuom higni mia angʼwen gi piero adek kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Kane Peleg ja-higni piero adek, nonywolo Reu.
Bangʼ kane osenywolo Reu, Peleg nodak higni mia ariyo gochiko kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Kane Reu ja-higni piero adek gariyo nonywolo Serug.
Kendo bangʼ nywolo Serug, Reu nodak higni mia ariyo gabiriyo kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Kane Serug ja-higni piero adek, nonywolo Nahor.
Kendo bangʼ kane osenywolo Nahor, Serug nodak higni mia ariyo kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Kane Nahor ja-higni piero ariyo gochiko nonywolo Tera.
Kendo bangʼ kane osenywolo Tera, Nahor nodak higni mia achiel gapar gochiko kendo nonywolo yawuowi kod nyiri mamoko.
Bangʼ ka Tera nosedak higni piero abiriyo nonywolo Abram, Nahor kod Haran.
Ma e nonro mar Tera. Tera nonywolo Abram, Nahor kod Haran. Kendo Haran nonywolo Lut.
Haran notho e dalagi miluongo ni Ur manie piny Kaldea kane Tera wuon mare pod ngima.
Abram kod Nahor nokendo. Nying chi Abram ne Sarai kendo nying chi Nahor ne Milka; mane nyar Haran; wuon Milka kod Iska.
To Sarai ne en migumba; nikech ne ok onywol.
Tera nokawo Abram wuode, gi Lut nyakware ma ka wuode Haran kod Sarai, chi Abram mi giwuok Ur e piny Kaldea ka gidhi Kanaan. To kane gichopo Haran, negidak kanyo.
Tera nodak higni mia ariyo gabich kendo notho Haran.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Abram niya, “Dar iwe pinyu gi jou kod joodu mondo idhi e piny ma abiro nyisi.
“Anaketi oganda maduongʼ kendo anagwedhi; anami nyingi bed gi huma, kendo anami ibed gweth ne ji.
Anagwedh jogo ma gwedhi kendo anakwongʼ jogo makwongʼi, kendo ogendini duto manie piny nogwedhi nikech in.”
Omiyo Abram nowuok kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosenyise kendo Lut nodhi kode. Abram ne ja-higni piero abiriyo gabich kane owuok Haran.
Nokawo chiege Sarai, gi Lut wuod owadgi, gi mwandu duto mane gisechoko kod wasumbini duto mane gin-go Haran, kendo negichako wuoth mar dhi Kanaan mi negichopo kuno.
Abram nowuotho e piny mochopo Shekem e tiend yath maduongʼ mar More. E kindego jo-Kanaan nodak e pinyno.
Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyore ne Abram mi owachone niya, “Anami kothi pinyni.” Omiyo Abram nogero kendo mar misango kanyo ne Jehova Nyasaye mane osefwenyorene.
Noa kanyo modhi e piny gode ma yo wuok chiengʼ mar Bethel kendo nogero hembe e kind Bethel man yo podho chiengʼ to gi Ai man yo wuok chiengʼ. Kanyo nogeroe kendo mar misango ne Jehova Nyasaye kendo nolamo Jehova Nyasaye kanyo.
Eka Abram nochako wuoth kendo odhi nyime giwuoth kochomo Negev.
Koro kech nomako pinyno kendo Abram nodhi Misri mondo odhi odag kuno kuom kinde matin nikech kech ne duongʼ.
Kane ochiegni donjo Misri, nowacho ne Sarai chiege niya, “Angʼeyo kaka in dhako ma jaber.
Ka jo-Misri oneni, gibiro wacho, ‘Ma en chiege.’ Mi gininega to inires ngimani.
Wach ni in nyamera, mondo mi gitimna maber kendo ngimana obedie nikech in.”
Kane Abram ochopo Misri, jo-Misri noneno Sarai kaka ne en dhako ma jaber miwuoro.
Kendo kane jodong Farao oneno Sarai, negiwuoro berne ne Farao kendo nokawe motere kar dak ruoth.
Farao nomiyo Abram rit maber nikech Sarai, kendo nomiyo Abram rombe, dhok, pundane machwo gi mamon, wasumbini machwo gi mamon kod ngamia.
To Jehova Nyasaye nosando Farao gi joode gi tuoche madongo nikech Sarai chi Abram.
Omiyo Farao noluongo Abram kendo nopenje niya, “Angʼo ma isetimonani? Ere gima omiyo ne ok inyisa ni Sarai en chiegi?
Mara angʼo ne iwuonda ni Sarai en nyameru momiyo akawe mondo obed chiega? Chiegi eri, kawe mondo udhi.”
Eka Farao nogolo chik ne joge mondo ogol Abram, chiege gi gige duto kendo gikowogi oko mar pinyno.
Omiyo Abram nowuok Misri gi chiege kod Lut kod gik moko duto mane en-go kochomo Negev.
Abram koro nosebedo ja-mwandu ahinya mar jamni gi fedha kod dhahabu.
Nodhi nyime kod wuoth koa Negev kobuoro e yo nyaka nochopo Bethel, kumane okwongo geroe hembe e kind Bethel kod Ai,
kendo kama nokwongo geroe kendo mar misango. Kanyo Abram nolamoe Jehova Nyasaye.
To Lut ma bende ne wuotho kod Abram neni kod jamni matindo mathoth, gi kweth mag dhok kod hembe.
Kuonde mag kwath ne tin mane ok nyal romogi ka gidak kanyakla, nimar mwandu mane gin-go nomedore mane ok ginyal dak kaachiel.
Kendo dhawo nowuok e kind jakwadh Abram kod jokwadh Lut. E kindeno jo-Kanaan kod jo-Perizi ne pod odak e pinyno.
Omiyo Abram nowacho ne Lut niya, “Kik dhawo bed e kindwa kata e kind jokwadhi kod jokwadha nikech wan wede.
Donge piny duto ni e lweti? Ber wapogre, kidhi koracham to adhi korachwich; to kidhi korachwich to adhi koracham.”
Lut notingʼo wangʼe moneno paw Jordan duto ka nitie gi pi maber mana ka puoth Jehova Nyasaye, machalo gi piny Misri kochiko Zoar. (Mano notimore kane pok Jehova Nyasaye oketho Sodom kod Gomora.)
Omiyo Lut noyiero pewe duto mag Jordan kendo nowuok kochomo yo wuok chiengʼ. Mano e kaka ji ariyogi nopogore.
Abram nodak e piny Kanaan, to Lut nodak e kind mier madongo manie paw Jordan kendo nogero hembene machiegni gi Sodom.
Koro jo-Sodom ne gin joma okethore kendo matimo richo mag wangʼ teko e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Abram kane Lut osepogore kode niya, “Tingʼ wangʼi gi kuma in tiere kendo ingʼi yo nyandwat gi yo milambo, yo wuok chiengʼ kod yo podho chiengʼ.
Piny duto ma inenono abiro miyi gi nyikwayi nyaka chiengʼ.
Anami nyikwayi bed mangʼeny mana ka buru mae lowo; ma ka ngʼato nyalo kwano buru, to nyikwayi bende inyalo kwan.
Aa malo kendo iwuothi e tungʼ piny koni gi koni, nikech amiyigo.”
Omiyo Abram nopudho hembene mi odhi odak but yiende madongo mag Mamre ei Hebron, kamane ogeroe kendo mar misango ne Jehova Nyasaye.
E kindeno Amrafel ruodh Shinar, Ariok ruodh Elasar, Kedorlaomer ruodh Elam kod Tidal ruodh Goyim
nodhi kedo gi Bera ruodh Sodom, Birsha ruodh Gomora, Shinab ruodh Adma, Shemeber ruodh Zeboim kod ruodh Bela (ma tiende ni Zoar).
Ruodhi abichgi duto noriwo jolwenjgi ne kedo e Holo mar Sidim (miluongo ni Nam chumbi).
Kuom higni apar gariyo negisebedo e bwo loch Kedorlaomer, to e higa mar apar gadek ne gingʼanyo.
E higa mar apar gangʼwen, Kedorlaomer kod ruodhi mane oriwore kode nodhi omonjo kendo oloyo jo-Refai man Ashteroth Karnaim, jo-Zuzim e Ham gi jo-Emi man Shave Kiriathaim,
kendo jo-Hori manie gode mag Seir, mane ochwe nyaka El-Paran machiegni gi piny motimo ongoro.
Eka negidwogo chien kendo gidhi nyaka En Mishpat (ma tiende ni Kadesh), kendo negikawo piny jo-Amalek duto gi piny jo-Amor manodak Hazazon Tamar.
Eka ruodh Sodom, ruodh Gomora, ruodh Adma, ruodh Zeboim kod ruodh Bela (ma tiende ni Zoar) nowuok kendo oikore kedo moriedo jolwenjgi e Holo mar Sidim,
mondo oked gi Kedorlaomer ruodh Elam, Tidal ruodh Goyim, Amrafel ruodh Shinar kod Ariok ruodh Elasar mi ruodhi angʼwen-go nokedo gi ruodhi abich.
Holo mar Sidim nopongʼ gi buche mag chwodho, kendo kane ruodhi mag Sodom kod Gomora ringo, moko nopodho e buchego to moko noringo otony e gode.
Ruodhi angʼwen-go noyako gik moko duto mag Sodom kod Gomora kod chiembgi duto mi gidhi.
Bende negikawo Lut, wuod owadgi Abram kod mwandune duto nikech noyudo odak Sodom.
Ngʼat achiel mane oyudo otony nobiro kendo onyiso Abram ja-Hibrania wachni. E ndalogo Abram nodak e tiend yiende madongo mag Mamre ja-Amor mane omin Eshkol kod Aner, osiepe Abram.
Kane Abram owinjo ni watne oseter e twech, noluongo jotichge machwo motiegore mia adek gapar gaboro kendo olawogi nyaka Dan.
Gotieno Abram nopogo jotichnego e migepe mondo omonj ruodhigo kendo negiriembogi mi gilawogi nyaka Hoba, ma yo nyandwat mar Damaski.
Abram nodhi moomo gik moko duto mane joka odhigo kendo noreso Lut wuod owadgi kod mwandune duto kaachiel gi mon kod ji mamoko.
Bangʼ ka Abram noduogo koseloyo Kedorlaomer kod ruodhi mane oriwore kode, ruodh Sodom nobiro mondo orom kode ei Holo mar Shave (ma tiende ni Holo mar Ruoth).
Eka Melkizedek ruodh Salem nokelo makati gi divai. Ne en jadolo mar Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo,
kendo nogwedho Abram kowacho niya, “Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo, Jachwech polo kod piny ogwedhi, in Abram.
Kendo ogwedh Nying Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo mane oketo wasiki e lweti.” Eka Abram nomiye achiel kuom apar mar gik moko duto.
Ruodh Sodom nowacho ne Abram niya, “Miya ji to idongʼ gi gik moko duto.”
To Abram nowacho ne ruodh Sodom, “Asetingʼo lweta ne Jehova Nyasaye, ma en Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo, Jachwech polo gi piny kendo asekwongʼora
ni ok nakaw giri moro, kata mana tol kata pat kira, mondo kik chiengʼ moro iwachi ni, ‘An ema ne amiyo Abram obedo jamoko.’
Ok abi kawo gimoro to mana ma joga osechamo kod pok ma joga kaka Aner, Eshkol kod Mamre onego oyudi. Onego giyud pokgi.”
Bangʼ ma, wach Jehova Nyasaye nobiro ne Abram e fweny ni, “Abram, kik iluor. An e okumbani, kendo pokni maduongʼ moloyo.”
To Abram nowacho niya, “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, en angʼo ma dimiya to pod asiko ka aonge nyathi kendo jacham mwanduna en mana Eliezer ja-Damaski?”
Kendo Abram nowacho niya, “Pod ok imiya nyithindo; omiyo achiel kuom wasumbini maga ema nobed jacham girkeni maga.”
Eka wach Jehova Nyasaye nobirone kawacho niya, “Ngʼatni ok nobed jacham girkeni magi, to wuowi ma owuok e ringri iwuon ema nobed jacham girkeni magi.”
Nogole oko mowachone niya, “Rang polo malo kendo kwan sulwe ka dipo ni inyalo kwanogi.” Eka nowachone niya, “Omiyo mano e kaka nyikwayi nobedi.”
Abram noyie kuom Jehova Nyasaye, mi Jehova Nyasaye nokwane kaka ngʼama kare.
Kendo nowachone niya, “An e Jehova Nyasaye manogoloi Ur piny jo-Kaldea mondo amiyigo obed girkeni mari.”
To Abram nopenje niya, “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ere kaka anyalo ngʼeyo ni obiro bedo girkeni mara?”
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye nonyise niya, “Kelna roya bwongʼ, diel kod im mahikgi adek, adek kaachiel gi akuch odugla kod nyathi akuru.”
Abram nokelone magi duto, nongʼadogi diriyo moro ka moro kendo okelo nusegi moro ka moro omanyore gi wadgi, to kata kamano, winy ne ok ongʼado.
Eka achudhe nopiyo e ringʼogo, to Abram noriembogi.
Kane chiengʼ podho, Abram nogore e nindo matut kendo mudho mandiwa noime.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Ngʼe malongʼo ni nyikwayi nobed jodak e piny moro ma ok margi, kendo nolokgi wasumbini mi nosandgi malit kuom higni mia angʼwen.
To anakum piny ma noketgi wasumbini, bangʼe giniwuogi gia gi mwandu mogundho.
To kata kamano, inidag amingʼa mi itho gi kwe kiluwo kwereni.
E tiengʼ mar angʼwen nyikwayi nodwogi ka, nikech e ndalogo ema noyud ka richo jo-Amor osemedore moromo kum.”
Kane chiengʼ osepodho kendo piny oyuso, tago mar mach madum iro kod chuk mach maliel nothinyore mi okadho e kind lemo mag gik manoyangʼ ka.
Odiechiengno Jehova Nyasaye notimo singruok gi Abram mowachone niya, “To ne nyikwayi, amiyogi pinyni, koa e aora mar Misri nyaka aora maduongʼ mar Yufrate.
Bende amiyogi pinje kaka piny jo-Keni, jo-Kenizi, jo-Kadmon,
jo-Hiti, jo-Perizi, jo-Refai,
jo-Amor, jo-Kanaan, jo-Girgash, kod jo-Jebus.”
Koro Sarai chi Abram ne pok onywolone nyithindo. To ne en gi misumba ma nyako ma nyar Misri, ma nyinge ne Hagar;
omiyo Sarai nowacho ne Abram niya, “Jehova Nyasaye ok osemiya nyithindo. Dhiyo mondo iriwri gi jatichna ma nyako; dipoka ayudo joga koa kuome.” Abram noyie gi wach Sarai.
Kane oyudo Abram osedak Kanaan kuom higni apar, Sarai chiege nokawo misumbane ma nyako Misri, ma nyinge Hagar kendo nochiwe ne chwore mondo obed chiege.
Abram noriwore gi Hagar kendo nomako ich. Kane ofwenyo ni en gi ich, nochako chayo ruodhe madhako.
Eka Sarai nowacho ne Abram niya, “In ema ikelona achayani. Ne aketo jatichna e lweti, kendo ka koro ongʼeyo ni osemako ich to ochaya mad Jehova Nyasaye bed jangʼad bura e kinda kodi.”
Abram nodwoke niya, “Jatichni ni e lweti, tim kode gima iparo ni ber.” Eka Sarai nosando Hagar; mi noringo oa e wangʼe.
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye noyudo Hagar machiegni gi soko e thim; ne en soko manie bath yo madhi Shur.
Kendo nopenjo niya, “Hagar jatich Sarai, ia kanye to idhi kanye?” Hagar nodwoke niya, “Aringo aa e wangʼ Sarai matiyone.”
Eka malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Dogi ir ngʼat ma itiyone kendo ichiwri e lwete.”
Malaika nomedo wachone niya, “Abiro medo ogandani mabed mangʼeny ma ok nyal kwan.”
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nomedo wachone niya, “Koro in gi ich kendo ibiro nywolo nyathi ma wuowi, mi inichake Ishmael, nikech Jehova Nyasaye osewinjo chandruokni.
Obiro bedo ngʼama kwiny ka kanyna mapok obo; nobed mamon gi ji duto, kendo ji duto bende nobed mamon kode, mi nodag komon gi owetene duto.”
Bangʼeno Hagar nochako Nyasaye mane osewuoyo kode nying ni El-roi (ma tiende ni Jehova Nyasaye Maneno); nimar nowacho niya, “Koro aseneno Jalno manena.”
Mano emomiyo sokono nochaki ni Beer-Lahai-Roi; kendo pod entiere nyaka chil kawuono, e kind Kadesh kod Bered.
Kuom mano Hagar nonywolone Abram nyathi ma wuowi kendo nochako nyinge ni Ishmael.
Abram ne ja-higni piero aboro gauchiel kane Hagar onywolone Ishmael.
Kane Abram ne ja-higni piero ochiko gochiko, Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyorene mi nowachone niya, “An Nyasaye Maratego; bed ngʼama odimbore e nyima kendo maonge ketho.
Abiro guro singruokna e kinda kodi kendo anamed kothi obed mangʼeny.”
Abram nopodho auma e nyim Nyasaye kendo Nyasaye nowachone niya,
“Singruok matimo kodi ema: Inibed wuon ogendini mangʼeny.
Ok nochak oluongi ni Abram; to enoluongi ni Ibrahim, nimar aseketi ibedo wuon ogendini mangʼeny.
Anamiyi nyikwayo mathoth; ginidog ogendini madongo kendo ruodhi nowuog kuomgi.
Anagur singruokna manyaka chiengʼ e kinda kodi gi nyikwayi kod tienge mabiro, mi anabed Nyasachi kendo Nyasach nyikwayi nyaka chiengʼ.
Piny Kanaan duto makoro udakieni anamiyi kaachiel gi nyikwayi mondo obed girkeni manyaka chiengʼ kendo anabed Nyasachgi.”
Eka Nyasaye nowacho ne Ibrahim niya, “In kaachiel gi nyikwayi kod tienge mabiro nyaka rit singruokna.
Singruokna manyaka iriti, in kaachiel gi nyikwayi ema: Ngʼato ka ngʼata madichwo e kindu nyaka ter nyangu.
Nyaka teru nyangu kendo ma nobed ranyisi mar singruokna e kinda kodu.
Kuom tienge mabiro ngʼato angʼata madichwo monywol e uteu kata ongʼiew gi pesa ma ok kothu nyaka ter nyangu, e odiechiengʼ mar aboro bangʼ nywolne.
Nyaka tergi nyangu bedni onywolgi e uteu kata ongʼiewogi gi pesa. Singruokna man kuom ringreu nyaka bed mosiko.
Ngʼato angʼata madichwo, mane ok oter nyangu e ringruok, nogol oko kuom jogi; nikech oseketho singruokna.”
Nyasaye nomedo wachone Ibrahim niya, “Koro ok inichak iluong Sarai chiegi ni Sarai, to iniluonge ni Sara.
Anagwedhe kendo anamiyi nyathi ma wuowi koa kuome. Anagwedhe mi nobed min ogendini; kendo ruodhi mag ogendini noa kuome.”
Ibrahim nopodho auma; monyiero kowacho e chunye niya, “Bende ngʼama ja-higni mia achiel nyalo nywolo wuowi? Bende Sara ma ja-higni piero ochiko nyalo nywolo nyathi?”
Kendo Ibrahim nowacho ne Nyasaye niya, “Mano nyalo mana timore kaponi Ishmael odak e bwo ngʼwono mari!”
Eka Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “Ooyo, en mana Sara chiegi ema nonywolni wuowi, kendo iniluong nyinge ni Isaka. Anaket singruokna kode kaka singruok manyaka chiengʼ ne nyikwaye.
To bende asewinjo kwayo mikwayo nikech Ishmael, omiyo anagwedhe, kendo anamiye nyithindo gi nyikwayo mangʼeny.
Makmana singruokna abiro chopo gi Isaka ma Sara biro nywolone e kinde maka ma e higa mabiro.”
Kane Nyasaye osetieko wuoyo kod Ibrahim, noweye modhi.
E odiechiengno Ibrahim nokawo wuode Ishmael kod jogo duto machwo monywol e ode kata mane ongʼiewo gi pesa, kendo noterogi nyangu, mana kaka Nyasaye nonyise.
Ibrahim ne ja-higni piero ochiko gochiko kane otere nyangu,
to wuode Ishmael ne ja-higni apar gadek.
Ibrahim kod wuode Ishmael noter nyangu odiechiengno.
Kendo chwo duto mane ni e od Ibrahim, kaachiel gi monywol e ode kata ma ongʼiewo, bende noter nyangu kode.
Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyore ne Ibrahim machiegni kod yiende madongo mag Mamre kane obet e dho hembe kar odiechiengʼ tir.
Ibrahim notingʼo wangʼe malo kendo noneno ji adek machwo kochungʼ bute. Kane onenogi, noringo matek koa e dho hema mondo oromnegi kendo nopodho piny auma e nyimgi.
Nowacho niya, “Ruodha ka ayudo ngʼwono e wangʼi, to kik ikadh jatichni.
Rituru mondo okel pi matin, mondo uluokgo tiendu eka uywe e tiend yien-ni.
We ayudnue chiemo moro matin mondo ucham omednu teko eka udhi nyime gi wuodhu mosekelou ir misumbauni.” Negidwoke niya, “Mano ber, tim kamano.”
Omiyo Ibrahim noreto kadhi ir Sara ei hema mowachone niya, “Kaw mogo mayom gorogoro adek, idwale kendo itedgo makati piyo piyo.”
Eka noringo odhi e dipo kendo noyiero nyarwath mopugno kendo nomiyo jatich molose piyo.
Eka Ibrahim nokawo mo gi chak mar adila kod ring nyarwath mane osetedi maber mi oketogi e nyimgi. Kane gichiemo, Ibrahim nochungʼ butgi e tiend yath.
Negipenjo Ibrahim niya, “Ere Sara chiegi?” Ibrahim nodwokogi niya, “En ei hema.”
Eka achiel kuomgi nowacho niya, “Adier anaduog iri e kinde maka ma higa mabiro kendo Sara chiegi biro nywolo nyathi ma wuowi.” To kara Sara ne winjo wachno kobet e dho hema e ngʼe welogo.
Ibrahim kod Sara nosebedo moti kendo hikgi noniangʼ kendo ndalo Sara mag nywol nosekadho.
Omiyo Sara nohum kanyiero gie chunye niya, “Bende ma ditimre adier ka an kod ruodha wasedoko joma oti ka ma?”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nopenjo Ibrahim niya, “Angʼo momiyo Sara nonyiero kawacho ni, ‘Bende danywol nyathi kaka asetini?’
Bende nitie gimoro amora matek ne Jehova Nyasaye? Abiro duogo iri e kinde mowinjore e higa mabiro kendo Sara biro nywolo nyathi ma wuowi.”
Omiyo Sara noluor mokwer niya, “Ne ok anyiero.” To kata kamano Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “En adier ni ninyiero.”
Kane jogo owuok mondo odhi, Ibrahim nowuok kodgi ka kowogi ka gichomo Sodom.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Bende dapand ne Ibrahim gima adwaro timo?
Adieri Ibrahim biro bedo oganda maduongʼ kendo maratego, kendo ogendini duto manie piny nogwedhi nikech en.
Nimar aseyiere mondo ochik nyithinde kod nyikwaye mondo oluw yore Jehova Nyasaye ka gitimo timbe mabeyo kendo makare. Kamano Jehova Nyasaye biro timo ne Ibrahim gik moko duto mane osingone.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Ywak mi ywaknego Sodom gi Gomora duongʼ kendo richogi ngʼeny,
kuom mano abiro dhi mondo ane ka gik magisetimo richo kaka ywak osechopo ira, eka abiro ngʼeyo adiera.”
Jogo nowuok kendo negiluwo yo madhi Sodom, to Jehova Nyasaye nodongʼ kochungʼ e nyim Ibrahim.
Eka Ibrahim nosudo machiegni kode kendo openjo niya, “Bende ditiek joma kare machal gi joma timbegi richo?
Kaponi nitie ji piero abich maonge ketho e dalano? Dikethe koso diweye nikech ngima ji makare piero abichgo?
Ok dineg joma onge ketho machal gi joma oketho, adier ok inyal timo kamano nikech kaponi itimo kamano to joma onge ketho diyud kum mana maromre gi joma nigi ketho. To mano ok nyalre nikech jangʼad bura nyaka ngʼad bura kare?”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Ka ayudo ji piero abich maonge ketho e dala mar Sodom, to abiro reso dalano nikech joma onge kethogo.”
Eka Ibrahim nowacho kendo niya, “Kaka koro asebedo gichir ma awuoyo gi Ruoth Nyasaye, kata obedo ni ok an gimoro to makmana lowo kod buru.
To ka dipo ni kwan joma onge ketho oromo mana ji piero angʼwen gabich, dikech dalano nikech ji abich kende?” Jehova Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “Kayudo ji piero angʼwen gabich kanyo, to ok nakethe.”
Ibrahim nomedo wuoyo kode kendo niya, “To ka dipo ni ji piero angʼwen kende ema oyudore kanyo?” Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “Kayudo ji piero angʼwen kanyo, to ok nakethe.”
Eka Ibrahim nomedo wachone niya, “Kik isin koda, to weya aweya awuo. To ka dipo ni ji piero adek ema oyudi e dalano?” Jehova Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “Ok nakethi ka ayudo ji piero adek maonge ketho kanyo.”
Ibrahim nowacho niya, “Kaka koro asebedo gi chir ma wuoyo gi Ruoth Nyasaye, angʼoma ditim ka ji piero ariyo ema oyudore e dalano?” Jehova Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “Nikech ji piero ariyo maonge ketho ok anakethe.”
Eka Ibrahim nowacho niya, “Mad Jehova Nyasaye kik sin koda, to oyie awach wach achiel mogik. Ka dipo ni ji apar kende ema oyudi e dalano?” Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “Nikech ji apar maonge ketho ok natiek dalano.”
Kane Jehova Nyasaye osetieko wuoyo kod Ibrahim, nowuok kendo Ibrahim nodok dala.
Malaika ariyogo nochopo Sodom kar angʼich welo kendo Lut noyudo obet e dhoranga dalano. Kane onenogi, noa malo mondo mi opodho auma e nyimgi.
Nowachonegi niya, “Jodongo, yieru uraw e od jatichu mondo ulwok tiendeu kendo unindi eka kiny unyalo dhi gokinyi.” To negiwacho niya, “Ooyo, wabiro nindo mana e laru kae.”
To Lut nonano ni nyaka ginind e ode. Eka ne olosonegi chiemo, kendo notedonigi makati ma ok oketie thowi mi gichiemo.
Kane pok gidhi e nindo, chwo madongo kod matindo moa kuonde duto mag dala maduongʼ mar Sodom, nobiro molworo odno.
Negiluongo Lut ka gipenje niya, “Ere chwo mane obiro iri ka gotieno? Golnwagi oko kae wadwa terore kodgi.”
Kuom mano, Lut noloro dhoot mowuok odhi irgi,
kendo nowachonegi niya, “Ooyo jowadwa, kik utim tim makweroni!
Koro neuru, an kod nyiri ariyo mapok ongʼeyo chwo; weuru agolnugi oko mondo utim kodgi kaka uhero; to kik utim marach ni jogi, nimar gin wenda.”
Negidwoke niya, “Wuogi e nyimwa, in nibiro ka kaka jadak kendo koro idwaro ketori kaka jangʼad bura!” Wabiro timoni marach moloyogi, omiyo ne gidhiro Lut giteko mondo gi muk dhoot.
To jogo mane ni e otgo noywayo Lut mi odwoko e ot kendo giloro dhoot.
Eka negimiyo jomanenie dhoot oko-go obedo muofni, jomatindo gi jomadongo, mane ok ginyal yudo dhoot.
Ji ariyogo nowacho ni Lut niya, “Bende in gi ngʼato moro kae kaka chwo nyigi, yawuoti kata nyigi, kata ngʼat moro amora e dala maduongʼni ma watni? Golgi oko kae,
nikech wadhi ketho dalani. Ywak ma iywak nego dalani osebedo malich e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, omiyo oseorowa mondo wakethe.”
Kuom mano Lut nodhi mowuoyo gi chwo nyige mane osetimo winjruok mar kend gi nyige. Nowachonegi niya, “Timuru piyo piyo mondo uwuog oko e dalani, nikech Jehova Nyasaye oseikore mar ketho dala maduongʼni!” To chwo nyige ne paro ni otugo.
Kane ochopo kogwen, malaika nojiwo Lut, kawacho niya, “Tim piyo kaw chiegi gi nyigi ariyo man kae, nono to ubiro rumo ka dala maduongʼni iketho.”
Kane pod gidigni, malaika ariyogo nomako lwete gi lwet chiege kod lwet nyige ariyo ma gigologi oko mar dala maduongʼni, nikech Jehova Nyasaye nokechogi.
Piyo piyo nono kane gisegologi oko, achiel kuom malaikago nowacho niya, “Ring utony ne ngimau! Kik ungʼi chien, kendo kik uchung kamoro amora e pap; tonyuru udhi e gode nono, to ubiro lal!”
To Lut nowachonegi niya, “Ooyo, Ruodha, asayou!
Jatichu oseyudo kech e wangʼu, kendo usenyisa ngʼwono maduongʼ kuom reso ngimana. To kata kamano ok anyal ringo nyaka e gode; nono to chandruogni ojuka mi anyalo atho.
Ne, nitie dala moro matin machiegni manyalo ringo mondo atonyie. En mana dalano omiyo yienwauru mondo omi wachop kuno kendo wares ngimawa.”
Nowachone niya, “Mano ber, kwayonino bende abiro rwako; kendo ok naketh dala miwachono.
Kuom mano ring idhi kuno piyo, nikech ok anyal timo gimoro nyaka ichop kuno.” (Mano ema omiyo noluong dalano ni Zoar.)
Lut nochopo Zoar gokinyi kar onyango.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye noolo kite maliel makakni koa e polo mowangʼo Sodom gi Gomora.
Kamano noketho mier madongogo gi pawno duto, kaachiel gi ji duto manodak e miergo kod gik moko duto manyak e lowo.
To chi Lut nolokore mongʼiyo chien, kendo nolokore siro mar chumbi.
Kinyne gokinyi, Ibrahim nomondo kama ne ochungʼie nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Nongʼiyo mwalo yo Sodom gi Gomora, kod pewege duto kendo noneno iro maduongʼ koa e pinyno, mana ka iro mar mach maduongʼ.
Kuom mano ka Nyasaye noketho mier mag pap, noparo Ibrahim kendo nogolo Lut oko mar masirano mane oketho mier mane odakie.
Lut kod nyige ariyo nowuok Zoar kendo negidhi gidak e gode nikech noluor dak Zoar. En kod nyige ariyo negidak e rogo.
Chiengʼ moro achiel nyar Lut maduongʼ nowacho ne nyamin matin niya, “Wuonwa koro oseti, kendo onge ngʼama nyalo kendowa kaka chik mar piny duto dwaro.
We wami wuonwa kongʼo omadhi kendo ka osemer, to wariwre kode kendo wanywol nyithindo mondo kik ogandawa lal.”
Gotienono negimiyo wuon-gi kongʼo mi omer, kendo nyare maduongʼ nodonjo moriwore kode. Lut nomer mane ok ongʼeyo seche mano ochako kata tieko riwore gi nyare.
Kinyne nyako maduongʼ ne owacho ne nyako matin niya, “Otieno mokadho ne ariwora gi wuonwa. Omiyo we wamiye kongʼo kendo kawuono mi omer mondo idhi iriwri kode kendo wanywol nyithindo mondo kik ogandawa lal.”
Kuom mano negimiyo wuon-gi kongʼo momer gotieno kendo nyako matin nodonjo ma oriwore kode. Kendo ne ok ongʼeyo seche mane nyare matin-no ochako kata otieko riwore kode.
Kuom mano nyi Lut ariyogo nomako ich kod wuon-gi.
Nyako maduongʼ nonywolo wuowi, kendo nochake ni Moab, en e kwar jo-Moab ma kawuono.
Nyako matin bende nonywolo wuowi kendo nochake ni Ben-Ami; en e kwar jo-Amon.
Ibrahim nowuotho moa kanyo modhi e gwenge mag Negev kendo odak e kind Kadesh kod Shur. Nodak Gerar kuom kinde matin,
kendo kanyo ema Ibrahim nowachonegi niya, “Sara en nyaminwa.” Eka Abimelek ruodh Gerar nooro joote moomone Sara kendo nokawe kaka chiege.
To Nyasaye nofwenyore ne Abimelek e lek gotieno kendo owachone niya, “Dine ber ka itho nikech dhako ma ikawono; en chi ngʼato.”
To ne oyudo Abimelek pok oriwore kode. Eka nowacho niya, “Jehova Nyasaye bende dineg joma onge ketho?
Donge ne onyisa ni ma nyaminwa; kendo donge Sara ema nowachona ni ma owadwa? Asetimo ma giparo malongʼo kod lwedo maler.”
Eka Nyasaye nowachone e lek niya, “Ee angʼeyo ni nitimo ma kod paro malongʼo omiyo aseriti mondo kik iketh e nyima. Mano ema nomiyo ok ayieni mondo iriwri kode.
Koro dwokne Ibrahim chiege, nimar en janabi, kendo obiro lamoni mi ok initho. To ka ok idwoke, to bed gadiera ni in gi jogi duto ubiro tho.”
Kinyne gokinyi mangʼich Abimelek noluongo jotichne duto kendo kane onyisogi gik moko duto mane osetimore, negibedo maluor ahinya.
Eka Abimelek noluongo Ibrahim ire mi openje niya, “Angʼo ma isetimonwani? Ere gima rach ma asetimoni ma omiyo isekelo richo maduongʼni kuoma kod pinyruodha? Isetimona gik moko ma ok onego tim ne ngʼato.”
Kendo Abimelek nopenjo Ibrahim niya, “En angʼo miparo momiyo itimo gini?”
Ibrahim nodwoke niya, “Ne awacho e chunya ni, ‘Adier luor mar Nyasaye onge ka, kendo gibiro nega nikech chiega.’
To bende, kuom adier en nyaminwa, ma nyar wuora, to minewa ema opogore; kendo ne akende obedo chiega.
Kendo kane Nyasaye ochika mondo awuog e od wuora mondo awuoth e pinje mamoko, nawachone Sara ni, ‘Mae kaka inyalo nyisa ni ihera: Kamoro amora ma wadhiye wach niya, “An owadu.” ’ ”
Eka Abimelek nokelo rombe gi dhok kod wasumbini mamon kod machwo kendo nomiyogi Ibrahim kendo Abimelek nodwokone Ibrahim Sara chiege.
Kendo Abimelek nowacho niya, “Pinya duto ni e lweti; dag kamoro amora ma ihero.”
Nonyiso Sara bende niya, “Asemiyo owadu shekel mar fedha maromo alufu achiel mondo obed ranyisi ne jou duto ni ionge gi ketho; nikech ok isetimo gimoro amora marach.”
Eka Ibrahim nolamo Nyasaye, kendo Nyasaye nochango Abimelek, chiege kod jotichne ma nyiri mondo omi ginywol nyithindo kendo,
nimar noyudo ka Jehova Nyasaye osedino ii mon man e od Abimelek nikech Sara chi Ibrahim.
Koro Jehova Nyasaye notimo ngʼwono ne Sara kaka nosewacho kendo Jehova Nyasaye nochopo kare singruok mane osenyiso Sara.
Sara nomako ich kendo nonywolone Ibrahim wuowi ka Ibrahim hike oniangʼ, mana e kinde mane Nyasaye osingore.
Ibrahim nochako wuowi mane Sara onywolone ni Isaka.
Kane wuode Isaka nigi ndalo aboro, Ibrahim notere nyangu kaka Nyasaye nochike.
Ibrahim ne ja-higni mia achiel kane onywol Isaka wuode.
Sara nowacho niya, “Nyasaye osekelona mor kendo ji duto mowinjo ma biro bedo mamor koda.”
Kendo nomedo wacho niya, “Ngʼama dine nyis Ibrahim ni Sara didhodh nyathi? To koro asenywolone wuowi ka en ngʼama oti.”
Nyathino nodongo kendo nowe dhoth, kendo chiengʼ mane Isaka oweyoe dhoth Ibrahim notimo nyasi maduongʼ.
Chiengʼ moro Sara noneno ka Ishmael mane Hagar nyar Misri onywolo ne Ibrahim ka jotugo gi Isaka kendo jare.
Omiyo Sara nowacho ne Ibrahim niya, “Riemb dhako ma misumbani kod wuode, nimar wuod dhako ma misumbani ok nobed jacham girkeni kaachiel gi wuoda Isaka.”
Gino nochwanyo Ibrahim ahinya nikech wachno neni kuom wuode.
To Nyasaye nowacho ne Ibrahim niya, “Kik chunyi bed gi chwanyruok nikech wuodi Ishmael kod jatichni madhako, Hagar. Winj gimoro amora ma Sara jaodi wachoni; nikech kuom wuodi Isaka ema kothi duto nowuogie.
Abiro miyo wuod jatichni madhako bed oganda maduongʼ nikech en bende en rembi.”
Kinyne gokinyi mangʼich Ibrahim nokawo chiemo kod puga mar pi kendo nomiyo Hagar. Noketonegi e goke kendo ogole odhi gi wuode. Hagar nowuok modhi kendo nobayo abaya e thim mar Bersheba.
Ka pi mane ni e puga norumo, noketo nyathi e tiend bungu.
Eka nowuotho odhi nyime kama dirom fut adek kendo nobedo piny kanyo, mi nowacho e chunye niya, “Ok anyal rango nyathi katho.” Kendo kane obet machiegni kanyo, nyathi nochako ywak.
Nyasaye nowinjo nyathi kaywak kendo malaika mar Nyasaye noluongo Hagar gie polo kendo owachone niya, “Angʼo marach, Hagar? Kik iluor; Nyasaye osewinjo nyathi kaywak kama onindeno.
Kaw nyathi kendo itingʼe, nikech anami nyikwaye obed oganda maduongʼ.”
Eka Nyasaye noyawo wengene kendo oneno soko mar pi. Kuom mano nodhi mopongʼo puga gi pi kendo nomiyo nyathi omodho.
Nyasaye ne ni kod wuowino kane odongo kendo nodak e thim mobedo jadwar molony.
Kane odak e thim mar Paran, min mare noyudone nyako mokendo koa e piny Misri.
E kindeno Abimelek kod Fikol jatend jolweny mar Abimelek nowacho ne Ibrahim niya, “Nyasaye ni kodi e gimoro amora mitimo.
Koro kwongʼrina e nyim Nyasaye kawuono ni ok nitimna gimoro marach kata ne nyithinda kata ne nyikwaya. Emomiyo koro timna ngʼwono kaachiel gi pinyni ma intie kaka jadak mana kaka an bende ne atimoni maber.”
Ibrahim nodwoke niya, “Asingora ni anatim kamano.”
Ibrahim nonyiso Abimelek chandruok mar soko mar pi ma jotich Abimelek nomaye githuon.
To Abimelek nowacho niya, “Ok angʼeyo ngʼama osetimo mae. Ne ok inyisa, ma kawuono ema akwongo winje.”
Kuom mano Ibrahim nokelo rombe kod dhok mi omiyogi Abimelek, kendo ji ariyogi notimo singruok.
Ibrahim nowalo rombe ma sibini abiriyo mag kwethge,
kendo Abimelek nopenjo Ibrahim niya, “Ere tiend rombe ma sibini abiriyo ma isewalogi?”
Ibrahim nodwoke niya, “Kaw nyirombe abiriyogi kaka ranyisi ni nakunyo sokoni.”
Mano emomiyo kanyo iluongo ni Bersheba nikech ji ariyogo notimo singruok kanyo.
Bangʼ ka winjruok nosetim Bersheba, Abimelek kod Fikol ma jatend jolwenje nodok e piny jo-Filistia.
Ibrahim nopidho yien moro Bersheba, kendo kanyo noluongo nying Jehova Nyasaye, Nyasaye manyaka chiengʼ.
Kendo Ibrahim nodak e piny jo-Filistia kuom kinde mangʼeny.
Bangʼ kinde moko Nyasaye notemo Ibrahim. Noluonge niya, “Ibrahim!” Eka nodwoke niya, “Eri an ka.”
Eka Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Kaw wuodi, wuodi ma miderma Isaka, kendo mi ihero mondo idhigo e gwengʼ mar Moria. Chiwe kanyo kaka misango miwangʼo pep ewi got moro ma abiro nyisi.”
Kinyne gokinyi mangʼich Ibrahim noa malo kendo noiko pundane ne wuoth. Nodhi kod jotijene ariyo kaachiel gi Isaka wuode. Kane osengʼado yien moromo tiyogo e misango miwangʼo pep, nochako wuoth madhi kamane Nyasaye osenyise.
E odiechiengʼ mar adek Ibrahim notingʼo wangʼe moneno kanyo gi kuma bor.
Nowacho ne jotije niya, “Dongʼuru kae gi punda ka an kod Isaka wadhi kucha. Wadhi lemo kendo eka wabiro duogo iru.”
Ibrahim nokawo yien mar misango miwangʼo pep kendo nomiyo Isaka, to en owuon notingʼo mach kod pala ka ji ariyogo ne wuotho.
Isaka notingʼo dwonde mopenjo wuon-gi Ibrahim niya, “Wuora?” Ibrahim nodwoke niya, “En angʼo wuoda?” Eka Isaka nopenje niya, “Mach kod yien nikae, to ere nyaim mar misango miwangʼo pep?”
Ibrahim nodwoke niya, “Wuoda, Nyasaye owuon ema biro chiwo nyaim mar misango miwangʼo pep.” Bangʼ mano negidhi nyime giwuodhgi kanyakla.
Kane gichopo kumane Nyasaye osenyiso Ibrahim, Ibrahim nogero kendo mar misango kanyo kendo nopango yien e wiye motweyo Isaka wuode kendo nopiele ewi kendo mar misango, ewi yien.
Eka notero lwete kendo okawo pala mondo oneg-go wuode.
To malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye noluonge gie polo niya, “Ibrahim! Ibrahim!” Eka nodwoke niya, “Eri an ka.”
Malaika nowachone niya, “Kik iket lweti kuom wuodi, kendo kik itimne gimoro amora. Koro asengʼeyo ni iluoro Nyasaye, nikech ok isetama e wuodi ma miderma.”
Ibrahim notingʼo wangʼe mopo koneno im komoko gitungene e bungu. Nodhi mokawo im kendo ochiwo kaka misango miwangʼo pep kar wuode.
Omiyo Ibrahim nochako kanyo ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Jachiwo kendo nyaka chil kawuono iwacho niya, “E God Jehova Nyasaye ema nochiwe.”
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nochako luongo Ibrahim gie polo,
mi Jehova Nyasaye owacho niya, “Akwongʼora gi nyinga awuon, ni nikech isetimona ma kendo ok isetama e wuodi ma miderma,
abiro gwedhi adier kendo anami nyikwayi bed mangʼeny ka sulwe mae polo kendo ka kuoyo manie dho nam. Nyikwayi nokaw mier mag jowasikgi mondo obed margi,
kendo ogendini duto manie piny nogwedhi kokalo e kothi, nikech isewinjo wachna.”
Eka Ibrahim nodok ir jotije, kendo giduto negiwuok ka gidok Bersheba. Kendo Ibrahim nodak Bersheba.
Bangʼ kinde moko, Ibrahim noyudo wach niya, “Milka bende koro osenywolone owadu Nahor yawuowi ma gin:
Uz wuowi makayo, Buz owadgi, Kemuel (wuon Aram),
Kesed, Hazo, Pildash, Jidlaf kod Bethuel.”
Bethuel nonywolo Rebeka. Yawuowi aborogo ema Milka nonywolone Nahor owadgi Ibrahim.
Jatichne ma nyako ma nyinge Reuma bende nonywolone yawuowi, ma gin: Teba, Gaham, Tahash kod Maaka.
Sara nodak kuom higni mia achiel gi piero ariyo gabiriyo.
Notho Kiriath Arba (ma tiende ni Hebron) e piny Kanaan, kendo Ibrahim noywago Sara kendo nodengo ahinya.
Eka Ibrahim noa malo e but ringre chiege kendo owuoyo gi jo-Hiti kowachonegi niya,
“An mana jadak kendo wendo e kindu. Miyauru kamoro angʼiew moromo kar yiko.”
Jo-Hiti nodwoko Ibrahim niya,
“Jaduongʼ, winjwa in jatelo maduongʼ e kindwa. Ik aika ngʼati e bur-wa moro amora miyiero. Onge ngʼato e dierwa mabiro tami yiko ngʼati e bure.”
Eka Ibrahim nochungʼ mokulore e nyim jo-Hiti.
Nowachonegi niya, “Ka uyie mondo aik ngʼata, to winjauru kendo ukwana Efron wuod Zohar
mondo mi ousna bure man Makpela manie giko puothe. Kwayeuru mondo ousnago e nengo mowinjore mondo obed kara mar yiko.”
Efron ja-Hiti noyudo obet piny e kind jog-gi kendo nodwoko Ibrahim ka jo-Hiti duto ma nobiro e dhoranga dalano winjo.
Nowachone niya, “Ooyo ruodha, winja, amiyi puodho, kendo amiyi bur man kanyo. Amiyigo e nyim jowagi duto mondo iyikie ngʼati motho.”
Ibrahim nochako okulore e nyim jo-Hiti,
kendo nowacho ne Efron ka giwinjo niya, “Ka iyie to winja. Abiro chulo nengo mar puodhono. Yie achuli mondo mi aik ngʼata kanyo.”
Efron nodwoko Ibrahim niya,
“Winja ruodha; nengo lowono oromo kilo angʼwen gi nus mar fedha. To en angʼo mathagowa; ik ngʼati.”
Ibrahim noyie gi dwaro mar Efron kendo nomiye nengo mar puodho mane osewacho ka jo-Hiti winjo: ma en kilo angʼwen gi nus mar fedha kaluwore gi rapim mane jo-ohala tiyogo.
Omiyo puoth Efron man Makpela machiegni gi Mamre kaachiel gi lowo kod bur mosekuny gi yien duto mane ni e puodhono,
nodoko mwandu mag Ibrahim e nyim jo-Hiti duto mane obiro kaka joneno e dhoranga dala.
Bangʼe Ibrahim noiko chiege Sara e bur mane ni e puodho ma Makpela machiegni gi Mamre (man Hebron) e piny Kanaan.
Kuom mano puodhono gi bur mane nitie jo-Hiti nomiyo Ibrahim kaka kare mar yiko.
Ibrahim noseti kendo hike noniangʼ, kendo Jehova Nyasaye nosegwedhe e yore duto.
Nowacho ne jatichne maduongʼ mane rito gige ode duto niya, “Ket lweti e kind ema.
Adwaro mondo ikwongʼrina gi nying Jehova Nyasaye, Nyasach polo kod piny ni ok ibi yudone wuoda dhako koa kuom nyi Kanaan ma an jadak e kindgini,
to ibiro dhi thurwa kendo ir wedena mondo iyudne wuoda Isaka dhako.”
Jatichne nopenje niya, “Datim angʼo ka nyakono ok oyie biro koda e pinyni? Dadwok wuodi thuru kumane iayeno?”
Ibrahim nowachone niya, “Nyaka ine ni ok idwoko wuoda kuno.
Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach polo mane ogola thurwa e dala wuora kendo nowuoyo koda kotimo koda singruok ni, ‘To ne nyikwayi nami pinyni’ kendo en owuon ema obiro oro malaikane nyimi mondo mi iyudne wuoda dhako kuno.
To ka nyakono ok dwar biro kodi, eka inibed thuolo kuom singruok ma atimo kodini. Ne mana ni ok idwoko wuoda kuno.”
Omiyo jatijeno noketo lwete e kind em ruodhe Ibrahim kendo notimo singruok kode e wachni.
Eka jatijeno nokawo ngamia apar mag ruodhe, kod chiwo duto mabeyo mochako wuoth kodhi Aram-Naharaim (tiende ni, Mesopotamia) koluwo yo madhi dala matin mar Nahor.
Noketo ngamia onindo piny machiegni gi soko but dala; ne en kar angʼich welo, seche mamon dhi umbo.
Eka nolemo niya, “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Nyasach ruodha Ibrahim, gwedha kawuono, kendo nyis ngʼwononi ne ruodha Ibrahim.
Ne, koro eri achungo e bath sokoni, kama nyi dalani biro umboe pi.
Mad timreni ka awachone nyako moro ni, ‘Asayi, yie dapigi piny mondo mi amodhie,’ kendo ka dowachna ni, ‘modhi kendo abiro chiwo pi ni ngamia-gi duto’ to en ema mondo obed nyako ma iseyierone Isaka jatichni. Kamano anangʼe ni isenyiso ngʼwononi ne ruodha.”
Kane pok otieko lemo, Rebeka notucho kotingʼo dapige e goke. Ne en nyar Bethuel wuod Milka, mane chi Nahor owadgi Ibrahim.
Nyakoni ne en jaber man-gi chia, mapok ongʼeyo dichwo! Nolor e soko, motwomo pi eka odwogo.
Jatich Ibrahim noringo kadhi romone mi owachone niya, “Akwayi, yie imiyae pi mondo amodhi.”
Eka nowacho niya, “Modhi, ruodha” kendo mapiyo nono noloro dapi e lwete momiye pi omodho.
Bangʼ kane osemiye pi modho, nowachone niya, “Abiro dhi umbo pi ne ngamia magi bende, nyaka gitiek modho.”
Omiyo noloko pi mapiyo nono e besen, moringo odok e soko omo pi kendo noomo moromo ngamiagego duto.
Jatich Ibrahim nolingʼ thi ma ok owuoyo, karange lingʼ-lingʼ mondo one ane ka Jehova Nyasaye osegwedho wuodhe.
Kane ngamia-go osetieko modho, ngʼatno nogolo tere mar um mar dhahabu ma pekne romo achiel kuom apar mar kilo kod bangli ariyo mag dhahabu mapekgi oromo nus kilo.
Eka nopenje niya, “In nyar ngʼa? Yie inyisa bende dwayudie kar nindo dalau?”
Nodwoke niya, “An nyar Bethuel, ma wuod Nahor gi Milka.”
Kendo nomedo wacho niya, “Wan kod lum kod chiemb ngamia mangʼeny kaachiel gi ot ma unyalo nindoe.”
Ngʼatno nopodho auma molamo Jehova Nyasaye,
kowacho niya, “Duongʼ odogne Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach ruodha Ibrahim, ma ok oseweyo nyiso adierane gi ngʼwonone ne ruodha. To an, Jehova Nyasaye osetelona e wuoth nyaka e od wede ruodha.”
Nyakono noringo modhi onyiso joodgi duto gik mane osetimorene.
Rebeka ne nigi owadgi miluongo ni Laban, kendo Laban noringo matek ka dhi ir ngʼatno mane ni e sokono.
Kane Laban oseneno tere e um nyamin kod bangli ka ni e lwet nyamin kendo kane owinjo gima Rebeka wacho ni ngʼatno onyise, Laban nodhi ir ngʼatno moyude ka ochungʼ e bath ngamia-go machiegni gi soko.
Laban nowachone niya, “Bi, in ngʼama Jehova Nyasaye ogwedho. Angʼo ma omiyo ichungʼ oko ka? Aseikoni ot kendo nitie kar ngamia bende.”
Kuom mano ngʼatno nodonjo e ot kendo misike mane ngamia otingʼo nogol kuomgi. Nomigi lum kod chiembgi mi nokelo pi ne jatich Ibrahim kod joge mondo olwokgo tiendegi.
Eka nokel chiemo ne jatich Ibrahim to nowachonegi niya, “Ok abi chiemo kapok anyisou gima onego awachnu.” Laban nowachone niya, “Kara nyiswa.”
Kuom mano nowacho niya, “An jatich Ibrahim.
Jehova Nyasaye osegwedho ruodha ahinya kendo osebedo jamoko. Osemiye rombe kod dhok, fedha kod dhahabu, jotich machwo kod mamon gi ngamia kod punde.
Sara, jaod ruodha osenywolone wuowi ka hike oniangʼ kendo ruodha osemiyo wuodeno mwandune duto.
Ruodha nomiyo akwongʼora kowacho ni, ‘Kik iyudne wuoda nyako kuom nyi Kanaan ma adakie lopgini,
to dhi e dala wuora kendo ir anywolana kendo iyudne nyako ne wuoda.’
“Eka ne apenjo ruodha ni, ‘Datim nangʼo ka nyakono ok oyie biro koda?’
“Nodwoke ni, ‘Jehova Nyasaye, ma asebedo ka awuotho e nyime biro ori gi malaikane kendo obiro gwedho wuodhi, mondo mi iyudne wuoda nyako moa kuom anywolana kendo e od wuora.
Ka idhi michopo ir jowa to singruogni ok nomaki, to bende ka gitamore miyi nyakono mondo ibigo, to kwongʼruokni ok nobed e wiyi.’
“Kane abiro e soko kawuono, nawacho ni, ‘Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, Nyasach ruodha Ibrahim, kalongʼoni, to gwedh wuodhani.
Ne, koro eri achungo e bath sokoni, ka jatich ma nyako obiro omo pi kendo awachone niya, “Yaye miyae pi amodhi,”
kendo ka owachona niya, “Modhi, kendo abiro omo pi nyaka ne ngamia-gi bende,” to en ema mondo obed nyako ma Jehova Nyasaye oseyiero ne wuod ruodha.’
“Kane pok atieko lemo e chunya, Rebeka nochopo ka otingʼo dapi e goke. Nolor e soko mondo otuom pi kendo nawachone ni, ‘Yaye miyae pi amodhi.’
“Piyo piyo nono noyieyo pi piny mi owacho ni, ‘Modhi kendo abiro miyo ngamia magi bende pi.’ Kuom mano namodho, kendo ngamia bende nomodho.
“Napenje ni, ‘In nyar ngʼa?’ “En to nodwoka ni, ‘An nyar Bethuel, wuod Nahor gi Milka.’ “Eka ne aketo tere e ume gi bangli e lwete,
kendo napodho auma kalamo Jehova Nyasaye. Namiyo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach ruodha Ibrahim duongʼ, mane telona e yo maber mayudo nyako ma nyakwar owad gi ruodha ne wuode.
Koro nyisauru kuyie timo ngʼwono kod adieri ne ruodha; to ka ok kamano to nyisa mondo mi angʼe kuma achomo.”
Laban kod Bethuel nodwoke niya, “Ma-oa kuom Jehova Nyasaye ok wanyal wachoni gimoro amora.
Rebeka eri; kawe mondo udhi, kendo obed chi wuod ruodhi, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye osechiko.”
Kane jatich Ibrahim owinjo gima negiwacho, nopodho auma e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka jatich Ibrahim nogolo gik moko mag dhahabu kod mag fedha kod lewni mi nomiyogi Rebeka; kendo nochiwo mich ma nengogi tek ne owadgi kod min-gi.
Eka jatich Ibrahim kod jogo mane ni kode nochiemo kendo ometho kendo ne ginindo kanyo. Kane gichiewo kinyne gokinyi nowacho niya, “Weuru adog ir ruodha.”
To owad gi Rebeka kod min-gi nodwoke niya, “We nyakoni odongʼ kodwa kuom ndalo apar kata moloyo kanyo; eka udhi.”
To jatich Ibrahim nowachonegi niya, “Kik ugengʼna, to weyauru adog ir ruodha, nikech Jehova Nyasaye osegwedho wuodha.”
Eka negiwacho niya, “We waluong nyako mondo wapenje kuom wachni.”
Kuom mano negiluongo Rebeka kendo gipenje niya, “Inyalo dhi gi ngʼatni?” Rebeka nodwokogi niya, “Abiro dhi.”
Kuom mano ne giweyo Rebeka odhi kaachiel gi nyako mane opire kod jatich Ibrahim gi joge.
Kendo negigwedho Rebeka kagiwachone niya, “Nyathiwa, bed min ji gana gi gana; mad nyikwayi medre ma kaw mier madongo mag wasikgi.”
Eka Rebeka kod jotije ma nyiri noikore moidho ngamia-gi mi gidhi gi jatich Ibrahim. Kuom mano jatich Ibrahim nokawo Rebeka kendo gidhi.
Noyudo ka koro Isaka oa Beer-Lahai-Roi, nikech noyudo odak Negev.
Ka noyudo owuotho e pap godhiambo chiengʼ moro ka owuoyo gi Nyasaye, kendo kane orango malo, noneno ngamia kabiro.
Rebeka bende norango malo moneno Isaka. Nolor piny koa ewi ngamia
kendo nopenjo jatich Ibrahim niya, “Macha en ngʼa manie pap mabiro romonwa cha?” Jatich nodwoke niya, “En ruodha.” Eka nokawo nanga ma oumogo wangʼe.
Eka jatich nonyiso Isaka gik moko duto mane osetimo.
Isaka notero Rebeka e hemb Sara min-gi, kendo Isaka nokendo Rebeka. Kuom mano Rebeka nobedo chi Isaka, kendo Isaka nohero Rebeka gihera mamalo; kendo Isaka ne ok obedo gi parruok bangʼ tho min mare.
Ibrahim nokendo dhako machielo mane nyinge Ketura.
Ketura nonywolone Ibrahim, Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak kod Shua.
Jokshan nonywolo Sheba kod Dedan; nyikwa Dedan ne gin jo-Ashur, jo-Letush kod jo-Leum.
Midian nonywolo Efa, Efer, Hanok, Abida kod Elda. Magi duto ne gin nyikwa Ketura.
Ibrahim nomiyo Isaka mwandune duto mane en-go.
To kane pod ongima, nochiwo mich ne yawuot monde ma jotichge kendo nodarogi mondo gia kuom Isaka koterogi e piny man yo wuok chiengʼ.
Ibrahim nodak kuom higni mia achiel gi piero abiriyo gabich
Eka Ibrahim notho koluwo kwerene ka en gi higni mathoth ka en ngʼama oti kendo hike ngʼeny.
Yawuot, Isaka kod Ishmael noyike e rogo man Makpela machiegni gi Mamre e puoth Efron ma wuod Zohar ja-Hiti,
ma en puodho ma Ibrahim nongʼiewo kuom jo-Hiti. Kanyo ema Ibrahim gi Sara chiege noyikie.
Bangʼ tho Ibrahim, Nyasaye nogwedho wuode Isaka, mane kindeno odak Beer-Lahai-Roi.
Ma e nonro mar Ishmael wuod Ibrahim mane Hagar jatich Sara ma nyar Misri onywolone.
Magi e nying yawuot Ishmael kaluwore gi nywolgi: Nebayoth, wuod Ishmael makayo, Kedar, Adbel, Mibsam,
Mishma, Duma, Masa,
Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Nafish kod Kedema.
Magi e nying yawuot Ishmael ma nying-gi nochak miechgi kod kuonde mane gibworoe, ne gin ruodhi apar gariyo ngʼato ka ngʼato gi ogandane.
Ishmael nodak kuom higni mia achiel kod piero adek gabiriyo. Eka notho kendo oluwo kwerene.
Nyikwaye nodak e gwengʼ manie kind Havila nyaka Shur, machiegni gi tongʼ Misri kochomo yo Ashur kendo negidak kagimonre gowetene.
Mae nonro Isaka wuod Ibrahim. Ibrahim nonywolo Isaka,
kendo Isaka ne ja-higni piero angʼwen kane okendo Rebeka nyar Bethuel ja-Aram mane odak e piny Padan Aram, kendo ma nyamin Laban.
Isaka nolamo Jehova Nyasaye ne chiege, nikech en migumba. Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko lamone, kendo chiege Rebeka nomako ich.
Nyithindo ne olarore e iye mi nowacho niya, “Angʼo momiyo ma timorena?” Omiyo nodhi mondo openj Jehova Nyasaye wachni.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Ogendini ariyo ni e iyi, kendo ogendini ariyogo biro pogore; oganda moro biro bedo motegno moloyo machielo kendo wuowi maduongʼ noti ne wuowi matin.”
Kane kinde mar nywol ochopo, to ne nitie rude ma yawuowi e iye.
Mano mane okwongo wuok ne kwar, kendo dende duto ne chalo motimo yier; kuom mano negichake ni Esau.
Bangʼ ma owadgi nowuok kod lwete komako ofunj tiend Esau; kuom mano negichako Jakobo. Isaka ne ja-higni piero auchiel kane Rebeka onywolo yawuowigo.
Yawuowigo nodongo, kendo Esau nobedo jadwar molony, ngʼat ma jathim, to Jakobo to ne ngʼama muol madak ei hema.
Isaka ma nohero ring le nohero Esau to Rebeka nohero Jakobo.
Chiengʼ moro kane Jakobo tedo ogira, Esau nodonjo koa e dwar kodenyo.
Esau nowacho ne Jakobo niya, “Asayi miya ogira makwarno adenyo!” (Mano emomiyo bende iluonge ni Edom.)
Jakobo nodwoke niya, “Kuong iusna duongʼni mar nywol.”
Esau nowachone niya, “Ne achiegni tho. Ere ohala ma ayudo kuom duongʼ mar nywolna?”
To Jakobo nowachone niya, “Kwongʼrina mokwongo.” Kuom mano Esau nokwongʼore ne Jakobo, ma ousone duongʼne mar nywol.
Eka Jakobo nomiyo Esau kuon gi ogich ngʼor. Nochiemo kendo ometho, eka ne ochungʼ mi odhi. Kuom mano Esau, nojwangʼo duongʼne mar nywol.
Koro ne nitie kech maduongʼ e piny; bangʼ kech mokwongo mane obedo e ndalo Ibrahim kendo Isaka nodhi Gerar ir Abimelek ruodh jo-Filistia.
Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyore ni Isaka kendo owachone niya, “Kik idhi Misri; to dag mana e piny kama abiro nyisi.
Dag kae matin, kendo abiro bedo kodi mi agwedhi. Nimar in kod nyikwayi abiro miyou pinyni kendo nachop singruok mane atimo gi wuonu Ibrahim.
Anami nyikwayi bed mangʼeny ka sulwe mae polo kendo abiro miyogi pinyni duto, kendo kokadho kuom nyikwayi, ogendini duto mag pinyni nogwedhi.
Anagwedhgi kamano nikech Ibrahim noluora kendo norito dwarona, chikena, buchena kod wechena.”
Kuom mano Isaka nomedo dak Gerar.
Kane jo-Gerar openje kuom chiege, nowachonegi niya, “En nyamera, nikech noluoro wachonegi ni en chiega. Nowachonegi kamano nikech noparo ni jo-Gerar nyalo nege nikech Rebeka ne en dhako ma jaber.”
Kane Isaka osedak kuno kuom kinde mangʼeny, Abimelek ruodh jo-Filistia nongʼicho gie dirisa moneno ka Isaka gi Rebeka chiege jotugo.
Kuom mano Abimelek noluongo Isaka mopenje niya, “Kwerie ka dhakoni ok chiegi! Angʼo ma omiyo niwacho, ‘Ni en nyaminu’?” Isaka nodwoke niya, “Nikech ne aparo ni anyalo wito ngimana nikech en.”
Eka Abimelek nowacho niya, “Ma en angʼo ma itimonwa ni? Ka dipo ni ngʼatwa moro dine oseriwore gi chiegi, donge dikelonwa richo maduongʼ.”
Omiyo Abimelek nogolo chik ne ji duto niya, “Ngʼato angʼata ma omulo ngʼatni kata chiege to nyaka negi.”
Isaka nopidho cham e pinyno kendo Jehova Nyasaye nogwedhe e higano moyudo cham moloyo manochwoyo nyadi mia achiel.
Isaka nomedo bedo gi mwandu ahinya kendo mwandune nomedore mobedo jamoko marahuma.
Ne en kod pith mag jamni kod pith mag dhok kod jotich mangʼeny mi nyiego nomako jo-Filistia kode.
Omiyo jo-Filistia nodino sokni mane wasumbini Ibrahim wuon Isaka okunyo.
Eka Abimelek nowacho ne Isaka niya, “Dar ia ira ka nikech in giteko moloyowa.”
Omiyo Isaka nodar kanyo modhi e Holo mar Gerar kendo nodak kanyo.
Isaka nochako oyawo sokni mane osekuny e ndalo Ibrahim wuon mare, mane jo-Filistia odino bangʼ tho Ibrahim, kendo nochakogi nying mane oyudo wuon-gi Ibrahim osechakogi chon.
Jotich Isaka nokunyo holo kendo negiyudo soko man-gi pi machwer maliw.
To jokwath mag Gerar nolaro pig-no gi jokwadh Isaka kagiwacho niya, “Pigni en marwa.” Kuom mano Isaka nochako sokono ni Esek (tiende ni kar dhawo) nikech ne gilare kode
Eka jotich Isaka nokunyo soko moro kendo, to ne gilarore kuom mano bende; kuom mano nochake ni Sitna (tiende ni sadha).
Nodar kanyo modhi kendo odhi okunyo soko machielo, kendo onge ngʼama nolaro kode. Nochake ni Rehoboth (tiende ni thuolo moromowa), kowacho niya, “Koro Jehova Nyasaye osemiyowa thuolo kendo wabiro medore e piny.”
Noa kuno modhi nyaka Bersheba,
Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyore ne gotieno mowachone niya, “An e Nyasach wuonu Ibrahim. Kik iluor nikech an kodi; abiro gwedhi kendo abiro medo nyikwayi nikech singruok mane atimo gi Ibrahim jatichna.”
Isaka nogero kendo mar misango kuno kendo noluongo nying Jehova Nyasaye. Nogero hembe kanyo mi jotichne nokunyo soko moro kanyo.
Eka Abimelek nobiro ire koa Gerar, ka gin gi Ahuzath jangʼadne rieko kod Fikol ma jatend jolwenje.
Isaka nopenjogi niya, “Angʼo momiyo ubiro ira to ne ok udwara mi uriemba?”
Negidwoke niya, “Koro wasefwenyo ratiro ni Jehova Nyasaye neni kodi, omiyo wadwaro mondo watim kodi winjruok kwakwongʼore. Yie watim winjruok kodi
ni ok initimnwa marach mana kaka wan bende ne ok watimoni marach to ne wariti maber mi wagoli gi kwe mondo idhi. To koro Jehova Nyasaye osegwedhi.”
Kuom mano Isaka nolosonegi nyasi mi gichiemo kendo gimetho.
Kinyne gokinyi mangʼich negisingore ka gikwongʼore ngʼato gi ngʼato. Eka Isaka nogonyogi ma gidhi gi kwe.
Chiengʼ onogo jotich Isaka nobiro ire monyise kuom soko mane gisekunyo. Negiwachone niya, “Waseyudo pi!”
Noluongo kanyo ni Shiba (tiende ni kar singruok) nyaka chil kawuono dalano osebed kiluongo ni Bersheba.
Kane Esau ja-higni piero angʼwen, nokendo Judith nyar Beeri ma ja-Hiti, kod Basemath nyar Elon ma ja-Hiti.
Mon-go nomiyo Isaka kod Rebeka chuny lit.
Kane Isaka oseti kendo wengene noseimore makoro ok nyal neno, noluongo Esau wuode makayo kendo owachone niya, “Wuoda.” Eka Esau nodwoke niya, “An ka.”
Isaka nowacho niya, “Koro asedoko moti kendo ok angʼeyo ndalo thona.
Omiyo koro sani kaw gigi mag lweny kaka atungʼ kod asere kendo idhi e thim ikelna ring le.
Tedna ringʼo mamit mana kaka ahero cha kendo ikelna mondo acham mondo mi amiyi gwethna kapok atho.”
To Rebeka nochiko ite ka Isaka wuoyo gi wuode Esau. Kane Esau osewuok odhi e thim mondo odhi oneg le kendo okel,
Rebeka nowacho ne Jakobo wuode niya, “Nawinjo ka wuonu wacho ni owadu Esau niya,
‘Kelna ring le kendo ilosna mamit mondo acham mondo agwedhi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kapok atho.’
Koro wuoda chik iti malongʼo kendo tim gima awachoni.
Dhiyo e kweth mag jamni kendo ikelna nyidiek ariyo mopugno, mondo mi atedne wuonu ringʼo mamit kaka ohero-cha.
Bangʼ mano iterne wuonu mondo ocham bangʼe ogwedhi kapok otho.”
Jakobo nowacho ne Rebeka min mare niya, “Esau omera en ngʼat ma rayier an to an gi del mapoth
Datim nangʼo ka diponi wuora omula? Donge abiro nenora ngʼama wuonde kendo biro kelona kwongʼ kar gweth.”
Min Jakobo nonyise niya, “Wuoda, we mondo kwongʼno omaka, in to tim mana gima awacho; dhiyo kendo ikelnagi.”
Omiyo Jakobo nodhi mokelo nyidiek mopugno ne min mare kendo noloso chiemo mamit mana kaka wuon-gi ohero.
Eka Rebeka nokawo lewni mabeyo mag Esau wuode maduongʼ mane oyudo en-go e ot kendo ne orwako ne Jakobo wuode matin.
Kendo Rebeka nokawo piende diego moumogo bede Jakobo kod ngʼute kuonde maonge yier.
Eka nomiyo Jakobo wuode chiemo molos mamit kod kuon mane osetedo.
Jakobo nodhi ir wuon mare kendo owachone niya, “Wuora.” Eka Isaka nopenje niya, “Wuoda, to in ngʼa?”
Jakobo nodwoko wuon mare niya, “An Esau wuodi makayo. Asetimo kaka ne inyisa. Yie ia malo ibed piny kendo icham ring le ma akeloni mondo mi igwedha.”
Isaka nopenje niya, “To ne iyude piyo nade wuoda?” Nodwoke niya, “Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasaye nogwedha.”
Eka Isaka nowacho ne Jakobo niya, “Sud machiegni mondo mi amuli, wuoda, mondo mi angʼe adier ka in wuoda Esau koso.”
