Kane aduogo aa Padan, nabuok malich ka Rael minu otho e piny Kanaan kane pok wachopo Efrath. Kuom mano ne aike e bath yo madhi Efrath” (ma tiende ni Bethlehem).
Kane Israel oneno yawuot Josef nopenjo niya, “Magi ngʼa gini?”
Josef nowacho ne wuon mare niya, “Gin yawuowi ma Nyasaye osemiya ka.” Eka Israel nowacho niya, “Kelgi ira ka mondo agwedhgi.”
Koro wenge Israel ne ok nyal neno maber nikech hike noniangʼ. Kuom mano Josef nosudo nyithindo machiegni kendo Israel nokwakogi monyodhogi.
Israel mowachone Josef niya, “Ne ok apar mar neno wangʼi kendo to koro Nyasaye oseyiena maneno nyaka nyithindi bende.”
Eka Josef nogolo nyithindogo e chong Israel kendo nokulore nyaka e lowo.
Kendo Josef nomako lwet nyithindo ariyogo, Efraim e bade korachwich kochomo bad Israel koracham, kendo Manase koracham kochomo bad Israel korachwich kendo nokelogi machiegni gi Israel.
To Israel norieyo bade ma korachwich moketo ewi Efraim wuowi ma chogo, kendo bade ma koracham ewi Manase kata obedo ni en ema ne en wuowi maduongʼ.
Eka nogwedho Josef mowachone niya, “Mad Nyasaye ma wuonena Ibrahim kod Isaka nowuothogo, Nyasaye ma osebedo jakwadh ngimana nyaka ndaloni,
Malaika ma oseresa e chandruok duto mad gwedh raweregi. Mad nyinga kod nying Ibrahim kwara kod Isaka wuora sik kuomgi, kendo gimedre gibed oganda maduongʼ e piny.”
Kane Josef oneno ka wuon mare keto lwete ma korachwich ewi Efraim ne ok obedo mamor; kuom mano, nogolo lwet wuon-gi ewi Efraim moketo ewi Manase.
Josef nowachone niya, “Ooyo, wuora ma e wuowi ma kayo: ket lweti ma korachwich e wiye.”
To wuon-gi nodagi mowachone niya, “Angʼeyo mano nyathina. Manase bende biro bedo oganda maduongʼ. To kata kamano owadgi matin nobed giduongʼ moloye kendo nyikwaye nobed ogendini mangʼeny.”
Nogwedhogi chiengʼno, kendo owachonegi niya, “Ka Israel dwaro gwedho ngʼato to nokonyre gi nyingu kowacho kama, ‘Mad Nyasaye gwedhi kaka osegwedho Efraim kod Manase.’ ” Kuom mano noketo Efraim obedo maduongʼ ne Manase.
Eka Israel nowacho ne Josef niya, “Koro achiegni tho, to Nyasaye biro bedo kodu kendo nodwoku e piny kwereu.
To in, kendo kaka ngʼama duongʼne owetene, amiyi lowo mane akawo kuom jo-Amor gi ligangla kod atungʼ.”
Eka Jakobo noluongo yawuote mowachonegi niya, “Biuru machiegni mondo anyisu gima biro timorenu e ndalo mabiro.
“Un yawuot Jakobo chokreuru buta kendo uchik itu; winjuru Israel wuonu.
“Reuben, in e wuoda makayo, kendo in e tekona kendo in e ranyisi mokwongo mar tekra, bende in giluor mangʼeny kod teko mangʼeny.
Ijamuomri ka pi aora, to ok inibed gi duongʼ, nikech isedonjori, gi kitanda wuonu ma ichido.
“Simeon gi Lawi gin owete, gisetimo timbe mag lweny gi liganglagi.
Ok nariwra kodgi e buchegi, ok nariwra kodgi e chokruogegi, nikech ka mirima omakogi to ginego ji kendo gingʼado odond dhok sa asaya ka gihero.
Okwongʼ mirimbgi nikech en mirima mager kendo makwiny. Anakegi e kind joka Jakobo kendo akegi e piny Israel duto.
“Juda, oweteni biro paki; bende inimak wasiki gi ngʼutgi, kendo oweteni biro kuloreni.
Yaye Juda nyathina, ichalo nyathi sibuor, modwogo koa dwar. Obuto ka sibuor madhako monindo piny, maonge ngʼama nyalo chiewo.
Ludh duongʼ ok noa e lwet Juda kata odunga mar teko ok noa e tiende, nyaka wuon loch ma biro rito ogendini duto chopi kendo luor mar ogendini nobed kuome.
Obiro tweyo pundane e kor mzabibu, enotue nyathi pundane e mzabibu moyier; kendo obiro luoko lepe gi divai makwar.
Wangʼe nobed makwar moloyo divai kendo lake nobed matar ka chak.
“Zebulun nodag e dho nam kama yiedhi gowe, kendo tongʼ mare nodhi nyaka Sidon.
“Isakar en punda maratego ma nindo piny e dier misikene.
Kane oneno kaka dalane ber, kendo kaka pinyno ber, noyie tingʼo misigo modoko misumba matiyo tich matek.
“Dan nobed jangʼad bura ne joge mana kaka achiel kuom oganda Israel.
Dan nobed ka thuol man e dir yo, thuol man-gi kwiri mager e yo, ma kayo ombongʼ Faras mondo ngʼama oidhe ochwanyre magore piny gi kangʼeye.
“Aserito warruok yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
“Gad to nomonj gi jomecho, to noriembgi kolawogi matek.
“Asher nobed gi chiemo mamit; nobed gi chiemo moromo ruoth chamo.
“Naftali to en mwanda mogony, ma nywolo nyithindo mabeyo.
“Josef en mzabibu manyago olemo mopidh e bath thidhna, ma bedene ogawore e kor ot.
Jodir asere nolawe matek kokecho, ne gibaye gi asere ka igi owangʼ.
Kata kamano, Nyasaye Maratego ma Nyasach Jakobo noturo atungegi, kendo Jakwath, ma Lwanda mar Israel, nochodo leche mag ogich bedegi.
Nyasach wuonuno ma en Nyasaye Maratego, mondo ogwedhi gi gweth mag polo gi gweth mag nyak mag lowo, gi gweth mag nyithindo.
Gweth mag wuoro dongo moloyo gweth mag gode madongo machon, kendo moloyo gik mabeyo duto mag gode mosiko. Gwethgi mondo obi ne Josef, ngʼat mane opog gi jowetene.
“Benjamin en ondiek ma kech kayo; gima osenego ochamo gokinyi, kendo godhiambo okidho matindo tindo gima osemako.”
Magi e dhout Israel apar gariyo duto kendo mae gima ne wuon-gi owachonegi kane ogwedhogi, ka omiyo moro ka moro gweth moromore kode.
Eka Jakobo nochiko yawuote kowachonegi niya, “An koro achiegni tho mondo adhi ariwra gi jowetena, yikauru but kwerena e rogo man e puoth Efron ja-Hiti.
Rogo man e puodho man Makpela, machiegni gi Mamre e piny Kanaan, ema ne Ibrahim ongʼiewo kaka kar yiko kaachiel gi puodhono duto koa kuom Efron ja-Hiti.
Kanyo ema ne oike Ibrahim kod Sara chiege, kanyo bende ema ne oikie Isaka kod Rebeka chiege, kendo kanyo ema ne aikoe Lea.
Puodhono kod rogo duto mane ni e iye nongʼiew koa kuom jo-Hiti.”
Kane Jakobo osetieko wacho wechegi ni yawuote kamano nodwoko tiende e kitanda, mi chunye nochot kendo noluwo kwerene.
Josef nogore kuom wuon-gi kendo noywak kuome monyodhe.
Eka Josef nochiko jotichne ma jothieth mondo olos ringre wuon-gi, Israel gi yath. Kuom mano jothiethgo noloso ringre Jakobo.
Notieko ndalo piero angʼwen nikech mano e kaka kitundu molos gi yath idwaro mondo otieki. Jo-Misri noywage kuom ndalo piero abiriyo.
Ka ndalo mag ywak noserumo, Josef nowuoyo gi jood Farao niya, “Ka unyalo timona ngʼwono, to nyisnauru Farao niya,
‘Kane wuora chiegni tho, nomiyo asingorane ni abiro yike e bur mane okunyo e piny Kanaan. Kuom mano yie adhi aike eka abiro duogo.’ ”
Farao nowachone niya, “Dhiyo mondo iyik wuonu mana kaka nomiyo isingorine.”
Kuom mano Josef nodhi moyiko wuon mare. Jotich Farao duto nodhi kode, ma gin jok midewo mane tiyo e dalane kendo e piny Misri duto,
kaachiel gi joode gi jood owetene kod jood wuon-gi. Nyithindo kod jamni gi dhok kende ema ne owe Goshen.
Joriemb geche gi Farese bende nodhi kode. Ne en gi oganda maduongʼ.
Kane gichopo kar dino cham man Atad, machiegni gi Jordan, negiywago wuon-gi matek kendo malit ahinya; kendo Josef nokawo ndalo abiriyo koywago wuon-gi.
Kane jo-Kanaan modak kuno oneno ywak man kar dino cham man Atad, negiwacho niya, “Jo-Misri nigi kuyo mar ywak.” Mano ema omiyo iluongo loka Jordan kono ni Abel Mizraim.
Kuom mano yawuot Jakobo notimo mana kaka nochikogi:
Negitingʼo ringre nyaka Kanaan kendo giike e rogo man e puodho man Makpela, machiegni gi Mamre, mane Ibrahim ongʼiewo kaka kar yiko kaachiel gi puodhono koa kuom Efron ja-Hiti.
Bangʼ yiko wuon-gi, Josef nodok Misri kaachiel gi owetene kod ji mamoko mane odhi kode yiko wuon-gi.
Kane owete Josef oneno ni wuon-gi osetho, negiwacho niya, “Mit ka Josef iye nowangʼ kodwa, mi ochulnwa kuor kuom richo duto mane watimone?”
Kuom mano negioro wach ne Josef kagiwacho niya, “Kane pok wuonu otho noweyonwa wach niya,
‘Akwayi mondo iwene owetegi richogi kod gima mono mane gitimoni.’ Kuom mano yie iwenwa timbewa duto ma wasetimoni nikech wan jotich Nyasach wuonu.” To kane Josef owinjo wechego, pi wangʼe noton.
Eka owetene nobiro ire kendo ogoyo chongegi piny e nyime: Negiwachone niya, “Wan wasumbinigi.”
To Josef nowachonegi niya, “Kik ubed maluor. An dakaw kar Nyasaye?
Un ne udwaro mondo utimna marach, to Nyasaye nodwaro mondo obed gima ber; mondo oresgo ngima ji mangʼeny, makoro ngima mana nikech wachno.
Omiyo koro kik uluor. Abiro ritou kaachiel gi nyithindu.” Kamano nokweyo chunygi kendo owuoyo kodgi gi muolo.
Josef nodak Misri, kaachiel gi jood wuon-gi. Nodak higni mia achiel kod apar.
Kendo noneno nyikwa Efraim nyaka tiengʼ mar adek. Bende noneno nyithind Makir wuod Manase kinywolo mokwanogi ka nyithinde.
Eka Josef nowacho ne owetene niya, “Koro achiegni tho. To Nyasaye biro resou kendo golou e pinyni mi oteru e piny mane osingore ka okwongʼore ne Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo.”
Kendo Josef nomiyo yawuot Israel okwongʼore kendo owachonegi niya, “Nyasaye biro resou, kendo nyaka une ni ukawo chokena ka udhigo.”
Kamano Josef notho ka en ja-higni mia achiel kod apar. Kendo bangʼ kane gisewiro ringre gi yath, negikete e sanduku e piny Misri kuno.
Magi e nying jo-Israel mane odhi e piny Misri gi Jakobo, moro ka moro gi joode:
Reuben, Simeon, Lawi, kod Juda;
Isakar, Zebulun kod Benjamin;
Dan kod Naftali; Gad kod Asher.
Joka Jakobo duto noromo ji piero abiriyo, nikech Josef to noyudo osechopo e piny Misri.
Koro Josef gi owetene duto kod tiengʼno duto notho,
to jo-Israel nonyaa kendo gimedore ahinya mi gimedo bedo oganda mathoth moloyo mane gipongʼo pinyno duto.
Bangʼe ruoth manyien mane ok ongʼeyo wach Josef nobedo e loch e piny Misri.
Nonyiso joge niya, “Neuru, jo-Israel osenyaa moloyowa.
Watangʼuru, nono to gibiro medore ahinya kendo bedo maratego, ma ka lweny owuok ginyalo dok ne wasikwa mondo giked kodwa, mi giring gia e pinywa.”
Kuom mano, jo-Misri noketo nyipeche mondo ochun jo-Israel gi tich matek, kendo negigero Pithom gi Rameses kaka miech keno mag ruoth Farao.
To kaka ne imedo sandgi, e kaka negimedo nyaa kendo gimedore; omiyo jo-Misri nomedo luoro jo-Israel,
kuom mano jo-Misri nobembo jo-Israel gi tich mapek mar wasumbini.
Negimiyo ngimagi odoko matek gi tije achuna mag nyono lowo mar matafare; e tijegi duto jo-Misri noketogi gi tich mapek mar wasumbini.
Bangʼe ruodh jo-Misri nogolo chik mondo mond jo-Hibrania ma jocholo miluongo ni Shifra kod Pua niya,
“Ka ucholo mond jo-Hibrania mi uneno ka onywolo nyathi ma wuowi, to negeuru, to ka en nyathi ma nyako, to kik unege.”
To kata kamano, jochologo noluoro Nyasaye kendo ne ok gitimo gima ruodh jo-Misri nonyisogi mondo gitim, mine ok ginego nyithindo ma yawuowi.
Ruodh jo-Misri noluongo jochologo mi openjogi niya, “En angʼo momiyo utimo kama? Angʼo momiyo ok uneg nyithindo ma yawuowi?”
Jochologo nodwoko Farao niya, “Mond jo-Hibrania ok chal gi mond jo-Misri, gin giteko kendo ginywol kapok jocholo ochopo irgi.”
Kuom mano Nyasaye nogwedho jochologo, kendo jo-Israel nomedo nyaa mi odoko oganda maduongʼ.
Nikech jochologo noluoro Nyasaye, Nyasaye nogwedhogi gi nyithindo.
Bangʼe Farao nogolo chik ne joge kowacho niya, “Nyathi ma wuowi moro amora monywol nyaka udir e aora Nael, to nyithindo ma nyiri to uwe odongi.”
Ja-Lawi moro nokendo nyar ja-dhoodgi,
mi nomako ich monywolo nyathi ma wuowi. Ka noneno ni en nyathi ma jaber, nopande kuom dweche adek.
To ka koro ne ok onyal medo pande, nokawo osera mochwe gi togo momuono gi lowo kod odok. Bangʼe noketo nyathino ei oserano kendo noketo oserano ei odundu e tiend aora Nael.
Nyamin nyathino nochungʼ gichien mondo one ane gima biro timore ni nyathino.
Eka nyar Farao nodhi e aora Nael mondo olwokre, ka jotichne to ne wuotho e geng aora. Nyar Farao noneno oserano ka ni e kind odundu, mine ooro jatichne ma nyako mondo ogeme.
Ne oele mi oyudo nyathi. Nyathino ne ywak, kendo nokeche mowacho niya, “Ma en achiel kuom nyithind jo-Hibrania.”
Eka nyamin nyathino nopenjo nyar Farao niya, “Bende anyalo dhi mondo aluongni achiel kuom mond jo-Hibrania mondo opirni nyathini.”
Nyar farao nodwoke niya, “Ee, dhiyo.” Kuom mano nyakono nodhi mokelo mana min nyathino.
Nyar Farao nowachone niya, “Kaw nyathini mondo ipidhna bangʼe abiro chuli.” Omiyo dhakono nokawo nyathino kendo norite.
Ka nyathino nosedongo mobedo maduongʼ nokawe motere ne nyar Farao kendo nyathino nodoko wuod nyar Farao. Nochake ni Musa kowacho niya, “Ne agole e pi.”
Kane Musa osedoko ngʼat maduongʼ, chiengʼ moro nodhi ir owetene ma jo-Israel kendo noneno kaka negitiyo tich matek. Noneno achiel kuom jo-Hibrania wetene, ka igoyo kod ja-Misri.
Nogoyo machiemo koni gi koni, kendo kane ok oneno ngʼato, nonego ja-Misrino mi oike ei kuoyo.
Kinyne nodok mi oneno jo-Hibrania ariyo ka dhawo. Nopenjo ngʼat ma nokwinyo nyawadgino niya, “Marangʼo igoyo ja-Hibrania wadu?”
Ngʼatno nodwoke niya, “En ngʼa ma oketi ruoth kendo jangʼadnwa bura? Iparo mar nega kaka nyoro inego ja-Misri cha?” Ka Musa nowinjo kamano, kibaji nogoye mobedo maluor koparo niya, “Gima nyoro atimo nyaka bed ni osengʼere.”
Kane Farao owinjo wachno notemo mondo oneg Musa, kata kamano Musa noringo modhi odak e piny Midian, mi obet e bath soko moro.
Jadolo moro mar jo-Midian ne nigi nyiri abiriyo, negibiro tuomo pi ka giolo e karaya mondo jamb wuon-gi omodhi.
Jokwath moko nobiro mondo oriembgi, to Musa noa malo moresogi kendo nomiyo jambgi pi omodho.
Bangʼe kane nyirigo odok ir Reuel wuon-gi, nopenjogi niya, “Angʼo momiyo udwogo chon kawuono?”
Negidwoke niya, “Ja-Misri moro noresowa e lwet jokwath, mi otuomonwa pi kendo omiyo jamni pi omodho.”
Reuel nopenjo nyige niya, “En kanye? Marangʼo uweye? Luongeuru mondo oyud gimoro ocham.”
Musa noyie mondo odag gi ngʼatno, mi Reuel nomiye nyare miluongo ni Zipora mondo obed chiege.
Zipora nonywolo wuowi mi Musa nochako nyinge ni Gershom, kowacho niya, “Asedoko jadak e piny ma ok marwa.”
E kinde mane Musa pod odak Midian, Farao ruodh Misri notho. Jo-Israel ne ngʼur ahinya kuom tichgi mar wasumbini mi giywak malit, kendo ywakgi mondo oresgi e tich mar bedo misumba nochopo ir Nyasaye.
Nyasaye nowinjo ngʼurgi mi oparo singruokne gi Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo.
Kuom mano Nyasaye noneno kaka jo-Israel thagore mi wachno ne odonjo e chunye.
Chiengʼ moro Musa ne kwayo jamb Jethro jaduongʼne ma Jadolo mar jo-Midian, mi nongʼado thim gi jamni nyaka Horeb got mar Nyasaye.
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyorene kanyo e ligek mach maliel e dier bungu. Musa noneno ni kata obedo ni mach nomako bunguno, bunguno to ne ok wangʼ.
Kuom mano Musa noparo e chunye owuon niya, “Abiro sudo machiegni mondo ane hono maduongʼni. Angʼo momiyo bunguni ok wangʼ kata obedo ni mach lielie.”
Kane Jehova Nyasaye oneno kosudo machiegni mondo one ane, Nyasaye noluonge gi e dier bungu niya, “Musa! Musa!” Eka Musa nodwoke niya, “An ka.”
Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Kik imed sudo machiegni, to lony wuoche e tiendi, nikech kama ichungoeni en Kama Ler.”
Bangʼe Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “An e Nyasach kwereni, Nyasach Ibrahim gi Nyasach Isaka kendo Nyasach Jakobo.” Kane Musa owinjo wachno to nopando wangʼe, nikech noluoro rango wangʼ Nyasaye.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Chutho aseneno thagruok mar joga e piny Misri. Asewinjo ywakgi nikech joma chunogi e tich mar wasumbini kendo angʼeyo thagruokgi.
Omiyo aselor mondo aresgi e lwet jo-Misri kendo agolgi e pinyno mondo akelgi e piny maber kendo malach, ma en piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich. En piny jo-Kanaan gi jo-Hiti gi jo-Amor gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus.
Koro ywak jo-Israel osechopona, kendo aseneno kaka jo-Misri sandogi.
Koro dhiyo. Aori ir Farao mondo igol joga ma jo-Israel e piny Misri.”
To Musa nodwoko Nyasaye niya, “An to an ngʼa, ma dadhi ir Farao kendo golo jo-Israel e piny Misri?”
Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “Abiro bedo kodi. Ranyisi ma ibiro neno ni An ema aori ema: Ka isegolo ogandani e piny Misri, to ubiro lamo Nyasaye ewi godni.”
Musa nodwoko Nyasaye niya, “Ka dipo ni adhi ir jo-Israel mi awachonegi ni, ‘Nyasach kwereu oseora iru,’ mi gipenja ni, ‘Nyinge en ngʼa?’ Koro to ananyisgi nangʼo?”
Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “AN MANTIE. Ma e gima onego iwach ni jo-Israel, ‘AN MANTIE oseora iru.’ ”
Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa kendo niya, “Nyis jo-Israel kama, ‘Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu, kendo ma Nyasach Ibrahim gi Nyasach Isaka kendo Nyasach Jakobo; oseora iru.’ “Ma e nyinga manyaka chiengʼ, ma en nying manyaka parago, kuom tiengʼ ka tiengʼ.
“Dhiyo, ichok jodong jo-Israel mondo iwachnegi kama. ‘Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach kwereu; ma en Nyasach Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo; nofwenyorena mi owachona kama: Aserangou mi aseneno gino mosetimnu e piny Misri.
Kuom mano asesingora ni nyaka agolu e thagruok e piny Misri mi akelu e piny jo-Kanaan gi jo-Hiti gi jo-Amor gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus, ma en piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich.’
“Jodong jo-Israel biro winjo gima iwacho. Bangʼ mano in kaachiel gi jodongo unudhi ir ruodh Misri mi uwachne kama: ‘Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach jo-Hibrania oseromo kodwa. Omiyo yie iwe wadhi e thim kama kawo wuodh ndalo adek mondo wachiwne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa misengini.’
To angʼeyo ni ruodh Misri ok noyienu mondo udhi makmana kochune gi bat maratego.
Kuom mano, abiro rieyo bada mi agoo jo-Misri gi kit masiche duto ma anakel e diergi. Bangʼ mano, to enoyienu mondo udhi.
“Bende anami jo-Misri bed gi ngʼwono kuom jogi, mondo ka uwuok to ok unua gi lwetu nono.
Dhako ka dhako nyaka kwa jabathe kod joma odakgo e ode mondo omiye gik molos gi fedha gi dhahabu kod lewni, ma unuket kuom yawuotu gi nyiu. Kuom mano unuyak gige jo-Misri.”
Musa nodwoko niya, “To kapo ni ok giyie kata winjo wachna mi giwacho ni, ‘Jehova Nyasaye ne ok ofwenyoreni’?”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nopenje niya, “Mano en angʼo mantie e lwetino?” Musa nodwoko niya, “En luth.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya “Bole piny kanyo.” Musa nobole piny e lowo kendo nolokore thuol mi Musa noringe.
Bangʼe Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Rie badi mondo imake gi yo ka iwe.” Kuom Mano Musa norieyo bade kendo nomake gi yo ka iwe mi nochako olokore luth e lwete.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Ma en kamano mondo mi giyie ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi; Nyasach Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo osefwenyoreni.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “So lweti ei lawi.” Kuom mano, Musa nosoyo lwete ei lawe kendo kane ogole oko, to lwete nolokore dhoho, marachar ka pe.
Bangʼe nonyise niya, “Koro dwok lweti ei law.” Kuom mano, Musa nodwoko lwete ei law, kendo kane ogole, lwete nochango modoko machal gi dende duto.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Kapo ni ok giyie gi wachni kata kuom ranyisi mokwongo, to ginyalo yie mar ariyo.
To kapo ni ok giyie gi ranyisi ariyogo kata winjo wachni, to kaw pi mar aora Nael, kendo iole e lowo motwo. Pi migolo e aorano biro lokore remo e lowo motwo.”
Musa nodwoko Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye, ok asebedo ngʼat ma wuoyo kalewe yot chakre chon kata e sa misebedo ka iwuoyo kod misumbani. Lewa pek kendo aywayo wach.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “En ngʼa manochweyo dho dhano? En ngʼa mamiyo odoko momo kata ite odino? Koso en ngʼa mamiyo oneno kata obedo muofu? Donge en an Jehova Nyasaye?
Omiyo koro dhiyo, abiro konyi e wuoyo bende abiro puonji gima onego iwachi.”
To Musa nodwoke niya, “Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye, ka iyie to or ngʼat machielo.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye ne mirima omako gi Musa mowachone niya, “Donge owadu Harun ma ja-Lawi nitie? Angʼeyo ni onyalo wuoyo maber. Osechako wuoth obiro romoni bende chunye biro bedo mamor ka oneni.
Ibiro wuoyo kode mi iket weche e dhoge; abiro konyou un ji ariyo mondo uwuo bende abiro puonjou gima onego utim.
Obiro wuoyo gi ji kari kendo obiro bedo kaka dhogi bende ibiro bedone kaka Nyasaye.
To kaw ludhni e lweti nimar ibiro timo kode honni gi ranyisi.”
Eka Musa nodok ir Jethro jaduongʼne mowachone niya “Yie iweya adog Misri ir joga mondo ane kapo ni nitie moro kuomgi ma pod ngima.” Jethro nodwoke niya, “Dhiyo kendo ibed gi gweth.”
Noyudo Jehova Nyasaye osewuoyo gi Musa e piny Midian kowachone niya, “Dog Misri, nikech jogo duto mane dwaro negi osetho.”
Omiyo Musa nokawo chiege kod yawuote, mi oketogi e punda kendo nochako wuoth mar dok Misri. Bende nokawo ludh Nyasaye e lwete.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Ka idok Misri nyaka ine ni itimo e nyim Farao honni duto ma asemiyi teko mondo itim. Makmana abiro miyo chuny Farao doko matek ma ok onyal weyo jo-Israel mondo oa.
Eka iniwach ni Farao kama, ‘Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho: Israel e wuoda makayo,
kendo ne anyisi niya, “Yie iwe wuoda odhi, mondo olama.” To nikech nidagi weye mondo odhi; koro abiro nego wuodi makayo.’ ”
E kinde mane Musa obuoro kamoro e kor yo, Jehova Nyasaye noromo kode kendo nochiegni nege.
To Zipora nokawo pala modingli mi ongʼadogo pien mantie e dho duongʼ wuode kendo nokawo pien-no momulogo tiend Musa. Nowacho niya, “Adier ibedona wuon kisera mar remo.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye noweye. (E kindeno ema Zipora nowachoe niya, “Wuon kisera mar remo,” ma tiende ni tero nyangu.)
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni Harun niya, “Dhiyo e thim mondo irom gi Musa.” Omiyo nodhi moromo gi Musa e got mar Nyasaye kendo nonyodhe.
Eka Musa nonyiso Harun weche duto mane Jehova Nyasaye oore mondo owachi, kendo nonyise honni duto mane Jehova Nyasaye oore mondo otim.
Eka Musa gi Harun nochoko jodong jo-Israel duto kanyakla,
kendo Harun nonyisogi gik moko duto mane Jehova Nyasaye onyiso Musa. Bende notimo honni duto e nyim ji,
kendo ne giyie. Kendo kane giwinjo ni Jehova Nyasaye oseneno chandruokgi kendo ni odwaro resogi, negikulore mi gilame.
Bangʼe Musa gi Harun nodhi ir Farao mi giwachone niya, “Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach jo-Israel wacho kama: ‘We joga odhi, mondo gilosna sawo e thim.’ ”
To Farao nodwokogi niya, “Jehova Nyasaye to en ngʼa, ma dimi awinj dwonde mi awe jo-Israel dhi? Ok angʼeyo Jehova Nyasaye kendo ok anawe jo-Israel dhi.”
Negiwachone niya, “Nyasach jo-Hibrania oseromo kodwa. Omiyo koro yie iwe wadhi e thim kama kawo e wuodh ndalo adek mondo wachiw misengini ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, nono to dipo ka okelonwa masiche kata tho.”
To ruodh Misri nowachonegi niya, “Musa gi Harun, en angʼo momiyo ugolo ji kuom tijegi ma gitimo? Doguru e tiju!”
Eka Farao nomedo wacho niya, “Neuru, ogandani koro osenyaa momedore to pod udwaro chungogi e tich.”
Chiengʼ onogo Farao nogolo chik ni jorit wasumbini kod nyipeche kowachonegi niya,
“Kik uchak umi jo-Israel lum magilosogo matafare; to nyaka une ni giomo lum kendgi giwegi.
To nyaka une ni giloso matafare ma kwan-gi romre gi mano ma gisebedo ka giloso, kik uwe kwan-go dog chien. Gin jonyawo, emomiyo gigoyo koko ni, ‘Yie iwewa wadhi kendo wachiw misango ni Nyasachwa.’
Keturu tich obed matekie moloyo ni jogi mondo gisiki ka gitiyo kendo kik uchik itu ne miriambogi.”
Eka jorit wasumbini kod nyipeche ne odhi mowachone jo-Israel niya, “Ma e gima Farao wacho, ‘Ok abi miyou lum kendo.
Dhiuru mondo udwar lumbu kamoro amora ma unyalo yude, to ngʼeuru ni tiju to ok nodwok chien kata matin.’ ”
Omiyo jo-Israel nokee e piny Misri duto ka gichoko lum.
Jorit wasumbini ne kasogi kawachonegi niya, “Tiekuru tich momiu odiechiengʼ ka odiechiengʼ, mana machal kaka ne utimo kane un gi lum.”
Nyipeche ma jo-Israel mane jotich Farao oyiero nigoyo kipenjogi niya, “En angʼo mosemonou loso matafare ndalo ariyogi kaka uloso pile?”
Eka nyipeche ma jo-Israel nodhi modonjo ir Farao kagiwacho niya, “Ere gima omiyo isetimone jotichni kama?
Jotichni ok mi kata mana lum, to eka pod inyisowa kama: ‘Losuru matafare!’ Jotichni igoyo, to jogi ema nigi ketho.”
Eka Farao nowacho niya, “Jonyawogi un mana jonyawo! Mano e gima omiyo usiko kuwacho ni, ‘Yie wadhi mondo wachiw misango ni Jehova Nyasaye.’
Koro doguru e tich, ok nomiu lum moro amora, to nyaka ulos matafare ma kar kwan-gi rom gi ma usebedo kuloso pile.”
Eka nyipeche ma jo-Israel nofwenyo ni gin e chandruok ka nonyisogi niya, “Ok unyal dwoko kar kwan matafare musebedo kuloso pile.”
Bangʼ kane gisea ir Farao, negiyudo Musa gi Harun karitogi mondo orom kodgi,
kendo negiwachonegi niya, “Mad Jehova Nyasaye neu mi ngʼadnu bura! Usemiyo wadoko gima dungʼ mangʼwe ni Farao kod jodonge kendo useketo ligangla e lwetgi mondo ginegwago.”
Eka Musa nodok ir Jehova Nyasaye mowachone niya, “Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye, en angʼo momiyo isekelo chandruok ni ogandani? Koso ma emomiyo ni ora?
Nyaka nachak dhi ir Farao mondo awuo e nyingi, osekelo chandruok ni ogandani bende ok isereso ogandani ngangʼ.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Koro ibiro neno gino ma abiro timo ne Farao: Nikech bada man-gi teko, obiro weyogi mondo gidhi; kendo nikech tekona maduongʼ obiro riembogi mi gia e pinye.”
Nyasaye bende nonyiso Musa kama, “An e Jehova Nyasaye.
Ne afwenyora ne Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo kaka Nyasaye Maratego, to ne ok afwenyoranegi gi nyinga ma ungʼeyago ma en Jehova Nyasaye.
Bende ne aguro singruokna kodgi ni anamigi piny Kanaan, kama negidakie kaka jodak.
To bende asewinjo ngʼur, mar jo-Israel ma jo-Misri oseloko wasumbinigi mi aparo singruokna.
“Emomiyo nyis jo-Israel kama: ‘An e Jehova Nyasaye kendo abiro golou e tije mapek ma jo-Misri oketo kuomu. Abiro miyo ubed thuolo e tij bedo wasumbini mag-gi kendo abiro resou kakumogi malit mondo awaru.
Abiro kawou kaka joga awuon, bende abiro bedo Nyasachu eka ubiro ngʼeyo ni An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, manogolou ka uwuok e bwo tich matek mar jo-Misri.
Kendo abiro kelou e piny mane akwongʼora ka atingʼo bada malo ni anami Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo. Abiro miyougo kaka girkeni. An e Jehova Nyasaye.’ ”
Musa nodwoko ni jo-Israel wechegi, to kata kamano ne ok giwinje nimar chunygi nonyosore nikech tich mapek mar bedo wasumbini.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nonyiso Musa niya,
“Dhiyo, inyis Farao ruodh jo-Misri mondo owe jo-Israel owuogi e pinye.”
To Musa nodwoko Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Ka jo-Israel ema ok nyal winja, en angʼo manyalo miyo Farao winja mi dewa nimar an radwal?”
Jehova Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa kod Harun kochikogi mondo gidhi ir Farao ruodh Misri, mondo gigol jo-Israel e piny Misri.
Magi e jotelo mag anywolagi: Yawuot Reuben ma kach Israel ne gin: Hanok, Palu, Hezron kod Karmi. Mago e jo-Reuben.
Yawuot Simeon ne gin: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakin, Zohar kod Shaul mane en wuod nyar ja-Kanaan. Mago e joka Simeon.
Magi e nying joka Lawi kaluwore gi anywolagi: Gershon, Kohath gi Merari. (Lawi nodak kuom higni mia achiel gi piero adek gabiriyo.)
Yawuot Gershon kaluwore gi dhoodgi ne gin: Libni kod Shimei.
Yawuot Kohath ne gin: Amram, Izhar, Hebron kod Uziel. (Kohath nodak kuom higni mia achiel gi piero adek gadek.)
Yawuot Merari ne gin: Mali kod Mushi. Magi ema ne dhout jo-Lawi kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Amram wuod Kohath nokendo nyamin wuon-gi ma nyinge Jokebed, mane onywolone Harun kod Musa. (Amram nodak kuom higni mia achiel gi piero adek gabiriyo.)
Yawuot Izhar ne gin: Kora, Nefeg kod Zikri.
Yawuot Uziel ne gin: Mishael, Elzafan kod Sithri.
Harun nokendo Elisheba nyar Aminadab ma bende nyamin Nashon, kendo nonywolone Nadab, Abihu, Eliazar kod Ithamar.
Yawuot Kora ne gin: Asir, Elkana kod Abiasaf. Magi ema ne dhout joka Kora.
Eliazar wuod Harun nokendo achiel kuom nyi Putiel, kendo nonywolone Finehas. Magi ema ne jotend dhout joka Lawi.
Ma e Harun nogo kod Musa mane Jehova Nyasaye owachonegi niya, “Gol jo-Israel oa e piny Misri kaluwore gi dhoutgi”
Gin giwegi ema ne giwuoyo gi Farao ruodh jo-Misri mondo ogol jo-Israel e piny Misri. Ne en mana Musa kod Harun.
Kane Jehova Nyasaye owuoyo gi Musa e piny Misri,
nowachone niya, “An Jehova Nyasaye. Nyis Farao ruodh jo-Misri gik moko duto manyisi.”
To Musa nodwoko Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Nikech an radwal, en angʼo manyalo miyo Farao winja?”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Ne, aseketi kaka Nyasaye ni Farao, kendo Harun owadu biro bedoni janabi.
Nyaka iwach gik moko duto ma achiki, kendo Harun owadu nonyis Farao mondo owe jo-Israel owuog e pinye.
Abiro keto chuny Farao bedo matek, ma kata obedo ni abiro nwoyo honni kod ranyisi e piny Misri,
to Farao ok nowinju. Omiyo anasand jo-Misri gi masiche madongo kakumogi malich mi anagol joga ma jo-Israel e piny Misri.
Kendo jo-Misri nongʼe ni an Jehova Nyasaye e kinde ma anakumgi ka agolo jo-Israel kuomgi.”
Musa kod Harun notimo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochikogi.
E kinde mane giwuoyo gi Farao, Musa ne ja-higni piero aboro to Harun to ne ja-higni piero aboro gadek.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa kod Harun niya,
“Ka Farao onyisou ni mondo utim hono moro, to in Musa nyis Harun ni, ‘Kaw ludhi kendo dire piny e nyim Farao,’ kendo obiro lokore thuol.”
Kuom mano, Musa kod Harun ne odhi ir Farao mi gitimo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochikogi. Harun nodiro ludhe piny e nyim Farao kod jodonge mi nolokore thuol.
Farao noluongo jorieko kod ajuoke mag Misri mine gitimo gik machal gi mane Harun otimo ka gitiyo gi teko mag yedhegi mopondo.
Ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomgi nodiro ludhe piny kendo nolokore thuol. To ludh Harun nomwonyo ludhegigo.
To kata kamano, chuny Farao ne odoko matek kendo ne ok onyal winjogi mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ne osewacho.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Chuny Farao pod tek, odagi weyo joga mondo odhi.
Dhi ir Farao gokinyi ka odhi e aora. Rite e bath aora Nael mondo irom kode, bende kaw luth mane olokore thuol cha e lweti.
Eka inyise ni, ‘Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach jo-Hibrania, oseora mondo anyisi niya: We joga odhi, mondo gilama e thim. To nyaka chop koroni pok iwinjo.
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho: Ranyisini biro miyo ingʼe ni an Jehova Nyasaye: Abiro chwado pi aora Nael gi luth mantie e lwetani kendo pigno biro lokore remo.
Rech manie aora Nael biro tho, kendo aora biro dungʼ, jo-Misri ok nomodh pigno.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Nyis Harun ni, ‘Kaw ludhi mondo irie badi ewi pige mag Misri, ma gin aore matindo kod madongo, yewni kod kuonde duto mag kano pi, kendo gibiro lokore remo.’ Remo biro bedo kamoro amora e piny Misri nyaka ei agulni molos gi kite.”
Musa kod Harun notimo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochikogi. Notingʼo ludhe e nyim Farao kod jodonge duto mi ochwado aora Nael kendo pige duto nolokore remo.
Rech manie aora Nael notho, kendo aora nodungʼ marach ma jo-Misri ne ok nyal modho pige. Remo ne nitie kamoro amora e piny Misri.
To ajuoke mag Misri notimo mana gik machal kamano gi tijegi mag ajuoke mi chuny Farao nomedo doko matek; ne ok onyal winjo wach Musa kod Harun mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosewacho.
To kata kamano nodok e kare mar dak, kendo ne ok odewo wechegi.
Jo-Misri duto nokunyo bath aora Nael mondo giyud pi modho, nikech ne ok ginyal modho pi aorano.
Ndalo abiriyo norumo bangʼ ka Jehova Nyasaye nosechwado aora Nael.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa mondo odhi ir Farao kendo onyise niya, Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho: “We joga odhi mondo gilama.
Ka idagi weyo joga mondo odhi, to abiro kelo masira mar ogwende e pinyni duto.
Ogwende nopongʼ aora Nael kendo giniwuogi ka gidhi e odi nyaka kor nindo. Bende ginipongʼ nyaka kitandani, ute jodongi kod mag jogi, kaachiel gi kuonde tedo gi dwalo makati.
Ogwendego nochikre kuomi, kuom jogi kendo kuom jodongi duto.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya; “Nyis Harun kama: ‘Rie ludhi ewi aore, sokni kod yewni, kendo ogwende nowuog maim piny Misri duto.’ ”
Omiyo Harun norieyo lwete ewi pige mag Misri, kendo ogwende nowuok mopongʼo pinyno.
To ajuoke bende notimo mana kamano gi tijegi mochido kendo negimiyo ogwende owuok e piny Misri.
Farao noluongo Musa kod Harun mi owachonegi niya, “Kwauru Jehova Nyasaye mondo ogol ogwendegi kuoma kod joga, eka anawe jogi mondo odhi otim misengini ni Jehova Nyasaye.”
Musa nodwoko Farao niya, “Aweyoni mondo iket kinde mowinjore alemnie kod jodongi gi jogi mondo in kod joodi ogol ogwende kuomu, to mago manie aora Nael to nodongʼ.”
Farao nodwoke niya, “Obed kiny.” Musa nodwoke niya, “We obed mana kaka isewachono mondo ingʼe ni onge ngʼat machal kod Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa.
Ogwende nodar kawuok e uteni, e ute jodongi kod ute mag jogi; to e aora Nael ok giniwuogie.”
Bangʼ ka Musa kod Harun noseweyo Farao, Musa noywak ni Jehova Nyasaye nikech ogwende mane osekelo kuom Farao.
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye notimo mana kaka Musa nokwaye. Ogwende notho ei udi kod laru gi pewe.
Negichokore pidhe pidhe kendo negipongʼo piny.
Kane Farao oneno ni oseyudo thuolo, noketo chunye matek mine ok onyal winjo Musa kod Harun, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Nyis Harun kama: ‘Rie ludhi mondo ichwadgo buru ma e lowo,’ kendo buru ma e lowo mar piny Misri duto biro lokore kikun.”
Negitimo mano kendo ka Harun norieyo bade mane otingʼogo luth mi ochwado buru ma e lowo, kikun nopor kuom ji kod jamni. Buru ma e piny Misri duto nolokore kikun.
To ka ajuoke notemo mondo gin bende gihon kikun kuom tichgi mochido, to ne ok ginyal, kendo kikun nopor kuom ji gi jamni.
Ajuoke nowacho ne Farao niya, “Ma en lwet Nyasaye!” To kata kamano chuny Farao ne tek kendo ne ok onyal winjo wach Musa gi Harun mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Chiew gokinyi ahinya mondo irom gi Farao ka odhi e aora Nael mondo inyise kama: Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho: We joga odhi mondo gilama.
To ka ok iweyo joga mondo odhi, to abiro kelo lwangʼni kuomi, kuom jodongi, kuom jogi kod ei uteu duto. Ute jo-Misri biro pongʼ gi lwangʼni kata mana e lowo kama gintie bende biro pongʼ.
“ ‘To chiengʼno ok anahon lwangʼni e piny Goshen kama joga odakie, mi iningʼe ni an Jehova Nyasaye kare anie pinyni.
Abiro keto pogruok e kind joga kod jogi. Hononi kiny notimre kiny.’ ”
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye notimo mano. Kweth mag lwangʼni mopoto noolore e od Farao, kendo ei ut jodonge bende piny Misri duto ne lwangʼnigo oketho.
Eka Farao noluongo Musa kod Harun mowachonegi niya, “Dhiuru utim misango ni Nyasachu e piny Misri ka.”
To Musa nodwoko niya, “Mano ok nyal bedo kare. Misengini ma wachiwo ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nyalo bedo gima kwero ni jo-Misri. To ka wachiwo misengini makwerogo e wangʼ-gi, donge gibiro goyowa gi kite?
Nyaka wakaw wuodh ndalo adek e thim mondo wachiw misengini ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa mana kaka ochikowa.”
Farao nodwoko niya, “Abiro yienu mondo udhi uchiw misengini ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu e thim to mana ka ok udhi mabor. Omiyo lamnauru.”
Musa nodwoko niya, “Bangʼ kinde matin ka asewuok, to abiro lamoni Jehova Nyasaye, kendo kiny lwangʼni nowe Farao, jodonge kod joge. Makmana ni Farao kik chak riambi kotamo jo-Israel dhi timo misengini ni Jehova Nyasaye.”
Bangʼe Musa noweyo Farao mi olamo Jehova Nyasaye,
kendo Jehova Nyasaye notimo kaka Musa nokwayo: Lwangʼni noweyo Farao kod jodonge kaachiel gi joge: Kata lwangʼni achiel ne ok odongʼ.
To kata mana e kindeni Farao nomedo bedo gi tok teko kendo ne ok onyal weyo jo-Israel mondo odhi.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Dhi ir Farao mondo iwachne kama: ‘Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach jo-Hibrania wacho: “We joga odhi mondo olama!”
To ka itamori weyogi mondo gidhi kendo isiko kiketogi e tich misumba,
to lwet Jehova Nyasaye biro kelo tho ne jamni mantiere lek kaka fareseni kod pundeni, ngamia magi kaachiel gi dhogi, rombegi kod dieki.
To Jehova Nyasaye biro keto pogruok kuom jamb jo-Israel kod mago mag jo-Misri mi onge chiach ja-Israel moro amora ma biro tho.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye noketo odiechiengʼ ma gigo notimre kowacho kama: “Kiny Jehova Nyasaye notim ma e pinyni.”
Kendo kinyne Jehova Nyasaye notimo kamano. Jamni duto mag jo-Misri notho, to onge jamb ja-Israel kata achiel mane otho.
Kane Farao ooro ji mondo onon wachno, to negiyudo kaonge kata achiel kuom jamb jo-Israel mane otho. To kata kamano wi Farao nomedo bedo matek mine ok onyal weyo ogandano mondo odhi.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa kod Harun niya, “Jukuru buch kendo mopongʼo lwetu mondo Musa okire e kor yamo e nyim Farao.
Obiro lokore buru mayom e piny Misri duto kendo buche malokore adhola biro gore kuom ji kaachiel gi jamni e piny duto.”
Kuom mano ne gijuko buch kendo mi gichungʼ e nyim Farao. Musa nokiro buru e kor yamo kendo buche malokore adhola nogore kuom ji kod jamni.
Ajuoke ne ok nyal chungʼ e nyim Musa nikech buche mane ni kuomgi kaachiel gi jo-Misri duto.
To Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo chuny Farao omedo bedo matek mine ok nonyal winjo wach Musa kod Harun, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosewacho ne Musa.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Chiew okinyi mangʼich, idhi ir Farao kendo inyise kama: ‘Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach jo-Hibrania wacho: We joga odhi olama.
Ka ok kamano to wangʼni abiro oro masichena madongo dongo kuomi, kuom jodongi kod kuom jogi mondo ingʼe ni onge ngʼat machal koda e piny ngima.
Ka dine arie bada mi agoyi gi tuo moro kaachiel gi jogi, to dikoro asetieki e wangʼ piny.
Makmana asetingʼi malo mana ne wachni, ni mondo anyisigo tekona kendo mondo nyinga olandi e piny duto.
To kaka pod ithago joga kendo itamori weyogi mondo gidhi,
kiny sa machal kama anaor pe malich mapok none e piny Misri, nyaka nene.
Chiw chik mondo jambu kaachiel gi gimoro amora ma un-go e pap okel kar tony, nikech pe biro chwer kuom ngʼato angʼata kata le moro amora ma pod ni oko ma ok odonjo e kar tony mi githo.’ ”
Jodong Farao-go ma noluoro wach Jehova Nyasaye noreto mondo okel wasumbinigi kaachiel gi jambgi e kar tony.
To mago mane ok odew wach Jehova Nyasaye ne oweyo wasumbinigi gi jambgi e pap.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Rie badi kochomo polo mondo pe ochwe e piny Misri duto; kochwe kuom ji, le kod gimoro amora madongo e puothe mag Misri.”
Ka Musa norieyo ludhe kochomo polo, Jehova Nyasaye nooro mor polo gi pe kendo polo nomil koni gi koni, kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye noolo pe e piny Misri.
Pe nochwe kendo polo nomil koni gi koni. Ne en masich pe marachie moloyo nyaka piny Misri ne chakre.
E piny Misri duto pe nogoyo gimoro amora mantie e pewe; obed ji kata le. Nogoyo gimoro amora matwi e puothe kendo nolwero it yiende duto.
Makmana piny Goshen kende ema pe ok ochwee, kama piny ma jo-Israel nodakie.
Eka Farao noluongo Musa gi Harun. Nowachonegi niya, “Koro aseketho. Jehova Nyasaye ni kare, to an kaachiel gi joga wasetimo richo.
Kwanwa Jehova Nyasaye nimar mor polo gi pe oromowa. Abiro weyou mondo udhi, nimar onge tiende mondo umed bedo ka.”
Musa nodwoko niya, “Ka asewuok oko mar dala, abiro yaro bada ka akwayo Jehova Nyasaye. Polo mamor biro rumo bende pe ok nochak ochwe kendo, mondo ingʼe ni piny en mar Jehova Nyasaye.
To kata kamano angʼeyo ni in kaachiel gi jodongi pod ok uluoro Jehova Nyasaye.”
(Tworo gi shairi nokethore chuth, nimar noyudo ka shairi oseketo wangʼe, to tworo nosethiewo.
Ngano to ne ok okethore nimar ne pok gimoyo.)
Eka Musa noweyo Farao mi gidhi oko mar dala. Noyaro bade ni Jehova Nyasaye, mi mor polo kod pe norumo kendo koth bende ne ok ochwe e piny.
Kane Farao oneno ka koth, pe gi mor polo orumo, to nomedo timo richo. Nomedo bedo gi chuny matek en kaachiel gi jodonge.
Kuom mano chuny Farao nomedo bedo matek kendo ne ok oyie ni jo-Israel mondo odhi kaka ne Jehova Nyasaye osewacho kokalo kuom Musa.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Dhi ir Farao, nikech asemiyo chunye kaachiel gi chunje jodonge odoko matek mondo mi atim honnigi mag ranyisina e kindgi;
eka ununyis nyithindu kod nyikwau kaka ne adoko makwiny gi jo-Misri bende kaka ne atimo ranyisina e kindgi, eka mondo ungʼe ni an Jehova Nyasaye.”
Kuom mano Musa gi Harun nodhi ir Farao mi owachone niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach jo-Hibrania wacho: ‘Nyaka karangʼo ma ibiro tamori bolori e nyima? We joga odhi mondo gilama.
Ka itamori weyo joga mondo odhi, to abiro kelo ongogo e pinyi kiny.
Gibiro poto ma gium lowo ma ok nen. Gibiro chamo gimoro amora matin mane pe oweyo kaachiel gi kit yien duto matwi e lowo.
Gibiro pongʼo uteni gi ut jodongi kod mag jo-Misri duto; enobed gimoro ma wuoneu kata kwereu pok noneno chakre odiechiengʼ mane gichako dak e pinyni nyaka sani.’ ” Eka Musa nolokore mowuok e nyim Farao.
Jodong Farao nowachone niya, “Ngʼatni nobednwa obadho nyaka karangʼo? We ogandani odhi mondo mi gidhi gilam Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi. Dibed ni pok ifwenyo ni Misri kethore?”
Eka Musa gi Harun noduogo ir Farao. Farao nowachonegi niya, “Dhi, ulam Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, makmana ni en ngʼa gini madhi kodu?”
Musa nodwoke niya, “Wabiro dhi gi jowa duto jomatindo kuom jomadongo gi yawuotwa gi nyiwa kaachiel gi jambwa kod dhowa duto, nimar nyaka watim nyasi ni Jehova Nyasaye.”
Farao nowacho niya, “Mad Jehova Nyasaye bed kodu ka dipo ni aweyou udhi gi mondu kod nyithindu! Nenore ni udwaro kelo chandruok!
Ooyo! Chwo kende ema mondo odhi kendo olam Jehova Nyasaye nimar mano ema isebedo ka ikwayo.” Eka Musa gi Harun noriembi oko e nyim Farao.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Rie badi e piny Misri mondo bonyo opoti e piny kendo mondo ocham gimoro amora matwi e puothe gi gimoro amora ma pe oweyo.”
Kuom mano Musa norieyo ludhe e piny Misri, kendo Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo yamb wuok chiengʼ okudho matek e pinyno odiechiengno kod otienono duto. Kane ochopo gokinyi, yamono nokelo bonyo;
omiyo negimonjo piny Misri duto ma gipoto kamoro amora man thuolo e pinyno. Nyaka nene masira machal kamano mar bonyo ne pok obetie kendo ok nochak obedie kendo.
Ne giumo lowo mi piny olokore maratengʼ. Negichamo gimoro amora ma pe noweyo, mane gin gimoro amora matwi e puothe gi olembe ma nitie ewi yien. Onge kata it oboke manodongʼ e yien kata yath moro e piny Misri.
Farao noluongo Musa gi Harun mapiyo nono mi owachonegi niya, “Asetimo richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi kaachiel gi nyimu bende,
koro yie ichak iwena richona kendo lam ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi mondo ogol masira marachni kuoma.”
Musa noweyo Farao mi olamo Jehova Nyasaye.
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye noloko kudho mar yamo mi yamb podho chiengʼ nokudho matek, bende yamono nochoko bonyo duto mi otero e Nam Makwar. Onge bonyo moro amora mane odongʼ e piny Misri.
To Jehova Nyasaye noketo chuny Farao odoko matek kendo ne ok onyal weyo jo-Israel mondo odhi.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Rie badi kochomo polo mondo mudho olandre e piny Misri; ma en mudho mandiwa.”
Kuom mano Musa norieyo bade kochomo polo kendo mudho mandiwa nokwako piny Misri duto kuom ndalo adek.
Onge ngʼato mane nyalo neno wadgi kata wuok oko kuom ndalo adek, kata kamano piny Israel to ne nigi ler kama negidakie.
Eka Farao noluongo Musa mi owachone niya, “Dhiuru, ulam Jehova Nyasaye. Mondu kod nyithindu nyalo dhi kodu; makmana dhou gi jambu ema nyaka dongʼ.”
To Musa nowacho niya, “Nyaka imiwa thuolo mar timo misengini gi misango miwangʼo pep ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa.
Jambwa duto bende nyaka dhi kodwa; kendo onge moro amora madongʼ chien. Moko kuomgi nyaka watigo e lamo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, nikech kapok wachopo kuno to ok wabi ngʼeyo ni mane monego watigo kuom lamo Jehova Nyasaye.”
To Jehova Nyasaye noketo chuny Farao obedo matek kendo ne ok oyie mondo owegi gidhi.
Farao nowacho ne Musa niya, “Wuogi ia e nyima! Ne ni ok ichako ibiro e nyima kendo! Nimar odiechiengʼ ma inine wangʼa kendo to ibiro tho!”
Musa nodwoke niya, “Mana kaka iwachono, ok anachak abi iri kendo.”
Noyudo ka Jehova Nyasaye osewacho ne Musa niya, “Pod abiro kelo masira achiel kuom Farao gi jo-Misri. Bangʼ masirano, obiro weyou mondo uwuog kae udhi, to ka otimo kamano, to obiro mana riembou chutho.
Nyis oganda ni chwo kaachiel gi mon mondo omi jobathgi gik molos gi fedha kod dhahabu.”
(Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo jo-Misri otimo ngʼwono ne jo-Israel, kendo Musa owuon nomi luor gi jodong Farao e piny Misri kaachiel gi jo-Misri.)
Omiyo Musa nowacho niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho: ‘Kochopo dier otieno tir, to abiro dhi e piny Misri.
Nyithindo duto makayo ma yawuowi mag Misri biro tho, kochakore gi wuod Farao makayo mobet e kom duongʼ nyaka wuod nyako ma jatich makayo ma jarego, kaachiel gi nyithind jamni mokwong nywol.
Ywak nobedie piny Misri duto, ma en ywak moloyo moro amora mosebedo kata mabiro bedo.
To jo-Israel nobed gi kwe ma kata mana guok ok nogwe dhano kata chiayo.’ Bangʼ mano eka unungʼe ni Jehova Nyasaye keto pogruok e kind Misri gi Israel.
Jodong-gi duto biro biro ira ka gikulorena kendo kagiwacho ni, ‘Dhiyo, in kaachiel gi jogo maluwi!’ Bangʼ mano to anadhi.” Eka Musa nowuok e nyim Farao ka en gi mirima.
Jehova Nyasaye nosewacho ni Musa niya, “Farao biro tamore winji mondo honnina omedre piny e Misri.”
Musa gi Harun notimo honnigi duto e nyim Farao, to Jehova Nyasaye noketo chunye omedo bedo matek mine ok onyal weyo jo-Israel dhi koa e pinye.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa gi Harun ka gin Misri niya,
“Dweni ema biro bedonu dwe mokwongo, ma en dwe mokwongo mar hiku.
Nyis oganda duto mar Israel ni odiechiengʼ mar apar mar dweni, ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka gol achiel kuom nyirombe ne joode, nyarombo achiel ne ot ka ot.
To ka nitie joot matin ma nyarombo achiel ohingo, to nyaka giriwre e nyarombo achiel gi joot machiegni kodgi, bangʼ ka gisekawo kwan joma ni kanyo. Nyaka ongʼe kar nyirombe madwarore kaluwore gi gima ngʼato ka ngʼato biro chamo.
Chiayo ma uyiero nyaka bed madichwo ma ja-higa achiel maonge songa kendo unyalo yierogi kuom rombe kata diek.
Neni urito chiayogo nyaka odiechiengʼ mar apar gangʼwen mar dwe, eka oganda jo-Israel duto noyangʼ-gi ka chiengʼ wuok.
Eka bangʼe to gikaw remo moko kendo giwirgo sirni mag dhoudi kod wi dhoudi.
E otieno nogo nyaka gicham ringʼo mobul kaachiel gi alode makech kod makati ma ok oketie thowi.
Kik ucham ringʼo manumu kata motedi gi kado to nyaka ubul lemb chiayogo; wich, tielo kaachiel gi jamb-ich.
Kik uwe lemo moro dongʼ ma ok uchamo nyaka okinyi; to kapo nono moro odongʼ to nyaka wangʼe e mach chuth.
Ma e kaka onego uchame: Ka utweyo okanda enungou, ka urwako wuoche e tiendu kendo umako luth e lwetu; nyaka une ni uchame piyo nikech en sawo mar Pasaka mar Jehova Nyasaye.
“E otienono abiro wuotho e piny Misri duto kendo naneg nyathi ka nyathi madichwo makayo mar dhano kod chiayo, bende nakum nyiseche duto mag jo-Misri, an Jehova Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Remono nobed kido mar ranyisi makende manyiso kuma udakie kendo ka aneno remogo to anakadhu. Masiche ma agoyogo piny Misri ok nomaku.
“Ma en odiechiengʼ manyaka upar ne tiengeu duto mabiro kendo nyaka urite ka sawo mochwere ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Kuom ndalo abiriyo nyaka ucham makati ma ok oketie thowi. Odiechiengʼ mokwongo nyaka ugol oko thowi ma ukano e ute, nikech ngʼato angʼata ma ochamo gimoro amora ma oted gi thowi chakre chiengʼ mokwongo nyaka chiengʼ mar abiriyo to nongʼad kare oko kuom oganda jo-Israel.
Chiengʼ mokwongo kod chiengʼ mar abiriyo nyaka ubed gi chokruok mowal. Kik utim tich moro amora kuom odiechiengego makmana loso chiemo ma ji duto chamo; mano kende e gima unyalo timo.
“Nyaka utim Sawo mar makati ma ok oketie thowi, nikech chiengʼno ema ne agoloue piny Misri. Timuru nyasini odiechiengni kaka sawo mochwere ne tiengeu duto mabiro.
Chakre odhiambo mar tarik apar gangʼwen nyaka odhiambo mar tarik piero ariyo gachiel mar dwe mokwongo nyaka ucham makati ma ok oketie thowi.
Kuom ndalo abiriyo thowi moro amora kik yud e uteu, kendo ngʼato angʼata mochamo gimoro amora moketie thowi nyaka ngʼad kare oko kuom oganda jo-Israel, bed ni en japiny moro kata ja-Israel.
Kik ucham gima olos gi thowi. Kamoro amora mudakie nyaka une ni uchamo makati ma ok oketie thowi.”
Eka Musa noluongo jodong Israel duto mowachonegi niya, “Dhiuru mondo ngʼato ka ngʼato oyier nyarombo kata nyadiel ne joode kendo uyangʼ-gi ka utimogo Pasaka.
Eka ukaw oboke mag raywechi ulute remo mar chiayono manie karaya kendo ukir moko ewi sirni mag dhoudi, to moko ukir e sirni mag dhoutu koni gi koni. Kik ngʼato angʼata kuomu wuog oko mar dhoot nyaka okinyi.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye biro wuotho e piny Misri duto mondo oneg jo-Misri, to obiro neno remo ewi reru kod e bath dhoutu kendo nokal dhoudigo, ok noyie ne janek mondo odonj e uteu mondo onegu.
“Rituru wechegi kaka chike mochwere nyaka ne tienge mabiro.
Ka udonjo e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye biro miyou kaka ne osingorenu, to neuru ni utimo nyasi mar sawoni.
Kendo ka nyithindu nopenju gima tiend sawoni en,
to nyisgiuru ni, ‘En misango mar Pasaka mitimo ni Jehova Nyasaye, nikech nokadho ut jo-Israel e piny Misri konego jo-Misri to oweyo miechwa.’ ” Eka ji nopodho auma molamo Jehova Nyasaye.
Jo-Israel notimo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa kod Harun.
E dier otieno tir Jehova Nyasaye nonego nyithindo ma yawuowi makayo duto mag jo-Misri, kochakore gi kach ruoth Farao mane ni e kom duongʼ nyaka kach joma ni e od twech, kaachiel gi nyithindo makayo duto mag jamni.
Farao kaachiel gi jodonge kod jo-Misri duto nochiewo e dier otieno kendo ne nitie ywak maduongʼ e piny Misri, nikech ne onge ot moro amora e piny Misri mane ngʼato ok othoe.
E otienono Farao ne oluongo Musa kod Harun mowachonegi niya, “Wuoguru gi jo-Israel piyo mondo uwe joga mondo udhi ulam Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kaka usekwayo.
Kawuru jambu kod kweth mag dhou mondo udhigo kaka usewacho kendo an bende lemnauru mondo ayud gweth.”
Jo-Misri nokwayo jo-Israel mondo owuog owe pinygi piyo kagiwacho niya, “Ka ok uwuok to waduto wabiro tho!”
Kuom mano jo-Israel nokawo mogo modwal mapok oketie thowi kendo negitingʼogi e gokgi e sufuriache ka giboyogi gi sukni.
Jo-Israel notimo kaka Musa ne ochikogi kendo ne gikwayo jo-Misri lewni kod gik molos gi fedha kod dhahabu.
Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo jo-Misri otimo ngʼwono ne jo-Israel kendo ne gimiyogi gimoro amora mane gikwayogi; kamano e kaka jo-Israel noyako gige jo-Misri.
Jo-Israel nowuok Rameses kochomo Sukoth; ne gin ji madirom alufu mia auchiel ka ok okwan mon kod nyithindo.
Oganda mamoko mathoth bende nodhi kodgi kaachiel gi kweth mangʼeny mag chiayo ma gin jamni kod kweth mangʼeny mag dhok.
Ne gitedo makati ma ok oketie thowi gi mogo modwal mane giago e piny Misri. Ne ok oketie thowi nikech ne oriembgi gia e piny Misri apoya kendo ne ok giyudo thuolo kata mar tedo chiemo mane ginyalo chamo e kor yo.
Jo-Israel nodak e piny Misri kuom higni mia angʼwen gi piero adek.
Chiengʼ mane higni mia angʼwen gi piero adekgo orumo ema ne oganda Jehova Nyasaye duto owuokie piny Misri.
Ne en otieno mane Jehova Nyasaye oritogie mondo ogolgie piny Misri. Otieno onogono en otieno moket mondo jo-Israel duto obed kaparo Jehova Nyasaye nyaka ne tienge mabiro.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa gi Harun niya, “Magi e chike monego urit ka utimo Pasaka. “Jopinje mamoko kik chame.
Misumba moro amora mungʼiewo nyalo chame to mana bangʼ kusetere nyangu,
to wendo moro mobuoro iru kata jatichu ok onego chame.
“Ring chiayo mar misango nyaka cham mana e ot achiel, kik lemo kata achiel gol oko mar odno kendo kik utur choke moro amora.
Oganda duto mar jo-Israel nyaka tim sawoni.
“Koponi nitie japiny moro modak e dieru modwaro timo ne Jehova Nyasaye Pasaka, to en kaachiel gi joge machwo nyaka tergi nyangu, eka onyalo riwore kodu e timo sawoni bangʼe nokwane kaka achiel kuom jo-Israel. Onge ngʼato angʼata madichwo ma ok oter nyangu ma oyiene chamo sawo mar Pasakani.
Chikni oket ne jo-Israel duto gi jopinje mamoko duto machalre.”
Jo-Israel duto notimo gik moko duto mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiko Musa gi Harun,
mi chiengʼno ema Jehova Nyasaye nogolo jo-Israel e piny Misri kochan-gi e dhoutgi.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Nyathi ka nyathi madichwo makayo nyaka walna. Nyak mokwongo mar nyodo e kind jo-Israel en mara, bed ni en dhano kata chiayo.”
Eka Musa nowacho ne ogandano niya, “Paruru odiechiengni, chiengʼ mane uwuokie piny Misri, piny mane ubedoe wasumbini, nikech Jehova Nyasaye nogolou e pinyno gi lwedo maratego. Kik ucham gimoro amora moketie thowi.
Kawuono e dwe mar Abib, ema uwuokie.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye okelou e piny jo-Kanaan gi jo-Hiti gi jo-Amor gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus, piny ma nosingore ne kwereu ni nomiu, piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich; to nyaka utim sawoni e dweni:
Kuom ndalo abiriyo chamuru Makati ma ok oketie thowi kendo chiengʼ mar abiriyo timuru nyasi ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Chamuru makati ma ok oketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyogo; gimoro amora man-gi thowi kik yudi e kindu kata e pinyu duto.
Chiengʼno wachne wuodi ni, ‘Atimo ma nikech gima Jehova Nyasaye notimona kane awuok e piny Misri.’
Raparni biro bedonu kaka ranyisi e lwetu kendo e lela wangʼu ni chik Jehova Nyasaye nyaka bed e dhou kinde duto, Jehova Nyasaye nogolou e piny Misri gi lwete maratego.
Rit chikni e ndalo mowal higa ka higa.
“Bangʼ ka Jehova Nyasaye osekelou e piny jo-Kanaan mi omiyougo, kaka ne osingo ka okwongʼorenu kaachiel gi kwereu,
to nyaka uchiw ni Jehova Nyasaye nyak mokwongo mar nyodo. Chiayo ka chiayo madichwo makayo gin mag Jehova Nyasaye.
Nyaka uwar nyathi punda ka nyathi punda mokwong nywol ka uchiwo nyarombo kare, to ka ok iware, to tur ngʼute. Waruru kayo duto mag yawuotu.
“E kinde mabiro, ka wuodi nopenji ni, ‘Ma to nyiso angʼo?’ To nyise ni, ‘Jehova Nyasaye nogolowa e piny Misri gi lwete maratego kama ne wabede wasumbini.
Kane Farao kuom wich teko mare otamore weyowa mondo wadhi, Jehova Nyasaye nonego nyithindo makayo duto mag dhano gi mag jamni, e piny Misri. Ma emomiyo atimo ne Jehova Nyasaye misango gi nyithind jamni machwo makayo, to wawaro yawuotwa kwachiwo gik moko kargi.’
Kendo obiro bedoni kaka ranyisi e lweti kendo kido e lela wangʼi ni Jehova Nyasaye nogolowa e piny Misri gi lwete maratego.”
Kane Farao oweyo ogandano odhi, Nyasaye ne ok oweyogi giluwo yo mangʼado e piny jo-Filistia, kata obedo ni yorno ne ngʼado machiegni. Nimar Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Ka jogi oromo gi lweny, to ginyalo loko pachgi mi gidog e piny Misri.”
Omiyo Nyasaye notelonegi ma giluwo yo malworo thim mochomo Nam Makwar. Jo-Israel nowuok e piny Misri ka oikore ne lweny.
Musa nokawo choke Josef ka nowuok nimar Josef noketo yawuot Israel osingore ka kwongʼore. Nowacho niya, “Nyasaye biro resou adier, bangʼe nyaka utingʼ chokena ka ua ka.”
Kane gisewuok Sukoth, ne gibworo Etham e lak thim.
Godiechiengʼ Jehova Nyasaye netelonegi gi bor polo mondo otelnegi e yorgi kendo gotieno notelonegi gi ligek mach mondo omigi ler, mondo mi negiwuothi odiechiengʼ kata otieno.
Boche mag polo mane otelonegi godiechiengʼ kata ligek mach mane otelonegi gotieno ne ok owuok kama ne entiere e nyim ogandano.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya;
“Nyis jo-Israel oduogi mondo gibuor machiegni gi Pi Hahiroth mantie e kind Migdol gi nam. Gibiro bworo machiegni gi nam, mochomore gi Baal Zefon.
Farao biro paro kowacho ni, ‘Jo-Israel digni e piny korwenyo e thim.’
Abiro miyo chuny Farao bedo mapek, mi owuogi kolawo jo-Israel. To abiro yudo duongʼ ne an awuon kuom Farao kaachiel gi jolwenje duto, eka jo-Misri nongʼe ni an Jehova Nyasaye.” Eka jo-Israel notimo kamano.
Kane onyis ruodh Misri ni jogo osedhi, Farao gi jodonge noloko pachgi kuom jo-Israel mi giwacho niya, “Angʼo ma wasetimoni? Waseweyo jo-Israel odhi kendo tije ma yande gitiyonwa orumo!”
Eka ne oikne geche mar jolweny, bangʼe nokawo jolweny mage.
Nokawo geche mia auchiel mabeyo mag lweny, kod geche mamoko mag jo-Misri ka moro ka moro nigi jatend lweny.
Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo chuny Farao ma ruodh Misri odoko matek, mi nolawo jo-Israel mane wuotho ka gin gi chir.
Jo-Misri kod farese Farao gi gechegi, gi joidh farese kod jolweny nolawo jo-Israel mi gijukogi ka gibworo e bath nam machiegni gi Pi Hahiroth mochomore gi Baal Zefon.
Kane Farao ochopo machiegni kodgi, jo-Israel notingʼo wangʼ-gi mi gineno ka jo-Misri lawogi. Luoro nomakogi mi giywakne Jehova Nyasaye.
Negiwacho ni Musa niya, “Ne onge kuonde yiko mane inyalo yikwae e piny Misri momiyo ikelowa e thim ka mondo wathoe? En angʼo ma isetimonwani kuom golowa e piny Misri?
Donge ne wanyisi e piny Misri ni, ‘Wewa, mondo watine jo-Misri?’ Dine bernwa tiyo ni jo-Misri moloyo tho e thim!”
Musa nodwoko ogandano niya, “Kik ubed maluor. Chungʼuru motegno eka ubiro neno resruok ma Jehova Nyasaye biro kelonu kawuono. Jo-Misri ma uneno kawuononi ok unuchak une kendo.
Jehova Nyasaye biro kedonu; owinjore ubed gi kwe.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Angʼo momiyo uywakna? Nyis jo-Israel mondo odhi nyime giwuoth.
Tingʼ ludhi malo kendo irie badi ewi nam mondo ipog pige eka jo-Israel ongʼad nam kawuotho e lowo motwo.
Abiro keto chuny jo-Misri doko matek mondo gilaw bangʼ-gi nyaka ei nam. Kendo abiro yudo duongʼ kuom Farao kaachiel gi jolweny gi geche lwenje kod joidh faresene.
Jo-Misri biro ngʼeyo ni an Jehova Nyasaye ka ayudo duongʼ kuom Farao gi gechene kod joidh faresene.”
Eka Malaika mar Nyasaye, mane osebedo kotelo e nyim jolwenj jo-Israel, nodok chien bangʼ jo-Israel. Bor polo bende ne osudo machiegni e nyim jo-Israel mi odok ka ngʼegi,
ka ochungʼ e kind jolwenj jo-Misri kod jo-Israel. Otienono duto bor polono nokelo mudho ne konchiel to komachielo nokelo ler; omiyo onge oganda mane osudo machiegni gi machielo otienono duto.
Eka Musa norieyo bade ewi nam, kendo otienono duto Jehova Nyasaye notugo yamo ma aa yo wuok chiengʼ mopogo pi nyadiriyo mi kanyo olokore lowo motwo. Pige nopogore,
kendo jo-Israel nongʼado nam kawuotho e lowo motwo, ka pi ogingore e bathgi korachwich gi koracham.
Jo-Misri nolawogi kendo farese Farao duto gi gechene kaachiel gi joidh gechene nolawogi nyaka ei nam.
Kane piny dwaro yawore Jehova Nyasaye nonenogi gie ligek mach, mine omiyo jolwenj jo-Misri odigni.
Nomiyo tiende gechegi owuok mine ok ginyal riembogi. Eka jo-Misri nowacho niya, “Waringuru waa kuom jo-Israel! Jehova Nyasaye ema kedonegi kod jo-Misri.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Rie badi e nam mondo pi oum jo-Misri gi gechegi kod joidh faresegi.”
Musa norieyo bade e nam kendo ka piny ne oyawore, to nonwangʼo ka pi osedok e wangʼe. Jo-Misri ne ringo kochomo dier nam, kendo Jehova Nyasaye noywerogi gi pi nyaka ei namno.
Pi nogingore kadok kare kendo noimo geche gi joidh farese gi jolweny Farao duto mane olawo jo-Israel nyaka e nam. Onge kata achiel kuomgi mane otony.
Jo-Israel to nongʼado nam kawuotho e lowo motwo, ka pi ogingore e bathgi korachwich gi koracham.
Chiengʼno Jehova Nyasaye noreso Israel e lwet jo-Misri, kendo Israel noneno ka jo-Misri otho e dho nam.
Bangʼ ka jo-Israel noseneno teko maduongʼ mane Jehova Nyasaye onyiso kokedo gi jo-Misri, oganda noluoro Jehova Nyasaye kendo negiketo genogi kuome kaachiel gi kuom Musa jatichne.
Eka Musa gi jo-Israel nowero wendni ni Jehova Nyasaye: “Abiro wer ni Jehova Nyasaye, nimar nyinge oromo mi duongʼ. Oseumo faras kod jariembne ei nam.
“Jehova Nyasaye e tekrena bende en e wenda; kendo osebedo warruokna. Anapake nimar en Nyasacha, ma Nyasach wuora, kendo abiro miyo nyinge duongʼ.
Jehova Nyasaye en jalweny; Jehova Nyasaye e nyinge.
Noimo geche Farao kod jolwenje ei Nam Makwar. Jodong Farao mogen duto noimo e nam makwar.
Pige matut oseimogi duto, kendo gisenimo nyaka e bwo pi mana ka kidi.
“Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, lweti ma korachwich ne nigi teko maduongʼ. Yaye, Jehova Nyasaye lweti ma korachwich ema isetiekogo wasigu.
“Kuom tekoni maduongʼ, ne iloyo jogo mane opiem kodi. Ne inyiso mirimbi mager mi nomwonyogi kaka lum.
Muya mawuok e umi nomiyo pige ogingore malo. Apaka mar pi nogingore mochungʼ ka kor ot; pige man kuonde matut nochokore e chuny nam.”
Jawasigu nosungore kawacho niya, “Abiro lawogi, abiro jukogi. Abiro pogo mwandugi; abiro yako gimoro amora. Abiro golo liganglana kendo lweta biro tiekogi.
Kane ikudho muchi kende, to nam noimogi. Ne ginimo ka chuma e apaka maduongʼ.
“En ngʼa machal kodi e kind nyiseche, yaye Jehova Nyasaye? En ngʼa machalo kodi: in miler moloyo, in ma in-gi duongʼ moloyo kendo matimo honni?
Ne irieyo badi ma korachwich ma piny omwonyogi.
“Kuom herani ma ok rum, ibiro telone oganda ma isereso. Kuom tekoni ibiro telonegi nyaka kar dakni maler.
Pinje biro winjo mi tetni, kihondko biro mako jo-Filistia.
Jodong Edom kibaji biro goyo, bende jotend Moab biro tetni, to jo-Kanaan chunygi biro nyosore;
kibaji kod kihondko biro biro kuomgi. Kuom teko mar lweti gibiro lingʼ thi ka kidi, nyaka ogandani kadhi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nyaka jogi mane ichweyo kadhi.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ibiro kelogi mi gidonji kendo ibiro miyo gibedi ewi godi mar girkeni, ma en kama ne iloso kaka kar dakni, kendo kama ler mar lemo mane iloso gi lweti, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye.
Jehova Nyasaye biro locho nyaka chiengʼ.”
Ka farese Farao gi gecheni kod joidh faresene ne odhi e nam, Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo pi nam odok e wangʼe mi oimogi, to jo-Israel nongʼado nam kawuotho ewi lowo motwo.
Eka Miriam janabi madhako ma nyamin Harun, nokawo oyieke e lwete kendo mon duto noluwo bangʼe ka gin gi oyieke kendo ka gimiel.
Miriam nowernegi niya, “Weruru ni Jehova Nyasaye, nimar otingʼe malo ahinya. Oseimo faras gi jaithne ei nam.”
Eka Musa notelo ni Israel kagiwuok e Nam Makwar kendo negidhi ei thim mar Shur. Kuom ndalo adek ne giwuotho e thim ma ok giyudo pi.
Kane gichopo Mara, ne ok ginyal modho pi makanyo nikech nokech. (Mano emomiyo kanyo iluongo ni Mara.)
Kuom mano ogandano nongʼur ne Musa kawacho niya, “Wabiro modho angʼo?”
Eka Musa noywak ne Jehova Nyasaye kendo Jehova Nyasaye nonyise yien moro. Nobole ei pi mi pi obedo mamit. Kanyo ema Jehova Nyasaye nomiyogie buche kod chike kendo notemogi.
Nowachonegi niya, “Ka uchiko itu maber ne wach Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ma utimo gima kare e nyim wangʼe, ka urito chikene kendo umako buchene duto, to ok anakel kuomu tuo moro amora mane akelo ne jo-Misri, nimar an Jehova Nyasaye machangou.”
Eka negichopo Elim, kama ne nitie sokni apar gariyo kod yiende mag othidhe piero abiriyo mine gibworo kanyo machiegni gi pi.
Oganda jo-Israel duto nochako wuoth kawuok Elim mi gidhi e thim mar Sin mantie e kind Elim gi Sinai, chiengʼ mar apar gabich mar dwe mar ariyo bangʼ kane gisewuok Misri.
E thim kanyo oganda jo-Israel duto nongʼur ne Musa gi Harun.
Jo-Israel nowachonegi niya, “Mad ne Jehova Nyasaye negwa e piny Misri! Kuno ne wabet kwalworo agulni mopongʼ gi ringʼo, kendo ne wachamo kit chiemo moro amora mane wadwaro, to isekelowa e thim ka mondo kech oneg ogandani duto.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Abiro lwaronu makati koa e polo malo. Ji nyaka wuogi pile pile mondo ochok moromogi odiechiengno. Kuom yorni abiro temogigo mondo ane kata ka gibiro luwo chikena.”
Chiengʼ mar auchiel nyaka gitedi gima gichoko, mano nyaka bed marom nyadiriyo kuom gima gisebedo ka gichoko odiechienge moko odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ.
Kuom mano Musa gi Harun nowacho ne jo-Israel duto kama: “Godhiambo ubiro ngʼeyo ni ne en Jehova Nyasaye ema noresou Misri,
kendo gokinyi ubiro neno duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye, nikech osewinjo ngʼur ma ungʼurnego. Wan to wan ngʼa gini ma dimi ungʼurnwa?”
Bende Musa nowachonegi niya, “Ubiro ngʼeyo ni ne en Jehova Nyasaye ka omiyou ringʼo mondo ucham godhiambo kendo gi Makati duto ma udwaro gokinyi nimar osewinjo ngʼur ma ungʼurnego. Wan to wan ngʼa? Ok wan ema ungʼurnwa to ungʼurne mana Jehova Nyasaye.”
Eka Musa nowacho ni Harun niya, “Nyis oganda jo-Israel duto ni, ‘Biuru e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, nimar osewinjo ngʼur ma ungʼurgo.’ ”
Ka pod Harun ne wuoyo ni oganda jo-Israel duto, negingʼiyo yo thim kendo duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye ne othinyore e boche polo.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Asewinjo ngʼur mar jo-Israel. Nyisgi kama, ‘Ka piny yuso ubiro chamo ringʼo kendo gokinyi ubiro chamo Makati muyiengʼ. Eka ubiro ngʼeyo ni an Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.’ ”
Odhiambono, aluru nobiro moimo kambi kendo gokinyi ne nitie thoo momoko koluoro kambi.
Kane thoo oserumo, gik marochere mongʼinore ongʼinore momoko ewi lowo nonenore.
Ka jo-Israel nonene, negipenjore kendgi niya, “Ma en angʼo?” Nimar ne ok gingʼeyo gima ne en. Musa nowachonegi niya, “En e Makati ma Jehova Nyasaye osemiyou mondo ucham.
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye osechiko, ‘Ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka chok mangʼeny kaka odwaro. Kaw moromo ngʼato ka ngʼato ma udakgo.’ ”
Jo-Israel notimo kaka nonyisgi; jomoko nochoko mangʼeny, to jomoko nochoko matin.
To kane gipimogi gi gir pimo mar omer, ngʼat mane ochoko mangʼeny ok ne nigi mangʼeny bende ngʼat mane ochoko matin ok ne nigi matin ahinya. Ngʼato ka ngʼato nochoko mana mangʼeny moromo gi dwarone.
Eka Musa nowachonegi niya, “Onge ngʼato manokan chiemono kata matin nyaka okinyi.”
Kata kamano, jomoko kuomgi ne ok odewo wach Musa, negikano moko nyaka okinyi, to negiyudo ka kudni opongʼo chiemono kendo negichako dungʼ. Kuom mano Musa ne iye owangʼ kodgi.
Okinyi ka okinyi ngʼato ka ngʼato ne choko moromo gi dwarone to ka chiengʼ nobedo makech to chiemono ne oleny.
Chiengʼ mar auchiel, ngʼato ka ngʼato nochoko morome nyadiriyo, bangʼe to jotend dhoudi nobiro mokelo ne Musa wachni.
Eka nowachonegi kama, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye ochiko, ‘Kiny en odiechieng yweyo, ma en Sabato maler mowal ne Jehova Nyasaye. Teduru mago mudwaro tedo kendo bokuru mago mudwaro boko, to modongʼ to ukan nyaka kiny.’ ”
Kuom mano negikano chiemo nyaka okinyi mana kaka Musa nochikogi kendo chiemono ne ok owichore kata timo kudni.
Musa nowachonegi niya, “Mano ema ucham kawuono nikech kawuono en Sabato ni Jehova Nyasaye. Ok unuyud chiemo munyalo kwanyo kawuono.
Chokuru chiemo kuom ndalo auchiel, nimar odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo ma en Sabato ok nonwangʼ chiemono.”
Kata kamano, jomoko nodhi mondo ochok chiemo chiengʼ mar abiriyo, to ne ok giyudo.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Ubiro tamoru rito chikena kod puonjna nyaka karangʼo?”
Beduru kungʼeyo ni Jehova Nyasaye osemiyou Sabato, mano emomiyo chiengʼ mar auchiel omiyou Makati moromo ndalo ariyo. Ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka sik kama entie chiengʼ mar abiriyo, kendo onge ngʼama nodhi oko.
Kuom mano oganda noyweyo chiengʼ mar abiriyo.
Oganda jo-Israel noluongo makatino ni manna nikech nochalo gi kodhi matindo tindo marachere, kendo ne en gi ndhandhu machal gi kek moted gi mor kich.
Musa nowacho niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye osechiko, ‘Kaw mana moromo ngʼato achiel chamo kendo kane ni tienge mabiro mondo gine Makati mane amiyou uchamo e thim kane agolou e piny Misri.’ ”
Kuom mano Musa nonyiso Harun kama, “Kaw manna madirom ngʼato achiel chamo mondo iket e agulu. Bangʼe kete e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mondo okane ne tienge mabiro.”
Kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa, Harun noketo manna e nyim Sandug Muma mondo mi okane.
Jo-Israel nochamo manna kuom higni piero angʼwen nyaka negichopo e piny mane ji odakie, negichamo manna nyaka negichopo e tongʼ mar piny Kanaan.
(Omer en achiel kuom apar mar efa.)
Oganda jo-Israel duto nochako wuoth kawuok e thim mar Sin, ka giwuotho ka gi kacha mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochikogi. Ne gibworo Refidim, to ne onge pi mane ji nyalo modho.
Kuom mano negidhawo gi Musa kagiwacho niya, “Miwa pi wamodhi.” To Musa nodwokogi niya “En angʼo momiyo udhawo koda? En angʼo momiyo uketo Jehova Nyasaye e tem?”
To kata kamano ji ne riyo mar pi oloyo kanyo, kendo ji nongʼur ni Musa. Negiwachone niya, “En angʼo momiyo nigolowa Misri mondo nyithindwa kaachiel gi jambwa otho?”
Eka Musa noywak ni Jehova Nyasaye niya, “En angʼo mowinjore atim kod jogi? Gichiegni kata mana goya gi kite.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Wuothi idhi e nyim oganda. Kaw jodong jo-Israel moko mondo odhi kodi kendo kaw luth mane ichwadogo aora Nael mondo idhigo.
Abiro chungʼ e nyimi e bath lwanda mantie Horeb. Chwad lwanda to pi nowuog kuome mi oganda nomodhi.” Kuom Mano Musa notimo kamano e nyim jodong jo-Israel duto.
Eka nochako kanyo ni Masa kod Meriba nikech jo-Israel nogwandore kanyo to bende nikech ne gitemo Jehova Nyasaye kagiwacho niya, “Bende Jehova Nyasaye ni e dierwa koso?”
Jo-Amalek nobiro momonjo jo-Israel Refidim.
Eka Musa nonyiso Joshua niya, “Yier jomoko kuom jowa mondo idhi iked gi jo-Amalek. Kiny anachungʼ ewi got gi ludh Nyasaye e lweta.”
Kuom mano Joshua nokedo gi jo-Amalek mana kaka Musa nochiko, kendo Musa gi Harun kod Hur nodhi ewi got.
E kinde duto mane Musa osiko kotingʼo bedene malo, to jo-Israel ne loyo, to kane Musa odwoko bedene piny, to jo-Amalek ema ne loyo.
Ka bede Musa nojony, to negikawo kidi mi giketone mondo obedie. Harun gi Hur ne ojuko bedene kotingʼo malo, ka ngʼato achiel omako bade konchiel, to machielo omako komachielo, omiyo bedene nosiko kochungʼ tir nyaka podho chiengʼ.
Kuom mano Joshua noloyo jolwenj jo-Amalek mana gi ligangla.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Ndik wachni e kitap ndiko kaka gima ibiro par bende nyaka ine ni Joshua owinje, nimar abiro tieko jo-Amalek duto e piny ka.”
Musa nogero kendo mar misango mochake ni “Jehova Nyasaye en banderana.”
Nowacho kama, “Nimar bede notingʼ malo e nyim kom duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye. Kendo Jehova Nyasaye noked gi jo-Amalek e tienge duto.”
Koro Jethro, jadolo mar Midian kendo jaduongʼ Musa, nowinjo gik moko duto mane Nyasaye osetimo ni Musa, kaachiel gi joge ma jo-Israel, bende kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosegolo jo-Israel kawuok e piny Misri.
Bangʼ ka Musa ne oseriembo chiege ma Zipora, jaduongʼne Jethro norwake
kaachiel gi yawuote ariyo. Wuowi achiel niluongo ni Gershom nimar Musa nowacho niya, “Asebedo jadak e piny ma ok marwa,”
to machielo nochako ni Eliezer nimar nowacho niya, “Nyasach wuonwa ema ne jakonyna, ne oresa kane Farao dwaro nega gi ligangla.”
Jethro, jaduongʼ Musa, kaachiel gi yawuot Musa gi chi Musa, ne jobiro ire e thim kama ne ojotie but got mar Nyasaye.
Noyudo ka Jethro oseorone wach niya, “An, jaduongʼni Jethro abiro iri gi chiegi kaachiel gi nyithindi ariyo.”
Kuom mano Musa nowuok mondo orom ni jaduongʼne mi nokulore piny kendo onyodhe. Ne gimosore eka bangʼe gidonjo ei hema.
Musa nonyiso jaduongʼne gik moko duto ma Jehova Nyasaye notimone Farao kaachiel gi jo-Misri, nikech jo-Israel. Bende nonyise chandruok duto mane giseyudo e yo kendo kaka Jehova Nyasaye noseresogi.
Jethro ne mor mar winjo gik mabeyo duto ma Jehova Nyasaye nosetimo ne jo-Israel kuom resogi e lwet jo-Misri.
Nowacho niya, “Opak Jehova Nyasaye, ma noresoi e lwet jo-Misri bende e lwet Farao kendo oreso oganda e lwet jo-Misri.
Koro angʼeyo ni Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ moloyo nyiseche moko duto, nimar notimo kamano ne joma nosando jo-Israel marach.”
Eka Jethro, jaduongʼ Musa, nokelo misango miwangʼo pep kod misengni mamoko bende ne Nyasaye, kendo Harun nobiro kod jodongo duto mag jo-Israel mondo gichiem gi jaduongʼ Musa e nyim Nyasaye.
Kinyne, Musa nobet e kome mondo obed jangʼad bura ne ogandano, kendo negichungʼ ka gilwore chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo.
Kane jaduongʼne oneno gik moko duto mane Musa timo ne oganda, nowacho ne kama, “En angʼo ma itimo ne ogandani? En angʼo momiyo in kendi ema ibedo kaka jangʼad bura, ka jogi olwori chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo?”
Musa nodwoke niya, “Nikech ji biro ira mondo omany dwach Nyasaye.”
Ka gin gi larruok moro amora e kindgi, to ikelona kendo athego joma ochwanyorego mi anyisgi buche kod chike mag Nyasaye.
Jaduongʼ Musa nodwoko kawacho niya, “Gima itimoni ok ber.
In kaachiel gi joma osebiro irigi ubiro mana ool. Tijni pek mohewi; ok inyal time kendi.
Chik iti mondo angʼadni rieko kendo Nyasaye obed kodi. Onego ibed jachungʼ jogi e nyim Nyasaye kendo iter larruokgi e nyime.
Puonjgi buche kod chike duto kendo nyisgi kaka onego gidagi kod tije monego gitim.
To nyaka iyier joma niginyalo ma gin ji moluoro Nyasaye, joma ogen ma ok kaw asoya, kendo iketgi gibed jotend ji maromo alufu alufu, mia mia, piero abich abich, kod apar apar.
Ketgi mondo gibedi jongʼad bura ni oganda kinde duto, to buche matek kende ema ginyalo keloni. Buche mayot ginyalo ngʼado giwegi, nimar mano biro miyo tingʼ ma in-go bedo mayot, nimar gibiro lawe kodi.
Ka itimo kama kaka Nyasaye dwaro, to ok ibi ol kendo jogi biro dok e miechgi kamor.”
Musa nowinjo jaduongʼne mi notimo gik moko duto mane owacho.
Noyiero joma riek kuom jo-Israel duto mi noketogi jotelo mag ji alufu alufu, mia mia, piero abich abich, kod apar apar.
Negitiyo kaka jongʼad bura mar oganda kinde duto. Buche matek negikelo ne Musa, to buche mayot negitieko giwegi.
Eka Musa nokowo jaduongʼne e yo kendo Jethro nodok e pinygi.
E dwe mar adek bangʼ ka jo-Israel nosewuok Misri, negichopo e thim Sinai e odiechiengʼno.
Bangʼ kane gisewuok Refidim, negidonjo thim Sinai, kendo Israel nojot e nyim got e thimno.
Eka Musa noidho got mondo odhi owuo gi Nyasaye kendo Jehova Nyasaye noluonge gi ewi got mowachone kama: “Ma e gima iwachne od Jakobo to gi jo-Israel.
‘Un uwegi useneno gima ne atimone piny Misri kendo kaka ne atingʼou mana kaka ongo tingʼo nyithinde mi akelou ira awuon.
Koro, ka uwinja chuth mi urito singruokna, to kuom ogendini duto ubiro bedo mwanduna awuon. Kata obedo ni piny duto en mara,
un to ubiro bedona oganda mar jodolo kendo oganda maler.’ Magi e weche manyaka iwachne jo-Israel.”
Kuom mano Musa nodok moluongo jodongo duto mag oganda mi oketo e nyimgi weche duto mane Jehova Nyasaye ochike mondo owachi.
Oganda duto nodwoko kanyakla kawacho niya, “Wabiro timo gik moko duto ma Jehova Nyasaye ochiko.” Kuom mano Musa nodwoko wachgi ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Abiro biro iru e boche polo mondo omi oganda owinj kaka awuoyo kodi kendo mano biro miyo giket genogi kuomi ndalo duto.” Eka Musa nonyiso Jehova Nyasaye gima oganda nowacho.
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Dhi ir oganda mondo ipwodhgi kawuono gi kiny. Ketgi giluok lepgi
mondo gibed moikore e odiechiengʼ mar adek, nimar chiengʼno Jehova Nyasaye biro lor ewi Got Sinai ka ji duto nene.
Ket tongʼ ne oganda molworo got kendo nyisgi ni, ‘Beduru motangʼ mondo kik ngʼato idh got kata mulo tie got, nimar ngʼato angʼata mochopo e tiend godni to nyaka negi.
Ngʼatno nyaka chiel gi kite, kata chwowe gi asere; to kik ngʼato angʼata ket lwete kuome. Bed ni en dhano kata le, ok noweye mondo obed mangima.’ To ji nyalo idho godno mana ka tungʼ oywak kuom thuolo malach.”
Bangʼ ka Musa noselor e got modhi ir oganda, nopwodhogi mine gilwoko lepgi.
Eka nowacho ne oganda niya, “Ikreuru ne odiechiengʼ mar adek kendo kik ngʼato riwre gi chiege.”
Chiengʼ mar adek gokinyi, polo nomil kamor, ka boche polo okwako wi got kendo turumbete noywag matek, ma ji duto mane ni e kambi notetni.
Eka Musa notelo ne oganda kawuok e kambi mondo orom gi Nyasaye, kendo negichungʼ e tiend got.
Iro noimo Got Sinai nikech Jehova Nyasaye nolor kanyo ei mach. Iro ne dhwolore kawuok ewi godno mana ka iro mawuok e kendo, mi got duto noyiengni,
kendo turumbete nomedo ywak matek. Eka Musa nowuoyo kendo Nyasaye nodwoke.
Jehova Nyasaye nolor ewi Got Sinai mi oluongo Musa nyaka ewi godno. Omiyo Musa noidho e got
mi Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Dhiyo kendo isiem ji mondo kik girire ni gidwaro neno Jehova Nyasaye nimar thothgi nyalo tho.
Kata mana jodolo ma osudo ir Jehova Nyasaye nyaka pwodhre ka ok kamano to Jehova Nyasaye nomwomre kuomgi.”
Musa nowacho ne Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Ji ok nyal biro ewi Got Sinai nimar in iwuon ema ne isiemowa ni mondo waket kiewo molworo got mondo owale obed maler.”
Jehova Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “Lor piny iom Harun ibigo ira. To jodolo gi ji kik rire mondo one Jehova Nyasaye, nono to abiro mwomora kuomgi.”
Kuom mano Musa nolor piny ir ji monyisogi gik mane Jehova Nyasaye owachone.
Eka Nyasaye nowuoyo kowacho niya,
“An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mane ogolou e piny Misri, ka uwuok e piny mane unie wasumbini.
“Kik ubed gi nyiseche mamoko e nyima.
Kik ulos nyasaye milamo maket gi kido moro amora e polo malo kata e piny mwalo, kata e bwo pi.
Kik ukulrunegi piny; bende kik ulamgi; nimar An, Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, An Nyasaye ma janyiego, kendo akumo nyithindo nikech richo mar wuonegi chakre tiengʼ mar adek nyaka tiengʼ mar angʼwen mar jogo mamon koda,
to anyiso hera ni tienge gana gi gana mar jogo mohera kendo morito chikena.
Kik uti gi nying Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu e yo ma ok owinjore, nimar Jehova Nyasaye ok nongʼwon ne ngʼato angʼata matiyo gi nyinge e yo marach.
Rituru chiengʼ Sabato kendo ukete obed maler.
Tiuru kuom ndalo auchiel kendo uti tijeu duto,
to chiengʼ mar abiriyo en Sabato ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Chiengʼno ok unutim tich moro amora, bed ni un kata yawuotu kata nyiu kata jotiju machwo kata jotiju mamon kata jambu kata jodak manie dieru.
Nimar kuom ndalo auchiel Jehova Nyasaye nochweyo polo gi piny, gi nembe kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie igi, to noyweyo chiengʼ mar abiriyo. Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye nogwedho chiengʼ Sabato mi okete maler.
Luor wuonu gi minu mondo udagi amingʼa e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou.
Kik ineki.
Kik iterri.
Kik ikwal.
Kik ihang wach ne wadu.
Kik igomb od wadu. Kik igomb chi wadu kata jatije ma wuowi kata jatije ma nyako, kata rwadhe kata pundane kata gire moro amora.”
Kane oganda oneno mil polo gi mor polo kendo owinjo ywak turumbete mi gineno ka got otimo iro, luoro nomakogi. Negisudo gichien
mi giwachone Musa niya, “Wuo kodwa in iwuon to wabiro winjo. Kik iwe Nyasaye wuo kodwa nono to wabiro tho.”
Musa nowacho ne oganda niya, “Kik ubed maluor. Nyasaye osebiro mondo otemu mondo omi usik kuluore kendo mondo kik utim richo.”
Ogandano nochungʼ gichien ka Musa to ne ochomo bor polo kama Nyasaye ne nitie.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Nyis jo-Israel kama: ‘Useneno un uwegi ni asewuoyo kodu ka aa e polo.
Kik ulos nyiseche manono mondo opiem koda; bende kik ulos nyiseche mag kido mag fedha kata dhahabu.
“ ‘Losnauru kendo mar misango mochwe gi lowo kendo timieuru misenginiu miwangʼo pep kod mag lalruok gi rombeu gi dieu kod dhou. Kinde moro amora ma amiyo nyinga oyudo duongʼ, to anabi iru mi agwedhu.
Ka ulosona kendo mar misango mar kite, to kik ugere gi kite mopa, nimar ubiro miyo kendono bedo mogak ka utiyoe gi gige payo kite.
Kendo kik udhi e kendona mar misango ka uwuotho e kuonde motingʼore ma iidhogo malo, dipo ka dugu onenorene.’
“Magi e chike manyaka iketi e nyimgi.
“Ka ingʼiewo ja-Hibrania ma misumba, to enotini kuom higni auchiel. To e higa mar abiriyo, enobed thuolo, ka ok ochulo gimoro.
Kane obiro kapok okendo, to nodog kende; to kane obiro ka osekendo, to nodog gi chiegeno.
Ka ruodhe omiye dhako kendo onywolone yawuowi gi nyiri, dhakono kaachiel gi nyithinde nobed mwandu ruodhe kendo mana misumbano kende ema nobed thuolo.
“To ka misumba owacho ni, ‘Ahero ruodha kod chiega gi nyithinda kendo ok adwar bedo thuolo,’
to ruodhe nyaka tere e nyim jongʼad bura. Notere e dhoot kata e siro mar dhoot kendo notuch ite gi riwi. Bangʼe obiro bedo misumbane nyaka chiengʼ.
“Ka ngʼato ouso nyare kaka misumba, to ok noweye obed thuolo kaka iweyo misumba madichwo.
To ka ruoth mongʼieweno chunye ok mor kode; to ruodheno noweye mondo oware. Oonge gi thuolo mar use ne jopinje mamoko, nikech oseketho singruokne kode.
Ka oyiere ni wuode, to nyaka omiye duongʼ kaka nyare.
Ka wuowino onywomo dhako machielo, to nyaka omi dhako mokwongo chiemo, lewni kendo nyaka obed kode e achiel.
To ka ok ochiwone gik moko adekgi, to dhakono, ni thuolo mar dhi, maonge chudo moro amora mar pesa.
“Ngʼato angʼata mogoyo ngʼato kendo onego to adier nyaka negi.
To kata kamano, ka gima otimono obothne, ma en dwach Nyasaye mondo mi otimre; to Nyasaye nomiye kar tony moseikone.
To ka ngʼato ochano kendo onego ngʼat machielo kuom wangʼ teko, to goleuru oko mabor gi kar kendona mar misango kendo negeuru.
“Ngʼato angʼata ma omonjo wuon kata min nyaka negi.
“Ngʼato angʼata mokawo nyawadgi githuon mi omiye ngʼat machielo kuom chudo kata bed ni pod opande e kindeno moyude gi ngʼatno, to nyaka nege.
“Ngʼato angʼata ma okwongʼo wuon kata min nyaka negi.
“Ka chwo gore kendo achiel kuomgi ogoyo nyawadgi gi kidi kata gi adhongʼ to ok otho, to obedo mana matuo kosiko e pien,
to ngʼatno mane ogocho ok nomok e wachno ka machielono ochungo mi owuotho oko gi ludhe; to kata kamano, nyaka ochul ngʼat mohinyoreno kuom thuolone mokethore kendo one ni ochango chutho.
“Ka ngʼato ogoyo dichwo kata dhako ma misumba gi luth kendo misumbano otho kaluwore gi gochono, nyaka kume.
To ok enokume ka misumbano ochungo oa malo bangʼ ndalo achiel kata ariyo, nimar misumbano en mwandune.
“Ka chwo magore ogoyo dhako man-gi ich kendo onywol ka kinde nywol pok ochopo to onge hinyruok moro malich, ngʼat motimo marachno nyaka gol chudo moro amora ma chwor dhakono okwayo kendo jangʼad bura oyiego.
To ka nitie hinyruok marach to nyaka ukaw ngima kar ngima kendo
wangʼ kar wangʼ, kendo lak kar lak, kendo lwedo kar lwedo kendo tielo kar tielo,
del mowangʼ kar del mowangʼ kendo adhola kar adhola, kendo kama ogwar kar kama ogwar.
“Ka ngʼato ogoyo wangʼ misumba madichwo kata madhako ma wangʼeno okethore, to nyaka owene misumbaneno thuolo kaka chudo mar wangʼeno.
Kendo ka omuko lak misumba madichwo kata madhako, to nyaka owene misumbaneno thuolo kaka chudo mar lakeno.
“Ka rwath ochwoyo dichwo kata dhako monego, rwadhno nyaka go gi kite ma tho, kendo ringe kik cham. To wuon rwadhno wachno ok nomake.
To kata kamano, ka rwadhno osebedo gi kido mar chwopo kendo wuon-gi osesiem to ok osetweye e dipo mi onego dichwo kata dhako, rwadhno nyaka go gi kite kendo wuon-gi bende nyaka negi.
Kata kamano, ka buch tho oloki, moketne chudo, to nyaka ochul nengo moro amora moketne mondo oresgo ngimane.
Chik achielno ema nyaka tigo ka rwadh ochwowo nyathi ma wuowi kata ma nyako
Ka rwath ochwowo dichwo kata dhako ma misumba, to wuon rwadhno nyaka chul ruodh misumbano fedha ma pekne romo nus kilo, kendo rwadhno nyaka negi.
“Ka ngʼato oelo dho bur kata okunyo moro kendo oweyo dhoge nono mi rwadh pur kata punda onyumoree,
