to wuon burno nyaka chul kuom lalno; kendo nyaka ochul wuon gigi kendo jamni mothogo nobed mage.
“Ka rwadh ngʼato ohinyo rwadh ngʼat machielo mi otho, to ginius rwath mangimano kendo ginipog pesa kaachiel gi ring rwath mothono marom.
To kata kamano, kane ongʼere ni rwadhno ne nigi kido mar chwopo, kendo wuon-gi ne osesiem to ne ok otweye, wuon-gi nyaka chul, chiayo kar chiayo kendo chiayo mothono nobed mare.
“Ka ngʼato okwalo rwath kata rombo kendo onege kata ouse, nyaka ochul dhok abich kuom rwath kendo kweth rombe angʼwen kuom rombo.
“Ka jakuo ojuk kakwelo kendo ogoye mi otho, ngʼatno mogoye remo ok nodongʼ e wiye kuom remo mochwer;
to ka otimore bangʼ ka chiengʼ osetuch, to remo nodongʼ e wiye. “Jakuogno nyaka chul gima rom gi gima nokawono, to ka oonge gi gimoro, to nyaka use mondo ochulgo kuo mokwalono.
“Ka chiayo mokwalno oyudego kangima bed ni en rwath kata punda kata rombo, nyaka ochul nyadiriyo.
“Ka ngʼato okwayo jambe e puodho kata e puoth mzabibu kendo oweyogi ma gi chodo kendo gikwayo e puoth ngʼato, nyaka ochul kawuok kuom puothe kata puothene mag olembe mabeyo.
“Ka mach omuoch mi olandore e bungu kendo owangʼo cham ma pod ochungʼ kata cham mobeti kata puodho duto, to ngʼatno mane omoko majno nyaka chul.
“Ka ngʼato omiyo wadgi fedha kata mwandu mondo okanne kendo okwalgi e od wadgino, to ka omak jakuogno, to nyaka chul nyadiriyo.
To ka jakuo ok oyudi, wuon ot nyaka chopi e nyim jongʼad bura mondo gifweny ka dipo ni lwete omulo mwandu nyawadgi
E weche duto mag bedo gi rwath, e yo ma ok owinjore kata punda kata rombo kata law, kata gimoro amora molal ma ngʼato diwachie ni, ‘Ma en mara,’ jogo duto nyaka kel wechegigo e nyim jongʼad bura. Ngʼat ma jongʼad bura oyudo ni nigi ketho, nyaka chul wadgino nyadiriyo.
“Ka ngʼato omiyo wadgi punda kata rwath kata rombo kata chiayo moro amora mondo oritne maber to chiayono otho kata ohinyore kata okwal,
to wach mantie e kindgi ibiro losi kuom kwongʼruok e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ne wadgino nine ok omulo mwandu wadgi. Wuon chiayono nyaka yie gi wachno, kendo onge chudo manochiw.
To ka chiayono ne okwal koa kuom wadgi, to nyaka wadgino chule nengo moromo gi chiayono.
Ka chiayono ne okidhi gi le mager, to enokel choke modongʼ kaka ranyisi kendo ok enochune mondo ochul chiayo mokidhino.
“Ka ngʼato oholo chiayo koa kuom wadgi kendo chiayono ohiny kata otho ka wuon-gi onge, nyaka ochul.
To ka wuon chiayo nigi chiayono, to jaholono ok nochun mondo ochul. Ka chiayono ne ichuloe gimoro, to pesa mochulno norom nyaka lalno.
“Ka ngʼato osero nyako mapok osingi ne kend kendo oriwore kode nyaka ochul gir keny kendo nyakono nobed chiege.
Ka wuon-gi otamore chiwe ne ngʼatno, to ngʼatno pod nyaka chul mana gir keny.
“Kik uwe jajwok madhako bed mangima.
“Ngʼato angʼata moriwore gi chiayo nyaka negi.
“Ngʼato angʼata motimo misango ni nyasaye moro makmana Jehova Nyasaye nyaka negi.
“Kik sand jadak kata loke misumba, nikech ne un jodak Misri.
“Kik uthir dhako ma chwore otho kata nyathi kich.
Ka utimo kamano ma giywakna, adier anawinj ywakgi
Mirimba biro bedo mager kodu kendo abiro negou gi ligangla mondeu biro bedo monde liete kendo nyithindu biro bedo nyithi kiye.
“Ka iholo pesa ni achiel kuom joga ma jachan mantie e dieru, to kik uchal gi ji mamoko ma holo ji pesa kendo kik ukaw ohala kuomgi.
Ka ikawo law wadu kaka gir singo, to duoknego kapok chiengʼ opodho,
nikech laweno kende ema oumorego. Ere gima donindie? Ka oywakna, to abiro winjo, nimar an Nyasaye ma jangʼwono.
“Kik iyany Nyasaye kata kwongʼo jatend jou.
“Kik utamru golo chiwo mowuok e decheu kata kuonde kenou. “Nyaka umiya yawuotu makayo.
Timuru machal kamano ni rwethu kod rombeu. Weuru gibed gi minegi kuom ndalo abiriyo, to chiengʼ mar aboro miyagiuru.
“Unubed joga maler. Kuom mano kik ucham ring chiayo mondiek onego; direuru ne guogi.
“Kik iland wach ma ok adiera. Kik ikony ngʼat marach kidoko janeno mar miriambo.
“Kik itim gima rach nikech ji mangʼeny time. Ka in janeno e bura, to kik iketh bura mana nikech idwaro chwako koma ji ngʼenyie,
kendo kik ichwak ngʼato e bura nikech odhier.
“Ka irodhno gi rwadh jasiki kata pundane ka bayo abaya molal, nyaka idwoke ne wuon-gi.
Ka ineno punda jasiki ka lodi motingʼo ogoye piny, to kik iweye kanyo; nyaka ine ni ikonye.
“Kik iketh buch jou modhier.
Kik ibed gi wach e bura mar miriambo kendo kik umi ngʼat maonge ketho ngʼadne buch tho, nimar ok anangʼwon ne ngʼat ma bura oloyo.
“Kik iyie kawo asoya, nikech asoya dino wenge jogo maneno kendo omiyo ngʼat makare bedo ngʼama rach.
“Kik usand japiny moro modak e dieru; un uwegi ungʼeyo kaka bedo jadak chalo, nikech ne un jodak e piny Misri.
“Kuom higni auchiel unupur puotheu kendo unuka cham monyakie,
to e higa mar abiriyo weuru puothe onind ma ok opur kendo ma ok okomie cham. Eka joma odhier mantie e kind jou nyalo yudo chiemo, kendo le mag thim nyalo chamo gima giweyo. Timuru kamano bende ne puotheu mag mzabibu kod zeituni.
“Tiuru tijeu kuom ndalo auchiel, to e odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo kik uti tich moro amora mondo omi rwethu kod pundeu oyud yweyo kendo misumba monywol e uteu kaachiel gi jodak bende nyalo yudo yweyo.
“Nyaka une ni utimo gik moko duto ma asenyisou. Kik uluong nying nyiseche mamoko; bende kik uwe winjgi kata mana e dhou.
“Unutimna nyasi mar sawo nyadidek e higa.
“Timuru nyasi mar sawo mar makati ma ok oketie thowi; kuom ndalo abiriyo chamuru Makati ma ok oketie thowi, kaka nachikou. Timuru ma e kinde moketi e dwe mar Abib, nimar mano e dwe mane uwuokgo e piny Misri. “Kik ngʼato bi e nyima gi lwete nono.
“Timuru nyasi mar Sawo mar Keyo mar cham mane ukwongo komo e puotheu. “Timuru nyasi mar Sawo mar Keyo e giko higa, ka uchoko chambu koa e puotheu.
“Joma chwo duto nobi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nyadidek e higa.
“Kik uchiwna remo motimgo misango kaachiel gi gimoro amora moketie thowi. “Bor chiayo modongʼ motimnago misango kik chop nyaka okinyi.
“Keluru cham mabeyo mokwongo nyaknu e lowo e od Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. “Kik uted nyadiel ma pod dhodho cha min.
“Neuru, aoro malaika nyimu mondo oritu e yo kendo mondo okelu kama aseikonu.
Chikuru itu kendo winjuru gima owacho. Kik ungʼanyne; nimar Nyinga ni kuome, nikech ka utimo kamano to ok enowenu.
Ka uwinjo maber gima owacho kendo utimo gik moko duto mawacho, to abiro bedo jasik jowasiku kendo anakwed jogo makwedou.
Malaikana biro telonu materu e piny jo-Amor, jo-Hiti, jo-Perizi, jo-Kanaan, jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus kendo anatiekgi duto.
Kik ukulru e nyim nyisechegi kata lamogi kata luwo timbegi. Nyaka une ni umukogi kendo utoyo kite ma gilamo matindo tindo.
Lamuru Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo anagwedhu gi chiemo kod pi. Anatiek tuoche kuomu,
kendo onge dhako ma iye no-oo piny, kata manobed migumba e pinyu. Abiro miyou ngima moromo chuth.
“Abiro oro kihondkona otel nyimu kendo anami piny ka piny ma uromogo bagni. Anami wasiku duto ringu.
Abiro oro masiche mondo otel nyimu kendo masichego noriemb jo-Hivi, jo-Kanaan kod jo-Hiti.
To ok anariembgi oko dichiel e higa, nikech piny nyalo bedo gunda kendo le mag thim nyalo bedonu mathoth mokalo akwana.
Abiro bedo kagologi matin tin e nyimu, nyaka chop umedru moromo kawo pinyno.
“Abiro keto tongʼ mar pinyu kochakore Nam Makwar nyaka e tongʼ Nam mar Mediterania, kendo chakre e thim nyaka e Aora mar Yufrate.
Kik utim winjruok kodgi kata kod nyisechegi.
Kik uwegi gidagi e pinyu, ka ok kamano to ginimi utim richo e nyima, nikech lamo nyisechegi nobednu obadho.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Bi ira, in kaachiel gi Harun, Nadab, Abihu kod jodongo piero abiriyo mag Israel. Un to unudongʼ kulemo mochwalore matin,
makmana Musa kende ema nobi machiegni gi Jehova Nyasaye. Oganda modongʼ kik bi kode.”
Kane Musa odhi kendo onyiso oganda weche duto kod chike Jehova Nyasaye, negidwoko gi dwol achiel niya, “Gik moko duto ma Jehova Nyasaye osewacho wabiro timo.”
Eka Musa nondiko gik moko duto mane Jehova Nyasaye osewachone. Kinyne gokinyi ne ochiewo mi ogero kendo mar misango e tiend got kendo ochungo kite apar gariyo mochungʼ kar ogendini apar gariyo mag Israel.
Eka nooro yawuot Israel matindo kendo negichiwo misango miwangʼo pep kod misango mag rwedhi matindo kaka misango mag lalruok ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Musa nokawo nus remo kendo oketo e tewni, kendo nus modongʼ nokiro kuom kendo mar misango.
Eka nokawo Kitabu mar Singruok mi osomo ni oganda. Negidwoko niya, “Wabiro timo gik moko duto ma Jehova Nyasaye osewacho; kendo wabiro rito chikego.”
Eka Musa nokawo remono mi okiro kuom ji kendo owacho niya, “Ma e remo mar singruok ma Jehova Nyasaye osetimo kodu kaluwore gi wechegi duto.”
Musa kod Harun gi Nadab kod Abihu kaachiel gi jodong Israel piero abiriyo nodhi e got
moneno Nyasach Israel. E bwo tiend Nyasaye ne nitie gima chalo gi laru molos gi kit ombo, marieny ka polo.
To Nyasaye ne ok okumo jodong Israel-go, negineno Nyasaye kendo negichiemo mi gimetho.
Jehova Nyasaye nonyiso Musa niya, “Bi ira ewi got mondo ibed ka kendo anamiyi kite mopa masendikoe chike kod buche mondo ipuonj oganda.”
Eka Musa nochako wuoth gi Joshua jakonyne, kendo Musa nodhi malo e got mar Nyasaye.
Nowacho ne jodongo niya, “Ritwauru ka nyaka chop waduog iru. Harun kod Hur ni kodu kendo ngʼato angʼata man-gi wach madwaro loso mondo odhi irgi.”
Kane Musa odhi ewi got, boche polo noumo godno,
kendo duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye nopongʼo wi Got Sinai. Kuom ndalo auchiel boche polo noimo godno kendo e odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo Jehova Nyasaye noluongo Musa ka en ei bor polo.
Duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye ne chalo gi mach maliel ewi got ne jo-Israel.
Eka Musa nodonjo ei bor polono kane odhi ewi got, kendo nobedo ewi got kuom ndalo piero angʼwen odiechiengʼ gotieno.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Nyis jo-Israel mondo okelna chiwo. Inichokna chiwogo moro amora kuom ji duto moyie golo kuom herogi.
“Chiwo manyaka ikaw kuomgi e magi: “dhahabu, fedha kod mula;
law marambulu, maralik, marakwaro, law mayom, kod law mar yie diek,
piende rombe molok gi range makwar, piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nembe; yiend siala,
mor zeituni miolo e taya mondo okel ler, gik milosogo mor pwodhruok kod ubani mangʼwe ngʼar,
gi oniks kod kite moko miketo kuom law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod kod law akor.
“Bangʼ mano gigerna kama ler mar lemo kendo anadag kodgi.
Ger Hemb Romoni gi gigene duto machalre mana gi kido ma abiro nyisi.
“Ketgi gilos sanduku maber molos gi yiend siala ma borne romo fut angʼwen gi nus to lachne romo fut achiel gi nus kendo borne madhi malo romo fut achiel gi nus.
Bawe gi dhahabu maler oko gi iye kendo nochwene ndiga mar dhahabu mothedhi molwore.
Thedhne ratege angʼwen molworore mag dhahabu machalo gi bangli kendo twegi e tiendene angʼwen-go, ka ratege ariyo bedo e bathe konchiel to ariyo mamoko e bathe komachielo.
Bangʼ mano los ludhe mag yiend siala kendo ibawgi gi dhahabu.
Rwak ludhego ei ratege mantie e bethe Sandug Muma mondo otingʼego.
Ludhego nyaka siki ei rategego mag sanduku; ok owinjore golgi.
Eka iket ei Sandug Muma kite mopa mag chike ma abiro miyi.
“Losne raum mar pwodhruok gi dhahabu maler ma borne romo fut angʼwen gi nus kendo lachne romo fut achiel gi nus.
Kendo e giko mar raumno los kido mar malaika ariyo miluongo ni kerubi gi dhahabu mothedhi.
Los kido mar malaika mar kerubi achiel e giko raumno kendo malaika mar ariyo e giko komachielo; bende los kido mar malaika mar kerubigo e gimoro achiel gi raumno, e giko raumgo.
Kido mar malaika mar kerubigo noyaro bwombegi kochomo malo mondo giumgo raumno. Kerubigo nochungʼ momanyore ka ngʼiyore gi wi raumno.
Ket raumno ewi Sandug Muma, bangʼe iket kite mopa ariyo mar chike ma abiro miyi.
Ewi raum kanyo e kind kerubi ariyo manie wi Sandug Muma, ema abiro romoe kodi kendo kanyo ema namiyie chikena mondo iterne jo-Israel.
“Los mesa mar yiend siala ma borne romo fut adek to lachne romo fut achiel gi nus kendo borne madhi malo romo fut ariyo gi robo.
Bawe gi dhahabu maler kendo lwor bethene gi dhahabu.
Bende chwe bathe ma lachne romo gi pat lwedo achiel kendo ichwe dir batheno gi dhahabu.
Los ratege molworore angʼwen mag dhahabu ne mesano kendo twegi e konde angʼwen mag mesa kama tiende angʼwen-go nitie.
Ratege molwororego nobed machiegni gi bethe mesano mondo omak ludhego mitiyogo kuom tingʼo mesa.
Los ludhego gi yiend siala kendo bawgi gi dhahabu kendo iti kodgi kuom tingʼo mesa.
Kendo los sende, bakunde kaachiel gi agulnine kod tewnine mitiyogo kitimogo misengini miolo piny, to gigo duto nyaka losi gi dhahabu maler.
Ket Makati miketo e nyima pile ewi mesano ndalo duto.
“Los rachungi mar taya gi dhahabu maler kendo ithedh tiende gi kore gi kikombege machalo maua gi thiepege kod obokege obed gimoro achiel kode.
Bedene auchiel noa e bath rachungi tayano, ka adek nitie e bathe konchiel kendo adek nitie komachielo.
Kikombe adek molos kaka maupe mag oyungu gi thiepene kod obokene nobed e bade achiel kendo adek e bade maluwe kendo bedene auchielgo nochwogore kawuok e rachungi taya.
Kendo kuom rachungi taya enobedie kikombe angʼwen molos machal gi maupe mag oyungu mathiewo kendo golo thuoke.
Maua achiel nobedi e bwo bede ariyo mokwongo mar rachungino, mar ariyo nobed e bwo mar ariyo, to mar adek nobed e bwo bede mar adek, giduto gin bede auchiel.
Maupego kod bede yien-go duto gi rachungi taya nobed gimoro achiel mothedh gi dhahabu maler.
“Bangʼ mano los techene abiriyo kendo iketgi ewi rachungi mondo giliel ka gimenyo nyime.
Gima ingʼadogo otambi kod kama otambino betie nyaka los gi dhahabu maler.
Kilo piero adek gangʼwen mar dhahabu maler ema notigo kuom loso rachungi mar taya kod gigene duto.
Nyaka ine ni igerogi machal gi kido mane onyisi ewi got.
“Los Hemb Romo gi pasia apar mar law mayom momin man-gi rangi marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro ka ogorie kido mar malaika mar kerubi gi jagoro molony.
Pasiago duto nyaka bed maromre ka borne romo fut piero angʼwen gariyo to lachne romo fut auchiel.
Riw pasia abich kanyakla kendo abich modongʼ bende iriw
Los tonde milierogo pasia e riak pasia man-gi range marambulu kendo itim kamano e riak pasia matungʼ komachielo.
Los tonde piero abich e riak pasia achiel kendo tonde piero abich mamoko e riak pasia komachielo ka tonde moliergo pasiago omanyore.
Eka ilosi ramaki piero abich mag dhahabu kendo ti kodgi kuom riwo pasia ariyogo kanyakla mondo omi Hemb Romo obed gimoro achiel.
“Los pasia apar gachiel mag yie diek ne hema mondo oumgo Hemb Romo.
Pasia apar gachielgo duto nyaka romre ka bor moro ka moro romo fut piero angʼwen gabich to lachgi romo fut auchiel.
Riw pasia abich kanyakla mondo obed gimoro achiel kendo auchiel modongʼ riw obed achiel. Ban pasia mar auchiel nyadiriyo e nyim hema.
Los tonde milierogo pasia piero abich e giko riak pasia konchiel kendo tonde milierogo pasia e giko riak pasia komachielo.
Eka ilos ramaki mag mula piero abich kendo iketgi e tonde mitweyogo hema mondo oriwgi kaka gimoro achiel.
Kuom bath pasia momedore, nus pasia momedoreno enolier e tok Hemb Romo.
Pasia mag hemano nobed fut achiel gi nus e bathe koni gi koni; to bathe modongʼ nolier e bath Hemb Romo mondo oume.
Losne hemano raum mar pien rombe molok gi range makwar kendo iniume gi piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nam.
“Los sirni mochungʼ mag yiend siala ne Hemb Romo.
Siro ka siro borne nobed fut apar gabich to lachne nobed fut ariyo gi nus,
kipimo siro ka siro maromre gi nyawadgi. Los sirni duto mag Hemb Romo machalre.
Kiloso sirnigo, to nyaka ilos sirni piero ariyo migerogo bath Hemb Romo mochomo yo milambo
kendo ilos rachungi mar taya piero angʼwen mag fedha miketo e bwogi, ka rachungi ariyo iketo e bwo sirni ariyo momanyore.
Kuom bath Hemb Romo komachielo man koma ochomo yo nyandwat, bende ilosne sirni piero ariyo
kod rachungi piero angʼwen mag fedha, ka siro ka siro otingʼo rachungi ariyo ariyo.
Los sirni auchiel ne bathe mochwalore mochomo yo podho chiengʼ mar Hemb Romo,
kendo ilos sirni ariyo mibiro ketoe konde ariyo man yo tok Hemb Romo.
E konde ariyogi nyaka riw sirni ariyo chakre e tiende nyaka e wiye malo, kendo oriwgi gi nyange modol, giduto ariyogo ginibed machal kamano.
Omiyo sirni duto nobed aboro, to rachungi duto mag fedha nobed apar gauchiel ka siro ka siro otingʼo rachungi ariyo ariyo.
“Bende losuru yiende miriwo mag yiend siala; ka abich oket ne sirni mantie bathe konchiel mar Hemb Romo,
kendo abich mamoko oketi e bathe komachielo kendo sirni abich modongʼ omak sirni mane omakgo katoke mochomo yo podho chiengʼ mar Hemb Romo.
Raidhi madiere noa tungʼ nyaka tungʼ e dier sirnigo.
Baw sirnigo gi dhahabu kendo los ratege mag dhahabu mondo omak raidhi miriwogo. Bende baw raidhigo gi dhahabu.
“Gur Hemb Romono kaluwore gi kaka ne anyisi ewi got.
“Los pasia mar law mayom momin mar range marambulu, maralik kod marakwaro, moketie kido mar malaika mar kerubi mondo ogorie gi jagoro molony.
Liere gi rangʼaw molos gi dhahabu e sirni angʼwen mag siala mobaw gi dhahabu kendo mochungi ewi rachungi angʼwen mag fedha.
Lier pasiano gi ramaki kendo ket Sandug Rapar e tok pasiano. Pasiano biro pogo Kama Ler gi Kama Ler Moloyo.
Ket raum mar pwodhruok ewi Sandug Rapar ei Kama Ler Moloyo.
Ket mesa oko mar pasiano koma ochomo yo nyandwat mar Hemb Romo kendo ket rachungi taya kochomore kode e yo milambo mar Hemb Romo.
“Los pasia mar law mayom momin mar range marambulu, maralik kod marakwaro ma en tich mar jachwecho molony mondo ongʼaw e dhoranga Hemb Romo.
Los ramaki mag dhahabu kod sirni abich mag yiend siala mobaw gi dhahabu. Bende ilosi rachungi mag mula abich ni sirnigo.
“Ger kendo mar misango gi yiend siala, ma borne madhi malo romo fut angʼwen gi nus, lachne kod borne mondo obed fut abiriyo gi nus maromre.
Los tungʼ e konde angʼwen mag kendono, mondo omi tungego kod kendo mar misango obed gimoro achiel ka kendono omuon wiye gi mula.
Gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendo mar misango los gi mula. Gigo ne gin agulni ma ijowogo buru, opawo, bakunde mikirogo remo, gi uma michiwogo ringʼo kod tegni mag mach.
Losne singʼenge mar mula kendo ilos nyange mag mula kendo iketgi achiel achiel e kondene angʼwen-go.
Kete e bwo ndiri molworo kendo mar misango kendo ochopi nyaka e kor kendo mar misangono.
Los ludhe mag yiend siala ni kendo mar misangono kendo ibawgi gi mula.
Ludhego noso e nyangeyego mondo gibedi e bath kendo mar misangono kitingʼego.
Los kendo mar misangono gi bao mayom, to ituch bugo e chuny sandukuno mondo iwe iye obed thuolo, kendo lose mana kaka nonyisi ewi got.
“Los laru ne Hemb Romono. Yo milambo mar laruno borne norom mita piero angʼwen gauchiel kendo onego obed gi pasia momin molos gi law mayom,
bende obed gi sirni piero ariyo gi rachungi piero ariyo mag mula kod ramaki mag fedha kod rangʼaw miriwogo sirnigo.
Koma odok yo nyandwat mar laruno nobed maromo mita piero angʼwen gauchiel kendo nobed gi pasia mongʼaw e sirni piero ariyo kendo morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula; ramaki kod rangʼaw miriwogo kor sirni molos gi fedha.
“Koma odok yo podho chiengʼ mar laruno lachne norom mita piero ariyo gadek kendo nobed gi pasia mongʼaw e sirni apar morwakie rachungi apar.
Koma odok yo wuok chiengʼ mar laruno lachne norom mita piero ariyo gadek.
Pasia ma borgi romo mita abiriyo nobed e dir rangach konchiel, ka pasiago ongʼaw ewi sirni adek man-gi rachungi adek;
kendo pasia ma borgi romo mita abiriyo nobedi e dir rangach komachielo kongʼawgi e sirni adek man-gi rachungi adek.
“To e dhoranga laruno, ketie pasia mar law mayom momin ma borne romo mita ochiko kendo man-gi rangi marambulu gi maralik kod makwar duto molos gi jachwecho molony koketgi ewi sirni angʼwen man-gi rachungi angʼwen.
Sirnigo duto molworo laruno nobed gi ramaki gi rangʼaw molos gi fedha kaachiel gi rachungi mag mula.
Laruno borne norom fut mia achiel gi piero abich, to lachne norom fut piero abiriyo gabich kendo borne modhi malo en fut abiriyo gi nus gi pasia molos gi law mayom kendo rachungi duto nyaka bed mag mula.
Gik moko duto mag tich e Hemb Romo, bed ni gin gik ma itiyogo tich moro amora, to gi loye duto mag hema kaachiel gi loye mag laru nyaka losgi gi mula.
“Chik jo-Israel mondo gikelni mo maliw mar zeituni mobi mondo omi teyni osik kaliel ma ok otho.
Harun gi yawuote nyaka neni teynigo osiko kaliel e nyim Jehova Nyasaye chakre odhiambo nyaka okinyi, ka gikete e Hemb Romo oko mar pasia mantiere e nyim Sandug Muma. Ma en chik mosiko nyaka chiengʼ ne jo-Israel nyaka ne tienge duto mabiro.
“Luong Harun owadu kaachiel gi yawuote ma gin Nadab, Abihu, Eliazar kod Ithamar kowuok kuom jo-Israel mondo gitina kaka jodolo.
Twangʼne Harun owadu lewni mopwodhi mag dolo mondo omi omiye duongʼ gi luor.
Nyis jotich molony duto ma asemiyo rieko e yore machalo kamago ni mondo gilos ne Harun lewnigo mag pwodhruok mondo otinago kaka jadolo.
Lewni manyaka gitwangʼ e magi: law akor, law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod, kandho, law akor mogor, kilemba mar wich kod okanda. Nyaka gilos lewni mowal mag dologi ne owadu Harun kod yawuote mondo gitina kaka jodolo.
Lewnigo nyaka gilosi gi dhahabu, gi law man-gi range marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro.
“Los law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod gi dhahabu, gi law man-gi range marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro momin gi law mayom, ma en tich jatwengʼo molony.
Nyaka obed gi okanda ariyo mag gok mitweyego e gok chien gi nyime
Okandane mochwe maber nyaka bed machal kode kendo obed gimoro achiel gi law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod bende nyaka lose gi dhahabu kod law momin mayom man-gi range marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro.
“Kaw kite ariyo mag oniks kendo ikedgi kaka ikedo kido ka indiko nying yawuot Israel,
kaluwore gi nywolgi ka nying yawuowi auchiel ondikie kidi achiel, to auchiel modongʼ ondikie kidi machielo.
Iked nying yawuot Israel mana kaka jaked kidi molony kedo kido. Bangʼ mano ru kitego e tond dhahabu,
kendo twegi e lep akor mag law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod mondo gibed kaka kite rapar ne nyithind Israel. Harun enotingʼ kitego e goke kaka rapar e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Ruwgi kaka thiwni mag dhahabu,
kendo e nyoroche ariyo mokedi gi dhahabu maler kaka tol mondo itwe nyorochego e thiwni.
“Jatwengʼo molony ema nyaka los law akor mar ngʼado bura, kolose gi dhahabu gi usi marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro kod law mayom mar katana kendo momin maber ka law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod.
Onego oromre duto ka borne gi lachne romo bat achiel kendo nobane nyadiriyo.
Bangʼ mano, chan laini angʼwen mag kite ma nengogi tek kuom lawno. Laini mokwongo chanie kite kaka rubi, topaz gi beril;
to e laini mar ariyo chanie kite kaka tarkus gi safir kod emerald;
e laini mar adek chanie kite kaka jasinth gi agat kod amethist;
e laini mar angʼwen chanie kite kaka krisolit gi oniks kod jaspa. Kidigo duto mondo ochan kaka thiwni mag dhahabu.
Kitego duto nondikie nying yawuot Israel apar gariyo, ka okedgi kaka kido ka moro ka moro ochungʼ ne nying dhout Israel apar gariyogo.
“Losne law akor thiwni mag dhahabu maler mokadi ka tol.
Losne thiwni ariyo mag dhahabu kendo itwegi e riak law agoko.
Twe thiwni ariyogo mag dhahabu e ratege mantie e riak law akor,
kendo itwe lak thiwnigo komachielo e laini ariyo mochan kaka dhahabu ka ochome e tond law akor kuom law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod gi yo ka nyime.
Los ratege ariyo mag dhahabu kendo ichomgi e konde ariyo mamoko mag law akor gi yo ka iye e riak law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod.
Los ratege ariyo mag dhahabu kendo ichomgi e riak tonde ariyo mag gok yo ka nyime mar law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod machiegni gi kama oriwego but nungone.
Ratege mag law akor nyaka twe e ratege mag law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod gi tol marambulu, kiriwe gi okanda manie nungone mondo law akor kik gonyre.
“Kinde duto ma Harun donjo e Kama Ler, notingʼ nying yawuot Israel e kore kondikgi e law akor mar ngʼado bura mondo obed kaka Rapar mochwere e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Ket Urim gi Thumim bende kuom law akor mondo omi gibed kondikgi e agog Harun kinde duto ma odonjo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Kuom mano kinde duto ma Harun ni e nyim Jehova Nyasaye notingʼ gir ngʼado bura ne jo-Israel e agoge.”
“Los kandho mar law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod gi law marambulu,
ka en gi kama otuch e diere ma wich wuokie. Kama otuch ma wich wuokieno nyaka twangʼ gi pien mondo kik oyiechi.
Twangʼ gik mongʼinore kaka olemo molos gi usi marambulu gi maralik kod makwar kendo ket gara mar dhahabu e kindgi
Gara mag dhahabugo kod gik mongʼinore kolemogo nobed kokikore molworo riak law.
Harun nyaka rwak lawno kotiyo tich dolo. Ywak garago nowinji kodonjo e Kama Ler e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo kowuok mondo kik otho.
“Los san mopamore gi dhahabu maler kendo indikie wechegi: Kama owal ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Twe gima ondikie wechego gi tol marambulu e kilemba mar jadolo gi yo ka nyime.
Noliere e lela wangʼ Harun kendo notingʼ ketho duto ma dipo kobetie kuom mich maler ma jo-Israel chiwo ni Jehova Nyasaye. Kamano e kaka nobedi e lela wangʼ Harun kinde duto mondo Jehova Nyasaye oyie gi chiwogo.
“Twangʼ law kandho mar law mayom mar katana kendo ilos kilemba gi law mayom mar katana. Okanda to mondo ogor gi ngʼama olony.
Mondo omi yawuot Harun oyud duongʼ kod luor, losnigi lewni mag akor, okanda kod kilemba.
Bangʼ ka iserwako lewnigi kuom owadu Harun gi yawuote, to wirgi gi mo kendo ipwodhgi. Walgi mondo gitina kaka jodolo.
“Ilosnegi sirweche matindo mar law katana mondo giumgo dug-gi, chakre nungogi nyaka thochgi.
Harun gi yawuote nyaka rwak lewnigo kinde duto ma gidonjo e Hemb Romo, kata ka gidhi e kendo mar misango mondo giti tich dolo e Kama Ler mondo kik gibed giketho mi githo. “Ma nobed singruok mosiko ne Harun gi nyikwaye duto.
“Ma e gima nyaka itim e kinde miwalogi mondo gitina kaka jodolo: Kaw nyarwath kod imbe ariyo maonge songa.
Bende kaw mogo mar ngano mayom ma ok oketie thowi modwal gi mo mondo ilosgo makati kod kek kaachiel gi chapat mowir gi mo.
Ketgi ei adita kendo ikel gigo, kaachiel gi nyarwath kod imbe ariyo-ka.
Eka ikel Harun gi yawuote e dhoranga Hemb Romo kendo ilwokgi gi pi.
Kaw lewnigo magin kandho gi kandho moumo law akor miluongo ni efod, gi kandho mar law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod kod law akor mondo irwakne Harun. Twe law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod kuome gi okandane motwangʼ maber.
Rwakne kilemba e wiye kendo itwene san mopamorecha e lela wangʼe kaka osimbo maler.
Kaw mor pwodhruok kiolo e wiye mondo ipwodhego.
Kel yawuote kendo irwaknegi kandho
kendo isidhnegi kilemba e wiyegi. Bangʼe twe okanda kuom Harun gi yawuote. Tich dolo en margi kaluwore gi singruok mochwere. “Mano e kaka inipwodh Harun gi yawuote.
“Kel rwadh-cha yo ka nyim Hemb Romo kendo Harun gi yawuote noyie lwetgi e wiye.
Yangʼe e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e dhoranga Hemb Romo.
Kaw remb rwadhno moko kendo iwirie tunge kendo mar misango gi lith lweti to modongʼ to ipuk e bwo kendo mar misangono.
Eka ikaw boche duto mogawo jamb-ich gi moumo chuny gi nyiroke ariyo kod boche mogawogi kendo iwangʼ-gi e kendo mar misango
To wangʼ ring rwadhno gi piene kaachiel gi wen oko mar kambi. En misango mar golo richo.
“Kaw achiel kuom imbego kendo Harun kaachiel gi yawuote noyie lwetgi e wiye.
Yangʼe kendo ikaw rembe ikir e bethe kendo mar misango koni gi koni.
Pog ring imno lemo lemo kendo ilwok jamb-ich gi tiendene kichokogi kaachiel gi wich kod lemo mamoko.
Bangʼe wangʼ imno duto ewi kendo mar misango. En misango miwangʼo pep ne Jehova Nyasaye madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar, ma en misango motim ni Jehova Nyasaye gi mach.
“Kaw im machielo kendo Harun gi yawuote noyie lwetgi e wiye.
Yangʼ imno kendo ikaw rembe moko mi imien e it Harun ma korachwich kod it yawuote ma korachwich kod lith lwetgi mathuon ma korachwich kod lith tiendegi ma korachwich, to remo modongʼ to ikir e bath kendo mar misango moluoro.
Kaw remo moko mantie e kendo mar misango gi mor pwodhruok moko kendo kire kuom Harun gi lepe kendo kuom yawuote gi lepgi. Eka en gi yawuote gi lepgi nobed maler.
“Kaw boche im, gi boche mag sembe gi boche mogawo jamb-ich gi boche moimo chuny gi nyiroke ariyo kod boche mogawogi kaachiel gi bam ma korachwich (ma e im miwalogo jodolo).
Bende kaw achiel kuom makati ma ok oketie thowi moketi ei okapu e nyim Jehova Nyasaye gi kek molos gi mo kod chapat.
Ketgi duto e lwet Harun gi yawuote kendo ofwagi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo.
Bangʼe kawgi oko e lwetgi kendo iwangʼ-gi e kendo mar misango kaachiel gi misango miwangʼo pep kaka misango madum tik mangʼwe ngʼar ne Jehova Nyasaye, ma en misango miwangʼone Jehova Nyasaye gi mach.
Bangʼ ka isekawo agoko mar im mitimogo nyasi mar walo Harun, fwaye e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo kendo mano nobed lemo ma kori.
“Pwodh lemo mag im mane otimgo misango mar walo Harun kod yawuote ma gin agoko kaka misango mifwayo gi em mane ochiw.
Magi ema nobed lemo ma Harun gi yawuote yudo kuom jo-Israel. En e chiwo ma jo-Israel nochiw ni Jehova Nyasaye kawuok e misengini mag lalruok.
“Lep Harun mopwodhi mag dolo nyaka dongʼ ni yawuote gi nyikwaye bangʼ thone mondo mi owirgi gi mo kiketogi kaka jodolo.
Wuod Harun manoket kare kaka jadolo kendo ma nobi e Hemb Romo mondo oti tij dolo e Kama Ler norwak lewnigo kuom ndalo abiriyo.
“Kaw im miwalogo ngʼato kiketo jadolo kendo ited ringe kama ler.
Harun gi yawuote nyaka cham ring imno kaachiel gi makati manie okapu e dhoranga Hemb Romo.
Nyaka gicham chiwogo mane otimnegigo pwodhruok kiwalogi kaka jodolo. To onge ngʼat machielo moyiene chamo chiemono nikech gin gik mopwodhi.
To ka ringʼo kata makati mopwodhgigo odongʼ nyaka okinyi, to nyaka wangʼe. Ok owinjore chame nikech en gima ler.
“Tim ne Harun kod yawuote gik moko duto masechiki, ka ikawo ndalo abiriyo mondo iwalgi kaka jodolo.
Kuom ndalogo odiechiengʼ ka odiechiengʼ nyaka itim misango mar golo richo gi rwath mondo pwodhgigo kuom richo, kamano inipwodh kendo mar misango, kiwire gi mo kendo iwalego ne tich Nyasaye.
Kuom ndalo abiriyo pwodh kendo mar misango kendo kete obed maler. Eka kendo mar misango biro bedo maler moloyo kendo gimoro amora morere kuome nobed maler.
“Gima nyaka ichiw e kendo mar misango pile ka pile ema: nyirombe ariyo mahikgi achiel achiel.
Chiw achiel gokinyi to machielo godhiambo.
Chiw nyarombo mokwongono gi mogo mayom moromo gorogoro achiel gi nus moruw gi mo mobi e olemb zeituni moromo lita achiel, kendo ichiw divai moromo lita achiel kaka misango miolo piny
Chiw nyarombo machielo godhiambo kendo ichiwe kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham kod misango miolo piny mana kaka chiwo mokwongo, ma en misango madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar, miwangʼo pep ne Jehova Nyasaye.
“Ne tienge duto, misango miwangʼo pep ni nyaka chiw ndalo duto e dhoranga Hemb Romo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Kanyo ema abiro romoe kodu kendo wuoyoe kodu;
bende kanyo ema abiro romoe gi jo-Israel, mi duongʼna nomi kanyo bed maler.
“Kuom mano abiro puodho Hemb Romo gi kendo mar misango mondo obed maler kendo abiro puodho Harun gi yawuote mondo otina kaka jodolo.
Bangʼ mano abiro dak kod jo-Israel kendo abiro bedo Nyasachgi.
Gibiro ngʼeyo ni an Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi ema ne agologi e piny Misri mondo omi adag kodgi. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi.
“Los kendo mar misango miwangʼoe ubani gi yiend siala.
Borne gi lachne nyaka bed maromre ma gin nus mita moro ka moro, to borne madhi malo nyaka bed mita achiel, kendo tungene nyaka bed gimoro achiel kode.
Baw wiye kod bethene duto kod tungene gi dhahabu maler bende losne ndiri mar dhahabu molwore.
Los ratege ariyo mag dhahabu ne kendono mar misangono e bwo ndiri ka gimanyore ariyo koni gi koni mondo omak ludhe mitingʼego.
Los yiend siala kendo ibawgi gi dhahabu.
Ket kendono mar misango e nyim pasia molier e nyim Sandug Muma man e nyim Sandug Raparno kama abiro romoe kodu.
“Harun nyaka wangʼ ubani mangʼwe ngʼar e kendono mar misango okinyi kokinyi koiko teyni.
Nyaka owangʼ ubani kendo e seche momokoe teyni godhiambo mondo ubanigo owangʼ kinde duto e nyim Jehova Nyasaye nyaka ne tienge mabiro.
Kik ichiw kit ubani moro amora e kendono mar misango kata misango miwangʼo pep kata chiwo mar cham kendo kik ichiw misango miolo piny.
Harun nochiw misango mar pwodho tunge kendono dichiel e higa. Chiwo mar higa ka higa mar pwodhruok nyaka tim gi remb misango mar golo richo ni tienge duto mabiro. Kendono nobed maler moloyo ni Jehova Nyasaye.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Ka ikwano jo-Israel, to ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka chul nengo ne Jehova Nyasaye mowarogo ngimane e sa ma ikwane. Eka onge masira mane ogore kuomgi ka ikwanogi.
Ngʼato angʼata moriwore gi joma osekwan nyaka chiw nus shekel kaluwore gi kweno mar shekel manie kama ler mar lemo, ma pekne romo kilo auchiel. Nus shekel mochiwo nobed mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Jogo duto moriwore gi joma osekwan ma jo-higni piero ariyo kadhi nyime nyaka kel chiwono ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka uchulo Jehova Nyasaye chiwo ma upwodhorugo, jo-mwandu kik kel mangʼeny moloyo midwaro, to jachan bende kik kel matin moremo kar midwaro.
Kaw pesa mar pwodhruokno kuom jo-Israel kendo kete e tich mar Hemb Romo. Enobed Rapar ni jo-Israel e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ka utimogo pwodhruok ni ngimau.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Los karaya mar luok molos gi mula to gi rachungi miketoe karayano bende olos gi mula. Kete e kind Hemb Romo kod kendo mar misango bangʼe iol pi e iye.
Harun gi yawuote noluok tiendegi kod lwetegi gi pi mogol e iye.
Kinde ka kinde ka gidonjo e Hemb Romo, to nyaka giluokre gi pigno mondo kik githo. Bende kinde ka kinde ma gidhi kar kendo mar misango mondo gichiw misango miwangʼo pep ni Jehova Nyasaye,
to nyaka giluok lwetgi gi tiendgi mondo kik githo. Mano nobedi chik mochwere momako Harun gi nyikwaye nyaka ni tienge duto mabiro.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Gik mangʼwe ngʼar monego ikaw gin: kilo auchiel mar mane-mane, kilo adek mar dalasini, gi obala ndago maromo kilo adek,
kasia maromo kilo auchiel, kendo giduto nyaka pimgi gi rapim ma itiyogo e kama ler mar lemo, to bende ikel lita angʼwen mar mo zeituni.
Riw gigi duto mondo ilos mor pwodhruok maler madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mana kaka ngʼat molony e loso gik mangʼwe ngʼar loso. Enobed mor pwodhruok maler.
Bangʼe ti kode ka iwirogo Hemb Romo, Sandug Muma mar Singruok,
mesa gi gigene duto mag tije, rachungi taya gi gigene duto mag tich, kendo mar misango miwangʼoe ubani,
kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep gi gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono, gi karaya kod rachungi mare.
Nyaka ipwodhgi mondo gibed maler moloyo kendo gimoro amora morere kuomgi nobed maler.
“Wir Harun gi yawuote kendo pwodhgi mondo gitina kaka jodolo.
Nyis jo-Israel kama, ‘Ma ema nobed mor pwodhruok maler ne tienge duto mabiro.
Kik iole e dend ji bende kik ilos mo moro amora machal kaka olos mono. En gima owal kendo nyaka ikawe kaka gima owal.
Ngʼato angʼata manolos mo machal kamano kata manowir ngʼato angʼata ma ok jadolo nongʼad kare oko.’ ”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Kaw gik madum mangʼwe ngʼar kaka duogo, sare, mieny kod ubani maler, kendo pekgi nyaka bed maromre,
kendo riwgi milosgo ubani mangʼwe ngʼar ma en tich jalos gik mangʼwe ngʼar. Ketie chumbi mondo obed gima ler mowal.
Kawe moko matin kuom gigo mondo ireg mayom kendo iketie Sandug Muma manie nyim Hemb Romo, kama abiro romoe kodu, kendo nobednu maler moloyo.
Kik ulos ubani moro amora e yo machal kama ne un uwegi, nikech en gima ler mowalne Jehova Nyasaye.
Ngʼato angʼata manolos ubani e yo machal kamano mondo owinj tik mamit ma aa kuome nyaka ngʼad kare oko kuom ogandane.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Ngʼe ni aseyiero Bezalel wuod Uri, ma wuod Hur, maa e dhood Juda,
kendo asepongʼe gi Roho mar Nyasaye mondo obed gi lony, gi rieko, gi nyalo kod ngʼeyo tije duto mag lwedo;
mondo omi ogor kido mabeyo mag dhahabu gi fedha kod mula,
kendo ongʼad kite duto gi payo bao kendo mondo otim kit tije duto mag lwedo.
Kata kamano aseyiero Oholiab wuod Ahisamak bende, maa e dhood Dan mondo okonye. “Bende asechiwo rieko ni jotich lwedo duto molony mondo olos gik moko duto masechiki kaka:
Hemb Romo, Sandug Rapar mar pwodhruok gi raumne, kod gik moko duto mag hema kaka:
mesa gi gigene mag tich, gi rachungi taya gi gigene mag tich, gi kendo mar misango miwangʼoe ubani,
kod kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep gi gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono, gi karaya kod rachungi mare,
kaachiel gi lewni motwangʼ, ka lewni mopwodhi mag Harun jadolo kod lep yawuote kane gitiyo kaka jodolo;
kod mor pwodhruok gi ubani madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mar Kama Ler. “Nyaka gilose mana kaka nachiki.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Nyis jo-Israel kama: ‘Nyaka urit sabatona duto. Ma nobed ranyisi e kinda kodu nyaka ni tienge duto mabiro, mondo omi ungʼe ni An e Jehova Nyasaye mamiyo ubedo maler.
“ ‘Rituru Sabato nikech enobednu odiechiengʼ maler. Ngʼato angʼata ma ok orito odiechiengno nyaka negi bende ngʼato angʼata motiyo chiengʼ Sabato nyaka ngʼad kare oko kuom ogandane.
Kuom ndalo auchiel nyaka uti, to odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo en Sabato mar yweyo ma en chiengʼ maler ni Jehova Nyasaye. Ngʼato angʼata ma otimo tich moro amora chiengʼ Sabato nyaka negi.
Jo-Israel nyaka rit Sabato ka gitimoe nyasi kuom tienge duto mabiro kaka singruok mosiko.
Enobed ranyisi e kinda kod jo-Israel nyaka chiengʼ nimar kuom ndalo auchiel Jehova Nyasaye nochweyo polo gi piny kendo e odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo noweyo tich moyweyo.’ ”
Kane Jehova Nyasaye otieko wuoyo gi Musa ewi Got Sinai nomiye kite ariyo mopa mag rapar mane gin kite mopa ariyo ma Nyasaye nondikoe gi lwete owuon.
Kane ji oneno ni Musa osedeko ewi got, negichokore ma gilworo Harun kendo giwachone niya, “Bi mondo ilosnwa nyiseche ma biro dhi nyimwa, nimar ok wangʼeyo gima osetimore ne Musa mane ogolowa ka waa e piny Misri.”
Harun nodwokogi niya, “Kawuru sitadi mag dhahabu ma yawuotu kod nyiu orwako mondo ukelna.”
Kuom mano, ji duto nokawo sitadigi mi gikelogi ne Harun.
Nokawo gik mane omiyego monywaso kendo olosogo kido machalo gi mar nyaroya. Eka nowachonegi niya, “Magi e nyisecheu mane ogolou e piny Misri, yaye Israel.”
Kane Harun oneno kamano, nogero kendo mar misango e nyim nyaroyano kendo nolando niya, “Kiny notim sawo ne Jehova Nyasaye”
Kuom mano, ji nochiewo kinyne kogwen mochiwo misango miwangʼo pep kendo negichiwo misango mag lalruok. Bangʼe negibedo piny mondo gichiem kendo gimethi kendo negia malo mondo gimiel miende dwanyruok.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Lor piny idog ir jogi mane igolo kawuok e piny Misri nikech gisekethore”
Giselokore mapiyo nono ka giweyo chike mane amiyogi kendo giseloso nyasaye maket gi nyaroya. Gisekulorene piny kendo gisechiwone misango mi giwacho niya, “Magi e nyisecheu mane ogolou e piny Misri, yaye Israel.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Aseneno jogi kendo gin joma tokgi tek.
Kuom mano, koro weya mondo mirimba mager otiekgi. Bangʼe to anaketi ibed oganda maduongʼ.”
To Musa nokwayo Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasache kowachone niya, “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, en angʼo momiyo mirimbi mager ditiek jogi mane igolo gi teko maduongʼ kod lweti maratego kawuok e piny Misri?
Angʼo momiyo dimi jo-Misri wuo gi ngʼayi kawacho ni, ‘Nogologi gi chuny marach mondo otiekgi ewi gode kendo mondo otiekgi e wangʼ piny?’ Kuom mano, we mirimbi mager, mondo ilok chunyi kik ikel kethruok ni jogi.
Par jotichni Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo mane ikwongʼorini in iwuon kiwacho ni, ‘Abiro keto nyikwayi mondo obed mangʼeny kaka sulwe mar kor polo bende abiro miyo nyikwayi pinyni duto mane asingonegi ni nobed mwandugi nyaka chiengʼ.’ ”
Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye noloko pache mine ok okelone joge masira mane osewacho.
Musa nolor koa e got kotingʼo kite ariyo mag Rapar e lwete kendo kitego nondik koni gi koni.
Kitego ne gin tich Nyasaye; kendo ndiko mane ni kuomgi ne mar Nyasaye.
Kane Joshua owinjo koko mane ji goyo nowacho ne Musa niya, “Mahu mar lweny wuok e kambi.”
To Musa nodwoke niya, “Ok en mahu mar loch kata ywak mar joma olo e lweny; to en mana koko mar wer ema awinjo.”
Kane Musa ochopo machiegni gi kambi koa e tiend got noneno ji kamiel e nyim nyaroya, kendo iye nowangʼ mi nodiro kite mopa mane ni e lwete piny ma gitore matindo tindo.
Bangʼe nokawo nyaroya mane giseloso mi owangʼe e mach kendo norege mayom kaka mogo mi noruwe gi pi momiyo jo-Israel mondo omodhi.
Nopenjo Harun niya, “Angʼo mane jogi otimoni momiyo irwakogi e richo maduongʼ kamano?”
Harun nodwoke niya, “Kik ibed gi ich wangʼ ruodha nimar ingʼeyo kaka chuny jogi osiko kopongʼ gi richo.
Ne giwachona kama, ‘Losnwa nyiseche mabiro telonwa, nimar ok wangʼeyo gima otimo ngʼat ma Musa-ni mane ogolowa e piny Misri.’
Kuom mano nawachonegi ni, ‘Ngʼato ka ngʼato man-gi bangli mag dhahabu okaw mondo okel.’ Eka negimiya dhahabu kendo nakete e mach mi aloso nyaroyani!”
Musa noneno ka ji osenjawni kendo kaka Harun noketogi mi gibedo joma wigi tek ma ijaro gi wasikgi.
Kuom mano nochungʼ e dhoranga kambi mowacho niya, “Ngʼato angʼata man kor Jehova Nyasaye obi ira.” Kendo jo-Lawi duto nochungʼ e ngʼeye.
Eka nowachonegi niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel wacho: ‘Ngʼato ka ngʼato okaw liganglane. Wuothuru ei kambi duto koni gi koni ka ngʼato ka ngʼato nego owadgi, osiepne kod ngʼat modak bute.’ ”
Jo-Lawi notimo kaka Musa nochikogi kendo chiengʼno ji madirom alufu adek nonegi.
Eka Musa nowacho niya, “Un osewalu ni Jehova Nyasaye kawuono nimar ne ulokoru gi oweteu gi yawuotu kendo Jehova Nyasaye osegwedhou kawuono.”
Kinyne Musa nowacho ni ji niya, “Usetimo richo maduongʼ to koro abiro dhi ir Jehova Nyasaye nimar dipoka akwayonu Jehova Nyasaye mondo owenu richou.”
Kuom mano Musa nodok ir Jehova Nyasaye mowacho niya, “Yaye, mano kaka jogi osetimo richo malich, ma giseloso nyisechegi mag dhahabu.
To koro kiyie, to wenegi richogi, to ka ok kamano, to ruch nyinga oko e kitabu misendikono.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko Musa niya, “Ngʼato angʼata motimo richo e nyima ema anaruch nyinge oko e kitabu mara.
To koro, dhiyo mondo itelne ji kiterogi kama ne awacho kendo malaikana biro telo nyimu. To kata kamano, ka kindena mar kum ochopo to anakumgi nikech richogi.”
Kuom mano, Jehova Nyasaye nogoyo jogo gi tuoche kuom lamo nyaroya mane Harun oloso.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Wuoguru ka in kaachiel gi jok mane igolo e piny Misri kendo dhiuru e piny mane asingo ka akwongʼora ne Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo kawachonegi ni, ‘Anamiye nyikwau.’
Abiro oro Malaika mondo otel e nyimu kendo obiro riembo jo-Kanaan gi jo-Amor gi jo-Hiti gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus.
Dhiuru e piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich. To ok anadhi kodu nikech un oganda ma tokgi tek kendo dipo ka atiekou e wangʼ yo.”
Kane oganda owinjo weche manyoso chunygo negichako ywak maonge ngʼama nolichore gi gimoro amora e dende.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye nosewacho ni Musa niya, “Nyis jo-Israel kama, ‘Un oganda ma tokgi tek. Ka anyalo dhi kodu kata matin, to anyalo tiekou. Koro goluru oko gik mulichogo dendu eka anane gima anyalo timo kodu.’ ”
Kuom mano jo-Israel nogolo oko gik mane gilichogo dendgi ka gin e tiend Got Horeb.
Koro Musa nohero kawo Hema kendo gure oko mar Kambi mochwalore matin koluonge ni “Hemb Romo.” Ngʼato angʼata mane dwaro penjo Jehova Nyasaye wach ne dhi e Hemb Romo oko mar kambi.
Kinde moro amora mane Musa odhi oko e Hema to ji duto ne wuok kendo chungʼ e dhoutgi mag hema ka gingʼiyo Musa nyaka chop odonji.
Kane Musa dhi e Hema to bor polo ne lor piny kendo siko e dhoot ka Jehova Nyasaye wuoyo gi Musa.
Kinde mane oganda oneno bor polono kochungʼ e dho Hema gin bende negichungʼ mi gilam ka ngʼato ka ngʼato nitie e dho Hembe.
Jehova Nyasaye ne wuoyo gi Musa wangʼ gi wangʼ mana ka ngʼato ma wuoyo gi osiepne. Bangʼ mano Musa noduogo e kambi, to Joshua wuod Nun, ma en wuowi mane konye nodongʼ mana e Hema.
Musa nowacho ne Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Isebedo ka iwachona ni, ‘Telne jogi,’ to pok imiya ngʼeyo ngʼatno ma ibiro oro koda. Isewacho niya, ‘Angʼeyi gi nyingi kendo amor kodi.’
Ka imor koda to puonja yoreni mondo angʼeyi kendo mondo asik ka amori. Par ni ogandani gin jogi.”
Jehova Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “An awuon abiro dhi kodi kendo kwe mara nobed kodi.”
Eka Musa nowacho niya, “Ka in iwuon ok idhi kodwa, to kik igolwa ka.
Ere kaka ngʼato dingʼe ni imor koda kaachiel gi jogigi makmana ka idhi kodwa? Koso en angʼo ma dipoga gi jogigi kod ogendini mamoko mantie e piny?”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Abiro timo mana gino ma isekwayo nimar amor kodi kendo angʼeyi gi nyingi.”
Eka Musa nowachone niya, “Koro nyisa duongʼni.”
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Abiro miyo duongʼna duto kadho e nyimi kendo abiro hulo nyinga ma en Jehova Nyasaye e nyimi. Anakech ngʼama adwaro kecho kendo anangʼwon-ne ngʼama adwaro ngʼwonone.”
Nowacho bende niya “Ok inyal neno wangʼa, nimar onge ngʼama nyalo nena mi dok mangima.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Nitie wi lwanda moro buta ka ma inyalo chungʼie.
Ka duongʼna kadho to abiro pandi e rogo mar lwanda kendo abiro umi gi lweta nyaka chop akadhi.
Eka abiro golo lweta kuomi mi inine mana ngʼeya, to wangʼa to ok nine.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Paa kite ariyo machal gi mane okwongo ka kendo anandikie weche mane ni e kite mokwongo mane itoyo.
Bed moikore gokinyi kendo ibi ira ewi Got Sinai kendo kanyo ema anaromie kodi.
Onge ngʼato angʼata manobi kodi kata manobed machiegni ewi got kata mana chiayo kod kweth mag dhok kik kwaa e alwora mar godno.”
Kuom mano Musa nopayo kite ariyo machal gi mane okwongo ka kendo nodhi ewi Got Sinai gokinyi kotingʼogi e lwete mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechike.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nolor koa ei boche kendo nochungʼ kanyo kod Musa kohulone nyinge mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Kendo nokadho e nyim Musa kohulo niya, Jehova Nyasaye, Jehova Nyasaye, ma jangʼwono kendo ma kecho ji, ahora mos bende agundho gihera kod adiera,
ka anyiso hera ne ji gana gi gana kendo aweyo ni ji timbegi maricho, wich teko kod richo. To kata kamano, ok akwan joricho kaka joma kare; to akumo nyithindo gi nyikwayo nyaka tiengʼ mar adek kod mar angʼwen nikech richo kweregi.
Musa nokulore nyaka e lowo mapiyo nono mi olamo.
Nowacho niya, “Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye, ka ayudo ngʼwono e nyim wangʼi, to yie idhi kodwa. Kata obedo ni jogi gin joma tokgi tek kamano, to wenwa kuom timbewa mamono kod richowa kendo kwan-wa kaka mwanduni.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Atimo kodi singruok. E nyim jogi duto abiro timo honni madongo mapok otimie oganda moro amora e piny. Jogo mudak e kindgi biro neno kaka timbe ma an Jehova Nyasaye abiro timo dongo.
Rituru chike ma amiyou kawuono. Abiro riembo oko e nyimu jo-Amor, jo-Kanaan, jo-Hiti, jo-Perizi, jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus.
Beduru motangʼ ne timo winjruok gi jogo modak e pinyno ma udhiyoe, nono to ginibednu obadho.
Mukuru kendegi mag misengini, touru kitegi mopa milamo kendo tongʼuru sirnigi mag Ashera.
Kik ulam nyasaye moro amora nikech Jehova Nyasaye en Nyasaye ma janyiego.
“Beduru motangʼ ne timo winjruok gi jogo modak e pinyno; nimar ka gilamo nyisechegi e yor dwanyruok kendo gitimo misengini gibiro luongou kendo ubiro chamo chiembgi mag misengini.
To bende ka ukawo nyigi moko mondo obed mond yawuotu mi nyigigo odwanyore kendgi gi nyisechegigo, to gibiro miyo yawuotu timo kamano.
“Kik ulos nyiseche mothedhi mag mula mondo ulam.
“Timuru nyasi mar Sawo mar makati ma ok oketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo kaka nachikou. Timuru mano e kinde moketi e dwe mar Abib, nimar e dweno ema ne agoloue e piny Misri.
“Nyak mokwongo mar nyodo e kind jo-Israel en mara, bed ni en dhano kata jamni.
Waruru nyodo mokwongo mar punda gi nyarombo, to ka ok unyal ware, to tururu ngʼute. Waruru yawuotu makayo. “Onge ngʼama onego obi e nyima gi lwete nono.
“Kuom ndalo auchiel unutim tijeu to odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo unuywe; kata mana e kinde mag pur kod keyo bende nyaka uywe.
“Timuru nyasi mar Sawo mar Jumbe gi keyo mar nyak mokwongo mar ngano kod Sawo mar Pono Olembe e rumb higa.
Jou machwo duto nyaka chopi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ma Nyasach Israel nyadidek e higa.
Abiro riembo oko ogendini bende abiro yaro tongʼ mar pinyu kendo onge ngʼat manobed gi gombo kuom pinyu e kinde ma udhi ir Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ngʼato ka ngʼato nyadidek e higa.
“Kik uchiwna remo motimgo misango kaachiel gi gimoro amora moketie thowi, kendo misango moro amora mochiw chiengʼ nyasi mar Pasaka kik dongʼ nyaka okinyi.
“Keluru cham mabeyo mokwongo nyaknu e lowo e od Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. “Kik uted nyadiel ma pod dhodho cha min.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Ndik wechegi piny nimar kaluwore gi wechegi asetimo singruok kodi kaachiel gi jo-Israel.”
Musa nobedo gi Jehova Nyasaye kuno kuom ndalo piero angʼwen odiechiengʼ gotieno, ka ok ocham makati kata modho pi. Kendo nondiko weche mag singruokgi e kite mopa miluongi ni Chike Apar.
Kane Musa olor koa e Got Sinai gi kite ariyo mopa mag Sandug Muma kotingʼo e lwete to ne ok ongʼeyo ni lela wangʼe ne rieny nikech nosewuoyo gi Jehova Nyasaye.
Kane Harun kod jo-Israel duto oneno ka lela wangʼ Musa rieny, negiluoro biro bute machiegni.
To Musa noluongogi; omiyo Harun kod jodongo duto mag oganda Israel noduogo ire mi owuoyo kodgi.
Bangʼe jo-Israel duto nobiro machiegni kode kendo ne omiyogi chike duto ma Jehova Nyasaye nosemiye e Got Sinai.
Kane Musa otieko wuoyo kodgi, noketo ragengʼ e wangʼe.
To e kinde moro amora mane odhi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mondo owuo kode, to nogolo ragengʼno nyaka owuog e nyime. Kane owuok oko mi onyiso jo-Israel gima Jehova Nyasaye osewachone, negineno wangʼe karieny.
Eka Musa ne gengʼo wangʼe kendo nyaka chop ochak odhi owuo gi Jehova Nyasaye kendo.
Musa noluongo ogendini mag jo-Israel duto kanyakla mi owachonegi niya, “Gik ma Jehova Nyasaye ochikou mondo utim e magi:
Kuom ndalo auchiel nyaka uti to odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo nobed odiechiengu maler, ma en Sabato mar yweyo ni Jehova Nyasaye. Ngʼato angʼata motimo tich chiengʼ Sabato nyaka negi.
Kik umok mach e kar daku moro amora chiengʼ Sabato.”
Musa nowacho ni oganda jo-Israel duto niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye ochiko:
Teruru chiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye kuom gik moko duto ma un-go. Ngʼato angʼata ma chunye oyie nyaka kel ne Jehova Nyasaye chiwo mag: “dhahabu, fedha kod mula;
law marambulu, maralik, marakwaro, law mayom kod law mar yie diek;
piende rombe molok gi range makwar, piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nembe, yiend siala;
mor zeituni miolo e taya mondo okel ler, gik mangʼwe ngʼar milosogo mor pwodhruok kod ubani mangʼwe ngʼar;
gi oniks kod kite moko miketo kuom law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod kod law akor.
“Jotich duto molony mantie e kindu nyaka bi mondo olos gik moko duto ma Jehova Nyasaye osechiko kaka:
“Hemb Romo kod hembene ma oko, gi raumne, gi ramakine, gi sirnine gi bepene miriwo kod sirni gi rachungigi,
gi Sandug Muma, gi ludhene, gi raum mar kar pwodhruok kod pasia mogengʼe;
gi mesa kod ludhene kaachiel gi gigene duto mag tich kod makati miketo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye;
bende gilos rachungi taya kod gigene duto kaka techene gi mo milielgo;
gi kendo mar misango miwangʼoe ubani, kaachiel gi ludhene, kod mor pwodhruok gi ubani mangʼwe ngʼar, gi pasia molier e dhood Hemb Romo,
kod kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep, gi singʼengene molos gi mula man kod ludhene gi gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono kaachiel gi karaya kod rachungine,
kod pasia mag laru gi sirnine kod rachungigi kod pasia moumo kar donjo mar laru,
loye mag hema gi loye mag laru gi tonde motwegigo,
kaachiel gi lewni mochwe mag tij dolo mitiyogo e kama ler mar lemo ma gin lewni mag Harun jadolo kod lep yawuote ka gitiyogo kaka jodolo.”
Eka oganda mar jo-Israel duto noa e nyim Musa,
kendo ji duto mane oyie kendo chunygi oelore nobiro mokelo mich ni Jehova Nyasaye kuom tich mar Hemb Romo gi tijene duto gi lewni mopwodhi mag dolo.
Ji duto mane oyie, chwo kod mon, nobiro mokelo bangli gi sitadi mag dhahabu. Ji duto nokelo ne Jehova Nyasaye misango mifwayo mar dhahabu,
to jomoko to nokelo law marambulu, kata maralik, kata marakwaro, kata yie diek, kata piende rombe molok makwar, kata piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nembe.
Jogo mane kelo chiwo mar dhahabu kata fedha kata mula nokelogi kaka chiwo ni Jehova Nyasaye kendo ngʼato angʼata mane nigi yiend siala ne tich moro amora nokelo.
Dhako moro amora molony e twengʼo kod chwecho nokelo law marambulu, maralik kod marakwaro.
Kendo mon duto mane chunygi oyie kendo olony e twengʼo nokelo yie diek.
Jotelo nokelo kite mag oniks kod kite mamoko miketo e law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod kendo kuom law akor.
Bende negikelo gik madum mangʼwe ngʼar gi mor zeituni miolo e taya to gi mor pwodhruok kod ubani mangʼwe ngʼar.
Jo-Israel duto machwo gi mamon mane chunygi oyie nokelo ni Jehova Nyasaye chiwo mar hera ne tich duto mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiko Musa mondo otim.
Eka Musa nowacho ne jo-Israel niya, “Winjuru, Jehova Nyasaye oseyiero Bezalel wuod Uri, ma wuod Hur, maa e dhood Juda,
kendo osepongʼe gi Roho mar Nyasaye, mondo obed gi lony, gi rieko, gi nyalo kod ngʼeyo tije duto mag lwedo;
mondo omi ogor kido mabeyo mag dhahabu gi fedha kod mula,
kendo ongʼad kite duto gi payo bao kendo mondo otim kit tije, duto mag lwedo.
Kendo osemiyo Bazalel, wuod Uri, ma wuod Hur, maa e dhood Juda kaachiel gi Oholiab wuod Ahisamak maa e dhood Dan rieko mar puonjo jomoko.
Osemiyogi rieko mar tiyo tije machalo kaka pecho, goro, chweyo lewni marambulu, maralik, marakwaro kod lewni mayom, ma gin tich joma nigi lony.
Kuom mano Bezalel, Oholiab kod jotich duto molony mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo rieko gi nyalo mar ngʼeyo kaka itiyo tich duto mar gero kama ler mar lemo nyaka ti mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye osechiko.”
Eka Musa noluongo Bezalel gi Oholiab kod jotich duto molony mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo rieko gi nyalo kendo mane oyie biro mondo oti.
Musa nomiyogi chiwo duto mane jo-Israel osekelo kuom gero kama ler mar lemo, kendo ji nomedo kelo chiwo mar hera okinyi kokinyi.
Omiyo jotich duto molony e tije mag lwedo mane timo tije ei kama ler mar lemo noweyo tijegi
mi ginyiso Musa niya, “Ji kelo gik mangʼeny moloyo kar midwaro moloyo kuom tich mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiko ni mondo otim.”
Eka Musa nogolo chik mine gilando wachni e kambi duto kagiwacho niya, “Onge dichwo kata dhako manochak okel chiwo moro amora ne tich gero kama ler mar lemo.” Kuom mano notam ji mondo kik gimed kelo gige tich,
nikech gik mane osekel ne ngʼeny moloyo tieko tich duto mar gero kama ler mar lemo.
Jotich molony duto mane nigi jotich mamoko nogero Hemb Romo gi pasia apar mar law mayom momin man-gi rangi marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro ka ogorie kido mar malaika mar kerubi gi jagoro molony.
Pasiago duto ne romre ka borne romo fut piero angʼwen gariyo to lachne romo fut auchiel.
Negiriwo pasia abich kanyakla kendo abich modongʼ bende negiriwo.
Eka negiloso tonde milierogo pasia e riak pasia man-gi range marambulu kendo negitimo kamano e riak pasia matungʼ komachielo.
Bende negiloso tonde piero abich e riak pasia achiel kendo tonde piero abich mamoko e riak pasia komachielo ka tonde moliergo pasiago omanyore.
Eka negiloso ramaki piero abich mag dhahabu kendo negitiyo kodgi kuom riwo pasia ariyogo kanyakla mondo omi Hemb Romo obed gimoro achiel.
Negiloso pasia apar gachiel mag yie diek ne hema mondo oumgo Hemb Romo.
Pasia apar gachielgo duto ne romre ka bor moro ka moro romo fut piero angʼwen gabich to lachgi romo fut auchiel.
Negiriwo pasia abich obedo gimoro achiel kendo auchiel modongʼ bende negiriwo kamano.
Eka negiloso tonde milierogo pasia piero abich e giko riak pasia konchiel kendo tonde piero abich e giko riak pasia komachielo.
Negiloso ramaki mag mula piero abich mondo gitwego hemano kanyakla mondo obed gimoro achiel.
Eka negilosone hemano raum mar pien rombe molok gi range makwar kendo negiume gi piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nam.
Negiloso sirni mochungʼ mag yiend siala ne Hemb Romo.
Bor siro ka siro ne en fut apar gabich, to lachne ne en fut ariyo gi nus;
ka siro ka siro ochungʼ momanyore gi nyawadgi. Negiloso sirni duto mag Hemb Romo machalre kamano.
Negiloso sirni piero ariyo migerogo bath Hemb Romo mochomo yo milambo,
kendo negiloso rachungi mar taya piero angʼwen mag fedha miketo e bwogi, ka rachungi ariyo iketo e bwo sirni ariyo momanyore.
Kuom bathe komachielo man koma ochomo yo nyandwat, negiloso sirni piero ariyo,
kod rachungi piero angʼwen mag fedha, ka siro ka siro otingʼo rachungi ariyo ariyo.
Negiloso sirni auchiel ne bathe mochwalore mochomo yo podho chiengʼ mar Hemb Romo,
kendo sirni mamoko nokete e konde man yo tok Hemb Romo.
E konde ariyogi noriw chakre e tiende nyaka e wiye malo kendo sirnigo noriw machalre.
Omiyo ne nitie sirni aboro gi rachungi mag fedha apar gauchiel mag fedha, ka siro ka siro otingʼo rachungi ariyo ariyo.
Bende negiloso bepe miriwo mag yiend siala ka abich oket ne sirni mantie bathe konchiel mar Hemb Romo,
to abich modongʼ oketi e bathe komachielo, to abich modongʼ nomako sirni mane omakgo katoke mochomo yo podho chiengʼ mar Hemb Romo.
Negiloso raidhi madiere mane ochakore tungʼ nyaka tungʼ e dier sirnigo.
Ne gibawo sirnigo gi dhahabu kendo negiloso ratege mag dhahabu mondo omak raidhi miriwogo. Bende ne gibawo raidhigo gi dhahabu.
Negiloso pasiago gi law mayom momin mar range marambulu, maralik kod marakwaro moketie kido mar malaika mar kerubi kogorie gi jagoro molony.
Negiloso ludhe angʼwen mag yiend siala mobaw gi dhahabu. Ne gilosonegi rangʼaw mag dhahabu kendo ne girwakonegi rachungigi angʼwen mag fedha.
Negilosone dhoranga Hemb Romo law mayom momin mar range marambulu, maralik kod marakwaro, ma en tich jachwecho molony;
kendo ne gilosonegi ludhe abich man-gi ramaki. Ne giumo wi ludhego kod ratege molworogi gi dhahabu, to rachungi abich mirwako ewi sirnigo nolos gi mula.
Bezalel noloso Sandug Muma gi yiend siala ma borne romo fut angʼwen gi nus to lachne romo fut achiel gi nus kendo borne madhi malo romo fut achiel gi nus.
Nobawe gi dhahabu maler oko gi iye kendo nochwene ndiga mar dhahabu mothedhi molwore.
Nothedhne ratege angʼwen molworore mag dhahabu machalo gi bangli kendo notwegi e tiendene angʼwen-go, ka ratege ariyo bedo e bathe konchiel to ariyo mamoko e bathe komachielo.
Eka noloso ludhe mag yiend siala mi obawogi gi dhahabu.
Kendo norwako ludhego ei ratege mantie e bethe Sandug Muma mondo otingʼego.
Noloso raum mar pwodhruok gi dhahabu maler ma borne romo fut angʼwen gi nus kendo lachne romo fut achiel gi nus.
Eka noloso kido mar malaika ariyo miluongo ni kerubi gi dhahabu mothedhi.
Noloso kido mar malaika mar kerubi achiel e giko raumno kendo malaika mar ariyo e giko komachielo; kendo noriwogi ma gibedo gimoro achiel ewi raumno.
Kido mar malaika mar kerubigo noyaro bwombegi kochomo malo mondo giumgo raumno. Kerubigo nochungʼ momanyore ka ngʼiyore gi wi raumno.
Negiloso mesa gi yiend siala ma borne romo fut adek to lachne romo fut achiel gi nus kendo borne madhi malo romo fut ariyo gi robo.
Eka ne gibawe gi dhahabu maler kendo gilworo bethene gi dhahabu.
Bende negiloso bethene molwore ma lachne romo gi pat lwedo achiel kendo ne gichweyo bethenego gi dhahabu.
Negilosone ratege molworore angʼwen mag dhahabu kendo ne gitweyogi e konde angʼwen mag mesa kama ne nitie tiendene.
Ratege molwororego noket machiegni gi bethe mesano mondo omak ludhego mitiyogo kuom tingʼo mesa.
Ludhe mitingʼogo mesano nolos gi yiend siala kendo nobawgi gi dhahabu.
Gik mitiyogo e mesano mane olosi gi dhahabu maler ne gin, sende, bakunde, tewni kod agulnine mitiyogo kuom chiwo misengini miolo piny.
Negiloso rachung taya gi dhahabu maler kendo ne othedh tiende gi kore gi kikombege machalo maua gi thiepege kod obokege kaka gimoro achiel.
Bedene auchiel nochwogore gi e kore ka adek nitie konchiel kendo adek nitie komachielo.
Kikombe adek molos kaka maupe mag oyungu gi thiepene kod obokene nobedo e bade achiel, kendo adek e bade maluwe kendo bedene auchielgo nochwogore kawuok e rachungi taya.
Kendo kuom rachungi taya ne nitie kikombe angʼwen molos machal gi maupe mag oyungu mathiewo kendo golo thuoke.
Maua achiel noketi e bwo bede ariyo mokwongo mar rachungino, mar ariyo noketi e bwo mar ariyo, to mar adek noketi e bwo bede mar adek, giduto gin bede auchiel.
Maupego kod bedego duto nobedo gimoro achiel gi rachungi taya mothedh gi dhahabu maler.
Negilosone rachungino teyni abiriyo, kaachiel gi gik mingʼadogo otambi kod gigene mag jowo buru molos gi dhahabu maler.
Negiloso rachung tayano kod gigene duto gi dhahabu maler maromo kilo piero adek gangʼwen.
Negiloso kendo mar misango miwangʼoe ubani gi yiend siala. Ne oromre bathe duto koni gi koni ka borne gi lachne en fut achiel gi nus, to borne madhi malo ne gin fut adek, kendo tungene nyaka bed gimoro achiel kode.
Ne gibawo wiye kod bethene duto kod tungene gi dhahabu maler bende nolosne ndiri mar dhahabu molwore.
Negiloso ratege ariyo mag dhahabu e bwo ndiri ka gimanyore ariyo koni gi koni mondo omak ludhe mitingʼego.
Negiloso ludhego gi yiend siala kendo ne gibawogi gi dhahabu.
Bende negiloso mor pwodhruok maler kod ubani maliw madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar, ma en tich jalos mo madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar.
Negigero kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep gi yiend siala ka borne madhi malo romo fut angʼwen gi nus; to lachne kod borne romo fut abiriyo gi nus maromre.
Negiloso tungʼ e konde angʼwen mag kendono, mondo omi tungego kod kendo mar misango obed gimoro achiel, kendo ne gimuono kendo mar misangono gi mula.
Gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendo mar misango nolos gi mula. Gigo ne gin agulni, opawo, bakunde mikirogo remo, gi uma michiwogo ringʼo kod tegni mag mach.
Negiloso singʼenge ne kendo mar misango gi mula mondo oketi e bwoye nyaka chopi e kore gi yo ka malo
Negiloso chuma molworore mag mula mondo omak ludhe ma itingʼego e kondene angʼwen-go.
Negiloso ludhego gi yiend siala mi gibawe gi mula
Negirwako ludhego ei nyangeyego mondo gibedi e bath kendo mar misangono kitingʼego, bende ne gitucho bugo e chunye mondo owe iye thuolo ka gitiyo gi bao mayom.
Negiloso karaya mar mula gi rachungi miketoe karayano mag mula ka gitiyo gi kiyo mag mon mane tiyo e dho Hemb Romo.
Bangʼe negiloso laru. Yo milambo mar laruno borne ne romo fut mia achiel gi piero abich gachiel kendo ne en gi pasia momin molos gi law mayom,
pasiani nolierie sirni piero ariyo gi rachungi piero ariyo mag mula, kod ramaki mag fedha kod rangʼaw miriwogo sirnigo.
Koma odok yo nyandwat mar laruno nobed maromo fut mia achiel piero abich gachiel kendo nobed gi sirni piero ariyo gi rachungi piero ariyo mag mula man-gi ramaki kod rangʼaw miriwogo kor sirni molos gi fedha.
Kochomo yo podho chiengʼ mar laruno lachne ne romo fut piero ochiko gaboro kendo ne en gi pasia mongʼaw e sirni apar morwakie rachungi apar kaachiel gi ramaki molos gi fedha kod rangʼaw miriwogo sirnigo.
Kochomo yo wuok chiengʼ mar laruno bende lachne ne romo fut piero abiriyo gabich.
Pasia ma borgi romo fut piero ariyo gadek ne nitie e bath rangach konchiel ka pasiago ongʼaw ewi sirni adek man-gi rachungi adek,
kendo pasia mamoko ma borgi romo fut piero ariyo gadek ne nitie e bath rangach komachielo kongʼawgi e sirni adek man-gi rachungi adek.
Pasiago duto molworo laruno molos gi law mayom momin.
Rachungi mag sirnigo nolos gi mula. Ramaki gi rangʼaw mag sirnigo nolos gi fedha, kendo nobaw wi sirnigo gi fedha; rangʼaw mag sirnigo duto mag laru nolos gi fedha.
Pasia duto mag dhorangach nolos gi law mayom momin marambulu gi maralik kod makwar molos gi jatwengʼo molony. Borne ne romo fut piero adek kendo kaka pasia mag laru borne ne romo fut aboro,
gi sirni angʼwen kod rachungi mag mula angʼwen. Ramekigi gi rangʼawgi nolos gi fedha.
Loye duto mag Hemb Romo kod loye mag alwora mar laru nolos gi mula.
Magi e kar romb gik moko duto mane otigo kigero Hemb Romo, ma en Hema mar singruok kaka nokwan-gi gi chik mane Musa ogolo ne jo-Lawi kotelnegi gi Ithamar wuod Harun jadolo.
(Bezalel wuod Uri ma wuod Hur ja-dhood Juda noloso gik moko duto kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa;
ne en gi Oholiab wuod Ahisamak ma ja-dhood Dan ma jatich lwedo kendo jagoro kendo jatwangʼ lewni marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro.)
Kar dhahabu duto mane okel kawuok e misango mifwayo mane otigo e tich duto mar kama ler mar lemo ne romo kilo alufu achiel (1,000) kaluwore gi rapim mar kama ler mar lemo.
Fedha mane oyudi koa kuom oganda duto mane okwan e kweno maduongʼ ne romo kilo alufu adek mia angʼwen (3,400) kaluwore gi rapim mar kama ler mar lemo,
fedhago ema nochok kane ngʼato ka ngʼato mane okwan ogolo nus shekel kaluwore gi rapim mar kama ler mar lemo nimar kar romb joma nokwan machwo mahikgi oromo piero ariyo kadhi nyime ne gin ji alufu mia auchiel gadek mia abich gi piero abich (603,550).
Fedha maromo kilo alufu adek mia angʼwen-go (3,400) notigo kuom loso rachungi mag kama ler mar lemo kod mag pasia, ka rachungi ka rachungi kawo kilo piero adek gangʼwen (34,000).
To kilo piero ariyo negitiyogo kuom loso ramaki mag sirni kendo bawo wi sirnigo kod loso rangʼepegi.
Mula mane oyudi e misango mifwayo ne romo kilo alufu ariyo mia angʼwen (2,400).
Negitiyo kode kuom loso rachungi mag dho Hemb Romo gi kendo mar misango mar mula gi singʼengene gi gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono,
kaachiel rachungi mag laru kod mag dhorangach kod sigingigi mag Hemb Romo kod laru molwore.
Negiloso lep dolo momin gi law mayom marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro ma itiyogo e kama ler mar lemo. Bende negiloso lewni mopwodhi ne Harun kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Negiloso law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod gi dhahabu kod usi marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro momin gi law mayom.
Ne githedho dhahabu marep-rep kendo ne gilire matindo tindo mondo olosgo law marambuluno gi maralik kod marakwaro kolose gi jatwengʼo molony.
Negiloso okanda ariyo mag gok mitweyogo law efodno e kondene gi yo ka nyime kod yo kangʼeye.
Okandane mochwe maber ne chalo kode kolose obedo gimoro achiel gi law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod bende nyaka lose gi dhahabu kod law momin mayom man-gi range marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Ne giketone kite mag oniks e yo michanogo dhahabu kendo negikedogi kaka ikedo kido ka gindiko nying yawuot Israel kuome.
Eka negitweyo kitego e lep akor mag law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod mondo gibed kaka kite mag rapar ne nyithind Israel kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Ne gitwangʼo law akor e yo ma jatwengʼo molony twengʼogo ka olose gi dhahabu kod usi marambulu, gi maralik kod marakwaro kod law mayom mar katana kendo momin maber ka law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod.
Noromre duto ka borne gi lachne romo bat achiel kendo nobane nyadiriyo.
Eka negichano laini angʼwen mag kite ma nengogi tek kuom lawno. Laini mokwongo ne gichane kite kaka rubi, topaz gi beril;
e laini mar ariyo ne ochanie kite kaka tarkus, gi safir kod emerald,
to e laini mar adek ne gichane kite kaka jasinth, gi agat kod amethist
kendo e laini mar angʼwen ne gichane kite kaka krisolit gi oniks kod jaspa. Kidigo duto negichano kaka thiwni mag dhahabu.
Kitego duto nondikie nying yawuot Israel apar gariyo, ka okedgi kaka kido ka moro ka moro ochungʼ ne nying dhout Israel apar gariyogo.
Bende negilosone law akor thiwni mokedi mag dhahabu maler machalo kaka tol.
Ne gilose kaka ichano dhahabu kod chumbe molworore ariyo mag dhahabu mi gitweyo chumbe molwororego e riak law mar law akor.
Negitweyo thiwni ariyogo mag dhahabu e ratege mantie e riak law akor,
kendo negitweyo lak thiwnigo komachielo e laini ariyo mochan kaka dhahabu ka gichomego e tond law akor kuom law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod gi yo ka nyime.
Negiloso ratege ariyo mag dhahabu mi gichomogi e konde ariyo mamoko mag law akor gi yo ka iye e riake kama otwangʼ-go law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod.
Eka negiloso ratege ariyo mag dhahabu mi gichomogi e riak tonde ariyo mag gok yo ka nyime mar law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod machiegni gi kama oriwego but nungone.
Negitweyo ratege mag law akorno kuom ratege mag law dolo miluongoni efod gi tol e yo nungone mondo law kik gonyre kuom law efod kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Negiloso kandho marambulu mirwakogo law dolo mar efod, ma en tij jatwengʼo molony,
ka en gi otuchi e diere kaka ngʼut law kendo notwangʼ ngʼuteno gi pien mondo kik oyiechi.
Negiloso gik mongʼinore kaka olemo molos gi usi marambulu gi maralik, law momin mayom e riak lawno.
Bende negiloso gara kaka okode mag dhahabu maler mi gilierogi e riak aroyano ka gikikore gi gik mongʼinore kolemo.
Garago gi gik mongʼinore kolemogo nokikore e riak lawno alwora mondo orwake kitimo tich dolo kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
To negilosone Harun kod yawuote kandho mar law mayom mar katana, ma en tij jatwengʼo molony,
kendo ne gilosonegi kilemba motwangʼ gi law mayom mar katana gi ogute kaachiel gi sirwaru maiye,
kod okanda mayom mitweyo marambulu gi maralik kod marakwaro kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Negiloso gima opadore ka san gi dhahabu maler mondo obed osimbo maler mi gindiko kuome ni: Kama owal ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka ne gitweye gi tol marambulu e kilemba kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Koro tich duto mar Hemb Romo norumo. Jo-Israel notimo gik moko duto mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Eka negikelo hemb romono ir Musa: Ne en hema kod gigene duto gi ramakine gi sirnine gi bepene miriwo kod sirni gi rachungigi;
kod raum mag pien rombo molok makwar gi raum mar piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nembe kod pasia migengʼego;
kod Sandug Muma gi ludhene gi raum mar kar pwodhruok;
gi mesa kod gigene duto mag tich kod makati miketo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye;
gi rachungi mar taya molos gi dhahabu maler gi gigene duto kaka techene gi mo milielgo;
gi kendo mar misango mochwe gi dhahabu, gi mor pwodhruok, gi ubani mangʼwe ngʼar gi pasia molier e dhood hema;
kod kendo mar misango molos gi mula kaachiel gi singʼengene man kod ludhene, gi gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono; gi karaya molos gi mula, kod rachungine;
kod pasia mag laru, gi sirnine kod rachungigi, kod pasia moumo kar donjo mar laru; loye mag laru gi tonde motwegigo, gi gik moko duto mar kar lemo ma en Hemb Romo;
gi lewni mochwe mag tij dolo mitiyogo e kama ler mar lemo ma gin lewni mag Harun jadolo kod lep yawuote ka gitiyogo kaka jodolo.
Jo-Israel nosetimo tije duto mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Musa ne onono tijno mi oneno ni negisetimo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko. Omiyo Musa nogwedhogi.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
Chiel laru mar Hemb Romo, ma en Hemb Lemo maler chiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe mokwongo.
Ket Sandug Muma e iye kendo igengʼe gi pasia.
Kel mesa kendo ichanie gik moko duto monego bedi e wiye. Bangʼe ikel rachungi taya kendo imok teynige.
Ket kendo mar misango miwangʼoe ubani molos gi dhahabu e nyim Sandug Muma kendo iket pasia e dhood Hemb Romo.
Ket kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep e nyim dhood hekalu mar Hemb Romo;
bende ket karaya e kind Hemb Romo gi kendo mar misango mi iolie pi.
Bangʼe chielne laru alwora pasia bangʼe ilier pasia moro mondo ogengʼ dhoranga laru.
Kaw mor pwodhruok mondo ipwodhgo Hemb Romo kod gik moko duto mantie; iwale kod gigene duto kendo obiro bedo maler.
Eka iwir kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep kod gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono, iwal kendo mar misangono to obiro bedo maler.
Wir karaya kod rachungine kendo iwalgi.
Kel Harun kod yawuote e dho Hemb Romo kendo ilwokgi gi pi.
Bangʼe rwak Harun gi lepe maler mag dolo, wire kendo wale mondo otina kaka jadolo.
Kel yawuote kendo irwaknegi kandho moro ka moro.
Wirgi mana kaka ne iwiro wuon-gi mondo mi gitina kaka jodolo. Wir margi biro miyo gibedo jodolo maga kuom tiengegi duto manyaka chiengʼ
Omiyo Musa notimo gik moko duto mana kaka ne Jehova Nyasaye ochike.
Kuom mano Hemb Romo nochungi chiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe mokwongo e higa mar ariyo.
Kane Musa ochungo Hema noketo rachungi kargi morwako bepe kendo ochungo sirni.
Eka noyaro hema ewi Hemb Romo mi oketo raum e wiye kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Nokawo Kite mag Rapar moketo ei Sanduk Muma; norwako ludhe e chumbe molworore mag Sanduk eka noyieyo raum e wiye.
Eka nokelo Sandug Muma ei Hemb Romo mogengʼe gi pasia kendo nogengʼo Sandug Muma kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Noketo rachungi taya ei Hemb Romo kochomo yo nyandwat mar oko mar laru,
kendo noketo makati miketo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Noketo rachungi taya ei Hemb Romo komanyore gi mesa man yo milambo mar Hemb Romo
kendo noketo teyni kuome e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Musa noketo kendo mar misango molos gi dhahabu ei Hemb Romo e nyim pasia
mi nowangʼo ubani madum mangʼwe ngʼar kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Eka noketo pasia e dho Hemb Romo.
Noketo kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep machiegni gi dhood Hemb Romo mi nochiwoe misengni miwangʼo gi chiwo mag cham kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Noketo karaya mar logo e kind Hemb Romo gi kendo mar misango mi noolo pi e iye.
Kendo Musa gi Harun kod yawuote notiyo kode kaluoko lwetegi gi tiendegi.
Sa moro amora mane gidonjo e Hemb Romo kata kane gidhi machiegni gi kendo mar misango to ne gilwoko lwetgi gi tiendegi mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Eka Musa nochungo laru molworo Hemb Romo kod kendo mar misango mi noketo pasia e dhoranga laru. Omiyo Musa notieko tich.
Eka bor polo noumo Hemb Romo kendo duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye nopongʼo Hemb Romono.
Musa ne ok nyal donjo ei Hemb Romo nikech bor polo ne nitie kendo duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye nopongʼo kar lemo.
E wuodhe duto mag jo-Israel, e kinde moro amora ma bor polo ne oa ewi Hemb Romo negichako wuoth,
to ka bor polo ne ok otingʼore malo ne ok gichak wuoth nyaka chop odiechiengʼ motingʼore.
Kuom mano bor polo mar Jehova Nyasaye ne nitie ewi Hemb Romo godiechiengʼ, to mach ne nitie ei bor polono gotieno e nyim jo-Israel duto e wuodhegi.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye noluongo Musa mowuoyo kode gie Hemb Romo. Nowachone niya,
Wachne nyithind Israel kiwacho kama: Ka ngʼato kuomu kelo chiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye, to onego okel chiwo mag chiayo kaka dhok kata rombe.
Ka chiwo en misango miwangʼo pep mar dhiangʼ, to nyaka obed mana mano madichwo maonge songa. Nyaka to ochiwe e dho Hemb Romo mondo omi Jehova Nyasaye oyie kode.
Nyaka oket lwete ewi misango miwangʼo pep, mi Jehova Nyasaye noyie gi misangono mondo obed gima opwodhgo richone.
Kendo enoyangʼ nyarwath e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, eka yawuot Harun ma bende gin jodolo nokel remo, kendo ginikir remo molworo kendo mar misango kendo mochomore gi dho Hemb Romo.
Eka noyangʼ rwadhno kaka misango miwangʼo pep kendo enopoge matindo tindo.
Eka yawuot Harun jadolo nomok mach e kendo mar misango, kendo ginichan yien ewi mach.
Bangʼe yawuot Harun ma jodolo nochan lemo duto kaka wich gi boche ewi yien manie mach mar kendo mar misango.
Enoluoki jamb-ich gi tiendene gi pi, kendo jadolo nowangʼ-gi duto ewi kendo mar misango. En misango miwangʼo pep, madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova Nyasaye.
To ka chiwono en misango miwangʼo pep nowuogi kuom jamni kata kuom rombe kata diek, to nyaka ochiw mano madichwo maonge songa.
Kendo mondo onege e bath kendo mar misango yo nyandwat nyim Jehova Nyasaye, eka jodolo magin yawuot Harun nokir rembgi ewi kendo mar misango bathe koni gi koni.
Kendo nongʼade matindo tindo, eka jadolo nochan-gi ewi yien manie wi kendo mar misango wich kod boche.
To noluok jamb-ich gi tiendene kod pi, eka jadolo nokelgi duto mi nowangʼ-gi ewi kendo mar misango. En misango miwangʼo pep, madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
To ka misango miwangʼo pep michiwone Jehova Nyasaye gin mana winy, to koro nyaka okel mana akuch odugla kata nyathi akuru.
Jadolo nokele e kendo mar misango, kendo nochod wiye, eka owangʼe ewi kendo mar misango, kendo rembe nobii michwer e bath kendo mar misango.
Enogol oswakone gi gik moko manie i oswakone mowitgi oko e bath kendo mar misango, yo wuok chiengʼ kama otimo buru.
Eka enobare gi e bwombe, to ok nopoge chuth, kendo bangʼe jadolo nowangʼe ewi kendo mar misango, kokete ewi yien manie mach. Ma en misango miwangʼo pep, ma en misango miwangʼo gi mach, madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka ngʼato okelone Jehova Nyasaye chiwo mar cham, to nyaka obed mogo mayom. Onego ool mo kuom mogono kendo ochwo ubani kuome,
eka otere ne yawuot Harun ma jodolo. Jadolo nokaw mogo mayom moru gi sanja achiel kaachiel gi ubani duto kendo nowangʼe kaka pok mar rapar ewi kendo mar misango, ma en misango miwangʼo pep, madum tik mangʼwe ngʼar ne ma Jehova Nyasaye.
Cham mar misango mane odongʼ koro nobedi mar Harun gi yawuote, ma en gima ler moloyo kuom misengini mag Jehova Nyasaye miwangʼo gi mach.
Ka ikelo chiwo mar cham motedie kendo, nyaka obed kek molosi gi mogo mayom ma ok oketie thowi modwal gi mo kata chapat mowir gi mo.
To ka chiwo mari mar cham en gima otedi e tawo, to enobedi mogo mayom ma ok oketie thowi, kendo moru gi mo.
Poge matindo tindo, ol mo kuome, nikech en misango mar cham.
To ka chiwo mari mar cham en gima otedi e tawo, inilose gi mogo mayom kod mo.
Kel misango mar cham molos gi gigi ne Jehova Nyasaye, kele ne jadolo, mabiro chiwe e kendo mar misango.
Enopog moko kaka pok mar rapar kendo chiw moko e kendo mar misango kaka misango miwangʼo pep madum tik mangʼwe ngʼar ne Jehova Nyasaye.
To gima nodongʼ kuom chiwo mari mar cham nobed mar Harun gi yawuote, en gima ler moloyo nikech ogole kuom misango miwangʼo gi mach ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Misengini duto mag cham ma uchiwo ni Jehova Nyasaye nyaka bed ma ok oketie thowi, nimar misango ma uwangʼo gi mach ni Jehova Nyasaye kik ketie mor kich kata thowi.
To gigo unyalo chiwo ni Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mar cham mokwongo, makmana kik uwangʼ-gi e kendo mar misango kaka iwangʼo misango madum tik mangʼwe ngʼar.
To chiwo duto mag cham mondo ituonie chumbi. Kik iwe mak ituone chumbi e misengini magi duto mag mogo kaka nisingori ni Nyasachi; mano emomiyo chumbi nyaka tuonie misengini duto mutimo.
Ka ukelone Jehova Nyasaye misango mar cham kod cham mokwongo nyak, to nyaka uchiw wiye cham manyien mobul e mach kendo moyoki.
Keturu mo gi ubani nikech en misango mar cham.
Jadolo nokaw cham moko mondo oru gi mo kendo enowangʼ-gi kaachiel gi ubani kaka rapar, nikech en misango miwangʼo ni Jehova Nyasaye gi mach.
To ka ngʼato ochiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye misango mar lalruok mogolo e kweth jambe bed ni en rwath kata roya to nyaka obed maonge songa.
Ngʼatno nyaka ket lwete ewi misango mar dherno, kendo oyangʼe e dho Hemb Romo. Eka jodolo ma yawuot Harun nokaw remo, kendo ginikire e bathe kendo mar misango koni gi koni.
Koa kuom chiwo mar lalruok nyaka otimne Jehova Nyasaye misango miwangʼo gi mach ma gin: boche moimo jamb-ich, gi kuonde machiegni kode,
gi nyiroke kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man but oguro, kod jwala mabor man ewi chuny nogol oko kaachiel gi nyiroke.
Eka yawuot Harun nowangʼ-gi e kendo mar misango koketgi ewi misango miwangʼo pep man e yien moket e mach mondo obed misango miwangʼo madum tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka ngʼato ochiwo chiayo mondo otim-go misango mar lalruok ni Jehova Nyasaye, to nyaka ochiw chiayo madhako kata madichwo maonge songa.
To ka ochiwo nyarombo, to nyaka ochiwe e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka nyaka oket lwete ewi chiayono kendo oyangʼe e dho Hemb Romo. Yawuot Harun nokaw remo, kendo ginikire e bethe kendo mar misango koni gi koni.
Koa kuom chiwo mar lalruok nyaka timne Jehova Nyasaye misango miwangʼo gi mach ma gin: bochene gi sembe duto mogol koa e lumbru gi bor moumo jamb-ich kaachiel gi boche man kuom jamb-ich,
gi nyiroke ariyo kod bor man kuomgi man but oguche kod jwala mabor manie wi chuny nogol oko kaachiel gi nyiroke.
Jadolo nowangʼ gigi duto ewi kendo mar misango kaka chiemo, ma en chiwo miwangʼo pep ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka chiwo mare en diel, to nyaka ochiwe e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka nyaka oket lwete ewi chiayono kendo oyangʼe e dho Hemb Romo. Yawuot Harun nokaw remo, kendo ginikire e bethe kendo mar misango koni gi koni.
Koa kuom chiwo mar lalruok nyaka tim ne Jehova Nyasaye misango miwangʼo pep ma gin: boche moimo jamb-ich gi kuonde machiegni kode,
gi nyiroke kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man but oguro, kod jwala mabor man ewi chuny nogol oko kaachiel gi nyiroke.
Jadolo nowangʼ gigi duto ewi kendo mar misango kaka chiemo, ma en chiwo miwangʼo pep ne Jehova Nyasaye kendo madum tik mangʼwe ngʼar. Boche duto gin mag Jehova Nyasaye.
Mano nobed chik mochwere ne tienge duto mabiro e kamoro amora manudagie; kendo kik ucham bor kata remo.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wachne jo-Israel ni, ‘Magi e chike mabiro mako ngʼato ka odonjo e richo ka ok ongʼeyo kendo otimo gima chik Jehova Nyasaye okwero:
“ ‘Ka jadolo mowal oketho mi omiyo joga obedo mogak, to ochune ni nyaka ochiw ni Jehova Nyasaye nyarwath maonge songa kendo otim-go misango mar golo richo, ne richo mosetimono.
To nyaka ochiw rwadhno e dho Hemb Romo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Kendo oyie lwete e wiye mi oyangʼe e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka jadolo mowal nokaw remb rwadhno moko, mi nokele e Hemb Romo.
Kendo enolut lwete ei remono, mi okir moko nyadibiriyo e nyim pasia mar kama ler mar lemo mar Jehova Nyasaye.
