Bangʼ mano jadolono nomien remo moko e tunge kendo mar misango miwangʼoe ubani e nyim Jehova Nyasaye manie Hemb Romo. To remb rwadhno modongʼ nopuki e tiend kendo mitimoe misango miwangʼo pep manie dho Hemb Romo.
To boche duto mogol kuom rwath mochiw kaka misango mar golo richo noket tenge gi boche moumo jamb-ich kod boche mamoko molwore,
kaachiel gi nyiroke gi boche mogawogi manie bath oguro kod jwala mabor manie wi chuny kod nyiroke,
mago duto noket tenge mana kaka iketo boche mogol kuom rwedhi mitimogo misengini mag lalruok. Eka jadolo nowangʼ-gi pep ewi kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep.
Pien nyarwadhno gi ringe duto, kaachiel gi wiye kod tiendene, jamb-iye kod wen,
ma tiende ni nyarwadhno duto, notingʼ kendo noter oko mar pacho kama ler ma en kama oket tenge ne puko buch kendo mar misango, kendo mondo owangʼe kanyo pep gi mach mar yien ewi pidh buruno.
“ ‘Ka oganda mar jo-Israel duto otimo richo ka ok gingʼeyo maponi gitimo gimoro ma chik Jehova Nyasaye okwero, kata obedo ni gikia, to gin joricho.
Ka achien richono ofwenyore, to nyaka gichiw nyarwath mitimogo misango mar golo richo, kendo gikel nyarwath e nyim Hemb Romo.
Jodong oganda mar Israel noket lwetgi ewi nyarwadhno e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo enoyangʼe mana kanyo.
Jadolo mowal to nokaw remo moko mag rwadhno kendo nokel ei Hemb Romo.
Nolut lith lwete ei remono, mi nokire nyadibiriyo e nyim pasia mar kama ler mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Bangʼ mano to mondo omien remo moko e tunge kendo mar misango manie nyim Jehova Nyasaye ei Hemb Romo. To remo modongʼ nopuki e tiend kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep manie dho Hemb Romo.
Nokaw boche duto mi nowangʼ-gi ewi kendo mar misango,
kendo nochiw rwadhno mana kaka nochiwo rwath mitimogo misango mar golo richo. Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodhnigi kethogi mi nowenegi.
“ ‘Eka enogol nyarwadhno oko mar kambi mi ochiwe kaka misango miwangʼo mana kaka mochiwo mokwongo-cha. Mano en misango mar golo richo ni oganda.
“ ‘Ka jatelo moro odonjo e richo ka ok ongʼeyo kendo otimo gima chik ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasache okwero to obedo jaketho.
To ka onyise kit richo ma osetimo, to nyaka okel nywok maonge songa mondo otimnego misango kuom ketho chik.
Enoket lwete ewi chiayono, kendo enoyangʼe kama itimoe misango miwangʼo pep e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. En misango mar golo richo.
Eka jadolo nokaw remo moko mar golo richo gi lith lwete mi nomiene e tunge kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep, eka bangʼe remo duto modongʼ to nopuk e tiend kendo mar misango.
Nowangʼ boche duto ewi kendo mar misango kaka nowangʼo mo mar misango mar lalruok. Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ketho mar ngʼatno kendo nowene richone.
“ ‘Ka ngʼato moro ei oganda odonjo e richo ka ok ongʼeyo kendo otimo gima chik Jehova Nyasaye ok oyiego, to en jaketho.
To ka onyise kit richo ma osetimo to nyaka okel diel maonge songa mondo otimnego misango kuom ketho chik.
Enoket lwete ewi chiayono mitimogo misango mar golo richo, kendo enoyangʼe kama itimoe misango miwangʼo pep.
Eka jadolo nokaw remo moko gi lith lwete kendo nomiene tunge kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep, eka remo modongʼ to nopuki e tiend kendo mar misango.
Nowangʼ boche duto ewi kendo mar misango mana kaka nowangʼo mo mar misango mar lalruok ma en tik madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova Nyasaye. Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ketho mar ngʼatno kendo nowene richone.
“ ‘To ka ngʼato ochiwo rombo mondo otim-go misango mar golo richo, to nyaka obed mana rombo maonge songa.
Enoket lwete ewi chiayono, kendo enoyangʼe kaka misango mar golo richo kama itimoe misango miwangʼo pep.
Eka jadolo nokaw remo moko mar misango mar golo richo gi lith lwete kendo nomiene tunge kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep, eka remo duto modongʼ to nopukie tiend kendo mar misango miwangʼo.
Nowangʼ boche duto kendo nowangʼ-gi ewi kendo mar misango mana kaka iwangʼo mo mar rombo mar lalruok, kendo jadolo nowangʼ bochego ewi misengini miwangʼo ni Jehova Nyasaye gi mach. Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ketho mar ngʼatno kendo nowene richone.
“ ‘Ngʼato angʼata ma nokwongʼre kata ma notamre mar hulo wach moro mosewinjo kata moseneno, en bende nobed jaketho, kendo nyaka kume mi ochul.
“ ‘Kata ka ngʼato omulo gimoro makwero, bed ni en le mar bungu motho kata gik mamol motho, ka ok ongʼeyo, mi ofwenye achien, to enodok jaketho.
Kata ka orere kuom gimoro makwero moa kuom dhano ka ok ongʼeyo, mi ofwenyo achien, to enodok jaketho.
Ka ngʼato ohedhore ma okwongʼore mar timo gimoro, maber kata marach ka ok ongʼeyo, (e wach moro ma ngʼato thoro hedhore ka kwongʼore) mi bangʼe achien ofwenyo, to enodok jaketho.
Ka ngʼato angʼata en jaketho e achiel kuom wechegi, to nyaka ohul kaka oseketho,
kendo nyaka okel ni Jehova Nyasaye rombo kata diel madhako kaka misango mar golo richo kuom ketho mosetimo; bangʼe jadolo nopwodhnego kethoneno.
“ ‘To ka ok onyal chiwo nyarombo, to nokel akuche odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo ni Jehova Nyasaye kuom richo mosetimono. Kuom mano, akuru achiel notimnego misango mar golo richo, to machielo to notimnego misango miwangʼo pep.
Enokelgi ne jadolo, eka jadolo nokwong ochiw winyo mar misango mar golo richo. Enomak wiye komino ngʼute, to ok nochode chuth,
kendo nokir remb winyono moko e kor kendo mar misango, to remo modongʼ to mondo ochwer e tiend kendono, nikech en misango mar golo richo.
Jadolo nochiw winyo machielo modongʼ kaka misango miwangʼo pep e yo ma chik dwaro kendo mondo opwodhego kuom richo mosetimo mi nowene.
“ ‘To ka ok onyal yudo kata mana akuche odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo, to chunoni nyaka ochiw kilo angʼwen mar mogo mayom kaka misango mar golo richo. Kik oolie mo kata kik oketie ubani, nikech en misango mar golo richo.
Eka enokel mogono ni jadolo eka jadolo nojuke sanja kaka rapar, mi nowangʼe e kendo mar misango ewi misengini miwangʼo gi mach ni Jehova Nyasaye. Mano en misango mar golo richo.
Kamano e kaka jadolo notimne pwodhruok kuom richo mosetimo kendo nowene. Mana kaka chiwo mag cham, chiwo mamoko nobed mag jadolo.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Ka ngʼato oketho mi otimo richo mar oyiem kaluwore gi chike maler mag Jehova Nyasaye, to nyaka okel ne Jehova Nyasaye im maonge songa kendo man-gi nengo kaluwore gi rapim mar shekel mar kama ler mar lemo. En misango michiwo mar pwodhruok e ketho.
Nyaka ochul nengo mar gima ne ok ochiwo kaluwore gi chike maler, kendo bende omedi achiel kuom abich mar nengono kendo ochiwe duto ne jadolo, mabiro kawo imno kendo otimnego misango mar pwodhruok e ketho eka nowene richone.
“Ka ngʼata otimo richo kendo otimo gima okwer e chik moro amora mar Jehova Nyasaye, kata obedo ni ok ongʼeye, to en richo kendo en okwane jaketho.
Nyaka okelne jadolo im man-gi nengo kendo maonge songa kaka misango mipwodhogo ketho. Kamano jadolo nopwodhe kuom ketho mosetimo kokia kendo nowene.
En misango mar pwodhruok e ketho; nikech osetimo marach e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Ka ngʼato otimo richo kendo ok obedo ja-ratiro e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ka owuondo nyawadgi kuom gima osingne kata gima owene mondo oriti kata gima okwal,
kata ka okwanyo gima olal bangʼe oriambo kendo oriyo dhoge, kata ka otimo richo ma ngʼato angʼata nyalo timo;
kuom mano ka otimo richo kendo odoko jaketho, to nyaka odwok gima osekwalo kata mochamo malangʼ, kata gima ne osingne, kata gima ne okwanyo molal,
kata gimoro amora mane okwongʼoree gi miriambo. Nyaka ochul gigo duto mi omedie achiel kuom abich mar nengogi kendo mondo ochiwgi duto ne wuon-gi chiengʼ mochiwoe misango mipwodhego e kethoneno.
Bende nyaka okel ni jadolo misango mar pwodhruok e richo ni Jehova Nyasaye im maonge songa ma nengone oromo timo misango mipwodhego e kethoneno.
Mano e kaka jadolo notimnego misango mipwodhogo kethoneno e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, kendo enowene kuom ketho duto ma osetimo, mane omiyo obedo jaricho.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Mi Harun gi yawuote chikni: ‘Magi e chike mag misango miwangʼo pep: Misango miwangʼo pep nyaka nind e kendo mar misango otieno duto nyaka okinyi, bende mach kik tho e kendo mar misangono.
Eka jadolo norwak lepe mayom mag dolo ma oko gi maiye, kendo nojow buru mar misango miwangʼo pep kogolo e kendo mar misango mi oolgi oko e bath kendono.
Eka nogol lewnigo kendo norwak mamoko, bangʼe notingʼ buru kotero oko mar kambi kama ler mar pwodhruok.
Mach manie kendo mar misango to nyaka sik kaliel. Jadolo nyaka med yien e kendono okinyi kokinyi kendo ochanie misango miwangʼo pep eka owangʼe boche mag misengini mag lalruok.
Mach nyaka sik kaliel e kendo mar misango ma ok tho.
“ ‘Magi e chike mag misengini mag cham: Yawuot Harun nochiwe ne Jehova Nyasaye e nyim kendo mar misango.
Jadolo nojuk mogo mayom sanja gi mo kaachiel gi ubani mi oriwgi gi misango mar cham, kendo nowangʼ sanja ma ojukono kaka rapar e kendo mar misango mondo odungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Harun gi yawuote nocham modongʼ, to nyaka gichame ma ok oketie thowi e kama ler mar lemo; kendo ginichame e laru mar Hemb Romo.
Mogono ok onego ru gi thowi; nikech asemiyogigo kaka migapgi kuom misengini michiwona miwangʼo gi mach. En gima ler ka misango mar golo richo kod misango mar pwodhruok e ketho.
Nyakwar Harun moro amora madichwo nyalo chame. Ma en migapgi mapile pile mar misengini miwangʼo ne Jehova Nyasaye gi mach kuom tiengʼ ka tiengʼ mabiro. Gimoro amora morere kuome nodok maler.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho kendo ne Musa niya,
“Chiwoni ema Harun gi Yawuote nokelne Jehova Nyasaye chiengʼ ma iwalogi: Mogo mayom moromo kilo angʼwen kaka chiwo mar cham mapile pile, nus mar mogono ginichiw gokinyi, to nus modongʼ ginichiw godhiambo.
Tedeuru gi mo e tawo, eka ukele koseruwore maber, kendo chiwe kongʼinjore matindo tindo, kendo otimgo misango mar cham madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Wuode manokaw kare kaka jadolo mowal ema nolos misangono. Nyaka wangʼe pep nimar en migawo mapile pile mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Kuom misango mar cham moro amora ma jadolo ogolo nyaka wangʼ pep kendo kik chamgi.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
Nyis Harun gi yawuote kama: Magi e chike mag misango mar golo richo: Chiach misango mar golo richo nyaka yangʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mana kama iyangʼoe chiach misango miwangʼo pep nikech en gima ler moloyo.
Jadolo mochiwo misangono nyaka chame kama ler mar lemo, ma nitie e laru mar Hemb Romo.
Gimoro amora morere e misangono nobed gima owal ni Jehova Nyasaye. Ka diponi remb misangono okirore e nanga, to nyaka lwoke e kama ler mar lemo.
Chunoni agulu motedie ringʼo mar misango mar golo richo nyaka too; to ka aguch mula ema otedee, to nyaka rudhe maler mi bangʼe lawe gi pi.
Ngʼato angʼata madichwo ma jaodgi jodolo oyiene chamo misangono, nikech en gima ler moloyo.
Ka remb chiayo motimgo misango miwangʼo mar golo richo okel ei Hemb Romo mondo pwodhgo richo ei Kama Ler mar lemo, to misangono kik cham; nyaka wangʼe gi mach.
Magi e chike mag misango ma ipwodhruokgo e ketho, ma en misango maler moloyo:
Chiayo mar misango mipwodhruokgo e ketho nyaka yangʼ mana kama iyangʼoe chiayo mar misango miwangʼo pep kendo rembe nyaka kir e bethe kendo mar misango koni gi koni.
Eka jadolo nokaw bochene duto, kaka sembe gi boche moumo jamb-ich,
kod nyiroke kaachiel gi boche mogawe gi man but oguro kendo inigol jwala mabor manie wi chuny kod nyiroke.
Jadolo nochiwgi ka wangʼogi ewi kendo mar misango, mondo obed misango miwangʼo gi mach ni Jehova Nyasaye, nikech en misango mipwodhruokgo e ketho.
Ngʼato angʼata madichwo ma jaodgi jodolo oyiene chame, to nyaka chame mana e kama ler mar lemo mowal ni Jehova Nyasaye, nikech en gima ler moloyo.
Chik achielni ema oriwo misango mar golo richo kod misango mipwodhruokgo e ketho. Misenginigo nodongʼ ni jadolo motimogi, kopwodhogo richo.
Jadolo matimo misango miwangʼo pep ma ngʼato ochiwo nodongʼ gi pien chiayono kaka mare owuon.
Misango duto mag cham mobul e kendo kata motedi e sufuria, kata e dakuon, nodongʼne jodolo motime;
makmana misengini mamoko mag cham moruw gi mo kata ma ok oruw, ema nopog maromre ne yawuot Harun duto.
Magi e chike mag misango mar lalruok ma ngʼato nyalo chiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Ka ochiwe ka gir goyo erokamano, to ochiwe kaachiel gi makati ma ok oketie thowi moted gi mo, kod chapat ma ok oketie thowi mowir gi mo, gi kek moted gi mogo mayom kendo modwal gi mo.
Bende enokel misango mar lalruok mar goyo erokamano kaachiel gi makati moted gi thowi.
Enokel achiel kuom moro ka moro kaka misango mochiwe ne Jehova Nyasaye, nikech en mar jadolo makiro remb misengini mag lalruok.
Ring misango mar goyo erokamano nyaka cham mana odiechiengno mochiwe ma ok oriyo nyaka okinyi.
“ ‘Ka misango motimo en mar kwongʼruok, chiwo mar hera, to misangono nyaka cham e odiechiengno mochiwe, to ka moro odongʼ to inyalo chame kinyne.
Ka ringʼo moro mar misango odongʼ nyaka chiengʼ mar adek, to nyaka wangʼe e mach.
Ka ring misango mar lalruok ocham chiengʼ mar adek, to misangono ok noyiego. Bende Nyasaye ok nokwan misangono ka gima ber, nimar en gima kwero, kendo ngʼama ochame nobed jaricho.
“ ‘Ringʼo morere e gimoro amora mogak, kik cham, to nyaka wangʼ e mach. To ringʼo mamoko modongʼ to inyalo cham gi ngʼato angʼata maler.
To ka ngʼat mogak ochamo ring misango mar lalruok mochiwne Jehova Nyasaye, ngʼatni nyaka ngʼad kare oko kuom ogandagi.
Ngʼato angʼata momulo gimoro mogak, bedni en dhano kata le, kata gimoro amora makwero, eka bangʼe ochamo ring misango mar lalruok mochiw ni Jehova Nyasaye, en bende nyaka ngʼad kare oko kuom ogandagi.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Nyis jo-Israel kama: ‘Kik ucham bor moro amora mar dhok, rombe, kata diek.
Chiayo moyud kotho kende kata ma ondiegi onego kik gicham bore to boreno inyalo tigo e yo moro amora.
Ngʼato angʼata kuomu manocham bor chiayo ma lembe moko osetimgo misango miwangʼo pep ni Jehova Nyasaye, to nyaka ngʼad kare kuom ogandane.
Ka moro amora mudakie, kik ucham remo moro amora bed ni en mar winy kata en mar le.
Ngʼato angʼata mochamo remo nyaka ngʼad kare kuom ogandane.’ ”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Nyis jo-Israel kama: ‘Ngʼato angʼata mochiwo misango mar lalruok ne Jehova Nyasaye, nyaka kel migawo mar misango kaka chiwo mare ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Enokelne Jehova Nyasaye gi lwete owuon boche miwangʼo gi mach kaachiel gi agoke kendo enolier agokono kofwaye e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo.
Jadolo nowangʼ bochego e kendo mar misango, makmana ni agoko to nodongʼ ni Harun gi yawuote.
Unuchiwne jadolo bam ma korachwich mar chiayo kaka misango mar lalruok.
To wuod Harun mano kir remo kendo wangʼ boche mar misango mar lalruok nyaka kaw bam korachwich kaka pokne.
To kuom misango mar lalruok ma jo-Israel golo, asekawo agoko miliero kendo ifwayo kod bam michiwo kaka pok kendo asemiyogi Harun jadolo kod yawuote kaka pokgi mapile pile kuom jo-Israel.’ ”
Ma e migawo mar chiwo miwangʼo pep ne Jehova Nyasaye mane opogone Harun gi yawuote e odiechiengʼ mane owalgi mondo gitine Jehova Nyasaye kaka jodolo.
E odiechiengʼ mane opwodhgi, Jehova Nyasaye nochiwo chik ni jo-Israel mondo omigi ma kaka pokgi mapile ne tienge mabiro.
Magi koro e chike mag misango miwangʼo pep, misango mar cham, misango mar golo richo, misango ma ipwodhruokgo e ketho gi misengini mitimo chiengʼ miketo jadolo e tich kaachiel gi misengini mag lalruok.
Chikegi Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo Musa e Got Sinai, chiengʼ mane ochoko jo-Israel mondo ochiwne Jehova Nyasaye misengini mag-gi, ka gin e Thim mar Sinai.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Kel Harun gi yawuote gi lepgi mag dolo, gi mor pwodhruok, gi rwadh misango mar golo richo gi imbe ariyo, kod odheru motingʼo makati ma ok oketie thowi,
kendo ichok oganda duto e dho Hemb Romo.”
Musa notimo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike, kendo oganda jo-Israel duto nochokore e dho Hemb Romo.
Musa nowachonegi niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye osechiko mondo otim.”
Eka Musa nogolo Harun gi yawuote e dier oganda mi olwokogi gi pi.
Bangʼ mano norwako ne Harun kandho, eka notweyone okanda e nungone, kendo norwakone law mayom mar dolo miluongo ni efod, bangʼe notweyone law dolono miluongo ni efodno gi okandane motwangʼ maber.
Norwakone law akor, moketo ombulu miluongo ni Urim gi Thumim e law akorno.
Eka nosidhone Harun kilemba e wiye, kendo oketone san mar dhahabu mopamore, ma en osimbo maler e nyim kilemba kaka ne Jehova Nyasaye ochike.
Eka Musa nokawo mor pwodhruok mowirogo Hema kod gik moko duto manie iye, kendo nopwodhogi.
Nokiro mo moko ewi kendo mar misango nyadibiriyo, mowire kaachiel gi gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono gi karaya mar luokruok gi rachungine, kendo nopwodhogi.
Noolo mor pwodhruok moko ewi Harun, kowire kendo kopwodhe ne tich dolo.
Bangʼe nokelo yawuot Harun morwakonegi kandho, eka otweyonigi okanda e nungogi kendo osidhonegi kilemba mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Eka Musa nokelo rwath mane ibiro timgo misango mar golo richo, Harun kod yawuote noyie lwetgi e wiye.
Musa noyangʼo rwadhno kendo rembe moko nokawo gi lith lwete momieno e tunge kendo mar misango mondo opwodhgo kendo mar misango. Remo modongʼ to ne opuko e bwo kendo mar misango. Kamano nowalo kendo mar misangono mondo opwodhego.
Bangʼe Musa nokawo boche duto mogawo jamb-ich gi moumo chuny gi nyiroke ariyo kod boche mogawogi mi nowangʼogi e kendo mar misango.
To ring rwadhno gi piene kaachiel gi wen, nogolo oko mar kambi mowangʼogi duto kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Eka Musa nokelo im mane ibiro timgo misango miwangʼo pep mar golo richo, kendo Harun kaachiel gi yawuote noyieyo lwetgi e wiye.
Eka Musa noyangʼo imno, kendo nokawo remo mi okiro e bath kendo mar misango.
Ne opogo ring imno lemo ka lemo kendo nowangʼo wiye gi lemogo duto kod bochene.
Bangʼe nolwoko jamb-ich kod tiende imno gi pi, kendo nowangʼo imno pep e kendo mar misango kaka misango miwangʼo pep, ma en misango miwangʼo gi mach ne Jehova Nyasaye kendo madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Bangʼ mano Musa nokelo im machielo, ma en im miwalogo jodolo ne tich kendo Harun gi yawuote noyieyo lwetgi e wiye.
Musa moyangʼo imno kendo nokawo remb imno moko momieno e it Harun ma korachwich, gi lith lwete mathuon ma korachwich kod lith tiende mathuon ma korachwich.
Eka bangʼe Musa nochungo yawuot Harun, kendo nomieno remo e itgi ma korachwich gi lith lwetgi mathuon ma korachwich kod lith tiendegi mathuon ma korachwich. Remo modongʼ to ne okiro e bath kendo mar misango moluoro.
Nokawo boche gi boche mag sembe, kod boche duto mogawo jamb-ich gi boche moimo chuny gi nyiroke ariyo kod boche mogawogi, kaachiel gi bam ma korachwich.
Kuom okapu mar makati ma ok oketie thowi mane ni e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, nokawo makati gi kek molos gi mo kod chapat achiel mi oketogi ewi boche kod bam ma korachwich.
Gigi duto noketo e lwet Harun gi yawuote mondo gifwagi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo.
Bangʼe Musa nokawogi e lwetgi kendo nowangʼogi kaachiel gi misango miwangʼo pep e kendo mar misango kaka misango miwalogo jodolo. En misango miwangʼo pep ne Jehova Nyasaye kendo madum tik mangʼwe ngʼar ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Musa nokawo agoko mi ofwaye e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo; ma ne pok mar misango mar im miwalogo Harun, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Eka Musa nokawo mor pwodhruok kod remo mane nitiere e kendo mar misango mi okiro kuom Harun gi yawuote kod lepgi mag dolo. Omiyo nopwodho Harun gi yawuote kod lepgi mag dolo.
Eka Musa nokone Harun gi yawuote niya, “Teduru ringʼono e dho Hemb Romo, kendo kanyo ema uchame gi makati manie okapu kama nitie gik mipwodhogo jodolo ne tich, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochika, kawacho ni, ‘Harun gi yawuote ema nyaka cham ringʼono.’
Ringʼo kod makati modongʼ to nyaka une ni uwangʼo.
Kik uwuog e dho Hemb Romo kuom ndalo abiriyo, nyaka kinde ma iwalougo rum nikech walou biro kawo ndalo abiriyo.
Pwodhruok ma otimore kawuononi kuomu e kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochika ni atimnu.
Nyaka ubedi e dho Hemb Romo odiechiengʼ gotieno kuom ndalo abiriyo ka utimo gima Jehova Nyasaye dwaro, mondo kik utho nikech mano e gima Jehova Nyasaye osechika mondo awachnu.”
Omiyo Harun gi yawuote notimo gik moko duto mane Jehova Nyasaye ochikogi gi dwond Musa.
Chiengʼ mar aboro Musa noluongo Harun gi yawuote kaachiel gi jodong Israel.
Nowacho ne Harun niya, “Kaw nyarwath mondo itimgo misango mar golo richo kendo ikaw im mondo itimgo misango miwangʼo pep, jamnigo nyaka bed maonge songa kendo ichiwgi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Nyis jo-Israel kama: ‘Kawuru nywok maonge songa mondo utimgo misango mar golo richo, to nyaroya gi nyarombo mahikgi achiel kendo maonge songa mondo uchiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep.
Kendo uchiw rwath kod im kaka misango mar lalruok kaachiel gi misango mar cham moruw gi mo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye nikech tinendeni Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyrenu.’ ”
Negikelo gik moko duto mane Musa ochikogi e dho Hemb Romo, kendo oganda duto mar Israel nosudo mochungʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka Musa nowachonegi niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye osechikou mondo utim, mondo duongʼne maler ofwenyrenu.”
Musa nowacho ne Harun niya, “Sud machiegni gi kendo mar misango, kendo itim misango mar golo richo, gi misango miwangʼo pep, mondo ipwodhrigo kaachiel gi oganda; eka ichiw misango kipwodhogo oganda kaka Jehova Nyasaye osechiko.”
Kuom mano, Harun nosudo machiegni but kendo mar misango, kendo noyangʼo nyarwath mane obiro gologo richone owuon.
Bangʼe yawuote nokelone remo, mi onyumoe lith lwete, nomienogo tunge mag kendo mar misango, eka remo modongʼ to ne opuko e tiend kendo mar misango.
Nokawo boche gi nyiroke kod jwala mabor manie wi chuny mag chiayo mane itimogo misango mar golo richo, kendo nowangʼogi pep ewi kendo mar misango mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
To ringʼo kod piem to ne otero oko mar kambi mowangʼogi.
Bangʼ mano Harun noyangʼo chiayo mar misango miwangʼo pep. Yawuote nogamone remo kendo nokiro e bethe duto mag kendo mar misango.
Eka negimiye lemo ka lemo mar chiayo mar misango miwangʼo pep kaachiel gi wich kendo owangʼogi e kendo mar misango.
Nolwoko jamb-ich kaachiel gi tielo kendo nowangʼogi kuom misango miwangʼo pep ewi kendo mar misango.
Eka Harun nokelo misango mane ji ochiwo. Nokawo nywok mane ibiro timgo misango mar golo richo ni oganda, noyangʼe kendo nopwodhogo richogi mana kaka notimo gi misango mokwongo.
Bangʼ mano nokawo chiayo mar timo misango miwangʼo pep kendo nochiwe mana kaka ne chik dwaro.
Eka nokelo misango mar cham kendo nojuko sanja mowangʼo e kendo mar misango kaachiel gi misango miwangʼo pep mar okinyi.
Eka Harun noyangʼo rwath kod im mane itimogo misango mar lalruok ni oganda. Yawuote nogamone remo mokiro e bethe duto mag kendo mar misango.
To boche mag rwadhno kod imno kaka sembe, gi boche mogawo jamb-ich gi nyiroke kaachiel gi jwala mabor manie wi chuny,
duto negiketo ewi agoko, eka Harun nowangʼogie kendo mar misango.
Harun noliero agoko kod bam korachwich e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango miliero kendo ifwayo mana kaka Musa nochiko.
Eka Harun notingʼo lwete malo kochomo oganda mi nogwedhogi. Bangʼe nolor piny oa kama notimoe misengini mag golo richo gi misengini miwangʼo pep, kod misengini mag lalruok.
Eka Musa gi Harun nodonjo e Hemb Romo, to kane giwuok oko to negigwedho ji, kendo duongʼ maler mar Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyore ni oganda duto.
Mach nomuoch e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo nowangʼo misango miwangʼo pep kaachiel gi migepe mag boche manie wi kendo mar misango. Kane ji oneno gima notimoreno, negipongʼ gimor mi gipodho auma.
Nadab gi Abihu ma yawuot Harun nokawo tewnigi mag mach mi giketoe mach, kendo ne gioloe ubani, kendo ne gimoko makwero e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma chik Jehova Nyasaye ok oyie.
Kuom mano mach nomuoch e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mowangʼogi kendo ne githo mana kanyo.
Eka Musa nowacho ni Harun niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye nowuoyoe kawacho kama, “ ‘Ananyis kaka an Nyasaye Maler ne jogo masudo buta, kendo nyaka miya luor e nyim ogendini duto.’ ” Wachni nomako dho Harun.
Musa noluongo Mishael gi Elzafan yawuot Uziel ma en owadgi wuon Harun, mowachonegi niya, “Biuru ka mondo utingʼ ringre oweteu ugol oko mar kambi oa e dho kama ler mar lemo.”
Kuom mano negibiro ma gitingʼogi kendo gigologi oko mar kambi kaka Musa nochiko kapod girwako lepgi mag dolo miluongo ni tunik.
Eka Musa nowacho ne Harun kod yawuote ma Eliazar gi Ithamar niya, “Kik uwe wiu bed mogar, bende kik uyiech lepu, nono to ubiro tho kendo Jehova Nyasaye iye biro wangʼ gi ogandani duto. To wedeu kaachiel gi jo-Israel duto to nyalo ywago joma Jehova Nyasaye osetieko gi mach.
Un to kik uwuogi ua e dho Hemb Romo, nono to ubiro tho, nikech un Jehova Nyasaye osewalou.” Omiyo negitimo mana kaka Musa nosewachonegi.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye ne owuoyo gi Harun kowachone niya,
In kaachiel gi yawuoti kik umadh kongʼo kata gima mero ji e kinde ma udhi e Hemb Romo, nono to ubiro tho. Mano en chik momako nyikwau nyaka tiengʼ mabiro.
Nyaka uket pogruok e kind gik mowal ne Jehova Nyasaye kod gik ma ok mowal, bende gik ma ok ler gi gik maler,
kendo nyaka ipuonj jo-Israel chike duto mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyogi koa e dho Musa.
Musa nowacho ne Harun gi yawuote mane odongʼ magin Eliazar gi Ithamar niya, “Kawuru misango mar cham mane odongʼ kuom misengini mane ochiwne Jehova Nyasaye gi mago miwangʼo gi mach kendo uchame ka ok oketie thowi but kendo mar misango, nikech en gima ler moloyo,
kendo nyaka uchame e kama ler mar lemo nikech en pokni kaachiel gi yawuoti. Ma en pok mogol kuom misengini miwangʼo gi mach ne Jehova Nyasaye nikech kamano e kaka nochika.
To in kaachiel gi yawuoti gi nyigi unyalo chamo agoko mane olier mifwayo kaachiel gi bam mane ochiw e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Chamgiuru kama owal ni Jehova Nyasaye, nimar osemiyigi in kaachiel gi nyithindo kaka pokni mar misango mar lalruok ne jo-Israel.
Bam mane osechiw kod agoko mane oselier nyaka kel kaachiel gi boche mag misengini miwangʼo gi mach nobed misango mifwayo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Ma nobed pokni mapile pile in kaachiel gi nyithindi kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko.”
Kane Musa openjo wach diel mane otimgo misango mar golo richo, kendo kane onyise ni ne osewangʼe, mirima nomake gi Eliazar kod Ithamar magin yawuot Harun mane odongʼ.
Eka nopenjogi niya, “Marangʼo ne ok uchamo misango mar golo richo e kama ler mar lemo? En misango maler mane omiu mondo upwodhgo oganda kuom richogi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Nikech remb diendno ne ok oter e Kama Ler mar lemo, mano emomiyo ne onego uchame ei hekalu kaka nachikou.”
Harun to nodwoko Musa niya, “Kawuono yawuota osetimo ni Jehova Nyasaye misango mar golo richogi giwegi kod misango miwangʼo pep, to kata kamano to koro neye gima osetimorena! To ka dine acham misango mar golo richoni kawuono, bende dine atimo maber e nyim Jehova Nyasaye?”
Bangʼ kane Musa osewinjo mae to ne oneno ni Harun ni kare.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun niya,
“Nyis jo-Israel niya, ‘Kuom le duto manie piny, magi ema unyalo chamo:
Unyalo chamo kit le moro amora ma ombongʼ tiendegi opogore ariyo kendo manyamo kambula.
“ ‘Nitie moko manyamo kambula kende kata moko ma ombongʼ tiendegi kende ema opogore ariyo, mago to kik ucham. Ngamia kata obedo ni onyamo kambula kamano, to nikech ombongʼ tiende ok opogore, chik ok oyieni mondo uchame nikech ogak.
Aidha kata obedo ni onyamo kambula to ombongʼ tiende ok opogore, kik uchame nikech ok oler.
Apwoyo kata obedoni onyamo kambula kamano, to ombongʼ tiende ok opogore, chik ok oyienu mondo uchamgi nikech gin gik makwero.
Kata obedo ni ombongʼ tiend anguro opogore ariyo kamano, to ok onyam kambula; chik ok oyienu mondo uchamgi nikech gin gik makwero.
Kik ucham ring-gi kata kik umul ringregi motho. Gin gik makwero ne un.
“ ‘To kuom gik moko duto modakie nam gi aore to unyalo chamo mana mago man kod thuokgi kod kalagakla.
To gik moko duto manie nam gi aore maonge gi thuokgi kata kalagakla, bed nigimol kata gin achiel kuom gik mangima modak ei pi nyaka ukwer.
Nikech gin gik makwero, kik ucham ring-gi bende kik umul motho kendgi.
Gimoro amora modak ei pi to gionge thuokgi kata kalagakla nyaka gibednu gik makwero.
“ ‘Winy manyaka ukwer kendo kik ucham e magi: Ongo, achuth gi olith
gi otenga kod kit otenga duto,
gi kit agak duto,
tula, nyatawo gi okok kod kit olith duto
tula matin, gi osou, gi tula maduongʼ,
gi tula marachar gi tula modak e thim gi mbusi,
gi nyamnaha gi ngʼangʼa, tula kod olik tiga.
“ ‘Kute duto mafuyo kendo mawuotho gi tiende angʼwen nobednu gik makwero.
Kata kamano, nitiere kute moko ma unyalo chamo man-gi tiende angʼwen kod mago ma gichikorego.
Kuom mano unyalo chamo kit bonyo, osialo gi kit onjiri kaachiel gi kit ongogo duto.
To gik moko duto mafuyo kod mago man-gi tiende angʼwen, nobednu gik makwero.
“ ‘Gik makamagi biro miyo ubed mogak, kendo ngʼato angʼata momulo ring chiayo motho kendeno nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.
Ngʼata angʼata motingʼo ring chiayo mothono nyaka luok lepe, kendo en bende obiro bedo mogak nyaka odhiambo.
“ ‘Le moro amora ma ombongʼne ok obarore duto kata ma ok nyam kambula nobednu gima kwero, kendo ngʼato angʼata momulo ring-gino nobed mogak.
To kuom le duto mawuotho gi tiende angʼwen, mago mawuotho kanyono piny gi kokegi nobednu mogak, kendo ngʼato angʼata momulo ring-gi nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.
Ngʼato angʼata motingʼo ring chiayogo motho nyaka luok lepe kendo nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo. Nikech le ma kamago gin le mogak.
“ ‘Le mogak manyaka ukwer e magi: oyieyo, oyiech gudhugudhu, ngʼech moro amora maduongʼ kata matindo,
gi ogwe gi kalagwena gi olele gi obongo-bongo kod ongʼongruok.
Gigi duto nobednu makwero kendo ngʼato angʼata ma omulogi ka gisetho nobed mogak nyaka chop seche mag odhiambo.
Kaponi achiel kuom legi otho kendo molwar kuom gimoro amora mwakonyorego pile, to gino koro nobed mogak, bedni en gima olos gi yien, kata en law, kata pien kata ogunia. Gino koro nyaka nyum ei pi kendo nobed mogak nyaka chop seche mag odhiambo, eka bangʼe nobed maler.
Kaachiel kuomgi olwar ei agulu, gik moko duto man ei aguluno nobed mogak, kendo nyaka uto aguluno.
Chiemo moro amora minyalo cham moole pi moaye aguluno nobed mogak, kendo gimoro amora mimadho mowuok ei aguluno nobed mogak.
Gimoro amora ma gima othono orere nobed mogak; ka orere kuom kendo kata kuom aguch kendo, to nyaka mukgi oko nikech gin gik mogak kendo nyaka kwan-gi kamano.
Kata kamano soko kata yawo motingʼo pi nosik ka ler, to ngʼato angʼata momulo gimoro amora motho nobed mogak.
Kaponi achiel kuom gik mothogo olwar kuom kodhi mipidho, to kodhigo nosik ka ler,
to ka kodhigo gin mosebudi e pi, mi gimoro amora motho olwarie, to nobed mogak.
“ ‘Ka le moyienu chamo otho, to ngʼato angʼata momule nobed mogak nyaka chop seche mag odhiambo.
Ngʼato angʼata mochamo ringʼono nyaka luok lepe, kendo enobed mogak nyaka chop seche mag odhiambo. Kata ngʼato angʼata motingʼo chiayono bende nyaka luok lepe, bende nosik mogak nyaka chop seche mag odhiambo.
“ ‘Gimoro amora mamol kik ucham nikech gin gik makwero.
Kik ucham gimoro amora malak gi bund-igi kata mawuotho gi tiende angʼwen kata man-gi tiende mathoth nikech gin gik makwero.
Kik gigi mi ubed mogak. Kik gik ma kamago mi ubed mogak kata mochido.
An Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kuom mano pwodhreuru kendo ubed jomaler, nikech an aler. Kik uchidru gi gimoro amora mamol kata malak e lowo.
An e Jehova Nyasaye mane ogolou e piny Misri mondo abed Nyasachu, kuom mano beduru maler nikech an aler.
“ ‘Magi e chike mag le gi mag winy, kod gik mangima mamol ei pi, kod mago malak ewi lowo.
Nyaka uket pogruok e kind gik makwero kod gik ma ok kwero, kendo mondo upog gik mangima michamo kod mago ma ok cham.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa kowacho niya,
Wachne nyithind Israel kama: Ka dhako omako ich ma onywolo nyathi ma wuowi, to enobed mogak bangʼ ndalo abiriyo, machalre kaka obedo mogak e ndalone mar neno malo.
Chiengʼ mar aboro, nyathino nyaka ter nyangu.
Bangʼ mae to dhakono nyaka rit kuom ndalo piero adek gadek, mondo pwodhe kuom rembe. E kindeno ok oyiene mulo gimoro amora mowal ni Jehova Nyasaye, kata donjo e kama ler mar lemo, nyaka ndalone mag pwodhruok rum.
To ka onywolo nyathi ma nyako, to nobed mogak kuom ndalo apar gangʼwen, mana kaka obedo mogak e ndalone mar neno malo. Bangʼ mano to nyaka orit kuom ndalo piero auchiel gauchiel mondo opwodhe kuom rembe.
“ ‘E ndalo ma pwodhruokne kuom nyathi ma wuowi kata ma nyako oserumo, to enokel nyaim ma hike achiel mitimogo misango miwangʼo pep Jehova Nyasaye, kaachiel kata nyathi akuru gi akuch odugla, mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kendo enochiwe ni jadolo e dho Hemb Romo.
Eka jadolo nochiwe ni Jehova Nyasaye mondo opwodhgo dhakono, kendo dhakono nodok maler kuom rembe mosechwer. “ ‘Magi e chike momako dhako monywolo nyathi ma wuowi kata ma nyako.
Ka en dhako modhier ma ok nyal yudo nyaim, to oyiene mondo okel akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo. Achiel kuomgi notim godo misango miwangʼo pep, to machielo notimgo misango mar golo richo. Jadolo notim misenginigo, ka opwodhogo dhakono, kendo dhakono nobed maler.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa gi Harun niya,
Ka ngʼato dende okuot kata oluro kata en-gi mbala marieny e dende manyalo bedo tuo malandore mar del, nyaka kele ir Harun jadolo kata ir achiel kuom yawuote ma en jadolo.
Jadolo nyaka non kama lit manie dende, kendo ka yier mantiere kama litno oselokore rachar kendo kama litno nenore ni odonjo ei ringʼo ahinya, to kare en tuo malandore mar del. Ka jadolo onone, to enolande ni ogak.
Ka kido mantiere e piene en rachar to ok onenre ni odonjo ei ringʼo kendo yier manie iye pok olokore rachar, to jadolo nyaka ket ngʼat man-gi tuono kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyo.
E odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo jadolo nyaka none, bende ka oneno ni pod onge pogruok kendo pok olandore e del, to nyaka okete kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyo mamoko.
E odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo jadolo nyaka none kendo, to ka kama litno oserumo kendo pod ok olandore e del, to jadolo noland ni oler; en mana kama oluro. Ngʼatno nyaka luok lepe, kendo enobed maler.
To ka kama olurono ok olandore e dende ka bangʼ ka osedhi ir jadolo mondo olande ni oler, to nyaka onyisre e nyim jadolo kendo.
Jadolo nyaka none, kendo ka kama olurono oselandore e del, to enolande kaka ngʼama ogak; nikech en tuo malandore.
Ka ngʼato angʼata nigi tuo malandore mar del, to nyaka kele ir jadolo.
Jadolo nyaka none, kendo ka nitie kido marachar kama litni mi yier man kanyo olokore marachar, kendo kanyo onogo otimo adhola,
to mano nyiso ni en tuo malandore mosedak mar del kendo jadolo noland ngʼatno ni ogak. Kik okete kar kende nikech osebedo mogak.
Ka tuono olandore e dende duto, kaka jadolo nene, kendo ka tuono olandore e dende duto chakre e wiye nyaka tiende,
to jadolo nyaka none, to ka tuono olandore e dende duto, to enowach ni ngʼatno ler. Nikech dende duto oselokore rachar, en ngʼat maler.
To ka dende ochako dholore, to enobed mogak.
Ka jadolo oneno dende modholore, to nowach ni ogak. Dende modholoreno ogak; en gi tuo malandore.
Ka dipo ni dende modholoreno olokore rachar, to nyaka odhi ir jadolo.
Jadolo nyaka none, kendo ka kuonde malit olokore rachar, to jadolo noland ni ngʼama ogakno ler; eka enobed maler.
Ka bur omako ngʼato mi ochango,
kendo kama bur ne nitiereno, kido marachar mokuot kata mobokore mamarmar onenore, to nyaka odhi ir jadolo.
Jadolo nyaka non kama burno ne nitie kendo ka onenore ni odholore ahinya kendo yier manie iye oselokore rachar, to jadolo noland ni ngʼatno ogak. En tuo malandore mar del ma osewuok kama bur ne netie.
To ka dipo, ni sa ma jadolo nonene oyudo kaonge yier marachar kuome, to bende ok odholore kendo oselal, to jadolo nyaka kete tenge kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Ka tuono landore e del, to jadolo noland ni ngʼatno ogak; nikech en tuo malandore.
To ka kidono ok lokre kendo ok landre, to jadolo nowach ni oler nikech en mana mbala moa e bur.
Ka ngʼato dende kamoro owangʼ kendo kido mamarmar kata marachar owuok e adhola mar kama owangʼno,
to jadolo nyaka non adholano, kendo ka yier mane iye olokore rachar, kendo onenore ni odholore, to en tuo malandore mowuok kama owangʼno. Jadolo noland ni ngʼatno ogak; nikech en tuo malandore mar del.
To ka jadolo onone kendo onge yier marachar e adholano kendo ka ok odholore kendo oselal, eka jadolo nokete kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyo.
E odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo jadolo nyaka non ngʼatno, to ka tuono landore e dende, to jadolo noland ni ngʼatno ogak; nikech en tuo malandore mar del.
To kata ka kama odholoreno ok olokore kendo ok olandore e del to oselal, en kama okuot moa kuom kama owangʼ, omiyo jadolo noland ni ngʼatno ler; nikech en mbala mowuok kama owangʼ.
Ka dichwo kata dhako nigi adhola e wiye kata e tike,
jadolo nyaka non adholano, to ka onenore ni odholore kendo yier manie iye ratongʼ kendo ongelore, jadolo noland ni ngʼatno ogak; nikech en kama ilni, ma en tuo malandore e wich kata e tik.
To ka dipo ni e sa ma jadolo nono adhola makamano, ok onenore ni odholore kendo onge yier maratengʼ kuome, eka jadolo noket ngʼama tuoni kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyo.
E odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo jadolo nyaka non adholano, kendo ka ilni ok omedore kendo onge yier maratongʼ e iye kendo ok onenre ni odhe,
to nyaka liele makmana kama tuo nitiereno, kendo jadolo nyaka kete kare kende kuom ndalo abiriyo.
E odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo jadolo nyaka non kama ilnino, kendo ka pod ok omedore kendo odholore, to jadolo nowach ni ngʼatno ler. Ngʼatno nyaka luok lepe eka nobed maler.
To ka kama ilnino omedore e del bangʼ ka oseland ni oler,
to jadolo nyaka none, kendo ka ilni omedore e del, to onge tiende mondo jadolo omany yier maratongʼ, nimar ngʼatno ogak.
Ka dipo ni e ngʼado bura mar jadolo oneno ni kanyo olokore kendo yier maratengʼ oseti kanyo, to mano nyiso ni osechango. Ngʼatno osedoko maler kendo jadolo nolande ni oler.
Ka dichwo kata dhako nigi kido marachar e dende,
to jadolo nyaka non-gi, kendo ka kidogo nenore marachar ma tangʼ-tangʼ, to en kama roch mawuok e del ma ok nyal hinyo ngʼato; kendo ngʼatno ler.
Ka yie wi ngʼato oluny duto kendo odongʼ rabondo, to oler.
Chuny wiye oluny mi odongʼ rabondo, to oler.
To ka en-gi kama lit molokore mamarmar e bondone kata e thur wiye, to en tuo malandore moa e wiye kata e thur wiye.
Jadolo nyaka none, kendo ka kama lit mokuot e wiye kata e thur wiye olokore mamarmar ka tuo del malandore,
to ngʼatno tuo kendo ogak. Jadolo noland ni ogak nikech kama lit manie wiye.
“Ngʼat man-gi dhoho nyaka rwak lewni moyiech, owe wiye nono, oum lend wangʼe gi piny kendo oywag kokok ni, ‘Ok aler! Ok aler!’
Ka dipo ni pod en-gi tuono pod ogak. Nyaka odag kende; kendo odag oko mar kambi.
“Ka law moro amora opur; bed ni en mar pamba kata mar usi,
moro amora mochwe kata motwangʼ, pien moro amora kata gimoro amora molos gi pien
kendo ka lewni mopur, kata pien, kata mochwe kata mano motwangʼ, kata gir pien moro amora, mano maratiglo kata marakwaro, en pur malandore kendo nyaka nyis jadolo.
Jadolo nyaka non kama opurno kendo oket gik mopurgo tenge kuom ndalo abiriyo.
E odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo nyaka onone, kendo ka purno olandore e law, kata e njora mochwe kata motwangʼ, bedni itiyo kode e yo moro amora, to en pur maketho gik moko; kuom mano gima kamano ogak.
Jadolo nyaka wangʼ lawno, kata mano mochwe kata motwangʼ kata gir pien moro amora mane osepur, nikech pur osekethe; gino nyaka wangʼ.
“To ka diponi jadolo oneno kama opurno ka ok olandore e lawno, kata e law mochwe kata motwangʼ, kata e pien,
to enochiw chik mondo luok mochidono. Eka nyaka okete tenge kuom ndalo abiriyo mamoko.
Bangʼ ka oseluok law mopurno, jadolo nyaka none, kendo kapok lawno oloko kite obedo ni pok olandore, en gima ogak. Nyaka wangʼe gi mach kata obedo ni kama opurno ni yo ka oko kata yo ka iye.
Ka sa ma jadolo onone, to oyudo ni pur oselal ka gino oselwoki, to nyaka oyiech kama opurno oko, bedni en kuom law, kata kuom pien, kata kuom usi mochwe kata law motwangʼ.
To ka kama opurno ochako othinyore e lawno, kata e usino mochwe kata e lawno motwangʼ, kata e pien, kolandore, kendo gima kamano mopur nyaka wangʼ e mach.
To ka oseluok law kata usi mochwe, kata law motwangʼ, kata pien ma chilono orumo, to nyaka chak lwoke kendo eka enobed maler.”
Magi e chike mag gik mopur man kuom law pamba kata law kaki mochwe kata motwangʼ kata pien moro amora mondo ongʼe ni gigak kata ok gigak.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Magi e chike marito ngʼama tuo e kinde mag nyasi mag pwodhruok kokele e nyim jadolo:
Jadolo nodhi oko mar kambi kendo nonon ngʼatno. Ka osechango kuom tuone malandore mar del,
to jadolo nyaka gol chik mondo ngʼat matuono okelne winy ariyo maler mangima michamo gi yiend sida, gi usi makwar kod bad owino.
Bangʼe jadolo biro golo chik mondo winyo achiel onegi ei agulu motingʼo pi soko.
Eka jadolo nokaw winyo ma pod ngima gi yiend sida, gi usi makwar kod bad owino, kendo lutogi duto e remb winyo mane osenegno.
Kendo nokir remono nyadibiriyo kuom ngʼat man-gi tuo malandoreno, kowachoni ngʼatni koro ler, eka gikone nowe winyo mangima-cha kendo dire mondo odhi e pap.
“Ngʼat ma ipwodhono nyaka luok lepe, kendo noliel yie dende duto, bangʼe nolwokre gi pi, eka nobed ngʼama opwodhore. Bangʼ mae eka oyiene mar donjo ei kambi to ok oyiene mondo onindi ei hema nyaka chop bangʼ ndalo abiriyo.
Chiengʼ mar abiriyo nyaka oliel yie dende duto kaka yie wiye, gi yie tike kod yie wangʼe, kaachiel gi yie dende mamoko duto. Bangʼe nyaka olwok lepe kendo olwokre gi pi, eka koro nobed ngʼama opwodhore chuth.
“Chiengʼ mar aboro nyaka okel nyiimbe ariyo kod rombo sibini ma jo-higa achiel. Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa kendo nyaka kelgi kaachiel gi mogo mayom moromo kilo apar moru gi mo mondo timgo misango mar cham kod mo maliw moromo nus lita.
Jadolo matimone pwodhruok nokel ngʼat mipwodhono kaachiel gi misenginine mag pwodhruok e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e dho Hemb Romo.
“Bangʼ mae Jadolo nokaw achiel kuom nyiimbego kendo nochiwe kaachiel gi mo kaka misango mipwodhruokgo e ketho bende nochiwgi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo.
Enoyangʼ nyaimno e kama ler mar lemo ma bende iyangʼoe misango mar golo richo kaachiel gi misango miwangʼo pep. Mana kaka misango mar golo richo en mar jadolo, misango mar pwodhruok e ketho bende en mar jadolo nikech en gima ler moloyo.
Jadolo nokaw remo moko kuom remo mipwodhruokgo e ketho, kendo nomien remono e dho it ma korachwich mar ngʼat mipwodhono kaachiel gi lith lwete mathuon ma korachwich, kod lith tiende mathuon ma korachwich.
Bangʼe jadolo nokaw mo, kendo ool moko e pat lwete owuon ma koracham,
eka enolut lith lwete ma korachwich e mo manie pat lwete ma koracham, kendo kire nyadibiriyo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Bangʼ mae Jadolo nokaw mo moko modongʼ e pat lwete, kendo wire e dho it ma korachwich mar ngʼat mipwodhono, gi lith lwete mathuon ma korachwich gi lith tiende mathuon ma korachwich, ewi kuonde mane omienie remb misango mar pwodhruok e ketho.
Mo modongʼ e pat lwet jadolo, nyaka ool ewi ngʼat mipwodhono. Mano e kaka notimne pwodhruok e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
“Eka jadolo notim misango mar golo richo mondo otimgo pwodhruok ne ngʼat midwa pwodho kuom gakne. Bangʼ mano jadolo noyangʼ chiayo mitimogo misango miwangʼo pep,
kendo chiwe e kendo mar misango kaachiel gi misango mar cham mitimonego pwodhruok eka enobed maler.
“To ka diponi ni en jachan kendo ok onyal yudo gigi, to nyaka okel nyaim kaka misango mar pwodhruok e ketho michiwo mondo pwodhego kaachiel gi mogo mayom madirom gorogoro ariyo moruw gi mo mondo timgo misango mar cham kod mo maliw moromo nus lita,
gi akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo kaka onyalo yudo. Winyo achiel nobed mar timo misango mar golo richo, to machielo nobed mar timo misango miwangʼo pep.
“Kochopo chiengʼ mar aboro nyaka okel gigo duto ne jadolo mondo opwodhi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e dho Hemb Romo.
Jadolo nokaw nyaim mar misango mipwodhruokgo e ketho kaachiel gi morno, kendo nochiwgi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo.
Kendo noyangʼ nyaim mitimogo misango mar pwodhruok e ketho, mi nokaw rembe moko, kendo nomien e dho it ngʼat mipwodhono ma korachwich, kod e lith lwete mathuon ma korachwich, kendo e lith tiende mathuon ma korachwich.
Bangʼe jadolo nool mo moko e pat lwete owuon ma koracham,
to mo moko to nokir nyadibiriyo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye gi lith lwete ma korachwich.
To mo moko manie pat lwete, nowir kuonde mane oseminie remb misango mar pwodhruok e ketho kaka dho it ma korachwich mar ngʼama ipwodhono gi lith lwete mathuon ma korachwich, kod lith tiende mathuon ma korachwich.
Mo modongʼ e pat lwet jadolo nyaka ool ewi ngʼat mipwodhono mondo otimnego pwodhruok e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka jadolo nochiw akuch oduglago kata nyithi akuru, ma ngʼat mipwodhono okelo kaka misango,
achiel nochiw kaka misango mar golo richo, to machielo to notimgo misango miwangʼo pep, kaachiel gi misango mar cham. Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ngʼatno e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.”
Magi e chike moketi ni ngʼatno man-gi tuo malandore mar del, kendo ma ok nyal yudo chiwo mitimogo misengini mipwodhego.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun niya,
“Ka udonjo e piny Kanaan, ma amiyou kaka girkeni maru, mi akelo gimoro marach mamiyo kor ot pur,
to wuon odno nyaka dhi ir jadolo manyise niya, ‘Aseneno gimoro marach machalo pur e oda.’
Jadolo nyaka gol chik mondo gik moko duto manie odno ogol oko kapok odhi onono kama opurno mondo gimoro amora manie odno kik bed mogak. Bangʼ ma, jadolo nigi thuolo mar donjo kendo nono odno.
Enonon kuonde ma opur e kor odno kendo ka dipo nitie kuonde mopudhore molokore ratiglo kata Rakwaro manenore nodonjo matut e kor ot,
to jadolo nyaka wuogi oko mar odno kendo olor odno kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Chiengʼ mar abiriyo nyaka jadolo duog manon odno. Kaponi purno olandore e kor ot,
to nyaka ogol chik mondo omuk kite duto ma gino osemako mi owitgi oko e tok pacho kama ok ler.
Bangʼ mano to nyaka ogol chik mondo kor odno ochwer maler, kendo gik magisechwero opuk kama ok ler e tok pacho.
Eka giniket kite manyien kuonde duto mane gisegoloe moko-ka, kendo gimwon odno manyien.
“To kapo ni gima rach makelo pur ochako othinyore e odno kendo bangʼ ka kitego osegol oko mi ochwer kor odno kendo omuon,
to jadolo nyaka duogi mondo onon odno kendo. Kapo ni gima rach makelo purno olandore e odno, to mano nyiso ni en gima rach makelo kethruok, kuom mano odno en gima ogak.
Koro odno nyaka muki, kendo kitene gi yiendene, kod lope duto nyaka ter e tok pacho mondo owitgi kama ok ler.
“Ngʼato angʼata manodonji e odno e kinde ma pod olore nobed ngʼama ogak nyaka chop odhiambo.
To ngʼato angʼata ma nindo e odno kata chiemo e odno, nyaka luok lepe.
“Kapo ni jadolo odhi mondo onon odno mi oyudo ni gima rach makelo purno ok oselandore bangʼ kane osemwone, to jadolo nongʼad wach ni odno ler nikech gima rach makelo purno oserumo.
Mondo jadolo opwodh odno, nyaka okaw winy ariyo, yiend sida moko gi usi makwar kod owino.
Nyaka oneg winyo achiel ei dapi motingʼo pi soko,
bangʼe okaw yiend sida gi owino gi usi makwar, kaachiel gi winyo machielo ma pod ngimacha, kendo olutgie remb winyo mosenegno, kod pi soko, eka kendo okirgie odno nyadibiriyo.
Nyaka opwodh odno gi remb winyo, pi soko gi winyo mangima, gi yiend sida gi owino kod usi makwar.
Eka enowe winyo mangima mondo ofu odogi e pap mar dala matin. Mae e kaka nopwodh ot kendo nobed maler.”
Magi e chike kuom tuoche malandore mag del, kod tuoche mailo del,
kaachiel gi pur mamako nanga gi mamako kor ot,
kod kuonde mobokore e del gi kuonde moluro kata mamarmar.
Chikno biro puonji kuom gima ler kod gima ogak. Magi e chike mag tuoche malandore e del kod mag gik mopur.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa gi Harun niya,
Wuo gi nyithind Israel kendo unyisgi kama: Ka ngʼato dende chwer bedni en nyach, remo, tutu, kata nyodo, to gik machwer kawuok e dendego ogak.
Kata ka pod odhi nyime gichwer kata kodinore, to gino biro miyo obedo mogak. Ma e kaka gik machwergo biro miyo obedo mogak.
“ ‘Kitanda moro amora ma ngʼatni onindoe kata moro amora ma ngʼatni obetie ka dende chwer bedo mogak.
Ngʼato angʼata momulo kitandono nyaka neni olwoko lepe, kaachiel gi dende, kendo enobed mogak nyaka chop odhiambo.
Ngʼato angʼata mobet kama ngʼama dende chwer osebetie, nyaka luok lepe kendo luokre, kendo nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo.
“ ‘Ngʼato angʼata momulo ngʼato ma dende chwerno nyaka luok lepe kod dende, kendo nobed mogak nyaka chop odhiambo.
“ ‘Ka ngʼama dende chwer ongʼulo olawo kuom ngʼama ler, ngʼatni nyaka luok lepe kendo olwokre, kendo nobed mogak nyaka chop odhiambo.
“ ‘Gimoro amora ma ngʼat ma dende chwerno oidho kadhi wuoth bedo mogak,
kendo ngʼato angʼata momulo gima ngʼatno osebetie nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo, kendo ngʼato angʼata mokawo gigo nyaka luok lepe kendo olwokre, kendo nobed mogak nyaka chop odhiambo.
“ ‘Ngʼato angʼata ma ngʼama ogakni omulo kapok ologo lwete to nyaka olwok lepe kendo olwokre kendo nobed mogak nyaka chop odhiambo.
“ ‘Gimoro amora mochwe gi lowo nyaka to, kendo gimoro amora molos gi bao ma ngʼatno omulo nyaka luok gi pi.
“ ‘Ka ngʼato opwodhi kuom gima chwer e dende, to nyaka oketre tenge kuom ndalo abiriyo mar nyasi mar pwodhruok; mi olwok lepe kod dende kendo obiro bedo mapoth.
E odiechiengʼ mar aboro nyaka okaw akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo mondo okelgi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e dho Hemb Romo kendo ochiwgi ne jadolo.
Bangʼe jadolo biro chiwogi kaka misango, achiel kuomgi mar misango migologo richo to machielo to mar misango miwangʼo pep. E yo machalo kama obiro tero kwayo mar weyo richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ne ngʼatno ma dende chwer mondo opwodhe.
“ ‘Ka ngʼat madichwo kothe mar nyodo owuok, nyaka olwokre, kendo nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.
Nanga kata pien moro amora ma koth nyodono dilwarie nyaka luok gi pi, kendo nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.
Ka ngʼat ma dichwo obedoe achiel gi dhako mi kodhi mar nyodo owuok e diergi, nyaka giduto giluokre, kendo ginibed mogak nyaka odhiambo.
“ ‘Ka dhako ni e kindene mar neno malo, to dhakono nobed mogak nyaka otiek ndalo abiriyo, kendo ngʼato angʼata momule nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.
“ ‘Gimoro amora manonindie e kinde moneno malo nobed mogak, kendo gimoro amora manobedie nobed mogak.
Ngʼato angʼata momulo kitandane nyaka luok lepe, kendo olwokre, kendo en bende nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.
Ngʼato angʼata manomul gima obetie, nyaka luok lepe, kendo olwokre, en bende nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.
Kata bed ni en kitanda, kata bed ni en gima nyocha obete, to ngʼato angʼata manomul gigi, en bende nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.
“ ‘Dichwo moro amora mane obet e achiel gi dhakono e kinde moneno malo nobed mogak kuom ndalo abiriyo, kendo nyaka kitanda monindoe bende nobed mogak.
“ ‘Ka dhako chwer ndalo mogwarore e kinde ma ok one malo, kata ka ochwer mokadho ndalo ma ojanene malo, to enobed mogak kuom ndalo duto ma pod ochwerieno mana machalre kaka ndalone monenoe malo.
Kitanda moro amora moninde e ndalo ma pod oneno malo nobed mogak mana kaka kitanda monindoe mapile kendo gimoro amora mobetie nobed mogak mana machal gi kinde monenoe malo.
Ngʼato angʼata momulo gigi nobed mogak, kendo nyaka olwok lepe kendo olwokre, kendo nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.
“ ‘Ka dhakono osepwodhore kuom chwerneno, to nyaka okwan ndalo abiriyo, eka koro obiro bedo maler.
Kochopo odiechiengʼ mar aboro to okaw akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo, kendo okelne jadolo e dho Hemb Romo.
Jadolo biro kawo akuru achiel otimgo misango mar golo richo to machielo to otimgo misango miwangʼo pep. Kamano jadolo biro pwodho dhakono e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kuom gakne kaluwore gi dende machwerno.
“ ‘Nyaka usiem jo-Israel kuom gik mamiyo ji bedo mogak, mondo kik gidwany kar dakna maler manie kindgi, manyalo kelonegi tho ka gigak.’ ”
Magi e chike momako dichwo ma dende chwer kata mobet mogak nikech wuok mar nyote,
kata dhako manie kindeno mar neno malo kaachiel gi dichwo kata dhako machwer kod dichwo moriwore gi dhako mogak.
Jehova Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa bangʼ tho yawuot Harun ariyo ka gibiro e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Nyis Harun owadu ni kik thor donjo e Kama Ler Moloyo manie nyim Sandug Muma miluongo ni kar ngʼwono, nono to enotho, nikech afwenyora gi e bor polo manie ewi raum.
“Ma e kaka Harun nodonj e Kama Ler Moloyo: Enokaw nyarwath mar misango mar golo richo kod im mar misango miwangʼo pep.
Nyaka orwak kandhone mopwodhi mar dolo miluongo ni tunik gi sati maiye, bangʼe to otwe okanda kendo otwe kilemba e wiye. Magi gin lep dolo; kuom mano nyaka olwokre kapod orwakogi.
Koa kuom oganda jo-Israel nyaka okaw nywogi ariyo kaka misango mar golo richo kod im mar misango miwangʼo pep.
“Harun nochiw rwath mondo otimgo misango mar golo richone owuon kopwodhorego kaachiel gi joode.
Eka enokaw diek ariyo kendo ochiwgi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e dho Hemb Romo.
Harun nogo ombulu e kind diek ariyogo, kendo diel achiel biro bedo mar Jehova Nyasaye to machielo nobed mar bungu.
Harun nokaw diel ma ombulu oyiero kaka mar Jehova Nyasaye, kendo otimgo misango mar golo richo.
To diel ma ombulu oyiero kaka diend bungu nyaka kel kangima e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mondo ti godo kaka gir pwodhruok kiweye odhi e pap kaka diend bungu.
“Harun nyaka chiw rwath mondo otimgo misango mar golo richone owuon kopwodhorego kaachiel gi joode, kendo noyangʼ rwadhno mondo obed kaka misango mar golo richone owuon.
Enokaw tap mach moketie mach mogol e kendo mar misango manie nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaachiel gi ubani mangʼwe ngʼar madirom lwedo ariyo, kendo nokelgi kama ogengʼ gi pasia.
Eka nool ubani mangʼwe ngʼarno e majno e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo ich ubanino oim raum mar Sandug Rapar mondo kik otho.
Enokaw remb rwadhno kendo okir gi lith lwete e bath raum mar misango koma ochomo yo wuok chiengʼ kendo okir remono nyadibiriyo gi lith lwete e nyim raum mar misango.
“Nyaka oyangʼ diel mitimogo misango mar golo richo ni oganda jo-Israel, mi noter rembe ei kama ogengʼ gi pasia, kendo nokir remono ewi raum mar misango, kendo e nyim raumno bende, mana kaka nokiro remb rwadh-cha.
Mano e kaka nopwodh Kama Ler Moloyo nikech timbe mogak kod ngʼanyo mar oganda jo-Israel, bed ni gisetimo richo moro mora. Mano bende e kaka nopwodhi Hemb Romo manie diergi kuom timbegi mogak.
Ok oyiene ngʼato angʼata bedo ei Hemb Romo chakre e kinde ma Harun odonjo ei Kama Ler Moloyo kopwodhore owuon, kopwodho joode, kopwodho nyithind Israel duto, nyaka sa ma owuokie, kosetieko tij pwodhruok duto.
“Bangʼ tieko magi to nowuogi oko mar kendo mar misango manie nyim Jehova Nyasaye, kendo nopwodh kendono. Enokaw remb rwath moko gi remb diel moko, kendo mienogi e tunge kendo duto mar misango.
Enokir remo moko gi lith lwete nyadibiriyo e kendo mar misango kendo nopwodhe e timbe mogak mag jo-Israel mi nobed maler.
“Bangʼe ka Harun osetieko pwodho Kama Ler Moloyo gi Hemb Romo kod kendo mar misango, to nokel diel mangima.
Harun noket lwetene duto ewi diendno mangima, kohulo richo kod ngʼanyo mar jo-Israel, tiende ni richogi duto kendo enowe richogo duto ewi diendno. Eka enomiye ngʼatno moseyier ne tijno mondo okaw diendno oter e pap.
Diendno notingʼ kuome owuon richo mar jo-Israel nyaka kar kende kendo ngʼatno nyaka gony diendno kosechopo e thim kuno.
“Eka Harun nodonj ei Hemb Romo, kendo nolony lepe mag katana mane orwako e kinde mane odonjo e Kama Ler Moloyo kendo enowegi mana kanyo.
Bangʼe nolwokre gi pi e kama ler mar lemo kendo norwak lepe mag dolo, eka enochiw misango miwangʼo pep mondo otimgo pwodhruok ni en owuon kod oganda jo-Israel duto.
Bangʼ mano nowangʼ boche chiayo motimgo misango mar golo richo e kendo mar misango.
“To ngʼat matero diend bungu e pap nyaka luok lepe kendo olwokre; eka bangʼe to onyalo donjo ei kambi.
Rwath gi diel mane otimgo misengini mag golo richo, kendo ma rembgi noseter ei Kama Ler Moloyo mar pwodho richo, nyaka gol ring-gi gi piendegi kod wen mag-gi oko mar kambi, mondo owangʼ-gi pep.
Ngʼatno ma owangʼogi nyaka luok lepe kendo olwokre, bangʼe to onyalo donjo e kambi.
“Koro chik momakou nyaka chiengʼ ema: E odiechiengʼ mar apar mar dwe mar abiriyo higa ka higa, un nyithind Israel, kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak kodu, nyaka ubed gilamo mar tweyo chiemo kendo kik uti tich moro amora,
nikech ma en odiechiengʼ manotimnue pwodhruok mondo ubed maler, eka unubed maler kuom richou duto e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Odiechiengno en Sabato mowal manyaka ubedie gi yweyo, kulemo kendo utweyo chiemo. Mano en chik momakou nyaka chiengʼ.
Jadolo mowir kendo mowal moketi kar wuon mare ema notimnu pwodhruokni, kendo nyaka orwak lep dolo mag katana maber,
kendo enopwodhi Kama Ler Moloyo kaachiel gi Hemb Romo kod kendo mar misango, eka enopwodh jodolo kaachiel gi oganda jo-Israel.
“Koro chik momakou nyaka chiengʼ ema: Pwodhruok kuom richo duto mag jo-Israel nyaka tim dichiel e higa.” Kendo notim kamano mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya:
“Wuo gi Harun gi yawuote kaachiel gi nyithind Israel duto kendo iwachnegi kama: ‘Ma e chik ma Jehova Nyasaye ochiwo
Ja-Israel moro amora motimo misango gi rwath kata nyaim, kata diel ei kambi kata oko mar kambi,
to ok okele e dho Hemb Romo mondo otimgo ni Jehova Nyasaye misango e nyim Hema Maler mar Jehova Nyasaye, to ngʼatno nokwan mana kaka ngʼama oneko nikech osechwero remo, omiyo nongʼad kare oko kuom ogandagi.
Chikni oketi mondo omi jo-Israel okelne Jehova Nyasaye misengini makoro gitimo e pewe. Nyaka gikelgi ne jadolo manochiwgi e dho Hemb Romo kaka misango mar lalruok.
Jadolo nokir remo e kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye manie dho Hemb Romo, kendo owangʼ boche madum tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Ok gichak gichiw misengini ne jochiende ma gisebedo ka gidwanyorego. Koro ma en chik momakou nyaka chiengʼ kaachiel gi tienge mabiro.’
“Wachnegi kama: ‘Ka ja-Israel moro amora kata jadak manie diergi otimo misango miwangʼo pep, kata misango moro amora,
kendo ok okele e dho Hemb Romo mondo otimgo ni Jehova Nyasaye misango, to ngʼatno nyaka ngʼad kare oko kuom ogandagi.
“ ‘Ka ja-Israel moro amora kata japiny moro modak e diergi ochamo remb chiayo moro amora to anabed jasike, kendo anangʼade oko kuom ogandani.
Nimar gima ochwe ngimane nitie e remo, omiyo asemiyougo mondo utim-go misango e kendo mar misango mondo upwodhrugo nikech remo ema itimogo misango mar pwodho ngima ngʼato.
Kuom mano, anyiso jo-Israel kama: “Ngʼato angʼata kuomgi kik cham remo kendo jodak manie dieru bende kik cham remo.”
“ ‘Ja-Israel moro amora kata jadak manie dieru modhi dwar, momako le kata winyo mondo ocham, nyaka ol rembe piny mi oik kod lowo,
nikech gik mangima duto ngimagi ni e rembgi. Mano emomiyo asewacho ne jo-Israel niya, “Kik ucham remb gimoro amora, nikech gima ochwe ngimane ni e rembe, kendo ngʼato angʼata mochame nongʼad kare oko.”
“ ‘Ngʼato angʼata ma ja-Israel kata jadak manie dieru mochamo gima otho kende, kata mondiek onego nyaka luok lepe kende olwokre, kendo nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo, eka bangʼe nobed maler.
To ka ok olwoko lepe kendo ok olwokore, to nyaka oyud kum kuom kethone.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya:
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo iwachnegi ni, ‘An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Kik utim timbe ma jo-Misri mane udak e diergi timo kendo kik timbe moko mag jo-Kanaan makoro aterou e diergi yudre kuomu. Bende kik uluw timbe ma gitimo.
Nyaka urit chikena kendo luwuru yorena, nikech an Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Rituru yorena kod chikena, nimar ngʼat moluwogi nobed mangima kuomgi. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Kik ngʼato terre gi dhako moluongo ni watne. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Kik ikuod wi wuonu kuom terruok gi chiege, nikech en minu.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi chi wuonu, nikech kitimo kamano to ikelone wuonu wichkuot.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi nyaminu mahie, kata nyameru maka wuonu machielo kata maka minu machielo, bedni onywole e dala kae, kata kamoro machielo.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi nyakwari maka wuodi kata maka nyari, nikech kitimo kamano to ikelo wichkuot ni in iwuon.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi nyaminu moa e ot machielo, nikech en nyaminu.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi nyamin wuonu nikech en wayu.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi nyamin mamau nikech en bende en mamau.
“ ‘Kik igomb terori gi chi owadgi wuonu nikech en minu, kendo mano kelo wichkuot ne wuonuno.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi chi wuodi nikech en maru, ok oyieni mondo itim kamano.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi chi owadu nikech mano nyalo kelo wichkuot ne owaduno.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi nyako kaachiel gi min-gi. Kik iterri gi nyakware ma ka wuode kata maka nyare, nikech gin wede dhakono. Mano en tim anjawo.
“ ‘Kik ikend nyamin chiegi mondo obed nyieke ma iriwri kode ka nyamin pod ngima.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi dhako manie kindene mar neno malo.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi chi ngʼama udakgo mokiewo, dipo ka omiyo ibedo mogak.
“ ‘Kik ichiw nyathini moro amora ni nyasaye manono miluongo ni Molek, nimar ok onego iketh nying Nyasaye. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi dichwo wadu nikech mano en tim makwero.
“ ‘Kik iterri gi chiayo nikech mano miyo ibedo mogak. Dhako bende kik yie mondo chiayo oterre kode, nikech mano en gima kwero.
“ ‘Kik udwanyru kutimo timbe ma kamago nikech timbego ema ogendini mabiro riembo e nyimu ne timo.
Kata mana piny bende nobedo mogak, omiyo ne akumogi nikech richo mag-gi, kendo piny nongʼogo joma nodakie iye.
To nyaka urit yorena kod chikena. Onge ngʼato kuomu manotim timbe makwerogo kata obed ja-Israel kata jadak e dieru,
nikech magi e timbe ma joma nodak e pinyni kapok ubiro notimo kendo negiketho pinyni.
To ka udwanyo pinyno, to ngʼeuru ni onyalo ngʼogou oko mar oganda mane okwongonu dake kane gidwanye.
“ ‘Jogo duto matim makwerogo noyud e ngimagi, ginto nyaka golgi oko ei ogandagi.
Emomiyo luwuru chikena kendo ritreuru ma kik uluw timbe makwero mane joma odak e pinyni otimo kapok ubiro, mondo kik ubed mogak. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi kanyakla mar Israel duto kendo inyisgi ni: ‘Beduru maler nikech an Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu aler.
“ ‘Ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomu nyaka luor min gi wuon kendo nyaka urit Sabato maga. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
“ ‘Kik uluw bangʼ nyiseche manono, kendo kik ubed gi nyiseche mothedhi mag nyinyo. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
“ ‘Ka uchiwo misango mar lalruok ne Jehova Nyasaye, to timeuru e yo mowinjore ma Jehova Nyasaye oyiego.
Misangono ibiro chame e odiechiengno muchiwee kata kinyne, to ringʼo mane odongʼ nyaka chiengʼ mar adek nyaka wangʼ e mach.
Ka lemo moro amora kuom ringʼoni ocham chiengʼ mar adek, to Jehova Nyasaye ok noyie kodu nikech en gima kwero.
Ngʼato angʼata manocham ringʼono nokwan ka jaketho nikech osedwanyo kama ler mar Jehova Nyasaye, kendo ngʼatno nyaka ngʼad kare oko kuom ogandane.
“ ‘Ka ukayo cham manie puotheu, to kik ugol cham duto nyaka manie giko puodho, kata kik uhul nyaka cham modongʼ.
Kupono olembeu mag mzabibu, to kik upon-gi duto, bende mago molwar piny kik ukwany. Mago weuru ni joma odhier kod jodak manie dieru. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
“ ‘Kik ikwal. “ ‘Kik iriambi. “ ‘Kik iwuond nyawadu.
“ ‘Kik ikwongʼri gi miriambo ni ngʼato gi nyinga nimar kitimo kamano to ichayo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Kik ima wadu e yor wuond kata kik imaye gire. “ ‘Kik itamri chulo ngʼato kuom tich motiyoni kendo nyaka ichule mana godiechiengno.
“ ‘Kik ikwongʼ ngʼama ite odino, kata kik iket gimoro e nyim muofu monyalo chwanyoree, luoruru Nyasachu. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Kik iketh buch ngʼato, to ngʼad bura kare ma kik idogne jachan kata luoro wangʼ ngʼama duongʼ, to ngʼadne wadu bura makare kichungʼ e adiera.
“ ‘Kik iketh nying jowadu koni gi koni e yor kuoth, kendo kik ihangne jowadu wach ma ok nikare. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Kik ibwon owadu gi chunyi. Nyis wadu kethone e wangʼe, mondo kik iriwri kode e richone.
“ ‘Kik idwar chulo kuor, kendo kik ibed ngʼama mon gi jowadgi, to her wadu kaka iherori iwuon. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Rituru yorena. “ ‘Kik uwe jamni mopogore opogore luwre ma nywol nyithindo. “ ‘Kik uriw kodhi e puodho achiel, kendo kik urwak nanga motwangʼ gi usi ariyo mopogore opogore.
“ ‘Ka ngʼato oterore gi misumba ma nyako mapok okendi mosewinjore gi ngʼama onego kende, kata mapok omi thuolo mar dhi, to wachno nyaka none maber. Kik neg nyakono gi ngʼat moterore kodeno nikech pod en misumba.
Ngʼat motimo kode tim makamanono nyaka kel im e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e dho Hemb Romo mondo timgo misango mar pwodhruok e ketho.
Jadolo notim misango mar golo richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye gi imno kuom pwodho ngʼatno e kethone, eka richo mosetimo nowene.
“ ‘Ka udonjo e pinyno kendo upidho kit yiend olemo moro amora to ukwan olembene ka gik makwero. Kuom higni adek kik umul olembego kendo kik uchamgi.
E higa mar angʼwen to olembege duto nobed maler, ma en chiwo mar pak ni Jehova Nyasaye.
To e higa mar abich, unyalo chamo olembege. Kuom mano keyo magu nomedre. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
“ ‘Kik ucham ringʼo motimo remo. “ ‘Kik ukor wach kata kik ubed ajuoke mag nyakalondo.
“ ‘Kik utit yie wiu kata kik utit yie tiku.
“ ‘Kik usar dendu kuywago ngʼama otho, kendo kik usar kido moro amora e dendu. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Kik utime timbe manyalo miyo nyiu bed jochode, nikech mano nyalo kethonu piny makel richo mangʼeny.
“ ‘Rituru Sabato maga kendo kama ler mar lemo mara nyaka umi luor mowinjore. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Kik udhi upenj wach kuom jo-nyakalondo kata kuom ajuoke mamoko, nikech timo kamano biro miyo ubedo mogak. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
“ ‘Nyaka ichiw luor kichungone jaduongʼ ma wiye oti lwar kendo uluor Nyasachu. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Ka japiny moro odak e dieru, to kik usande.
Japiny moro modak e dieruno nyaka udag kode mana kaka wuodu. Hereuru mana kaka uheroru uwegi nikech ne un jodak e piny Misri. An Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
“ ‘Kik uti gi rapim ma ok nikare ka upimo bor kata pek mar gimoro kata kupimo ngʼeny mare.
Tiuru gi rapim ma ok riambi kendo mapimo gimoro makare. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mane ogolou e piny Misri.
“ ‘Rituru yorena duto kod chikena kendo uluwgi. An e Jehova Nyasaye.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya
Nyis jo-Israel ni: Ja-Israel moro amora kata jadak moro amora manie dieru manochiw nyathine moro amora ni nyiseche manono miluongo ni Molek, nyaka negi. Oganda jo-Israel duto mondo ogoye gi kite nyaka otho.
Anabed jasik ngʼatno kendo anangʼad nyinge oko kuom ogandane; kuom chiwo nyathine ni nyasaye manono miluongo ni Molek, osedwanyo kama ler mar lemo, kendo osechayo nyinga maler.
To kapo ni oganda jo-Israel ok odewo wach ngʼat mochiwo achiel kuom nyithinde ne Molek, ma ok ginege,
to an awuon ema nabed jasik ngʼatno gi dhoodgi duto. Kargi anangʼad oko kuom ogandagi, kaachiel gi jogo duto maluwe kendo madwanyore kalamo Molek.
Anabed jasik ngʼama oweya modhi odwanyore gi jo-nyakalondo kod lang chunje maricho; kendo anangʼad kare oko kuom ogandagi.
Pwodhreuru ubed maler nikech An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Rituru buchena kendo uluwgi, nimar An e Jehova Nyasaye mapwodhou.
Ngʼato angʼata mokwongʼo wuon kata min, nyaka negi; nikech timneno; rembe nodongʼ e wiye owuon.
Ka ngʼato oterore gi chi wadgi ma gidakgo, to jochode ariyogo nyaka neg-gi duto.
Ka ngʼato oterore gi chi wuon mare, to oseelo dug wuon-gi. Ji ariyogi nyaka neg-gi kendo rembgi nobedi e wigi giwegi.
Ka ngʼato oterore gi chi wuode to giduto nyaka neg-gi. Gima gitimono en tim makwero to rembgi nobedi e wigi giwegi.
Ka dichwo oterore gi dichwo wadgi. Giduto ji ariyogi gitimo gima kwero kendo giduto nyaka neg-gi to rembgi nobedi e wigi giwegi.
Ka ngʼato okendo nyako kaachiel gi min-gi bende okendo, to ma en anjawo. Kargi ji adekgo nyaka wangʼ-gi kod mach, mondo tim marach kik dongʼ e dieru.
Ka ngʼato oterore gi chiayo, ngʼatni nyaka nege, to chiayono bende nyaka negi.
Ka dhako osudo machiegni gi chiayo mondo oterre kode, giduto nyaka neg-gi kendo rembgi obed e wigi giwegi.
Ka ngʼato okendo nyamin mare ma nyar wuon kata ma nyar min, ma giterore kode, to otimo gima kwero. Nyaka neg-gi ka ji duto neno nikech oterore gi nyamin, koro nyaka oyud kum.
Ka ngʼato oterore gi dhako manie dwe, mano okuodo wi dhakono, nikech oele nyaka kama rembe wuokie, dhakono bende oseyie moel nyaka kama rembe wuokie. Giduto nyaka riembgi gia e dier ogandagi.
Ok oyieni mondo iterri gi nyamin mamau, nikech mano en tim maketho wat. Joma timo timbegi nyaka migi kum.
Ka ngʼato oterore gi nyamin wuon, ngʼatni okuodo wi wuon mareno, omiyo nyaka giyud kum, kendo mondo oneg-gi ma nying-gi lal chuth e dier ogandagi.
Ka ngʼato oterore gi chi owadgi, to mano en dwanyruok nikech oelo dug owadgi, kendo ok giniyud nyithindo.
Un nyaka koro urit chikena gi buchena kendo umak-gi, mi uluwgi duto, eka piny mamiyou mondo udagieno ok nongʼogu oko.
Kik uluw timbe oganda mudak e diergi madhi riembonu oko-gi. Nikech gigi mane gitimo nomiyo aol kodgi.
Kendo ne awachonegi niya, “Abiro kawo pinygi kendo abiro miyougo kaka girkeni, ma en piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich.” An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mosepogou gi ogendini mamoko.
Nyaka uket pogruok e kind le michamo gi ma ok cham, kendo e kind winy michamo to gi ma ok cham. Kik udok mogak nikech le moro amora kata winyo kata gimoro amora mamol e lowo ma gin gik masewalo tenge nochido.
Nyaka ubed maler e nyima nikech an Jehova Nyasaye aler, kendo asewalou e kind ogendini mondo ubed joga awuon.
Ngʼato angʼata kuomu madichwo kata madhako ma en ajuok nyakalondo kata ma ajwoga moro amora, to ugo gi kite nyaka otho. Giduto nyaka ugogi gi kite kendo rembgi nobedi e wigi giwegi.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Wuo kod jodolo ma yawuot Harun, kendo iwachnegi ni: ‘Kik jadolo tim gimoro ne ringre jadhodgi moro amora motho ma dimi obed mogak,
makmana kaponi ngʼat ma othoni en watne manie ot kaka min kata wuon kata wuode kata nyare kata owadgi,
kata nyamin-gi manie lwete mapok okendi. Nyamin-gi mapok okendino kende ema nyalo miyo obed mogak.
Kik obed mogak kuom mulo ringre joma otho ma gin wedene kuom kend.
“ ‘Jodolo ok oyienegi mondo giliel wigi, kata tito yie tikgi bende kik gisar dendgi.
Nyaka gibed jomaler e nyim Nyasachgi, kendo kik gicha nying Nyasachgi. Nikech gin ema gichiwo misengini miwangʼo e mach ni Jehova Nyasaye, ma en chiemb Nyasachgi, omiyo nyaka gibed maler.
“ ‘Jodolo ok oyienegi kendo nyako mochot kata nyako mosewere gi chwore, nikech jodolo nyaka bed maler e nyim Nyasachgi.
Kwan-giuru kaka jomaler, nikech gin ema gichiwo chiemo ni Nyasachu. Kawgiuru kaka jomaler nikech an Jehova Nyasaye aler; an mamiyo ubedo maler.
“ ‘Ka nyar jadolo olokore ochot, to nyakoni okuodo wi wuon-gi, omiyo nyaka wangʼe gi mach.
“ ‘Jadolo maduongʼ e kind owetene, kendo moseol mor pwodhruok e wiye, kendo owal mondo orwak lep dolo, kik owe wiye obed mogar, kata kik orwak law moyiech.
Jadolono ok oyiene donjo e ot ma ngʼato othoe. Kik obed mogak kata bedni ngʼatno en wuon mare kata min mare,
kata kik owuogi koa kama ler mar lemo mar Nyasache, kata miyo kanyo bedo mogak, nikech en ngʼama owal kendo owir gi mor pwodhruok mar Nyasache. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Nyako mokendo nyaka bed nyako ngili.
Kik okend dhako ma chwore otho, kata dhako mowere gi chwore, kata dhako mochot, makmana nyako ngili,
mondo omi kik onywol nyithindo mogak e kind ogandane. An e Jehova Nyasaye mamiyo obedo maler.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Nyis Harun ni: ‘Kuom tiengeu duto, onge ngʼama ongʼol ma oyiene mondo ochiw chiemo ni Nyasache.
Ngʼato angʼata man-gi songa kik sud machiegni gi Nyasaye, obed ni en muofu kata rangʼol, kata ma dende kamoro otimo mbala,
kata ka tiende kata bade ongʼol,
kata ka en rakuom kata othwogo, kata ka en rachiero, kata ka wangʼe chwero pi, kata ka en gi adhola monyaa kata ka en bwoch.
Nyakwar Harun moro amora man-gi songa kik sud machiegni mar timo ne Jehova Nyasaye misango miwangʼo. Nikech en gi songa ok onego osud machiegni mondo ochiw chiemo ne Nyasache.
Onyalo chamo chiemb Nyasache, bedni ogol chiemono kuom gik maler kata kuom gik maler moloyo;
to nikech ngʼol mare ok onego osud machiegni gi Pasia kata gi kendo mar misango, nikech dipo ka omiyo kara maler mar lemo obedo mogak nimar en gi songa. An e Jehova Nyasaye mapwodhogi.’ ”
Kuom mano Musa nonyiso Harun gi yawuote kod jo-Israel duto wachno.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
Nyis Harun gi yawuote ni nyaka giritre ahinya ka gitiyo gi mich maler ma nyithind Israel kelona mar chiwo, nono to dipo ka gichayo nyinga. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
Wachnegi ni: Ka ngʼato moro mogak osudo machiegni kod kama jo-Israel chiwoe chiwo maler ni Jehova Nyasaye, to nangʼad kare oko kendo ok nobed gimoro e nyima. Mano en chik manyaka uriti chakre sani kod tiengʼ mabiro. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
Koth Harun moro amora matuo mar dhoho nogore kuome kata man-gi tuo machwer, ok onego cham chiemo mowal mochiwne Jehova Nyasaye kapok opwodhe. Enobed ngʼama ogak ka omulo gima orere kuom ngʼama otho kata orere kuom ngʼama kothe mar dichwo owuok,
kata ka omulo gimoro mamol manyalo miyo obed mogak, kata ngʼato angʼata mamiyo obedo mogak, bedni ogak manade.
Ngʼato angʼata momulo gik mogakgo nobed mogak nyaka chiengʼ podhi. Ok onego ocham chiemo mowal moro amora motimgo misango nyaka chop olwokre.
Bangʼ podho chiengʼ, ngʼatno nobed maler, kendo bangʼ mano oyiene mondo ocham chiwogo nikech en chiembe.
Ok oyiene mondo ocham chiayo moro amora motho kende, kata ma ondiek onego, nikech timo kamano biro miyo obedo mogak. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Jodolo to nyaka rit chikena mondo kik gibed joketho mi githo kuom richono. An e Jehova Nyasaye mapwodhogi.
“ ‘Ngʼato angʼata ma ok oaye oganda jadolo kik cham chiwo maler, kata bedni en wendo molimo jadolo, kata obed jatich jadolo ma ondiko kaka jotich.
To ka jadolo ongʼiewo jatich kod pesa to oyiene chiemo kaachiel gi wasumbini monywol e dalane.
Ka ngʼat ma ok jadolo okendo nyar jadolo, nyakoni ok oyiene mondo ocham mich moyiedhi mogol kuom chiwo maler.
To ka nyar jadolo chwore otho, kata ka owere gi chwore kapok onywol mi odok dalagi mondo odag kanyo ka nyako mapok okendi, to oyiene chamo chiemb wuon mare. Makmana ni ngʼat ma ok jadolo, to kik cham chiemono.
“ ‘Ngʼato angʼata manyalo ponono kochamo chiemo mowal kokia ni en gima ochiw ni Jehova Nyasaye, to nyaka ochul jadolo ka omedo gi achiel kuom abich mar nengo mar gima ochamo cha.
Jodolo nyaka tangʼ mondo kik giketh chiwo maler ma jo-Israel osewalo ni Jehova Nyasaye,
ka gichiwo thuolo ni joma gingʼeyo ni ok jodolo chamo chiemo mowalgo, nikech mano miyo jogo bedo joketho kendo gidonjo e kum mowinjore gi chudo. An Jehova Nyasaye mapwodhogi.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
“Nyis Harun gi yawuote kod jo-Israel duto kiwachonegi ni: ‘Ka ngʼato moro amora kuomu, bed ni en ja-Israel kata jadak manie dieru okelo misango miwangʼo pep ni Jehova Nyasaye, bedni en mar chopo singo kata chiwo mar hera,
to nyaka ichiw chiayo maonge songa, obedni en rwath, kata diel kata rombo, eka Jehova Nyasaye noyiego.
Kik uchiw chiayo man-gi songa nikech Jehova Nyasaye ok bi yie kode.
Ka ngʼato okelone Jehova Nyasaye misango mar lalruok mar dhiangʼ kata rombo mondo ochopgo singruokne, kata obed ni en chiwo mar hera, to nyaka obed chiayo maler maonge songa eka Jehova Nyasaye noyie kode.
Kik ichiwne Jehova Nyasaye chiayo ma muofu, ma rangʼol kata man-gi songa, kata man-gi kalanga, kata motimo aluny kata man-gi adhola machwer. Chiayo makamagi kik ket ewi kendo mar misango mondo obed misango miwangʼo pep gi mach ni Jehova Nyasaye.
To kuom chiwo mar hera unyalo chiwo rwath kata rombo man-gi songa, to chiwogi ok noyiego kuom timo misango mar singruok.
Kik ichiwne Jehova Nyasaye chiayo mopwodi kata moroo. Kik utim tim maka ma e pinyu,
kendo kik uyie kawo chiayo machal kamano kuom jadak manie pinyu mondo uchiwe ni Nyasachu ka chiembe. Jehova Nyasaye ok bi yie kodgi nikech gin-gi songa kendo gingʼol.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
“Ka onywol nyarombo, nyaroya kata nyadiel, to kik upoge gi min mare nyaka bangʼ ndalo abiriyo. Kochiwe ne Jehova Nyasaye bangʼ ndalo aboro kaka misango miwangʼo gi mach to Jehova Nyasaye noyie kode.
Kik uneg dhiangʼ gi nyathine, kata rombo gi nyathine odiechiengʼ achiel.
“Ka uchiwo misango mar goyo erokamano ni Jehova Nyasaye, to chiweuru kaka chik dwaro eka Jehova Nyasaye noyie kodu.
Nyaka chame duto maonge modongʼ mana godiechiengno. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
“Rituru chikena kendo uluwgi maber. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
Kik udwany nyinga maler. An kenda ema jo-Israel nyaka miya luor kaka ngʼama ler. An e Jehova Nyasaye mapwodhogi,
kendo manogolou e piny Misri mondo abed Nyasachu. An e Jehova Nyasaye.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo inyisgi ni: ‘Magi e sewni moyier mag Jehova Nyasaye, magin chokruok mage maler, ma onego ulandi kuonde duto ma uchokorue.
“ ‘Nitie ndalo auchiel munyalo tiyoe tijeu; to chiengʼ mar abiriyo en odiechieng Sabato mar yweyo, ma en odiechiengʼ mowal mar chokruok. Ok oyienu timo gimoro amora, kamoro amora mudakie, nikech en Sabato mar Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Magi e sewni moyier mag Jehova Nyasaye, ma gin chokruok maler, manyaka ulandi e kindegi mowinjore.
Pasaka mar Jehova Nyasaye chakore godhiambo tarik apar gangʼwen mar dwe mokwongo.
To tarik apar gabich mar dweno en Sap Makati ma ok oketie Thowi mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo nyaka ucham makati motedi ma ok oketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Chiengʼ mokwongo mar jumano nyaka ubed gi chokruok mowal, kendo kik uti tich moro amora ma utiyo pile.
Kuom ndalo abiriyo, chiwuru ne Jehova Nyasaye misengini miwangʼo pep. Chiengʼ mar abiriyo beduru gi chokruok mar jomaler, kendo kik uti tich moro amora ma utiyo pile.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo inyisgi ni: ‘Ka uchopo e piny ma asesingonu mi ukayo cham, to nyaka ukelne jadolo cham ma ukwongo kayo.
E odiechiengʼ mokwongo bangʼ Sabato, jadolo biro fwayo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye cham mukwongo kayo kaka mich moyiedhi, eka Jehova Nyasaye noyie kodu.
To chiengʼono muchiewoe cham mifwayo to nyaka uchiwe ne Jehova Nyasaye gi nyaim ma pod hike achiel kendo maonge songa mondo timgo misango miwangʼo pep,
kaachiel gi misango mar cham gi mogo mayom madirom kilo abiriyo moruw gi mo. Kendo misangono mondo owangʼe modungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova Nyasaye. Misango miolo piny to obed divai maromo lita achiel.
Kik ucham makati, kata makati mowangʼ kata cham manyien ma pod numu, kapok ochopo chiengʼ ma uchiwone Nyasachu michni. Kendo mae en chik momakou kaachiel gi nyikwau nyaka chiengʼ kamoro amora manudagie.
“ ‘Chakre odiechiengʼ moluwo Sabato, mane ukeloe mich mar cham moyiedhi, to nyaka ukwan ma une ni oromo jumbe abiriyo.
Kwanuru ndalo piero abich bangʼ Sabato mar abiriyo, kendo chiengʼno unutim misango ni Jehova Nyasaye gi cham manyien.
Keluru makati ariyo mugolo e miechu kaka misango mifwayo, kendo ulosgi gi mogo mayom moromo kilo abiriyo moketie thowi, mondo uchiwgi ne Jehova Nyasaye kaka chiwo mar cham mokwongo.
Kaachiel gi makatino chiwne Jehova Nyasaye nyirombe abiriyo machwo maonge songa mahikgi en achiel, gi nyarwath matin kod imbe ariyo. Ginibed misango miwangʼo pep ni Jehova Nyasaye kaachiel gi misango mar cham gi misango miolo piny mondo obed misango miwangʼo pep madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova.
Bangʼe chiw nywok achiel mitimogo misango mar golo richo, kaachiel gi nyiimbe ariyo ma jo-higa achiel mitimogo misango mar lalruok.
Jadolo nyaka chiw nyiimbe ariyogo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo, kaachiel gi makati mag cham mokwongo. Magi nobed mich mowal michiwo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, kendo ginidongʼ ni jadolo.
To odiechiengʼno unugo tungʼ kulando chokruok maler, kendo kik uti tijeu mapile. Maeni en chik momakou kaachiel gi nyikwau kamoro amora manudagie.
“ ‘Ka ukeyo e puotheu, to kik uka nyaka cham manie giko puodho, kata kik uhul cham modongʼ, mago weuru ni joma odhier kod jodak. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wach ni jo-Israel ni: ‘E odiechiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe mar abiriyo, nyaka ubed gi odiechieng yweyo; ma en odiechieng chokruok mowal kaka rapar kugoyo turumbete.
Chiengʼni kik utim tijeu mapile, to chiwuru misango miwangʼo pep ni Jehova Nyasaye.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“E odiechiengʼ mar apar mar dwe mar abiriyo nobednu Chiengʼ Pwodhruok. Beduru gi chokruok maler ka uriyo kech, kendo uchiw ni Jehova Nyasaye misango miwangʼo pep.
Odiechiengʼno kik ngʼato kuomu mul tich moro amora nikech en Chiengʼ Pwodhruok, migolonue richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Ngʼato angʼata ma ok nyal riyo kech odiechiengʼno to nongʼad kare oko chuth e kind ogandane.
Kendo anatiek ngʼato angʼata momulo tich moro amora chiengʼno, kendo anagole e kind ogandane.
Kik umul tich moro amora. Ma en chik ma omakou nyaka nyikwau duto kamoro amora ma unudagie.
Chiengʼno nobednu Sabato mar yweyo, kendo nyaka une ni uriyo kech. Chakre odhiambo mar odiechiengʼ mar ochiko mar dwe nyaka kinyne godhiambo, nyaka urit Sabato maru.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
