“Wach ni jo-Israel ni: ‘Chakre tarik apar gabich e dwe mar abiriyo en Sawo mar Kiche mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo nobedi kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Odiechiengʼ mokwongo nobed chokruok maler ma kik uti tijeu mapile.
Kuom ndalo abiriyo chiwuru ni Jehova Nyasaye misengini miwangʼo pep, eka chiengʼ mar aboro to ubedi gi chokruok maler kendo chiengʼno uchiwni Jehova Nyasaye misango miwangʼo pep. En chokruok mitiekogo nyasi, omiyo kik uti tijeu mapile.
(“ ‘Magi e sewni moyier mag Jehova Nyasaye manyaka ulandi ni gin e chokruok maler michiwone Jehova Nyasaye gi mach kaka misengini miwangʼo pep, gi misengini mag cham gi misengini miolo piny kendo moro ka moro nigi odiechienge mowinjore.
To ewi mago nitie Sabato mag Jehova Nyasaye gi chiwo mamoko to gi gimoro amora misesingori kaachiel gi chiwo mar hera michiwo ni Jehova Nyasaye.)
“ ‘Omiyo kochakore e odiechiengʼ mar apar gabich mar dwe mar abiriyo bangʼ keyo to nyaka utim Sap Jehova Nyasaye kuom ndalo abiriyo. Chiengʼ mokwongo en odiechiengʼ mowal mar yweyo, kendo chiengʼ mar aboro bende en kamano.
Chiengʼ mokwongo kawuru olembe yien mabeyo gi bede othidhe, gi bede yien motimo otiep, gi omburi, kendo ubed mamor e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Timuru sawoni ni Jehova Nyasaye kuom ndalo abiriyo higa ka higa. Mae en chik momakou gi nyikwau nyaka chiengʼ. Paruru ni kochopo dwe mar abiriyo to nyaka ubed gi sawoni.
Un jo-Israel nyaka udagi e kiche kuom ndalo abiriyo,
mae ema biro miyo nyikwau nopar kaka namiyo jo-Israel odak e kiche kinde mane agologi e piny Misri. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.’ ”
Kamano e kaka Musa nolando ni jo-Israel sewni moyier mag Jehova Nyasaye.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Chik jo-Israel mondo gikelni mo maliw mar zeituni mobi mondo omi teyni osik kaliel pile.
Harun nyaka ne ni teynigo osiko kaliel oko mar pasia moumo Sandug Muma mar Hemb Romo manie nyim Jehova Nyasaye chakre odhiambo nyaka okinyi. Ma en chik mosiko nyaka chiengʼ ne tienge duto mabiro.
Teyni manie rachung taya maler molos gi dhahabu nyaka rit pile ka pile e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
“Kawuru mogo mayom kendo utedgo makati apar gariyo, ma moro ka moro oted gi mogo moromo kilo abiriyo.
Chan uru makatigi laini ariyo e mesa maler molos gi dhahabu mochungʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo e laini ka laini obed gi auchiel.
To e laini ka laini mondo ukete ubani maler, mondo obed kaka rapar mar makati ma ichiwo ni Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango miwangʼo pep.
Makatini nyaka kete e nyim Jehova Nyasaye pile ka pile chiengʼ Sabato ka chiengʼ Sabato. Gin mich ma ichiwo e lo jo-Israel kaka singruok manyaka chiengʼ.
Makatigo mondo odongʼ ni Harun gi yawuote, kendo nyaka gichamgi kama ler mar lemo, nikech en migawo mar pok maler moloyo ma gichiwo kinde ka kinde kaka misengini miwangʼo ni Jehova Nyasaye.”
Wuowi moro ma min mare ja-Israel to wuon mare ja-Misri nowuok e dier jo-Israel kendo dhawo nowuok e kambi e kinde gi ja-Israel moro.
Wuod dhako ma ja-Israel noyanyo Nying Jehova Nyasaye mi ojare; omiyo negikele e nyim Musa. (Min-gi ne nyinge Shelomith, nyar Dibri mane oa e dhood Dan.)
Negikete e od twech ka girito gima Jehova Nyasaye biro nyisogi.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Gol ngʼat moseyanyano oko mar kambi. Ji duto mane nitie koyenyo mondo giket lwetgi e wiye kendo kanyakla mar jo-Israel duto okaw kite ochielego.”
Wachne jo-Israel niya, Ka ngʼato okwongʼo Nyasache, to oyud kum moromo gi kethono,
to ngʼato angʼata moyanyo nying Jehova Nyasaye nyaka negi. Oganda duto nyaka chiele gi kite, bed ni en ja-Israel kata jadak, to koseyanyo nying Jehova Nyasaye to nyaka nege.
“ ‘Ngʼato angʼata monego wadgi, en bende nyaka nege.
Ngʼato angʼata monego chiayo nyaka chul chiayo, to ngʼato angʼata monego nyawadgi nyaka negi.
Ngʼato angʼata mohinyo wadgi, nyaka timne gima otimono.
Lero kar lero, wangʼ kar wangʼ, lak kar lak. Nyaka hiny ngʼatno mana kaka osehinyo nyawadgi.
Ngʼato angʼata monego chiayo nyaka chul chiayo, to ngʼato angʼata monego nyawadgi nyaka negi.
Kaka ikumo jadak e kaka ikumo ja-Israel. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.’ ”
Eka Musa nowuoyo gi jo-Israel mi gigolo ngʼat mane oyenyocha oko mar kambi kendo negichiele gi kite. Jo-Israel notimo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa ewi Got Sinai niya,
Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo inyisgi ni: Ka gichopo e piny mabiro miyogi, to pinyno nyaka rit Sabato mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Kuom higni auchiel oyienu pidho cham e puotheu, gi loso tiend yiendeu mag mzabibu kendo oyienu kayo chambu kendo pono olembeu.
To kochopo higa mar abiriyo to puodho nyaka yud yweyo mar Sabato, ma en Sabato mar Jehova Nyasaye. E higano lowo nyaka yud yweyo ma kik upidh gimoro amora e puotheu mag cham gi mag mzabibu.
E higano kik uka orowe kata kik upon mzabibu monyak kendgi e yien mane ok uloso, nikech en higa ma piny yweyoe.
To gimoro amora ma piny nochiegnu e hik Sabato nobed mar chiembu, chiemb jotichu machwo gi mamon kaachiel gi jotichu mamoko, kod welo molimou kuma udakie kuom ndalo machwok,
kendo nobed mar jambu gi le manie pinyu. Gimoro amora ma piny ochiego inyalo cham.
Waluru Sabato abiriyo mag higni abiriyo nyadibiriyo, tiendeni higni piero angʼwen gochiko.
Eka gouru turumbete kamoro amora e odiechiengʼ mar apar mar dwe mar abiriyo, kendo Odiechieng Pwodhruokno gouru turumbete e gwengeu duto.
Waluru higa mar piero abich, kendo ugo milome e piny duto ni en higa ma joma otwe igonyo iweyogi gibedo thuolo. Enobed hiku mar mor; ngʼato ka ngʼato nodog thurgi ir joode kendo ir anywolane.
Higa mar piero abichno nobednu uduto hik mor, kik upidhe cham, kendo kik ukaye orowe, kata kik uponie mzabibu monyak kende e yien mane ok uloso.
Nimar en higa mar piero abich, kendo mosewalnu maler ni Jehova Nyasaye, nyaka ucham gik monyak e puothe.
E higani mar piero abich nyaka ngʼato ka ngʼato odog thurgi.
E higani ka ngʼato ongʼiewo lop wadgi to kik wuond moro bedie kindgi.
Ka ingʼiewo lop wadu nyaka ikwan higni kochakore e higa mar piero abich mokadho. Nyaka oket nengo lopno mana maromre gi higni ma pod ibiro keyoe.
Ka hignigo ngʼeny to nyaka imed nengo, to ka higni nok, to nyaka idwok nengo piny, nikech gima ingʼiewo kuome en mana cham mibiro kayo.
Kik ngʼat maa nyawadgi, to luoruru Nyasachu. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Rituru buchena kendo une ni uluwo chikena, eka mondo udag gi kwe e pinyno.
Mano eka lowo nochiegnu cham kendo nuchiem ma uyiengʼ mi unudagi gi kwe.
Kapo upenjo niya, “Angʼo ma wabiro chamo e higa mar abiriyo ka ok wachwoyo, kata ka ok wakeyo?”
To anadwoku kama: Anaolnu gweth mogundho e higa mar auchiel, kendo puotheu nochieg cham moromou chamo nyaka bangʼ higni adek.
E kinde ma uchwoyo e higa mar aboro to unubed mana kapod uchamo cham machon nyaka chop ubed gi keyo e higa mar ochiko.
Kik ngʼato usne wadgi lowo chuth, nikech lowo en mara, un to un mana joma amiyo lowo kaka wenda kendo jodak.
E pinyu kamoro amora mudakie, nyaka uyie mondo puodho mane oseusi mondo owar.
Ka wadu moro dhier omako ma ouso lope, to nyaka wadgi moro tem matek kendo owarne lopeno.
To ka ngʼato onge gi watne manyalo warone lowo, to kata en owuon ndalo moyudo pesa onyalo ware,
kendo enokwan chakre higni mane ouse lopeno, kendo chulo ngʼatno pesa moromo gi higni ma pod odongʼ nyaka chop higa mar mor, eka koro oyiene kawo lopno obed mare kendo.
To ka ok onyal waro lopeno, to lopno nosik e lwet ngʼat mane ongʼiewocha nyaka chop higa mar piero abich. To kochopo higa mar morno to nowe lowo odogni wuon mare machon, kendo wuon-gi nokawe.
Ka ngʼato oyie mi wadgi ongʼiewo ode mar dak manie dala mochiel motegno gi ohinga, to oyiene mana mar ware ka higa achiel pok orumo nyaka ne ngʼiewe. Higano mangima en gi thuolo mar ware.
Ka ok oware ka higa pok orumo, to odno mantiere ei ohinga mochiel motegnono mar dala maduongʼ nosik mana kobedo mar ngʼat mane ongʼiewecha, kaachiel gi nyikwaye kod kothe duto nyaka chiengʼ. Kata kochopo higa mar piero abich to ok nodwoke e lwet wuon machon.
To udi moger e mier ma ok ochiel gi ohinga nokwan mana kaka ikwano lowo. Ginto gin gik minyalo waro, maka ochopo higa mar piero abich to nyaka dwokgi e lwet wegi.
Jo-Lawi nigi thuolo kinde duto mar waro utegi manie miechgi.
Ka ja-Lawi moro ok owaro ode manie dalagi, to odni nyaka duogne e higa mar piero abich, nikech udi manie miech joka Lawi e mwandu kende ma gin godo e piny Israel.
To puothe mag lek mag joka Lawi ok nyal usi, nikech mano en mwandugi nyaka chiengʼ.
Ka ja-Israel wadu moro obedo modhier e dieru, to nyaka ukonye mana kaka ukonyo jadak kata wendo molimou kuma udakie kuom ndalo machwok mondo omi osik kodak kodu.
Kik ukaw ohala moro amora kuome, to daguru kode kuluoro Nyasachu.
Kik uhole pesa mondo uyudie ohala, kendo kik ukaw ohala kuom chiemo ma uhole.
An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mane ogolou e piny Misri momiyou piny Kanaan kendo mondo abed Nyasachu.
Ka wadu odhier kendo ochiwore mondo ingʼiewe, to kik ikete otini ka misumba.
To dag kode kaka jatich michulo kata kaka wendo modak kodi, kendo obiro tiyoni nyaka chop higa mar piero abich.
Eka bangʼe noa iri en kaachiel gi nyithinde, kendo odogi ir joodgi owuon kendo e lop kwerene.
Nikech jo-Israel gin wasumbiniga mane agolo an awuon e piny Misri, ok onego ngʼiewgi kaka wasumbini.
Kik isand ja-Israel wadu kata matin, to iluor Nyasachi.
Wasumbini magu machwo kata mamon, unyalo mana ngʼiewo koa ir ogendini mukiewogo.
To bende un gi thuolo mar ngʼiewo nyithind jodak manie dieru, kaachiel gi joma ginywolo e dieru, makoro ginibed mwandu magu uwegi,
Bangʼ ka usetho to unuwegi ni yawuotu kaka girkeni kendo ginibed wasumbini mag-gi nyaka chiengʼ, makmana ni jo-Israel weteu to kik usandi.
Ka jadak moro manie dieru kata wendo oyudo mwandu mi obedo jamoko, to wadu moro to obedo modhier, mi ongʼiewe gi jadak modak e dieru kata anywola jadakno,
to en giratiro mondo oware bangʼ ka osengʼiewe. Achiel kuom wedene nyalo ware.
Ngʼatni nyalo bedo owad gi wuon, kata wuod wuon kata mana watne moro amora e anywolane. To en bende kobedo ja-mwandu to onyalo warore owuon.
En kaachiel gi ngʼat mane ongʼieweno nyaka kwan kar romb higni chakre chiengʼ mane ongʼiewe nyaka chop higa mar piero abich. Pesa monego dwokne ngʼat mane ongʼieweno nyaka bed maromre gi pok ma dine ngʼatno ondikogo jatich kuom higni ma ngʼatno osetiyogo.
To ka higni modongʼ ngʼeny, to noware gi chudo mamalo.
To kodongʼ gi higni manok mondo ochop e higa mar piero abich, to noware gi chudo ma piny.
Ngʼatni nyaka riti kaka jatich mondiki kendo ngʼat mane ongʼiewe ok oyiene mondo osande.
Ka ngʼatno ok owar e achiel kuom yorego, to en kaachiel gi nyithinde noweye thuolo e higa mar piero abich,
nikech jo-Israel gin wasumbini maga. Gin wasumbini maga mane agolo e piny Misri. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Kik ulos kido moro amora mopa kata chungo siro moro milamo bende kidi moro amora mopa kik yud e pinyu kukulorune kulame. An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Rituru Sabato maga, kendo luoruru kara maler mar lemo. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka urito buchena kendo urito chikena,
to abiro kelonu koth e kinde mowinjore, kendo pinyu nochieg cham mi yiendeu nonyag olembe.
Ubiro dino cham nyaka chop kinde muponoe mzabibu kendo ubiro pono mzabibu nyaka chop kinde muchwoyoe bende ubiro bedo gi chiemo moromou kendo ubiro dak gi kwe e pinyu.
Anamiu kwe e pinyu, mi ununindi maonge ngʼama nomiu luoro. Anatieki ondiegi duto e dieru kendo ligangla ok nomonju kata matin.
Unuriemb jowasiku duto e dieru kendo ununeg-gi.
Jou abich nobed gi teko mar riembo ji mia achiel, kendo jou mia achiel nobed gi teko mar riembo ji gana apar, kendo ununeg wasiku.
Abiro olonu gweth, kendo abiro miyo unywol mi ununyaa mathoth, kendo abiro chopo singruok duto mane atimo kodu.
Cham mag higa makadho manie decheu noromu chamo nyaka chop kinde ma ugologie oko mondo uyud thuolo mar rwako cham manyien.
Abiro loso kar dakna e dieru kendo ok anajwangʼu kata matin.
Anawuoth e dieru mi nabed Nyasachu, kendo unubed joga.
An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mane ogolou e piny Misri, mondo kik ubed wasumb jo-Misri kendo ne aturo lodi mane otwenu mi koro sani uwuotho tir.
To ka unutamru winja ma ok urito chikenago duto,
ma udagi buchena kendo uchayo chikena, ma ok urito chikena duto ma uketho singruok mara mane atimo kodu,
to koro ngʼeuru chuth ni mae e kaka abiro timonu: Anapou gi masira kod tho marach, gi tuo mayuyo wangʼ gi tuo mamiyo del dhe. Cham ma upidho ok nokonyu kata matin nikech jowasiku ema nochamgi.
Anabed ka asin kodu mi wasiku nolou e lweny kendo gininegu; unubed e bwo loch jowasiku, kendo unubwogru gi ngʼwech kata kaonge joma lawou.
Kata bangʼ timo magi duto kapod ok unyal winja, to anakumu nyadibiriyo kuom richo duto.
Anatiek sunga mar wich teko ma un-go, kendo anami polo rieny ka chuma, kendo piny mwalo nodog matek ka mula.
Ubiro ketho tekreu kayiem nono, kuchwoyo cham nimar chambu ok nochiegi, kata yedheu bende ok nonyag olembe.
Kapod usikona mana gi wich teko kendo udagi winja, to anakelnu masiche moloyo nyadibiriyo maromre gi richou.
Abiro oronu le mag bungu mondo oked kodu kendo ginineg nyithindo kaachiel gi jambu mi unudongʼ manok kendo yoreu nodongʼ nono maonge joma wuothoe.
Kobedo ni pod ok udwogo ira kata bangʼ timonu magi duto, kendo udhi mana nyime gi wich teko,
to an bende nanyisu wich teko, mi anamiu kum moloyo nyadibiriyo nikech richou.
Kendo anakel lweny e dieru mondo achulgo kuor kuom ketho singruok mane atimo kodu, kendo kinde duto manuchokru e miechu to nagou gi tuoche kendo wasiku nomaku.
Anami chiembu doko manok kendo mon apar notedi e agulu achiel. Ginipimnu chiemo e rapim, kendo kata kuchiemo to onge ngʼama noyiengʼ.
Kobedo ni pod ok udwogo ira kata bangʼ timonu magi duto, kendo udhi mana nyime gi wich teko,
to an bende nasik kodu gi wich teko gi mirimba mager, kendo anakumu moloyo nyadibiriyo gi mirimba mager nikech richou.
Unucham ring yawuotu kod nyiwu.
Anaketh kuondeu motingʼore gi malo, kendo anamuki kendeu muwangʼoe ubani. Anaket ringreu motho kuom nyiseche manono kendo anajwangʼu chuth.
Miechu madongo biro bedo gundni, kuondeu maler mag lemo abiro ketho, kendo ok anayie winjo tik mangʼwe ngʼar mag misengini mau.
Anaketh pinyu kendo jowasiku mabiro dakie nohum nono.
Abiro keyou e kind ogendini, anagol ligangla mi alawu. Pinyu nodongʼ gunda, kendo miechu madongo nokethi chuth.
E kinde duto ma pinyu nodongʼ gunda, ka un to asekeyou udak e kind wasiku; pinyu nobed ma ok opur mondo ochulgo Sabato maga duto mane ok urito.
E kinde duto ma pinyu nodongʼ gunda kamano, enobed ma ok opure, ka oritogo Sabato duto mane ok oyweyoe e kinde mane udak kuno.
To kuom jou modongʼ ka ngima e piny wasikgi, ginto anagogi kod kihondko e piny wasikgi, ma kata ka yamo okwadho it oboke maponi giwinjo, to giniwuog gi ngʼwech. Giniringi mana ka joma wasigu lawo gi ligangla mi gipodh piny kata obedo ni onge ngʼama lawogi.
Ginituomre kendgi giwegi mana ka joma wasigu lawo gi ligangla, kata obedo ni onge ngʼama lawogi. Omiyo ok unuyud teko mar kedo gi wasiku.
Unulal nono e kind ogendini, kendo wasiku notieku.
Joma otony e dieru mane odongʼ kangima e pinje mag wasiku nobed ka dendgi dhi adhiya nikech richogi kendo nikech richo mag kweregi, mana machal kaka notimore ni kweregi.
Bangʼ mae gibiro hulo richogi gi richo kweregi mane omiyo giweya kaachiel gi richo mane omiyo gibedo wasika,
mane omiyo abedo kodgi mamon kendo mane omiyo aterogi e piny wasikgi, eka bangʼe chunygi ma ok oyie kaka adwaro nobolre, mi giniyud kum kuom richogi,
eka abiro paro singruok mane atimo gi Jakobo kendo gi Isaka kendo gi Ibrahim, kendo anapar pinyu.
Piny to nodongʼ gunda nikech joma odakie osea, kendo obiro nindo ka ok opure mondo ochulgo Sabato duto mane ok oyweyoe. Giniyud kum kuom richogi nikech ne gichayo chikena kod buchena.
“Kata kamano, kata obedo ni gin e piny wasikgi, to ka anawitgi kendo ok anajwangʼ-gi kata tiekogi chuth, mi aketh singruok mane atimo kodgi. An Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi.
Nikech aherogi, omiyo anapar singruok mane atimo gi kweregi, mane agolo e piny Misri mana kane ogendini neno mondo an Jehova Nyasaye abed Nyasachgi.”
Magi e buche, chike kod yore mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo jo-Israel e Got Sinai kokadho kuom Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo inyisgi ni: ‘Ka ngʼato ochiwo singo makende ni obiro chiwo ngʼato ni Jehova Nyasaye, eka bangʼe oyudo ni ok onyal chopo singruokneno, to nengo monego wargo ngʼatno ema:
Ngʼama dichwo ma hike chakore piero ariyo nyaka piero auchiel, en to noware mana gi shekel piero abich mag fedha, ma gin shekel mitiyogo e kama ler mar lemo.
To dhako ma bende hike romo kamano to nowar gi shekel piero adek.
To ka ngʼatno hike chakre abich nyaka piero ariyo, to noware gi shekel piero ariyo ka en dichwo, to ka en dhako to noware gi shekel apar.
To ka ngʼatno hike pok ochopo abich to osekadho dwe achiel, to noware gi shekel abich mar fedha ka en nyathi ma wuowi, to ka en nyako to noware gi shekel adek.
To ka ngʼatno hike chakore piero auchiel kadhi malo, to nochul shekel apar gabich ka en dichwo, to ka en dhako to noware gi shekel apar.
Kaponi ngʼat mane osingoreno odhier ma ok nyal chulo nengo ma oketneno, to nokaw ngʼatni mondo otere e nyim jadolo, kendo jadolo noyiene mondo ochul mana gima nokwongʼore ni onyalo.
“ ‘Ka ngʼato osingore ni obiro chiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye chiayo minyalo timgo misango, to gima ochiwono nobed mowal ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Ok oyiene wilo chiayono mondo oket moro kare, bedni orach kata ober, bende ok onyal wile gi gimoro amora. To kaponi otimo kamano, to nyaka ongʼe ni chiayono kod mokwongo giduto koro ginibed mowal ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka chiayo mane osingono obedo mogak ma ok nyal timgo misango ni Jehova Nyasaye, to chiayono chuno ni nyaka kele e nyim jadolo,
mondo jadolo onon ka ober kata ka orach. Nengo moro amora ma jadolo oketo ema nobed nengo chiayono.
To ka wuon chiayono dwaro waro chiacheno, to nyaka omed achiel ewi abich mar nengone.
“ ‘Ka ngʼato ochiwo ode mondo obed gima owal ni Jehova Nyasaye, to jadolo mondo onon odno kober kata korach. To nengo moro amora ma jadolo oketo ema nobed nengo odno.
To ka wuon odno dwaro waro odeno, to nyaka omed achiel ewi abich mar nengone, eka odno noduogne.
“ ‘Ka ngʼato ochiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye bath lope moro, to nyaka nengone romre gi nengo kodhi ma inyalo chwo e puodhono. Nengo kodhi mar shairi midhi chwo e lowono nyaka rom abiriyo ma en shekel piero abich mar fedha.
Kaponi ochiwo lopeno e Higa mar Piero Abich, to nengone osiki mana kamano.
Kaponi ochiwe ka Higa mar Piero Abich oserumo, to jadolo mondo okwan higni modongʼ nyaka chop ndalo mar Higa mar Piero Abich, kendo nengone obed mana maromo gi higni modongʼ-go.
Kaponi ngʼat mane ochiwo lopeno nigi chuny mar ware, to nyaka ochul achiel ewi abich mar nengone, eka puodhono nobed mare.
To kaponi ok odwar waro lopeno, kata ka oseuse ni ngʼato machielo, to koro ok oyiene ware.
Ka ochopo Higa mar Piero Abich mi oweyo puodhono, to nobed gima ler kaka puodho moyangne Jehova Nyasaye chuth, kendo puodhono nodongʼne jadolo kaka mwandune chuth.
“ ‘Ka ngʼato ochiwo ni Jehova Nyasaye puodho mosengʼiewo, ma ok en lop anywola,
to jadolo nigi thuolo mondo ogo nengo maromre kode nyaka chop e Higa mar Piero Abich, kendo ngʼatno nochul nengono mana godiechiengno, kaka gima owal ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka Higa mar Piero Abich osechopo, to puodho nodwok ir ngʼat mane ongʼiewe kuome, ma en wuon lowo hie.
Nengo ka nengo nopim gi nengo shekel mitiyogo e kama ler mar lemo ma shekel achiel romre gi gera piero ariyo.
“ ‘Gimoro amora mokwong nywol kuom jambi gin mag Jehova Nyasaye, bedni gin dhok, kata rombe, omiyo kik ichiwgi kaka gima iwalo ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Kaponi en chiayo mogak ma ok nyal timgo misango ni Jehova Nyasaye, to noware e nengo mogone, komedo achiel ewi abich mar nengone. Kaponi ok oware to nyaka ngʼiewe mana e nengo moketi.
“ ‘Gimoro amora ma ngʼato angʼata osechiwo ni Jehova Nyasaye chuth kuom mwandune ma en godo, bedni en dhano kata chiayo kata lop anywola ok onego ngʼiew kata waro nikech gima osechiw ne Jehova Nyasaye ler moloyo.
“ ‘Ngʼato angʼata mochiwne Jehova Nyasaye mondo okum ok nyal war, to nyaka nege anega.
“ ‘Achiel kuom apar mar gik moko duto ma lowo onyago bedni gin cham, kata olembe duto gin mag Jehova Nyasaye, kendo gin gik maler mowalne.
Ka ngʼato owaro achiel kuom apar mar gige, to nyaka omedie achiel ewi abich mar nengogi.
Chiayo mar apar mokadho e bwo ludh jakwath e kinde ma okwanogi, nobed mowal ni Jehova Nyasaye, bedni gin dhok kata rombe.
Ok oyiene pogo mabeyo gi maricho kata wilogi. To kaponi owilo chiayo moro gi machielo, to chiayono kaachiel gi mowilegono, giduto ginibed gik maler e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo ok nyal wargi.’ ”
Magi e chike mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo Musa ewi Got Sinai ne jo-Israel.
Chiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe mar ariyo e higa mar ariyo Jehova Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa e Hemb Romo e Thim mar Sinai ka jo-Israel nosewuok Misri. Nowachone niya,
“Kaw kwan dhout oganda mar jo-Israel duto kaluwore gi gwengegi kod anywolagi, kindiko nying joma chwo duto moro ka moro.
In kod Harun mondo ukwan jo-Israel kuketogi e migepegi, ma mago jo-higni piero ariyo kadhi nyime nyalo tiyo e lweny.
Kaw ngʼato achiel koa e dhoot ka dhoot, ka moro ka moro otelo ne jog-gi mondo okonyi kweno.
“Magi e nying joma chwo mabiro konyi kweno: “koa kuom joka Reuben, kaw Elizur wuod Shedeur;
koa kuom joka Simeon, kaw Shelumiel wuod Zurishadai;
koa kuom joka Juda, kaw Nashon wuod Aminadab;
koa kuom joka Isakar, kaw Nethanel wuod Zuar;
koa kuom joka Zebulun, kaw Eliab wuod Helon.
Magi e joma chwo mane okaw koa kuom yawuot Josef: koa kuom Efraim, kaw Elishama wuod Amihud; koa kuom Manase, kaw Gamaliel wuod Pedazur;
koa kuom joka Benjamin, kaw Abidan wuod Gideoni;
koa kuom joka Dan, kaw Ahiezer wuod Amishadai;
koa kuom joka Asher, kaw Pagiel wuod Okran;
koa kuom joka Gad, kaw Eliasaf wuod Dewel;
koa kuom joka Naftali, kaw Ahira wuod Enan.”
Magi e joma chwo mane oyier koa e dhoudi, mane gin jotend dhoudigo. Gin ema ne gin jotend dhout Israel.
Musa gi Harun nokawo nying joma nomigi,
kendo negiluongo jogwengʼno duto kanyakla e odiechiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe mar ariyo. Ji nonyiso nonro margi kaluwore gi gwengegi kod anywola mag-gi, kendo joma hikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime nondik nying-gi, moro ka moro,
mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa. Kuom mano ma e kaka Musa nokwanogi e Thim mar Sinai.
Koa kuom nyikwa Reuben ma en wuowi makayo mar Israel: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, achiel ka achiel, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb joka Reuben ne gin ji alufu piero angʼwen gauchiel gi mia abich (46,500).
Koa kuom nyikwa Simeon: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, achiel kaachiel, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb joka Simeon ne gin ji alufu piero abich gochiko gi mia adek (59,300).
Koa kuom nyikwa Gad: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb joka Gad ne gin ji alufu piero angʼwen gabich, mia auchiel gi piero abich (45,650).
Koa kum nyikwa Juda: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb joka Juda ne gin ji alufu piero abiriyo gangʼwen gi mia auchiel (74,600).
Koa kuom nyikwa Isakar: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb joka Isakar ne gin ji alufu piero abich gangʼwen gi mia angʼwen (54,400).
Koa kuom nyikwa Zebulun: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb joka Zebulun ne gin ji alufu piero abich gabiriyo gi mia angʼwen (57,400).
Kuom yawuot Josef: Koa e dhood Efraim: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb joka Efraim ne gin ji alufu piero angʼwen gi mia abich (40,500).
Koa e dhood Manase: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb joka Manase ne gin ji alufu piero adek gariyo gi mia ariyo (32,200).
Koa kuom nyikwa Benjamin: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb dhood Benjamin ne gin ji alufu piero adek gabich gi mia angʼwen (35,400).
Koa kuom nyikwa Dan: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb dhood Dan ne gin ji alufu piero auchiel gariyo gi mia abiriyo (62,700).
Koa kuom nyikwa Asher: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb dhood Asher ne gin ji alufu piero angʼwen gachiel gi mia abich (41,500).
Koa kuom nyikwa Naftali: Chwo duto mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime moromo tiyo e lweny nondik nying-gi, kaluwore gi nonro mar dhoodgi kod anywolagi.
Kar romb dhood Naftali ne gin ji alufu piero abich gadek gi mia angʼwen (53,400).
Magi e joma Musa gi Harun kod jotend Israel apar gariyo nokwano, ka moro ka moro ochungʼ ne anywolane.
Jo-Israel duto ma jo-higni piero ariyo kadhi nyime mane nyalo tiyo e lwenj Israel nokwan kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Kar rombgi ne gin ji alufu mia auchiel gadek mia abich gi piero abich (603,550).
Anywola mar jo-Lawi, kata kamano, ne ok okwan gi joma moko.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Kik ikwan dhood Lawi kata riwogi e kweno mar jo-Israel mamoko.
Kuom mano, yier jo-Lawi mondo obed jorit Hemb Romo mar Rapar kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye. Gin ema nyaka gitingʼ Hemb Romo gi gige; kendo girite maber ka gilwore kod hembegi koni gi koni.
Kamoro amora ma itero e Hema, jo-Lawi ema nyaka gole oko, kendo kamoro amora midhi gure Hema, jo-Lawi ema nyaka gure. Ngʼato angʼata mosudo machiegni kode nyaka negi.
Jo-Israel nyaka gur hembegi e migepe, ka ngʼato ka ngʼato nitiere kare owuon kaluwore gi rangʼiny moketi.
Jo-Lawi, kata kamano, nyaka gur hembegi e alwora mar Hemb Romo mar Rapar mondo omi mirimb Jehova Nyasaye kik lwar kuom oganda mar jo-Israel. Jo-Lawi nobed karito Hemb Romo mar Rapar.”
Jo-Israel notimo gigi duto mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa gi Harun niya,
“Jo-Israel nyaka chokre kolworo Hemb Romo kochwalore matin kode, ka ngʼato ka ngʼato ni e bwo jatendgi kod gima ondikie nying dhoodgi.”
Koa yo wuok chiengʼ, migepe mag joka Juda nodag kanyo kaluwore gi rangʼiny moketi. Jatend Juda ne en Nashon wuod Aminadab.
Migawo mar dhood Juda ne romo ji alufu piero abich gangʼwen gi mia angʼwen (74,600).
Dhood Isakar nodag butgi. Jatend dhood Isakar ne en Nethanel wuod Zuar.
Migawo mar dhood Isakar ne romo ji alufu piero abich gangʼwen gi mia angʼwen (54,400).
Dhood Zebulun noluwogi. Jatend dhood Zebulun ne en Eliab wuod Helon.
Migawo mar dhood Zebulun ne romo ji alufu piero abich gabiriyo gi mia angʼwen (57,400).
Jogo duto mane odak e dala Juda, kaluwore gi migepegi, ne romo ji alufu mia achiel gi piero aboro gauchiel gi mia angʼwen (186,400). Gin e joma biro wuok motelo.
Koa yo milambo nobedie migepe mag Reuben kaluwore gi rangʼiny moketi. Jatend dhood Reuben ne en Elizur wuod Shedeur.
Migawo mar dhood Reuben ne romo ji alufu piero angʼwen gauchiel gi mia abich (46,500).
Dhood Simeon nodag butgi. Jatend dhood Simeon ne en Shelumiel wuod Zurishadai.
Migawo mar dhood Simeon ne romo ji alufu piero abich gochiko gi mia adek (59,300).
Maluwogi ne en dhood Gad. Jatend dhood Gad ne en Eliasaf wuod Reuel.
Migawo mar dhood Gad ne romo ji alufu piero angʼwen gabich gi mia auchiel gi piero abich (45,650).
Jogo duto mane odak e dala Reuben, kaluwore gi migepe mag-gi, noromo ji alufu mia achiel gi piero abich gachiel, mia angʼwen gi piero abich (151,450). Gin ema giniwuogi mar ariyo.
Bangʼe Hemb Romo kod kar dak mar jo-Lawi noket e dier kambe mamoko. Ginichanre mana kaka kuondegi mag bworo ochanore ka jomoko ka jomoko ni kargi giwegi.
Koa yo podho chiengʼ nobedie migepe mag Efraim kaluwore gi rangʼiny moketi. Jatend dhoodno ne en Elishama wuod Amihud.
Migawo mar dhood Efraim noromo ji alufu piero angʼwen gi mia abich (40,500).
Dhood Manase ema nobed butgi. Jatend dhoodno ne en Gamaliel wuod Pedazur.
Migawo mar dhood Manase noromo ji alufu piero adek gariyo gi mia ariyo (32,200).
Maluwogi ne en dhood Benjamin. Jatend dhood Benjamin ne en Abidan wuod Gideoni.
Migawo mar dhood Benjamin noromo ji alufu piero adek gabich gi mia angʼwen (35,400).
Jogo duto mane odak e dala Efraim, kaluwore gi migepe mag-gi noromo ji alufu mia achiel gaboro gi mia achiel (108,100). Gin ema ne giwuok mar adek.
Koa yo nyandwat nobedi migepe mag kuonde dak mag Dan, kaluwore gi rangʼiny moketi. Jatend dhood Dan en Ahiezer wuod Amishadai.
Migawo mar dhood Dan noromo ji alufu piero auchiel gariyo gi mia abiriyo (62,700).
Maluwogi ne en dhood Asher. Jatend dhood Asher ne en Pagiel wuod Okran.
Migawo mar dhood Asher noromo ji alufu piero angʼwen gachiel gi mia abich (41,500).
Maluwogi ne en dhood Naftali. Jatend dhood Naftali ne en Ahira wuod Enan.
Migawo mar dhood Naftali noromo ji alufu piero abich gadek gi mia angʼwen (53,400).
Jogo duto mane odak e dala Dan noromo ji alufu mia achiel gi piero abich gabiriyo, gi mia auchiel (157,600). Gin ema giniwuogi mogik kaluwore gi rangʼiny moketi.
Magi e jo-Israel, mane okwan kaluwore gi dhoutgi. Jogo duto mane nitie kar dak, kaluwore gi migepe mag-gi noromo ji alufu mia auchiel gadek, mia abich gi piero abich (603,550).
Kata kamano, jo-Lawi ne ok okwan gi jo-Israel mamoko, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko Musa.
Omiyo jo-Israel notimo gik moko duto mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiko Musa; mano e yo mane gichokore godo e rangʼiny mag-gi giwegi, kendo mano e kaka negichokore, moro ka moro gi dhoodgi kod joge.
Ma e nonro mar joka Harun kod Musa e kinde mane Jehova Nyasaye owuoyo gi Musa e Got Sinai.
Nying yawuot Harun ne gin Nadab ma wuowi makayo kod Abihu, Eliazar kod Ithamar.
Mago ema ne nying yawuot Harun, mane gin jodolo mowir kendo mopwodhi mondo obed jodolo.
Kata kamano Nadab kod Abihu, notho e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e kinde mane gichiwo misango ma ok opwodhi e Thim mar Sinai. Ne gionge yawuowi; omiyo Eliazar gi Ithamar kende ema nobedo jodolo e ndalo mane Harun wuon-gi pod ngima.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Kel dhood jo-Lawi kendo ichiwgi e nyim jadolo Harun mondo gikonye tich.
Nyaka gitine kaachiel gi oganda duto e nyim Hemb Romo ka gitiyo tije mag kama ler.
Nyaka girit malongʼo gige Hemb Romo duto, ka gichopo chike duto mag jo-Israel monego gitim e Hemb Romo.
Chiw jo-Lawi e lwet Harun gi yawuote nikech gin e joma owal e dhood Israel mondo okonye tich.
Yier Harun kod yawuote mondo obed jodolo; ngʼato angʼata mosudo machiegni gi kama ler mar lemo nyaka negi.”
Jehova Nyasaye nomedo wachone Musa niya,
“Asekawo jo-Lawi koa ei jo-Israel e lo wuowi makayo mar chi ja-Israel moro ka moro. Jo-Lawi gin meka,
nimar yawuowi makayo duto gin meka. Kane anego yawuowi makayo duto e piny Misri, ne awalo ne an awuon kayo moro amora e Israel, obed mar dhano kata mar le mondo gibed maga. An e Jehova Nyasaye.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa e Thim mar Sinai niya,
“Kwan jo-Lawi kaluwore gi joutgi kod anywolagi. Kwan chwo duto chakre ja-dwe achiel kadhi nyime.”
Omiyo Musa nokwanogi, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nomiye chik.
Magi ema ne nyinge yawuot jo-Lawi: Gershon, Kohath gi Merari.
Magi ema ne nying joka Gershon: Libni gi Shimei.
Joka Kohath ne gin: Amram, Izhar, Hebron gi Uziel.
Joka Merari ne gin: Mali gi Mushi. Magi ema ne anywola jo-Lawi, kaluwore gi dhoutgi.
Koa e dhood Gershon, ne nitiere jo-Libni gi Shimei; mago ema ne joka Gershon.
Kar romb chwo duto kochakore ja-dwe achiel kadhi nyime noromo ji alufu abiriyo mia abich (7,500).
Dhout jo-Gershon nonego dag yo podho chiengʼ mar kama ler.
Jatend Gershon ne en Eliasaf wuod Lael.
Tij jo-Gershon e Kar Hemb Romo ne en rito Kama Ler mar Lemo kod hema, kaachiel gi gik moumego, kaka pasia mantiere e dhorangach mar Hemb Romo.
Bende negirito pasia mag laru, pasia mar dhorangach mar laru molworo kama ler gi kendo mar misango kod tonde, kaachiel gi gik moko duto mitwechogo.
E dhood Kohath ne nitiere jo-Amram, jo-Izhar, jo-Hebron, jo-Uziel; magi ema ne anywola joka Kohath.
Kar romb chwo duto kochakore ja-dwe achiel kadhi nyime ne romo ji alufu aboro mia auchiel (8,600). Tij jo-Kohath ne en rito kama ler mar lemo.
Dhood Kohath nonego dagi yo milambo mar kama ler.
Jatend dhout jo-Kohath ne en Elizafan wuod Uziel.
Tijgi ne en rito Sandug Muma, mesa, rachungi mar taya, kende mag misengini, gige kama ler mar lemo mitiyogo tije dolo, pasia, kod gik moko duto mitiyogo tijego.
Jatelo maduongʼ mar jo-Lawi ne en Eliazar wuod Harun jadolo. En ema ne oyiere bedo jatelo mag joma rito kama ler mar lemo.
E dhood Merari ne nitiere jo-Mali kod jo-Mushi; magi ema anywola joka Merari.
Kar romb chwo duto kochakore ja-dwe achiel kata moloyo dwe achiel mane okwan ne romo ji alufu auchiel mia ariyo (6,200).
Jatend dhout Merari ne en Zuriel wuod Abihail. Nonego gidagi yo nyandwat mar kama ler.
Joka Merari noyier mondo orit sirni mag kama ler mar lemo, yiend reru, sirni mamoko, mise, kaachiel gi gige duto kod gik moko duto mitiyogo kanyo,
kaachiel gi sirni mochungʼ molworo laru man-gi mise, sigingi mag hema kod tonde.
Musa kod Harun gi yawuote nonego dagi yo wuok chiengʼ mar Hemb Romo. Tijgi ne en rito kama ler mar lemo e lo jo-Israel. Ngʼato angʼata mane osudo machiegni gi kama ler mar lemo nyaka ne negi.
Kar romb jo-Lawi duto mane okwan kaluwore gi chik mane Jehova Nyasaye ogolo kokadho kuom Musa kod Harun kaluwore gi anywolagi ne gin ji alufu piero ariyo gariyo (22,000), magi ne gin kaachiel gi nyithindo duto ma yawuowi kochakore ja-dwe achiel kadhi nyime.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Kwan nyithindo ma yawuowi makayo duto mag Israel kochakore ja-dwe achiel kadhi nyime kendo indik nyingegi piny.
Ket jo-Lawi obedna kaka kayo e lo kayo duto mag jo-Israel, kendo kaw jamb jo-Lawi obed e lo kweth makayo mag jamb jo-Israel. An e Jehova Nyasaye.”
Omiyo Musa nokwano nyithindo makayo duto mag jo-Israel, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Kar romb nyithindo ma yawuowi duto makayo ma ja-dwe achiel kadhi nyime, kondik nying-gi moro ka moro ne romo ji alufu piero ariyo gariyo, mia ariyo gi piero abiriyo gadek (22,273).
Jehova Nyasaye nochako owachone Musa niya,
“Ket jo-Lawi mondo obedna kaka kayo e lo jo-Israel, kendo jamni mag jo-Lawi e lo jambgi. Jo-Lawi nyaka bed maga. An e Jehova Nyasaye.
Mondo omi ires jo-Israel makayo ji mia ariyo piero adek gabiriyo ma kwan-gi ohewo kwan midwaro mar jo-Lawi,
chok shekel abich ne ngʼato ka ngʼato, kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ma pekne romo gera piero ariyo.
Mi Harun kod yawuote pesa miwarogo jo-Israel momedore.”
Omiyo Musa nochoko pesa kuom joma ne omedore e kwan mane jo-Lawi oreso.
Koa kuom kayo mag jo-Israel nochoko fedha ma pekne en shekel alufu mia achiel mia adek gi piero auchiel gabich (1,365), kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo.
Musa nochiwo ne Harun kod yawuote pesa miwarogo jo-Israel momedore mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa gi Harun niya,
“Kwan jo-Kohath ma gin bad jo-Lawi kaluwore gi gwengegi kod dhoutgi.
Kwan chwo duto mahikgi chakore piero adek nyaka piero abich mabiro tiyo e Hemb Romo.
“Tij jo-Kohath e Hemb Romo en rito gik maler moloyo.
Ka udar kama ujote, to Harun kod yawuote nyaka donji ei hema mi gigol pasia kendo giumgo Sandug Muma.
Bangʼe gium nangani gi piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nembe, kendo giyar suka marambulu bangʼe giket sirni mitingʼego.
“Nyaka gipedh mesa manie Nyim Nyasaye gi kitamba marambulu, bangʼe giket sende e wiye, gi dise kod bakunde, gi njage mar chiwo misango miolo piny; bende gine ni makati man kanyo seche duto kik rum.
Nyaka gipedh nanga ewi gigi duto kendo giumgi gi piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nembe bangʼe giket sirni mitingʼego.
“Nyaka gikaw nanga marambulu kendo gium rachungi taya ma en kar keto gima chiwo ler, kaachiel gi techene, gi gima ingʼadogo otambi kod odheru, kod njage duto mikanoe mo.
Bangʼe to nyaka giume gi piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nembe kaachiel gi gige duto kendo gikete e sirni mitingʼego.
“Nyaka gipedh nanga marambulu ewi kendo mar misango mar dhahabu bangʼe giume gi piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nembe kendo giket sirni mitingʼego kuonde mowinjore.
“Nyaka gikaw gik moko duto motiyogo e tij dolo e kama ler mar lemo, kendo gibogi gi suka marambulu, kod piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nembe, bangʼe giketgi e sirni mitingʼego oliero liero.
“Nyaka gigol buru oko e kendo mar misango mar mula bangʼe gipedh suka maralik e wiye.
Bangʼ mano giniket gik michiemogo mag dolo e kar kendo mar misango, kaachiel gi gige chiedo, uma mar chwoyo ringʼo, opawo kod bakunde mikirogo remo. Nyaka gipedh raum mar piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nembe e wiye kendo giket sirni mitingʼego kuonde mowinjore.
“Bangʼ ka Harun gi yawuote osetieko umo gik maler mitiyogo kod gik maler duto mamoko, kendo ka kambi oseikore mar wuok, to jo-Kohath koro nyaka bi mondo oti tij tingʼo. Kik gimul gik maler, nimar ka gitimo kamano to ginitho. Jo-Kohath nyaka tingʼ gigo mantiere ei Hemb Romo.
“Eliazar wuod Harun, jadolo, nochungʼne mo mar taya, ubani mangʼwe ngʼar, chiwo mar cham michiwo kinde ka kinde, kod mor pwodhruok. Nyaka obed jarit mar kar lemo duto kod gik moko duto manie iye, kaachiel gi gik maler molosego kod gik moko duto mokan kanyo.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa gi Harun niya,
“Neuru ni dhout jo-Kohath ok ogol oko kuom jo-Lawi,
mondo omi gibed mangima kendo kik githo ka gibiro machiegni gi gik maler moloyo. Timnegiuru kama: Harun gi yawuote mondo odhi ei kama ler mar lemo kendo gimi ngʼato ka ngʼato tije kod gima onego otingʼ.
To dhout jo-Kohath kik donji nikech dipo ka gigoyo wangʼ-gi kuom gik maler mi githo.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Kwan joka Gershon kaluwore gi anywolagi kod dhoutgi.
Kwan chwo duto mahikgi en piero adek nyaka piero abich, ma gin joma obiro konyo tich mar Hemb Romo.
“Ma e tich ma joka Gershon biro timo ka gitiyo kendo ka gitingʼo misigo:
Gibiro tingʼo pasia moumgo kar lemo, Hemb Romo, gik moumego kod piende monyongʼ mayom mag le mag nam moumgo wiye, moumgo dhoranga Hemb Romo,
pasia mag laru molworo kar lemo kod kendo mar misango, pasia mar dhorangach, tonde kod gik moko duto mitiyogo kanyo. Joka Gershon nyaka ti tije duto madwarore mondo oti kanyo.
Tijegi duto, bedni en tingʼo kata tich moro amora nyaka tim ka Harun kod yawuote ema oteloe. Unupog-gi tich monego gitim.
Ma e tich ma dhout Gershon onego tim e Hemb Romo. Ithamar wuod Harun jadolo ema notelne tijegi.
“Kwan jo-Merari kaluwore gi dhoutgi kod anywolagi.
Kwan joma chwo duto mahikgi piero adek nyaka piero abich mabiro konyo e tich mar Hemb Romo.
Ma e tich ma gibiro tiyo e Hemb Romo: ginitingʼ yiende moten-go kar lemo, fito mage, sirni kod mise,
kaachiel gi sirni molworo laru man-gi mise, sigingi mag hema, tonde, gi gik moko duto mitiyogo kanyo kendo ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka mi gik monego otingʼ.
Ma e tich ma dhood Merari onego ti e Hemb Romo kotelnegi gi Ithamar wuod Harun jadolo.”
Musa, Harun kod jotend oganda mar jo-Israel nokwano jo-Kohath kaluwore gi dhoutgi kod anywolagi.
Chwo duto mahikgi piero adek nyaka piero abich mane obiro tiyo e tij Hemb Romo,
kokwan kaluwore gi dhoutgi, ne romo ji alufu ariyo mia abiriyo gi piero abich (2,750).
Mano e kar romb jogo duto mane oa e dhout jo-Kohath mane otiyo e Hemb Romo. Musa kod Harun nokwanogi kaluwore gi chik mane Jehova Nyasaye ogolo kokalo kuom Musa.
Jo-Gershon nokwan kaluwore gi dhoutgi kod anywolagi.
Chwo duto mahikgi piero adek nyaka piero abich mane obiro tich e Hemb Romo,
kokwan kaluwore gi dhoutgi kod anywolagi, ne romo ji alufu ariyo mia auchiel gi piero adek (2,630).
Mano e kar romb jogo mane oa e dhout anywola mar Gershon mane otiyo e Hemb Romo. Musa kod Harun nokwanogi kaluwore gi chik Jehova Nyasaye.
Jo-Merari nokwan kaluwore gi dhoutgi kod anywolagi.
Chwo duto mahikgi piero adek nyaka piero adek gabich mane obiro chiwo kony e tich mar Hemb Romo,
kokwan kaluwore gi dhoutgi ne romo ji alufu adek gi mia ariyo (3,200).
Ma e kar kwan joka Merari duto. Musa kod Harun nokwanogi kaluwore gi chik mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiwo kokalo kuom Musa.
Omiyo Musa, Harun kod jotend Israel nokwano jo-Lawi duto kaluwore gi dhoutgi kod anywolagi.
Chwo duto mahikgi piero adek nyaka piero abich mane obiro tiyo e Hemb Romo
ne romo ji alufu aboro mia abich gi piero aboro (8,580).
Kaluwore gi chik Jehova Nyasaye mane omiyo Musa, ngʼato ka ngʼato nomi tije. Kuom mano nokwan-gi, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Mi jo-Israel chik mondo oriemb ngʼato angʼata man-gi tuo mar del kata man-gi tuo magolo tutu kata ngʼat ma ok ler nikech osemulo ringre ngʼama otho.
Riemb chwo kod mon duto mondo giwuok oko mar kambi; kik ginjaw kambi nikech adak e diergi.”
Jo-Israel notimo kamano; mine giriembogi oko mar kambi. Negitimo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wachne jo-Israel kama: ‘Ka dichwo kata dhako okwinyo wadgi e yo moro amora kendo obedo ngʼama ok ja-ratiro ne Jehova Nyasaye, ngʼatno oketho
kendo nyaka ohul richo mosetimono. Nyaka ochiw chudo duto mar kethone, omed achiel kuom abich ewi chudono bangʼe ochiwe duto ne ngʼat mosekethone.
Ka ngʼat ma okethneno onge gi watne moro amora ma inyalo mi chudono, to chudono en mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo nyaka chiwe ne jadolo, ka itere gi im ma ikwayonego pwodhruok kuom richo.
Chiwo duto mowal ma jo-Israel kelo gin mek jadolo.
Chiwo mowal mar ngʼato ka ngʼato en mare owuon, ka osechiwe ne jadolo nobed mar jadolo.’ ”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo iwachnegi kama: ‘Ka chi ngʼato ok obedo ja-adiera kendo ok obedo ja-ratiro
mi oterore gi dichwo moro, kendo timni opandore ne chwore ma ok ongʼere (nikech onge janeno mane onene kendo ne ok omake randoo),
kendo ka nyiego omako chwor dhakono mi ochich kode, to chiegeno ochido, kata kapo ni nyiego omake kode kendo ochich kode kata obedo ni ok ochido,
to chworeno nyaka tere ir jadolo bed ni dhakono osedwanyore adier kata chwore chich mana kode kayiem. Bende nyaka oter chiwo mar achiel kuom apar mar efa mar mogo mar shairi e lo jaode. Ok onego ool mo kuome kata keto gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar kuome, nikech en chiwo mar cham mar ketho chich, tiende ni en chiwo mifwenyogo adiera.
“ ‘Jadolo nokel dhakono mochungʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka notuom pi maler e agulu kendo nojow buru moa e dier kama ler mar lemo mi okwo e pigno.
Bangʼ ka jadolo osekelo dhakono mochungʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, enogony yie wiye eka noket chiwo mifwenyogo adiera e lwete ma en chiwo mar cham mitiekogo chich. Jadolo to notingʼ pi mar muma mifwenyogo adiera e lwete owuon.
Eka jadolo noket dhakono kwongʼre kowacho niya, “Kaonge dichwo moseterore kodi kendo pod ok ibedo ja-adiera mibedo modwanyore kendo weyo yo ma ibedo mogak ka ingʼeyo ni in dhako man kod chwore, to mad pi makechni makelo kwongʼ kik hinyi.
To ka en adier ni isedwanyori, mi ngʼato oterore kodi, kingʼeyo ni in chi ngʼato,”
to jadolo nokwongʼ dhakono niya, “Jehova Nyasaye mondo omi iyi ogore piny, kata omi ibwog nyathi ka kindene mar nywol pok ochopo, kibedogo ranyisi ne jou kuom wach kwongʼruok.
Mad pigni donj e iyi kendo omi iyi kirre kata omi ibwog nyathi ka kinde mar nywolne pok ochopo.” “ ‘Bangʼe dhakono nodwok kawacho niya, “Amin. Mad obed kamano.”
“ ‘Nyaka jadolo ndik kwongʼ-gi e Kitabu bangʼe olingʼ-gi ei pi makechno.
Enoket dhakono mondo omodh pi makech makelo kwongʼ, kendo pigni nodonj e iye mi kelne sand mager.
Jadolo nokaw chiwo mar cham mar golo chich koa e lwet dhakono, mi nofwaye e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo okele e kendo mar misango.
Eka jadolo nojuk chiwo mar cham mopongʼo lwete kaka chiwo mar rapar kendo nowangʼe ewi kendo mar misango; bangʼ mano, noket dhakono omodh pigno.
Ka dipo ni osedwanyore en owuon kendo ok osebedo ja-ratiro ne chwore, to nokete omodh pigno makelo kwongʼ, kendo ma nomi obed gi sand mager; ma mi obwog nyathi ka ndalone pok ochopo kendo ngʼama okwongʼ e kind ogandane.
To ka dipo ni dhakono ok odwanyore kendo ok ochido, nokete thuolo mi ochak onywol nyithindo kendo.
“ ‘Ma e chik mar tieko chich ka dhako ok ja-adiera kendo odwanyore, kongʼeyo ni pod en dhako man-gi chwore,
kata ka gimoro otimore ma chwore ochich kode. Jadolo nokete ochungʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo nyaka oket chikni ne dhakoni.
Dichwo nobed maonge ketho moro amora, to dhakono ibiro kum ne richo mage.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo kod jo-Israel kendo inyisgi kama: ‘Ka dichwo kata dhako dwaro chiwo singruok makende, ma en singruok makende ne Jehova Nyasaye kaka ja-Nazir,
to nyaka owe madho divai kod math mamoko moket e thowi kendo ok onego omadh kongʼo kata kongʼo moa kuom math mamoko moket e thowi. Ok onego omadh gimoro amora molos gi olemb mzabibu, kata chamo olemb mzabibu manumu kata motwo.
E kinde duto ma en ja-Nazir, ok onego ocham gimoro amora mowuok kuom olemb mzabibu, bed ni en kothe kata opokone.
“ ‘E thuoloni duto ma en e bwo singruok mar bedo tenge, wiye ok noliel gi wembe. Enorite maler ne Jehova Nyasaye nyaka ndalone mag kwongʼruok norum; kendo enopidh yie wiye maboyo.
“ ‘E thuoloni duto ma en e bwo singruok mar bedo tenge ne Jehova Nyasaye, ok onego osud machiegni gi ringre ngʼama otho.
Bed ni wuon-gi kata min-gi kata owadgi kata nyamin-gi ema otho, to ok onego obed mogak, nikech ranyisi mar bedo ngʼat mowal ne Nyasaye ni e wiye.
E kindeno duto ma okete tenge, en ngʼama owal ne Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Ka dipo ni ngʼato otho bute, mi yie wiye mosewal ogak, to nyaka oliel yie wiyeno chiengʼ mar abiriyo mipwodhee.
To chiengʼ mar aboro nyaka okel akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ne jadolo e dhoranga Hemb Romo.
Jadolo nochiw achiel kaka misango mar golo richo to machielo kaka misango miwangʼo pep mar kwayone ngʼwono nikech notimo richo kuom bedo kama ringre ngʼama otho nitie. E odiechiengno nyaka opwodh wiye.
E kindeno duto mokete tenge nyaka ochiwre ne Jehova Nyasaye kendo okel nyaim ma hike achiel kaka misango michiwo mar pwodhruok e ketho. To kinde mane osetieko kowale ok nokwan nikech yie wiye mane nyiso ni owaleno ne odoko mogak.
“ ‘Koro mano e chik momi ja-Nazir ka kinde mokete tenge orumo kendo nyaka kele e dhoranga Hemb Romo.
E dhorangach kanyo ema nyaka ochiwe misangone ne Jehova Nyasaye ma gin: nyaim ma hike achiel maonge songa kaka misango miwangʼo pep, sibini ma hike achiel maonge songa kaka misango migologo richo; im maonge songa kaka chiwo mar lalruok,
kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham kod misango miolo piny, kod okapu mopongʼ gi makati ma ok oketie thowi kaka kek molos gi mogo mayom moru gi mo, kod chapat mowir gi mo.
“ ‘Jadolo nochiwgi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mar pwodhruok e richo kod misango miwangʼo pep.
Bende nochiw okapu man-gi makati ma ok oketie thowi kod im kaka misango mar lalruok ne Jehova Nyasaye, kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham kod misango miolo piny.
“ ‘Bangʼe e dhoranga Hemb Romo, ja-Nazirno nyaka liel yie wiye mane osewal tenge. Enokaw yie wiyeno mi olute e mach mantiere e bwo misango mar chiwo mar lalruok.
“ ‘Bangʼ ka ja-Nazirno oselielo yie wiye mane osewal tenge, jadolo nomiye bad im mosechwaki, kod kek kod chapat mogoloe okapu, mago molos ma ok oketie thowi.
Bangʼ mano jadolo noliergi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo; kaachiel gi agoko kod em mane olier nimar gin gik mopwodhi kendo gin mek jadolo. Bangʼ timo kamano, ja-Nazir koro nyalo mana madho divai.
“ ‘Mano e chik momako ja-Nazir mosekwongʼore kaluwore gi pwodhruok mare kendo mano e misango manyaka otimne Jehova Nyasaye kaachiel gi gimoro monyalo chiwo. Nyaka ochop singo mar kwongʼruok mane ochiwo, kaluwore gi chik mar ja-Nazir.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Nyis Harun kod yawuote ni, ‘Ma e kaka onego ugwedh jo-Israel. Wachnegi kama:
“ ‘Jehova Nyasaye mondo ogwedhu kendo oritu;
Wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye mondo orieny kuomu kendo omiu ngʼwono mogundho;
Jehova Nyasaye orangu maber kendo omiu kwe.’
“Kamano e kaka ginihul nyinga kuom jo-Israel, kendo anagwedhgi.”
Kane Musa osetieko gero hekalu, nogwedhe, kendo owale gi gik moko duto manie iye. Bende nogwedho kendo owalo kar kendo mar misango kod gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono.
Eka jotelo mag Israel, ma gin jotelo mag anywola ma bende ema jotend dhoudi mane ochungʼ ne jogo mane okwan, nochiwo misengini.
Chiwo mane gikelo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ne gin geche auchiel moum wiye gi rwedhi mabwoch apar gariyo. Jatelo ka jatelo nogolo rwadh bwoch achiel bende jotelo ariyo noriwore mochiwo gari achiel moum wiye. Gigi duto negikelo e nyim hekalu.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Kaw gigi koa kuomgi, mondo iti kodgi e tij Hemb Romo. Migi jo-Lawi kaluwore gi tich ngʼato ka ngʼato.”
Omiyo Musa nokawo gechego kod rwedhi ma buochgo mi ochiwogi ne jo-Lawi.
Nomiyo jo-Gershon geche ariyo kod rwedhi mabwoch angʼwen, kaluwore gi tijgi,
kendo nomiyo jo-Merari geche angʼwen kod rwedhi mabwoch aboro, kaluwore gi tijgi. Giduto ne gin e bwo loch Ithamar ma wuod Harun jadolo.
To joka Kohath, Musa ne ok omiyogi gimoro amora nikech tich mane omigi ne en mar tingʼo gik maler.
Kane osegwedh kendo mar misango, jotelo nokelo chiwo mag-gi mag gweth kendo nochiwgi e nyim kendo mar misango.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye nosewacho ne Musa niya, “Odiechiengʼ ka odiechiengʼ jatelo achiel nyaka kel misango mare mar gwedho kendo mar misango.”
Ngʼatno mane okelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mokwongo ne en Nashon wuod Aminadab moa e dhood Juda.
Chiwo mare ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar fedha mokuoyogo pi ma pekne en shekel piero abiriyo. Magi nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka chiwo mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
rwath matin achiel, im achiel kod nyaim achiel matin ma hike achiel, nochiw misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel mar kaka misango mar golo richo;
kod rwedhi ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich kod nyiimbe abich mahikgi oromo higa achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Magi e misengini mane Nashon wuod Aminadab ogolo.
Nethanel wuod Zuar, ma jatend Isakar nokelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mar ariyo.
Misango mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar kwoyo pi mar fedha ma pekne en shekel piero abiriyo. Magi nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka chiwo mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
nyarwath achiel, im achiel kod nyaim achiel ma hike achiel, kaka misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel kaka misango mar golo richo;
kod rwedhi mabwoch ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich kod nyiimbe abich mahikgi achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Magi e misengini mane Nethanel wuod Zuar ogolo.
Eliab wuod Helon, ma jatend jo-Zebulun nokelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mar adek.
Misango mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar fedha mar kwoyo pi ma pekne en shekel piero abiriyo. Giduto nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo moru gi mo kaka misango mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne ne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
nyarwath achiel, im achiel kod nyaim achiel ma hike achiel kaka misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel kaka misango mar golo richo;
kod rwedhi mabwoch ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich gi nyiimbe abich ma jo-higa achiel, nochiw misango mar lalruok. Magi e misengini mane Eliab wuod Helon ogolo.
Elizur wuod Shedeur, ma jatend joka Reuben nokelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mar angʼwen.
Misango mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar fedha mar kwoyo pi ma pekne en shekel piero abiriyo. Mago nokel ka giluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka misango mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
rwath matin achiel, im achiel kod nyaim achiel matin ma hike achiel, nochiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel kaka misango mar golo richo;
kod rwedhi ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich kod nyiimbe mahikgi oromo higa achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Magi e misengini mane Elizur wuod Shedeur ochiwo.
Shelumiel wuod Zurishadai, ma jatend joka Simeon nokelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mar abich.
Misango mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar fedha mar kwoyo pi ma pekne en shekel piero abiriyo. Mago nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka misango mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
rwath matin achiel, im achiel kod nyaim matin achiel ma hike achiel, nochiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel kaka misango mar golo richo;
gi rwedhi ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich kod nyiimbe mahikgi oromo higa achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Magi e misengini mane Shelumiel wuod Zurishadai ochiwo.
Eliasaf wuod Dewel, ma jatend joka Gad nokelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mar auchiel.
Misango mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar fedha mar kwoyo pi ma pekne en shekel piero abiriyo. Mago nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka misango mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
rwath matin achiel, im achiel kod nyaim matin achiel ma hike achiel, nochiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok kaka misango mar golo richo;
gi rwedhi mabwoch ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich kod nyiimbe abich ma jo-higa achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Magi e misengini mane Eliasaf wuod Dewel ochiwo.
Elishama wuod Amihud, ma jatend joka Efraim nokelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo.
Misango mare mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar fedha mar kwoyo pi ma pekne en shekel piero abiriyo. Mago nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka misango mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne ne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
rwath matin achiel, im achiel kod nyaim matin achiel ma hike achiel, nochiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel kaka misango mar golo richo;
gi rwedhi mabwoch ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich kod nyiimbe abich ma jo-higa achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Mago e misengini mane Elishama wuod Amihud ochiwo.
Gamaliel wuod Pedazur, ma jatend joka Manase, nokelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mar aboro.
Misango mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar fedha mar kwoyo pi ma pekne en shekel piero abiriyo. Mago nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka misango mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
rwath matin achiel, im achiel kod nyaim matin achiel ma hike achiel, nochiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel kaka misango mar golo richo;
gi rwedhi mabwoch ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich, kod nyiimbe abich ma jo-higa achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Mago e misengini mane Gamaliel wuod Pedazur ochiwo.
Abidan wuod Gideoni, ma jatend joka Benjamin, nokelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mar ochiko.
Misango mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul mar fedha mar kwoyo pi ma pekne ne en shekel piero abiriyo. Mago nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka misango mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
rwath matin achiel, im achiel kod nyaim achiel ma hike achiel, nochiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel kaka misango mar golo richo;
gi rwedhi mabwoch ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich gi nyiimbe abich ma jo-higa achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Mago e misengini mane Abidan wuod Gideoni ochiwo.
Ahiezer wuod Amishadai, ma jatend joka Dan, nokelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mar apar.
Misango mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar fedha mar kwoyo pi ma pekne ne en shekel piero abiriyo. Mago nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka misango mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne ne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
rwath matin achiel, im achiel kod nyaim matin achiel ma hike achiel, nochiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel kaka misango mar golo richo;
gi rwedhi mabwoch ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich gi nyiimbe abich ma jo-higa achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Mago e misengini mane Ahiezer wuod Amishadai ogolo.
Pagiel wuod Okran, ma jatend joka Asher, nokelo misango mare odiechiengʼ mar apar gachiel.
Misango mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar fedha mar kwoyo pi ma pekne ne en shekel piero abiriyo. Mago nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka misango mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne ne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
rwath matin achiel, im achiel kod nyaim achiel ma hike achiel, nochiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel kaka misango mar golo richo;
gi rwedhi mabwoch ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich gi nyiimbe abich ma jo-higa achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Mago e misengini mane Pagiel wuod Okran ochiwo.
Ahira wuod Enan, ma jatend joka Naftali, nokelo misango mare e odiechiengʼ mar apar gariyo.
Misango mare mane okelo ne en san achiel mar fedha ma pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kod bakul achiel mar fedha mar kwoyo pi ma pekne ne en shekel piero abiriyo. Mago nokel kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ka moro ka moro opongʼ gi mogo mayom moru gi mo kaka misango mar cham;
bakul achiel mar dhahabu ma pekne ne en shekel apar, mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar;
nyarwath achiel, im achiel kod nyaim achiel ma hike achiel, nochiw misango miwangʼo pep;
nywok achiel kaka misango mar golo richo;
gi rwedhi mabwoch ariyo, imbe abich, nywogi abich kod nyiimbe abich ma jo-higa achiel, nochiw kaka misango mar lalruok. Mago e misengini mane Ahira wuod Enan ochiwo.
Misengini mane jotend jo-Israel okelo e kinde mane ogwedh kendo mar misango e magi: sende mag fedha apar gariyo, bakunde mag fedha mag kwoyo pi apar gariyo kod dise mag dhahabu apar gariyo.
San ka san mar fedha pekne ne en shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, kendo bakul ka bakul mar kwoyo pi pekne ne en shekel piero abiriyo. Dise duto mag fedha pekgi noromo shekel alufu ariyo gi mia angʼwen (2,400), kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo.
Dise apar gariyo mag dhahabu mane opongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar pekgi noromo shekel apar moro ka moro, kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo. Dise duto mag dhahabu pekgi noromo shekel mia achiel gi piero ariyo.
Kar kwan mar jamni mane ochiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep noromo nyirwedhi apar gariyo, imbe apar gariyo kod nyiimbe apar gariyo mahikgi achiel, kaachiel gi misango mag cham. Nywogi apar gariyo notigo kaka misango mar golo richo.
Kar kwan jamni duto mane ochiw kaka misango mar lalruok noromo rwedhi mabwoch piero ariyo gangʼwen, imbe piero auchiel, nywogi piero auchiel kod nyiimbe piero auchiel ma jo-higa achiel. Magi e misengini mane ochiw e kendo mar misango kane osepwodhe.
Kane Musa odonjo e Hemb Romo mondo owuo gi Jehova Nyasaye, nowinjo dwond Jehova Nyasaye kawuoyo kode koa e kind kerubi ariyo manie wi raum mar Sandug Muma mar Singruok. Kendo Musa nowuoyo kode.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi Harun kendo iwachne kama: ‘Ka iketo teyni abiriyo kuonde mowinjore, to nyaka ler margi meny nyim rachung taya.’ ”
Harun notimo kamano; noketo teyni kuonde mowinjore ka gimenyo nyim rachung taya, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko Musa.
Ma e kaka rachung taya nolosi: Nolose gi dhahabu mothedhi chakre e bwoye nyaka wiye malo. Rachung taya nolosi mana kaka ranyisi mane Jehova Nyasaye osenyiso Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wal jo-Lawi e kind jo-Israel mamoko kendo pwodhgi gibed maler.
Kipwodhogi, to itim kama: Kwo pi mipwodhogigo kuomgi; bangʼe giliel yie dendgi duto kendo giluok lepgi, eka gibed joma opwodhi.
Nyisgi gikaw nyarwath kaachiel gi misango mar cham mar mogo mayom moru gi mo; bangʼe ikaw nyarwath matin mar ariyo kaka misango mar golo richo.
Kel jo-Lawi e nyim Hemb Romo kendo ichok oganda duto mar dhood Israel.
Nyaka ikel jo-Lawi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, mondo jo-Israel nyaka oyie lwetgi kuomgi.
Harun nyaka kel jo-Lawi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo koa kuom jo-Israel, mondo omi gibed moikore ne tij Jehova Nyasaye.
“Bangʼ ka jo-Lawi oseketo lwetgi ewi rwedhigo, to chiw achiel kuomgi ne Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mar golo richo, to machielo chiw kaka misango miwangʼo pep mipwodhogo jo-Lawi mondo ngʼwon-nigi.
Ket jo-Lawi ochungʼ e nyim Harun kod yawuote bangʼe ichiwgi kaka misango mifwayo ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Ma e kaka onego iwal jo-Lawi e kind jo-Israel mamoko mondo obed maga.
“Bangʼ ka isepwodho jo-Lawi kendo ichiwogi kaka misango mifwayo, to nyaka gibi mondo gitim tijgi e Hemb Romo.
Gin e jo-Israel manyaka chiw chuth ne an. Asekawogi kaka meka awuon e lo kayo ma en nyodo mokwongo ma wuowi mar ja-Israel.
Nyathi moro amora ma wuowi mokwongo ma ja-Israel bed ni en dhano kata chiayo, en mara. Kane anego kayo duto man Misri, ne awalogi gibedo maga.
Bende aseketo jo-Lawi duto obedo e lo yawuowi makayo e Israel.
Kuom jo-Israel duto, asechiwo jo-Lawi kaka mich ne Harun gi yawuote mondo giti tij lemo e Hemb Romo e lo jo-Israel kendo mondo gikelnegi resruok kuom masira manyalo mako jo-Israel ka gisudo machiegni gi kama ler mar lemo.”
Musa gi Harun kod oganda jo-Israel duto notimone jo-Lawi gigo duto mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiko Musa.
Jo-Lawi nopwodhore giwegi kendo negiluoko lepgi. Bangʼ mano Harun nochiwogi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mifwayo mi notimonegi misango mondo opwodhgigo.
Bangʼ mano, jo-Lawi nobiro tiyo tijgi e Hemb Romo kotelnegi gi Harun kod yawuote. Negitimone jo-Lawi mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Ma e kaka jo-Lawi biro tiyo: Joma chwo mahikgi piero ariyo gabich kata moloyo kanyo nobi mondo obed achiel kuom jotich e Hemb Romo,
to ka giromo higni piero abich, to giniwe tich.
Ginyalo konyo owetegi e tije mag Hemb Romo, to gin giwegi ok onego gimul tich moro amora. Ma e kaka ibiro pogo tije ne jo-Lawi.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa e Thim mar Sinai e dwe mokwongo mar higa mar ariyo bangʼ kane gisewuok Misri. Nowachone niya,
“Ket jo-Israel otim nyasi mar Pasaka e kinde moketne mowinjore.
Tim nyasini e kinde moketne, ma en kinde mag odhiambo mar odiechiengʼ mar apar gangʼwen mar dweni, kaluwore gi chikene kod buchene duto.”
Omiyo Musa nowacho ne jo-Israel mondo otim nyasi mar Pasaka,
kendo negitimo kamano e Thim mar Sinai e kinde mag odhiambo mar odiechiengʼ mar apar gangʼwen mar dwe mokwongo. Jo-Israel notimo gik moko duto mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
To jomoko kuomgi ne ok obedo e nyasi mar Pasaka e odiechiengʼno nikech negibedo mogak bangʼ mulo ringre joma otho. Omiyo negibiro ir Musa kod Harun mana godiechiengno
mi giwachone Musa niya, “Wasebedo mogak nikech wamulo ringre joma otho, to en angʼo momiyo ditamwa chiwo misango ne Jehova Nyasaye kaka jo-Israel mamoko e kinde moketne?”
Musa nodwokogi niya, “Horeuru nyaka angʼe gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho kuomu.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Nyis jo-Israel kama: ‘Ka ngʼato angʼata kuomu kata nyikwau obedo mogak nikech ringruok motho kata ka gidhi wuoth, to pod ginyalo mana timo nyasi mar Pasaka mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Nyasini ginitim chiengʼ mar apar gangʼwen mar dwe mar ariyo e seche mag odhiambo. Ginicham nyarombo, kaachiel gi makati ma ok oketie thowi kod alode makech.
Kik giwe chiemogo machop okinyi bende kik gitur choke rombono. E kinde ma gitimo nyasi mar Pasaka nyaka gine ni giluwo chike duto.
To ka ngʼat ma ok ogak kendo ma ok odhi wuoth otamore timo nyasi mar Pasaka, ngʼatno nyaka gol oko kuom jogi nikech ne ok ochiwo misango ne Jehova Nyasaye e kinde moketne. Ngʼat ma kamano noyud kum moromore gi richone.
“ ‘Japiny moro modak kodu madwaro timo nyasi mar Pasaka mar Jehova Nyasaye nyaka tim kamano kaluwore gi chikene kod buchene. Nyaka ubed gi chike machalre ne japiny moro kod ngʼat monywol e gwengʼno.’ ”
E odiechiengʼ mane osetiek gero kar lemo, ma en Hema mar Singruok, bor polo noume. Chakre odhiambo nyaka okinyi bor polo mane oumo kar lemo ne chalo ka mach.
Mano e kaka nochalo ka bor polo oume godiechiengʼ to gotieno ochalo ka mach.
E kinde moro amora ma bor polo ne oa ewi Hema, jo-Israel ne chako wuoth; to e kinde ma bor polo nopiyo ewi Hema, jo-Israel ne goyo kambi.
Kane Jehova Nyasaye ogolo chik, to jo-Israel ne chako wuoth, kendo kane ogolo chik to negigoyo kambi. E kinde duto ma bor polo nosiko ewi kar lemo, negisiko e kambi.
Kane bor polo osiko koumo kar lemo kuom thuolo malach, jo-Israel norito buche Jehova Nyasaye kendo ne ok giwuok.
Seche moko bor polo neumo kar lemo kuom ndalo manok kende; to ka Jehova Nyasaye nogolo chik to negidak, bangʼe kochako ogolo chik to gichako wuoth.
Seche moko bor polo ne ni kanyo chakre odhiambo nyaka okinyi kende, to kane oyawore gokinyi to negichako wuoth. Bed ni en odiechiengʼ kata otieno, to e kinde ma bor polo noyawore, negichako wuoth.
Bed ni bor polo nosiko koumo kar lemo kuom ndalo ariyo, dwe achiel kata higa achiel, to jo-Israel ne siko e kambi kendo ne ok gichak wuoth; to ka bor polono ne oyawore, to negichako wuoth.
Kane Jehova Nyasaye ogolo chik negibet e kambi, kendo kane ochako ogolo chik to negichako wuoth. Negirito weche Jehova Nyasaye, kaluwore gi chik mane ochiwo kokalo kuom Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
Los turumbete ariyo mag fedha mothedhi, kendo ti kodgi kuom choko oganda duto kanyakla mondo mi gichak wuoth.
Ka turumbete ariyogi oywak, to ogandagi mondo ochokre e nyimi e dhoranga Hemb Romo.
Ka turumbete achiel kende ema oywak, to jotelo mag oganda, jo-Israel nyaka chokre e nyimi.
Ka turumbete oywak, to dhoudi mantie yo wuok chiengʼ nyaka chak wuoth.
Ka turumbete mar ariyo oywak, to dhoudi mantie yo milambo nyaka chak wuoth. Ywak mar turumbeteno ema nobed ranyisi mar chako wuoth.
Ka ichoko ji kanyakla, to ywak turumbetego nyaka pogre.
“Yawuot Harun, ma gin jodolo, ema nogo turumbete. Ma en chik mosiko ne un kod tiengʼ mabiro.
Ka udhi kedo gi wasiku ma thirou e pinyu owuon, to nyaka ugo turumbete. Bangʼe Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noparu kendo noresu e lwet wasiku.
Bende e kinde ma un gi mor, ma gin kinde sewni moyier kaka nyasi mar Dwe Manyien, nyaka ugo turumbete e kinde muchiwoe misengini miwangʼo pep kod misengini mag lalruok, nikech ginibednu rapar e nyim Nyasachu nimar An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.”
E odiechiengʼ mar piero ariyo mar dwe mar ariyo e higa mar ariyo, bor polo nowuok ewi Hemb Romo mar Sandug Muma mar Singruok.
Eka jo-Israel nowuok koa e Thim mar Sinai kendo ne giwuotho kuonde duto nyaka bor polo nopie e Thim mar Paran.
Chako wuodhgi mokwongo notimore bangʼ ka Jehova Nyasaye nosegolo chik kokalo kuom Musa.
Jo-Juda ema ne okwongo wuok ka gin e bwo bandechgi, kotelnegi gi Nashon wuod Aminadab.
Dhood Isakar notelnegi gi Nethanel wuod Zuar,
to Eliab wuod Helon notelo ne dhood Zebulun.
Bangʼe ne gibano Hemb Romo, kendo joka Gershon kod joka Merari mane otingʼe, nochako wuoth.
Dhood joka Reuben nowuok bangʼ-gi ka gin e bwo bandechgi, kotelnegi gi Elizur wuod Shedeur.
Dhood Simeon notelnegi gi Shelumiel wuod Zurishadai,
to Eliasaf wuod Dewel notelo ne dhood Gad.
Bangʼe jo-Kohath nochako wuoth ka gitingʼo gik maler nikech Hemb Romo nyaka ne gur kapok gichopo.
Bangʼe jo-Efraim nochako wuoth ka gin e bwo bandechgi kotelnegi gi Elishama wuod Amihud.
Dhood Manase notelnegi gi Gamaliel wuod Pedazur,
to Abidan wuod Gideoni notelo ne dhood Benjamin.
Dhood Dan ema ne ochako wuoth mogik e bwo bandechgi kotelnegi gi Ahiezer wuod Amishadai.
Dhood Asher notelne gi Pagiel wuod Okran,
to Ahira wuod Enan notelo ne dhood Naftali.
Ma e kaka chenro mar jo-Israel nobet kane gichako wuoth.
Musa nowacho ne Hobab wuod Reuel ja-Midian, ma en jaduongʼne niya, “Wawuok wadhi kama Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni obiro miyowa. Kuom mano bi kodwa mondo wadhi e piny maber mane Jehova Nyasaye osingo ne jo-Israel kendo wabiro miyi kar dak.”
Nodwoke niya, “Ooyo, ok anadhi kodu; to adok thurwa ir jowa.”
Musa to nowachone niya, “Ka iyie to kik iwewa. In ema ingʼeyo kambi monego wadhi wadagie thimni, kendo in e wangʼwa.
Ka idhi kodwa, to wabiro pogoni gimoro amora maber ma Jehova Nyasaye omiyowa.”
Omiyo ne giwuok ka gia e got mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo ne giwuotho kuom ndalo adek. Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye nodhi nyimgi e ndalo adekgo mondo oiknegi kama ginyalo yweyoe.
Bor polo mar Jehova Nyasaye noumogi godiechiengʼ kane giwuok e kargi mar bworo.
Pile kane gisechako wuoth gi Sandug Muma, Musa ne wacho niya, “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, aa malo! Mad wasiki okee; kendo jomamon kodi oringi oa e nyimi!”
Kinde duto mane oyie Sandug Muma piny, Musa ne wacho niya, “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, duogi ir oganda jo-Israel mangʼenygi.”
Kane koro ji ngʼur ne Jehova Nyasaye kuom chandruok mane gineno, kendo kane owinjo ngʼurgino mirimbe nomedore. Kuom mano mach mane oa kuom Jehova Nyasaye noliel e kindgi mi owangʼo bath kambi konchiel.
Kane ji oywak ne Musa, ne olamo Jehova Nyasaye mi mach notho.
Omiyo kanyo noluong ni Tabera (tiende ni Kama Mach osewangʼo) nikech mach moa kuom Jehova Nyasaye nosewangʼo bath kambi konchiel e kindgi.
Joma yoreyore mane obiro kodgi nochako dwaro chiemo mamoko, kendo jo-Israel nochako ywak kawacho niya, “Mad debed ni wan gi ringʼo ma wanyalo chamo!
Mano kaka waparo rech mane wachamo Misri maonge chudo moro amora, bende waparo olembe mopogore opogore, kitungu kod kitungu marachar.
Koro sani waonge gi ndhandhu mar chiemo; kendo ok wane gimoro amora makmana manna-gi!”
Manna-no ne chalo gi kothe matindo tindo marachere kendo ma kitgi ne chalo gi duogo.
Ji ne wuok gokinyi michok manna-go bangʼe giregogi e pongʼ lwedo kata yokogi e pany. Ne gitedogi e agulu kata dwalogi ka ngʼama dwalo makati. Bende ne gichalo gimoro molos gi mo zeituni.
Kane thoo omako kambi gotieno, to manna bende ne lwar piny.
Musa nowinjo ji duto moa e anywola ka anywola kaywak, ka moro ka moro ochungʼ e dho hembe. Jehova Nyasaye iye nomedo owangʼ kendo kihondko nomako Musa.
Nopenjo Jehova Nyasaye niya, “En angʼo momiyo isekelo chandruok ma kama ne jatichni? En angʼo ma asetimo ma ok mori momiyo imiya tingʼ mapek mar jogi duto?
Bende ne amako ich mar jogi duto? Bende ne anywologi? Angʼo momiyo iwachona mondo akaw tingʼ-gi ka atingʼogi e kora mana kaka japidi tingʼo nyithindo matindo, mondo atergi e piny mane isingori ne kweregi ni nitergie.
Dayud ringʼo madirom jogi kanye? Gisiko ka giywakna ni, ‘Miwa ringʼo mondo wacham!’
Ok anyal tingʼo jogi duto kenda awuon; gipek mohewa.
Ka mano e kaka idwaro tiyo koda, to nega sani, to ka dipo ni ikecha, to yie iwe miya chandruok ma kama.”
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa kama: “Kelna jodong Israel piero abiriyo ma ingʼeyo ni jotelo kendo ruodhi. Kelgi e Hemb Romo kendo gichungʼ kodi kanyo.
Abiro lor mondo awuo kodi kanyo, kendo abiro kawo teko mar loch moko kuomi mane amiyi kendo ami jogo. Gibiro konyi rito ogandano makoro tingʼno ok noturi kendi.
“Nyis jo-Israel kama: ‘Pwodhreuru ka uikoru ne kiny ma ubiro chamoe ringʼo; nimar Jehova Nyasaye osewinjo ywak maru niya, “Mad dibed ni nitie kama wanyalo yudoe ringʼo mwachamo! Ne wawinjo maber e piny Misri!” Omiyo koro Jehova Nyasaye nomiu ringʼo, ma ubiro chamo.
Ok unuchame mana kuom ndalo achiel kende, kata ndalo ariyo, kata ndalo abich, kata apar kata piero ariyo,
to unuchame kuom dwe achiel, manyaka othingʼu mi ungʼogi nikech usedagi Jehova Nyasaye modak e kindu kendo useywak e nyima, kuwacho niya, “Angʼo momiyo ne waa Misri?” ’ ”
To Musa nodwoko niya, “Antie gi ji alufu mia achiel mawuotho gi tiendgi, to in to iwacho ni, ‘Abiro miyogi ringʼo moromogi chamo kuom dwe achiel mangima!’
Bende ginyalo yiengʼ ka kweth mag jamni kod kweth mag dhok oyangʼ duto? Bende ginyalo yiengʼ ka rech duto manie nam omaknegi?”
Jehova Nyasaye nopenjo Musa niya, “Bende nitie gima nyalo tamo Jehova Nyasaye? Kawuononi ibiro ngʼeyo ka wechena gin adier kata ok adier.”
Omiyo Musa nowuok kendo nonyiso ji gima Jehova Nyasaye nowacho. Nokelo jodong-gi piero abiriyo ma gichokore kanyakla kendo noketogi duto gichungʼ ka gilworo Hemb Romo.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nolor e bor polo mi owuoyo kode, kendo nokawo teko moko mane osemiye mi omiyo jodongo piero abiriyogo. Kane Roho odonjo kuomgi, ne gikoro wach, to bangʼ mano ne ok gichako gitimo kamano kendo.
Kata kamano, ji ariyo ma nying-gi Eldad kod Medad, mane osekwan kaachiel gi jodongo piero abiriyo-ka nodongʼ e kambi. To kata kane ok gidhi e Hemb Romo kamano, Roho nobiro kuomgi mi gikoro wach e kambi.
Rawera moro noringo mi odhi ir Musa mowachone niya, “Eldad kod Medad koro wach e kambi.”
Joshua wuod Nun, mane jakony Musa chakre tin-ne, nowacho ne Musa niya, “Ruodha, kwergi!”
To Musa nodwoko niya, “Nyiego omaki nikech wachna? Mad ne oganda duto mag Jehova Nyasaye bed jonabi mi oket Roho mare kuomgi!”
Eka Musa kod jodong Israel nodok e kambi.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye notugo yamo mokelo aluru koa e nam. Yamo nokelogi ma gichokore e alwora mar kambi madirom fut adek koa piny, kendo kama ne gichokoreno ne nyalo romo wuoth mar ndalo achiel.
Odiechiengno duto kod otieno gi odiechiengʼ maluwe duto ji nowuok kendo nochoko aluru. Onge ngʼama nochoko aluru matin ne atonge apar. Bangʼe ne gimoyogi e kambi mondo gituo.
To kane pok gimuonyo ring alurugo, mirimb Jehova Nyasaye nomedore kuomgi, kendo nonegogi gi masira malich.
Omiyo kanyo noluongi ni Kibroth Hatava, nikech kanyo ema ne giyikoe joma ne wuoch ringʼo omako.
Koa Kibroth Hatava, ji nodhi nyaka Hazeroth kendo negidak kanyo.
Miriam kod Harun nochako wuoyo marach kuom Musa nikech jaode ma nyar jo-Kush, nimar ne onywomo nyar Kush.
Negipenjore niya, “Bende Jehova Nyasaye osewuoyo kokalo kuom Musa kende? Donge osewuoyo kokalo kuomwa bende?” Kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowinjo ma.
(Musa ne en ngʼama obolore, ngʼat mobolore moloyo ngʼato angʼata manie wangʼ piny.)
Gikanyono Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa, Harun kod Miriam niya, “Wuoguru oko e Hemb Romo karu ji adekgo.” Omiyo giduto ne giwuok oko.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nolor e bor polo; mochungʼ e dho Hemb Romo kendo noluongo Harun gi Miriam. Kane gibiro kargi ji ariyogo,
nowachonegi niya, “Winjuru wechena: “Ka janabi mar Jehova Nyasaye nitie e dieru, to abiro afwenyorane, kendo awuoyo kode e lek.
To ma ok en adiera kuom jatichna Musa; nikech en ja-ratiro e oda duto.
En awuoyo kode wangʼ gi wangʼ, awuoyo kode maler ma ok gi ngeche; kendo oneno tich Jehova Nyasaye. Angʼo momiyo ne ok uluor ka uwuoyo kuom jatichna Musa?”
Mirimb Jehova Nyasaye nomedore kuomgi, kendo no-aa oweyogi.
Kane bor polo owalore oa ewi Hemb Romo, Miriam noa malo ka dende obawore gi dhoho mobedo marachar ka pe. Harun nolokore mongʼiye kendo noneno ka en-gi dhoho,
kendo nowacho ne Musa niya, “Yaye, ruodha, kik iwe wachul gowi mar richo kata obedo ni wasetimo gima ofuwoni.
Kik iweye ochal gi nyathi mobwogi ma aa ei min-gi ka en-gi ringruok mokethore.”
Omiyo Musa noywak ne Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Yaye Nyasaye, yie ichange!”
Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko Musa niya, “Ka wuon-gi ne nyalo ngʼudho olawo e wangʼe, donge dine obedo gi wichkuot kuom ndalo abiriyo? Wale obed tenge kuom ndalo abiriyo; bangʼ mano inyalo duoge e kambi.”
Omiyo Miriam nobedo oko mar kambi kuom ndalo abiriyo, kendo ji nochungʼ kar tiendgi nyaka ne odwogo.
Bangʼ mano, ji nowuok Hazeroth kendo negigoyo kambi e Thim mar Paran.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Or jomoko odhi onon piny Kanaan, ma onego ami jo-Israel. Koa e dhoot ka dhoot manie oganda inior achiel kuom jotendgi.”
Kaluwore gi dwond Jehova Nyasaye, Musa noorogi ka gia e Thim mar Paran. Jogi duto ne gin jotend jo-Israel.
Magi e nying-gi, koa e dhood Reuben ne en Shamua wuod Zakur;
koa e dhood Simeon, ne en Shafat wuod Hori;
koa e dhood Juda, ne en Kaleb wuod Jefune;
koa e dhood Isakar, ne en Igal wuod Josef;
koa e dhood Efraim, ne en Hoshea wuod Nun;
koa e dhood Benjamin, ne en Palti wuod Rafu;
koa e dhood Zebulun, ne en Gadiel wuod Sodi;
koa e dhood Manase (ma en dhood Josef), ne en Gadi wuod Susi;
koa e dhood Dan, ne en Amiel wuod Gemali;
koa e dhood Asher, ne en Sethur wuod Mikael;
koa e dhood Naftali, ne en Nabi wuod Vofsi;
koa e dhood Gad, ne en Geuel wuod Maki.
Magi e nying chwo mane Musa ooro mondo onon piny Kanaan. (Musa nomiyo Hoshea wuod Nun nying ni Joshua.)
Kane Musa oorogi mondo gidhi ginon piny Kanaan, nowachonegi niya, “Luwuru Negev kendo udhi nyaka piny manie got.
Nonuru ane pinyno kaka chalo, mondo ungʼego ni joma odak kanyo gin thuondi koso ngoche, gingʼeny koso ginok?
Nonuru ane kaka piny ma gidakieno chalo, ka ober kata orach? Nonuru ane mier ma gidakie nichalo nade, ochielgi koso ok ochielgi?
Lopno, to chalo nade? En lowo mamiyo koso motwo? Bende en gi yiende koso oongego? Temuru beru mondo ukel olembe moko mag pinyno.” (Ndalono ne en kinde keyo mokwongo mar mzabibu.)
Omiyo ne giwuok kendo neginono pinyno kochakore Thim mar Zin nyaka Rehob, kagichomo Lebo Hamath.
Ne giwuotho mi gikadho piny Negev nyaka gichopo Hebron, kama Ahiman, Sheshai kod Talmai, ma nyikwa Anak nodakie. (Hebron noger higni abiriyo motelone Zoan manie piny Misri.)
Kane gichopo e Holo mar Eshkol, ne gitongʼo bad yath achiel motingʼo pumbi mar olemb mzabibu. Ji ariyo kuomgi notingʼe e luth kaachiel gi gik mongʼinore kod ngʼowu.
Kanyo niluongo ni Holo mar Eshkol nikech negingʼado bad olemb mzabibu mochiek.
Bangʼ ndalo piero angʼwen negidwogo ka gia nono pinyno.
Negidwogo ir Musa gi Harun kod oganda jo-Israel duto e dala Kadesh manie Thim Paran. Kanyo ema ne gimiyogi dwoko kaachiel gi chokruok duto kendo neginyisogi olemo machiek e pinyno.
Negimiyo Musa nonro machalo kama: “Ne wadhi e piny mane iorowae, kendo en piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich! Olemo moa kuno eri.
Joma odak kuno nigi teko mangʼeny, kendo gidakie mier madongo mochiel motegno kendo malich. Bende ne waneno nyikwa Anak kuno.
Jo-Amalek odak Negev; jo-Hiti, jo-Jebus kod jo-Amor odak e piny manie got; to jo-Kanaan odak machiegni gi dho nam e alwora mar Jordan.”
Eka Kaleb nokwero ji mondo olingʼ e nyim Musa kendo nowacho niya, “Wadhiuru kendo wakaw pinyno, nimar wanyalo kawe.”
To joma nodhi kode kuno nowacho niya, “Ok wanyal monjo jogo; gitek moloyowa.”
Omiyo ne gilandone jo-Israel dwoko marachni kuom piny mane gidhi nono. Negiwacho niya, “Piny mane wadhi nono nego joma odak eigi. Ji mane waneno kuno gin joma robede.
Ne waneno Nefilim kuno (nyikwa Anak aa kuom jo-Nefilim). Ne wanenore mana ka ongogo, to bende mano e kaka ne wachalo e nyimgi.”
Otienono oganda duto mag gwengʼ notingʼo dwondgi malo mi giywak matek.
Jo-Israel duto nongʼur ne Musa kod Harun, kendo chokruok mar oganda duto nowachonegi niya, “Donge dine ber ka watho Misri? Kata mana e thim ka!
Angʼo momiyo Jehova Nyasaye kelowa e pinyni mondo negwa gi ligangla? Mondewa kod nyithindwa ibiro kaw mana kaka gik moyaki. Donge deber ka wadok Misri?”
Kendo negiwacho e kindgi giwegi niya, “Onego wayier jatelo mondo wadog Misri.”
Eka Musa kod Harun nopodho auma e nyim chokruok mar oganda Israel duto mane ochokore kanyo.
Joshua wuod Nun kod Kaleb wuod Jefune, ma gin achiel kuom joma ne odhi nono piny Kanaan, noyiecho lepgi
mi owacho ne chokruok mar oganda jo-Israel duto niya, “Piny mane wakalo e iye kendo wanono ber miwuoro.
Ka dipo ni Jehova Nyasaye mor kodwa, to obiro telonwa nyaka e pinyno, piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich, kendo obiro miyowa pinyno.
Gima utim en ni kik ungʼanyne Jehova Nyasaye. Kik uluor jopinyno, nikech wabiro mwonyogi duto. Jarit mag-gi osea, to wan to Jehova Nyasaye nikodwa kendo kik uluorgi.”
