To chokruok mar oganda duto nowuoyo e kindgi giwegi mondo gichielgi gi kite. Eka duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye nothinyore ne jo-Israel duto e Hemb Romo.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Nyaka karangʼo ma jogi biro jarae? Nyaka karangʼo ma jogi biro tamore yie kuoma, kata bangʼ timo honni mopogore opogore e kindgi?
Abiro negogi gi masira mi atiekgi chuth, to un to abiro miyou ubed oganda maduongʼ kendo motegno moloyogi.”
Musa noywak ne Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Jo-Misri ongʼeyo wachni malongʼo ni in ema nigolo jo-Israel oa kuomgi gi tekoni iwuon.
Kendo gibiro nyiso jopinyni wachni. To bende gisewinjo ni in, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, oseneni kitelonegi godiechiengʼ gi boche mag polo, to gotieno itelonegi gi pilni mar mach.
Ka inego jogi duto dichiel, to oganda mabiro winjo wach machalo kama kuomi biro wacho niya,
‘Jehova Nyasaye ne ok nyal chopo gi jogi e piny mane osingorenegi kokwongʼore, momiyo ne onegogi e thim.’
“Mad koro teko Jehova Nyasaye oyangre malongʼo, mana kaka isewacho:
‘Jehova Nyasaye ok kech piyo, to en gihera mogundho kendo oweyo ne ji richogi kendo ongʼwono ne joma ongʼanyo. To kata kamano, joma oketho ok nyal we ma ok okum; okumo nyithindo kuom richo mag wuonegi nyaka tiengʼ mar adek kata nyaka tiengʼ mar angʼwen.’
Kaluwore gihera mari maduongʼ, yie iwene jogi richo mag-gi, mana kaka isebedo ka ingʼwononegi chakre gia Misri nyaka sani.”
Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko niya, “Aseweyonegi richogi mana kaka ne ikwayo.
Kata kamano, akwongʼora gi nyinga awuon kod duongʼ mara mopongʼo piny,
ni onge kata mana ngʼato achiel kuomgi mane oneno duongʼ mara kod ranyisi mag honni mane atimo Misri kendo e thim, to ne ok owinja kendo otema nyadipar; ma nochopi e piny mane asingonegi.
Bende onge kata mana ngʼato achiel kuomgi mabiro neno piny mane asingone kweregi ka akwongʼora. Ngʼato angʼata ma osenyisa achaya ok none pinyno.
To nikech jatichna Kaleb nigi chuny mopogore kod mag-gi kendo ma luwa gi chunye duto, abiro tere e piny mane odhiyoeno, kendo nyikwaye nokaw pinyno kaka girkeni margi.
To nikech jo-Amalek kod jo-Kanaan odak e kuonde mag holo, dwoguru kiny kendo udhi e thim mantiere e yo mochiko Nam Makwar.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa kod Harun niya,
“Nyaka karangʼo ma oganda ma timbegi richogi biro ngʼur koda? Asewinjo ngʼur mar jo-Israel ma jo-mibadhigi.
Omiyo nyisgiuru ni Jehova Nyasaye owacho ni, ‘Akwongʼora gi nyinga awuon, ni abiro timonu mana gigo mane awinjo kuwacho:
Ringreu nolwar mana e thimni; ngʼato angʼata kuomu ma hike piero ariyo ka dhi nyime mane okwan e ndalo kweno kendo mosengʼur koda.
Onge ngʼato angʼata kuomu manodonji e piny mane asingone katingʼo bada malo mondo obed dalau, makmana Kaleb wuod Jefune kod Joshua wuod Nun.
To kuom nyithindu mane uwacho ni ibiro kaw kaka gik moyaki, gin to abiro kelogi mondo giyud mor mar piny mane udagi.
To un, ringreu nodongʼ e thim.
Nyithindu nobed jokwath e pinyni kuom higni piero angʼwen, ka giyudo thagruok nikech bedou maonge gi ratiro, nyaka ane ni ringre ngʼama ogik odongʼ e thim.
Ne ubet ka unono pinyno kuom ndalo piero angʼwen, omiyo unuchul richou kuom higni piero angʼwen, ka higa achiel ikwano kar ndalo achiel, mi unufweny malongʼo gima omiyo akwedou.’
An, Jehova Nyasaye, asewacho, kendo abiro timo gigi adieri ne oganda ma timbegi richogi, moseriwore mar kweda. Giko mar ngimagi notimre e thim; kendo kae ema gibiro thoe.”
Omiyo joma Musa ne oseoro mondo odhi onon pinyno, mi odwogo kendo omiyo oganda duto ma timbegi richogi ongʼur kode kaluwore gi wach marach mane gikelo kuom pinyno;
jogi mane okelo wach marachni kuom pinyno noneg-gi gi masira e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Kuom joma nodhi nono pinyno, Joshua wuod Nun kod Kaleb wuod Jefune kende ema notony.
Ka Musa nowacho ne jo-Israel duto wachni kendo ne giywak gi lit ahinya.
Kiny gokinyi mangʼich ne giwuok mi gidhi e piny manie got. Negiwacho niya, “Wasetimo richo. Wabiro dhi nyaka kama Jehova Nyasaye nosingo.”
To Musa nowachonegi niya, “Angʼo momiyo utamoru winjo chik Jehova Nyasaye? Mano ok bi timore!
Kik udhi kuno, nikech Jehova Nyasaye oseweyou. Wasiku biro lou,
nimar jo-Amalek kod jo-Kanaan noked kodu kuno. Nikech useweyo Jehova Nyasaye, ok enodhi kodu kendo nonegu gi ligangla.”
To kata kamano, ne ok gidewo wachno, mi gichako dhi malo e piny got, to Musa kata Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye ne ok owuok e kambi.
Eka jo-Amalek kod jo-Kanaan mane odak e piny got nolor mwalo mi omonjogi kendo neginegogi duto ma gichopo nyaka Horma.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo iwachnegi ni, ‘Bangʼ ka usedonjo e piny mamiyouni kaka kar dak
kendo uchiwone Jehova Nyasaye misengini miwangʼo pep koa kuom kweth mag dhok kata mag jamni, kaka gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye bed ni gin misengini miwangʼo pep, chiwo mar hera, chiwo mag kwongʼruok kata mago mag nyasi.
Bangʼe ngʼama kelo chiwo mare nokelne Jehova Nyasaye chiwo mar cham maromo achiel kuom apar mar efa mar mogo mayom moruw gi achiel kuom angʼwen mar lita mar mo.
Bende nyaka uchiw achiel kuom angʼwen mar lita mar divai mondo obed misango miolo piny kuom nyarombo ka nyarombo mutimogo misango miwangʼo pep kata misango mar nyasi.
“ ‘Ka chiayo mitimogo misangono en im, to mogo mitimogo misango mar cham nyaka bed kilo angʼwen gi nus moruw gi mo moromo lita achiel gi nus,
kendo uchiw lita achiel gi nus mar divai kaka misango miolo piny. Kamano e kaka unuchiwne Jehova Nyasaye misango madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar ne Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘To ka en nyarwath ema utimogo ne Jehova Nyasaye misango miwangʼo pep, kata misango mar sawo, kaka singruok mowal kata chiwo mar lalruok ne Jehova Nyasaye,
to ukel rwath kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham maromo kilo ariyo mar mogo mayom moru gi nus mar lita mar mo.
Bende ukel nus mar lita mar divai kaka misango miolo piny. Obiro bedo chiwo mowangʼ miwangʼo, ma en gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye.
Rwath ka rwath, im ka im, rombo ka rombo, kata nyadiel ka nyadiel, nyaka losi e yo machal kamano.
Timuru ma ne misengini duto mag jamni moro ka moro.
“ ‘Ngʼato angʼata monywol e pinyni ma ja-Israel nyaka tim gigi, ka okelo chiwo molos gi mach kaka gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye.
To ne tiengʼ mabiro, kinde duto ma japiny moro kata ngʼato angʼata modak e kindu okelo misango molos gi mach kaka gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye, nyaka otim mana kaka utimo.
Oganda jo-Israel nyaka bed gi chike machalre ne tiengʼ mabiro kod jopinje mamoko; ma en singo mochwere ne tiengʼ mabiro. Un kod jopinje mamoko nubed machalre e nyim Jehova Nyasaye:
Chik achiel ema omakou machalre gi jopinje mamoko modak e dieru.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo iwachnegi kama: ‘Ka udonjo e piny ma ateroue,
kendo uchamo chiemb pinyno, to uchiw bathe moko kaka misango ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Chiw cham moa e nyak mokwongo mar lopi kendo ichiwe kaka misango moa e laru mar dino cham.
E tienge duto mabiro nyaka ugol misangoni ne Jehova Nyasaye koa e nyak mokwongo mar lopi.
“ ‘Ka e kia maru ok urito chike mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo Musa,
ma gin chike mane omiyou kokalo kuome, chakre e kinde mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiwogie kendo ka gidhi nyime nyaka e tienge mabiro;
to ka ma otim maonge chenro ka oganda ok ongʼeyo, to oganda duto nochiw nyarwath matin kaka misango miwangʼo pep ma en gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye, kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham kod misango miolo piny, kod nywok kaka misango mar golo richo.
Jadolo notim pwodhoruok ne oganda duto mag jo-Israel, kendo nowenegi richogi, nimar ne ok gingʼeyo gima negitimo kendo gisekelone Jehova Nyasaye misango mowangʼ pep kuom ketho margi kod misango mar golo richo.
Oganda duto mag jo-Israel kod jopinje mamoko manie dieru nowenegi richogi, nikech ji duto notimo richo ka ok gingʼeyo.
“ ‘To ka ngʼato achiel ema otimo richo ka ok ongʼeyo, to nyaka ochiw diel madhako ma ja-higa achiel kaka misango mar golo richo.
Jadolo notim pwodhruok e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ne ngʼatno motimo richo ka ok ongʼeyo, kendo ka osetimne pwodhruok, nowene richo.
Chik achielno ema oket ne ngʼato angʼata motimo richo ka ok ongʼeyo, bed ni en jakanyo ma ja-Israel kata japiny moro.
“ ‘To ka ngʼato otimo richo gi wangʼ matek, bed ni en japinyno kata japiny moro, to ojaro Jehova Nyasaye, kendo ngʼat makamano onego ogol oko e dier jogi.
Nikech osejaro wach Jehova Nyasaye kendo oketho chikene, ngʼatno nyaka gol oko; kendo richo mare nodongʼ e wiye.’ ”
Kane jo-Israel ne nitie e thim, ngʼat moro noyud ka modo yien chiengʼ Sabato.
Joma ne oyude ka omodo yien nokele ir Musa gi Harun kod chokruok duto,
kendo ne gikane e od twech, nikech ne ok ongʼere malongʼo gima onego timne.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Ngʼatno nyaka negi. Chokruok duto nyaka chiele gi kite e oko mar kambi.”
Omiyo ogandago nogole oko mar kambi kendo negichiele gi kite motho, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo iwachnegi kama: ‘Ne tiengʼ duto mabiro nyaka umin usi e riak lepu ka usi moro ka moro olwor gi kido marambulu.
Usi momin molier e riak lepugo nomi unupar chike duto mag Jehova Nyasaye, mondo omi uritgi ma ok uteroru gi gombo mag chunjeu kod wengeu uwegi.
Bangʼ mano unupar mar rito chikena duto kendo nowalu tenge ne Nyasachu.
An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mane ogolou Misri mondo obed Nyasachu. An Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.’ ”
Kora wuod Izhar, ma wuod Kohath, ma wuod Lawi, kod joka Reuben moko kaka Dathan gi Abiram, ma yawuot Eliab kod On wuod Peleth noriwore kaachiel
kendo negichokore mondo giked gi Musa. Kaachiel kodgi ne nitiere jo-Israel mia ariyo gi piero abich, ma jotend oganda mongʼere mane oseyier kaka jakanyo mar bura.
Negibiro kaka oganda achiel mochokore mondo giked gi Musa kod Harun kendo negiwachonegi niya, “Usetimo mokalo tongʼ! Oganda duto ler, ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomgi, kendo Jehova Nyasaye ni kodgi. En angʼo momiyo koro uketoru malo moloyo oganda mar Jehova Nyasaye?”
Kane Musa owinjo wachno, nopodho piny auma.
Eka nowacho ne Kora kod jolupne duto niya, “Kochopo gokinyi Jehova Nyasaye noyier joma oyie kuome kendo maler, kendo norwak ngʼatno obi bute.
To in, Kora, kod joma luwou duto nyaka tim ma: Kawuru ubani
kendo kiny umok mach kod gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Ngʼatno ma Jehova Nyasaye oyiero ema nobed ngʼama ler. Un jo-Lawi usekalo tongʼ!”
Musa bende nowacho ne Kora niya, “Koro Winjuru, un jo-Lawi!
Ok lichnu ni Nyasach Israel osegolou oko mar oganda jo-Israel mamoko kendo okelou bute owuon mondo uti e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo mondo uchung e nyim oganda kendo utinegi?
Osekelou kod jo-Lawi weteu duto bute, to koro sani utemo bedo jodolo bende.
Un kaachiel gi joma luwou duto usengʼanyo ni Jehova Nyasaye. Harun to en ngʼa ma ungʼurne?”
Eka Musa noluongo Dathan kod Abiram, ma yawuot Eliab. To negiwacho niya, “Ok wanabi!
Ok lichni ni isegolowa e piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich mondo inegwa e thim? Kendo sani koro idwaro miyowa tingʼ mapek?
Kata kamano, pod ok ikelowa e piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich kata miyowa girkeni mag puothe kod puothe mag mzabibu. Ubiro lodho wenge jogi oko? Ngangʼ, ok wanabi!”
Eka Musa iye nowangʼ matek mi owachone Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Kik iyie gi misengini mag-gi. Pod ok akawo kata mana punda achiel koa kuomgi, kata mana kethone ngʼato angʼata kuomgi.”
Musa nowacho ne Kora niya, “In kaachiel gi jolupni duto kod Harun bende nyaka ubi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka kaw tape owuon ma mach ni e yie kendo oketie ubani mangʼwe ngʼar madirom mia ariyo gi piero abich mi uchiwe e nyim Jehova Nyasaye in kaachiel gi Harun.”
Omiyo ngʼato ka ngʼato nokawo tape owuon ma mach nitie iye kendo oketoe ubani mangʼwe ngʼar mine gichungʼ kod Musa gi Harun e dhoranga Hemb Romo.
Kane Kora osechoko joge duto mondo okwedgo Musa gi Harun e dhoranga Hemb Romo, duongʼ Jehova Nyasaye ne onyisore ayanga ne oganda mane ochokore duto.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa kod Harun niya,
“Pogreuru gi kanyakla mar ogandani mondo omi atiekgi chuth.”
To Musa kod Harun nopodho auma moywak niya, “Yaye Nyasaye, mongʼeyo chunje duto mag dhano, iyi diwangʼ gi kanyakla mar ogandagi duto ka en mana ngʼato achiel ema otimo richo?”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa ni,
“Wachne kanyakla mar oganda kama: ‘Daruru uwuog machiegni gi hembe Kora, Dathan kod Abiram.’ ”
Musa noa malo modhi ir Dathan kod Abiram, kendo jodong Israel noluwe.
Nochiwo siem ne kanyakla mar oganda niya, “Suduru mabor gi hembe jogo ma timbegi richo! Kik umul girgi moro amora, ka ok kamano to ubiro lal nono nikech richo mag-gi.”
Omiyo negisudo mabor gi hembe mag Kora, Dathan kod Abiram. Dathan kod Abiram nosewuok oko kendo negichungo gi mondegi, nyithindgi kod rowere mag-gi e dhoranga hembegi.
Eka Musa nowacho niya, “Ma e kaka ubiro ngʼeyo ni Jehova Nyasaye ema noora mondo atim gigi duto kendo ni ne ok en pacha awuon:
Ka dipo ni jogi otho mana kaka ji duto nyalo tho, to kare Jehova Nyasaye ne ok oora.
To ka Jehova Nyasaye okelo gima nyien mopogore gi mago duto mapile, kendo ma piny oyawo dhoge mi omwonyogi, gi gik moko duto ma mekgi, kendo ma gidhi ei bur ka gingima, eka unungʼe ni jogi osewuotho e nyim Jehova Nyasaye gi achaya.”
Mana gi sa mane otieko wacho gigi, lowo mane ni e bwo tiendgi nobarore,
kendo piny noyawo dhoge mi omwonyogi, gi joodgi duto kod joka Kora duto kod mwandugi duto.
Negidhi e bur kagingima mi lowo uomogi kod mwandugi kendo negilal nono ei oganda Israel.
E kinde mane giywak, jo-Israel duto mane ni machiegni kodgi noringo, kaywak niya, “Wan bende piny dhi mwonyowa!”
Kendo mach nowuok koa kuom Jehova Nyasaye mi owangʼo ji mia ariyo gi piero abich mane oyudo chiwo misango mangʼwe ngʼar.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Nyis Eliazar wuod Harun, ma jadolo, mondo ogol tawo miwangʼo ubani kendo okee mirni mar mach mabor, nimar tawono ler
nimar gin tawo mag joma otimo richo ewi ngimagi giwegi. Los tawono moriere kendo iketgi ewi kendo mar misango, nimar nochiwgi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo gisebedo maler. We gibed ranyisi ne jo-Israel.”
Omiyo Eliazar jadolo nochoko tawo mar mula mane okel gi jogo mane osewangʼ, kendo nochokogi kanyakla monywasogi mondo muon-go kendo mar misango,
mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike kokalo kuom Musa. Ma ne parone jo-Israel ni onge ngʼato angʼata makmana nyikwa Harun ema onego bi mondo owangʼ gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, ka ok kamano to obiro chalo kaka Kora kod jolupne.
Kinyne oganda mar jo-Israel duto nongʼurne Musa kod Harun. Negiwachonegi niya, “Usenego jo-Jehova Nyasaye.”
To ka ogandano nochokore mar kwedo Musa kod Harun kendo gilokore ka gingʼiyo Hemb Romo, apoya nono boche polo noume kendo duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye noyangore.
Eka Musa kod Harun nodhi e nyim Hemb Romo,
kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuogi e kanyakla mondo omi atiekgi chuth.” Kendo Musa gi Harun nopodho auma e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka Musa nowacho ne Harun niya, “Kaw tawo mar ubani mari kendo iket gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar e iye, kaachiel gi mach moa e kendo mar misango, kendo iret idhi e chokruokno mondo itimnegi misango mar pwodhruok e richo. Mirima osebiro koa ir Jehova Nyasaye; masiche osechakore.”
Omiyo Harun notimo kaka Musa nowachone, kendo noringo modhi e dier chokruok. Masira ne osechakore e dier ji, to Harun nochiwo gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar kendo nokwayonegi ngʼwono kuom gima gisetimo.
Nochungʼ e kind joma ngima gi joma otho, mi masiche norumo.
Makmana ji alufu apar gangʼwen gi mia abiriyo (14,700) nosetho nikech masichego, komedore gi jogo mane osetho nikech Kora.
Eka Harun noduogo ir Musa e dhoranga Hemb Romo, nimar masiche noserumo.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo ichok odunga apar gariyo koa kuomgi, achiel ka achiel koa kuom jatelo moro ka moro mar dhoutgi. Ndik nying ngʼato ka ngʼato kuom odungane.
E odunga mar Lawi ndike nying Harun, nimar nyaka bedi odunga achiel mar jatelo mar dhoot ka dhoot.
Ketgi e Hemb Romo e nyim Sandug Rapar, kama aromoe kodi.
Odunga mar ngʼat mayiero biro loth, kendo abiro tieko chuth ngʼur ma jo-Israel ngʼurnigo maonge giko.”
Omiyo Musa nowuoyo gi jo-Israel, kendo jotendgi nomiye odunga apar gariyo, ka moro ka moro en mar dhoutgi, kendo odunga mar Harun ne achiel kuomgi.
Musa noketo odungago e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e Hema e nyim Sandug Rapar.
Kinyne Musa nodonjo ei Hemb Rapar kendo noneno odunga mar Harun, mane ochungʼ e lo Lawi, ne pok ochako loth kende to thuokene bende nosechako dongo, ka gingʼich mamoro wangʼ kendo gigolo olembe mag oyungu.
Eka Musa nogolo odunga duto e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mi okelone jo-Israel duto. Ne gingʼiyogi, kendo ngʼato ka ngʼato nokawo odungane owuon.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Dwok odunga mar Harun e nyim Sandug Rapar, mondo kane kaka ranyisi ne joma ongʼanyo. Mano biro tieko chuth kitgi mar ngʼur koda, mondo omi kik githo.”
Musa notimo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nonyise.
Jo-Israel nowacho ne Musa niya, “Wabiro tho! Waserwenyo, kendo wan duto waselal!
Ngʼato angʼata mosudo machiegni gi hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye biro tho. Dibed ni wan duto wabiro tho?”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Harun niya, “In gi yawuoti kod od wuonu nyaka ukaw tingʼ mag richo motimne kama ler mar lemo, kendo in-gi yawuoti kende ema nyaka ukaw tingʼ richo motimne jodolo.
Kel jo-Lawi weteu koa e dhoutu mag anywola mondo oriwre kodi kendo gikonyu ka in kod yawuote tiyo e nyim Hema mar Sandug Rapar.
Nyaka giwinju kendo giti tije duto mag Hema, to kik gidhi machiegni gi gig kama ler mar lemo kata mag kendo mar misango, ka ok kamano to gin kod un duto ubiro tho.
Nyaka giriwre kodi kendo gikaw tich mar rito Hemb Romo kaachiel gi tije duto manie Hema, kendo onge ngʼat machielo moyiene biro machiegni gi kama intie.
“Nyaka ikaw tich mar rito kama ler mar lemo kod kendo mar misango, mondo mi masira kik lwar kuom jo-Israel kendo.
An awuon aseyiero jo-Lawi weteni koa kuom jo-Israel kaka chiwo ne un, mowal ne Jehova Nyasaye mondo oti e Hemb Romo.
To in kod yawuoti kende ema onego bed jodolo kaluwore gi gik moko duto manie kendo mar misango kod mago mantiere ei pasia. Amiyou tich mar bedo jodolo kaka chiwo. Ngʼato angʼata ma osudo machiegni gi kama ler mar lemo nyaka negi.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Harun niya, “An awuon aseketi jarit mar chiwo duto mokelna; chiwo maler duto ma jo-Israel omiya amiyi kod yawuoti kaka pok maru kendo mano ema unuyud pile.
Nyaka ikaw thoth bath chiwo duto maler ma ok owangʼ e mach. Koa kuom mich duto ma gikelona kaka chiwo maler moloyo, bedni en chiwo mar cham, kata mar misango mar golo richo kata mar pwodhruok, pokno en mari kod yawuoti.
Chame kaka gima ler moloyo; chwo duto nochame. Nyaka ikawe kaka gima ler.
“Gimoro amora mowal tenge koa e mich mag misango mifwayo mar jo-Israel bende nobed mari. Achiwo ma ne in kod yawuoti gi nyigi kaka pok maru mapile pile. Ngʼato angʼata mantiere e odi mopwodhore maler nyalo chame.
“Amiyou mo zeituni mayom duto kod divai manyien mayom duto kod cham ma gichiwone Jehova Nyasaye kaka olemo mokwongo mar keyo margi.
Olembe mokwongo duto moa e puodho ma gikelone Jehova Nyasaye nobed mari. Ngʼato angʼata mantiere e odi mopwodhore maler nyalo chame.
“Gimoro amora mochiwne Jehova Nyasaye chuth nobed magu.
Nyodo mokwongo mar ich, obed dhano kata chiayo, mochiwne Jehova Nyasaye en mari. To nyaka uwar wuowi makayo moro amora kod kayo madichwo moro amora mar jamni ma ok ler.
Ka giromo dwe achiel, nyaka iwargi e nengo mar wero ma en shekel abich mar fedha, kaluwore gi shekel mar kama ler mar lemo, ma pekne romo gera piero ariyo.
“To kik iwar kayo ma rwath, rombo kata diel; nikech giler. Kir rembgi e kendo mar misango kendo iwangʼ mo mawuok kuomgi kaka misango miwangʼo gi mach, ma en gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye.
Ring jamnigo gin magu, mana kaka misango mifwayo mar agoko kod em korachwich bende maru.
Gimoro amora mowal tenge koa kuom misengini maler ma jo-Israel ochiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye, amiyoi gi yawuoti kod nyigi kaka pok maru mapile. En singruok ma ok rum e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ne in kaachiel gi nyikwayi.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Harun niya, “Ok iniyud girkeni mora amora e piny jogi, kata pok moro amora ok inibedgo e kindgi nimar an e pok maru kendo girkeni maru e kind jo-Israel.
“Amiyo jo-Lawi achiel kuom apar duto mantiere e Israel kaka girkeni margi ka achulogigo kuom tich ma gitiyo e Hemb Romo.
Chakre kawuono jo-Israel ok onego dhi machiegni gi Hemb Romo, ka ok kamano to ibiro kumogi kuom richo mag-gi kendo gibiro tho.
En mana jo-Lawi ema oyienegi mar tiyo tij Hemb Romo kendo kaw tingʼ duto mag richo motimie Hemb Romo. Ma en chik mogik makende ne tiengʼ mabiro. Ok giniyud girkeni moro amora kuom jo-Israel.
Kata kamano, amiyo jo-Lawi kaka girkeni margi achiel kuom apar ma jo-Israel ochiwo kaka misango ne Jehova Nyasaye. Mano emomiyo ne awacho kama kuomgi: ‘Ok giniyud girkeni e dier jo-Israel.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Wuo gi jo-Lawi kendo iwachnegi kama: ‘Ka uyudo koa kuom jo-Israel achiel kuom apar ma amiyou kaka girkeni magu, to nyaka un bende ugol achiel kuom apar mar achiel kuom aparno kaka chiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Chiwouno nokwan kaka cham moa kar dino kata kaka divai mimadho moa kar biyo divai.
E yo machalo kama ema un bende ubiro chiwoe chiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye koa kuom achiel kuom apar duto muyudo koa kuom jo-Israel. E achiel kuom apargo, nyaka ichiw pok mar Jehova Nyasaye ne Harun, jadolo.
Nyaka ichiw pok mar Jehova Nyasaye gino maber kendo maler moloyo mar gik moko duto ma omiu.’
“Wachne jo-Lawi kama: ‘Ka ichiwo mano maber, to ibiro kwane ne in kaka gima oa e kar dino cham kata kar biyo divai.
Un kod jouteu duto unyalo chamo bathe moko kamoro amora, nimar en pok maru ne tich mutiyo e Hemb Romo.
Ka usegolone Jehova Nyasaye gik mabeyo moloyo kamano, to ok unubed joketho kuom wachno, kendo ok nobed ni udwanyo gik maler ma jo-Israel ochiwo kendo ok ubi tho.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa gi Harun niya,
“Ma e dwaro mar chik ma Jehova Nyasaye osechiko: Nyis jo-Israel mondo okel nyaroya ma silwal maonge songa kata ma ok ongʼol kendo mapok otwe e jok.
Chiwe ne Eliazar jadolo; kendo nyaroyano nyaka gol oko mar kambi mi yangʼe ka oneno.
Bangʼe Eliazar jadolo nyaka kaw rembe moko e lith lwete kendo okwoye nyadibiriyo kochiko nyim Hemb Romo.
E kinde ma pod ongʼicho nyaroyano nyaka wangʼ piende, ringe, rembe kod wen.
Jadolo nokaw yiende moko mag sida, owino gi usi marakwaro kendo owitgi kuom nyaroya ma wangʼno.
Bangʼ mano, jadolo nyaka luok lepe kendo olwokre gi pi. Bangʼe onyalo donjo e kambi, makmana ni obiro bedo mochido nyaka chop odhiambo.
Ngʼatno mowangʼo nyaroyano bende nyaka luok lepe, kendo olwokre, en bende nobed mochido nyaka chop odhiambo.
“Ngʼat maler nochok buru mag nyaroyano kendo oketgi kar misango maler e oko mar kambi. Ginikan-gi gi dhout oganda mar jo-Israel mondo ti kodgi e pi pwodhruok; nikech en mar pwodho ji aa e richo.
Ngʼatno mochoko buch nyaroyano nyaka luok lepe bende, to en bende nobed mochido nyaka chop odhiambo. Ma nobedi chik mosiko ne jo-Israel kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak kodgi.
“Ngʼato angʼata momulo ringre ngʼama otho biro bedo mochido kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Nyaka opwodhre owuon gi pi chiengʼ mar adek kod chiengʼ mar abiriyo; eka obiro bedo maler. To ka ok opwodhore owuon chiengʼ mar adek gi chiengʼ mar abiriyo, to ok obi bedo maler.
Ngʼato angʼata momulo ringre ngʼama otho kendo ma ok opwodhore owuon ochido hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye. Ngʼatno nyaka gol oko mar Israel. Nikech pi mar pwodhruok pod ok okir kuome, ochido; kendo chidono odongʼ kuome.
“Chik momako ngʼama otho e hema ema: Ngʼato angʼata modonjo ei hema kendo ngʼato angʼata mantiere e iye nobed mochido kuom ndalo abiriyo,
kendo mikebe moro amora maonge raum moumego nobed mochido.
“Ngʼato angʼata man oko momulo ngʼatno mane onegi gi ligangla kata ngʼat motho kende, kata ngʼatno momulo chok dhano, kata liel, nobedi mochido kuom ndalo abiriyo.
“Ne ngʼatno mochido, ket buru moko moa e misango mar pwodhruok kendo uruw gi pi maler mi uol e wigi.
Eka ngʼatno maler nokaw owino, gilute e pi kendo gikuo pi e hema kod e gik moko duto molosgo ii hekalu gi ji man kanyo. Bende nyaka okwo pi kuom ngʼato angʼata mabed ni osemulo chok ngʼama osetho kata liel kata ngʼato ma osenegi kata ngʼato motho athoya.
Ngʼat maler ema nyaka kir pi kuom ngʼat mochidono chiengʼ mar adek gi mar abiriyo, to kochopo e odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo nyaka opwodhe. Ngʼama ipwodhono nyaka luok lepe kendo luokre gi pi, kendo odhiambono nobed mapoth.
To ka ngʼat mochido ok opwodhore owuon, nyaka gole oko e dier oganda, nikech osemiyo kama ler mar lemo mar Jehova Nyasaye ochido. Pi pwodhruokgo pod ok okir kuome, omiyo ochido.
Chik mosiko ne gin ema. “Ngʼat mokiro pi mar pwodhruok nyaka luok lepe bende, kendo ngʼato angʼata momulo pi mar pwodhruok nobed mochido nyaka chop odhiambo.
Gimoro amora ma ngʼat mochido omulo nobed mochido, kendo ngʼato angʼata momule nobed mochido nyaka chop odhiambo.”
E dwe mokwongo oganda jo-Israel duto nochopo e Thim mar Zin, kendo negidak Kadesh. Kanyo ema Miriam nothoe moike.
Koro ne onge pi mane ogandani nyalo modho, kendo ji nochokore mondo okwed Musa gi Harun.
Negidhawo gi Musa kagiwacho niya, “Mad ne bed ni watho e kinde mane owetewa otho e nyim Jehova Nyasaye!
Angʼo momiyo ikelo oganda Jehova Nyasaye e thimni, mondo mi wan kod jambwa watho kaye?
Angʼo momiyo ne igolowa Misri mondo ikelwa e piny malichni? Pinyni onge gi cham kata ngʼowu, mzabibu kata olembe mongʼinore to bende onge kata mana pi modho!”
Musa kod Harun nowuok koa e chokruok kochiko dhoranga Hemb Romo mi gipodho auma, kendo duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyorenegi.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Kaw odunga, kod owadu Harun mondo uchok jo-Israel kaachiel. Wuo kod lwanda ka gineno kendo pi biro chwer koa kuome. Ibiro golo pi kowuok e lwandano ne oganda mondo gin kod jambgi gimodhi.”
Omiyo Musa nokawo odunga e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mana kaka ne ochike.
En kod Harun nochoko chokruok kanyakla e nyim lwanda kendo Musa nowachonegi niya, “Winjuru, un jongʼanyogi, bende ochuno ni nyaka wamiu pi kowuok e lwandani?”
Eka Musa norieyo bade malo mi ochwado lwandano nyadiriyo gi odunga mare. Pi nobubni oko, kendo ogandago gi jambgi nomodho.
To Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa kod Harun niya, “Nikech ne ok uketo genou kuoma chuth mondo umiya duongʼ kaka ngʼama ler e nyim jo-Israel, ok unuter ogandani e piny ma amiyogi.”
Magi ne gin pige mag Meriba, kama jo-Israel nongʼurie gi Jehova Nyasaye kendo mano e kama nonyisore owuon kaka ngʼama ler e kindgi.
Musa nooro joote moa Kadesh ir ruodh Edom, kowacho kama: “Ma e gima owadu Israel wacho: Ingʼeyo tije matek duto ma wasebedo godo.
Kwerewa nodhi Misri, kendo negidak kuno kuom higni mathoth. Jo-Misri nosandowa kod wuonewa,
to kane waywakne Jehova Nyasaye, nowinjo ywakwa kendo nooro malaika mi ogolowa waa Misri. “Koro wan Kadesh ka, ma en dala mantiere but piny ma irito.
Yienwa wakal e pinyi. Ok wananyon puodho moro amora kata puoth mzabibu, kata modho pi moa e soko moro amora. Wabiro mana luwo yor ruoth tir kendo ok wanagom yo korachwich kata koracham nyaka wakal pinyi duto.”
To Edom nodwoko niya, “Ok unyal luwo ka; ka utemo, to wabiro wuok riat kendo wamonju gi ligangla.”
Jo-Israel nodwoko niya, “Wabiro luwo yo maduongʼ tir, kendo ka wan kata jambwa omodho piu mora amora, to wabiro chulo. Wadwaro mana kalo kanyo ka wawuotho gi tiendwa; maonge gimoro amora machielo mwadwaro timo.”
Negidwoko kendo niya, “Ok unyal luwo kae.” Eka Edom nochodo mar kedo kodgi gi jolweny mangʼeny kendo mager.
Nikech Edom notamore ni ok gikal e pinye, Israel nowere kodgi.
Oganda duto mar Israel nowuok Kadesh mi gibiro Got Hor.
E Got Hor machiegni gi tongʼ mar Edom, Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa gi Harun niya,
“Harun nochokre gi joge. Ok enodonji e piny mamiyo jo-Israel, nikech un ji ariyogi nungʼanyo ne chikena e pige mag Meriba.
Kaw Harun kod wuode Eliazar mondo itergi e Got Hor.
Lony lep Harun kendo irwakne wuode ma Eliazar, nimar Harun biro riwore gi jogi; mi otho kanyo.”
Musa notimo kaka Jehova Nyasaye nowachone: Negidhi e Got Hor ka oganda duto neno.
Musa nogolo lep Harun mi orwako ne wuode ma Eliazar. Kendo Harun notho ewi godno. Eka Musa kod Eliazar nolor oa ewi got,
kendo ka oganda duto nowinjo ni Harun osetho, to jo-Israel noywage kuom ndalo piero adek.
Kane ruodh Arad ma ja-Kanaan, mane odak Negev, nowinjo ni Israel ne wuotho e yo kochiko Atharim, nomonjo jo-Israel mi omako moko.
Eka Israel nosingore ne Jehova Nyasaye kama: “Ka ichiwonwa jogi e lwetwa, to wabiro tieko miechgi madongo duto.”
Jehova Nyasaye nochiko ite ne kwayo Israel kendo nochiwo jo-Kanaan ne gin. Negitiekogi duto kod miechgi; omiyo kanyo negichako ni Horma.
Negiwuotho ka gia Got Hor ka giluwo yo mochiko Nam Makwar, mondo giluor Edom. To ji chunygi nojok ka gin e yo;
omiyo negikwedo Nyasaye kod Musa, mi giwacho niya, “En angʼo momiyo ne igolowa Misri mondo watho e thimni? Waonge chiemo, waonge pi! Ok wadwar chiemo marachni!”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye noolo thuonde man-gi kwiri mager kuomgi; negikayo ji kendo jo-Israel mathoth notho.
Ji nobiro ir Musa mi giwachone niya, “Ne watimo richo e kinde mane wakwedo Jehova Nyasaye kod in. Lamnwa mondo Jehova Nyasaye ogol thuondegi oa kuomwa.” Omiyo Musa nolamone jogo.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Los thuond mula kendo ikete ewi luth; ma ngʼato angʼata ma thuol okayo kongʼiye to chango.”
Omiyo Musa noloso thuol mar mula mi okete ewi luth. Kane ngʼato thuol okayo mi bangʼe ongʼiyo thuond mulano to nochango.
Jo-Israel nodhi nyime giwuoth mi gigo kambi kama iluongo ni Oboth.
Eka ne giwuok Oboth mi gigo kambi kama iluongo ni Iye Abarim, mantiere e thim mochomo piny Moab kochiko yo wuok chiengʼ.
Kane giwuok kanyo negidhi nyime gi wuoth mi gigo kambi Holo mar Zered.
Negiwuok kanyo mi gigo kambi e bath aora Arnon, ma en thim molawore nyaka e piny jo-Amor. Arnon en kiewo mar Moab, mantiere e kind Moab kod jo-Amor.
Mano emomiyo Kitabu mar Lweny mar Jehova Nyasaye wacho niya, “Waheb mantiere Sufa kod holo mar aora Arnon,
kod kuonde mopie mag holo matut, kendo diny mochiko kar tich mar Ar kendo manie e kiewo mar Moab.”
Koa kanyo negidhi nyime nyaka Beer, ma en soko kama Jehova Nyasaye nonyisoe Musa niya, “Chok ji obed kanyakla kendo abiro miyogi pi.”
Eka Israel nower wendni: “Yaye soko, bubni oko! Werne soko,
wer kuom soko mane rawera matin okunyo, mano mane joka ruoth okunyo; joka ruoth molony e chike kendo man-gi odunga.” Eka negiwuok e thimno ka gidhi Matana,
ka gia Matana negidhi Nahaliel, ka gia Nahaliel negidhi Bamoth,
kendo kane gia Bamoth negidhi e holo mar Moab kama omanyore gi wi got Pisga minyalo nenogo kama otwo.
Israel nooro joote mondo owach ne Sihon ma ruodh jo-Amor kama:
“Yienwauru wakal e pinyu. Ok wanabar tenge e puothu moro amora kata e mago mag mzabibu, kata modho pi moa e soko moro amora. Wabiro wuotho e yor ruoth moriere tir nyaka wakal pinyruodhi.”
To Sihon notamo jo-Israel kalo e pinye. Nochoko ogandane mar lweny duto kendo negidhi e thim mondo giked gi Israel. Kane ochopo Jahaz, nokedo gi Israel.
Kata kamano jo-Israel nonege gi ligangla kendo gikawo puothe koa aora Arnon nyaka Jabok, ma en tongʼ mar jo-Amon kendo ne giyudo e pinyno ka jogo roteke.
Israel nomako mier madongo duto mag jo-Amor kendo negidak kuondego, kaachiel gi Heshbon kod kuonde dak duto molwore.
Heshbon ne en dala maduongʼ mar Sihon ruodh jo-Amor mane osekedo gi ruoth machon mar Moab kendo nosemayo lopene duto mochopo nyaka aora Arnon.
Mano emomiyo jochuog wer nowero niya, “Bi Heshbon mondo mi ogere kendo; mad dala maduongʼ mar Sihon ochal kaka chon.
“Mach nowuok Heshbon, en mach makakni moa e dala maduongʼ mar Sihon. Nowangʼo Ar man Moab, ma gin jokanyo mag kuonde motingʼore malo mag Arnon.
Okwongʼi, yaye Moab, otieku duto, yaye jo-Kemosh! Oseweyo yawuote e lwet nono mobedo jonjore kendo nyige obedo joma oter e twech, ir Sihon ruodh jo-Amor.
“To waseloko loch margi; Heshbon osetieki duto nyaka ochopo Dibon. Wasemukogi nyaka chopi Nofa, modhi nyaka Medeba.”
Omiyo Israel nodak e piny jo-Amor.
Bangʼ ka Musa noseoro jonon piny Jazer, jo-Israel nokawo kuonde dak molwore kendo ne giriembo jo-Amor mane ni kanyo.
Eka negigomo ma giluwo yo madhi Bashan, kendo Og ruodh Bashan gi jolweny mage duto nowuok riat mokedo kodgi e lweny Edrei.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Kik iluore, nimar asechiwe e lweti, en kaachiel gi jolweny mage duto kod pinye. Timne kaka ne itimone Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, mane obedo gi loch e piny Heshbon.”
Omiyo neginege, en kaachiel gi yawuote kod jolweny mage duto, maonge ngʼama otony mane odongʼ. Kendo negikawo pinye.
Eka jo-Israel nowuotho e pewe mag Moab mi gibworo e dho Aora Jordan momanyore gi Jeriko.
Balak wuod Zipor noneno gigo duto mane jo-Israel osetimo ni jo-Amor,
kendo Moab ne nigi bwok maduongʼ nikech jogo ne ngʼeny ahinya. Adiera, Moab luoro nomako ahinya nikech jo-Israel.
Jo-Moab nowacho ne jodong Midian niya, “Oganda mangʼenyni biro tieko gimoro amora ma wan-go, mana kaka rwath tieko lum manie pap.” Omiyo Balak wuod Zipor, mane ruodh Moab e kindeno,
nooro joote mondo oluong Balaam wuod Beor, mane ni Pethor but Aora Yufrate, mantiere e piny mane onywole. Balak nowacho kama: “Ogandagi oa Misri; gipongʼo wangʼ piny kendo gidak machiegni koda.
Koro bi mondo ikwongʼ jogi, nikech tekregi thoth. Dibed ni bangʼ ma anyalo loyogi mi ariembgi gia e pinyni. Nimar angʼeyo ni joma igwedho ogwedhi, kendo joma ikwongʼo okwongʼ.”
Jodong Moab kod Midian nowuok, ka gikawo chudo mar koro. Kane gichopo ir Balaam, neginyise gima Balak nowacho.
Balaam nowachonegi niya, “Ninduru ka kawuono kendo abiro miyou dwoko ma Jehova Nyasaye omiya.” Omiyo jotend jo-Moab nobedo kode.
Nyasaye nofwenyore ne Balaam mopenje niya, “Magi ngʼa gini man kodigi?”
To Balaam nonyiso Nyasaye niya, “Balak wuod Zipor, ma ruodh Moab, noorona ote ni:
‘Joma oa Misri opongʼo wangʼ piny. Koro bi kendo ikwongʼnagi. Dibed ni bangʼe anyalo kedo kodgi mi ariembgi.’ ”
To Nyasaye nowacho ne Balaam niya, “Kik idhi kodgi. Kik ikwongʼ jogo, nikech gin joma ogwedhi.”
Kinyne gokinyi Balaam noa malo mi owachone jotend Balak niya, “Doguru e pinyu, nimar Jehova Nyasaye osedagi weya mondo adhi kodu.”
Omiyo jotend jo-Moab nodok ir Balak mi owacho niya, “Balaam nodagi biro kodwa.”
Eka Balak nooro jotelo mamoko mangʼeny moloyo kendo mongirore moloyo mokwongo ka.
Negidok ir Balaam mi giwachone kama: “Ma e gima Balak wuod Zipor wacho: Kik iwe gimoro amora tami biro ira,
nikech abiro chuli maber kendo timoni gimoro amora miwacho. Bi mondo ikwongʼna ogandani.”
To Balaam nodwoko jotij Balak niya, “Kata ne bed ni Balak ne omiya kar dakne mopongʼ gi fedha gi dhahabu, to ok anyal timo gimoro amora maduongʼ kata matin makalo chik mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha.
Koro ninduru ka otienoni kaka jowadu mamoko ka notimo, mondo abi awinjiane gima nyien ma Jehova Nyasaye biro nyisa kuom wachni.”
Nyasaye nofwenyore ne Balaam otienono mowachone niya, “Nikech jogi obiro luongi, yie idhi kodgi, to kata kamano itim mana gima anyisi.”
Balaam nochiewo gokinyi, moidho pundane kendo nodhi gi jotelo mag Moab.
To mirima nomako Nyasaye ahinya kane odhi, kendo malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nochungʼ e yo mondo ogengʼne. Balaam noidho pundane, kendo jotijene ariyo bende ne ni kode.
Kane pundano oneno malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye kochungʼ e chuny yo kotingʼo ligangla e lwete, nobaro oko mar yo modhi e puodho. Balaam nogoye mondo oduog e wangʼ yo.
Eka malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nodhi mochungʼ kamoro ma yo dinygo e kind puothe ariyo mag mzabibu kama ochiel gohinga koni gi koni.
Kane pundano oneno malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye, nosudo machiegni gohingano moreyo tiend Balaam gohingano. Omiyo nogoyo pundano kendo.
Eka malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nosudo nyime mi ochungʼ kama diny maonge thuolo mar lokruok, korachwich kata koracham.
Kane pundano oneno malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye, nonindo piny e tiend Balaam, kendo ii Balaam nowangʼ mi ochwade gi luth.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye noyawo dho pundano, kendo nowacho ne Balaam niya, “En angʼo masetimoni momiyo isegoya nyadidek?”
Balaam nodwoko pundano niya, “Isemiya achalo ngʼama ofuwo! Kane bed ni an-gi ligangla e lweta, to dikoro asenegi.”
Pundano nopenjo Balaam niya, “Donge an mana pundani owuon, ma isebedo ka iidho, nyaka kawuononi? Bende iseneno ka an gi kido mar timoni gima chalo kama?” Nodwoke niya, “Ooyo.”
Bangʼe Jehova Nyasaye noyawo wenge Balaam, mi noneno malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye kochungʼ e wangʼ yo korieyo ligangla mare. Omiyo nokulore piny kendo nopodho auma e lowo.
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nopenje niya, “Angʼo momiyo isechwado pundani nyadidek? Abiro mondo agengʼi nikech yoreni obam e nyima.
Punda nonena nyadidek mobaro oa yo. To ka dine ok obaro, to dine asenegi, to en to aweye odhi.”
Balaam nowacho ne malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Asetimo richo. Ne ok angʼeyo nine ichungʼ e wangʼ yo mondo igengʼna. Koro ka ok imor, to abiro dok dala.”
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Balaam niya, “Dhiyo adhiya gi jogi, to iwach mana gima awachoni.” Omiyo Balaam nodhi gi jodong Balak.
Kane Balak owinjo ni Balaam biro, nowuok mondo oromne e dala jo-Moab mokiewo gi aora Arnon, e giko mar pinye.
Balak nowacho ne Balaam niya, “Donge ne aoroni joote mondo ibi ira piyo? Angʼo ma nomoni biro ira? Koso iparo ni ok anyal chuli?”
Balaam nodwoko niya, “Mano ber, eri asebiro. Koso iparo ni anyalo wacho gimoro amora? Ooyo, nyaka awach mana gima Nyasaye oketo e dhoga.”
Eka Balaam nodhi gi Balak nyaka Kiriath Huzoth.
Balak nochiwo misango mar dhok kod rombe, kendo nochiwo moko ne Balaam kod jodongo mane ni kode.
Kinyne gokinyi Balak nokawo Balaam motero Bamoth Baal, kendo kanyo noneno bath oganda.
Balaam nowacho niya, “Gerna kende abiriyo mag misango ka, kendo ikna rwedhi abiriyo kod imbe abiriyo.”
Balak notimo kaka Balaam nowacho, kendo negichiwo rwath gi im ewi kendo ka kendo mar misango.
Eka Balaam nowacho ne Balak niya, “Bed but misango ka, ka an to alengʼora e bathe ka; nimar sa moro dipo ka Jehova Nyasaye ofwenyorena. Gimoro amora monyisa to abiro nyisi.” Eka nowuok modhi kama otingʼore gi malo motwo.
Nyasaye nofwenyore ne Balaam kendo Balaam nowachone niya, “Aseloso kende abiriyo mag misango, kendo ewi kendo ka kendo asechiwe misango mar rwath kod im.”
Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo Balaam ote kowachone niya, “Dog ir Balak kendo imiye wachni.”
Omiyo nodok moyudo Balak kochungʼ but misango mane osechiwo ka en gi jodong Moab duto.
Eka Balaam nohulo ote moa kuom Nyasaye kama: “Balak ruodh Moab manie piny gode man yo wuok chiengʼ nooma Aram. Nowacho ni, ‘Bi mondo ikwongʼna Jakobo; bi mondo ikwedna jo-Israel.’
Ere kaka anyalo kwongʼo joma Nyasaye pok okwongʼo? Ere kaka anyalo kwedo joma Jehova Nyasaye pok okwedo?
Anenogi ka achungʼ ewi kite mabeyo; kendo arangogi gi ewi gode. Aneno oganda modak kar kendgi ma ok oseriwore gi ogendini mamoko.
Ere ngʼama nyalo kwano kar romb oganda joka Jakobo machalo gi buru kata ngʼama nyalo kwano migawo mar angʼwen mar Israel? Weuru atho kaka joma kare tho, kendo mad giko mara ochal kod margi!”
Balak nopenjo Balaam niya, “En angʼo ma isetimona? Ne aomi mondo ikwongʼ wasika, to onge gima isetimo makmana gwedhogi!”
Nodwoke niya, “Ok anyal wacho gima Jehova Nyasaye ne ok onyisa?”
Eka Balak nowachone niya, “Bi wadhi kamoro machielo kama inyalo nenogie; ibiro mana neno moko kuomgi to ok giduto. To ka isenenogi, to ikwongʼnagi.”
Omiyo notere e pap mar Zofim mantiere ewi Got Pisga, kendo kanyo nogero kende mag misango abiriyo mi nochiwo misango mar rwath kod im ewi kendo ka kendo.
Balaam nowacho ne Balak niya, “Bed but misangoni ka, ka anto adhi romo gi Nyasaye bathe kocha.”
Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyore ne Balaam kendo nomiyo Balaam ote kowachone niya, “Dog ir Balak kendo imiye wachni.”
Omiyo nodok moyudo Balak kochungʼ but misangone, ka en-gi jodong Moab. Balak nopenje niya, “Angʼo mane Jehova Nyasaye owacho?”
Eka Balaam nohulo ote moa kuom Nyasaye kama: Aa malo, Balak, kendo ichik iti; winja, wuod Zipor.
Nyasaye ok en dhano, mondo omi oriambi, kata ok en wuod dhano, mondo omi olok pache. Bende onyalo wuoyo to ok otim kaka owacho? Bende onyalo chiwo singo, to ok ochop singruokno?
Ne ayudo chik mondo achiw gweth; osegwedhogi, kendo ok anyal loko mano.
“Onge kido magalagala moyud kuom Jakobo, kata tim moro marach moyud kuom Israel. Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi ni kodgi; teko mar Ruoth ni kodgi.
Nyasaye nogologi Misri; tekogi chalo gi teko jowi.
Onge tim jwok manyalo mako joka Jakobo, kendo timbe ndagla ok nyal mako Israel. Ibiro goyo ngero kuom joka Jakobo ma Israel ni, ‘Ne gima Nyasaye osetimo!’
Ogandani ger mana ka sibuor madhako; kendo gijuol ka sibuor madichwo, ma ok nyal nindo piny nyaka ocham gima onego momadh rembe.”
Eka Balak nowacho ne Balaam niya, “Kare koro kik ikwongʼ-gi kata kik igwedhgi!”
Balaam nodwoke niya, “Donge ne anyisi ni nyaka atim mana gima Jehova Nyasaye onyisa?”
Eka Balak nowacho ne Balaam niya, “Bi wadhi kamachielo. Dibed ni biro bedo maber ne Nyasaye mondo ikwongʼnagi kanyo.”
Kendo Balak nokawo Balaam nyaka ewi Peor, momanyore gi kama otwo.
Balaam nowacho niya, “Gerna kende abiriyo mag misango kae, kendo ikna rwedhi abiriyo kod imbe abiriyo.”
Balak notimo kaka Balaam nonyise kendo nochiwo misango mar rwath kod im ewi kendo ka kendo mar misango.
Omiyo kane Balaam oneno ni berne Jehova Nyasaye mondo ogwedh Israel, ne ok otimo tim jwok kaka ne osetimo e kinde mokalo, to nolokore kongʼiyo yo thim.
Kane Balaam ongʼiyo oko mi oneno jo-Israel kochokore e dhoot ka dhoot, Roho mar Nyasaye nobiro kuome
mi nochiwo ote mare kama: “Ote Balaam wuod Beor, ote mar ngʼat ma wengene neno maber,
ote mar ngʼat mawinjo weche Nyasaye, ngʼat maneno fweny moa kuom Nyasaye Maratego, ngʼat mopodho piny auma, kendo ma wengene oyawore.
“Mano kaka hembe magi ber neno, yaye Jakobo, kuondeni mag dak, yaye Israel!
“Gilandore ka holni, mana ka puothe mantiere e bath aora, mana ka mane-mane ma Jehova Nyasaye opidho, bende mana ka yiend sida mopidh but pi.
Pi ma aa e dapigeni biro pongʼ mao oko; kendo kothgi nochal gi pi mabubni. “Ruodhgi nobed gi teko moloyo Agag; pinyruodhgi notingʼ malo.
“Nyasaye nogologi Misri; kendo gin gi teko machalo mar jowi. Gikidho oganda jowasikgi kendo gituro chokegi matindo tindo; kendo gichwowogi gi aserni mag-gi.
Gilidho ka ginindo piny mana ka sibuor madichwo, bende mana ka sibuor madhako maonge ngʼama nyalo chiewo? “Mad joma ogwedhi gwedhi to joma kwongʼi mondo okwongʼ!”
Eka Balak nobedo gi mirima mager gi Balaam. Noriwo lwetene kanyakla mi owachone niya, “Ne aomi mondo ikwongʼna wasika, to isemana gwedhogi ndalo adekgi.
Koro aa sani sani mondo idhi dala! Ne awachoni ni abiro miyi chudo maber, to Jehova Nyasaye osetami yudo chudono.”
Balaam nodwoko Balak niya, “Donge ne anyiso joote mane ioro ira niya,
‘Kata bed ni Balak ne miya ode mar ruoth mopongʼ gi fedha gi dhahabu, to ne ok anyal timo gimoro amora gi pacha awuon mopogore gi chik Jehova Nyasaye bed ni ber kata rach?’
Koro adok ir jowa, to kapok adhi to we anyisi gima jo-Israel biro timo, asiemi kuom gik ma jogi biro timo ne jogi e ndalo mabiro.”
Eka Balaam nohulo ote moa kuom Nyasaye kama: “Ote mar Balaam wuod Beor, ote mar ngʼat man-gi wangʼ maneno ler,
ote mar ngʼat mawinjo weche Nyasaye, ngʼat man-gi rieko moa kuom Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo, ngʼat maneno fweny moa kuom Nyasaye Maratego, ngʼat moriere piny auma, kendo ma wengene oyawore.
“Anene, to ok sani; asudo machiegni, to ok bute. Sulwe biro wuok koa kuom Jakobo; ludh loch biro wuok ei Israel. Obiro toyo wiye jo-Moab, kod wiye yawuot Sheth duto.
Obiro loyo piny jo-Edom e lweny mi okaw; kendo Seir ma wasike, nokaw, to Israel nomed bedo motegno.
Jatelo noa e oganda joka Jakobo, kendo enotiek joma otony mag dala maduongʼ.”
Eka Balaam noneno Amalek kendo nowachone ote mar Nyasaye kama: “Amalek ema ne okwongo kuom ogendini, to gikone ibiro tieke.”
Eka noneno jo-Keni kendo ochiwo oteneni: “Kar dak mari nigi kwe, kari mar pondo ni e bwo lwanda;
kata kamano un jo-Keni ibiro negu ndalo ma Ashur oterou e twech.”
Eka nochiwo otene niya, “Yaye, en ngʼa manyalo bedo mangima ka Nyasaye otimo ma?
Yiedhi madongo mathoth nobi koa e dho nam mar Kitim; gibiro mako Ashur kod Eber, to kata gin bende ibiro tiekgi.”
Eka Balaam noa malo mi odok dala kendo Balak bende nodhi e yore owuon.
Kane oyudo jo-Israel odak Shitim, chwo nochako terore gi monde jo-Moab,
mane ogwelogi e chiwo misengini ne nyisechegi. Ji nochiemo moyiengʼ kendo negipodho auma ka gilamo nyisechegi.
Omiyo Israel noriwore kodgi e yor lamo Baal mar Peor. Kendo mirima nomako Jehova Nyasaye ahinya kodgi.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Kaw jotend jogi duto, neg-gi kendo dhurgi e lela e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, mondo omi mirimb Jehova Nyasaye owuog kuom Israel.”
Omiyo Musa nowacho ne jongʼad bura mag Israel niya, “Ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomu nyaka neg jou machwo ma oseriwore e lamo Baal mar Peor.”
Eka ja-Israel moro nobiro gi nyar jo-Midian e hembe ka Musa neno kaachiel gi oganda jo-Israel duto mane oyudo ywak e dho Hemb Romo.
Kane Finehas wuod Eliazar, ma wuod Harun jadolo, noneno ma, nowuok e chokruokno, mokawo tongʼ e lwete,
kendo noluwo bangʼ ja-Israelno nyaka e hema. Nochwowogi duto moriwogi gi tongʼ. Eka tho mane osenego jo-Israel norumo;
to ji mane tho ma kamano onego ne gin ji alufu piero ariyo gangʼwen (24,000).
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Finehas wuod Eliazar, ma wuod Harun jadolo, osetieko mirimba kuom jo-Israel; nimar en gi nyiego machal gi mara; mano emomiyo ne ok atiekogi kata obedo nine an kod mirima kodgi kamano.
Emomiyo nyise ni aloso singruok mar kwe kode.
Asingorane ni en kod nyikwaye ginibed jodolo maga nyaka chiengʼ, nikech ne en jasinani kuom miyo Nyasache duongʼ kendo negichiwo misango mar pwodho jo-Israel e richo.”
Nying ja-Israel mane onegi gi nyar jo-Midian ne en Zimri wuod Salu, mane en jatend dhood Simeon.
To nying nyar jo-Midian mane onegi ne en Kozbi ma nyar Zur, ma wuon-gi ne en jatend dhood jo-Midian.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Sanduru jo-Midian kendo uneg-gi,
nikech ne githagou gi timbegi maricho mane gitimo Peor kendo kuom wach Kozbi ma nyar jatend Midian mane onegi ndalo mane yamb tho obiro nikech gima notimore Peor.”

Bangʼ masirano Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa kod Eliazar wuod Harun jadolo niya,
“Kwan ogendini mag jo-Israel duto kaluwore gi anywolagi, mago mahikgi piero ariyo kadhi nyime manyalo bedo jolweny e Israel.”
Musa kod Eliazar jadolo nowuoyo kod jo-Israel e pewe mag Moab mantiere e loka Jordan kod Jeriko mowachonegi niya,
“Kwanuru jogo mahikgi romo piero ariyo kadhi nyime, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.” Jo-Israel mane owuok Misri e magi:
Nyikwa Reuben, ma en wuod Israel makayo, ne gin: kokadho kuom Hanok, ne gin joka Hanok; kokadho kuom Palu, ne gin joka Palu;
kokadho kuom Hezron, ne gin joka Hezron; kokadho kuom Karmi, ne gin joka Karmi.
Magi ema ne joka Reuben; ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero angʼwen mia abiriyo gi piero adek (43,730).
Wuod Palu ne en Eliab,
to yawuot Eliab ne gin Nemuel, Dathan kod Abiram. Dathan-no kod Abiram ne jotend oganda, to kata kamano negikwedo Musa kod Harun kendo gijiwo joma ne luwo Kora kuom kwedo Jehova Nyasaye.
Piny nongʼamo dhoge mi omwonyogi kaachiel gi Kora, ma joma ne luwo bangʼe ji mia ariyo gi piero abich notho e mach. Jogi nobedo kaka ranyisi mar siemo ji.
To kata kamano, joka Kora ne ok orumo.
Nyikwa Simeon kaluwore gi anywola margi ne gin: koa kuom Nemuel, joka Nemuel; koa kuom Jamin, joka Jamin; koa kuom Jakin, joka Jakin;
koa kuom Zera, joka Zera; koa kuom Shaul, joka Shaul.
Magi ema ne joka Simeon; ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero ariyo gariyo mia ariyo (22,200).
Nyikwa Gad kaluwore gi anywola margi ne gin: koa kuom Zefon, joka Zefon; koa kuom Hagai, joka Hagi; koa kuom Shuni, joka Shuni;
koa kuom Ozni, joka Ozni; koa kuom Eri, joka Eri;
koa kuom Arodi, joka Arodi; koa kuom Areli, joka Areli.
Magi ema ne joka Gad; ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero angʼwen mia abich (40,500).
Yawuot Juda ma Er kod Onan notho Kanaan.
Nyikwa Juda kaluwore gi anywola margi ne gin: koa kuom Shela, joka Shela; koa kuom Perez, joka Perez; koa kuom Zera, joka Zera.
Nyikwa Perez ne gin: koa kuom Hezron, joka Hezron; koa kuom Hamul, kod joka Hamul.
Magi ema ne joka Juda; ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero abiriyo gauchiel gi mia abich (76,500).
Nyikwa Isakar kaluwore gi anywola margi ne gin: koa kuom Tola, joka Tola; koa kuom Pua, joka Pua;
koa kuom Jashub, joka Jashub; koa kuom Shimron, joka Shimron.
Magi ema ne joka Isakar, ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero auchiel angʼwen gi mia adek (64,300).
Nyikwa Zebulun kaluwore gi anywola margi ne gin: koa kuom Sered, joka Sered; koa kuom Elon, joka Elon; koa kuom Jalel, joka Jalel.
Magi ema ne joka Zebulun, ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero auchiel gi mia abich (60,500).
Nyikwa Josef kaluwore gi anywola margi kokalo kuom Manase kod Efraim ne gin:
Nyikwa Manase ne gin: koa kuom Makir, joka Makir (Makir ne en wuod Gilead); koa kuom Gilead, joka Gilead.
Nyikwa Gilead e magi: koa kuom Iezer, joka Iezer; koa kuom Helek, joka Helek;
koa kuom Asriel, joka Asriel; koa kuom Shekem, joka Shekem;
koa kuom Shemida, joka Shemida; koa kuom Hefer, joka Hefer.
(Kata kamano Zelofehad wuod Hefer ne onge yawuowi; to ne en mana gi nyiri kende, ma nyingegi ne gin Mala, Nowa, Hogla, Milka gi Tirza.)
Magi ema ne joka Manase; ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero abich gariyo mia abiriyo (52,700).
Nyikwa Efraim kaluwore gi anywola margi e magi: koa kuom Shuthela, joka Shuthela; koa kuom Beker, joka Beker; koa kuom Tahan, joka Tahan.
Magi ema ne nyikwa Shuthela: kokadho kuom Eran, ne gin joka Eran.
Magi ema ne joka Efraim; ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero adek mia abich. Magi duto ne gin nyikwa Josef kaluwore gi anywola mag-gi.
Nyikwa Benjamin kaluwore gi anywola margi ne gin: koa kuom Bela, joka Bela; koa kuom Ashbel, joka Ashbel; koa kuom Ahiram, joka Ahiram;
koa kuom Shufam, joka Shufam; koa kuom Hufam, joka Hufam.
Nyikwa Bela kokalo kuom Ard gi Naaman ne gin: koa kuo Ard, joka Ard; koa kuom Naaman, joka Naaman.
Magi ema ne joka Benjamin; ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero angʼwen gabich mia auchiel (45,600).
Nyikwa Dan kaluwore gi anywolagi ne gin: koa kuom Shulam, joka Shuham. Magi ema ne anywola mag Dan:
Anywola jo-Shuham duto kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero auchiel gangʼwen mia angʼwen (64,400).
Nyikwa Asher kaluwore gi anywola margi ne gin: koa kuom Imna, joka Imna; koa kuom Ishvi, joka Ishvi; koa kuom Beria, joka Beria;
kendo koa kuom nyikwa Beria ne gin: joka Heber; kod joka Malkiel.
To Asher ne nigi nyako ma nyinge Sera.
Magi ema ne joka Asher; ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero abich gadek mia angʼwen (53,400).
Nyikwa Naftali kaluwore gi anywola margi ne gin: koa kuom Jazel, joka Jazel; koa kuom Guni, joka Guni;
koa kuom Jezer, joka Jezer; koa kuom Shilem, joka Shilem.
Magi ema ne joka Naftali; ma kar kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero angʼwen gabich mia angʼwen (45,400).
Kar kwan jo-Israel duto ne romo ji alufu mia auchiel gachiel, mia abiriyo gi piero adek (601,730).
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Nyaka pog jo-Israel pinyni kaka girkeni kaluwore gi kar kwan-gi.
Dhoot maduongʼ imi lowo maduongʼ to dhoot matin to imi lowo matin; dhoot ka dhoot mondo oyud pok maromre gi kar kwan-gi.
Nyaka ine ni lopegi opog gi ombulu. Pok mar oganda ka oganda biro bedo kaluwore gi nying kweregi.
Pok moro ka moro nyaka pog gi ombulu e kind dhoudi madongo gi matindo.”
Jo-Lawi mane okwan kaluwore gi anywola ne gin: koa kuom Gershon, joka Gershon; koa kuom Kohath, joka Kohath; koa kuom Merari, joka Merari.
Jo-Lawi mamoko mane okwan ne gin: joka Libni, joka Hebron, joka Mali, joka Mushi, joka Kora. (Kohath ne kwar Amram;
kendo jaod Amram ne nyinge Jokebed, ma nyakwar Lawi, mane onywol ne jo-Lawi e Piny Misri. Amram nonywolo Harun, Musa kod nyamin-gi Miriam.
Harun ne en wuon Nadab gi Abihu, Eliazar kod Ithamar.
To kata kamano Nadab gi Abihu notho kane gichiwo misango e nyim Jehova Nyasaye gi mach ma ok oyiego.)
Kar kwan jo-Lawi machwo ma ja-dwe achiel kadhi nyime kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero ariyo gadek (23,000). Ne ok okwan-gi gi jo-Israel mamoko nikech ne ok opog-gi lowo.
Magi e joma ne okwan gi Musa kod Eliazar jadolo e kinde mane okwan jo-Israel e paw Moab mantiere e loka Jordan koa Jeriko.
Onge moro amora kuomgi mane okwan gi Musa kod Harun jadolo e kinde mane gikwano jo-Israel e Thim mar Sinai.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ne owachone jo-Israelgo ni nyaka githo e thim, kendo onge kata ngʼata achiel kuomgi mane otony makmana Kaleb wuod Jefune kod Joshua wuod Nun.
Nyi Zelofehad wuod Hefer, ma wuod Gilead, ma wuod Makir, ma wuod Manase, ne gin joka Manase wuod Josef. Nyirigo ne gin Mala, Nowa, Hogla, Milka kod Tirza. Negisudo machiegni gi
kar donjo mar Hemb Romo mi gichungʼ e nyim Musa, Eliazar jadolo, jotelo kod chokruok mar oganda duto, mi giwacho niya,
“Wuonwa notho e thim. Ne ok en achiel kuom jolup Kora, mane okwedo Jehova Nyasaye, to notho nikech richone owuon kendo ne ok onywolo yawuowi.
Angʼo ma dimi nying wuonwa lal nono e anywolagi nikech ne ok onywolo wuowi? Yie upognwa kamoro e kind wede wuonwa.”
Omiyo Musa nokelo wachgini e nyim Jehova Nyasaye
kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya,
“Gima nyi Zelofehad owacho nikare. Nyaka ipog-gi gimoro kaka girkeni ei wede wuon-gi kendo girkeni mag wuon-gi imigi.
“Wachne jo-Israel ni, ‘Ka dichwo otho ma ok onywolo wuowi, to ipog nyathine ma nyako girkeni mare.
To ka oonge gi nyako, to ipog owetene girkeni mare.
To ka oonge gi owete, to ipog owete gi wuonene girkeni mare.
To ka wuon-gi onge gi owetene, to ipog watne moro amora machiegni kode e anywolagi, mondo oyud girkenino. Mae nobed chik ne jo-Israel, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko Musa.’ ”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Dhi malo e Got Abarim kendo ingʼi piny ma asemiyo jo-Israel.
Bangʼ ka isenene, to in bende ibiro tho miluw kwereni, mana kaka owadu Harun notho,
nimar e kinde mane oganda ongʼanyo e sokni mantiere e Thim mar Zin, un duto ne ok urito chikna kendo nyiso oganda ni an Ngʼama Ler.” (Magi ne sokni mag Meriba Kadesh, mantiere e Thim mar Zin.)
Musa nowacho ne Jehova Nyasaye ni,
“Mad Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach chunje duto mag dhano, oyier jatelo manyalo rito ogandani
mondo otelnegi e gik moko duto ma gitimo kendo oritgi kagiwuok kendo ka gidwogo dala mondo oganda Jehova Nyasaye kik chal gi rombe maonge jokwath.”
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya, “Kaw Joshua wuod Nun, ngʼat man-gi Roho, kendo yie lweti kuome.
Kete ochungʼ e nyim Eliazar jadolo kod chokruok duto mar oganda kendo ipwodhe e nyimgi.
Miye tekoni moko mondo mi oganda jo-Israel duto omiye luor.
Nyaka ochungʼ e nyim jadolo Eliazar, mabiro ngʼadone rieko kopenjo Urim e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Kogolo chik, to en kod oganda jo-Israel duto nowuog oko, kendo kogolo chik to gibiro donjo iye.”
Musa notimo kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike. Nokawo Joshua mi otero e nyim Eliazar jadolo gi chokruok duto.
Eka noyieyo lwete kuome mi opwodhe, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Mi jo-Israel chikni kiwachonegi kama: ‘Kelnauru chiwo mitimonago misengini miwangʼo pep mondo obed chiemba madum tik mangʼwe ngʼar e kinde mowinjore.’
Wachnegi niya, ‘Misengini miwangʼo ne Jehova Nyasaye e magi: nyirombe ariyo ma jo-higa achiel maonge songa, kaka chiwo mapile mowangʼ odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ.
Chiw nyarombo achiel gokinyi to machielo godhiambo,
kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham moromo gorogoro achiel gi nus mar mogo mayom moruw gi mo mobi e olemb zeituni moromo lita achiel.
Ma e chiwo mapile mowangʼ mopwodhi e Got Sinai kaka gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye, en misango miwangʼo pep mochiwne Jehova Nyasaye.
Nyarombo ka nyarombo nokel gi misango miolo piny maromo divai lita achiel. Nyaka uol divaino ei kama ler mar lemo ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Chiw nyarombo mar ariyo godhiambo, kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham machalo kamano kod misango miolo piny ma iloso gokinyi. Ma en chiwo miwangʼo pep, misango madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘Chiengʼ Sabato, chiwuru misango mar nyiimbe ariyo maonge songa mahikgi achiel, kaachiel gi misango miolo piny kod chiwo mar cham maromo kilo abiriyo mar mogo mayom moru gi mo.
Ma en misango miwangʼo pep Sabato ka Sabato, komedi ewi chiwo mapile mar misango miwangʼo pep kod misango miolo piny.
“ ‘Odiechiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe ka dwe, chiwne Jehova Nyasaye misango miwangʼo pep mar nyirwedhi ariyo, im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo moromo higa achiel, duto maonge songa.
Rwath ka rwath nyaka chiw gi chiwo mar cham maromo kilo apar mar mogo mayom moru gi mo; im to chiw gi chiwo mar cham maromo kilo abiriyo mar mogo mayom moru gi mo;
to nyaim ka nyaim, to chiw gi cham maromo kilo adek mar mogo mayom moru gi mo. Ma en misango miwangʼo pep, gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye.
Rwath ka rwath nyaka chiw gi misango miolo piny mar divai maromo lita angʼwen; im to chiw gi lita achiel mar divai; to nyaim ka nyaim, to chiw gi lita achiel mar divai. Ma en misango miwangʼo pep mar dwe ka dwe ma onego chiw e higa mangima sa moro amora ma dwe manyien opor.
Nywok achiel chiwne Jehova Nyasaye kaka misango mar pwodhruok kimedo gi misango miwangʼo pep mapile pile kod misango miolo piny michiwego.
“ ‘Nyaka utim Pasaka mar Jehova Nyasaye e odiechiengʼ mar apar gangʼwen mar dwe mokwongo.
E odiechiengʼ mar apar gabich mar dweno nyaka ulos sawo; kuom ndalo abiriyo chamuru makati motedi ma ok oketie thowi.
Chiengʼ mokwongo mar jumano nyaka ubed gi chokruok mowal kendo kik uti tich moro amora mutiyo pile.
Chiwuru ne Jehova Nyasaye misango miwangʼo pep, misango mowangʼ mar nyirwedhi ariyo, im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo mahikgi achiel kendo maonge songa.
Rwath ka rwath nyaka chiw gi chiwo mar cham mar mogo mayom maromo kilo adek gi nus moru gi mo; im to ichiw gi mogo mayom maromo kilo ariyo moru gi mo;
to nyiimbe abiriyogo, to ichiw gi mogo mayom maromo kilo achiel moru gi mo.
Umed nyanywok achiel mar chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo.
Chiwuru magi kumedo ewi misango miwangʼo pep mapile pile gokinyi.
Kamano bende kelnauru chiwo mitimogo misengini miwangʼo pile pile kuom ndalo abiriyo mondo chiemba odungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar ni Jehova Nyasaye; kendo nyaka ulose kumedo gi misango miwangʼo pep mapile pile kod misango miolo piny.
E odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo losuru chokruok mowal kendo kik uti tich moro amora mutiyo pile.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mokwongo mar keyo mokwongo, kinde ma uchiwoe misango mar cham manyien ne Jehova Nyasaye e Sawo mar Jumbe, losuru chokruok maler kendo kik uti tijeu mapile.
Chiwuru misango miwangʼo pep mag nyirwedhi ariyo, im achiel gi nyirombe abiriyo mahikgi en achiel kaka gima dungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye.
Rwath ka rwath nyaka chiw gi chiwo mar cham maromo kilo apar mar mogo mayom moru gi mo; im to uchiw gi kilo abiriyo;
to imbe abiriyogo moro ka moro to chiw gi kilo adek.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo.
Chiwuru magi kaachiel gi misango miolo piny, kumedo gi misango miwangʼo pep mapile pile kod chiwo mar cham. Neuru ni jamnigo onge songa.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe mar abiriyo losuru chokruok mowal kendo kik uti tijeu mapile. En odiechiengʼ mugoyoe turumbete.
Chiwuru misango miwangʼo pep mar nyarwath achiel, im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo moromo higa achiel, ma duto onge songa mondo obed kaka misango madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye.
Rwath ka rwath nyaka chiw gi chiwo mar cham maromo kilo apar mar mogo mayom moru gi mo; im to chiw gi kilo abiriyo;
nyiimbe abiriyogo moro ka moro uchiw gi kilo adek.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo.
Magi imedo ewi misango miwangʼo pep mar dwe ka dwe kod mago michiwo pile ka pile kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham kod misango miolo piny mana kaka owinjore. Gin chiwo miwangʼo pep ne Jehova Nyasaye, madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mamoro Jehova Nyasaye.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mar apar mar dwe mar abiriyo beduru gi chokruok mowal. Nyaka utwe chiemo kulamo kendo kik uti tich moro amora.
Kelneuru Jehova Nyasaye chiwo madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mar misango miwangʼo pep mar nyarwath, im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo ma jo-higa achiel, mago maonge songa.
Rwath ka rwath nyaka chiw gi chiwo mar cham maromo kilo apar mar mogo mayom moruw gi mo; im to uchiw gi kilo abiriyo;
to nyiimbe abiriyo-ka, to uchiw gi kilo adek.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo, kumedo gi chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo kod misango miwangʼo pep mapile pile mikelo gi chiwo mar cham, kod misango miolo piny.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mar apar gabich e dwe mar abiriyo, losuru chokruok mowal kendo kik uti tijeu mapile. Losneuru Jehova Nyasaye sawo kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Kelnauru Jehova Nyasaye chiwo madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mar misango miwangʼo pep mar rwedhi apar gadek, imbe ariyo kod nyiimbe apar gangʼwen mahikgi achiel, maonge songa.
Kuom rwedhi apar gadekgo kelnauru chiwo mar cham maromo kilo apar mar mogo mayom moru gi mo; kuom imbe ariyogo, chiwuru kilo abiriyo ne moro ka moro;
to kuom nyiimbe apar gangʼwen-ka, to uchiw kilo adek.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka misango mar pwodhruok e richo, kumedo ewi misango miwangʼo pep mapile kod chiwo mar cham gi misango miolo piny.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mar ariyo chiwuru nyirwedhi apar gariyo, imbe ariyo kod nyiimbe apar gangʼwen mahikgi achiel, ma duto onge songa.
Chiwo mag cham kod misango miolo piny nyaka keti kaka chik dwaro maromre gi rwedhigo, imbego kod nyiimbego.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo, kumedo ewi misango miwangʼo pep mapile kod chiwo mar cham, kaachiel gi misango miolo piny.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mar adek chiwuru rwedhi apar gachiel, imbe ariyo kod nyiimbe apar gangʼwen ma jo-higa achiel, ma duto onge songa.
Chiwo mag cham kod misango miolo piny nyaka keti kaka chik dwaro maromre gi rwedhigo, imbego kod nyiimbego.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo, kumedo ewi misango miwangʼo pep mapile kaachiel gi misango miolo piny.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mar angʼwen chiwuru rwedhi apar, imbe ariyo kod nyiimbe apar gangʼwen ma jo-higa achiel, ma duto onge songa.
Chiwo mag cham kod misango miolo piny nyaka keti kaka chik dwaro maromre gi rwedhigo, imbego kod nyiimbego.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo, kumedo ewi misango miwangʼo pep mapile kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham kaachiel gi misango miolo piny.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mar abich chiwuru rwedhi ochiko, imbe ariyo kod nyiimbe apar gangʼwen ma jo-higa achiel, ma duto onge songa.
Chiwo mag cham kod misango miolo piny nyaka keti kaka chik dwaro maromre gi rwedhigo, imbego kod nyiimbego.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo, kumedo ewi misango miwangʼo pep mapile kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham kaachiel gi misango miolo piny.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mar auchiel chiwuru rwedhi aboro, imbe ariyo kod nyiimbe apar gangʼwen ma jo-higa achiel, ma duto onge songa.
Chiwo mag cham kod misango miolo piny nyaka keti kaka chik dwaro maromre gi rwedhigo, imbego kod nyiimbego.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo, kumedo ewi misango miwangʼo pep mapile kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham kaachiel gi misango miolo piny.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo chiw rwedhi abiriyo, imbe ariyo kod nyiimbe apar gangʼwen ma jo-higa achiel, ma duto onge songa.
Chiwo mag cham kod misango miolo piny nyaka keti kaka chik dwaro maromre gi rwedhigo, imbego kod nyiimbego.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo, kumedo ewi misango miwangʼo pep mapile kaachiel gi chiwo mar cham kaachiel gi misango miolo piny.
“ ‘E odiechiengʼ mar aboro chok oganda kanyakla kendo kik uti tije mapile.
Kelneuru Jehova Nyasaye chiwo madungʼ tik mangʼwe ngʼar mar misango miwangʼo pep mar rwath achiel, im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo ma jo-higa achiel, ma duto onge songa.
Chiwo mag cham kod misango miolo piny nyaka keti kaka chik dwaro maromre gi rwadhno, imno kod nyiimbego.
Ewi mago meduru nywok achiel kaka chiwo mar pwodhruok e richo, kumedo ewi misango miwangʼo pep mapile mar cham kaachiel gi misango miolo piny.
“ ‘Kuom chiwo mar kwongʼruok kod chiwo mar hera, losneuru Jehova Nyasaye sewni moyier kaka: misango miwangʼo pep, chiwo mag cham, misango miolo piny kod chiwo mag lalruok.’ ”
Musa nonyiso jo-Israel gigo duto mane Jehova Nyasaye ochike.
Musa nowacho ne jotend dhout Israel niya, “Jehova Nyasaye ochiko kama:
Ka ngʼato osingore ne Jehova Nyasaye kata kokwongʼore mar timo gimoro to kik olokre, to nyaka one ni ochopo singruokneno.
“Ka nyako ma rawera ma pod odak e od wuon mare osingore ne Jehova Nyasaye kata okwongʼore mar timo gimoro
mi wuon mare owinjo singruokneno to ok owacho gimoro, to kwongʼruokneno nyaka siki.
To ka wuon mare okwero e kinde mosingoreno, to onge kwongʼruok kata singruok mare ma osingorego manitimre; Jehova Nyasaye noweye thuolo nikech wuon mare osedagi.
“Ka onywome bangʼ ka osekwongʼore kata orikni ochiwo singruok motweye
mi chwore owinje to olingʼ alingʼa, to kwongʼruokneno nobed kamano.
To ka chwore owinjo wachni mokwere, to oketho kwongʼruok motweye kata singruok mane orikni chiwo, kendo Jehova Nyasaye kete thuolo.
“Kwongʼruok kata singruok moro amora ma dhako ma chwore otho kata dhako ma mowere gi chwore otimo nosiki.
“Ka dhako modak gi chwore okwongʼore kata otwere gi kwongʼruok
mi chwore owinjo wachni to ok owachone gimoro kendo ok okwere, to kwongʼruokno nyaka siki.
To ka chwore odagi kwongʼruokneno, to onge gimoro amora mane chiege owacho manyalo make. Chwore osekethogi, kendo Jehova Nyasaye nokete thuolo.
Chwor dhako nyalo guro kata ketho singruok kata kwongʼruok ma chiege dwaro sandorego.
To ka chwore ok owacho gimoro kuom wachno odiechiengʼ ka odiechiengʼ, to nochop kwongʼruok mage kod singruok mage duto motwerego. Kwongʼruokgo nosiki nikech kane owinjogi to nolingʼ.
To ka dipo ni olokore bangʼe modagi kosewinjogi, to ketho mar chiege nobed e wiye owuon.”
Magi e chike mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo Musa kaluwore gidak manie kind dichwo gi dhako, kendo e kind wuoro gi nyare ma pod tin modak e odgi.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“In kaachiel gi jo-Israel dhi uked gi jo-Midian, eka bangʼe ibiro tho miluw bangʼ kwereni.”
Omiyo Musa nowacho ne jo-Israel niya, “Yieruru jou moko mondo odhi oked gi jo-Midian kendo gitiek mirimb Jehova Nyasaye kuomgi.
Goluru ji alufu achiel achiel (1,000) moa e dhoot ka dhoot mar Israel.”
Omiyo ji alufu apar gariyo (12,000) noikore ne lweny, kowuok e dhout Israel duto ka gigolo ji alufu achiel achiel (1,000).
Musa noorogi e lweny ji alufu achiel (1,000) e dhoot ka dhoot, ka gin gi Finehas wuod Eliazar, ma jadolo, mane otingʼo gik moa ei kama ler mar lemo kod turumbete michiwogo ranyisi.
Negikedo gi Midian, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa, kendo neginego chwo duto.
Moko kuom joma nonegi ne gin Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur kod Reba mane gin ruodhi abich mag Midian. Bende neginego Balaam wuod Beor gi ligangla.
Jo-Israel nomako mond jo-Midian kod nyithindo kendo ne giyako kweth mag jamni, dhok, kod gik moko duto mag jo-Midian.
Ne giwangʼo miech jo-Midian mane gidakie, kaachiel gi kuondegi mag bworo.
Negikawo gik moko duto ma oyaki kod mane ope, kaachiel gi ji kod jamni,
kendo negikelo joma ne omaki, gik mane ope kod mane oyaki ne Musa gi Eliazar ma jadolo kod oganda jo-Israel e kargi mar bworo mantiere e pewe Moab, man but Jordan loka mar Jeriko.
Musa gi Eliazar jadolo kod jotend oganda duto nodhi mondo orom kodgi e oko mar kambi.
Musa nokecho gi jotend lweny duto; mago mane otelo ne migawo mar lweny mar alufe alufe kod mag miche miche mane odwogo koa e lweny.
Nopenjogi niya, “Angʼo momiyo useyiene mon mondo obed mangima?”
Gin e joma noluwo puonj Balaam kendo gin ema negimiyo oganda mar jo-Israel oweyo Jehova Nyasaye kuom gima notimore Peor, mane omiyo masira onego jo-Jehova Nyasaye.
Omiyo neguru yawuowi duto. Kendo uneg dhako moro amora moseriwore gi dichwo,
to uwe nyiri duto mapok ongʼeyo chwo.
“Un duto ma usenego ngʼato angʼata kata mulo ngʼato angʼata motho nyaka ubed oko mar kambi kuom ndalo abiriyo. To e odiechiengʼ mar adek kod mar abiriyo nyaka upwodhru uwegi kendo upwodh jogo mumako.
Pwodhuru lewni duto kaachiel gi gimoro amora molos gi pien, molos gi yie diel kata mago molos gi bao.”
Eka Eliazar jadolo nowacho ne jolweny mane odhi e lweny niya, “Chik mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo Musa ema:
Gik machalo gi dhahabu, fedha, mula, nyinyo, chuma
kod gimoro amora ma mach ok nyal wangʼo noleny e mach, eka enopwodhgi mi gibed maler. To bende nyaka luokgi gi pi mondo gibed maler. Omiyo gimoro amora ma mach ok nyal lenyo nyaka luok gi pigno.
Kochopo odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo to ulwok lepu kendo ubiro bedo maler. Bangʼe unyalo biro e kambi.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“In gi Eliazar jadolo kod jotend anywola mag oganda nyaka kwan ji duto kod jamni mane ope.
Nyaka upogi gik mane ope maromre ne joma nodhi e lweny kod joma nodongʼ.
Kuom mago mopogne jolweny mano kedo, goluru ni Jehova Nyasaye achiel kuom mia abich bed ni gin ji, dhok, punde, rombe kata diek.
Kawuru nus mar pokni kendo umi Eliazar jadolo kaka chiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Kuom nus mar pok jo-Israel kawuru achiel kuom piero abich, bed ni gin ji, dhok, punde, rombe, diek kata jamni mamoko. Chiwgi ne jo-Lawi ma tijgi en rito hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.”
Omiyo Musa kod Eliazar jadolo notimo kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Kuom gik mane ope, jolweny nokawo rombe alufu mia auchiel gi piero abiriyo gabich (675,000),
dhok alufu piero abiriyo gariyo (72,000),
punde alufu piero auchiel gachiel (61,000),
kod nyiri alufu piero adek gariyo (32,000) mane pok ongʼeyo chwo.
Nus mar gik mane ope mane omi joma ne odhi kedo e lweny ne gin: rombe alufu mia adek gi piero adek gabiriyo gi mia abich (337,500),
pok mar Jehova Nyasaye ne gin rombe mia auchiel gi piero abiriyo gabich (675);
kuom dhok alufu piero adek gauchiel (36,000), pok mar Jehova Nyasaye ne gin dhok piero abiriyo gariyo (72);
kuom punde alufu piero adek gi mia abich (30,500), pok mar Jehova Nyasaye ne gin punde piero auchiel gachiel (61);
kuom ji alufu apar gauchiel (16,000), pok mar Jehova Nyasaye ne gin ji piero adek gariyo (32).
Musa nomiyo Eliazar jadolo ma kor Jehova Nyasaye, kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Nus mar pok mar jo-Israel mane Musa ogolo kuom joma nodhi e lweny ne chalo kama:
nus mar pok mar oganda ne gin rombe alufu mia adek gi piero adek gabiriyo gi mia abich (337,500),
dhok alufu piero adek gauchiel (36,000),
punde alufu piero adek gi mia abich (30,500),
kod ji alufu apar gauchiel (16,000).
Kuom nus pok mar jo-Israel, Musa noyiero achiel kuom piero abich mar ji kod jamni, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochike, mi nomiyogi jo-Lawi, ma tijgi ne en rito hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka jotelo mane orito migepe mag jolweny, jotelo mag alufe alufe kod jotelo mag miche miche, nodhi ir Musa
mi owachone niya, “Jotichni osekwano kar romb jolweny man e lwetwa, kendo onge kata achiel kuomgi molal.
Omiyo wasekelo mich ne Jehova Nyasaye kuom gik molos gi dhahabu mane wayako kaka; thiwni, manyonge, tere, stadi kod tigo mondo omi wapwodhrego e richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.”
Musa kod Eliazar jadolo noyie okawo dhahabugo irgi, ma gin gik mothedhi maber.
Dhahabu duto mane oa ir jotend lweny mag alufe alufe kod mago mag miche miche mane Musa kod Eliazar jadolo ochiwo kaka mich ne Jehova Nyasaye pekgi ne romo kilo mia ariyo.
Jalweny ka jalweny noyako mana gima orome.
Musa kod Eliazar jadolo nokawo dhahabu koa kuom jotend jolweny mag alufe alufe kod mago mag miche miche mi negiterogi e Hemb Romo kaka rapar mar jo-Israel e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad, mane nigi kweth mag rombe kod dhok, noneno ni piny Jazer kod piny Gilead ne nigi lek maber mar pidho jamni.
Omiyo negibiro ir Musa gi Eliazar jadolo kod jotend oganda mar jo-Israel, mi giwachonegi niya,
Piny motingʼo Ataroth, Dibon, Jazer, Nimra, Heshbon, Eleale, Sebam, Nebo kod Beon
ma Jehova Nyasaye osekawo ka oganda mar jo-Israel neno en piny man-gi lek maber mar pidho jamni kendo ungʼeyo ni wan jotichu wan jopidh jamni.
Negiwachonegi niya, “Ka uyie kodwa, to miwauru pinyni wasumbiniu obed marwa mondo kik wakadh wadhi loka Jordan.”
Musa nowacho ne jo-Gad kod jo-Reuben niya, “Bende jou nyalo dhi e lweny ka un to udongʼ ka?
Angʼo momiyo unego chuny jo-Israel mondo kik dhi e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye osemiyogi?
Ma e gima kwereu notimo kane aorogi kane wan Kadesh Barnea mondo gidhi ginon pinyno.
Kane gisechopo e Holo mar Eshkol mi giringo pinyno, negimiyo chuny jo-Israel onyosore mar dhi e piny mane Jehova Nyasaye osemiyogi.
Negitugo mirimb Jehova Nyasaye chiengʼno mi nokwongʼore kama:
‘Nikech ok giseluwa gi chunygi duto, onge kata ngʼato achiel ma ja-higa piero ariyo kadhi nyime mane oa Misri mabiro neno piny mane asingora ka akwongʼora ne Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo;
onge ngʼato angʼata kuomgi manone pinyno makmana Kaleb wuod Jefune ma ja-Kenizi kod Joshua wuod Nun, nimar negiluwo bangʼ Jehova Nyasaye gi chunygi duto.’
Jehova Nyasaye nokecho gi jo-Israel kendo nomiyo giwuotho alanda e thim kuom higni piero angʼwen, nyaka ogandani duto mane otimo marach e nyim Jehova Nyasaye notho.
“Un koth jorichogi, koro ubiro ira, kuchungʼ kar kwereu kendo umiyo mirimb Jehova Nyasaye medore kuom Israel.
Ka uweyo luwo Jehova Nyasaye, to obiro jwangʼo ogandani duto e thim kendo un ema ubiro miyo jogi rum.”
Bangʼ kinde matin negidwogo ir Musa mi giwachone niya, “Dwaher gero dipo ne jambwa kod mier madongo mondo mondwa kod nyithindwa odagie.
To kata kamano waikore mar manore gi gige lweny kendo dhi gi jo-Israel wetewa e piny mane osingnegi. To mokwongo nyaka wager ne mondwa gi nyithindwa mier madongo mochiel motegno mondo ogengʼ-gi kuom wasigu.
Ok wanaduogi e miechwa nyaka wane ni jo-Israel duto oseyudo pinyno kaka pok margi.
Wan ok wanadwar mondo opognwa piny kodgi loka machielo mar aora Jordan nimar osepognwa lopwa yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jordan lokani.”
Eka Musa nowachonegi niya, “Ka utimo kamano ma umanoru gi gige lweny e nyim Jehova Nyasaye,
kendo ka un duto unudhi ka utingʼo gige lweny loka Jordan e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mi ubed kuno nyaka chop Jehova Nyasaye riemb wasike duto e nyime,
ka uloyo pinyno e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, eka unuduogi kendo unubedi maonge ketho e nyim Jehova Nyasaye gi Israel. Kendo pinyni biro bedo pok maru e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
“To ka ok utimo kamano, to ubiro timo richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye; kendo bed ka ungʼeyo ni richou nofwenyre e lela.
Geruru mier madongo ne mondu gi nyithindu, kod dipo ne jambu, kendo nyaka utim kaka usesingoru.”
Jo-Gad kod jo-Reuben nowacho ne Musa niya, “Wan jotichni, wabiro timo gima ruodhwa osechikowa.
Nyithindwa kod mondewa, rombwa kod dhowa biro dongʼ e miech Gilead ka.
To wan jotichni, ngʼato ka ngʼata ma jalweny biro ngʼado loka Jordan mondo oked e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mana kaka ruodhwa osechiko.”
Omiyo Musa nomiyogi chik ka oorogi ir Eliazar jadolo, kod Joshua wuod Nun kaachiel gi jotend dhout Israel.
Nowachonegi niya, “Ka jo-Gad kod jo-Reuben noidh kaachiel kodu Jordan e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, ka ngʼato ka ngʼato omanore mar kedo, to bangʼ ka useloyo piny, to unumigi piny Gilead kaka pok margi.
To ka ok giidho kaachiel kodu ka gimanore gi gige lweny, to nyaka gikaw pok mag-gi kaachiel kodu Kanaan.”
Jo-Gad kod jo-Reuben nodwoko niya, “Jotichni biro timo kaka Jehova Nyasaye osewacho.
Wabiro ngʼado ka wadhi loka Kanaan e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ka wamanore gi gige lweny, to pok ma wabiro yudo biro bedo loka koni mar Jordan.”
Eka Musa nomiyo jo-Gad, jo-Reuben kod nus mar dhood Manase wuod Josef pinyruodh Sihon ma ruodh jo-Amor kod pinyruodh Og ma ruodh Bashan; pinyno duto kaachiel gi miechgi kod gwenge molworogi.
Jo-Gad nogero mier madongo motegno kaka Dibon, Ataroth, Aroer,
Atroth Shofan, Jazer, Jogbeha,
Beth Nimra kod Beth Haran, kendo negigero dipo ne jambgi.
Joka Reuben nogero Heshbon, Eleale kod Kiriathaim,
kaachiel gi Nebo kod Baal Meon (nyingegi noduog oloki achien) kod Sibma. Mier madongo mane gigero negimiyo nying mamoko.
Nyikwa Makir wuod Manase nodhi Gilead, moloyo dalano mi giriembo jo-Amor mane oyudo odak kanyo.
Omiyo Musa nochiwo Gilead e lwet jo-Makir, ma nyikwa Manase, kendo negidak kanyo.
Jair ma nyakwar Manase nodhi mokawo mier madongo mane ni kanyo, kendo nochako kanyo ni Havoth Jair.
Noba nomonjo Kenath kod mier molwore kendo nochake nyinge owuon miluongo ni Noba.
Ma e chenro mar wuodh jo-Israel e kinde mane gia Misri kopog-gi e migepe mopogore opogore kendo kotelnegi gi Musa kod Harun.
Kaluwore gi chik mar Jehova Nyasaye, Musa nondiko nonro maber mar migepe mag wuodhgi. Ma e kaka ne giwuotho e migawo ka migawo:
Jo-Israel nochako wuoth koa Rameses e odiechiengʼ mar apar gabich mar dwe mokwongo, ma en odiechiengʼ mokwongo bangʼ Pasaka. Negiwuok ayanga ka jo-Misri nenogi to ne ok gidewo,
nikech jo-Misri noyudo yiko nyithindgi makayo mane Jehova Nyasaye onego ka ngʼadogo bura ne nyisechegi.
Jo-Israel nowuok Rameses kendo negibuoro Sukoth.
Negiwuok Sukoth mi gibworo Etham, mantiere e bath thim.
Negiwuok Etham, mi gidok chien Pi Hahiroth, man yo wuok chiengʼ mar Baal Zefon, mi gibworo but Migdol.
Negiwuok Pi Hahiroth mi gingʼado nam nyaka e thim, kendo kane gisewuotho kuom ndalo adek e Thim mar Etham, negibuoro Mara.
Negiwuok Mara mi gidhi Elim, kuma ne nitie sokni apar gariyo kod yiend othidhe piero abiriyo, kendo negibuoro kanyo.
Negiwuok Elim mi gibworo but Nam Makwar.
Negiwuok Nam Makwar mi gibworo e Thim mar Sin.
Negiwuok e Thim mar Sin mi gibworo Dofka.
Negiwuok Dofka mi gibworo Alush.
Negiwuok Alush mi gibworo Refidim, kama ne onge pi ma ji ne nyalo modho.
Negiwuok Refidim mi gibworo e Thim mar Sinai.
Negiwuok e Thim mar Sinai mi gibworo Kibroth Hatava.
Negiwuok Kibroth Hatava mi gibworo Hazeroth.
Negiwuok Hazeroth mi gibworo Rithma.
Negiwuok Rithma mi gibworo Rimon Perez.
Negiwuok Rimon Perez mi gibworo Libna.
Negiwuok Libna mi gibworo Risa.
Negiwuok Risa mi gibworo Kehelatha.
Negiwuok Kehelatha mi gibworo e Got Shefa.
Negiwuok Got Shefa mi gibworo Harada.
Negiwuok Harada mi gibworo Makheloth.
Negiwuok Makheloth mi gibworo Tahath.
Negiwuok Tahath mi gibworo Tera.
Negiwuok Tera mi gibworo Mithka.
Negiwuok Mithka mi gibworo Hashmona.
Negiwuok Hashmona mi gibworo Moseroth.
Negiwuok Moseroth mi gibworo Bene Jaakan.
Negiwuok Bene Jaakan mi gibworo Hor Hagidgad.
Negiwuok Hor Hagidgad mi gibworo Jotbatha.
Negiwuok Jotbatha mi gibworo Abrona.
Negiwuok Abrona mi gibworo Ezion Geber.
Negiwuok Ezion Geber mi gibworo Kadesh, mantiere e Thim mar Zin.
Negiwuok Kadesh mi gibworo e Got Hor, mantiere e tongʼ mar Edom.
Kaluwore gi chik mar Jehova Nyasaye, Harun jadolo nodhi e Got Hor, kama nothoe odiechiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe mar abich, e higa mar piero angʼwen bangʼ wuok jo-Israel e piny Misri.
Harun ne ja-higni mia achiel gi piero ariyo gadek eka ne otho e Got Hor.
Ruoth Arad ma ja-Kanaan, mane odak Negev mar Kanaan, nowinjo ni jo-Israel biro.
Kane giwuok e Got Hor negibuoro Zalmona.
Negiwuok Zalmona mi gibworo Punon.
Negiwuok Punon mi gibworo Oboth.
Negiwuok Oboth mi gibworo Iye Abarim, mantiere e tongʼ piny Moab.
Negiwuok Iye Abarim mi gibworo Dibon Gad.
Negiwuok Dibon Gad mi gibworo Almon Diblathaim.
Negiwuok Almon Diblathaim mi gibworo e gode mag Abarim, man but Nebo.
Bangʼ kane giwuok e gode mag Abarim negibuoro e pewe mag Moab mokiewo gi Jordan momanyore gi Jeriko.
Negibuoro e pewe mag Moab mokiewo gi Jordan chakre Beth Jeshimoth nyaka Abel Shitim.
Jehova Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa e pewe mag Moab momanyore gi Jeriko mokiewo gi Jordan kowachone niya,
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo iwachnegi kama: Ka ungʼado Jordan mi udonjo Kanaan,
to uriemb ji duto modak e pinyno. Kethuru gigegi duto mopa milamo bende uwit kido duto milamo ma giloso, kendo umuki kuondegi magiloso motingʼore gi malo mar lemo.
Kawuru pinyno mi udagie, nimar asemiyougo mondo obed maru.
Poguru pinyno e kugoyo ombulu e kindu, kaluwore gi dhoutu. Dhoot maduongʼ opog lowo maduongʼ, to dhoot matin opog lowo matin. Gimoro amora mopogne dhoutu gombulu nobed margi. Pog-gi kaluwore gi dhout kweregi.
“ ‘To ka ok uriembo joma odak e pinyno, to joma uweyo modongʼ biro bedonu ka cha bondo e wangʼu kendo ka kudho machwoyo dendu koni gi koni. Ginimiu chandruok e piny ma ubiro dakieno.
Bangʼ mano anatimnu gima ne achano mondo atimnegi.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Chik jo-Israel kiwachonegi kama: Ka usedonjo e piny Kanaan, ma en piny manomiu kaka poku, tongʼne nochal kama:
“ ‘Pinyu ma yo milambo nochakre e Thim Zin manie tongʼ piny Edom. Tongʼu ma yo milambo mogik yo wuok chiengʼ nochakre e giko mar Nam Chumbi
kongʼado yo milambo mar Akrabim, modhi nyime nyaka Zin kendo ochopo yo milambo mar Kadesh Barnea. Eka nodhi nyaka Hazar Adar mi okal nyaka Azmon,
