kama Azmon ogomoe, moriwre gi Wadi mar Misri kendo gikone en Nam Mediterania.
Tongʼu man yo podho chiengʼ nobed Nam Mediterania. Ma ema nobed tongʼu man yo podho chiengʼ.
Tongʼu man yo nyandwat nochakre e dho Nam Mediterania nyaka e Got Hor
kendo koa e Got Hor nyaka Lebo Hamath. Eka tongʼno nodhi nyaka Zedad,
kodhi nyime nyaka Zifron mi ogik Hazar Enan. Ma ema nobed tongʼu man yo nyandwat.
Tongʼu man yo wuok chiengʼ, nochakre Hazar Enan nyaka Shefam.
Tongʼno nodhi nyime koa Shefam nyaka Ribla mantiere yo wuok chiengʼ mar Ain kendo nomed dhi nyaka kuonde moridore mantiere yo wuok chiengʼ mar Nam Kinereth.
Eka tongʼno nodhi nyime koluwo Jordan kendo nogigi e Nam Chumbi. “ ‘Magi ema nobed tongʼ pinyu koni gi koni.’ ”
Musa nomiyo jo-Israel chik kama: “Ma e piny ma ubiro kawo kaka poku kokalo kuom goyo ombulu. Jehova Nyasaye osechiwo chik mondo pinyno opogi ne dhoudi ochiko gi nus,
nimar anywola mag dhood Reuben, dhood Gad, kod nus mar dhood Manase oseyudo pok margi.
Dhoudi ariyo gi nusgo oseyudo pokgi loka Aora Jordan man yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jeriko.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa niya,
“Magi e nyinge joma chwo monego pogu pinyni kaka pok maru: Eliazar jadolo kod Joshua wuod Nun.
Bende nyaka ikaw jatend dhoot ka dhoot mondo okonyi e tijno.
“Kendo magi e nying-gi: “e dhood Juda, en Kaleb wuod Jefune;
e dhood Simeon, en Shemuel wuod Amihud;
e dhood Benjamin, en Elidad wuod Kislon;
jatelo mowuok e dhood Dan, en Buki wuod Jogli;
jatelo mowuok e dhood Manase wuod Josef, en Haniel wuod Efod;
jatelo mowuok e dhood Efraim wuod Josef, en Kemuel wuod Shiftan;
jatelo mowuok e dhood Zebulun, en Elizafan wuod Parnak;
jatelo mowuok e dhood Isakar, en Paltiel wuod Azan;
jatelo mowuok e dhood Asher, en Ahihud wuod Shelomi;
jatelo mowuok e dhood Naftali, en Pedahel wuod Amihud.”
Magi e joma Jehova Nyasaye nochiko mondo opog jo-Israel girkeni e piny Kanaan.
Jehova Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa e pewe mag Moab momanyore gi Jeriko mokiewo gi Jordan kowacho niya,
“Chik jo-Israel mondo gimi jo-Lawi mier ma gibiro dakie kuom pok ma jo-Israel biro yudo. Kendo umigi lege mag kwath molworo miergo.
Eka ginibed gi mier ma ginyalo dakie kod lege mag kwath ne dhog-gi, rombegi kod jambgi mamoko duto.
“Kuonde mag kwath molworo mier ma umiyo jo-Lawi nopim maromo fut alufu achiel mia angʼwen gi piero abiriyo gauchiel koa e kor ohinga.
To oko mar dala, pimuru fut alufu angʼwen mia abich kod piero ochiko gadek koa yo wuok chiengʼ, fut alufu angʼwen mia abich kod piero ochiko gadek koa yo milambo, fut alufu angʼwen mia abich kod piero ochiko gadek koa yo podho chiengʼ, kod fut alufu angʼwen mia abich kod piero ochiko gadek koa yo nyandwat, ka dala oger e dier lowono tir. Ginikaw kanyo kaka lek mar kwath ne joma odak e miergo.
“Mier auchiel ma umiyo jo-Lawi nobed mier mag tony, ma ngʼat moneko nyalo ringo mondo opondie. Ewi mago medgi mier piero angʼwen gariyo mamoko.
Koriwore duto nyaka umi jo-Lawi mier piero angʼwen gaboro, kaachiel gi lege mag kwath.
Mier ma umiyo jo-Lawi koa kuom piny ma jo-Israel okawo kaka pok margi nyaka pog matindo tindo kaka pok mar dhoot ka dhoot: Kawuru mier mangʼeny kuom dhoot man-gi mangʼeny, to kawuru manok kuom jogo man-gi manok.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ne Musa kama:
“Wuo gi jo-Israel kendo iwachnegi ni: ‘Ka ungʼado Jordan mi uchopo Kanaan,
to yieruru mier moko mondo obed miechu mag tony, ma ngʼat monego ngʼato kobothne nyalo ringo dhiye.
Gibiro bedo mier mag tony kua e nyim ngʼama dwaro chulo kuor, mondo omi ngʼat miparo kuome ni oneko kik negi kapok oyale e nyim oganda.
Mier auchiel muchiwogi nobed mier mag tony.
Chiwuru mier adek mag tony ni yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jordan to adek nobed Kanaan.
Mier auchielgo nobed kuonde tony ne jo-Israel, jodak kod ngʼato angʼata modak kodgi, mondo omi ngʼato angʼata monego ngʼat machielo kobothne nyalo ringo dhiye.
“ ‘Ka ngʼato ogoyo wadgi gi gima olos gi chuma, motho, to en janek; omiyo janekno nyaka negi.
Kata ka ngʼato nigi kidi e lwete manyalo nego ngʼato, mi ogoyogo wadgi motho, to en janek; omiyo janekno nyaka negi.
Kata ka ngʼato otingʼo gimoro molos gi yien e lwete, mi ogoyogo wadgi motho, en janek; omiyo janekno nyaka negi.
Owad gi ngʼat monegno noneg janekno; koromo kode to nonege.
Ka ngʼato obwono wadgi gi chunye kata odiro gimoro kuome kongʼeyo motho,
kata ka en gi mirima mi ogoye adhongʼ motho, to ngʼatno nonegi; nimar en janek. Owad gi ngʼat monegno noneg janekno koromo kode.
“ ‘To kaponi odhiro wadgi ma ok gimonrego kata kochiele gi gimoro kobothne
kata ka olwaro kidi manyalo nege kuome motho; to ne ok en jasike kendo noonge gi paro mar hinye,
to oganda nokel thek e kind janekno kod owadgi ngʼat monegi kaluwore gi chik.
Oganda nyaka res janekno kuom owad gi ngʼat monegi mi gidwoke e dala mar tony mane oringo odhiye. Enodag kanyo nyaka chop jadolo mane owir gi mo maler tho.
“ ‘To ka ngʼat monekono owuok oko mar dala mar tony mane odhiyoe,
kendo owad gi ngʼat mane onegocha oyude oko mar dala mar tony, to onyalo nege ma ok obedo gi richo mar nek.
Janek nyaka sik e dalane mar tony nyaka jadolo maduongʼ tho; to en mana bangʼ tho mar jadolo maduongʼno ema onyalo dok chamo mwandune.
“ ‘Mago ema nobednu chike mosiko e tienge duto, kamoro amora ma unudagie.
“ ‘Ngʼato angʼata ma onego ngʼato nyaka negi kaka janek mana ka nitie joneno manyalo wacho ni notimore kamano. To onge ngʼama inyalo negi kuom wach janeno achiel kende.
“ ‘Kik ikaw asoya kuom ngʼatno moneko, nikech owinjore gi tho. Nyaka ngʼatno negi.
“ ‘Kik ikaw asoya kuom ngʼato angʼata moringo odhi e dala mar tony koparo ni inyalo weye mondo odog e lope owuon kapok jadolo maduongʼ otho.
“ ‘Kik udwany piny mudakie. Chwero remo dwanyo piny, kendo pwodhruok ok nyal tim ne piny modwany kuom chwero remo, makmana kokadho kuom remb ngʼatno mane ochwero remo.
Kik udwany piny mudakie gi remo kod kama adakie, nimar an, Jehova Nyasaye, adak e kind jo-Israel.’ ”
Jatend anywola mar joka Gilead wuod Makir, ma wuod Manase, mane oa e dhout nyikwa Josef, nobiro mi owuoyo e nyim Musa kod jotelo, ma gin jotend anywola mag jo-Israel.
Negiwacho niya, “Kane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo ruodha chik mondo opog piny ne jo-Israel kigoyo ombulu, nomiyi chik mondo pok mag owadwa Zelofehad mi nyige.
Koro parane ni onywomgi gi chwo moa e dhout jo-Israel mamoko; to pokgi nogol kuom pok mar kwerewa, mi med libamba mane onywomogi. Omiyo bath pok marwa nomawa.
Ka Higa mar Piero Abich mar jo-Israel ochopo (tiende ni Jubli), to nokaw girkeni mag-gi kigolo kuom gikeni mar dhoodgi kimedo e dhood joma onywomogi.”
Eka Musa nomiyo jo-Israel wach machalo kama kaluwore gi chik mane Jehova Nyasaye omiye: “Gima dhood nyikwa Josef wacho nikare.
Ma e chik ma Jehova Nyasaye chiwo kuom nyi Zelofehad: Inyalo nywomgi gi ngʼato angʼata ma gihero moa e dhoodgi.
Onge pok mar Israel maa e dhoodni to dhi e dhoot machielo, nimar ja-Israel moro ka moro norit lowo mane oyudo koa kuom kwerene.
Nyako moro amora ma oyudo pok mar lowo kaka girkeni e dhood Israel moro amora nyaka nyuom gi ngʼato moa e dhood wuon mare, mondo omi ja-Israel moro amora oyud pok mar wuon mare.
Onge pok mano kadhi koa e dhoodni kadhi e dhoot machielo, nimar ja-Israel moro amora nyaka rit lop kwerene.”
Omiyo nyi Zelofehad notimo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosemiyo Musa chik.
Nyi Zelofehad miluongo ni Mala, Tirza, Hogla, Milka kod Nowa nonywom gi ominegi ma yawuot owadgi wuon-gi.
Nonywomgi ei anywola mar nyikwa Manase wuod Josef, kendo pok margi nosiko e anywola gi wuon-gi kendo e dhood gi wuon-gi.
Magi e chike kod buche mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiwo kokalo kuom Musa mondo omi jo-Israel e pewe mag Moab e bath Aora Jordan kama omanyore gi Jeriko.
Magi e weche mane Musa owacho ne jo-Israel duto e piny motwo man wuok chiengʼ mar Jordan, mano man Araba mochomore gi Suf e kind Paran kod Tofel; Laban, Hazeroth kod Dizahab.
(En wuodh ndalo apar gachiel kia Horeb nyaka Kadesh Barnea kiwuok e got maluwo yo Seir.)
E higa mar piero angʼwen e odiechiengʼ mokwongo mar dwe mar apar gachiel, Musa ne owacho ne jo-Israel gik moko duto mane Jehova Nyasaye ochike mondo owachnegi.
Ma ne bangʼ kane oseloyo Sihon ruodh jo-Amor mane ruodh Heshbon kendo noloyo Og ruodh Bashan, ma bende nosebedo gi loch e piny Edrei gi Ashtaroth.
Musa nochako puonjo weche mag chik koa yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jordan nyaka tongʼ Moab kowachona niya,
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nowachonwa ka en Horeb niya, “Isedak mangʼeny ahinya e godni.
Wuogi e kambi kendo iwuoth kichomo bungu man e gode mag jo-Amor, dhi e miech ji duto mokiewo gi Araba, jogo modak e gode, jogo modak e tie gode man yo podho chiengʼ, jogo modak Negev kod mago modak e dho nam, kaachiel gi jogo modak e piny Kanaan kod Lebanon, nyaka chop e aora maduongʼ mar Yufrate.
Ne, asemiyoi pinyni. Dhiuru kendo ukaw piny mane Jehova Nyasaye ne okwongʼore ni nomi Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo kaachiel gi nyikwagi.”
E odiechiengno ne awachonu niya, “Un joma tekogi ohinga ma ok anyal tingʼo kenda.
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyo kwan maru omedore ma kawuono ungʼeny mana ka sulwe manie kor polo.
Mad Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu mi unyaa moromo alufu gi alufu kendo enogwedhu mana kaka nosingore.
To ere kaka anyalo tingʼo chandruoku, tingʼ magu mapek kod dondruokgo kenda awuon.
Yier jomariek man-gi winjo kod joma nigi luor mowuok e dhoudi duto kendo naketgi jotendu.”
Ne udwoka niya, “Gima iparo mar timono nikare.”
Omiyo nakawo joma otelo ne dhoutu, ma gin joma riek momi luor kendo naketogi mondo gibed loch kuomu kaka jotend oganda. Moko kuomgi naketo jotend ji alufu alufu, to moko jotend mia mia, to moko jotend ji piero abich abich, bangʼe moko jotend ji apar apar kendo moko naketo jotelo mopogore opogore e dhoutgi duto.
E kindeno nachiko jongʼad bura mau niya, Winjuru weche manie kind oweteu kendo ungʼad bura kare poni nitie bura e kind jo-Israel kendgi kata e kind ja-Israel kod japiny moro.
Kik udew wangʼ ka ungʼado bura, winj ngʼat matin kod maduongʼ mana machal. Kik uluor wangʼ ngʼato nimar bura makare en mar Nyasaye. Kelnauru bura moro amora matek ma ok unyal kendo abiro winjo.
Kendo kanyo ema ne anyisue gik moko duto mane onego utim.
Mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nochikowa, ne wachako wuoth ka wawuok Horeb kendo ne wachomo pinje mag gode mar jo-Amor, kwakalo e dier bungu malich ma useneno kendo ne wachopo Kadesh Barnea.
Eka ne awachonu niya, “Usechopo e pinje mag gode mar jo-Amor ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa miyowa.
To ne, Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasachu osemiyou piny. Dhiuru mondo ukawe mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach kwereu nowacho niya. Kik ubed maluor, chunyu bende kik nyosre.”
Eka un duto nubiro ira muwachna niya, “Waor jomoko nyimwa mondo odhi onon-nwa piny kendo odwoknwa wach e yo ma onego walu gi dala ma wabiro chopoe.”
Parono ne aneno kaber omiyo ne ayiero ji apar gariyo kuomu ka ngʼato ka ngʼato oa e dhoodgi.
Ne giwuok ka gidhi e pinje mag gode ma gichopo e Holo mar Eshkol mondo ginon kaka pinyno obet.
Negikawo gik monyak e pinyno, mi gikelonwa, kagiwacho niya, “En piny maber ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa biro miyowa.”
Ne ok giyie dhi e pinyno, kendo ne gingʼanyo mi gidagi winjo chike Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi.
Ne ungʼur e hembeu ka uwacho niya, Jehova Nyasaye ok dwarwa, omiyo nogolowa e piny Misri mondo ochiw-wa e lwet jo-Amor mondo otiekwa.
Ere kuma wanyalo dhiyoe? Owetewa osechido chunywa, ka giwachonwa niya, “Jogo tek kendo boyo moloyowa, mier madongo lach kendo nigi ohinga, bende ne waneno jo-Anak.”
Eka ne awachonu niya, “Kik ubwogi, kik uluorgi
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, ma otelo e nyimu, biro kedonu mana kaka ne okedonu e piny Misri kod e thim ka uneno gi wengeu uwegi.
Kuno bende ne uneno kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu okawo tingʼu mana kaka wuoro kawo tingʼ wuode, kotelonu e wuodhu duto nyaka uchopo ka.”
Ei magi duto ne ok uketo genou kuom Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,
mane otelo nyimu e wuodhu, gotieno notelonu gi mach to godiechiengʼ notelonu gi rumbi mondo umany kuonde monego ubworie kendo onyisu yo monego uluw.
Kane Jehova Nyasaye owinjo gima ne uwacho, mirima nomake mi okwongʼore niya,
“Onge ngʼama nitiere e tiengʼ mobamni manone piny maberni mane asingora ni nami kweregi,
makmana Kaleb wuod Jefune. En ema none pinyno kendo anamiyego kaachiel gi nyikwaye kamoro amora ma tiende nonyon nikech osebedo koluwo Jehova Nyasaye gi chunye duto.”
Nikech un, Jehova Nyasaye ne okecho koda mi owachona niya, “Ok inidonji e pinyno.”
To jalupni ma en Joshua wuod Nun ema nodonji e pinyno. Omiyo jiwe nikech en ema notelne jo-Israel duto ka kawo pinyno.
To jomatindo mane uwacho ni biro ter e twech, ma gin nyithindo ma ok ongʼeyo pogo ber kod rach, gin ema ginidonji e pinyno. Anamigi pinyno kendo ginikawe mi gidagie.
To un chakuru wuoth kudok chien e thim kuchomo Nam Makwar.
Eka ne udwoko niya, “Wasetimo richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Wabiro aa malo kendo kedo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ochikowa.” Omiyo ji duto norwako gige lweny ka giparo ni en gima yot monjo piny godeno.
To Jehova Nyasaye nowachona niya, Kwergi ni kik gidhi gikedi nimar ok anabed kodgi. Ibiro lowu gi wasiku.
Ne awachonu kamano to ne ok unyal winjo. Ne ungʼanyo ne Jehova Nyasaye mi ok uluwo chikene, kendo gi wich teko maru ne uwuotho ka udhi e piny mar gode.
Jo-Amor mane odak e pinje godego ne omonjou, mi gilawou ka kich ma ogodak kagi goyou chakre Seir nyaka Horma.
Ne udwogo ma uywak e nyim Jehova Nyasaye to ne ok ochiko ite ne ywaku kendo ne ok owinjo kwayou.
Omiyo ne udak Kadesh kuom kinde mangʼeny, adier kuom kinde mangʼeny ne udak kuno.
Eka ne wachako wuoth kwangʼado thim kwachomo Nam Makwar mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochika. Kuom kinde mangʼeny ne wadigni e piny gode mag Seir.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye ne owachona niya,
“Usedigni bangʼ kinde mangʼeny kulwororu e pinyni, omiyo wuothuru kuchomo yor nyandwat.
Nyis ji wechegi kiwachonegi ni, ‘Uchiegni kalo e piny joweteu ma nyikwa Esau modak Seir. Gibiro bedo gi kibaji nikech un, to beduru motangʼ.
Kik udwar kodgi lweny nimar ok anamiu pinygi kata mana kama uketo e tiendu kende. Asemiyo Esau pinje mag gode man Seir kaka girkeni mare.
Ubiro chulogi fedha kuom chiemo ma uchamo kod pi ma umodho.’ ”
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osegwedho tich lwetu. Oseritou ka uwuotho e thim malichni kendo kuom higni piero angʼwen-gi duto Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osebedo kodu mi ok uchando gimoro.
Eka ne wakalo Seir kama jowetewa ma nyikwa Esau nodakie. Bangʼe ne waa Araba kwachomo Elath kod Ezion Geber mi wawuotho kwachomo thim Moab.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye ne owachona niya, “Kik umonj jo-Moab kata kwinyogi mondo gitug lweny kodu, nimar ok anamiu dir pinygi moro amora. Kanyo asemiyo joka Ar ma nyikwa Lut kaka girkeni margi.”
(Jo-Emi osebedo ka odak kanyo, ma gin joma rateke, mangʼeny kendo ma roboche mana ka jo-Anak.
Jo-Emi kod jo-Anak ji ne luongogiga ni jo-Refai, to jo-Moab to ne luongogi ni jo-Emi.
Chon jo-Hori nodak e piny Seir, to nyikwa Esau noriembogi oko. Negitieko jo-Hori mane ni kanyo mi gidak kuondegi mana kaka jo-Israel notimo e piny mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyogi kaka girkeni.)
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Koro chungi mondo ingʼad Holo mar Zered.” Omiyo ne wangʼado holono.
E kinde mane wawuok Kadesh Barnea nyaka wangʼado Holo mar Zered nokawowa higni piero adek gaboro. E kindeno tiengʼ mar jolweny duto notho e kambi, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ne osesingorenegi.
Lwet Jehova Nyasaye ne mon kodgi nyaka ne otiekogi duto e kambi.
Kane joma odongʼ ma jolweny osetho,
Jehova Nyasaye ne owachona niya,
“Kawuononi ubiro kalo e gwenge mag Moab manie piny Ar.
Ka ubiro ir jo-Amon, to kik uchandgi kata dwaro tugo kodgi lweny, nimar ok anamiu gimoro amora e piny jo-Amon. Asechiwe kaka girkeni ne nyikwa Lut.”
(Pinyno bende ne okwan kaka piny jo-Refai mane osebedo kodak kuno, to jo-Amon to ne luongogi ni jo-Zamzumi.
Gin oganda marateke, mangʼeny kendo ma roboche mana ka jo-Anak. Jehova Nyasaye ne otiekogi e nyim jo-Amon, mane oriembogi mi gidak kuondegigo.
Jehova Nyasaye ne osetimo mano ne nyikwa Esau, mane odak Seir, e kinde mane otieko jo-Hori ka gineno. Negiriembogi oko kendo gidak kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
To jo-Kaftor mane oa Kaftor noriembo jo-Avi mabor nyaka e gwenge mag Gaza, mi koro gidak kanyo.)
“Koro ikreuru kendo ukadh holo mar Arnon. Neuru, asechiwo e lwetu Sihon ja-Amor ma ruodh Heshbon kod pinye. Chakuru kedo kodgi mondo ukawe.
Kochakore odiechiengni abiro kelo luoro kod kibaji ne ogendini duto modak e piny. E kinde ma giniwinjie humbu, gibiro kirni kendo kihondko biro makogi.”
Koa e thim mar Kedemoth, ne aoro joote ne Sihon ma ruodh Heshbon kakwaye mondo kwe obedie kawachone niya,
“Yienwauru wakal e pinyu nikech wabiro luwo yo tir kendo ok wanabar e bat korachwich kata koracham.
Yie iusnwa chiemo mwachamo kod pi mwamodho nikech nengogi romre gi fedha, kendo iwewa aweya wakadhi kwawuotho gi tiendwa,
mana kaka nyikwa Esau mane odak Seir kod jo-Moab modak Ar ne jotimonwa, negiweyo wangʼado Jordan miwadonjo e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa miyowa.”
To Sihon ruodh Heshbon ne otamowa kadho e pinygi nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nosemiye wich teko, kendo chunye odoko matek mondo ochiwe e lwetu mana kaka osetimo.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachona niya, “Neuru, koro achiwo Sihon kod pinye e lwetu, koro monjeuru mondo ukaw pinyeno.”
Kane Sihon kod jolwenje duto nobiro mondo ochak kodwa lweny e piny Jahaz,
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nochiwe e lwetwa kendo ne watieke gi nyithinde kod jolwenje duto.
E kindeno ne wakawo mieche duto, mi wanego, chwo, mon kod nyithindo duto, kendo onge ngʼama ne waweyo kangima.
To jamni kod gik moyaki mane oa e miechgi mane wakawo ne wadhi godo.
Onge dala mane nyalo sirowa e lweny chakre Aroer, e dho holo mar Arnon kod dala manie holo hie nyaka chop Gilead kendo onge kata mana dala achiel mane ok wanyal kawo. Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nochiwogi duto e lwetwa.
To kaluwore gi chik Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, ne ok ukawo piny jo-Amon moro amora kata mana piny mokiewo gi Jabok kata mago molworo dalane manie gode.
Bangʼe negigomo ma giluwo yo madhi Bashan, kendo Og ruodh Bashan gi jolweny mage duto nowuok riat mokedo kodwa e lweny Edrei.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachona niya, “Kik iluore nimar asechiwe e lweti, en kaachiel gi jolweny mage duto kod pinye. Timne kaka ne itimone Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, mane obedo gi loch e piny Heshbon.”
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nochiwo Og ruodh Bashan gi jolwenje duto e lwetwa, kendo ne watiekogi mi wanegogi duto maonge ngʼama nodongʼ.
E kindeno ne wakawo mier madongo mage duto. Onge kata mana dala maduongʼ kuom mier piero auchiel madongo mag-gi mane ok wakawo, tiende ni gwenge duto man Argob, ma en pinyruodh Og man Bashan.
Mier madongogi duto ne ochiel gi ohinga kod rangeye mag chumbe, to bende ne nitie mier moko matindo mangʼeny mane ok ochiel.
Dala ka dala ne wanegoe ji duto modakie, kaka chwo, mon kod nyithindo mana kaka ne watimo ne Sihon ruodh Heshbon.
To jamni duto kod gik moyaki moa e mier madongo mag-gi, ne watingʼo wadhigo.
Omiyo e kindeno ne wakawo pinje mag ruodhi ariyo mag jo-Amor, mantie yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jordan, kochakore e holo mar Arnon mochopo nyaka Got Hermon.
(Hermon iluongo ni Sirion gi jo-Sidon, to jo-Amor luonge ni Senir).
Ne wakawo dalane duto manie got mesa Gilead duto, kod Bashan duto chakre Saleka, Edrei, dalane mag pinyruodh Og man Bashan.
(Og ruodh Bashan kende e ngʼama ne odongʼ e dier jomane otony kuom jo-Refai. Otandane ne olos gi nyinyo; borne ne oyombo fut apar gadek kendo lachne fut auchiel. Otandaneno pod ni Raba piny jo-Amon nyaka chil kawuono).
Kuom pinje moko mane wakawo e kindeno, ne amiyo joka Reuben kod joka Gad tongʼ mokiewo gi Aroer man e bath holo mar Arnon, komedi gi nus mar piny gode manie Gilead kod miechgi duto.
Pinje Gilead modongʼ duto kod Bashan, pinyruodh Og, ne amiyo nus mar dhood jo-Manase. (E gwenge duto mag Argob man Bashan, nosebedo kiluongo ni piny jo-Refai.
Jair mawuok e dhood Manase ne okawo gwenge duto mag Argob ma ochopo nyaka e tongʼ man e kind jo-Geshur kod jo-Maakath; ne ochake nyinge owuon, manyaka kawuononi Bashan pod iluongo ni Havoth Jair.)
Kendo ne achiwo Gilead ne Makir.
To ne jo-Reuben kod jo-Gad, ne amiyogi kochakore Gilead nyaka e holo mar Arnon (e dier holono tir nobedo tongʼ) kendo koa Aora Jabok ma en tongʼ mar jo-Amon.
Bende nomi jo-Reuben kod jo-Gad piny ma yo podho chiengʼ mar Jordan man Araba nyaka Kinereth mochopo dho Nam mar Araba (ma tiende ni Nam Chumbi), man e bwo gode mag Pisga.
E kindeno ne amiyou chik kawacho niya, “Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyou pinyni mondo ukaw, to jolwenju duto machwo motegno moikore ne lweny nyaka kadh dhi loka e nyim oweteu ma jo-Israel.
Makmana mondeu, nyithindu kod jambu (angʼeyo ni un gi jamni mangʼeny), mondo odag e dalane ma asemiyou,
nyaka chop Jehova Nyasaye mi oweteu kwe, mana kaka osemiyou kendo gin bende gikaw piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou, loka mar Jordan. Bangʼ mano ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomu odogi kare ma asemiye kaka girkeni.”
E kindeno ne achiko kawachone Joshua niya, “Iseneno gi wangʼi gik ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi osetimo ni ruodhi ariyogi. Jehova Nyasaye biro timo mana machal kamano ne pinjeruodhi duto kuma udhiyoeno.
Kik uluorgi; nikech Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu owuon nokednu.”
E kindeno ne akwayo Jehova Nyasaye niya,
“Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, isechako nyiso jatichni badi mar loch kod tekoni maduongʼ. Nimar en nyasaye mane manie piny kata e polo manyalo timo gik marateke kaka misetimo?
We angʼadi adhi ane piny maber loka Jordan piny gode kod Lebanon.”
To nikech un, Jehova Nyasaye ne okecho koda kendo ne ok onyal chiko ite ne wechena. Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Mano oromo, kik ichak iwuo koda kuom wachno.
Dhiyo ewi got Pisga mondo ine piny koa wuok chiengʼ nyaka podho chiengʼ kendo koa nyandwat nyaka milambo. Rang piny gi wengeni owuon, nimar ok iningʼad aora Jordan.
Ket Joshua mondo okaw kari kijiwe kendo imiye teko, nimar en ema obiro telo ne jogi koterogi loka cha mondo gikaw piny ma ibiro nenono.”
Omiyo wan ne wadongʼ e bath holo machiegni gi Beth Peor.
Yaye, jo-Israel, winjuru buche kod chike ma amiyou, luwgi mondo udagi kendo mondo ukaw piny ma Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach kwereu miyou.
Kik umedi kata ugol gimoro amora kuom chik ma amiyou, to rituru chike ma amiyou mag Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Ne uneno gi wengeu uwegi gima Jehova Nyasaye ne otimo Baal Peor. Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu notieko koa kuomu jogo duto mane oluwo Baal mar Peor,
to ne un uduto mane usiko kupadoru kuom Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu pod ungima nyaka chil kawuono.
Ne, asepuonjou buche kod chike kaka ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha nochika, mondo uluw chikenego e piny mudhidonjoe kendo kawo.
Ritgiuru maber, nimar mano ema biro nyiso riekou gi ngʼeyou ni ogendini mamoko mabiro winjo buchegi duto wach niya, “Adier, onge oganda mariek kendo man-gi ngʼeyo koganda maduongʼni.”
Ere oganda machielo ma ogen man kod nyasachgi machiegni e yo ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa chiegnigo kodwa e yo moro amora ma walame?
Kara ere oganda machielo maduongʼ man kod buche gi chike makare machal gi chike mamiyou kawuononi?
Beduru motangʼ kendo neuru ni wiu ok owil gi gik museneno gi wangʼu kendo kik uwegi gia e chunyu ka pod ungima. Puonjuru nyithindu kod nyikwau wechegi.
Paruruane chiengʼ mane uchungʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu e Horeb, kane owachona niya, “Chok ji e nyima ka mondo giwinj wechena mondo mi gipuonjre luora ndalo duto mag ngimagi kendo bende gipuonj nyithindgi wechegi.”
Ne ubiro machiegni ma uchungʼ e tiend got. Godno mach ne liele mochopo nyaka e polo, ka en-gi rumbi maratengʼ kod mudho mandiwa.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye ne owuoyonu kokalo ei mach. Ne uwinjo dwol kawuok ei mach, to ne ok uneno ngʼat mane wuoyono, to makmana dwol kende ema nuwinjo.
Ne owachonu singruokne, ma gin Chike Apar, mane ochikou mondo uluw kendo ne ondikogi e kite mopa ariyo.
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye ne owachona e kindeno mondo apuonju buche kod chike ma onego uluw e piny ma udhiye loka Jordan mondo ukaw.
Ne ok uneno Jehova Nyasaye gi wangʼu e kinde mane uwinjo dwonde koa e mach e got Horeb. Omiyo beduru motangʼ ahinya,
mondo kik ubed jo-mibadhi ka uloso nyisecheu uwegi, kata kido moro amora mochwe ka dichwo kata ka dhako,
kata ka chiayo moro e piny kata ka winyo mafuyo e kor polo,
kata ka gimoro amora mochwe mamol e lowo kata ka rech manie pi.
Ka ungʼiyo polo ma uneno chiengʼ, dwe kod sulwe karieny (ma gin gigo manyiso duongʼ mar polo), to kik gimak pachu mi ukulrunegi ka ulamo. Gin gigo ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyo jopinje duto manie piny bwo polo.
To un, Jehova Nyasaye noresou mogolou e mach mager kuwuok e piny Misri mondo ubed kaka girkeni mare nyaka chiengʼ, mana kaka un sani.
Jehova Nyasaye nokecho koda nikech un, kendo ne okwongʼoreni ok anangʼad aora Jordan mondo adonji e piny maber ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou ka girkeni.
Abiro tho e pinyni, ok anangʼad aora Jordan, to un uchiegni ngʼado mondo udhi ukaw kereu e piny maberno.
Beduru motangʼ mondo kik wiu wil gi singruok mane Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu otimo kodu, kik ulos ne un uwegi kido moro amora milamo ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu okwero.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en mach matieko gik mowangʼo kendo en Nyasaye ma janyiego.
Bangʼ ka usedak e pinyno kuom higni mangʼeny mi ubedo gi nyithindo kod nyikwau, bangʼe ubedo jo-mibadhi ma uloso kido mopa kendo utimo gik mamono e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, ka umiye mirima;
to aluongo polo gi piny mondo obed joneno kuomu kawuono, ni ubiro rumo mapiyo nono e piny ma ubiro kawo loka Jordan.
Jehova Nyasaye biro keyou e dier ogendini kendo ji manok kuomu ema notony e kind pinje ma Jehova Nyasaye noterue.
Kuno unulamie gik ma dhano oloso gi lwetgi, ma gin nyiseche molos gi bao kata gi kite mopa, gin gik ma ok nyal neno, winjo, chiemo kata winjo tik gimoro.
To ka udwaro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kanyo, to unuyude ka umanye gi chunyu duto kod ngimau duto.
Bangʼ ka gigi duto osetimorenu mi ubedo gi chuny mool, eka unuduog ir Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo uluore.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en Nyasaye ma jangʼwono ok enojwangʼu kata tiekou kata wiye wil kod singruok mane otimo gi kwereu kokwongʼore.
Penj ane sani gik mane timore chon, ndalo mane pok onywolu, kochakore e ndalo mane Nyasaye ochweyo dhano e piny; penj ane koa e bath polo konchiel nyaka komachielo. Bende gima duongʼ kama osetimore kata gima chal kama osewinji?
Bende nitie oganda moro mosewinjo dwond Nyasaye kawuoyo e mach kaka usewinjoni ma obedo mangima?
Bende nitiere nyasaye moro mosegolo oganda kuom oganda machielo moselok wasumbini? Koso bende nitiere moro mosetemo timo timbe madongogi gi ranyisi, honni gi lweny kendo gi teko maduongʼ kod bat morie kaka Jehova Nyasaye notimonu e piny Misri e wangʼu kuneno.
Osenyisu gigi duto mondo ungʼe ni Jehova Nyasaye en Nyasaye; onge Nyasaye moro ma ok en.
Noyie uwinjo dwonde gie polo mond opuonjugo. Bende noyienu ma uneno mach makakni e piny, kendo nuwinjo dwonde ei majno.
Nikech ne ohero kwereu mi oyiero nyikwagi bangʼ-gi, ne ogolou Misri en owuon kod tekone maduongʼ,
mondo ogol oko ogendini maroteke moloyou, kokelou e pinygi mondo omiu bedo girkeni kaka en kawuononi.
Yie kendo ikaw odiechiengni obed ei chunyi ni Jehova Nyasaye en Nyasaye e polo malo kendo e piny mwalo. Onge Nyasaye moro machielo.
Emomiyo rituru buchene kod chikene ma amiyou kawuono, mondo gik moko odhi maber kodu gi nyithindu kendo mondo udag amingʼa e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou e kinde duto e piny.
Eka Musa noketo tenge mier adek madongo man yo wuok chiengʼ mar aora Jordan,
ma gin kuonde ma ka ngʼato onego wadgi ka ok ochano, to onyalo ringo dhi pondo kuondego mantie e miechgi madongo mondo ores ngimane.
Mier madongo-go gin magi: Bezer manie pinje gode motwo, mano ne jo-Reuben; Ramoth ei Gilead, obed kar jo-Gad; kendo Golan ei Bashan obed mar jo-Manase.
Ma e chik mane Musa omiyo jo-Israel.
Magi e weche, buche kod chike mane Musa omiyogi kane giwuok Misri,
kane gin e holo machiegni gi Beth Peor man yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jordan, e piny Sihon ruodh jo-Amor mane nigi loch Heshbon kendo ne oloye gi Musa kod jo-Israel kane giwuok Misri.
Negikawo pinye gi piny Og ruodh Bashan, mane gin gi ruodhi ariyo mag jo-Amor man loka yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jordan.
Pinyni nochakore Aroer koa e dier holo mar Arnon mochopo nyaka Got Siyon (tiende ni, Hermon),
kendo nokawo gwenge mag Araba man yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jordan, mochopo nyaka Nam mar Araba mantiere e tiend gode mag Pisga.
Musa noluongo jo-Israel duto ma owachonegi kama: Yaye, jo-Israel winjuru buche kod chike ma awachonu kawuono. Puonjreuru wechego kendo une ni umakogi.
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa notimo kodwa singruok e got Horeb.
Singruogni ne Jehova Nyasaye ok otimo gi wuonewa, to notime gi wan wawegi, ma kawuono nika kangima.
Jehova Nyasaye nowuoyo kodu wangʼ gi wangʼ gi ei mach ewi godno.
(E kindeno ne achungʼ e kindu gi Jehova Nyasaye ka asomoneu wach Jehova Nyasaye, nikech ne uluoro mach kendo ne ok uidho got.) Eka nowacho niya,
“An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mane ogolou piny Misri, ka uwuok e piny mane unie wasumbini.
“Kik ubed gi nyiseche mamoko e nyima.
Kik ulos nyasaye milamo maket gi kido moro amora, e polo malo kata e piny mwalo kata e bwo pi.
Kik ukulrunegi piny; bende kik ulamgi, nimar an Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, an Nyasaye ma janyiego kendo akumo nyithindo nikech richo mar wuonegi chakre tiengʼ mar adek nyaka mar angʼwen mar jogo mamon koda,
to anyiso hera ni tienge gana gi gana mar jogo mohera kendo morito chikena.
Kik uti gi nying Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu e yo ma ok owinjore, nimar Jehova Nyasaye ok nongʼwon ne ngʼato angʼata matiyo gi nyinge e yo marach.
Rituru chiengʼ Sabato kendo ukete obed maler, kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechikou.
Tiuru kuom ndalo auchiel kendo uti tijeu duto,
to chiengʼ mar abiriyo en Sabato ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Chiengʼno ok unutim tich moro amora, bed ni un kata yawuotu kata nyiu kata jotiju machwo kata mamon, kata rwethu, pundau kata jambu moro amora, kata jodak manie dieru mondo jotiju ma yawuowi kata ma nyiri oyudie thuolo mar yweyo kaka in.
Paruru ni ne un wasumbini e piny Misri kendo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nogolou kuno gi teko maduongʼ korieyo bade. Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechikou mondo urit chiengʼ Sabato.
Luor wuonu gi minu mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechikou, mondo udagi amingʼa kendo mondo udhi maber e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou.
Kik ineki.
Kik iterri.
Kik ikwal.
Kik ihang wach ne wadu.
Kik igomb chi wadu. Kik igomb od wadu kata lope kata jatije ma wuowi kata jatije ma nyako, kata rwadhe, kata pundane kata gire moro amora.”
Magi e chike mane Jehova Nyasaye owachone chokruok gi dwol maduongʼ e got koa e mach, rumbi kod mudho mandiwa kendo ne ok omedo gimoro. Eka ne ondikogi e kite ariyo mopa mi omiyagi.
Kane uwinjo dwol kawuok e mudho, to got bende wangʼ gi mach, jotend dhoutu gi jodongu nobiro ira.
Kendo nuwachona niya, “Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa osenyisowa duongʼne kod tekone kendo wasewinjo dwonde koa e mach. Kawuononi koro wasefwenyo ni ngʼato nyalo bedo abeda mangima kata obedo ni Nyasaye owuoyo kode.
To koro ere gima omiyo nyaka watho? Mach malichni biro tiekowa kendo wabiro tho ma ok wawinjo dwond Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kendo.
Nimar ere dhano mosewinjo dwond Jehova Nyasaye mangima kawuoyo koa e mach, kaka wasewinjo to pod wantie.
Dhi machiegni mondo iwinji gik moko duto ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa wacho. Eka iwachnwa gik moko duto ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa owachoni, wabiro winjo kendo timo.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowinjou kane uwuoyo koda ka uwacho niya, “Asewinjo gima jogi osewachoni, gik moko duto magiwacho beyo.
Yaye, dine ber ka chunygi osiko koluora kendo orito chikena duto mondo omi gidhi maber kaachiel gi nyithindgi nyaka chiengʼ!
“Dhiyo mondo inyisgi gidogi e hema mag-gi.
To in dongʼ koda ka mondo amiyi chike gi buche duto manyaka ipuonjgi giriti e piny mamiyogi mondo gidagie.”
Omiyo beduru motangʼ kutimo gik moko duto ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ochikou, ka ok udok korachwich kata koracham.
Wuothuru e yore duto ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechikou mondo ubed mangima kendo ubed gi mwandu mondo omi ngimau omedre e piny ma ubiro kawo.
Magi e chike, buche kod weche ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ochika mondo apuonju kendo uritgi e piny ma ungʼado aora Jordan mondo ukaw.
Chikegi omiu mondo un, nyithindu kod nyikwau oluor Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu e ndalo duto mag ngimau kurito buchene gi chikene ma amiyou mondo omi udag amingʼa gi mor.
Winjuru, yaye Israel, kendo beduru motangʼ kurito chikena mondo omi umedru e piny ma opongʼ gi chak kod mor kich, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu nosingorenu.
Winjuru, yaye jo-Israel, Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, en Jehova Nyasaye achiel.
Her Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi gi chunyi duto kendo gi ngimani duto kendo gi tekoni duto.
Chike mamiyou kawuono onego bed e chunyu.
Ketgi e chuny nyithindu, wuo e wechego ka un e dala, ka uwuotho e bath yo, ka unindo kata ka uchungʼ.
Twegiuru e ngʼut lweteu kaka ranyisi kendo bawgiuru e lela wengeu.
Ndikgiuru ewi dhoutu kendo e rangeyeu.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu okelou e piny mane osingore ne kwereu, ma Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo ni nomiu. En piny maduongʼ, man-gi mier madongo mane ok ugero,
udi mopongʼ kod gik moko duto mabeyo, mane ok uloso, sokni ma ne ok ukunyo kod puothe mag mzabibu gi yiend zeituni mane ok upidho. Ka usechiemo muyiengʼ
to beduru motangʼ mondo kik wiu wil kod Jehova Nyasaye mane ogolou Misri; e piny mane unie wasumbini.
Luor Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi, en kende ema itine ka ikwongʼori mana gi nyinge owuon.
Kik uluw nyiseche mamoko ma gin nyiseche joma odak e dieru;
nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu modak e dieru en Nyasaye ma janyiego kendo mirimbe ochomou kendo obiro tiekou e wangʼ piny.
Kik utem Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kaka ne uteme ka un Masa.
Beduru gi adieri mar rito chike Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kaka omiyou e chikene kod buchene.
Timuru gima nikare e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye mondo udhi maber e yoreu, mi udonji kendo kaw piny maber mane Jehova Nyasaye osingore ne kwereu kokwongʼore,
ni obiro riembonu wasiku duto e dieru mana kaka ne Jehova Nyasaye owacho.
E kinde mabiro ka wuodi openji niya, “Weche, buche kod chike mane Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa omiyi, tiendgi en angʼo?”
To iwachne niya, “Ne wan wasumb Farao e piny Misri, to Jehova Nyasaye ne ogolowa Misri gi teko maduongʼ.
Ne waneno gi wengewa kaka Jehova Nyasaye notimo honni kod ranyisi madongo ne jo-Misri kod Farao gi ode duto.
To ne ogolowa kuno kokelowa e piny mane osingore ne kwerewa kokwongʼore ni nomiwa.
Jehova Nyasaye ne ochikowa mondo warit buchene duto kendo waluor Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa mondo wadhi maber ndalo duto mag ngimawa, mana kaka timorenwa kawuononi.
Kendo ka warito chikegi adimba ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa miyowa kaka osechikowa, mano nobednwa kaka tim makare.”
Ka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu okelou e piny ma udhi donjoe mondo ukaw obed maru, mi oriembonu ogendini mangʼeny kaka jo-Hiti, jo-Girgash, jo-Amor, jo-Kanaan, jo-Perizi, jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus, ma gin pinje abiriyo madongo kendo maroteke moloyou.
Kendo ka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechiwo gi e lwetu mi uloyogi, to une ni utiekogi duto. Kik ulos winjruok kodgi bende kik utimnegi ngʼwono.
Kik ukendru kodgi. Kik uchiw nyiu ni yawuotgi kata kik yawuotu okend nyigi,
nimar ginimi yawuotu weya mitine nyiseche mamoko kendo mano dimi mirima mak Jehova Nyasaye mitieku mapiyo nono.
Ma e gima onego utimnegi: Mukuru kendegi mag misengini, touru kitegi mopa milamo, tongʼuru sirnigi mag Ashera kendo wangʼuru kido mag-gi milamo e mach.
Nimar un oganda mowal ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseyierou kuom ogendini duto manie piny mondo ubed joge, joge owuon mogeno.
Jehova Nyasaye ne ok oherou mi oyierou nikech ne ungʼeny moloyo ogendini mamoko, nimar un e oganda matinie moloyo,
to Jehova Nyasaye noyierou nikech noherou kendo orito singruok mane otimo gi kwereu kane ogolou gi tekone maduongʼ kendo warou e piny mane unie wasumbini, e lwet Farao ruodh Misri.
Ngʼeuru ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en Nyasaye. En Nyasaye ma ja-adiera; marito singruokne mar hera ne tienge gana gi gana mohere kendo rito chikene.
To jogo mochaye obiro kumo motiekgi mana ka gineno, adier ok obi deko ma ok okumo jogo mochaye.
Kuom mano rituru yorene, buchene kod chikene adimba ma amiyou kawuono.
Ka uchiko itu ne chikegi kendo uritogi adimba, eka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu norit singruokne mar hera kodu kaka ne osingore ne kwereu.
Obiro herou, gwedhou kendo miyo unyaa mangʼeny, obiro gwedho nyithindo munywolo, cham manie puotheu, decheu, divai manyien, mo, nyiroye ma dhou onywolo kod nyithi jambu e piny mane osingore ne kwereu ni nomigi.
Ibiro gwedhou moloyo ogendini duto; onge ngʼato kuomu madichwo kata madhako ma ok nobed maonge nyathi, kata jambu manobed maonge nyithindo.
Jehova Nyasaye notiek tuoche duto kuomu; bende ok nokelnu tuoche maricho mane uneno ka un Misri, to tuochego nomak mana wasiku mochayou.
Nyaka utiek ji duto ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu keto e lwetu. Kik ukechgi bende kik ulam nyisechegi, nimar mano nobednu obadho.
Unyalo wacho kendu niya, “Ogendinigi tek moloyowa. Ere kaka wanyalo riembogi oko?”
To kik uluorgi; paruru malongʼo gima ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu otimone Farao gi piny e Misri duto.
Ne uneno kod wengeu tem malich, honni madongo tekone kod bat morie mane Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ogolougo oko. Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro timo mano bende ne oganda makoro uluoro.
To bende Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyo kihondko omakgi ma kata ngʼato pond e dieru manade to ok notony.
Kik gimiu luoro nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu manie dieru duongʼ kendo en Nyasaye man-gi teko.
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro riembo ogendinigo kuomu matin tin mana ka uneno. Ok noyienu mondo utiekgi dichiel nimar dipo ka ondiegi onywolore mangʼeny mathagu.
To Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nochiwgi e lwetu, kowito riekogi nyaka ginirum duto.
Obiro chiwo ruodhi mag ogendinigo e lwetu kendo unutiek nyingegi e bwo polo. Onge ngʼama nochungʼ masiru kendo unutiekgi duto.
Kido mag nyisechegi nyaka uwangʼ e mach. Kik ugomb fedha kod dhahabu ma gin-go, bende kik ukawgi. Ka utimo kamano, to ginibednu obadho nimar gigo gin gigo makwero ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Kik ukel gimoro makwero e uteu, nimar un kod gima ukelono nokethi. Kik ubed gi gik machalo kamano nimar enokethgi.
Beduru motangʼ kurito chike duto ma amiyou kawuononi, mondo omi ubed mangima kendo unyaa mi udonji e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye nosingore ni nomi kwereu.
Parieuru kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ne otelonu ka ukalo e piny motwo kuom higni piero angʼwen-gi duto, mondo opuonju bolruok, kopimo paro ma un-godo e chunyu ka bende unyalo rito chikene.
Nodwokou piny momiyo kech okayou, eka bangʼe nomiyou manna mondo ucham ma en chiemo mane pok uneno ma kata mana kwereu bende ne pok oneno. Notimonu kamano mondo opuonjugo ni dhano ok bed mangima nikech chiemo kende to nikech wach ka wach moa e dho Jehova Nyasaye.
Lepu ne ok oti kendo tiendeu ne ok opudhore kata okuot kuom higni piero angʼwen-go duto.
Ngʼeuru e chunyu ni kaka ngʼato kumo wuode, omiyo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu bende koro kumou.
Rituru chike duto mag Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kuwuotho e yorene bende ka umiye luor.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kelou e piny maber, piny man-gi aore kod pi maber, man-gi thidhna mamol e holo koa e gode;
ma en piny machiego ngano kod shairi, mzabibu kod ngʼowu, olemo mongʼinore, zeituni kod mor kich.
Pinyno nobed gi chiemo mangʼeny, bende ok unuchand gimoro; en piny ma kite mayudore gin nyinyo kendo en piny ma mula unyalo kunyo e godene.
Ka usechiemo ma uyiengʼ, to pakuru Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuom piny maber ma osemiyou.
Beduru motangʼ mondo kik wiu wil kod Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, ka uweyo luwo yorene, chikene kod buchene ma amiyou kawuononi.
Ka ok kamano, ka usechiemo ma uyiengʼ, ka usegero ute mabeyo ma udakie
ka dhou kod jambu omedore, fedha kod dhahabu bende omedore ma gik ma un-godo duto omedore
to chunyu biro donjo e sunga ma wiu nowil kod Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mane ogolou Misri, e piny mane unie wasumbini.
Ne otelonu kokalo piny malach mar ongoro piny motwo maonge kata pi, motingʼo thuonde kwiri kod thomoni, ne omiyou pi koa e lwanda matek.
Ne omiyou manna ma uchamo e thim gimane kwereu ne ok ongʼeyo, mondo omi ubed ka uboloru kendo ka otemou mondo giko udhi maber.
Unyalo wacho e chunyu niya, “Tekona kod lucha kod tich lweta ema omiyo ayudo mwandugi.”
To par Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi, nimar en ema omiyi teko mar loso mwandu, kochopogo singruok mare mane osingore gi kwereu mana kaka en kawuononi.
Kapo ni wiu owil gi Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ma uluwo nyiseche moko, ulamo kendo ukulorunegi, to akwongʼora kawuononi ni notieku maonge kiawa.
Mana kaka ogendini mane Jehova Nyasaye otieko e wangʼu kuneno, omiyo un bende ibiro tieku nikech ok uluoro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Yaye Israel, winjuru, uchiegni ngʼado Jordan ka udhi riembo oganda maduongʼ kendo maroteke moloyou, man-gi mier madongo ma ohingagi chopo nyaka e kor polo.
Jo-Anak gin joma roteke kendo roboche! Usewinjo kiwuoyo kuomgi kiwacho niya, “Ere joma dichungʼ e nyim jo-Anak?”
To beduru gigeno kawuono ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ema dhi telo nyimu mana ka mach mawengʼo. Obiro tiekogi kendo obiro nyonogi mana ka uneno, kendo unuriembgi mi girum chutho mapiyo nono mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye osechiko.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseriembogi oko e wangʼu ka uneno, to kik uwach e chunyu niya, “Jehova Nyasaye osekelowa ka mondo wakaw pinyni nikech timwa makare.” Ooyo en mana nikech timbe maricho mag ogendinigo emomiyo Jehova Nyasaye dhi riembogi ka uneno.
Ok nikech timu mabeyo kata lony maru emomiyo udhi kawo pinyno mondo obed maru; to mana nikech timbe maricho mag ogandagi ema miyo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro riembogi oko e wangʼu mondo ochop gima nowachone kwereu ma Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo.
Ngʼeuru ni ok en nikech timu makare emomiyo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou piny maberni mondo ukaw, nimar kadier to un joma tokgi tek.
Paruru wachni kendo kik wiu wil kaka ne ujimbo mirimb Jehova Nyasaye e thim. Kochakore chiengʼ mane uwuok Misri ma uchopo ka, usebedo mana ka ungʼanyo ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Kane un Horeb ne ujimbo mirimb Jehova Nyasaye mane iye owangʼ modwaro tiekou.
Kane adhi e got mondo akaw chike mane ondiki e kite mopa, chike mag singruok mane Jehova Nyasaye otimo kodu, ne abet e got odiechienge piero angʼwen kod otieno piero angʼwen; kendo ne ok achiemo kata modho pi.
Jehova Nyasaye ne omiya kite ariyo ma ondiki gi lwet Nyasaye. Kuomgi ne ondiki e chike duto mane Jehova Nyasaye owachonu koa e mach mawuok e got, e odiechieng chokruok.
Kane odichienge piero angʼwen kod otieno piero angʼwen oserumo, Jehova Nyasaye nomiya kite mopa ariyo, ma gin kite mag singruok.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowachona niya, “Lor piny piyo piyo ia e got, nikech jogi mane igolo oa e piny Misri oselokore jo-mibadhi. Giseweyo mapiyo gik mane achikogi, kendo giseloso nyiseche mag kido.”
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye ne owachona niya, “Aseneno jogi, kendo gin joma tokgi tek adier!
We mondo atiekgi duto mondo agol nying-gi oko e wangʼ piny kae. Abiro miyo idok oganda maratego kendo mangʼeny moloyogi.”
Omiyo nalokora kendo alor kaa e got mane oyudo wangʼ. Kite mopa ariyo motingʼo winjruok ne nitie e lweta.
Kane angʼiyo ne aneno ni usetimo ketho e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu; kendo useloso nyasaye mar kido ma olos ka nyaroya. Uselokoru piyo ma uweyo yo ma Jehova Nyasaye ne ochikou.
Omiyo ne akawo kite mopa mane ni e lweta mi adiro piny ma gitore matindo tindo e nyimu.
Eka ne achako ariera piny e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kuom ndalo piero angʼwen odiechiengʼ gotieno; ne ok achiemo kata modho pi, nikech richo duto mane utimo, ka utimo gik mamono e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, kendo ka ujimbo mirimbe.
Ne aluoro mirima kod kum mager mar Jehova Nyasaye, nimar mirima nomake ahinya mar tiekou. To kata kamano nowinjo ywakna kendo.
Jehova Nyasaye ne iye owangʼ gi Harun mi odwaro tieke, to e kindeno ne alemone Harun bende.
Bende ne akawo giru mar kethono, ma en kido mar nyaroya mane uloso, mine awangʼe e mach. Bangʼe ne atoye matindo tindo narege mayom kaka mogo, eka ne akire e aora mamol koa e got.
Bende ne umiyo Jehova Nyasaye mirima ka un Tabera, Masa, kod Kibroth Hatava.
Kendo kane Jehova Nyasaye ogolou Kadesh Barnea nowacho niya, “Dhiuru mondo ukaw piny ma asemiyou.” To ne ungʼanyo ne chike mag Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, ne ok ugeno kuome kata miye luor.
Usebedo ka ungʼanyo ne Jehova Nyasaye ndalo duto ma asengʼeyoue.
Ne ariera piny ndalo piero angʼwen odiechiengʼ gotieno nikech Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni obiro tiekou.
Ne alamo Jehova Nyasaye kawacho niya, “Yaye Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, kik itiek jogigi, ma gin girkeni mari iwuon mane ireso gi badi maratego e piny Misri.
Par jotichni ma gin Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo kendo kik ine wich teko margi, timbegi maricho kod richo mag-gi
Ka ok kamano to piny mane igolowa biro wacho ni, ‘Nikech Jehova Nyasaye ne ok nyal kawogi matergi e piny mane osesingonegi kendo nikech ne ok oherogi, to Jehova Nyasaye osetero joge e thim mondo otho kuno nikech osin kodgi.’
To ngʼe ni gin jogi owuon kendo ma girkeni mari mane igolo gi tekoni maduongʼ kod bat morie.”
E kindeno Jehova Nyasaye nowachona niya, “Paa kite ariyo machal gi mane okwongo ka, mondo ibi ira e got kendo ilos Sanduk bao.
Abiro ndiko e kitego weche mane ni e kite mopa mokwongo mane itoyo, eka iketgi e sandugno.”
Omiyo ne aloso Sandug Muma gi yiend siala, mine apayo kite ariyo machal gi mane okwongo ka, eka ne adhi e got gi kite ariyogo katingʼo e lweta.
Jehova Nyasaye ne ondiko e kite mopagi weche mane ondikoe mokwongo, mane gin Chike Apar, mane owuoyogo kodu e got gi ei mach, e chiengʼ chokruok maler. Bangʼe Jehova Nyasaye nomiyagi.
Eka ne alor kaa e got mi aketo kite mopa mag chikego e sanduku mane aseloso mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ne osechiko kendo gin kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
(Jo-Israel nowuotho koa e sokni mag Jaakan nyaka Mosera; kanyo ema ne Harun othoe mi oike kendo Eliazar wuode nokawo tichne kaka jadolo.
Koa kanyo ne giwuotho ka gidhi Gudgoda ma gichopo nyaka Jotbatha, piny aore.
E kindeno Jehova Nyasaye ne oketo tenge oganda joka Lawi mondo otingʼ Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye, mondo omi gichungʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ka gitiyo tijene kendo ka gigwedho e nying Jehova Nyasaye nyaka chil kawuono.
Mano ema omiyo joka Lawi ok yud pokgi e kind jowetegi; nimar Jehova Nyasaye e pokgi mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nowachonegi.)
Koro ne asebet e got kuom ndalo piero angʼwen odiechiengʼ gotieno mana kaka ne atimo mokwongo mi Jehova Nyasaye ne ochako owinja kendo ok ne en dwarone mondo otieku.
Jehova Nyasaye ne owachona niya, “Dhiyo mondo itelne ji e yo mondo ukaw piny mane asesingora ni kweregi ni anamigi.”
To koro sani, yaye Israel, en angʼo ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro makmana miye luor kendo wuotho e yorene kendo hero tiyone gi chunyu duto kod ngimau duto.
Bende Jehova Nyasaye dwaro ni mondo urit buchene gi chikene ma amiyou kawuononi mondo okonyu.
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu e wuon polo kata polo man malo manade kaachiel gi piny kod gik moko duto manie iye.
Kata kamano Jehova Nyasaye norito kwereu nimar noherogi mi bangʼe noyiero mana un, nyikwagi e dier ogendini mamoko duto mondo ubed joge mana kaka pod un nyaka chil kawuono.
Chunyu mondo oter nyangu, kendo weuru wich teko.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en Nyasach nyiseche kendo Ruoth mar ruodhi; Nyasaye maduongʼ malich kendo ratego, ma ok dew wangʼ ngʼato kata kawo asoya.
Orito nyithind kiye kod mon ma chwogi otho kendo ohero jodak komiyogi chiemo kod lewni.
Nyaka uher jodak manie dieru nimar un bende ne un jodak e piny Misri.
Luoruru Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo utine. Rituru adiera mare ka ukwongʼoru e nyinge.
En ema nyaka umiye pak, nimar en Nyasachu ma osetimo timbe madongo kendo malich ma useneno gi wengeu.
Kwereu duto mane odhi e piny Misri noromo ji piero abiriyo, to koro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyo unyaa mangʼeny mana ka sulwe manie kor polo.
Heruru Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo urit dwarone, buchene, kod chikene ndalo duto.
Paruru kawuononi puonj mane uyudo kuom Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nimar kata obedo ni nyithindu pok ongʼeyo kata neno puonjno, to un to ungʼeye. Bende paruru duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye gi tekone kod bat morie;
kaachiel gi ranyisi mane otimo kod honni mane onyiso e dier jo-Misri, ne Farao ruodh Misri kod pinye duto.
Bende nuneno gima notimone jolwenj Misri, faresegi kod gechegi kane gilawou mi Nam Makwar oimogi kendo mi Jehova Nyasaye otiekogi pep.
Nyithindu ne ok oneno gima Jehova Nyasaye notimonu e thim nyaka ne uchopo kama untiereni.
Kendo gima ne otimone Dathan kod Abiram yawuot Eliab mawuok e dhood Reuben kane piny oyawo dhoge e dieru tir e kind jo-Israel duto ma omwonyogi duto kod joutgi, hembegi kod gik moko duto ma mekgi.
To un ema ne uneno giwengeu gik madongo duto mane Jehova Nyasaye otimo.
Rituru chike duto ma amiyou kawuononi mondo ubed gi teko kendo ukaw piny man loka mar Jordan mudhi kawono;
kendo mondo udagi amingʼa e piny mane Jehova Nyasaye osingo ne kwereu ni nomigi kod nyikwagi ma en piny maber mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich.
Piny ma udonjoe mondo ukaw ok chal gi piny Misri muwuokie, ma en kama nuchwoyoe kothe ka uolonegi pi mana kaka iolone puoth alot.
To piny ma ungʼado Jordan mondo udhi ukaw en piny gode kod holo ma mwonyo pi moa e polo.
En piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro ritoue; kendo orange pile ka pile higa ngima.
Koro ka urito chike mamiyou adimba kawuono, ka uhero Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo tiyone gi chunyu duto kod ngimau duto,
to abiro oro koth e pinyu e ndalo mowinjore e ndalo oro kod ndalo chwiri, mondo uyud cham, gi mzabibu kod mo.
Abiro chiwo lum ne jamni mau kendo unuchiem ma uyiengʼ.
Beduru motangʼ mondo pachu kik maki gi gik ma kamago ma ulam nyiseche mamoko ka ukulorenegi.
Mirimb Nyasaye nyalo lwar kuomu, ma olor ranga polo, mi koth bed maonge kendo puothe ok nochieg cham, ma uduto utho e piny maber ma Jehova Nyasaye miyou.
Kanuru wechenagi e chunyu kod pachu, twegiuru e bedeu ka ranyisi kendo e pat wengeu.
Puonjuru nyithindu wechegi, ka uwuoyo kuomgi ka ubet e dala, ka uwuotho e yo, ka unindo kata ka uchiewo.
Ndikgiuru ewi dhoutu kendo e rangeyeu,
mondo ndalo magu kod mag nyithindu omedre e piny mane Jehova Nyasaye osingore ni nomi nyithindu, mondo obed maru nyaka chiengʼ.
Ka urito adimba chike duto ma amiyou mondo uluw mi uhero Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ka uwuotho e yorene kendo ka urito wechene,
to Jehova Nyasaye biro riembo ogendinigi duto e nyimu, kendo ubiro kawo pinje madongo kendo maroteke moloyou.
Kamoro amora ma unyono, nobed maru, tongʼ maru noyarre koa e thim mar Lebanon kokalo Aora mar Yufrate nyaka nam man yo podho chiengʼ.
Onge ngʼama nosiru. Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mana kaka osechikou, biro kelo luoro kod kibaji e piny duto kamoro amora ma udhiyoe.
Winjuru, kawuononi aketo gweth kod kwongʼ e nyimu.
Ka urito chike Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ma amiyou kawuononi, to unuyud gweth.
Ka ok uluwo chike Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mi ulokoru uweyo yore ma amiyou kawuono, kendo ka uluwo nyiseche mamoko ma ok usengʼeyo, to unuyud kwongʼ.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osekelou e piny mudhiye mondo ukaw obed maru, to nyaka uhul weche gweth e got Gerizim, to weche mag kwongʼ to uhul e got Ebal.
Kaka ungʼeyo, godegi ni yo podho chiengʼ mar holo mar Jordan kama jo-Kanaan odakie. Gin gode mantiere Araba but Gilgal kama yiende madongo mag More nitie.
Uchiegni ngʼado Jordan mondo ukaw piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou. Ka usekawe ma udakie,
to neuru ni uluwo chike duto kod buche ma amiyou kawuononi.
Magi e buche kod chike manyaka une ni uluwo e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu, osemiyou mondo ukaw obed maru ka pod udak e pinyni.
Kethuru kuonde duto manie gode, thuche kendo kuonde duto manie tipo yiende madongo mane ogendini makoro uriembo ne lamoe nyisechegi.
Mukuru kendegi mag misango, touro kitegi ma gilamo kendo wangʼuru sirni mag-gi mag Ashera e mach; ngʼaduru matindo tindo kido mag nyisechegi kendo ugol nying-gi oko kuonde duto.
Kik ulam Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu e yo ma gilamogo nyiseche manono.
To nyaka udwar kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseyiero e kind dhoutu duto, mondo Nyinge obedie kaka kar dak mare. Kanyo ema onego udhiye
mondo uterie misango miwangʼo pep, kod misango magu kaachiel gi chiwo mar achiel kuom apar kod chiwo moyiedhi, kaachiel gi chiwo mar kwongʼruok kod chiwo mar hera, gi chiwo mag nyithindo makayo mag dhou kod jambu.
E nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kanyo ema un kod jou duto unuchiemie gi mor e gik moko duto ma lwetu timo, nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osegwedhou.
Kik utim kaka watimo e ndaloni, ma ngʼato ka ngʼato timo mana gima oneno ni berne,
nikech pok uchopoe kar yweyo, kendo yudo girkeni ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou.
To ubiro ngʼado loka Jordan mondo udagi e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kaka girkeni mi enomiu yweyo e lwet wasiku moluorou, mondo udagi gi kwe.
To kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noyier miluongo e Nyinge, kanyo ema unukelie gik moko duto ma achikou, ma gin misango miwangʼo pep, kod misango magu, achiel kuom apar magu, mich moyiedhi kod chiwo mag mwandu mugeno musingoru ni ubiro kelo ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Kendo kanyo bedie mamor gi Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi, in kaachiel gi yawuoti kod nyigi, jotichni ma yawuowi kod ma nyiri, jo-Lawi manie miechu, maonge gi pok kata girkeni ma mekgi giwegi.
Bed motangʼ mondo kik ichiw misango miwangʼo pep kamoro amora ma ihero.
Chiwgi mana e kama Jehova Nyasaye biro yiero e kind jo-dhoutu, kendo kanyo ema itimie gik moko duto ma achiki.
Kata kamano unyalo yangʼo chiayo meku kamoro amora e miechu, ma ucham ringʼo kaka udwaro, mana ka gima en ring mwanda kata ogunde. Kaluwore gi gweth ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou, joma ogak kod jomaler nyalo chamo ringʼogo.
To kata kamano kik ucham remo, to pukgiuru piny mana ka pi.
Kik ucham pok mar achiel kuom apar mar cham, divai manyien, kod mo, kata chiwo mag nyithindo makayo mag dhou kod jambu kata chiwo mar kwongʼruok kata chiwo mar hera kata chiwo mogen e miechu.
Unucham gigo kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro yiero, in kaachiel gi yawuoti kod nyigi, jotichgi machwo kod ma nyiri, gi jo-Lawi manie miechu, kendo nyaka ubed mamor e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuom gik moko duto ma lwetu timo.
Beduru motangʼ mondo kik ujwangʼ kod jo-Lawi modak e dieru e ndalo duto ma udak e pinyni.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemedo tongʼ maru kaka ne osingorenu, mi ugombo chamo ringʼo ma uwacho niya, “Agombo chamo ringʼo,” to nucham ringʼo mangʼeny kaka unyalo.
Ka kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oyiero mondo nyinge obedie bor kodu, to unyalo yangʼo chiayo moa e kweth jambu kod dhou moa e miechu kaka asechikou kendo ucham ringʼo kaka udwaro.
Chamgiuru mana kaka ducham mwanda kata ogunde. Joma ogak kod jomaler duto manie dieru nochiem duto.
To kik ucham remo, nikech remo en ngima, to ok onego ucham ngima gimoro kod ringe.
To kata kamano kik ucham remo, to pukgiuru piny mana ka pi.
Ka ok uchamo chiemogo to ubiro dhi maber kaachiel gi nyikwau, nikech mano utimo gima ber kendo malongʼo e nyim wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
To kawuru giu mowal kod gimoro amora ma usesingoru kukwongʼoru ni unuchiw kendo udhi kama Jehova Nyasaye noyier.
Ket misango miwangʼo pep e kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, ringʼo kaachiel gi remo. Remb misenginigo nyaka ol e bath kendo mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, to ringʼo to unyalo chamo.
Beduru motangʼ ka urito chike ma amiyou mondo udhi maber kaachiel gi nyikwau nikech mano utimo gima ber kendo malongʼo e nyim wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro riembo ogendini ma ubiro monjo kendo kawo pinygi ka uneno. To ka useriembogi oko mi udak e pinygi,
kendo bangʼ ka osetiekgi chuth e nyimu, to beduru motangʼ kendo kik upenj weche mag nyisechegi ka uwacho niya, “Ere kaka ogendinigi ne tiyo ni nyisechegi? Wan bende wabiro timo kamano.”
Ok onego ulam Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kaka gilamo nyisechegi, nikech Jehova Nyasaye mon gi kit lamo ma gilamogo nyisechegigo, kendo gitimo giko mamono duto ma Jehova Nyasaye osin-go. To bende gitimo misango gi yawuotgi kod nyigi e mach ka gichiwo ne nyisechegi.
Neuru ni utimo gik moko duto machikou, kendo kik umedie gimoro kata kik ugol.
Ka janabi moro kata ngʼat mokoro gik mabiro timore e lek otuch e dieru kendo ohulo wach moro mar hono kod ranyisi,
kendo ka honono kod ranyisino ma ohulo otimore bangʼe owacho niya, “We walu nyiseche mamokogi (ma gin nyiseche ma ok ungʼeyo) kendo ka owacho ni we walamgi,”
to kik uwinj wach janabino kata jalekno. Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu temou mondo ongʼe ane ka uhere gi chunyu duto kod ngimau duto.
En Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kende ema onego uluw kendo en kende ema owinjore umiye luor. Rituru chikene, luoreuru, tineuru kendo upadru kuome.
Janabino kata jalekno nyaka negi nimar opuonjo tim ngʼanyo ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mane oresou kagolou Misri kaka wasumbini; kendo osetemo golou e yore mane Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ochikou mondo uluw. Tim marachni nyaka ugol e dieru.
Ka dipo owadu hie, wuodi, nyari kata chiegi mihero kata osiepni migeno hoyi lingʼ-lingʼ kawachoni niya, “We wadhi mondo walam nyiseche mamoko” (ma gin nyiseche ma in kata kwereni ne ok ongʼeyo;
ma gin nyiseche mag ogendini mokiewo kodu, bed ni gin machiegni kata mabor, kochakore e bath piny konchiel nyaka komachielo);
to kik iyie olok pachi kata winjo wachne. Kik itimne ngʼwono moro amora kendo kik iluwe kata pande.
Nyaka inege kendo lweti owuon ema okuong tere e tho. Bangʼe lwet ji moko duto bende otim kamano.
Chieleuru gi kite nyaka otho, nimar otemo golou kuom Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mane ogolou Misri e piny mane unie wasumbini.
Eka jo-Israel nowinj wachno mabed giluoro, to onge ngʼato kuomu kendo manotim gima rachno kendo.
Ka iwinjo ka iwacho e achiel kuom miechu ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou mondo udagie
ni joma timbegi mono osedonjo e miechgi ma osewuondo ji mangʼeny kuondego kawachonegi niya, “Wadhiuru walam nyiseche mamoko” (ma gin nyiseche ma ok usengʼeyo),
to wachno nyaka unon matut ahinya ka en adieri. Ka osenwangʼo kamano ni gima kwero osetimore e dieru,
to nyaka uneg jogo duto modak e dalano gi ligangla. Neg-giuru duto kaachiel gi jambgi.
Chokuru gik moyaki dalano kendo uketgi e laru mi uwangʼ-gi kaka misango miwangʼo pep ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Nyaka odongʼ gunda ma ok nochak ger.
Gik mamonogo kik yud e lwetu eka mirima mager mar Jehova Nyasaye norum, mi notimnu ngʼwono kendo ununyaa kaka nosingore ne kwereu.
Nikech uluoro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kurito chikene duto ma amiyi kawuono kendo ka utimo gik makare e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye.
Un e nyithind Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Kik usar dendu kata uliel yie wiu, kuywago ngʼama otho, kata lielo pat wangʼu,
nimar un oganda mowal ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Kuom ogendini manie wangʼ piny, Jehova Nyasaye oseyierou mondo ubed mwandune mogeno.
Kik ucham gimoro amora makwero.
Magi e kit le gi jamni munyalo chamo: rwath, rombo, diel,
ogunde, nyakech, ngawo, diend bungu, abur, mwanda gi rombe manie gode.
Unyalo chamo kit le moro amora gi jamni ma ombongʼ tiendegi opogore ariyo kendo manyamo kambula.
To kuom mago manyamo kambula kata mago ma ombongʼ tiendegi opogore ahinya, ok onego ucham kaka ngamia, apwoyo, gi ogwangʼ terere kata obedo ni ginyamo kambula, ombongʼ tiendegi ok opogore, to gin gik mogak ne un.
Anguro bende en gima ogak kata obedo ni tiendene opogore kamano, ok onyam kambula. Kik ucham ring-gi kata kik umul ringregi motho.
To kuom gik moko duto modakie pi, unyalo chamo mago man kod thuokgi kod kalagakla.
To mago duto maonge gi thuokgi kata kalagakla ok onego ucham nimar kuomu gin gik mogak.
Unyalo chamo winyo moro amora ma ok ler.
Winy ma ok onego ucham e magi: ongo, achuth, gi olit,
gi otenga kod kit otenga duto, gi okun-okun,
gi kit agak duto,
kit tula moro amora, gi okok, kata kit olith duto,
gi tula matin, tula maduongʼ gi tula marachar,
gi tula modak e thim gi mbusi gi achuth gi osou,
gi nyamnaha, gi ngʼangʼa, tula kod olik tiga.
Kute duto mafuyo e kweth kik ucham nimar gin gik makwero.
To unyalo chamo gik mafuyo gi buombgi ma ok kwero.
Kik ucham gimoro ma uyudo ka osetho kende. Unyalo miye japiny moro amora manie miechu mondo ochame kata unyalo uso ne japiny moro, nikech un oganda mowal ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Kutedo nyadiel to kik uole cha min.
Neni uketo tenge achiel kuom apar mag giu ma puotheu onyago.
Chokuru achiel kuom apar mar chambu, divai manyien kod mo, kaachiel gi nyithindo makayo mag kweth dhou kod kweth jambu e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kama noyier mondo oluongie Nyinge mondo omi ubed joma oluoro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ndalo duto.
Ka dipo ni kar romono bor kodi ma ok inyal tero achiel kuom apar mari ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi osegwedhigo (nikech kama Jehova Nyasaye oyiero ne Nyinge bor kodi),
to inyalo loko mwandugo pesa mondo iter kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi biro yiero.
Konyri gi pesano ka ingʼiewogo gimoro ma ihero; obed ring dhiangʼ kata ring rombo, divai kata math moketo thowi kata gimoro amora ma chunyi digombi. Eka in kod joodi duto nuchiem kanyo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi mor.
Kendo kik wiu wil kod joka Lawi modak e miechu, nimar gionge gi pok margi kata girkeni mowalnegi.
Bangʼ higni adek, keluru achiel kuom apar duto mosechiw e higano mondo ukan-gi e miechu,
mondo omi joka Lawi (maonge pok kata girkeni ma owalnegi), to gi jodak, nyithind kiye kod mon ma chwogi otho modak e miechu obi ochiem mayiengʼ kendo mondo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ogwedhu e gik moko duto ma lwetu timo.
E giko mar higa mar abiriyo gope duto nyaka we.
Ma e kaka onego time: Ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka we gope ma ja-Israel wadgi nigo. Ok onego okaw chudo kuom ja-Israel kata wadgi nikech ndalo mar weyo gowi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye oselandi.
Jopinje mamoko to unyalo nyiso mondo ochulu gope ma gin-go, to gowi moro amora ma ja-Israel wadu nigo to nyaka iwene.
Kata kamano, ngʼat modhier ok onego bedi e dieru, nikech piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kod jou mondo ukaw kaka girkeni obiro gwedho,
mana ka urito chike duto mag Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo urito buchene duto ma amiyou kawuono.
Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro gwedhou kaka osewacho, kendo ubiro olo ogendini mangʼeny mwandu to un ok unuol kuomgi. Ubiro bedo gi loch kuom pinje mamoko to un onge manobed kod loch kuomu.
Ka nitie jachan e kind owete moa e mier mag piny ma Jehova Nyasaye nomiu, to kik ubed gi chuny mapek kata lep ma wuoyo marach ewi owadu modhierno.
To beduru mangʼwon kendo uholgi gimoro amora magidwaro.
Kata bedni higa mar abiriyo chiegni chopo to kik ubed gi ich lit mutamru olo owadu man-gi dwaro. Ka mano otimore, to owaduno nyalo mako bura e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mi ubed joketho.
Chiwreuru gi chuny man thuolo, to ka utimo kamano to Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro gwedho tijeu duto kod gimoro amora ma udwaro timo.
Joma ochando nobedie e pinyu ndalo duto. Kuom mano achikou mondo ubed gi chuny ma thuolo kuom oweteu, joma odhier kod joma ochando e pinyu.
Ka ja-Hibrania wadu madichwo kata madhako ochiwore mondo ingʼiewe kendo otini kuom higni auchiel, to e higa mar abiriyo nyaka iweye obed thuolo.
Kendo ka iweye mondo odhi ka en thuolo, to kik igole odhi gi lwete nono.
Kowe mabup gi chuny ma thuolo kimiye jamni, kar dino cham kod divai. Bedne mangʼwon kendo imiye kaluwore gi kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi osegwedhi.
Paruru nine un wasumbini e piny Misri to Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noresou. Mano emomiyo amiyou chikni kawuono.
Ka jatichni owacho niya, “Ok adwar weyi,” nikech oheri kod jo-dalani duto kendo owinjo maber ka odak kodu,
to kaw riwi kendo ituchgo ite kiteno e dhoot mondo koro obed misumbani nyaka chiengʼ tim kamano bende nyaka ne jatichni madhako.
Kik bedni matek weyo misumbani thuolo nimar higni auchiel mosebedo oromo chudo nyadiriyo maromre kod ngʼatno ma biro tiyoni ndalo. Kitimo kamano to Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi nogwedh gik moko duto mitimo.
Keturu tenge ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu jamni duto machwo mokwong nywolo e kweth jambu. Kik uket rwedhi ma dhou okwongo nywolo e jok bende kik ungʼad yie rombu mokwong nywolo.
E higa ka higa in kod joodi onego uchamgi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kama en owuon noyier.
Ka chiayo moro nigi songa, ongʼol kata en muofu kata ka en gi mbala moro amora to ok onego utim kode misango ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Onego uchame e miechu uwuon. Joma ok ler gi jomaler nyalo chame mana kaka gichamo mwanda kata nyakech.
Kik ucham remo, to pukgiuru piny mana ka pi.
Rituru dwe mar Abib kendo utim nyasi mar Pasaka mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, nikech e dwe mar Abib nogolou e piny Misri gotieno.
Timuru misango mar Pasaka ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi chiayo mawuok e kweth jambu kata e kweth dhou kama en owuon noyier miluongo e nyinge.
Kik uchame gi makati moketie thowi, to kuom ndalo abiriyo cham makati motedi ma ok oketie thowi, makati mar lit, nikech ne uwuok Misri apoya nono; mondo ndalo duto mag ngimau ubed kuparo ndalo mane uwuok Misri.
Kik thowi moro amora yud kuomu kata e pinyu kuom ndalo abiriyo. Kik uwe ringʼo moro amora motimgo misango odhiambo mar odiechiengʼ mokwongo nindi nyaka kiny.
Kik utim misango mar Pasaka, e dala moro amora ma Jehova Nyasaye miyou,
makmana kama enoyier ne nyinge owuon. Kanyo ema nyaka utime misango mar Pasaka godhiambo, ka chiengʼ dhi podho kuparogo odiechiengʼ mane uwuokie Misri.
Buluru misangono kendo uchame kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro yiero. Bangʼe kochopo okinyi to doguru e hembeu.
Kuom ndalo auchiel chamuru makati ma ok oketie thowi kendo e odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo beduru gi chokruok mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo kik uti tich moro amora chiengʼno.
Kwanuru jumbe abiriyo ugol koa chiengʼ mane uchako kayoe cham mochungʼ.
Bangʼe timuru nyasi mar Sawo mar Jumbe ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuom golo chiwo mar hera kupimo maromre gi gweth ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osegwedhougo.
Kendo beduru mamor e kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noyier ni Nyinge kaka kar romo, in gi yawuoti kod nyigi, jotichni machwo gi mamon, jo-Lawi man e miechu, jodak, nyithind kiye, kod mon ma chwogi otho modak e dieru.
Par nine un wasumbini e piny Misri kendo luwuru chikegi adimba.
Timuru Sawo mar kiche kuom ndalo abiriyo ka usechoko cham moa kar dino bangʼ keyo kod divai mobi.
Beduru mamor e sawoni, yawuoti kod nyigi, jotichni machwo gi mamon, jo-Lawi, jodak, nyithind kiye kod mon ma chwogi otho modak e miechu.
Kuom ndalo abiriyo timuru sawo ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu e kama Jehova Nyasaye owuon noyier. Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro gwedhou e keyo magu duto kendo e tij lweteu duto, mi moru nobed moromo.
Jou machwo duto nyaka chopi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nyadidek e higa ka higa mondo otim sewni adekgo kama en owuon obiro yiero. Sewni adekgo gin Makati ma ok Oketie Thowi, Sawo mar Jumbe kod Sawo mar Kiche. Onge ngʼat manobi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye gi lwete nono.
To ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomu nyaka kel mich maromre gi kaka Jehova Nyasaye osegwedhe.
Keturu jongʼad bura kod jotend dhoutu e miechu duto ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou, to gibiro ngʼado ne jou bura makare.
Kik uketh adiera kata dewo wangʼ ngʼato, kik ukaw asoya, nikech asoya dino wenge joma riek kendo omiyo ngʼat makare bedo ngʼama rach.
Luwuru tim makare kendo en kende ema uluwe mondo udagi amingʼa kendo ukaw piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou.
Kik uket siro mar Ashera moro amora e bath kendo mar misango ma ugerone Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,
kendo kik upa kidi milamo nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mon kodgi.
Kik itim misango ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi gi rwath kata gi rombo man-gi songa kata mbala, nimar mano en gima kwero e nyime.
Ka dichwo kata dhako modak e dieru e achiel kuom dalane ma Jehova Nyasaye omiyou oyud katimo richo e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo koketho singruokne,
mopogore gi chikena molamo nyiseche mamoko, kokulorenegi, bed ni en chiengʼ, dwe kata sulwe marieny e kor polo.
Ka wachni okel e nyimu, to nyaka unon tiende malongʼo. Ka unono wachni ma uyudo ni gima kwerono otimore e Israel adier,
to goluru dichwono kata dhakono mosetimo gima mononi e dhorangach mar dala maduongʼ kendo mondo uchiele gi kite nyaka otho.
Kik ungʼadne ngʼato buch tho ka nitie mana janeno achiel kende, to ngʼadne ngʼato buch tho ka nitie joneno ariyo kata adek.
Lwet jonenogo ema onego okuong ogoye motho, bangʼe eka joma moko nogoye. Nyaka ugol tim marachno oa e dieru.
Kokel buche matek e dieru ma ok unyal ngʼado, bedni gin buche mag nek, larruok kata mag goruok, to tergiuru kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro yiero.
Dhiuru ir jodolo magin jo-Lawi kendo kuom jangʼad bura manie tich sano. Nonuru wach kuomgi kendo gini ngʼadnu bura.
Gima giwachonu kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro yierono ema nyaka utim.
Nyaka une ni utimo mana kaka giwachonu ma ok uweyo kata matin. Kik ukwan ka nono gik ma giwachonu.
Ngʼato monyiso wich teko ne jangʼad bura kata ne jadolo ma ochungʼ kanyo kachiwo weche Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nyaka negi kendo nyaka ugol tim mamono e dier jo-Israel.
Ji duto biro winjo kendo nobed maluor bende ok ginichak gibed gi wich teko.
Ka udonjo e piny ma ruoth ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou, mi ukawe kendo udakie ma uwacho niya, “We waket ruodhwa mana kaka ogendini moluorowa,”
to neuru ni uyiero ruoth ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ema ochiwo, kendo nyaka obed achiel kuom oweteu, kik uket ngʼat machielo, ma ok en ja-Israel wadu.
To ruoth ok onego obed gi farese mangʼeny kata chuno ji mondo odog Misri dhi omo moko, nimar Jehova Nyasaye osewachonu niya, “Ok onego udog gi yorno kendo.”
Kik obed gi mon mathoth nikech mano dipoka oketho parone. Bende kik obed gi fedha kod dhahabu mangʼeny.
Ka okawo loch mar pinyruodhe, to nyaka ondik chikgi kogologi e kitap chik ma jodolo ma gin jo-Lawi nigo.
Chikgi nyaka obedgo kosomo pile ndalo duto mag ngimane mondo opuonjrego miyo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasache luor korito chikenegi kod buchene duto.
Kendo kik okwanre ni ober maloyo owetene koweyo luwo chik. Bangʼe en kod nyikwaye nobedie loch ndalo mangʼeny e pinyruodh Israel.
Jodolo, magin jo-Lawi, adier oganda duto mawuok e dhood Lawi ok noyud pokgi kata girkeni gi jo-Israel. Gibiro dak kuom chiwo motimne Jehova Nyasaye gi mach, nimar mano e pokgi.
Ok ginibed gi pok e kind jowetegi, nimar Jehova Nyasaye e pok margi mana kaka nosesingorenegi.
Pok mowinjore jodolo kaw kuom misango mar rwath kod rombo ma ji ochiwo gin lemo mar bat, ring lemb kod chino.
Onego umigi keyo mokwongo mag puotheu kaka cham, divai manyien, gi mo kod yie rombe mukwongo ngʼado,
nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseyierogi kod nyikwagi kagiwuok e dhoutu duto mondo gichungʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ka gitiyone kinde duto.
Ka ja-Lawi odhiyo e dalau moro amora e Israel modakie, kendo obiro gi dembruok kama Jehova Nyasaye biro yiero,
to onyalo timo tich dolo e nying Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasache mana kaka jo-Lawi mamoko matiyo kanyo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Onego oyud pok maromre kodgi, kata obedo ni oseyudo pok makore koa e ndalo wuon-gi.
Ka udonjo e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou, kik upuonjru timbe mamono mag ogendini man kuno.
Kik yud ngʼato kuomu matimo misango gi wuode kata nyare e kendo, kata matimo timbe nyakalondo, kata jwok, kata loko dhoch kata ido,
kata jo-nyakalondo kata ajwoga kata ngʼat matiyo gi lang chunje maricho.
Ngʼato angʼata matimo gik ma kamagi mono gi Jehova Nyasaye kendo nikech timbe mamonogi Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro riembo ogendini e nyimu.
Nyaka ubed maonge ketho e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Pinje ma ubiro kawo winjo rieko mag ajuoke nyakalondo, to un Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ok oyienu timo kamano.
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou janabi machal koda kowuok e dier oweteu, nyaka uwinje.
Nikech ma e gima ne upenjo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu e got Horeb e chiengʼ chokruok kane uwacho niya, “Kik wawinj dwond Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kata neno mach makakni kama dipo ka watho.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowachona niya, “Gima giwachono nikare.”
Abiro miyogi janabi machal kodi moa kuom owetegi, abiro keto wechena e dhoge kendo obiro nyisogi gik moko duto ma achikogi.
Ka ngʼato ok owinjo wechena ma janabino hulo e nyinga, to an awuon ema natere e bura.
To janabi mahedhore wacho wach moro amora e nyinga ma ok anyise ni mondo owachi kata janabi ma wuoyo e nying nyiseche mamoko nyaka negi.
Unyalo wacho e kindu uwegi niya, “Ere kaka wanyalo ngʼeyo ni wach mowachno oa kuom Jehova Nyasaye?”
Ka gima janabi owachono ok otimore kata ochopo kare, to mano en wach ma Jehova Nyasaye ok owacho. Janabino rodho arodha wach, kik uluore.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseriembo kendo otieko ogendini ma omiyou pinygi ma udakie,
to yieruru kendo uket tenge mier madongo adek man e dier pinyno ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou mondo ukaw.
Geruru yore kuno kendo upog piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou ka girkenino nyadidek, mondo ka ngʼato onego dhano to oring odhi otony kuno.
Ma e chik moketi ne ngʼama onego wadgi kobothne kendo ok ongʼeyo mi oringo odhi kanyo mondo ores ngimane.
Kuom ranyisi ngʼato nyalo dhi kod nyawadgi e bungu mondo gitongʼ yien kendo kongʼayo leye malo mondo otongʼ-go yien, to wi le nyalo bwodhore ma tongʼ ngʼatno manege, ngʼatni nyaka ring dhi e mier mag pondogi mondo ores ngimane.
Ka ok kamano to jachul kuor nyalo lawe gi mirima ma juke kakanyo ochwalore, kendo nege kata obedo ni ok owinjore gi tho, nimar notimorene ka ok en-gi paro mar timo mano.
Ma emomiyo achikou mondo uket tenge mier adekgo ne un uwegi.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu omedo tongʼ mar pinyu, kaka nosingore kokwongʼore ni kwereu, ni obiro miyou pinyni duto kaka nosingorenegi,
kendo ka uluwo adimba chike duto ma amiyou kawuono mondo uher Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mi uwuotho e yorene ndalo duto, to nyaka umed yiero mier adek madongo kuom mago.
Timuru ma mondo remo maonge ketho kik chwer e pinyu, ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kaka girkeni mondo kik ubed joketho kuom chwero remo.
Ka ngʼato ok dwar wadgi mobutone kokiye kendo mi otho bangʼe oringo kodhi e mier madongo mag tonygi,
to jodong gwengʼno nyaka ome maduoge ka gole e dala maduongʼno mondo gichiwe e lwet joma chulo kuor mondo onege.
Kik utimne ngʼwono, kendo nyaka ugol e dier jo-Israel richo mar chwero remb ngʼat maonge ketho, eka unudhi maber.
Ka udak e lowo mubiro yudo e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro miyou mondo ukaw kaka girkeni maru, to kik ngʼato kuomu keth kiewo mane kwereu oketo e kind ngʼato gi wadgi.
Wach janeno achiel kende ok nyal mi ngʼadne ngʼato bura kuom ketho moro kata richo moro motimo. To wach mantie e kind ji nyaka ngʼere malongʼo ka nitiere joneno ariyo kata adek.
Ka janeno ma ja-miriambo ochungʼ mondo odonjne ja-mahundu,
to ji ariyo ma laroregi nyaka chungʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ka jodolo kod jongʼad bura manie tich e kindeno nitie.
Jongʼad bura nyaka non wachno malongʼo, to ka janeno oyud ni ja-miriambo kochiwo neno maonge adier ewi owadgi,
to timne mana kaka ne odwa timo ne owadgi kendo nyaka ugol tim marachno e dieru.
Ji modongʼ nowinj wachni mi nobed maluor kendo tim mamonono ok nochak otimre kendo e dieru.
Kik ibed gi tim ngʼwono, to chul ngʼato ngima kar ngima, wangʼ kar wangʼ, lak kar lak, lwedo kar lwedo, kendo tielo kar tielo.
Ka udhi kedo gi wasiku kendo uneno farese, geche mag lweny kod jolweny motegno moloyou, to kik gimiu luoro nikech Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mane ogolou e piny Misri nobed kodu.
Ka uchiegni chako lweny, jadolo nosud nyime mondo owuo gi jolweny.
Enowach niya, “Winjuru, yaye jo-Israel kawuono udhi kedo gi wasiku, kik chunyu aa kata luoro maku, kik kihondko gou bende kik utetni e nyimgi.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ema nodhi kodu mondo okednu kuom wasiku mondo omiu loch.”
Jodongo nowach ne jolweny niya, “Bende ngʼato osegero ot manyien ma oweyo odno kapok orwako? Onego odog dala nikech dipo ka otho e lweny ma ngʼat machielo ema orwako odno.
Bende ngʼato osepidho mzabibu ma ok ochako chamo olembe? Onego odog dala nikech dipoka otho e lweny ma ngʼat machielo ema bi cham olemono.
Bende ngʼato osesingore ne nyako moro nokendo ma ok okende? Onego odog dala nikech dipoka otho e lweny ma ngʼat machielo ema kend nyakono.”
Eka jotelo nowach kendo niya, “Bende ngʼato nitie ka man-gi luoro kata ma chunye ool? Onego odog dala mondo owetene bende kik chunygi ool.”
Kane jodongo osetieko wuoyo gi jolweny negiyiero negi jotelo.
Ka uwuok dhi monjo dala maduongʼno, to penjuru jo-dalano ka gidwaro timo kodu winjruok mar kwe.
Ka giyie ma giyawo dhorangeyegi, to ji duto man kanyo nobed e bwo loch e tich matek kendo ginitinu.
Ka gidagi loso kwe mi gichako kedo kodu, to tiekuru dala maduongʼno.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ochiwo dala maduongʼno e lwetu, to neguru ji duto man kanyo gi ligangla.
To mon, nyithindo, jamni kod gik moko duto manie iye kawgiuru duto ka gik muyako kendo unyalo kawo gik muyako ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu omiyou koa kuom wasiku.
Ma e kaka onego utimne mier madongo duto man mabor, to kik utim kamano ne mier machiegni kodu.
Kata kamano e mier madongo duto mag ogendini ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kaka girkeni, kik uwe gimoro amora mayweyo kangima.
Tiekgi duto kaka jo-Hiti, jo-Amor, jo-Kanaan, jo-Perizi, jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechikou.
Ka ok kamano to gibiro puonjou mondo utim gik mamono ma gitimo kagilamo nyisechigi kendo unutim richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Ka umonjo dala maduongʼ ma ukedo kuom kinde mangʼeny kapok ukawe, to kik uketh yien mage ka utongʼogi gi le mi ugogi piny nikech unyalo chamo olembene. Bende yien manie piny gin ji madimi ukethgi?
Kata kamano unyalo tongʼo yiende ma ok nyag olemo mondo uketgi ka ohinga mi ukaw dala maduongʼ ma ukedogono.
Ka ngʼato onegi moyud ka oriere piny e pap kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou mondo ukaw kendo ok ongʼere malongʼo ngʼama onege,
to jodongu gi jongʼad bura nodhi mondo opim gi tol chakre kama ringre ngʼatno nitie nyaka e mier machiegni kode.
Eka jodongo manie dala machiegni kod ringre ngʼatno nokaw nyaroya mapok otiyo, kata mapok otwe e jok,
kendo gilor kode e holo kama pok opur kata pidhoe cham, kochomo aora ma pi molie, kendo kanyo ema mondo giture ngʼute.
Jodolo, ma yawuot joka Lawi nochungʼ nyime, nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseyierogi mondo gitine kendo mondo gichiw gweth e nying Jehova Nyasaye kendo mondo gingʼad buche mar larruok kod mag nek.
Eka jodongo duto manie dala machiegni gi kama ringruokno nitie noluok lwetgi e nyaroyano ma ngʼute otur e holo,
kendo giniwach niya, “Lwetwa ne ok osechwero remoni kata wangʼwa ne ok oneno ka otimore.
Yie iwinj pwodhruok ma jogi Israel ma isereso yaye Jehova Nyasaye kendo kik ikaw jogi kaka joketho mochwero remo maonge ketho.” Kamano ginipwodhre kuom richo mar chwero remono.
Mano e kaka ubiro golo kuomu tim marach mar chwero remo maonge ketho, nikech usetimo gima kare e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka udhi kedo gi wasigu kendo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ochiwogi e lwetu ma umakogi ka wasumbini magu,
kendo ka ineno dhako moro ma jaber e kind mon momaki, ma idwaro kendo to inyalo kawe obed chiegi.
Kel dhakono e odi, bangʼe liel wiye kendo ingʼad kokene,
bende igol lepe mane omakego. Bangʼ ka osedak e odi kuom dwe achiel koywago wuon gi min, eka idhi ire mondo ibed chwore kendo en bende obed chiegi.
Ka ok imor kode, to iweye odhi kamoro amora ma ohero. Ok onego iuse kata kete jatichni, nimar isemiye wichkuot.
Ka ngʼato nigi mon ariyo, kendo ohero moro maloyo machielo mi giduto ginywolone yawuowi, to wuowi mokwong nywol en wuod dhako ma ok ohero,
ka ondiko mwandune ne yawuote kik okaw ratiro mar wuowi makayo omi wuod dhako moherono.
Nyaka one ni ochiwone wuowi maduongʼ ma wuod dhako ma ok oherocha pok nyadiriyo mar gige duto. Wuowino en e ranyisi mokwongo mar tekre wuon. Ratiro mar wuowi makayo en mare.
Ka ngʼato nigi wuowi ma jendeke ma ok winj wuon kod min kendo ok owinjgi ka okume,
wuon gi min nyaka kawe mitere ir jodongo e ranga dalagi.
Giniwach ne jodongo niya, “Wuodwani wiye tek kendo ja-jendeke, ok owinjwa, en janjore kendo jakongʼo.”
Eka ji duto modak e gwengʼno nogoye gi kite motho. Nyaka ugol tim marachni e dieru kendo jo-Israel duto kowinjo wachno nobed maluor.
Ka ngʼato motimo tim mamono onegi mi ringre ongʼaw e yien,
