to kik uwe ringre dongʼ koliero ma piny ru. Une ni uike mana chiengʼno nikech ngʼato angʼata ma olier e yath en ngʼama Nyasaye okwongʼo. Kik udwany piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kaka girkeni.
Ka ineno rwadh wadu kata rombone kolal, kik iwuondri ni ok inene, to kawe idwokene wuon.
Ka owaduno ok odak machiegni kodi kaw chiayono iter dalani nyaka chop obi odware, eka mondo imiye.
Tim kamano bende ne pundane, kata lawe kata gire moro amora molal kendo kik ichal ngʼama ok oneno.
Ka ineno punda mar nyawadu kata rwadhe kopodho e yo, to kik ichal ngʼama ok oneno, to kony wuon-gi mondo ochunge oa malo.
Dhako ok onego rwak lewni mag chwo, chwo bende kik rwak lewni mag mon, nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ok dwar joma timo kamano.
Ka iyudo od winyo e bath yo, manie yien kata e lum piny kendo winyo madhako onindo e tongʼe kata oumo nyithinde, to kik ikaw winyono gi nyithinde.
Inyalo kawo nyithinde to iwe winyono odhi, mondo omi idhi maber kendo idag amingʼa.
Ka igero ot manyien, to nyaka iriw ragengʼ molworo gama mondo kik ikel chwero remo e odi ka ngʼato olwar e tat odi.
Kik ipidh kothe ariyo e puoth mzabibu, kitimo kamano, to gik motwi kata ochiek kanyo duto nobed mogak kendo ginidongʼ ei kama ler mar lemo.
Kik ipur gi rwath kod punda kitweyo e jok achiel.
Kik irwak law molos gi yie rombo kod katana motwangʼ kanyakla.
Nyaka imin usi e konde angʼwen mar lawi mar abola.
Ka ngʼato okendo chiege bangʼe bangʼ riwore kode chunye oa kuome kata oyudo ni ok ohere,
kendo owuok oketho nyinge komiye nying marach kendo owacho niya, “Ne anywomo dhakoni to kane ariwora kode to ne ok ayude gi gige ringre.”
Eka wuon nyako kod min nokel gima nyiso ni en kod ringre ne jodongo e ranga dala.
Wuon nyako nowach ne jodongo niya, “Ne achiwo nyara e kend ne ngʼatni to ok ohere.
To koro oseketho nyinge kowacho ni, ‘Ne ok ayudo nyari gi ringre.’ To ma e gima nyiso ni nyara ne oyud gi gige ringre.” Bangʼe jonywolne noyar law e nyim jodong gwengʼ,
kendo jodongogo nokaw ngʼatno mi kume.
Ngʼatno nochul chudo moromo sekel mia achiel mar fedha mondo mi wuon nyako nikech ngʼatni osemiyo nyar Israel mangili nying marach. Nyakono nosik kode kaka chiege kendo ok noriembe nyaka chiengʼ.
To ka dipo ni oyud ni en adier ni nyakono ne ok oyudo gi gige ringre,
to nyakono nokel e dhood wuon mare kendo joma chwo ma gwengʼno nochiele gi kite motho, nikech otimo gima rach e kind jo-Israel kodoko jachode e od wuon. Tim marachno nyaka ugol e dieru.
Ka ngʼato oyud ka terore gi chi wadgi, to dhakono kod ngʼatno nyaka negi. Tim marachno nyaka gol e dier jo-Israel.
Ka ngʼato oyudo nyako ngili e dala matin ma osetimo winjruok mar kend kod ngʼat machielo ma oterore kode,
to nyaka ugol ji ariyogo e dhorangach mar dala oko kendo chielgi gi kite ma githo. Nyakono nogo gi kite nikech ne en e gwengʼ to ok ogoyo koko mondo okonye, kendo ngʼatno nochiel nikech odwanyo chi ngʼato. Tim marachno nyaka ugol e dieru.
To ka ngʼato oromo gi nyako ma osetimo winjruok gi ngʼato mar kend mi omake githuon moterore kode, ngʼatno ema nyaka negi.
Kik utim gima rach ne nyakono, onge richo motimo mowinjore gi tho. Wachni chalo kod ngʼat ma omonjo wadgi monego,
nimar ngʼatni noromo gi nyakoni to kata nyako mosetimgo winjruokni ogoyo koko, ne onge ngʼama okonye.
Ka ngʼato oromo gi nyako mapok otimo winjruok mar kend gi ngʼato mi oterore kode githuon mi ofwenygi,
nyaka ochul wuon nyakono sekel piero abich mar fedha. Nyaka okend nyakono nimar osekethone, kendo ok noriembe e ndalo duto mar ngimane.
Ngʼato ok onego kend chi wuon, kendo kik odwany kitanda wuon mare.
Ngʼat ma nyangetane otore kata ma duongʼne ongʼad oko kik donj e chokruok mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Ngʼat ma onywol e kend ma ok nikare kata nyikwaye ok onego odonji e chokruok mar Jehova Nyasaye nyaka tiengʼ mar apar.
Jo-Amon kata jo-Moab kata achiel kuom nyikwaye ok onego odonj e chokruok mar Jehova Nyasaye nyaka e tiengʼ mar apar,
nikech ne ok giromonu e yo gi makati kod pi kane uwuok Misri, kendo negichulo Balaam wuod Beor modak Pethor manie Aram-Naharaim nengo mondo okwongʼu.
Kata kamano Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ne ok owinjo Balaam mine omiyo kwongʼno olokore gweth ne un nikech Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oherou.
Kik udwar winjruok e kindu kodgi e ndalo duto mag ngimau.
Kik ubed gi achaya e kindu gi jo-Edom nimar gin oweteu. Kik ukwed jo-Misri nikech ne udak e pinygi ka wasumbini.
Tiengʼ-gi mar adek ma ginywolo nyalo donjo e chokruok mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka ugoyo agengʼa ne wasiku, keturu mabor gik ma olil.
Ka ngʼato achiel kuom jou ogak nikech kothe mar nyodo owuok apoya koleko, to nyaka owuogi oko mar kambi mondo obed kuno.
To ka ochopo odhiambo nyaka olwokre eka oduogi e kambi ka chiengʼ podho.
Weuru kamoro oko mar kambi ma unyalo dhi losorue,
kendo kudhi losoru kanyo, to beduru gi kwer, ukunygo bur, mi ka uselosoru to uiko.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu wuotho e dieru e kambi ka ritou kendo mondo ochiw wasiku e lwetu. Kambi maru nyaka bed maler mondo kik one gima rach ma oweu.
Ka misumba obiro mopondo iru kik udwoke ne ruodhe.
Yie mondo odak kama ohero e dieru kata e miechu. Kik ukete e tij achune.
Onge ja-Israel madichwo kata madhako manobed jachode ei hekalu.
Kik ukel sitadi mar jachode madhako kata madichwo e od Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mondo ochul nengo mar kwongʼruok nimar gik moko ariyogo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mon godo.
Kik imi ja-Israel wadu chuli gi ohala kuom gima oholo bedni en pesa kata chiemo kata gimoro amora monego gol ohala.
Inyalo kawo ohala kuom japiny moro to ok owadu ma ja-Israel mondo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ogwedhu e gimoro amora ma uketoe lwetu mar timo e piny mudhikawo mondo obed maru.
Ka ukwongʼoru ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, to kik ubadhru chule, nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro bandhou wachno ma ubed joketho.
To ka ok ukwongʼoru to ok unubed joketho.
Gimoro amora ma dhogi owacho nyaka itim, nimar ne ukwongʼoru kendu ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi dhou uwegi.
Ka idonjo e puoth olemo mar wadu, inyalo chamo olemb mzabibu duto ma idwaro, to kik itingʼ moko ei okapu idhigo.
Ka idonjo e puoth cham mar wadu, to inyalo jako wiye cham gi lweti, kendo kik ika cham mochungʼ.
Ka ngʼato okendo dhako, to bangʼe oyudo ni ok ohere nikech osetimo gimoro ma ok nikare, onyalo ndikone barup weruok mar ketho keny, kendo oriembe oa e ode.
Bangʼe ka dhakono osea e ode, mi obedo chi ngʼat machielo,
to chwore mar ariyono bende ojok kode, mondiko barup weruok momiye, kendo oriembe, kata ka chwore mar ariyono otho,
to chwore mokwongo mane oriembe cha kik kende kendo nikech osedoko mogak. Tim ma kamano en kwero e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye. Kik umi richo bedi e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kaka girkeni.
Ka ngʼato okendo machiegni, kik tere e lweny kata kete e tich moro. Kuom higa achiel miuru ngʼatno thuolo momiyogi chiege mokendono mor.
Kik ngʼato omak pongʼ rego kata nyapongʼ kaka gir singo mar gowi, nikech mano chalo kaka ngʼama okawo ngima ngʼato owuon kaka gir singo.
Ka ngʼato oyudi ka mako ja-Israel wadgi moketo obedo misumbane kata ongʼiewe gi ngʼato, ngʼat motimo kamano nyaka tho. Nyaka ugol tim marachno e dieru.
E weche mag tuoche malandore mag del, neuru ni utimo kaka jodolo ma gin jo-Lawi opuonjou. Nyaka utim adimba gik moko duto ma anyisogi.
Paruru gima ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu otimo ne Miriam e yo kane uwuok e piny Misri.
Ka iholo ja-Israel wadu gimoro amora, to kik iyie idhi kode e ode kodwaro chiwoni gir singo.
Dongʼ oko kendo we en ema odonjie ode ogol gima odwa singonino.
Ka ngʼatno en jachan, to kik iwe gire mosingonino nindi e odi.
Dwokne lawe mar abolano kapok chiengʼ opodho mondo oyud gima oumorego. Eka enogoni erokamano kendo nokwan gino kaka ranyisi mar tim makare e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Kik itim marach ni jatich mabiro tiyoni kata obed ja-Israel wadu kata japiny moro manie gwengʼu kata dalau.
Odiechiengʼ ka odiechiengʼ kapok chiengʼ opodho chule kar tichne mosetiyo, nikech odhier ma chudono ema ogeno, ka ok kamano to onyalo ywak ne Jehova Nyasaye nikech in kendo inibed jaketho.
Wuone ok nonegi nikech ketho mag nyithindgi, bende nyithindo kik negi nikech ketho mag wuonegi, to ngʼato ka ngʼato nonegi nikech richone owuon.
Kik uketh buch japiny moro, kata mar nyathi kich kata mako law dhako ma chwore otho kaka gir singo.
Paruru nine un wasumbini e piny Misri kendo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ne oresou kua kuno. Mano emomiyo achikou mondo utim kamano.
Ka ikayo cham e puothi ma cham moro odongʼni ka ok ikayo, to kik idog iome. Weye ne jodak, nyithind kiye kod mon ma chwogi otho, mondo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi ogwedhi e kuom gik mitimo.
Ka uyiengo yiend zeituni, kik utengʼ bedene diriyo, to weuru olembe modongʼ e zeituni ne jodak, nyithind kiye kod mon ma chwogi otho.
Ka usepono mzabibu e puothu, kik uchak udog utengʼ yiendgi, to weuru modongʼne jodak, nyithind kiye kod mon ma chwogi otho.
Paruru nine un wasumbini e piny Misri. Mano emomiyo achikou mondo utim kamano.
Ka ji ariyo larore e wach moro, to nyaka giter wachno e od ngʼado bura kendo jongʼad bura nongʼadnegi bura kare, ka giweyo ngʼat makare thuolo to ngʼat man giketho ikumo.
Ka ngʼat moyud giketho onego chwadi, to jangʼad bura nowachne mondo onind piny ochwade maromre gi kethoneno,
to ok onego chwade del moloyo piero angʼwen. Ka ochwade moloyo mano, to wadu diyud wichkuot e wangʼe.
Kik utwe dho dhiangʼ kaywayo lodi ma idinogo cham.
Ka owete odak kanyakla kae to moro otho kaonge wuowi, to ngʼat moro nono ma ok ja-dalano ok onego kend chiegeno. Owadgi chwore hie ema mondo okawe okende mondo otimne gik moko duto ma yuoro onego otimne chi owadgi.
Nyathi ma wuowi mokwong nywolo ema notingʼ kar nying wuon mare mane otho mondo kik nyinge lal nono e dier oganda jo-Israel.
To ka ngʼato ok dwar kendo chi owadgi ma chwore othono, to dhakono mondo odhi ir jodongo e dhoranga dala kendo owach niya, “Owadgi chwora odagi ok onyal tingʼo kar owadgi ei Israel, odagi timona gima yuoro onego timne chi owadgi.”
Eka jodong dala noluong ngʼatno mondo owuo kode. To kapod odagi kowacho niya, “Ok adwar kende,”
chi owadgino nodhi ire e nyim jodongo mi olony wuochene achiel e tiende kendo ongʼudh olawo e wangʼe kowachone niya, “Ma e gima itimo ne ngʼat modagi rito dala owadgi mondo ochungi.”
Ngʼatno kothgi nongʼere e Israel kaka koth joma ne olony wuochegi.
Ka ji ariyo dhawo kae to chi ngʼat achiel kuomgi obiro konyo chwore, mi omake gi duongʼne,
to dhakono nyaka ngʼad lwete, kendo kik timne ngʼwono.
Kik ubed gi rapim ariyo e okapu magu mamoro pek to moro yot.
Bende kik ubed gi rapim ariyo e uteu mag pimo, ma moro duongʼ to moro tin.
Nyaka ubed gi gige pimo mowinjore kendo makare mondo udagi amingʼa e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mon gi joma timo gik ma kamago; ngʼat matimo gi mibadhi.
Paruru gima ne jo-Amalek otimonu kane uwuok Misri.
Kane uol kendo tekou norumo, negimonjou e yo ma ginego joma ne wuoth oolo; kendo ne ok giluoro Nyasaye.
Emomiyo ka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyou kwe e piny mobiro miyou mondo ukaw kaka girkeni, to kik wiu wil ma ok utieko jo-Amalek duto.
Ka udonjo e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kaka girkeni kendo ukawe ma udakie,
kawuru gik moko mokwongo nyak e puotheu e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kendo oketgi ei okapu. Bangʼe dhiuru kama Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro yiero mondo nyinge obedie
kendo uwach ne jadolo manie tich e kindeno niya, “Asingora kawuono ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi ni asebiro e piny mane Jehova Nyasaye osingore ni kwerewa ni nomiwa.”
Jadolo nokaw okapuno e lweti mi okete piny e nyim kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi.
Eka unuwachi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu niya, “Wuonwa ne en ja-Aram mane bayo kendo ne odhi Misri gi ji moko manok modak kuno mi obedo oganda maduongʼ, maratego kendo mangʼeny.
To jo-Misri nosandowa mi omiyo wathagore ka giketowa e tich matek.
Eka ne walamo Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach kwerewa kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowinjo ywakwa mi oneno chandruokwa, tich matek kod achune.
Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye nogolowa Misri giteko mangʼongo korieyo bade, gi ranyisi kod honni madongo.
Ne okelowa ka mi omiyowa pinyni, ma en piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich;
to koro, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, akeloni gik mokwongo nyak mag puodho mane imiya.” Bangʼe ket okapu e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi kendo ikulrine.
Un, jo-Lawi, kod jodak manie dieru biro bedo gimor kuom gik moko duto ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyou kod joutu duto.
Ka useketo tenge achiel kuom apar mag gik moko duto monyak e higa mar adek, ma en higa michiwoe achiel kuom apar mag gik monyak, to nyaka uchiw gigo ne jo-Lawi, gi jopinje mamoko modak e dieru kaachiel gi nyithind kiye kod mon ma chwogi otho mondo gibed gi chiemo moromogi.
Bangʼe ngʼato ka ngʼato nowach ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasache niya, “Asegolo koa e oda chiwo mowal kendo asemiyogi jo-Lawi, jodak, nyithind kiye kod mon ma chwogi otho, kaluwore gi chik mane imiyowa. Pok ajwangʼo chikeni kendo wiya bende pok owil gi gimoro amora kuomgi.
Pok achamo dir pok mowalni kata e kinde mane an e kuyo, kata gologi e oda ka agak; kendo ok asechiwogi ne ngʼat motho. Aseluoro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha, kendo asetimo gik moko duto mane iwachona.
Rang piny gie polo, ma en kar dakni maler kendo igwedh jogi Israel kod piny ma isemiyowa kane isingori kikwongʼori ni kwerewa, ma en piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich.”
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu wachonu kawuono mondo urit buchene kod chikene; ritgiuru ka uluwogi gi chunyu duto kod ngimau duto.
Usengʼado kawuono ni Jehova Nyasaye en e Nyasachu kendo ubiro wuotho e yorene kurito buchene, chikene kendo ubiro miye luor.
Jehova Nyasaye osewacho kawuononi ni un joge, kendo mwandune mogeno kaka nosingorenu kendo ni nyaka urit chikene duto.
Jehova Nyasaye osewacho ni unubed jok man-gi pak, huma kod luor maduongʼ moloyo ogendini mamoko duto mosechweyo kendo unubed jomaler e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kaka nosesingo.
Musa kod jodong Israel duto ne ochiko oganda niya, “Rituru chikegi ma amiyou kawuono
Ka usengʼado aora Jordan ma uchopo e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou, keturu kite moko kendo uwirgi maber.
Ndikuru kuomgi weche duto manie chike ka usengʼado ma uchopo e piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou ma en piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu nosingonu.
Ka usengʼado aora Jordan, chunguru kitegi e Got Ebal mana kaka achikou kawuono ka uwirogi maber.
Geruru kendo mar misango ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, ma en kendo mar misango molos gi kite. Kitego kik paa gi chuma.
Geruru kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi kite ma ok opa, kendo utim misango miwangʼo pep kanyo ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Timuru misengini mag lalruok kanyo, ka uchiemo kendo ubedo gi mor e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Kendo ndikuru weche duto mag chikni mochanore e kite ma usechungono.”
Eka Musa kod jodolo ma gin jo-Lawi nowachone jo-Israel duto niya, “Lingʼuru, yaye Israel, bende chikuru itu! Koro usebedo jo-Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Luor Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi kendo mondo iluw chikene kod buchene ma amiyi kawuono.”
E odiechiengʼ onogono Musa nochiko oganda kowachonegi niya,
Ka usengʼado aora Jordan, to dhoudigi nobi e Got Gerizim mondo gigwedh ji: Simeon, Lawi, Juda, Isakar, Josef kod Benjamin.
Kendo dhoudigi nochungʼ e Got Ebal ka gihulo weche mag kwongʼ: Reuben, Gad, Asher, Zebulun, Dan kod Naftali.
Jo-Lawi biro somone jo-Israel gi dwol maduongʼ niya,
“Okwongʼ ngʼat moloso kido milamo, kata nyiseche mopa, ma en gima mono e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, tij lwedo mar japecho kendo mochungi kama opondo.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat ma ok oluoro wuon kata min.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat masudo tongʼ mar jakiepe.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat ma wito muofu e yo.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat maketho buch japiny moro, nyathi kich kod dhako ma chwore otho.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat ma terore gi chi wuon, nimar odwanyo kitanda wuon.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat ma oterore gi chiayo.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat ma terore gi nyamin kata nyar wuon kata nyar min mare.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat ma oterore gi mar-mare.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat ma onego nyawadgi lingʼ-lingʼ.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat ma okawo asoya mondo oneg ngʼat maonge ketho.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
“Okwongʼ ngʼat ma ok orito weche mag chikni kata luwogi ka ojiwogi.” Eka ji duto nodwok niya, “Amin!”
Ka uluoro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo urito adimba chikene duto ma amiyou kawuono, to Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro tingʼou malo moloyo ogendini duto modak e piny.
Gwethgi duto nobed magu kamoro amora ma untie ka uluoro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo magi e gin:
Ibiro gwedhou ka un e dala kata ka un oko.
Nogwedhu gi nyithindo mangʼeny gi cham mogundho kod jamni mathoth ma gin kweth mag nyiroye kod mag nyirombe.
Nogwedh atongeu gi dakuondeu duto.
Nogwedhu ka udonjo e dala kendo ka uwuok.
Jehova Nyasaye noket wasiku ma monjou e lwetu mi unulogi. Ginimonju ka gin oganda achiel, to ginike ka gia iru ka gin migepe abiriyo.
Jehova Nyasaye biro gwedho decheu kaachiel gi gimoro amora ma uchiworu timo, Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro gwedhou e piny ma omiyou.
Jehova Nyasaye biro gurou kaka joge maler, mana kaka ne owacho ka okwongʼore, ka urito chike mag Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo uwuotho e yorene.
Eka ji duto modak e piny none ni un joma oluong gi nying Jehova Nyasaye kendo gibiro luorou.
Jehova Nyasaye biro miyou gweth mogundho; ma gin nyithindo mangʼeny, jamni mathoth kod cham mogundho e piny mane Jehova Nyasaye osingore kokwongʼore ni kwereu ni nomiu.
Jehova Nyasaye biro yawo polo, ma en kar keno mag mwandune, ka ochiwo koth e piny e ndalo mowinjore, kendo ka ogwedho tije duto mag lwetu. Ubiro chiwo hola ne pinje mangʼeny to un ok unuhol gimoro kuomgi.
Jehova Nyasaye nomi ubed jotelo to ok joma itelonegi. Ka urito chike ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kawuononi kendo uluwogi adimba, to kinde duto unubed jotelo to ok joma itelonegi.
Kik uwe chike ma amiyou kawuononi, ka udhi e bat korachwich kata koracham kendo ka uluwo nyiseche manono kendo utiyonegi.
To ka ok uchiwo luor ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo ok urito chikene duto adimba kod buchene ma amiyou kawuononi, to kwongʼ-gi duto biro makou.
Ibiro kwongʼou ka un e dala kata ka un oko.
Nokwongʼ atongeu gi dakuondeu.
Nyithindu munywolo nokwongʼ, kaachiel gi chambu, gi nyiroye mag dhou kod nyithi jambu.
Ibiro kwongʼou ka udonjo kendo kuwuok.
Jehova Nyasaye biro oronu kwongʼ, ngʼengʼ kod achaya e gimoro amora ma utimo, nyaka urum chuth makaru lal nono nikech richo ma usetimo ma ujwangʼe.
Jehova Nyasaye biro goyou gi tuoche mi otieku e piny ma udhi kawo.
Jehova Nyasaye nogou gi tuo mar kahera, midhusi gi tuo akuodi kod gwonyo kendo obiro kelonu oro mi cham rochre ewi dongo; kendo gigo duto biro thagou nyaka urum chuth.
Polo norieny ka mula ewiu, piny to nobed matek ka chuma.
Jehova Nyasaye enolok koth machwe e pinyu obed mana lo kod buru malich, gini olre koa e polo nyaka unurum.
Jehova Nyasaye nomi lou e nyim wasiku. Unumonjgi ka un e achiel, to unuring-gi kuke e migepe abiriyo, kendo unubed gima wichkuot ne ogendini duto manie piny.
Ringreu modongʼ ema nobed chiemb winy manie kor polo gi ondiegi manie thim, kendo onge ngʼato angʼata manogolgi kuomu.
Jehova Nyasaye nogou gi tuo mag buche mag Misri, akuodi, gwonyo kod kalanga ma ok thiedhi.
Jehova Nyasaye nogou gi tuo mar neko kendo noloku muofni kendo joma orundore.
E dier odiechiengʼ tir ubiro rundoru ka muofni e mudho. Onge gima unutim manodhi maber, ndalo duto nothiru kendo noyak giu maonge ngʼama noresu.
Inichan kendo nyako mihero, to ngʼat moro nono ema nokawe mabed kode. Iniger ot to ok inidagie, kendo inipidh mzabibu to ok inicham gik monyak kuomgi.
Rwadhi noyangʼ kineno, to ok ni cham ringe. Kanyna mari nokaw kuomi githuon, to ok noduognigo. Rombe magi nomi wasiki, to onge ngʼama noresgi.
Yawuoti kod nyigi noter e pinje mamoko, kendo inimanygi gi wengeni odiechiengʼ duto kionge gi teko mar resogi.
Oganda ma ok ingʼeyo nocham gik mitiyo matek gi luchi e puotheni kendo onge gima initim makmana tingʼ mapek kod achune e ndalou duto.
Gik ma wangʼi neno noloki neko.
Jehova Nyasaye nomi buche maremo ma ok thiedhi mak chongeni gi tiendeni kendo ginilandre koa e pat tiendi nyaka e wiyi.
Jehova Nyasaye biro riembou, to ruoth ma unuyier notelnu noteru e lwet piny ma kata kwereu ne ok ongʼeyo. Kuno unulamie nyiseche mamoko, ma gin nyiseche mopa gi yien kod kite.
Inibed gima mono miyanyo kendo ijaro e kind ogendini duto kuma Jehova Nyasaye noterue.
Unuchwo kothe mangʼeny to unuka manok, nikech bonyo nokethgi.
Unupidh mzabibu e puotheu ma ukagi to ok unumadh olemo mochwer kuomgi kata choko olembgigo nikech kute nochamgi.
Ubiro bedo kod yien zeituni e pinyu to ok unukonyru gi moe nikech zeituni nolwar piny.
Unubed gi yawuowi kod nyiri to ok unuritgi nimar notergi e twech e pinje mamoko.
Kweth mag bonyo noketh yiendu kod chambu duto e pinyu.
Jopinje mamoko modak e pinyu nonyaa mamedre moloyou, to un to unubed manok.
Ginibed gi gik ma giholou, to un ok nubed gi gima unyalo hologi. Ginibed jotelo, to un nubed joma itelonegi.
Kwongʼ-gi duto nobi kuomu. Kwongʼ-gi nolaw bangʼu mijuku manyaka urum uduto, nikech ne ok uwinjo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kata rito chikene kod buchene duto mane omiyou.
Ginibed ranyisi kod midhiero kuomu kod nyikwau nyaka chiengʼ.
Nikech ne ok utiyo ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi ilo kod mor e ndalo mane un gi mwandu,
omiyo e kech, e riyo, e duk, kod dhier unutine wasiku ma Jehova Nyasaye oseoronu. Enoket jok mar mula mapek e ngʼutu nyaka chop otieku.
Jehova Nyasaye enokel piny moro moa mabor, ma en piny mantie e giko piny, machal gi ongo mafuyo, gin oganda ma dhogi ok unuwinji,
oganda maneno makwiny maonge gi luor ne joma oti kata joma pod tindo.
Ginineg jambu ma pod tindo kendo giniketh chambu e puothe mi nyaka ginitieku chuth. Ok ginicham, divai manyien kata mo, kata mana nyiroye mag dhou kod nyirombe mag jambu nyaka chop gitieku chuth.
Ginitim agengʼa ne miechu madongo duto nyaka kuonde mochiel motingʼore gi malo ma uketo genou kuomgi lwar. Ginikethi mier madongo e piny duto ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou.
Nikech chandruok maniyudi ka wasiki okeloni ka in e twech, nucham nyaka nyithindu munywolo, ma gin ringre yawuotu kod nyiu ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyou.
Kata mana ngʼat maber kendo ngʼwon ahinya e dieru ok nobed gi miwafu ne owadgi owuon kata mana ne chiege mohero kata nyithinde modongʼ,
kendo ok enomi ngʼato angʼata ringre nyathineno ma en owuon ochamo nikech mano kende e gima nodongʼ bangʼ ka wasigu osemonjo miechu.
Dhako makare kendo man-gi lony mamalo e dieru, ngʼat modimbore kendo man-gi ngʼwono malach ma bende ok osewuotho e lowo gi tiende nono, nobed ka iye kwar kod chwore owuon kata mana gi yawuote kod nyige ma en owuon ema onywolo.
Notamre pogonegi kata mana bieche owuon bangʼ nywol, nimar oparo mondo ochamgi lingʼ-lingʼ e ndalo ma wasiku nogonu agengʼa ka masira olworo miechu madongo.
Ka ok urito weche duto manie chikni ma ondiki e kitabuni kendo ka ok uchiwo luor ne nyinge man-gi teko ma en Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,
Jehova Nyasaye biro kelo masiche malich kuomu kaachiel gi nyikwau, tuoche maywayo dend ji kuom kinde mangʼeny.
Obiro keto kuomu tuoche duto mag Misri ma uluoro kendo ginibed kuomu.
Jehova Nyasaye nokel kuomu kit tuoche duto ma ok ondiki e kitabuni mar chik nyaka chop tieku chuth.
Un ma ungʼeny ka sulwe manie polo unudongʼ matin nikech ne ok urito chike Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Mana kaka ne omoro Jehova Nyasaye mondo omiu gweth kendo ubed mangʼeny, e kaka obiro bedo gi mor ka oranou kendo otiekou. Notieku e piny ma udonjoe mondo ukaw.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nokewu e pinje duto, koa e tungʼ piny konchiel nyaka machielo. Kanyo unulamie nyiseche mamoko, ma gin nyiseche mopa mag yiende kod kite ma un uwegi kod ka kwereu ne ok ongʼeyo.
E kind pinjego ok unuyudie hoch kata yweyo ka ombongʼ tiendeu ool. Kuno Jehova Nyasaye nomiu paro maliw, wangʼ maneno ka ool gi dwaro to gi chuny machandore.
Unudag ka ukia gima biro timorenu; ka un gilworo odiechiengʼ kod otieno, ka ukia gima biro timore ne ngimau.
Ka piny oru gokinyi unuwach niya, “Mad ne bedni en odhiambo” kendo godhiambo unuwach niya, “Mad ne piny bed ni en okinyi” nikech masira ma unune nopongʼ chunyu kod gik ma wengeu none.
Jehova Nyasaye nooru dok Misri gi yiedhi, e wuoth mane awacho ni ok onego udhiye. Kuno unuchiwru ne wasiku kaka chwo kod mon ma jotich to onge ngʼama noyie ngʼiewou.
Magi e weche mag singruok mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiko Musa mondo omi jo-Israel otim kane gin Moab, kaachiel gi singruok mane osetimo kodgi Horeb.
Musa noluongo jo-Israel duto mowachonegi niya, Useneno gi wangʼu gik moko duto mane Jehova Nyasaye otimo Misri ne Farao, jodonge duto, to gi pinyno.
Ne uneno gi wangʼu timbe madongo mane gin ranyisi gi honni.
To nyaka chil kawuono pok Jehova Nyasaye imiyou paro mar ngʼeyo, mar neno kata it mar winjo.
E kinde mag higni piero angʼwen kane atelonu e thim lepu ne ok oti kata wuocheu bende ok oti.
Ne ok uchamo makati kata madho divai kata gima mero ji ne atimo mano mondo ungʼe ni An e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Kane uchopo ka, Sihon ruodh Heshbon kod Og ruodh Bashan ne omonjowa to ne waloyogi.
Ne wakawo pinygi mi wamiyo jo-Reuben, jo-Gad kod nus mar dhood jo-Manase kaka girkeni.
Nyaka urit weche mag singruokgi mondo mi udongi kuom gik moko duto mutimo.
Kawuononi uchungʼ uduto e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ka un kaachiel gi jotendu, jou madongo, jodongu, jotendu mamoko, kod jo-Israel duto machwo,
kaachiel gi nyithindu kod mondu, to gi jopinje mamoko modak e kembeu kabaronu yien kendo umbonu pi.
Uchungo ka mondo utim singruok gi Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, singruok ma Jehova Nyasaye timo kodu kawuononi gi kwongʼruok chopo kare,
mondo oyieru adimba kaka joge, ka obedo Nyasachu kaka ne osingore ne kwereu ma Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo.
Atimo singruokni ka akwongʼora kawuono, ok gi un kende
ma uchungʼ ka kodwa kawuononi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, to atime nyaka gi joma onge kodwa ka kawuono.
Un ungʼeyo kaka ne wadak Misri kendo kaka ne wakalo e kind pinje ka wabiro ka.
Ne uneno gik mamono ma gilamo kod kido mag nyisechegi manono molos gi yien kod kite, kaachiel gi mago mag fedha gi dhahabu.
Neuru ni onge dichwo kata dhako, anywola kata dhoot moro e dieru kawuono ma chunye lokore weyo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kadhi lamo nyiseche mag jopinjego; bende neuru ni onge yath manyago olemo makech mar richo.
Ka ngʼat ma kamano owinjo weche mag singruok mi omiyore gweth kende kendo owacho e chunye niya, “Onge gima biro tima kata obedo ni asetimo mana giga awuon maparo.” Magi duto nokel masira ne pinje mag pi to gi kuonde motwo.
Jehova Nyasaye ok nowene ngʼatno richone, kendo mirimbe mager nowangʼ ngʼatno ka mach. Kwongʼ duto mondikie kitabuni nomake kendo Jehova Nyasaye noruch nyinge oko e bwo pinyni.
Jehova Nyasaye nopoge kuom dhout Israel duto mi none masira kaluwore gi singruok duto mag kwongʼ mondiki ei Kitabuni mar Chik.
Nyithindu manobi bangʼu to gi jopinje moa mabor none kit kwongʼ duto modonjo e piny kod tuoche mayoreyore ma Jehova Nyasaye osekelo kuomgi.
Piny duto nowangʼ gi mach kendo notim chumbi, maonge gima opidhi manobedie, kata gima dongo ok none, bende onge kata mana alode manodongie. Nokethre mana ka Sodom gi Gomora gi Adma kod Zeboim mane Jehova Nyasaye oketho ka mirima nomake.
Pinje duto nopenjre niya, “Angʼo momiyo Jehova Nyasaye otimo ma ne pinyni? Angʼo momiyo mirima mager omake malich kama?”
To nodwokgi niya, “Nikech jogi ne ojwangʼo singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach kweregi mane otimo kodgi kogologi e piny Misri.
Negidhi mi gilamo nyiseche moko nono ma gikulorenegi, nyiseche mane ok gingʼeyo, ma gin nyiseche mane ok imiyogi mondo gilam.
Emomiyo mirimb Jehova Nyasaye nowangʼo pinyni, kokelo kuomgi kwongʼ duto ma ondiki e kitabuni.
Kane Jehova Nyasaye iye owangʼ ka en gi mirima mager, nogologi oko mi oterogi e piny moro ma pod gintiere nyaka chil kawuono.”
Gik mopondo duto ni e lwet Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, to gik mofwenynwa gin magwa kod nyithindwa nyaka chiengʼ, mondo mi walu weche duto mondiki e kitabuni.
Ka gweth kata kwongʼ-gi ma aseketo e nyimu obironu kendo uketogi e chunyu kamoro amora ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nokewu e kind pinje,
kendo ka un kod nyithindu udwogo ir Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ka uchiwo ne luor kod chunyu duto gi ngimau duto ma achikou kawuono,
eka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro chopo gweth mare kuomu obiro bedo gi miwafu ne un ma ochoku duto ka uwuok e pinje duto mane okeyoue.
Kata bed nine ojwangʼu e piny mabor ahinya e bwo polo ka, koa kuno Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro chokou mi duogu uduto.
Obiro kelou e piny mane mar kwereu, mi unukawe. Enomi ubed gi mwandu bende ununyaa mangʼeny maloyo kaka ne kwereu romo.
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nopwodh chunyu kod chuny nyikwau mondo uhere gi chunyu duto kod ngimau duto mondo udagi amingʼa.
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noket kwongʼ-gi duto ne wasiku ma ochayou kendo sandou.
Ubiro chiwo luor ne Jehova Nyasaye kendo mako chikene duto ma amiyou kawuono.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou mwandu e tije lweteu duto kod nyak mag kothu, nyiroye mag dhou kod cham mag piny. Jehova Nyasaye nobed mamor kodu kendo mi uchak uyud mwandu, mana kaka ne otimo ne kwereu,
ka uchiwo luor ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo rito chikene kod buchene ma ondiki e kitabuni kendo udwogo ir Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi chunyu duto kod ngimani duto.
Chik ma amiyou kawuononi ok en chik matek to bende ok en kuma bor ma ok unyal chopoe.
Ok enie polo malo madimi uwach niya, “Ere ngʼama didhinwa e polo malo mondo oomnwago kendo opuonjwa eka warite?”
Bende ok en loka nam, madimi upenj niya, “En ngʼa madingʼad loka nam mondo oomnwago kendo opuonjwa eka warite?”
Ooyo, wach ni machiegni kodu, en mana e dhou kendo e chunyu omiyo unyalo rite.
Neuru, kawuono aketo e nyimu ngima kod mwandu, tho kod kethruok.
Nimar achikou kawuono mondo uher Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kuwuotho e yorene kendo urito buchene kod chikene, eka unudag mi umedru mangʼeny kendo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nogwedhu e piny ma udonjoe mondo ukaw kaka girkeni.
To ka chunyu odagi ma ok uchiwo luor kendo ka uwuok ma ukuloru ne nyiseche mamoko mi ulamogi,
to awachonu kawuononi ni nyaka notieku. Ok unudag amingʼa e piny ma ubiro donjoe mondo ukaw ka usengʼado aora Jordan.
Kawuononi aluongo polo gi piny mondo obed joneno ni aseketo gik moko ariyo e nyimu ma gin ngima gi gweth, kata tho kod kwongʼ. Koro yieruru ngima mondo un kaachiel gi nyikwau udag maber
kendo mondo uher Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kuwinjo wechene kendo kuketo chunyu kuome. Nimar Jehova Nyasaye e ngimau, kendo obiro miyou higni mangʼeny e piny mane osesingore ne kwereu Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo.
Eka Musa nodhi mowuoyo ne jo-Israel kowacho niya,
“Koro sani an ja-higni mia achiel gi piero ariyo kendo koro ok anyal dhi nyime gi telonu. Jehova Nyasaye osewachona ni, ‘Ok iningʼad Jordan.’
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu owuon biro telo e nyimu. Enotiek dhout pinjego duto kendo unukaw pinjegigo duto. Omiyo Joshua notelnu mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye osewacho.
Jehova Nyasaye notimnegi mana gima ne otimone Sihon kod Og, ruodhi ma jo-Amor kaachiel gi pinjegi.
Jehova Nyasaye nochiwgi e lwetu to nyaka utimnegi gik moko duto ma asechikou.
Beduru gi chir kendo motegno. Kik uluorgi kendo kik gimi chunyu nyosre, nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro dhi kodu; ok enoweu kata jwangʼou.”
Eka Musa noluongo Joshua ma owuoyone e nyim jo-Israel duto niya, “Bed motegno kendo ma jachir, nimar nyaka idhi gi jogi e piny mane Jehova Nyasaye osingore ne kweregi ni nomigi kendo nyaka ipog-gi kaka girkeni margi.
Jehova Nyasaye owuon biro dhi nyimu kendo nobed kodu, ok noweu kata jwangʼou. Kik ubed maluor, bende kik chuny nyosre.”
Kuom mano Musa nondiko chikegi mi omiyogi jodolo, ma yawuot Lawi, mane otingʼo Sandug Muma mar singruok Jehova Nyasaye. Jodong Israel bende nomi chikego.
Eka Musa nomiyogi chik niya, “E giko mar higa mar abiriyo ka mar abiriyo, ma en higa mar weyo gope, ma bende en kinde mar Sawo mar kiche,
ka jo-Israel duto obiro mochungʼ e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kama obiro yiero, nyaka usomnegi chikegi.
Chokuru ji, chwo, mon kod nyithindo kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak e miechu mondo giwinj chikego eka mondo giwinj kendo gipuonjre luoro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo girit wechene duto maber.
Nyithindgi ma ok ongʼeyo chikni nyaka winji mondo opuonjre luoro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ndalo ma udakgo e piny ma ubiro kawo ka usengʼado aora Jordan.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Musa niya, “Ndaloni mar tho koro chiegni. Omiyo biuru gi Joshua mondo uchungʼ e dho Hemb Romo kama abiro miye tich.” Eka Musa kod Joshua nobiro mochungʼ e dho Hemb Romo.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyore ka siro e rumbi, kendo rumbi nochungʼ e dhood Hema.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Musa niya, “Ka isetho to jogi biro dwanyore gi nyiseche mamoko manie piny ma udonjoe, kendo gibiro jwangʼa ma giwe singruok mane atimo kodgi.
Odiechiengno anabed gi mirima kodgi mi ajwangʼ-gi, abiro pandonegi wangʼa kendo enotiekgi. Gik mamono kendo maricho notimrenegi kendo odiechiengno ginipenjre ni, ‘Donge masiragi osebiro nikech Nyasachwa ok nikodwa?’
Odiechiengno anapand wangʼa nikech timbegi mamono ma gisebedo ka gitimo mar lamo nyiseche mamoko.
“Kuom mano koro ndikni wendni kendo ipuonj jo-Israel kaka iwere mondo wendno obednegi janeno e kinda kodgi.
Ka asekelogi e piny ma opongʼ gi chak kod mor kich, ma en piny mane asingora kakwongʼora ne kweregi, kendo ka gisemetho ma gibedo gi mor, to ginidogi ir nyiseche mamoko ma gilamgi, kagiweya kendo ketho singruokna.
Ka masiche mangʼeny kod chandruok otimorenegi, to wendni nobed janeno e kinda kodgi, nimar wachni nyikwagi wigi ok nowilgo. Angʼeyo gima giikore mar timo, kata kane pok akelogi e piny mane asingonegi kakwongʼora.”
Kuom mano Musa nondiko wendno chiengʼno mopuonje jo-Israel.
Jehova Nyasaye ne ochiko Joshua wuod Nun niya, “Bed motegno kendo ma jachir, nimar inikel jo-Israel e piny mane asingoranegi kakwongʼora ni anamigi kendo an awuon nabed kodi.”
Kane Musa osetieko ndiko wechegi e kitabu manie chik koa e chakruok nyaka giko,
chikni ne omiyo jo-Lawi mane otingʼo Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Nowachonegi niya, “Kaw Kitabu mar Chikegi mondo ikete but Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi. Kitabuni nodongʼ kaka janeno e kinda kodu.
Angʼeyo ni un jongʼanyo ma wigi tek. Kaka usebedo ka ungʼanyo ne Jehova Nyasaye kapod angima kendo an kodu, to koro unungʼany marom nade bangʼ kasetho.
Choknauru jodongo mag ogandau to gi jotendu duto, mondo awuo e wechegi e itgi kendo mondo aluong polo gi piny obedna janeno kuomgi.
Nimar angʼeyo ni bangʼ thona an gi adiera ni udhi bedo jo-mibadhi mi unuwe yore mane achikou. E ndalo mabiro masira nomaku nikech unutim richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo unujimb mirimbe gi gik ma lwetu oseloso.”
Kuom mano Musa nosomo weche manie wendni kochake nyaka otieke ka oganda jo-Israel ochokore:
Chikuru itu kawuoyo, yaye polo; to in piny winj weche mawuok e dhoga.
We puonjna ochwe ka koth kendo wechena olor ka thoo, kendo a ngʼidho machwer e lum manyien mana ka koth mangʼeny ne yien matindo.
Abiro lando nying Jehova Nyasaye kendo abiro pako duongʼ mar Nyasachwa!
En Lwanda, tijene ler kendo yorene duto nikare; Nyasaye ma ok tim marach, ngʼat modimbore kendo makare.
Ogandani en tiengʼ makoch kendo mobam, ma timbegi maricho nyiso, ni koro ok gin mag Nyasaye.
Bende ma e yo ma ugoyonego Jehova Nyasaye erokamano, yaye joma ofuwo kendo maonge riekogi? Donge en wuonu mane ochweyou mi olosou?
Paruru ndalo mosekadho, parane weche mag tiengʼ mokadho. Penjuru wuonu, to obiro nyisou, bende penjuru jodongo, to gibiro leronu.
E kinde ma Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo nomiyo ogendini girkeni mag-gi, kendo kane opogo ogendinigo duto kuondegi mag dak, noketonegi tongʼ pinygi kaluwore gi kar romb kwan nyithind Israel.
Nimar joka Jakobo en pok Jehova Nyasaye owuon kendo mwandune.
Noyudo joka Jakobo kama otimo ongoro, ma en kama otwo kendo mojwangʼ. Nochielogi koni gi koni moritogi maber, mana ka ngʼama ochielo tong wangʼe,
mano bende e kaka ongo yiengo ode mondo nyithinde owuogi, koyaro bwombene mondo okawgi kendo otingʼ-gi.
Jehova Nyasaye kende ema ne otelonegi; kaonge nyiseche mag pinje mamoko mane ni kodgi.
Nomiyo giringo e kor gode manie piny kendo nomiyogi chiemo kod olembe manie puothe. Ne opidhogi mor kich mawuok e lwanda kod modhi mogol e lwanda.
Bende negiyudo mo moleny gi chak mag dhok kod mar nyirombe kod diek, kod imbe machwe mowuok Bashan kod mo mar cha ngano. Ne gimadho divai mochiek maber mar mzabibu.
Jeshurun ne odongo mobedo machwe; ne oyudo chiemo morome mi obedo machwe. Wiye nowil gi Nyasache mane ochweye, ma oweyo lwanda ma en warruok mare.
Negimiyo nyiego omake gi nyisechegigo, kendo iye nowangʼ-gi timbegi mamono mag lamo nyiseche manono.
Negitimo misango ne jochiende ma ok gin Nyasaye, ma gin nyiseche mane ok gingʼeyo; nyiseche mana mosieko, kendo nyiseche ma kwereu ne ok oluoro.
Ne ujwangʼo lwanda ma en wuonu, kendo wiu nowil gi Nyasaye mane ochweyou.
Jehova Nyasaye ne oneno ma mi oweyogi nikech iye nowangʼ gi yawuote kod nyige.
Nowacho niya, “Abiro pandonegi wangʼa” mondo aneye kaka gikogi nobedi, nimar gin tiengʼ mobaro, nyithindo ma ok jo-adieri,
negimiyo nyiego omaka gi gima ok Nyasaye kendo gichwanya kod kido milamo manono. Anami nyiego makgi gi joma ok onego kwan ka ji; anami mirima makgi gi piny maonge winjo.
Mach osemoki gi mirimba, en mach mawangʼo nyaka kuonde joma otho e bwo lowo. Obiro ketho piny kod nyakne duto kendo ka omoko mach nyaka e konde mag gode.
Abiro medo masiche mangʼeny kuomu, kendo anaked kodgi gi aserni.
Abiro oro kech malit e diergi, gi kute machamo piny kod masira, gi ondiegi mangemo mag bungu gi thuonde man-gi kwiri mager mamol e lowo.
Kihondko kod kibaji nogogi e miechgi; to liganglana notiek nyithindgi e yore. Yawuowi gi nyiri biro tho, kaachiel gi nyithindo ma pod yom kod jodongo moti.
Ne awacho ni abiro keyogi kendo nying-gi ok nopar e kind ogendini,
to ne alingʼ kane awinjo weche mag jasigu mondo jongʼadne rieko kik ngʼe gima aparo, mi giwach niya, “Lwetwa ema oseloyo, Jehova Nyasaye ok osetimo gimoro.”
Gin oganda maonge rieko, kendo gionge paro mar fwenyo gimoro.
Ka dine bed ni giriek dine gingʼeyo tiend gik matimore ma gifwenyo kaka giko margi biro bet.
Ere kaka ngʼato achiel nyalo riembo ji alufu achiel, kata ji ariyo miyo ji alufu apar ringi, makmana ka ok Jehova Nyasaye ma Lwandagi ema oweyogi mi oketogi e lwet wasikgi.
Nimar lwanda margi ok en Lwandawa mana kaka jasikwa osewacho.
Mzabibu margi wuok e mzabibu ma Sodom kendo wuok e puothe mag Gomora. Olembegi opongʼ gi kwiri kendo olembegi kech.
Divai margi en kwiri mar thuonde, kwiri mager mar thuond rachier.
Donge asekano wachni kendo aume e mirimba?
An ema nachul kuor, abiro chulo. Machiegnini tiendgi biro kier, odiechieng-gi mar masira osekayo machiegni kendo kethruok ochomogi.
Jehova Nyasaye biro ngʼado bura ne joge kendo nobed gi kech ne jotichne koneno, ka tekogi orumo kendo onge manodongʼ obed misumba kata ngʼa man thuolo.
Enowach niya, “Nyisecheugo nikanye, lwanda mane udwaro yudo resruok kuome,
ma gin nyiseche mane ochamo gik machwe mag misengini mi omadho divai mag misengini michiwo? Koro giwuogi mondo gikonyi, kendo gimiyi kar resruok!
“Ngʼeuru malongʼo ni An e Nyasaye kendo onge nyasaye machielo makmana An. An ema anego ji kendo An ema achiwo ngima, bende An ema ahinyo kendo achango. Omiyo onge ngʼama nyalo reso ngʼato e lweta.
Atingʼo bada malo kawacho niya, Akwongʼora ni kapod angima,
kendo ka asepiago liganglana mamil, to anakum jogo mochaya, kendo ka asechako ngʼado bura to anachul kuor ne wasika.
Abiro miyo asere maga tim remo ka liganglana powo dendgi; ma en remb joma onegi kod joma ni e twech, ma gin jotend wasikgi.”
Un pinje, beduru mamor gi jogi, nimar obiro chulo kuor kuom remb jotichne; obiro chulo kuor ne wasike kendo nopwodh pinye kod joge.
Musa nobiro gi Joshua wuod Nun kendo nosomo weche mag wendni ka ji winjo.
Kane Musa osetieko somo weche mag wendni ne jo-Israel,
nowachonegi niya, “Rituru wechegi ma asomonu kawuononi mondo chiengʼ moro upuonj nyithindu mondo oluw adimba wechegi duto manie chike.
Wechegi ok gin weche manono to gin e ngimau. Kurito wechegi to gibiro miyo udag amingʼa e piny mubiro kawo ka usengʼado aora Jordan.”
Odiechiengno Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Musa niya,
“Idh Got mar Nebo ma en achiel kuom gode mag Abarim manie piny Moab, yo Jeriko kendo ine piny Kanaan, ma en piny mabiro miyo jo-Israel kar girkeni margi.
Ewi got malo kuma idhiyoeno ema inithoe, mi iki gi ogandau, mana kaka owadu Harun notho e got Hor mi oike gi kwerene.
Ma notimore nikech un ji ariyogi ne uweya e nyim jo-Israel kar pi mar Meriba Kadesh man e piny ongoro mar Zin kendo nikech ne ok urito nyinga maler e kind jo-Israel.
Kuom mano, inine mana pinyno gi kuma bor ok inidonjie e piny ma amiyo jo-Israel.”
Magi e gweth mane Musa ngʼat Nyasaye owacho ne jo-Israel kapok otho.
Nowachonegi niya, “Jehova Nyasaye nobiro koa Sinai mochopo irgi koa Seir, mi ofwenyore koa e got Paran. Nobiro gi oganda maler kowuok yo milambo e kor gode mage.
En adier ni in ema ihero ji, jomaler duto ginie lweti. Giduto gikulore e nyimi kendo kuomi ema gikawe chike,
ma gin chike mane Musa omiyowa, mondo obed mwandu mag joka Jakobo.
En ema ne ruoth mar Jeshurun, ka jotend oganda ne ochokore, kaachiel gi dhout Israel.”
“Jo-Reuben mondo obed mangima kendo kik githo, to bende kik gibed manok.”
Kuom jo-Juda, Musa nowuoyoe kama: “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, winj ywak jo-Juda; yie mondo iduog-gi ir jogi. Bednegi tekregi ma gisirorego kendo ikonygi kuom wasikgi!”
Kuom jo-Lawi, Musa nowuoyoe kama: “Nimiyo nyikwa Lawi ombulu miluongo ni Thumim gi Urim mondo gingʼego dwaroni nikech gin joma tiyoni gadiera. Ne imiyogi tembe kama iluongo ni Masa kendo sokni mag Meriba mi inwangʼo ni gin jo-adiera.
Nowachone wuon kod min ni, ‘Aonge gi geno kodgi.’ Ne ok oyie gi jowetegi kata yie kod nyithinde owuon, to ne orito wecheni kendo rito singruokni.
Negipuonjo joka Jakobo chikeni kendo jo-Israel bende negipuonjo wecheni. Ne giwangʼo ubani mangʼwe ngʼar kendo negitimoni misengini miwangʼo pep ewi kendo mar misango.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, gwedh riekogi duto kendo ibed mamor gi tij lwetegi. Tiek joma wasikgi ma monjogi; kendo tiekgi chuth ma ok ginichak gibed gi teko.”
Kuom jo-Benjamin, Musa nowuoyoe kama: “Weuru joma oluoro Jehova Nyasaye obed gi kwe, nimar oritogi kinde duto, bende ngʼatno ma Jehova Nyasaye ohero yudo yweyo kuome.”
Kuom joka Josef, Musa nowuoyo kama, Mad Jehova Nyasaye gwedh tich lwetgi kamiyogo koth koa e polo malo, kaachiel gi pi manie bwo lowo,
gi olembe mabeyo duto ma chiengʼ nyalo miyo dongo kaachiel gi gik mabeyo duto mapichni;
kod mich mabeyo mawuok e gode machon, kod kuonde ma omew mag gode manyaka chiengʼ;
kod mich mabeyo duto mag piny to gi gik moko duto manie iye gi ngʼwono mar ngʼat modak e bungu maliel. Gwethgi duto obedi ewi joka Josef, ngʼat mane oyier kuom owetene.
Joka Josef nochal gi rwath makayo, tungene nochal mana ka tung jowi manie thim, ma obiro chuowogo ogendini moriembgi nyaka tunge piny duto. Tungego gin ji alufu apar mag Efraim kod ji alufu apar mag jo-Manase.
Kuom jo-Zebulun, Musa nowuoyoe kama: “Un jo-Zubulun, beduru mamor e seche muwuok kudhi oko, to un bende jo-Isakar beduru ei hembeu.
Gibiro luongo ji e gode kendo kanyo ema negi timie misengini makare; ginitim nyasi gi mwandu mabeyo miyudo e dho nam kod gik mabeyo mopondo e kwoyo.”
Kuom joka Gad, Musa nowuoyo kama: “Ogwedh ngʼat mayaro tongʼ Gad! Gad odak kanyo ka sibuor, koyiecho bat kata wi gima omako.
Negiyiero bath koma ber moloyo mondo obed margi, nikech gin ema nopognegi migap jatelo. Negibiro ir jatend ji, mi gingʼado bura makare mar Jehova Nyasaye, kendo kumo jo-Israel.”
Kuom joka Dan, Musa nowuoyoe kama: “Dan to en nyathi sibuor mawuok Bashan.”
Kuom joka Naftali, Musa nowuoyoe kama: “Dhood Naftali oum gi ngʼwono mangʼeny mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo otingʼo gweth mare, ginikaw piny mantie yo milambo mar nam.”
Kuom joka Asher, Musa nowuoyoe kama: Wuowi mogwedhi e kind yawuowi en Asher, we oyud pak e kind owetene, kendo olwok tiendene gi mo.
Nyororo mar rangeyeni nobed mag chuma kod nyinyo kendo tekoni nomedre ndalo duto mag ngimani.
“Onge ngʼama romo gi Nyasach Jeshurun, mawuotho e kor polo e duongʼne, mondo okonyi.
Nyasaye manyaka chiengʼ e kar konyruoku kendo tekone osiko manyaka chiengʼ. Obiro riembo wasiku duto ka uneno kowacho ni, ‘Tiekgiuru!’
Kuom mano Israel nodag kende gi kwe; bende nyithind Jakobo norit maber, e piny ma cham nitie kod divai manyien, kama thoo moa e polo lwarie gokinyi.
Yaye jo-Israel, un joma ogwedhi! En ngʼatno machal kodu, oganda mores gi Jehova Nyasaye? En e okumbani kendo jaresni kendo en e liganglau mar duongʼ. Wasiku nobed gi luoro e nyimu, kendo unumuk kuondegi motegno mag pondo.”
Eka Musa ne oidho got Nebo koa e pap mar Moab nyaka ewi Pisga ka ongʼado Jeriko. Kanyo ema Jehova Nyasaye nonyise piny Kanaan duto, chakre Gilead nyaka Dan,
piny Naftali kod piny Efraim gi Manase, piny Juda duto nyaka chopi e Nam Mediterania man yo podho chiengʼ;
piny mar Negev kod paw Holo mar Jeriko miluongo ni Dala Maduongʼ mar Othidhe nyaka Zoar.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Ma e piny mane asingora ka akwongʼora ne Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo kane awachonegi ni, ‘Pinyni anami nyikwau.’ Aseyie mondo ine pinyni gi wangʼi, to kata kamano ok iningʼad loka midonjie.”
Kendo Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye notho Moab mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho.
Ne oike Moab, e holo mochomore gi Beth Peor, to nyaka chil kawuono onge ngʼama ongʼeyo kama liende nitie.
Musa ne ja-higni mia achiel kod piero ariyo kane otho, to kata kamano wengene ne ok ojony kata tekone bende ok orumo.
Jo-Israel ne oywago Musa e pap man Moab kuom ndalo piero adek nyaka ndalo mag kuyo kod ywak orumo.
Koro Joshua wuod Nun ne opongʼ gi roho mar rieko nimar Musa ne oseketo lwetene kuome. Omiyo jo-Israel nochiko itgi kowuoyonegi kendo negitimo gik mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiko Musa.
Koa kanyo pok janabi moro owuok e Israel maromo gi Musa ngʼat mane Jehova Nyasaye ongʼeyo wangʼ gi wangʼ.
En ngʼat mane otimo honni kod ranyisi mane Jehova Nyasaye oore mondo otim e piny Misri ne Farao kendo ne jodonge koda ka piny duto.
Nimar onge ngʼat ma osenyiso tekone maduongʼ kata timo timbe makare mane Musa otimo ka jo-Israel duto neno.
Kane Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye osetho, Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua wuod Nun, jakony Musa niya,
Musa jatichna osetho. Omiyo sani, in kod jogi duto, ikreuru mondo ungʼad Aora Jordan e piny makoro achiegni miyo jo-Israel.
Kamoro amora ma tiendu nonyon anamiu, kaka nasingora ni Musa.
Gwengʼi nochakre e kuonde motwo nyaka Lebanon, kendo koa e aora maduongʼ, ma en Yufrate; piny mar jo-Hiti duto; nyaka chop e Nam Mediterania mantiere yo podho chiengʼ.
Onge ngʼama noloyi e ndalo duto mar ngimani. Kaka ne an kod Musa, bende e kaka abiro bedo kodi; ok anaweyi kata jwangʼi.
“Bed motegno kendo gi chir; nikech ibiro telone jogi nyaka e piny mar girkeni mane akwongʼora ni kweregi ni namigi.
Bed motegno kendo gi chir mogundho. Bed motangʼ mondo iluor chike duto mane jatichna Musa omiyi; kik ilokri korachwich kata koracham kiweyo chikegi, mano nomi ibed gi hawi kamoro amora midhiye.
Kik iwe Kitabu mar Chikni oa e dhogi; par wechene matut odiechiengʼ kod otieno, mondo mi ibed motangʼ kitimo gik moko duto mondik e iye. Mano biro miyo ibedo gi hawi e gimoro amora mitimo.
Par kaka asechiki. Bed motegno kendo gi chir. Kik iluor kendo kik chunyi nyosre; nikech an Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi abiro bedo kodi kamoro amora midhiye.”
Omiyo Joshua nochiwo chik ni jotend Israel niya,
“Dhiuru e kambi kendo unyis ji ni, ‘Ikuru gigeu mag lweny. Ndalo adek koa kawuono ubiro kalo aora Jordan gikae mondo udhi kendo ukaw mwandu mar piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kaka maru owuon.’ ”
To joka Reuben, gi joka Gad kod nus mar dhood joka Manase, Joshua nowachonegi niya,
“Paruru chike mane Musa jatich mar Jehova Nyasaye nomiyou, kowacho ni: ‘Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyou kar yweyo kendo osechiwonu pinyni.’
Mondeu, nyithindu kod kweth mag jambu nyalo dak e piny mane Musa omiyou yo ka wuok chiengʼ mar aora Jordan, makmana jou makedo duto, moikore gi gige lweny, nyaka uidh loka kutelo e nyim oweteu ma jo-Israel. Konyuru oweteu,
nyaka Jehova Nyasaye migi yweyo, mana kaka osetimoni, kendo nyaka gin bende gikaw mwandu mar piny ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dhi miyogi. Bangʼ mano, unyalo dok kendo udagie pinyu owuon, mane Musa, jatich Jehova Nyasaye nomiyou bath aora Jordan ma yo wuok chiengʼ.”
Eka negidwoko Joshua niya, “Gimoro amora misechikowa wabiro timo, kendo kamoro amora mi iorowae wabiro dhiyoe.
Mana kaka ne waluoro Musa, bende e kaka wabiro luoroi. Mad Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu bed kodi kaka nobedo gi Musa.
Ngʼato angʼata modagi winjo wachni kendo ok oluoro wecheni bende ok odewo chike mimiyogi, ibiro negi. Bed mana motegno kendo jachir!”
Bangʼe Joshua wuod Nun nooro jonon piny ariyo lingʼ-lingʼ moa Shitim. Nowachonegi niya, “Dhiuru, ungʼi pinyni, to moloyo Jeriko.” Omiyo negidhi ma gidonjo e od dhako moro mandhaga ma nyinge Rahab, mi gidak kanyo.
Ruodh Jeriko nonyisi niya, “Ngʼe ni jo-Israel moko osebiro ka gotienoni mondo onon pinywa.”
Omiyo ruodh Jeriko nooro wach ni Rahab niya, “Gol oko jogo mane obiro iri kendo odonjo e odi, nikech gisebiro mondo gitim nonro ma lingʼ-lingʼ e pinyni duto.”
Kata kamano, Rahab nosekawo ji ariyogi kendo opandogi. Nowacho niya, “En adier, ni jogi nobiro ira, to ne ok angʼeyo ni gia kanye.
E seche mag angʼich welo, e sa michiegoe dhoranga dala maduongʼ, jogi nowuok. Ok angʼeyo yo mane gidhiyoe. Ringuru bangʼ-gi piyo. Unyalo makogi.”
To chutho, noyudo ka osepando jogi ewi tado e bwo othith mane opedhi ewi tado kanyo.
Omiyo oganda mar ruodh pinyno nowuok piyo ka gilawogi e yo mochiko aora Jordan, kendo mana gisano ka jogo mane lawogi nosewuok oko, dhorangajno nolor.
Kane jonon pinygo ne pok odhi nindo, dhakoni noidho modhi ewi tado,
kendo mowachonegi niya, “Angʼeyo ni Jehova Nyasaye osemiyou pinyni kendo mano osemiyo luoro omako ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomwa, omiyo joma odak e pinyni kihondko osemako nikech un.
Wasewinjo kaka Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo pi Nam Makwar oduono kane uwuok e piny Misri, kendo gima ne utimone Sihon kod Og, ruodhi ariyo mag jo-Amor modak yo wuok chiengʼ mar aora Jordan, mane uketho chuth.
Kane wawinjo wachno, to kihondko nomakowa kendo chir duto mane ngʼato angʼata nigo norumo nikech un, kendo nikech Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en Nyasaye manie polo malo kendo e piny mwalo.
“Kuom mano, kwongʼrenauru gi Jehova Nyasaye ni ubiro ngʼwonone jooda, nikech an bende asetimonu ngʼwono. Singrenauru
ni ubiro ngʼwonone wuonwa kod minwa, owetena kod nyiminena, kod jogegi duto, kendo ni ubiro resowa mondo kik watho.”
Jogi nowachone adier niya, “Ngimau en ngimawa! Ka ok uwacho gino ma watimo, to wabiro bedo kodu gi ngʼwono kod ratiro e ndalo ma Jehova Nyasaye nomiwa pinyni.”
Omiyo nolorogi piny gi tol ka giluwo dirisa, nikech ot mane odakie ne ochwogi e kor ohinga mar dala maduongʼ.
E sa onogo nowachonegi niya, “Dhiuru e got mondo joma lawou kik yudu. Ponduru kuno kuom ndalo adek nyaka giduogi; eka udhi nyime giwuodhu.”
Jogi nowachone niya, “Kwongʼ ma isemiyo wakwongʼore godo ok otweyowa,
makmana, chiengʼ mwadonjo e pinyni, to nyaka itwe tol makwarni e dirisa kama ilorowanie, kendo nyaka ikel wuonu gi minu, oweteni gi joodi duto ei odi.
Ka dipo ni ngʼato owuok e odi modhi e yore mag mier, rembe enobed e wiye owuon; ok enobed wachwa. To ne ngʼatno manobed kodi ei ot, rembe nobedi e wiwa ka dipo ni lwedo moro nomule.
Makmana, ka dipo ni iwacho gino ma watimo, to inigonywa kuom kwongʼruok mane iketowa wakwongʼore godo.”
Nowachonegi niya, “Wawinjore! Kendo mondo obed kaka uwachono.” Omiyo ne ogologi mi gidhi. Bangʼe notweyo tol makwar e dirisa.
Kane gisea, negidhi nyaka e gode mi gidak kuno kuom ndalo adek, manyaka joma ne lawogi otieko manyo kuonde duto ka giluwo yo mi gidwogo ma ok giyudogi.
Eka jonon piny ariyogi nolor oa e gode. Negingʼado aora, mi gidhi ir Joshua wuod Nun, kendo giwachone gigo duto mane otimorenigi.
Negiwachone Joshua niya, “Adiera, Jehova Nyasaye osechiwo pinyni duto e lwetwa, bende jogo modak e pinyno kihondko osemako nikech wan.”
Gokinyi mangʼich Joshua kod jo-Israel duto nowuok koa Shitim, mi gidhi nyaka e aora Jordan, negibiro kanyo kapok giidho loka.
Bangʼ ndalo adek jotelo nowuotho e kuonde kambi duto,
ka gimiyogi chike niya, “Ka uneno ka Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, otingʼ gi jodolo, ma jo-Lawi, to nyaka uwuog oko e kuonde muchungʼie mondo uluwe.
Bangʼe ubiro ngʼeyo yo mudhiyoe, nikech ne pok uluwo yorni nyaka nene. Makmana, beduru mochwalore gi sandugno, madirom fut alufu ariyo mia ochiko gi piero abich gadek; kendo kik usud machiegni kode.”
Joshua nokone oganda Israel niya, “Pwodhreuru, nikech kiny Jehova Nyasaye biro timo gigo miwuoro e kindu.”
Joshua nowachone jodolo niya, “Kawuru Sandug Muma mar singruok kendo utel kode e nyim ji.” Omiyo ne gikawe mi gidhi nyimgi.
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua niya, “Kawuono abiro tingʼi malo e wangʼ jo-Israel duto, eka ginyalo ngʼeyo ni An kodi mana kaka ne an gi Musa.
Nyis jodolo matingʼo Sandug Muma mar singruok ni, ‘Ka uchopo e geng pige mag aora Jordan, to dhiuru kendo uchungʼ ei aora.’ ”
Joshua nowachone jo-Israel niya, “Biuru kae kendo uchik itu ne weche Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Kawuononi ubiro neno ranyisi ni Nyasaye mangima nikodu kendo enoriemb e nyimu jo-Kanaan, jo-Hiti, jo-Hivi, jo-Perizi, jo-Girgash, jo-Amor kod jo-Jebus.
Ne, Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto biro dhi nyimu nyaka aora Jordan.
Koro omiyo, yier ji apar gariyo koa e dhout Israel, ngʼato achiel koa e dhoot ka dhoot.
E sa ma jodolo motingʼo Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye ma en Ruoth Nyasaye mar piny duto, nonyon aora Jordan, pige-ge mamol koluwo aora tir nochungʼ kogingore ka pith.”
Omiyo ka ji noke oa e kambi mag-gi mondo gingʼad aora Jordan, jodolo motingʼo Sandug Muma mar singruok notelo nyimgi.
Aora Jordan koro notimo ataro kuonde duto nyaka ndalo mag keyo. Omiyo ka jodolo mane otingʼo Sandug Muma mar singruok nochopo e aora Jordan mi tiendegi omulo geng aora,
pige mane mol koa malo nochungʼ. Nogingore malo kaka pith, e dala miluongo ni Adam man but Zarethan. Pi mane mol kadhi e nam mar Araba (ma tiende ni Nam Chumbi) nochungʼ chuth, omiyo ji nongʼado modhi loka komachielo, momanyore gi Jeriko.
Jodolo mane otingʼo Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye nochungʼ motegno e lowo motwo e dier aora Jordan, nyaka ogendini mag jo-Israel notieko kadho ka giwuotho e lowo motwo.
Kane ogendini duto otieko ngʼado aora Jordan, Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua niya,
“Yier ji apar gariyo e kind jogi, ngʼato achiel koa e dhoot ka dhoot,
kendo ikonegi mondo gikaw kite apar gariyo e dier aora Jordan yo korachwich koma jodolo ochungoe kendo gitingʼ-gi mi giketgi piny kama gidhi dakie otieno ma kawuono.”
Omiyo Joshua noluongo ji apar gariyo mane oseyiero koa kuom jo-Israel, ngʼato achiel koa e dhoot ka dhoot,
kendo nowachonegi niya, “Dhiuru e nyim Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nyaka uchop e dier aora Jordan. Ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka kaw kidi e goke, kaluwore gi kwan mar dhout Israel,
mondo obed kaka ranyisi e dieru. E ndalo mabiro, ka nyithindu openjou ni, ‘Kitegi nyiso angʼo?’
To nyisgiuru kaka pi aora Jordan noduono kane Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye kadho. Kane ongʼad kode aora Jordan, to pige mag aora Jordan noduono. Kitegi mondo obed rapar ni jo-Israel nyaka chiengʼ.”
Omiyo jo-Israel notimo kaka Joshua nochikogi. Negikawo kite apar gariyo koa e dier aora Jordan, kaluwore gi kwan mar dhout Israel, kaka Jehova Nyasaye nokone Joshua; kendo negitingʼogi nyaka kama negibuoroe, kanyo negiketogie piny.
Joshua nochano kite apar gariyogo mane ni e dier aora Jordan kama jodolo mane otingʼo Sandug Muma mar singruok nosechungʼe kendo kitego pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
Koro jodolo mane otingʼo Sandug Muma mar singruok nodongʼ kochungʼ e dier aora Jordan nyaka ji notieko timo gik moko duto mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiko Joshua, mana kaka Musa nochiko Joshua. Ji nokadho mapiyo nono kadhi,
kendo bangʼ kane gisekadho giduto, eka jodolo bende nokadho modhi loka komachielo kotingʼo Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye ka ji duto neno.
Jo-Reuben, jo-Gad kod nus mar dhood Manase nongʼado ka gimanore gi gige lweny e nyim jo-Israel, mana kaka Musa nosechikogi.
Ji madirom alufu piero angʼwen mane moikore ni lweny mondo gikedi, nongʼado loka kocha e nyim Jehova Nyasaye nyaka e pewe mag Jeriko.
E odiechiengʼno, Jehova Nyasaye notingʼo Joshua malo e nyim jo-Israel, mi gimiye luor ndalo duto mag ngimane, mana kaka negimiyo Musa luor.
Bangʼe Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua niya,
“Chik jodolo motingʼo Sandug Muma mondo giwuog oko mar aora Jordan.”
Omiyo Joshua nochiwo chik ni jodolo niya, “Wuoguru oko mar aora Jordan.”
Kendo jodolo nowuok oko e aora kotingʼo Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye. Kadiemo wangʼ kapok giketo tiendegi e lowo motwo, to pige mag aora Jordan noduogo e wangʼe mi ochako mol mogingore kaka chon.
E odiechiengʼ mar apar gariyo mar dwe mokwongo, ji noa e aora Jordan mi ochokore Gilgal e tongʼ ma yo podho chiengʼ mar Jeriko.
Kendo Joshua nochungo kite apar gariyogo Gilgal, ma gin kite mane ogolo e aora Jordan.
Nowachone jo-Israel niya, “E ndalo mabiro ka nyikwau nopenj wuoneu ni, ‘Kitegi nyiso angʼo?’
To nyisgiuru ni, ‘Jo-Israel nongʼado aora Jordan kawuotho e lowo motwo.’
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu notwoyo aora Jordan e nyimu nyaka ukalo loka kocha. Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu notimo ni aora Jordan mana gima notimone Nam Makwar e ndalo mane otwoye e nyimu nyaka ne ungʼado loka kocha.
Notimo kamano mondo ji duto manie piny ongʼe ni lwet Jehova Nyasaye nigi teko kendo mondo omi uluor Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kinde duto.”
Kane ruodhi duto ma jo-Amor modak yo podho chiengʼ mar aora Jordan to gi ruodhi duto mag jo-Kanaan modak e dho nam nowinjo kaka Jehova Nyasaye notwoyo aora Jordan e nyim jo-Israel nyaka negingʼado, chunygi nobwok kendo ne gionge gi chir mar chomo jo-Israel tir.
E sechego Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua niya, “Piag pelni mabith mondo ichak terogo jo-Israel nyangu.”
Omiyo Joshua nopiago pelni mabith mi otero jo-Israel nyangu kama iluongo ni Gibeath Haraloth.
Gima omiyo notimo kamano en nikech ji duto mane oa Misri; ma gin jogo mahikgi noromo kedo e lweny, notho e thim ka gisewuok gia Misri.
Jogo duto mane oa Misri noseter nyangu, makmana joma nonywol e thim ka gisea Misri ema ne pod ok oter nyangu.
Jo-Israel nosewuotho e thim kuom thuolo maromo higni piero angʼwen manyaka ji duto mahikgi oromo kedo e lweny mane giwuokgo Misri nosetho nikech ne ok giseluoro Jehova Nyasaye. Jehova Nyasaye nosekwongʼorenegi ni ok gininee piny mane osingo ne kweregi mondo omigi, piny mopongʼ gi chak kod mor kich.
Omiyo yawuotgi mane onywol bangʼe ka gin e thim ema ne Joshua otero nyangu. Ne pod ok otergi nyangu nikech ne oyudo kapod giwuotho e thim.
Bangʼ kane ogandani duto oseter nyangu, ne gidongʼ e kambi nyaka ne gichango.
Bangʼ mano, Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua niya, “Kawuono asetieko ajara mar jo-Misri kuomu.” Omiyo kanyo iluongo ni Gilgal nyaka chil kawuono.
Godhiambo mar odiechiengʼ mar apar angʼwen mar dweno, jo-Israel nochokore Gilgal e pewe mag Jeriko kendo negitimo nyasi mar Pasaka.
Kinyne bangʼ Pasaka, mana godiechiengno, negichamo bath nyak mar piny kaka, makati ma ok oketie thowi gi chamb abula.
Bangʼ odiechiengʼ achiel kane gisechamo chiemo moa e pinyno, chiemb manna ne ok ochako biro ni jo-Israel nikech e higano negichamo mana nyak mar Kanaan.
Ka koro Joshua ne chiegni chopo Jeriko, nongʼiyo nyime mi oneno ngʼato mochungʼ kotingʼo ligangla e lwete. Joshua nosudo machiegni kode mopenje niya, “In jakorwa koso jasikwa?”
Ngʼatno nodwoke niya, “Ok an maru kata mar wasiku, to asebiro kaka jatend lweny mar Jehova Nyasaye.” Omiyo Joshua nopodho auma e nyime gi luor, mi openje niya, “En wach mane ma ruodha nigodo ni jatichne?”
Jatend lweny mar Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko niya, “Gol wuoche manie tiendi, nikech kama ichungoeni en Kama Ler.” Omiyo Joshua notimo kamano.
Koro Jeriko nolor motegno nikech jo-Israel kendo onge ngʼama ne nyalo wuok oko kata donjo iye.
Bangʼe Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, “Ne, asechiwo Jeriko gi ruodhe e lweti, kaachiel gi jolweny mage.
Lworuru dala maduongʼno dichiel ka un gi giu mag lweny kendo timuru ma kuom ndalo auchiel.
Beduru gi jodolo abiriyo motingʼo turumbete molos gi tunge imbe e nyim Sandug Muma. E odiechiengʼ mar abiriyo, lworuru dala maduongʼno nyadibiriyo, ka jodolo goyo turumbetego.
Ka uwinjogi ka gigoyo turumbetegi matek, to ket ji duto ogo koko matek; bangʼe ohinga mar Jeriko nopodh piny kendo ji duto nodonj e iye.”
Omiyo Joshua wuod Nun noluongo jodolo mowachonegi niya, “Tingʼuru Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo beduru gi jodolo abiriyo kotingʼo turumbete e nyime.”
Eka nochiwo chik ne ji niya, “Dhiuru nyime! Lworuru dala maduongʼ, ka jolweny momanore gi gige lweny otelo e nyim Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye.”
Kane Joshua osewuoyo gi ji, jodolo abiriyo mane otingʼo turumbete abiriyo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye nowuotho ka gigoyo turumbete, kendo Sandug Muma mar Singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye ne luwo bangʼ-gi.
Jolwenygo notelo e nyim jodolo mane goyo turumbete, to moko ne luwo bangʼ Sandug Muma, kendo e kindeno duto turumbete ne ywak.
Makmana Joshua nosiemo ji niya, “Kik uywag ywak mar lweny, kik utingʼ dwondu malo, bende kik uwach wach moro amora nyaka odiechiengʼ ma anakonue mondo ugo koko. Bangʼe eka unukogi!”
Omiyo negikawo Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye ka gilworogo dala maduongʼno dichiel. Bangʼe ji noduogo e kambi margi mi otienono ginindo kanyo.
Joshua nochiewo gokinyi mangʼich kinyne kendo jodolo nokawo Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Jodolo abiriyo mane otingʼo turumbete abiriyo nodhi nyime, ka gipangore e nyim Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo ka gigoyo turumbete. Ji momanore gi gige lweny notelo e nyimgi, to moko ne luwo bangʼ Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye ka turumbete dhi nyime gi ywak.
E odiechiengʼ mar ariyo negilworo dala maduongʼno dichiel bangʼe gidok e kambi kendo negitimo kamano kuom ndalo auchiel.
To chiengʼ mar abiriyo, ne gichiewo kogwen mi gilworo dala maduongʼno nyadibiriyo e yo machalre gi mamoko ka. Chiengʼno kende ema negilworo dala maduongʼno nyadibiriyo.
E sa mane gilwore mar abiriyo ka jodolo ne pod goyo turumbete matek, Joshua nochiko ji kawacho niya, “Koguru matek, nimar Jehova Nyasaye osemiyou dala maduongʼni!
Dala maduongʼni duto, to gi gik moko duto manie iye nyaka wene Jehova Nyasaye. Makmana Rahab, mochot, to gi jogo duto manie ode ema nongʼwon-ne, nikech nopando joma ne waoro mane obiro nono piny.
To beduru mabor gi gigo mowene Jehova Nyasaye, mondo kik ukel kethruok ne un uwuon kuom gimoro amora kuomgi. Ka ok kamano to unumi kambi mar jo-Israel bed mar kethruok kendo ukel chandruok kuome.
Fedha gi dhahabu duto, kod gigo molos gi mula kod molos gi nyinyo owal ni Jehova Nyasaye kendo nyaka tergi kar keno mare.”
Kane ogo turumbete, to ji ne goyo koko matek, kendo ka turumbete noywak, mi ji nogoyo koko matek, to ohinga mar Jeriko nopodho, omiyo ngʼato ka ngʼato nodonjo e dala maduongʼno mi gikawe.
Negiwalo dala maduongʼno ni Jehova Nyasaye ma giketho gimoro amora kendo ginego gi ligangla ngʼato angʼata madichwo kata madhako, jomatindo kata joma oti, dhok gi rombe kod punde.
Joshua nowachone jonon piny ariyogo niya, “Dhiuru e od Rahab kendo ukele kaachiel gi joodgi duto, kaluwore gi singruok mane uketo kode.”
Omiyo rawere mane odhi nono pinyno nodhi Jeriko e od Rahab mi ogole kaachiel gi wuon-gi, min-gi, owetene kod joodgi duto. Negigolo anywolane duto oko mi giketogi oko mar kambi jo-Israel.
Bangʼe ne giwangʼo dala maduongʼno duto, to gi gimoro amora manie iye, makmana fedha gi dhahabu, gi gik molos gi mula kod molos gi nyinyo noketi e kar keno mar od Jehova Nyasaye.
Kamano Joshua noreso Rahab, dhako ma ochot, kaachiel gi anywolane nikech en ema nopando jonon piny mane Joshua ooro Jeriko kendo Rahab nodak e dier jo-Israel nyaka chil kawuono.
E sechego Joshua nolando kwongʼ makende niya, “Kwongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye nobed kuom ngʼat manitem gero dala maduongʼ mar Jeriko kendo kama: “Koketo mise mare, to wuode makayo notho, to kochungo dhorangeyege; to wuode mogik notho.”
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye ne nigi Joshua kendo humbe nolandore e pinyno duto.
Jo-Israel ne ok obedo jo-ratiro kaluwore gi gik mane owal ni Jehova Nyasaye. Ngʼat mane nyinge Akan wuod Karmi, ma wuod Zabdi, ma wuod Zera, mar dhood Juda nokawo moko kuom gik mane owalgi. Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye nobedo gi mirima gi jo-Israel.
Kane Joshua ooro ji koa Jeriko mondo odhi Ai, mantiere but Beth Aven yo podho chiengʼ mar Bethel nokonegi niya, “Dhiuru kendo utim nonro ma lingʼ-lingʼ mar gwengʼno.” Omiyo jogo nodhi mi ginono Ai lingʼ-lingʼ.
Kane gidwogo ir Joshua, negiwachone niya, “Ji duto ok onego dhi kedo gi jo-Ai. To or ji alufu ariyo kata adek mondo odhi okawe kendo kik oket ji obed mool nikech nitiere mana ji manok kuno.”
Omiyo ji madirom alufu adek ema nodhi, to jo-Ai noriembogi,
mi ji madirom piero adek gauchiel nonegi. Ne giriembo jo-Israel koa e dhoranga dala maduongʼ nyaka kama nitiere kite mopa kendo neginegogi e holo. Mano nomiyo kihondko nogoyogi ma gipodho.
Bangʼe Joshua noyiecho lepe mi opodho auma e nyim Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye, moriyo kanyo nyaka odhiambo. Jodong Israel bende notimo kamano kendo ne giolo buru e wigi.
Joshua nowacho niya, “Yaye, Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ere gima omiyo isekelo jogi loka mar aora Jordan mana ni mondo ichiwgi e lwet jo-Amor mondo itiekgi? Mad ne gik mane wan-go loka cha romwa kendo wasik kuno!
Yaye, Ruoth Nyasaye, en angʼo ma dwawachi ka jo-Israel oseriemb gi wasikgi kama?
Jo-Kanaan gi jopinyni mamoko biro winjo kuom wachni kendo gibiro monjowa mi gitiekwa e pinyni. Angʼo ma nitim mondo ires nyingi maduongʼni?”
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, “Chungʼ malo! Angʼo ma ikulone wiyi piny ka?
Jo-Israel osetimo richo, kendo giseketho singruokna mane achikogi mondo giriti. Gisekawo bath gik moko mane owal, gisekwalo, giseriambo, kendo gisekawo gigo mokwer ma giriwo gi gig-gi giwegi.
Mano emomiyo jo-Israel ok nyal loyo wasikgi; giloko ngʼegi kendo giringo nikech oseketgi gir kethruok. Ok anabed kodu makmana ka uketho gigo manie dieru mowal ni kethruok.
“Aa malo mondo inyis jo-Israel opwodhre kinyisogi ni, ‘Pwodhreuru kuikoru ni odiechiengʼ ma kiny nikech Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel wacho kama: Gik mowal ne Jehova Nyasaye nitie e dieru, yaye Israel, omiyo kapod ok ugolo gigo kuomu, to ok unulo wasiku.
“ ‘Wuoguru gokinyi dhoot ka dhoot. Dhoot ma Jehova Nyasaye noyier biro biro e nyime anywola ka anywola, to anywola ma Jehova Nyasaye noyier biro biro e nyime dala ka dala, kendo dala ma Jehova Nyasaye noyier biro biro e nyime ngʼato ka ngʼato.
Ngʼatno mani maki gi gigo mowal notieki gi mach, kaachiel gi gige duto, nikech oseketho singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo osetimo gima mono e piny Israel!’ ”
Kinyne gokinyi mangʼich Joshua noluongo jo-Israel gi dhoutgi, kendo Juda noyier.
Anywola mar Juda nobiro, mi oyier joka Zera. Joka Zera nobiro ot ka ot mi od Zabdi ema noyier.
Kane ogolo ngʼato ka ngʼato kuom joka Zabdi, to Akan wuod Karmi, ma wuod Zimri, ma wuod Zera mar dhood Juda ema noyier.
Bangʼ mano, Joshua nowachone Akan niya, “Wuoda, mi Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel duongʼ gi pak. Nyisa gima isetimo kendo kik ipanda.”
Akan nodwoke niya, “En adier! Asetimone Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel richo. Ma e gima asetimo:
Kane aneno gik miketho kaka njora maber moa Babulon, gi fedha ma pekne dirom kilo ariyo, to gi dhahabu ma pekne oromo nus kilo, to chunya nogombogi mi akawogi kendo apandogi e bwo lowo ei hemba ka fedha ema oket piny mogik.”
Omiyo Joshua nooro joote mi giringo e hema kendo ne giyudogi mana kaka gin, kopandgi e hembe, ka fedha ema oket piny mogik.
Negigolo gigo koa e hema, mi gikelogi ni Joshua kod jo-Israel duto kendo gipedhogi oko e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Bangʼ mano Joshua, kaachiel gi jo-Israel duto nokawo Akan ma nyakwar Zera, gi fedha, gi njora, gi dhahabu, yawuote kod nyige, dhok, punde kod rombe, hembe kod gigo duto ma en godo mi giterogi nyaka e holo mar Akor.
Joshua nowacho niya, “Angʼo momiyo isekelo masira machal kama kuomwa? In bende Jehova Nyasaye biro keloni masira.” Bangʼe jo-Israel duto nochielo Akan kod joge gi kite, kendo ne giwangʼe kaachiel gi joge.
Bangʼ mano ne gidhuro kite kuom Akan, ma mano pod ni kamano nyaka chil kawuono. Eka mirima mar Jehova Nyasaye norumo. Kuom mano kanyo pod iluongo ni Holo mar Akor nyaka chil kawuono.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua niya, “Kik iluor, kendo kik chunyi nyosre. Kaw jolweny duto mondo udhi umonj Ai, nimar asechiwo e lwetu ruodh Ai, joge, dalane maduongʼ kod pinye.
Timneuru Ai kod ruodhe mana kaka ne utimone Jeriko kod ruodhe, to wangʼni oyienu kawo gigo mane giyudo e yor mecho kaachiel gi jamni. Monjuru dala maduongʼno gi yo katoke.”
Omiyo Joshua kod jolweny duto nowuok mondo gimonj Ai. Noyiero joge alufu piero adek molony e lweny mi oorogi oko gotieno komiyogi chik niya,
“Winjuru. Nyaka umonj dala maduongʼno gi yo katoke. Kik udhi mabor ahinya. Un duto nyaka uikru.
An kod jogo duto man koda, to biro dhi nyime e dala maduongʼ, to ka jogo obiro mondo omonjwa kaka negitimo motelocha, to wabiro ringo waa irgi.
Gibiro luwo bangʼwa nyaka wawuondgi mi giwuog oko mar dala maduongʼ, mi giniwach e chunygi ni, ‘Ne, giringowa mana kaka ne giringowa motelo.’ Omiyo seche mwaringogino
nyaka uwuog kuma upondoe kendo ukaw dala maduongʼno. Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro ketogi e lwetu.
Ka usekawo dala maduongʼno, to uwangʼe gi mach. Timuru gima Jehova Nyasaye osechiko kendo nyaka une ni utimo gik ma achikou.”
Eka Joshua noorogi ma gidhi gipondo e kind Bethel gi Ai, ma en yo podho chiengʼ mar Ai, kendo otienono nosiko gi ji kanyo.
Kinyne gokinyi mangʼich Joshua nochoko jolweny mage duto ka en kaachiel gi jodong Israel wuotho e nyimgi kadhi Ai.
Jolweny duto mane ni kode ne wuotho ka gichomo dala maduongʼ nyaka negichopo machiegni kode. Negigero kambigi yo nyandwat mar Ai, ka holo ni e kindgi kod dala maduongʼ.
Joshua nokawo ji madirom alufu abich mooro yo podho chiengʼ mar Ai mondo opond e kind Bethel kod dala maduongʼno.
Kuom mano thoth jolweny nobworo yo nyandwat mar dala maduongʼno, to joma nopondo ne ni yo podho chiengʼ. Otienono Joshua to nonindo e holo.
Kane ruodh Ai oneno ma, en kod ji duto mar dala maduongʼ nowuok oko mapiyo nono gokinyi mangʼich mondo girom kod jo-Israel e lweny kama omanyore gi Araba. To ne ok ongʼeyo ni kar pondo noseketi e ngʼe dala maduongʼno.
Joshua kod jo-Israel duto nowuondore ni ologi, mi giringo ka gichiko thim.
Chwo duto ma Ai nowuok mondo olaw Joshua gi joge, to kane gilawogi kamano, to ne gichwalore mabor gi dala maduongʼno.
Onge ngʼama nodongʼ Ai kata Bethel mane ok olawo jo-Israel. Ne giweyo dala maduongʼ nono ka gilawo jo-Israel.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua niya, “Siem yo Ai gi tongʼ mitingʼo e lwetino, nikech e lweti abiro chiwoe dala maduongʼno.” Omiyo Joshua nosiemo tongʼe kochiko Ai.
E seche mane otimo ma, jogo mane opondo noa malo piyo ka giringo gidonjo e dala maduongʼ. Bangʼ kane gisekawe, ne giwangʼe mana gisano.
Jo-Ai nongʼiyo chien ma gineno ka iro dhwolore e dala maduongʼ kochiko polo, makmana ne gionge gi thuolo mar pondo e yo moro amora nikech jo-Israel mane osebedo kawuondore ni ringo kochiko thim nolokore kod jogo mane lawogi.
Kane Joshua kod jo-Israel noneno ka joma nopondo osekawo dala maduongʼ kendo iro bende ne dhwolore kanyo, negilokore mi gimonjo jo-Ai.
Jogo mane opondo bende nowuok oko mar dala maduongʼ moromo kodgi kendo omonjogi, omiyo nogengʼnegi e diere ka jo-Israel ni koni gi koni. Jo-Israel notiekogi pep maonge ngʼama notony kata achiel.
Ruodh Ai kende ema negimako kangima kendo negitere ir Joshua.
Kane jo-Israel ne osetieko nego jo-Ai duto mane ni e pap kod mane ni e thim kama ne giselawogie, kendo kane gisenegogi duto gi ligangla, jo-Israel nodok Ai mi ginego jogo mane odongʼ kuno.
Jo-Ai duto machwo kod mamon alufu apar gariyo notho chiengʼno.
Joshua ne ok owe siemo Ai gi tongʼ mane otingʼo e lwete nyaka Israel notieko ji duto mane odak Ai.
Jo-Israel to nokawo jamni gi mwandu mane giyako mar dala maduongʼno mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko Joshua.
Omiyo Joshua nowangʼo Ai mi okete obedo pith mongingore mar kethruok kendo pod en kamano nyaka chil kawuono.
Ne onego ruodh Ai mi oliere gi tol e yath kama noriyoe nyaka odhiambo. Kane ochopo odhiambo, Joshua nogolo chik mondo ogol ringre oko e yath kendo lware piny e dhoranga dala maduongʼ. Nodhur kuome kite mangʼeny ma pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
Eka Joshua nogero kendo mar misango e got Ebal ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel,
mana kaka Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko jo-Israel. Nogere kaluwore gi gima nondiki e kitap Chik mar Musa niya, Kendo mar misango moger gi kite ma ok opa, gi gir nyinyo. Ewi kendono ema negichiwone Jehova Nyasaye misango miwangʼo pep kod misango mar lalruok.
Joshua nondiko chik Musa e kitego e nyim jo-Israel.
Jo-Israel duto, jopinje mamoko kod jopinyno machalre, ka gin gi jodong-gi, gi jotendgi kod jongʼad bura nochungʼ e bath Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye koni gi koni, ka gimanyore gi jo-Lawi ma gin jodolo. Nus mar jo-Israel nochungʼ kochomo got Gerizim, to nus mar jo-Israel mamoko nochungʼ kochomo got Ebal mana kaka Musa ma jatich Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko chon kane ochiwo nonro mar gwedho jo-Israel.
Bangʼ mano, Joshua nosomo weche mag chik ma gin, gweth gi kwongʼ mana kaka ondikgi e Kitap Chik mar Musa.
Onge chik Musa mane Joshua oweyo ma ok osomo ni kanyakla mar Israel duto, kaachiel gi mon, gi nyithindo, kod jopinje mamoko mane odak e diergi.
Ruodhi duto mane odak yo podho chiengʼ mar aora Jordan nowinjo humb wechego; mane gin ruodhi moa e tiend gode mag pinyno, gi ruodhi moa yo podho chiengʼ mar gode gi mago moa e wedhe mag Nam Mediterania kaachiel gi ruodhi moa Lebanon (mane gin ruodhi mag jo-Hiti, jo-Amor, jo-Kanaan, jo-Perizi, jo-Hivi kod mago mag jo-Jebus);
ruodhigo noriwore giduto mondo giked gi Joshua kod jo-Israel.
Kata kamano, kane jo-Gibeon owinjo gima Joshua notimone Jeriko kod Ai,
negiparo mondo giwuonde. Negidhi kaka jogo man-gi punde motingʼo ogunde moti gi piende divai moti kendo obaw.
Jogi norwako wuoch moyiech kod lewni moti. Makati mane gin-go duto nokethore.
Eka negidhi ir Joshua e kambi man Gilgal mi giwachone Joshua kod jo-Israel niya, “Wawuok e piny mabor, omiyo yie watim kodu winjruok.”
Jo-Israel nowacho ni jo-Hivi niya, “To ka dipo ni udak kodwa machiegni, ere kaka dwa los kodu winjruok?”
Negiwachone Joshua niya, “Wan jotichu.” To Joshua nopenjogi niya, “Un ngʼa gini to bende ua kanye?”
Negidwoko niya, “Jotichni oa e piny mabor ahinya nikech humb Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi. Wasewinjo humb gik mane otimo Misri,
kendo gigo duto mane otimone ruodhi ariyo mag jo-Amor man yo wuok chiengʼ mar aora Jordan, ma gin Sihon ruodh Heshbon kod Og ruodh Bashan, mane odak Ashtaroth.
Omiyo jodongwa kod ji duto modak e pinywa nowachonwa kama, ‘Kawuru gik mudhiyo godo e wuoth, dhiuru kendo urom kodgi ma uwachnegi niya, “Wan jotiju, losuru kodwa winjruok.” ’
Neuru makati mwatingʼogi, ne giliet ka wachako wuoth, to koro sani gikethore.
Piend divai mane wapongʼo bende ne nyien, to koro neye kaka giyiech. Lepwa kod wuochewa bende oseti nikech wuoth marabora ahinya.”
Jotelo moko mag jo-Israel nobilo chiemb jogo ka ok gipenjo Jehova Nyasaye wach.
Omiyo Joshua noketo winjruok mar kwe kodgi mondo oyienegi gidag kodgi, kendo jotelo ne opwodho ma ka gikwongʼore.
Ndalo adek bangʼ kane giseloso winjruok gi jo-Gibeon, jo-Israel nowinjo ni jogo gin mana joma odak kodgi machiegni.
Omiyo jo-Israel nowuok, to odiechiengʼ mar adek negichopo e miechgi madongo kaka: Gibeon, Kefira, Beeroth, kod Kiriath Jearim.
Jo-Israel ne ok omonjogi, nikech jotend kambi nosesingore ka kwongʼore kodgi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach jo-Israel. Kata kamano, ji duto nongʼur gi jotendgi,
to jotelogo duto nowacho niya, “Wasemiyogi singruok marwa e nying Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, omiyo koro ok wanyal mulogi.
Ma e gima wabiro timonegi: ‘Wabiro wegi gidagi mondo kik mirima bi kuomwa nikech waketho kwongʼruok mane wasingonegi.’ ”
Negidhi nyime kagiwacho niya, “Wegi gidagi, mondo gibednwa jobar yien gi joumb pi ni jowa duto.” Omiyo jotelo norito singruok margi.
Eka Joshua noluongo jo-Gibeon kendo owachonegi niya, “Angʼo momiyo ne uwuondowa ka uwacho ni, ‘Wadak mochwalore kodu,’ to kuom adier udak mana butwa?
Un joma okwongʼ! Ok unuwe tiyonwa kaka jobar yien gi joumb pi e od Nyasacha.”
Negidwoko Joshua niya, “Jotichni notimo kamano nikech Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi nochiko Musa jatichne mondo omiu pinyni duto kendo uneg ji duto modakie. Omiyo ne waluor nikech un, kendo mano ema nomiyo watimo kamano.
Koro to wan e lweti. Timnwauru gimoro amora muneno ni ber kendo longʼonu.”
Omiyo Joshua nokonyogi kuom jo-Israel ma ok ginegogi.
E odiechiengʼno noketo jo-Gibeon obedo jobar yien gi joumb pi ni jo-Israel duto kendo ni tich kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye kama Jehova Nyasaye biro yiero. Kendo mano e gima gin nyaka chil kawuono.
Eka Adoni-Zedek ruodh Jerusalem nowinjo ni Joshua osekawo Ai mi okethe chuth kendo onego ruodhe mana kaka nosetimone Jeriko kendo ni jo-Gibeon osetimo winjruok mar kwe gi jo-Israel mi gidak butgi.
En gi joge ne gibuok ahinya kuom wachni nikech Gibeon ne en dala maduongʼ mongirore, mana kaka achiel kuom mier madongo maka ruoth. Ne oduongʼ moloyo Ai, kendo joge duto ne gin jokedo mabeyo.
Omiyo Adoni-Zedek ruodh Jerusalem nokwayo Hoham, ruodh Hebron, Piram ruodh Jarmuth, Jafia ruodh Lakish kod Debir ruodh Eglon niya,
“Biuru mondo ukonya monjo Gibeon nikech oseloso kwe kod Joshua gi jo-Israel.”
Eka ruodhi abich mar jo-Amor; ruodhi ma Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lakish to gi Eglon noriwo jolwenjgi kaachiel. Negidhi kod jolweny mag-gi mi gimonjo Gibeon kendo gikedo kodgi.
Jo-Gibeon nooro wach ni Joshua e kambi man Gilgal niya, “Kik ijwangʼ jotichgi. Bi irwa piyo mondo ireswa! Konywa nikech ruodhi jo-Amor duto moa e piny manie wi got oseriwore mondo omonjwa.”
Omiyo Joshua kaachiel gi jolweny mage mathuondi nowuok Gilgal mapiyo nono mondo odhi oresgi.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua niya, “Kik iluorgi; asechiwogi e lwetu. Onge kata ngʼata achiel kuomgi mabiro sirou.”
Kane gisewuotho otieno duto ka gia Gilgal, Joshua nomonjogi apoya.
Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo gichalo joma orundore e nyim jo-Israel, mine giloyogi gi loch maduongʼ e Gibeon. Jo-Israel nolawogi ka giluwo yo madhi Beth Horon mi ginegogi ma gichopo kodgi nyaka Azeka kod Makeda.
E kinde mane giringo e nyim jo-Israel e yo moa Beth Horon kadhi Azeka, Jehova Nyasaye nolwaro pe madongo kuomgi koa e polo kendo thothgi nomedo tho nikech peno nonego ji mangʼeny moloyo mago mane jo-Israel onego gi ligangla.
E odiechiengʼ mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiwo jo-Amor ni jo-Israel, Joshua nowachone Jehova Nyasaye e nyim jo-Israel niya, “Yaye wangʼ chiengʼ, chungʼ kar tiendi ewi Gibeon, to in dwe, chungʼ mana ewi holo mar Aijalon.”
Omiyo wangʼ chiengʼ nochungʼ kar tiende, to dwe bende ne ok osudo, nyaka oganda mar jo-Israel nochulo kuor kuom wasikgi, mana kaka nondike e Kitap Jashar. Wangʼ chiengʼ nosiko kochungʼ e polo kuom thuolo madirom odiechiengʼ achiel.
Onge odiechiengʼ machal gi ma manosebetie ma Jehova Nyasaye nowinje kwayo mar dhano. Adier, adier Jehova Nyasaye ne kedo ni jo-Israel!
Bangʼe Joshua noduogo gi jo-Israel duto e kambi man Gilgal.
Koro ruodhi abichgo noringo kendo gipondo e rogo mantiere Makeda.
Kane owach ne Joshua ni ruodhi abichgo nopondo e rogo mar Makeda,
nowacho niya, “Dinuru dho rogono gi kidi maduongʼ kendo uket jomoko kanyo mondo orite.
Un to kik uchungʼ kanyo, lawuru wasiku, monjgiuru kua gichien kendo kik uwegi gichop e miechgi madongo, nikech Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechiwogi e lwetu.”
Omiyo Joshua kod jo-Israel notiekogi chuth makmana joma tin ema nodongʼ e miechgi madongo mochiel kod ohinga.
