Jolweny duto noduogo ir Joshua e kambi man Makeda maonge hinyruok moro, kendo onge ngʼama nowuoyo marach kuom jo-Israel.
Joshua nowacho niya, “Yawuru dho rogono kendo ugol ruodhi abichgo oko mi ukelgi ira.”
Omiyo negigolo ruodhi abichgo oko mi gikelogi, ne gin ruodh Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lakish kod Eglon.
Kane gisekelo ruodhigi ne Joshua, noluongo jo-Israel duto kendo owachone jotend lweny mane obiro kode niya, “Biuru ka kendo unyon ngʼut ruodhigi.” Omiyo negibiro mi ginyono ngʼutgi piny.
Joshua nowachonegi niya, “Kik uluor, kendo kik chunyu nyosre. Beduru motegno kendo gi chir. Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye biro timo ne wasigu duto ma ubiro kedogo.”
Bangʼe Joshua nomonjogi mi onego ruodhigo kendo olierogi e yien abich. Nowegi ka giliero e yiendego nyaka odhiambo.
Kane chiengʼ osepodho, Joshua nogolo chik mondo olor ringregi e yiende mane oliergie kendo odirgi e rogo kama negisepondoe. Negidino dho rogono gi kite madongo, ma pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
E odiechiengno Joshua nokawo Makeda. Notieko dala maduongʼno kod ruodhe gi ligangla kendo otieko ngʼato angʼata mane ni e iye. Onge ngʼama notony kanyo. Notimone ruodh Makeda mana kaka notimone ruodh Jeriko.
Eka Joshua kod jo-Israel duto mane ni kode nodhi Libna koa Makeda mi omonje.
Jehova Nyasaye nochiwo dala maduongʼni bende kod ruodhe e lwet jo-Israel. Dala maduongʼni to gi jogo duto modak e iye Joshua nonego gi ligangla. Onge ngʼama notony kanyo. Notimone ruodhgi mana kaka notimone ruodh Jeriko.
Eka Joshua kod jo-Israel duto mane ni kode nodhi Lakish koa Libna; mi gimonje.
Jehova Nyasaye nochiwo Lakish ne jo-Israel, to Joshua to ne okawe e odiechiengʼ mar ariyo. Dala maduongʼno kod ji duto modak kanyo nonego gi ligangla, mana kaka ne otimone Libna.
Kuom mano, Horam ruodh Gezer nobiro mondo okony Lakish, to Joshua noloye kaachiel gi jolweny mage maonge ngʼama notony.
Eka Joshua gi jo-Israel mane ni kode nodhi Eglon koa Lakish mi gimonje.
Ne gikawe odiechiengʼ nogono mi ginego ji duto kendo giketho gimoro amora mangima manie iye, mana kaka negisetimone Lakish.
Eka Joshua gi jo-Israel mane ni kode nodhi Hebron koa Eglon, mi gimonje.
Negikawo dala maduongʼno mi ginego ruodhe kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno kaachiel gi mago mane nitie e mier matindo mokiewo kode. Onge ngʼama notony, mana kaka ne otimone Eglon.
Eka Joshua gi jo-Israel mane ni kode noduogo mi omonjo Debir.
Negikawo dala maduongʼno, ruodhe kod mier matindo mokiewo kode mi ginegogi. Ji duto mane odak kanyo negitieko chuth kendo onge joma notony. Negitimone Debir kod ruodhe mana kaka negitimone Libna gi ruodhe, to gi Hebron.
Omiyo Joshua nokawo gwengʼno duto kaachiel gi piny manie got ma en Negev, e tiend gode ma yo podho chiengʼ, to gi kuonde mag pewe kaachiel gi ruodhigi duto. Onge joma notony. Notieko jogo duto mangima, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, nosechiko.
Joshua nokawogi koa Kadesh Barnea nyaka Gaza kendo koa e gwenge duto ma Goshen nyaka Gibeon.
Joshua nomako ruodhigo duto kaachiel gi pinjegi e lweny achielno nimar Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, nokedo ni joge.
Bangʼe Joshua noduogo gi jo-Israel duto e kambi man Gilgal.
Kane Jabin ruodh Hazor owinjo ma, nooro wach ne Jobab ma ruodh Madon, kod ruodhi mag Shimron gi Akshaf,
kod ruodhi mae piny gode ma yo nyandwat e Araba ma milambo mar Kinereth, e tiend gode ma yo podho chiengʼ kod e Nafoth Dor mantiere yo podho chiengʼ.
Nooro wach bende ni jo-Kanaan man yo wuok chiengʼ kod podho chiengʼ, kaachiel gi jo-Amor, jo-Hiti, jo-Perizi, kod jo-Jebus mantiere e piny gode; kendo ni jo-Hivi modak e tiend got Hermon e gwenge mag Mizpa.
Ne giwuok gi jolweny mangʼeny ka kuoyo manie dho nam ka gin-gi farese kod geche lweny mangʼeny.
Ruodhigi duto noriwo tekogi mi gichokore kanyakla e Sokni mag Merom, mondo giked gi jo-Israel.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua niya, “Kik uluorgi, nikech kiny sa machalo kama abiro chiwogi duto ne jo-Israel mi gineg-gi. Nyaka ungʼad odond tiend faresegi kendo uwangʼ gechegi.”
Omiyo Joshua gi jolwenje duto nobiro momonjogi apoya e Sokni mag Merom mi gikedo kodgi,
kendo Jehova Nyasaye nochiwogi e lwet jo-Israel. Negiloyogi mi gilawogi nyaka dala maduongʼ mar Sidon, nyaka Misrefoth Maim kendo nyaka Holo mar Mizpa ma yo wuok chiengʼ, maonge joma notony.
Joshua notimonigi kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko. Nongʼado odond tiend farese kendo nowangʼo gechegi.
E sechego Joshua noduogo mi okawo Hazor kendo onego ruodhe kod ligangla. Hazor ema ne jatend pinjegi duto.
Ji duto mane ni e dala maduongʼno noneg gi ligangla. Negitiekogi pep maonge gima yweyo mane odongʼ, Hazor bende ne giwangʼo.
Joshua nokawo mier madongo gi ruodhigi mi ginegogi gi ligangla. Notiekogi pep, mana kaka Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko.
Kata kamano, jo-Israel ne ok owangʼo dala maduongʼ moro amora moger e gode mag-gi matindo makmana Hazor ma Joshua nowangʼo.
Jo-Israel noyako gik moko duto kod kweth jamni mag mier madongogi, kendo neginego ji duto maonge ngʼama notony kata achiel.
Kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiwo chik ni jatichne Musa, omiyo Musa bende nochiwo chik ne Joshua, mi Joshua notimo mano. Onge gima noweyo ma ok otimo kuom gigo duto mane Jehova Nyasaye ochiko Musa.
Omiyo Joshua nokawo pinyni duto; kaka, piny manie got, piny Negev duto, gwenge duto mag Goshen, tiend gode ma yo podho chiengʼ, Araba kod gode duto mag Israel kaachiel gi pewe mag
Got Halak, machakore yo Seir, nyaka Baal Gad manie Holo mar Lebanon manie Got Hermon. Nomako ruodhigi duto mi onegogi.
Joshua nokedo gi ruodhigi duto kuom ndalo mangʼeny.
Onge dala maduongʼ moro amora mane otimo winjruok gi jo-Israel makmana jo-Hivi modak Gibeon. Joma odongʼ duto negikedogo.
Jehova Nyasaye owuon ema ne omiyo chunygi obedo matek mondo gitug lweny gi jo-Israel kendo mondo jo-Israel otiekgi chuth maonge ngʼwono mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko Musa.
E ndalono mane Joshua odhi kendo otieko jo-Anak moa e piny gode, ema bende notieke joma odak, Hebron, Debir kod Anab, mago moa e pinje gode mag Juda, to gi moa e pinje gode mag Israel. Joshua notiekogi duto kod miechgi.
Onge jo-Anak mane odongʼ e piny jo-Israel; makmana joma nodongʼ Gaza, Gath kod Ashdod.
Omiyo Joshua nokawo pinyno duto mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko Musa, mi nochiwe kaka girkeni ni jo-Israel kaluwore gi migepe mag dhoutegi. Bangʼe pinyni nobedo gi kwe.
Magi e ruodhi mag pinje mane jo-Israel oloyo kendo mane gikawo gwengegi ma yo wuok chiengʼ mar aora Jordan, kochakore e holo mar Arnon nyaka e Got Hermon, moriwo nyaka yo wuok chiengʼ mar Araba.
Negiloyo Sihon ma ruodh jo-Amor manodak Heshbon. Pinye nochakore Aroer man but holo mar Arnon koluwo holono nyaka e Aora Jabok, manie tongʼ mar jo-Amon. Ma noriwo nyaka nus mar Gilead.
Bende norito yo wuok chiengʼ mar Araba kochakore e Nam mar Kinereth nyaka e Nam mar Araba (tiende ni, Nam Chumbi), to nyaka Beth Jeshimoth, bangʼe nyaka yo milambo e tiend gode mag Pisga.
Kendo gwenge mag Og ruodh Bashan, achiel kuom mago mogik mag jo-Refai, ma lochne ne nitie Ashtaroth kod Edrei.
Norito Got Hermon, Saleka, Bashan duto, nyaka e tongʼ mar jo-Geshur gi Maaka, kendo gi nus mar Gilead nyaka e tongʼ-gi gi Sihon, ruodh Heshbon.
Musa, jatich Jehova Nyasaye kod jo-Israel noloyogi kendo Musa ma jatich Jehova Nyasaye nochiwo pinygino ne jo-Reuben, jo-Gad gi nus mar dhood Manase mondo obed kaka girkeni mag-gi.
Magi e ruodhi mag pinyno mane Joshua kod jo-Israel oloyo yo podho chiengʼ mar aora Jordan, kochakore Baal Gad mantie e Holo mar Lebanon nyaka Got Halak mochakore yo Seir. Pinjegi duto Joshua nochiwo kaka girkeni ni dhout Israel kaluwore gi dhoutgi kaka opog-gi mondo obed mag-gi.
Ne en piny gode, gi pinje mantiere e tiend gode ma yo podho chiengʼ, Araba, pewe manie tiend gode, gi thim kod Negev. Kuondego ema ne jo-Hiti, jo-Amor, jo-Kanaan, jo-Perizi, jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus odakie. Ruodhigo ne gin:
Ruodh Jeriko, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Ai (machiegni gi Bethel), ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Jerusalem, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Hebron, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Jarmuth, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Lakish, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Eglon, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Gezer, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Debir, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Geder, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Horma, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Arad, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Libna, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Adulam, ngʼato achiel
Ruodh Makeda, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Bethel, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Tapua, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Hefer, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Afek, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Lasharon, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Madon, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Hazor, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Shimron Meron, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Akshaf, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Tanak, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Megido, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Kedesh, ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Jokneam man Karmel, ngʼato achiel,
Ruodh Dor (man Nafoth Dor), ngʼato achiel, Ruodh Goyim man Gilgal, ngʼato achiel,
kod Ruodh Tirza, ngʼato achiel. Ruodhi duto mane onegi ne oromo piero adek gachiel.
Ka Joshua noseti kendo hike koro noniangʼ, Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Iseti ahinya, to pod nitie kuonde madongo mar pinyni monego kaw.
“Kuonde modongʼ mapok okaw e magi: “gwenge duto mag jo-Filistia gi jo-Geshur,
kochakore e Aora Shihor man yo wuok chiengʼ mar Misri nyaka e tongʼ Ekron man yo nyandwat, magi duto nokwan kaka jo-Kanaan. Kuonde mane jotelo abich mag Filistia orito ne gin, Gaza, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Gath kod Ekron; magi ne gin mag jo-Avi
yo milambo; pinje duto mag jo-Kanaan, kochakore Meara mar jo-Sidonia nyaka ochopo Afek, gi tongʼ mar jo-Amor;
e gwenge mag Gebal; to gi Lebanon duto ma yo wuok chiengʼ, kaachiel gi Baal Gad manie tiend Got Hermon nyaka Lebo Hamath.
“Ne jogo duto modak kuonde motimo gode chakre Lebanon nyaka Misrefoth Maim, tiende ni, jo-Sidonia duto, an awuon abiro riembogi mondo giwene jo-Israel. Beduru gi adieri mar pogo ni jo-Israel pinyni kaka girkeni margi, mana kaka asechikoi.
Pogeuru kaka girkeni ni dhoudi ochikogo, kaachiel gi nus joka Manase.”
Nus modongʼ mar joka Manase, gi jo-Reuben kod jo-Gad noseyudo girkeni mag-gi mane Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye osemiyogi yo wuok chiengʼ mar aora Jordan.
Nochakore Aroer koluwore gi holo mar Arnon, kendo koluwore gi dalano manie dier holono, mi oriwo gode duto mag Medeba mochopo nyaka Dibon,
bende nyaka mier matindo mar Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, mane jatelo Heshbon, mantiere e tongʼ mar jo-Amon.
Noriwo nyaka Gilead, gwenge jo-Geshur kod jo-Maaka, Got Hermon duto, kod Bashan duto, mochopo nyaka Saleka,
tiende ni, pinyruodh Og duto man Bashan, ma bende nosebedo gi loch e Ashtaroth gi Edrei. (To bende nobedo achiel kuom jo-Refai mogik.) Musa noloyogi mi okawo pinygi.
Makmana jo-Israel ne ok oriembo jo-Geshur gi jo-Maaka, omiyo pod gidak e dier jo-Israel nyaka chil kawuono.
To dhood Lawi ne ok omiyo girkeni, nikech chiwo mane ochiw kokalo e mach ne Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel e girkeni margi, mana kaka ne osingonigi.
Girkeni mane Musa omiyo dhood Reuben kaluwore gi anywola ka anywola e magi:
Tongʼ mar pinygi nochakore Aroer man but holo mar Arnon, kendo koa e dalano mantiere e dier holono nyaka Medeba,
gi Heshbon kaachiel gi mier matindo mantiere e pewe, kaka Dibon, Bamoth Baal, Beth Baal Meon,
Jahaz, Kedemoth, Mefath,
Kiriathaim, Sibma, Zereth Shahar mantiere e got manie holo,
Beth Peor, pewe mag Pisga, kod Beth Jeshimoth,
mier matindo duto mantiere e pewe kod kuonde duto mag Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, ma bende norito Heshbon. Musa noseloyo Sihon ruodh jo-Amor kaachiel gi Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur gi Reba mane jodong jo-Midian. Jodongogo nodak e pinyno ka gin e bwo loch Sihon.
Koriwore gi jogo mane onegi e lweny, jo-Israel nonego bende Balaam wuod Beor, mane ja-nyakalondo.
Aora Jordan ema nobedo tongʼ mar joka Reuben. Pinyno kaachiel gi mier matindo mokiewo kodgi nobedo girkeni mar joka Reuben.
Girkeni mane Musa omiyo dhood Gad kaluwore gi anywola margi e magi:
Piny Jazer, mier matindo duto mag Gilead kod nus mar jo-Amon mochopo Aroer machiegni gi Raba;
kendo chakre Heshbon nyaka Ramath Mizpa gi Betonim, kendo kochakore Mahanaim nyaka piny Debir;
to pinygi mane ni e holo notingʼo Beth Haram, Beth Nimra, Sukoth, Zafon kod bath piny Sihon ruodh Heshbon modongʼ (pinygino neni yo wuok chiengʼ mar aora Jordan kendo Jordan nyaka Nam Kinereth nodoko tongʼ mare).
Pinyno kaachiel gi mier matindo mokiewo kodgi nobedo girkeni mar joka Gad.
Girkeni mane Musa omiyo nus mar dhood Manase, tiende ni, nus mar nyikwa Manase, kaluwore gi anywola ka anywola.
Pinygi nochakore Mahanaim, mokwako piny Og ruodh Bashan duto kod kuonde dak duto mag Jair man Bashan, to gi mier matindo piero auchiel,
bende nokawo nus mar jo-Gilead, gi Ashtaroth kod Edrei (ma gin mier madongo mag Og ruodh Bashan). Magi e pok mane omi nyikwa Makir wuod Manase, tiende ni nus mar dhood Makir konchiel.
Ma e girkeni mane Musa ochiwo kane en e paw Moab nyaka loka aora Jordan, yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jeriko.
To ni dhood Lawi, Musa ne ok opogonigi girkeni, nikech Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, e girkeni margi, mana kaka nosesingonegi.
Koro magi e kuonde mane jo-Israel oyudo kaka girkeni e piny Kanaan, ma Eliazar jadolo, Joshua wuod Nun to gi jotend dhout Israel nopogonegi.
Girkeni mag-gi nochiw kuom goyo ombulu ni dhoudi ochiko gi nus, kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko kokalo kuom Musa.
Musa nosepogo yo wuok chiengʼ mar aora Jordan ni dhoudi ariyo gi nus kaka girkeni, to ne ok opogo jo-Lawi girkeni e dier ogendini moko,
nimar yawuot Josef ne osepogore mi obedo dhoudi ariyo ma gin, Manase gi Efraim. Jo-Lawi ne ok oyudo pok moro e pinyno makmana mier mag dak, to gi lege ma rombgi kod dhogi nyalo kwayoe.
Omiyo jo-Israel nopogo pinyno mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko Musa.
Eka jo-Juda nodhi ir Joshua Gilgal kendo Kaleb ma wuod Jefune ma ja-Kenizi nowachone niya, “Ingʼeyo gima Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Musa, ngʼat Nyasaye ka en Kadesh Barnea kuomi kod an.
Ne an ja-higni piero angʼwen kinde mane Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye noora ka aa Kadesh Barnea mondo anon pinyni, kendo naduogone wach kaka chunya noneno,
to owetena mane odhi koda nokelo wach mane onyoso chuny ji. To kata kamano, an to naluwo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha gi chunya duto.
Omiyo odiechiengno Musa nokwongʼorena ni, ‘E pinyno matiendi osenyono biro bedo girkeni magi kendo gi nyithindi nyaka chiengʼ, nikech useluwo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha gi chunyu duto.’
“Koro mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosingo, osemiya ngima kuom higni piero angʼwen gabich nyaka nowach ne Musa wachni, e kinde mane jo-Israel ne pod wuotho e thim. Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye oserito ngimana, makoro an gi higni piero aboro gabich!
Kata kawuono pod ategno mana ka kinde mane Musa ooracha, kendo pod an-gi ilo mar dhi oko mondo akedi mana kaka ne an ndalo cha.
Koro miya piny manie godni mane Jehova Nyasaye nosingona odiechiengʼ cha. In iwuon ni iwinjo ni jo-Anak ni kanyo kendo miechgi madongo ne lach kendo ochiel gohinga makmana Jehova Nyasaye kokonya to abiro riembogi oko mana kaka nowacho.”
Eka Joshua nogwedho Kaleb wuod Jefune mi omiye Hebron kaka girkeni mare.
Omiyo Hebron osebedo mar Kaleb wuod Jefune ma ja-Kenizi nyaka aa chiengʼno, nikech noluwo Jehova Nyasaye, Nyasach Israel, gi chunye duto.
Chon ni luongo Hebron ni Kiriath Arba kaluwore gi Arba, mane jatelo maduongʼ e dier jo-Anak. Bangʼe pinyno nobedo gi kwe.
Piny mane opog ni dhood Juda gi ombulu, kaluwore gi anywola margi, nochopo nyaka e gwenge mag Edom, kendo nyaka yo milambo e thim mar Zin.
Tongʼ-gi ma yo milambo nochakore e giko mar Nam Chumbi ma yo milambo,
kongʼado milambo mar Akrabim, kodhi nyime nyaka Zin, kendo ochwe nyaka milambo mar Kadesh Barnea. Bangʼe to ne ongʼado Hezron nyaka Adar kendo gomo kochiko Karka.
Bangʼe ne okalo nyaka Azmon mi ochopo nyaka Wadi manie piny Misri kendo ochopo nyaka e dho Nam Mediterania. Ma e giko tongʼne ma yo milambo.
Tongʼ-gi ma yo wuok chiengʼ nochakore Nam Chumbi modhi nyaka dho aora Jordan. Tongʼ-gi ma yo nyandwat nochakore kama aora Jordan donjogo e nam maduongʼ,
modhi malo nyaka Beth Hogla kendo odhi nyime yo nyandwat mar Beth Araba nyaka e kite mag Bohan ma wuod Reuben.
Tongʼno nodhi nyaka Debir koa e Holo mar Akor mi ogomo kochiko nyandwat nyaka Gilgal, mangʼiyore gi Pass mar Adumim mantiere yo milambo mar holono. Nodhi nyime koluwo dho aora mar En Shemesh mochopo nyaka En Rogel.
Bangʼe noluwo Holo mar Ben Hinom, kochomo pewe ma milambo mar dala maduongʼ mar jo-Jebus (tiende ni, Jerusalem). Koa kanyo noidho nyaka ewi got man yo podho chiengʼ mar Holo mar Hinom e giko mar Holo mar Refaim mantiere yo nyandwat.
Koa ewi got, tongʼno nochiko yo thidhna mag pige mag Neftoa, mowuok koa e mier matindo mag Got Efron kendo modhi nyaka Baala (tiende ni, Kiriath Jearim).
Bangʼe tongʼno nogomo kochiko yo podho chiengʼ chakre Baala nyaka Got Seir, koluwo yo nyandwat mar pewe mag Got Jearim (tiende ni, Kesalon), modhi nyime nyaka Beth Shemesh kendo ongʼado nyaka Timna.
Nodhi nyaka yo nyandwat manie pewe mar Ekron kendo ogomo kochiko Shikeron, mi okalo nyaka Got Baala kendo ochopo Jabnel. Tongʼno nochopo nyaka e nam.
Tongʼ ma yo podho chiengʼ nochopo nyaka e dho Nam Maduongʼ. Magi e tongʼ mar jo-Juda kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Kaluwore gi chik mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo Joshua, nomiyo Kaleb wuod Jefune bath piny Juda miluongo ni, Kiriath Arba, ma tiende ni, Hebron. (Arba ne en kwar Anak.)
Kochakore Hebron, Kaleb noriembo jo-Anak adek, ma gin Sheshai, Ahiman kod Talmai ma gin nyikwa Anak.
Koa kanyo nodhi momonjo joma odak Debir (machon ne iluongo ni Kiriath Sefa).
To Kaleb nowacho niya, “Anachiw nyara Aksa mondo okendi gi ngʼatno manoked ma kaw Kiriath Sefa.”
Othniel wuod Kenaz, ma owadgi Kaleb noloyo pinyno, omiyo Kaleb nomiye nyare Aksa mondo okendi.
Chiengʼ moro achiel kane obiro ir Othniel, nojiwe mondo okwa wuon mare puodho. Kane olor oa e pundane, Kaleb nopenje niya, “En angʼo midwaro ni mondo atimni?”
Nodwoko niya, “Timna ngʼwono makende. Nimar isemiya puodho man Negev, miya bende thidhna mar pi.” Omiyo Kaleb nomiye thidhna ma malo kod mamwalo.
Ma e girkeni mar dhood Juda, kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Mier matindo man yo podho chiengʼ ma nopogne dhood Juda man Negev kaachiel gi mago mogo tongʼ gi Edom ne gin: Kabzel, Eder, Jagur,
Kina, Dimona, Adada,
Kedesh, Hazor, Ithnan,
Zif, Telem, Biloth,
Hazor Hadata, Kerioth Hezron (tiende ni, Hazor),
Amam, Shema, Molada,
Hazar Gada, Heshmon, Beth Pelet,
Hazar Shual, Bersheba, Biziothia,
Baala, Iyim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Kesil, Horma,
Ziklag, Madmana, Sansana,
Lebaoth, Shilhim, Ain kod Rimon. Giduto ne gin mier gi gwenge maromo piero ariyo gochiko.
To mier mane nitiere e tiend gode ma yo podho chiengʼ ne gin: Eshtaol, Zora, Ashna,
Zanoa, En Ganim, Tapua, Enam,
Jarmuth, Adulam, Soko, Azeka,
Sharaim, Adithaim, kod Gedera (kata Gederothaim). Giduto ne gin mier gi gwenge maromo apar gangʼwen.
Mier mamoko ne gin: Zenan, Hadasha, Migdal Gad,
Dilean, Mizpa, Jokthel,
Lakish, Bozkath, Eglon,
Kabon, Lamas, Kitlish,
Gederoth, Beth Dagon, Naama kod Makeda. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge maromo apar gauchiel.
Mier mamoko ne gin: Libna, Ether, Ashan,
Ifta, Ashna, Nezib,
Keila, Akzib kod Maresha. Giduto ne gin mier gi gwenge maromo ochiko.
Ekron gi mier molworo bende ne margi.
Ashdod gi mier molwore bende ne margi kochakore yo podho chiengʼ mar Ekron.
Ashdod gi Gaza kod miechgi mochopo nyaka Wadi manie tongʼ-gi gi Misri, kendo koluwo nyaka dho Nam Maduongʼ bende ne margi.
Mier mamoko mane ni e got ne gin: Shamir, Jatir, Soko,
Dana, Kiriath Sana (tiende ni, Debir),
Anab, Eshtemo, Anim,
Goshen, Holon, kod Gilo. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge maromo apar gachiel.
Mier mamoko ne gin: Arab, Duma, Eshan,
Janim, Beth Tapua, Afeka,
Humta, Kiriath Arba (tiende ni, Hebron), kod Zior. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge maromo ochiko.
Mier mamoko ne gin: Maon, Karmel, Zif, Juta,
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoa,
Kain, Gibea, kod Timna. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge maromo apar.
Mier mamoko ne gin: Halhul, Beth Zur, Gedor,
Maarath, Beth Anoth kod Eltekon. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge maromo auchiel.
Mier mamoko ne gin: Kiriath Baal (tiende ni, Kiriath Jearim), kod Raba. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge maromo ariyo.
Mier mane giyudo e thim ne gin: Beth Araba, Midin, Sekaka,
Nibshan, Dala Maduongʼ mar Chumbi, kod En Gedi. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge maromo auchiel.
Jo-Juda ne ok nyal daro jo-Jebus, mane odak Jerusalem; jo-Jebus gi jo-Juda pod odak kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
Piny mane opog ne Josef nochakore Aora Jordan man yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jeriko, koluwo i thim mochopo e gode man Bethel.
Nodhi nyime chakre Bethel (tiende ni, Luz), mi ongʼado gwengʼ jo-Arki mantiere Ataroth,
koridore yo podho chiengʼ nyaka e tongʼ jo-Jaflet mochopo nyaka e holo mar Beth Horon kendo nyaka Gezer, mogik e nam.
Omiyo Manase gi Efraim, ma nyikwa Josef, noyudo girkeni mag-gi.
To piny Efraim kaluwore gi anywola ka anywola ema: Tongʼ mar pinye mane girkeni mare nochakore Ataroth Adar, ma yo wuok chiengʼ nyaka Beth Horon Mamalo,
kendo odhi nyime nyaka e nam. Bende kochakore Mikmethath mantiere yo nyandwat ne ogondore kochiko yo wuok chiengʼ nyaka Tanath Shilo, mochopo nyaka yo wuok chiengʼ mar Janoa.
Eka nodhi piny kochakore Janoa nyaka Ataroth gi Naara, momulo Jeriko mokadho e aora Jordan.
Kochakore gie tongʼ Tapua nodhi yo podho chiengʼ nyaka Kana Tavain kendo ogik e nam. Ma ema ne girkeni mar dhood Efraim, kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Piny mane omi Efraim kaka girkenino bende notingʼo mier moko mane ni e gwengʼ Manase.
Ne ok gidaro jo-Kanaan mane odak Gezer. Nyaka chil kawuono jo-Kanaan pod odak gi jo-Efraim ka gitiyonegi kaka wasumbinigi.
Ma e pok mar dhood Manase, kaka wuod Josef makayo, tiende ni, mar Makir, wuod Manase makayo. Makir ne kwar jo-Gilead, ma norwako Gilead gi Bashan nikech jo-Makir ne gin jolweny mongʼere.
Omiyo pokni nowene joka Manase mane odongʼ, kaka, anywola mar Abiezer, Helek Asriel, Shekem, Hefer, kod Shemida. Magi e nyikwa Manase ma wuod Josef mamoko machwo kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Zelofehad ma wuod Hefer, ma wuod Gilead, ma wuod Makir, ma wuod Manase, ne onge yawuowi makmana nyiri kende, ma nying-gi ne gin: Mala, Nowa, Hogla, Milka gi Tirza.
Negidhi ir Eliazar jadolo kod Joshua wuod Nun, to gi jotelo mi giwachonegi niya, “Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Musa mondo opognwa girkeni e dier owetewa.” Omiyo Joshua nomiyogi girkeni kaachiel gi owete wuonegi, kaluwore gi chik Jehova Nyasaye.
Pok mar Manase ne en lope apar kapok okwan piny Gilead kod piny Bashan mantiere yo wuok chiengʼ mar aora Jordan,
nikech nyi dhood Manase noyudo girkeni e kind owetegi. Piny jo-Gilead nobedo mar nyikwa Manase mamoko.
Piny Manase nochakore Asher nyaka Mikmethath mantiere yo wuok chiengʼ mar Shekem. Tongʼno nochakore yo milambo mokawo nyaka joma odak En Tapua.
Manase nokawo piny Tapua, to Tapua owuon, mane nitiere e tongʼ Manase, nobedo mar jo-Efraim.
Eka tongʼno nodhi nyime yo milambo mochopo nyaka Kana Ravin. Ne nitiere mier matindo ma mek Efraim mane nitiere e dier mier matindo mag Manase, makmana tongʼ Manase ne nitiere yo nyandwat mar holo matut madiny kendo mogik e nam.
Yo milambo ne en piny Efraim, to yo nyandwat ne en mar Manase. Piny Manase nochopo e nam kendo mokiewo gi Asher yo nyandwat, to Isakar yo wuok chiengʼ.
E Isakar kod Asher, Manase ne nitie bende kod Beth Shan, Ibleam kod jo-Dor, Endor, Tanak kod Megido, kaachiel gi jogo mane odak machiegni kodgi, ngʼat mar adek e kwan-no ne en Nafoth.
Kata kamano, jo-Manase ne ok nyal kawo e mier matindogi, nikech jo-Kanaan noramo ni nyaka gidag kanyo.
Omiyo ka jo-Israel nodoko maroteke, negiketo jo-Kanaan obedo wasumbinigi mane ok giriembogi kata matin.
Joka Josef nowachone Joshua niya, “Ere gima omiyo isepogonwa kendo miyowa mana kamoro achiel kaka girkeni? Wasenyaa kendo Jehova Nyasaye osegwedhowa mogundho.”
Joshua nodwokogi niya, “To ka usenyaa ahinya kamano kendo piny gode mag Efraim koro tinnu, kare koro dhiuru e bungu manie piny jo-Perizi kod jo-Refai mondo ubet kanyo obed maru.”
Joka Josef to nodwoko niya, “Piny godeno ok oromowa, kendo jo-Kanaan duto modak e pawno nigi geche mag lweny ma tiendgi otimo nyinyo, kendo mago modak Beth Shan gi mier molwore kaachiel gi holo mar Jezreel bende nigi gechego.”
To Joshua nowachone od Josef, ma gin Efraim kod Manase niya, “Usenyaa kendo un joma nigi teko. Ok unubed gi pok achiel kende,
to nyaka piny moyugno manie got bende. Beteuru nyaka kuma unyalo, to obiro bedo maru; kata obedo ni jo-Kanaan nigi geche nyinyo kendo gi tegno, pod unyalo riembogi.”
Kanyakla duto mag jo-Israel nochokore Shilo ma giguro Hemb Romo kanyo. Pinyno nobedo e bwo lochgi,
makmana ne pod nitiere dhout Israel abiriyo mane pod ok oyudo girkeni margi.
Omiyo Joshua nowachone jo-Israel niya, “Ubiro rito nyaka karangʼo kapok uchako kawo mwandu mar piny mane Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach wuoneu, asemiyou?
Yieruru ji adek koa e dhoot ka dhoot. Abiro oorogi mondo gidhi ginon pinyno kendo gindik malongʼo kuom pinyno, kaluwore gi pok mar ngʼato ka ngʼato. Bangʼe, to gidwog ira.
Nyaka upog pinyni e migepe abiriyo. Jo-Juda nyaka dongʼ kargi man yo milambo kendo joka Josef bende odongʼ kargi man yo nyandwat.
Bangʼ ka usendiko malongʼo kuom migepe abiriyo mar pinyno, to ukelnagiuru kae kendo abiro pogonugi gi ombulu e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa.
Kata kamano, jo-Lawi to ok noyud pok e dieru, nikech tichgi mar dolo ne Jehova Nyasaye e girkeni margi. To Gad, Reuben kod nus mar dhood Manase, to oseyudo girkeni margi e bath aora Jordan ma yo wuok chiengʼ nikech Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye nosemiyogi.”
E kinde mane jogi owuok mondo gidhi ginon piny, Joshua nomiyogi chik niya, “Dhiuru kendo utim nonro malongʼo mar pinyni kendo undik gik moko duto muyudo e iye. Bangʼe dwoguru ira kendo abiro miyou pok maru Shilo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.”
Omiyo jogo nowuok modhi koluwo dier piny tir. Negindiko gigo duto mane giyudo e pinyno e kitabu, e dala ka dala, e migepe abiriyo kendo mi gidwogo ir Joshua e kambi man Shilo.
Bangʼe Joshua nomiyogo pok margi Shilo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, kendo gikanyono nopogo jo-Israel pinyno kaluwore gi dhoutgi.
Pok mar joka Benjamin, notimne anywola ka anywola. Kuonde mane opognigo ne ni e kind Juda gi Josef.
Tongʼ-gi ma yo nyandwat nochakore e aora Jordan, kochomo pewe man yo nyandwat mar Jeriko, mi oluwo piny godego kochomo yo podho chiengʼ nyaka ochomo e thim mar Beth Aven.
Koa kanyo nongʼado kodhi yo milambo mar pewe mag Luz (tiende ni, Bethel), modhi nyaka Ataroth Adar mantiere yo milambo mar Beth Horon Mamwalo.
Koa e got momanyore gi Beth Horon mantiere yo milambo, tongʼno nogomo kochomo yo podho chiengʼ mar godno, mogik Kiriath Baal (tiende ni, Kiriath Jearim), ma en dala jo-Juda. Mano e tongʼ-gi ma yo podho chiengʼ.
Tongʼ ma yo milambo nochakore oko mar Kiriath Jearim mantiere yo podho chiengʼ, kendo tongʼno nochopo nyaka thidhna mar pi Neftoa.
Tongʼno nodhi nyaka e tiend got momanyore gi Holo mar Ben Hinom, kod yo nyandwat mar Holo mar Refaim. Nodhi nyime nyaka e Holo mar Hinom koluwo yo milambo mar pewe mar dala maduongʼ mar jo-Jebus kendo mochopo En Rogel.
Bangʼe nogomo kochiko yo nyandwat, modhi nyaka En Shemesh, kendo nyaka Geliloth, momanyore gi Adumim, kendo oridore kadhi piny nyaka Kit Bohan ma wuod Reuben.
Nodhi nyime nyaka yo nyandwat mar pewe mag Beth Araba mochopo nyaka Araba.
Eka nodhi kendo yo nyandwat mar pewe mag Beth Hogla mi owuok koa yo nyandwat mar dho Nam Chumbi, kama aora Jordan ochakore godo mantiere yo milambo. Mano e tongʼ-gi ma yo milambo.
Aora Jordan ne en tongʼ mantiere yo wuok chiengʼ. Ma e kaka nopog ni anywola mar Benjamin pinygi.
Mier madongo mane dhood Benjamin nitierego kaluwore gi anywolagi e magi: Jeriko, Beth Hogla, Emek Keziz,
Beth Araba, Zemaraim, Bethel,
Avim, Para, Ofra,
Kefa Amoni, Ofni kod Geba. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge apar gariyo.
Mier mamoko ne gin: Gibeon, Rama, Beeroth,
Mizpa, Kefira, Moza,
Rekem, Irpil, Tarala,
Zela, Haelef, jo-Jebus (tiende ni, Jerusalem), Gibea kod Kiriath. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge maromo apar gangʼwen. Magi e mier mane opog ni dhood Benjamin.
Pok mar ariyo nobiro ne dhood Simeon, kaluwore gi anywola margi. Girkeni margi ne nitiere e piny jo-Juda.
Notingʼo: Bersheba (kata Sheba), Molada,
Hazar Shual, Bala, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethul, Horma,
Ziklag, Beth Makaboth, Hazar Shusa,
Beth Lebaoth kod Sharuhen. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge maromo apar gadek.
Mier mamoko ne gin: Ain, Rimon, Ether kod Ashan. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge maromo angʼwen,
ka ok okwan mier matindo mokiewo kodgi mochopo nyaka Baalath Beer (ma bende iluongo ni Rama e piny Negev). Magi e mier mane opog ne dhood Simeon kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Girkeni mar dhood Simeon nopognegi koa kuom pok mar jo-Juda, nikech pok mar Juda ne duongʼ mohewogi. Omiyo dhood Simeon noyudo pok margi koa e piny Juda.
Pok mar adek ne mar dhood Zebulun kaluwore anywolagi. Tongʼ mar pok margi nochopo nyaka Sarid.
Koa yo podho chiengʼ nochiko Marala mochopo nyaka Dabesheth, kendo oyarore kochomo holo matut mantiere but Jokneam.
Nogomo kochiko yo wuok chiengʼ koa Sarid nyaka e piny Kisloth Tabor kendo odhi nyime nyaka Daberath mi ogik Jafia.
Bangʼe nodhi nyime gi yo wuok chiengʼ nyaka Gath Hefer kod Eth Kazin; bangʼe nowuok oko e Rimon mi ogomo yo Nea.
Bangʼ Nea, tongʼno nochomo yo nyandwat mochopo nyaka Hanathon bangʼe to ogik e holo mar Ifta El.
Pinyno notingʼo Katath, Nahalal, Shimron, Idala kod Bethlehem. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge apar gariyo.
Magi e mier matindo kod gwenge mane opog ne dhood Zebulun kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Pok mar angʼwen nomi dhood Isakar kaluwore gi anywola margi.
Pinyni notingʼo: Jezreel, Kesuloth, Shunem,
Hafaraim, Shion, Anaharath,
Rabith, Kishion, Ebez,
Remeth, En Ganim, En Hada kod Beth Pazez.
Tongʼ pinyno nochopo nyaka Tabor, Shahazuma gi Beth Shemesh, mi ogik nyaka aora Jordan. Giduto ne gin mier kod gwenge apar gauchiel.
Magi e mier matindo kod gwenge mane opog ne dhood Isakar kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Pok mar abich nomi dhoot Asher kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Pinygi nopogi kama: Helkath, Hali, Beten, Akshaf,
Alamelek, Amad kod Mishal. To yo podho chiengʼ, tongʼ-gi nochopo Karmel gi Shihor Libnath.
Bangʼe tongʼno nochomo yo wuok chiengʼ mochopo nyaka Beth Dagon koluwo Zebulun gi Holo mar Ifta El, kochomo yo nyandwat nyaka Beth Emek gi Neyel kokalo e bath Kabul.
Nodhi nyaka Abdon, Rehob, Hamon kod Kana, mochopo nyaka Sidon Maduongʼ.
Bangʼe nodwok tongʼno chien nyaka Rama modhi nyaka e dala maduongʼ mar Turo mochiel gohinga, mogomo kochiko Hosa koluwo dho nam e gwengʼ mar Akzib,
Uma, Afek kod Rehob. Giduto ne gin mier matindo kod gwenge piero ariyo gariyo.
Magi e mier matindo kod gwenge mane opog ne dhood Asher kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Pok mar auchiel nomi dhood Naftali, kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Tongʼ-gi nochakore Helef modhi nyaka kar yien maduongʼ man Zananim, koluwo Adami Nekeb gi Jabnel mochopo Lakum kendo gikone ne en aora Jordan.
Tongʼno noluwo yo podho chiengʼ kokadho Aznoth Tabor kendo owuok Hukok. Gi yo milambo tongʼno nokiewo gi Zebulun, to yo podho chiengʼ nokiewo gi Asher; to yo wuok chiengʼ nokiewo gi aora Jordan.
Mier mane ochiel gohinga ne gin: Zidin, Zer, Hamath, Rakath, Kinereth,
Adama, Rama, Hazor,
Kedesh, Edrei, En Hazor,
Iron, Migdal El, Horem, Beth Anath kod Beth Shemesh. Giduto ne gin mier matindo kod gwenge apar gochiko.
Magi e mier matindo kod gwenge mane opog ne dhood Naftali, kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Pok mar abiriyo nomi dhood Dan, kaluwore gi anywola margi.
Kuonde mane opog-gi ne gin: Zora, Eshtaol, Ir Shemesh,
Shalabin, Aijalon, Ithla,
Elon, Timna, Ekron,
Elteke, Gibethon, Baalath,
Jehud, Bene Berak, Gath Rimon,
Me Jarkon kod Rakon, to gi kama omanyore gi Jopa.
To dhood Dan ne nigi pek kuom kawo pok mar pinygi, omiyo negidhi ma gimonjo Leshem mi gikawe, bangʼe ginegogi gi ligangla. Negidak Leshem kendo ma gichake ni Dan mane en kwargi.
Magi e mier matindo kod gwenge mane opog ne dhood Dan, kaluwore gi anywolagi.
Kane gisetieko pogo pinyno e migepe ka migepe, jo-Israel nomiyo Joshua wuod Nun pok e diergi,
mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko. Negimiye dalano mane okwayogi, ma en, Timnath Sera manie piny Efraim. Kuom mano, nogero dala kanyo modakie.
Magi e pok mane Eliazar jadolo, Joshua wuod Nun kod jotelo mag dhout Israel nopogo lowo gombulu ka gin Shilo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e dhoranga Hemb Romo. Omiyo negitieko pogo pinyno.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Joshua niya,
“Kone jo-Israel oyier miechgi madongo mag tony, kaka ne asenyisou kokalo kuom Musa,
mondo ngʼato angʼata monego nyawadgi kobothne kendo ok dwarone nyalo biro kanyo mi oyud konyruok koa e lwet ngʼama dwaro chulone kuor.
“Ka oringo mi obiro e achiel kuom mier madongogi, to nyaka ochungʼ e dhorangach mar dala maduongʼ mondo owach malongʼo chandruok mare e nyim jotend dala maduongʼno. Bangʼ mano to girwake ei dalagi maduongʼno kendo gimiye kama odakie kodgi.
Ka ngʼat madwaro chulo kuor olawe, to kik gichiw ngʼatno modonjne, nikech ne onego nyawadgino ka ok ochano kendo ka oonge gi paro mar nege.
Nyaka odag e dala maduongʼ kanyo machop chiengʼ bura e nyim kanyakla kendo nyaka chop chiengʼ ma jadolo maduongʼ marito kanyo tho. Bangʼeno onyalo dok e dalane owuon, ma en dalano mane oringo koaye.”
Omiyo negiwalo tenge Kedesh man Galili e piny Naftali manie got, gi Shekem e piny Efraim manie got kod Kiriath Arba (tiende ni, Hebron), e piny Juda ma bende ni e got.
To yo wuok chiengʼ mar Aora Jordan (e piny mamalo momanyore gi Jeriko) negiyiero Bezer manie thim kuom piny dhood Reuben gi Ramoth mantiere Gilead kuom piny dhood Gad, kod Golan mantiere Bashan e dhood Manase.
Ja-Israel moro amora kata jadak mora amora modak e diergi ma nonego ngʼato ka ok ochano kendo ka oonge gi paro mar nege mondo odhi e mier madongo mowal mar tony mondo kik neg-gi gi ngʼatno madwaro chulo kuor kapok otergi e bura e nyim kanyakla.
Bangʼe jotelo mag anywola mag dhout jo-Lawi nobiro ir Eliazar jadolo, Joshua wuod Nun, kod jotelo mag dhout anywola mamoko mag Israel,
kama iluongo ni Shilo ei Kanaan mi giwachonegi niya, “Jehova Nyasaye nochiko kokalo kuom Musa ni mondo imiwa dalano mondo wadagie, kod kuonde ma jambwa nyalo kwayoe.”
Omiyo kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechiko, jo-Israel nomiyo jo-Lawi mier matindogi kod kuonde kwath koa kuom pokgi giwegi.
Pok mokwongo nodhine jo-Kohath kaluwore gi anywola margi. Jo-Lawi mane nyikwa Harun jadolo nopog mier matindo apar gadek koa e dhout Juda, Simeon kod Benjamin.
Nyikwa Kohath mane odongʼ nopog mier matindo apar koa e anywola mar dhout Efraim, Dan kod nus mar dhood Manase.
Nyikwa Gershon nopog mier matindo apar gadek koa e anywola mar dhood Isakar, Asher, Naftali, to gi nus mar dhood Manase man Bashan.
Nyikwa Merari kaluwore gi anywola margi, noyudo mier matindo apar gariyo koa e dhood Reuben, Gad kod Zebulun.
Omiyo jo-Israel nopogo jo-Lawi mier matindogi kod kuonde kwath, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko kokalo kuom Musa.
Koa e dhout Juda kod Simeon negipogo mier matindogi gi nying-gi kama:
mier matindogi ne gin mek nyikwa Harun mane oa kuom jo-Kohath e anywola mar jo-Lawi, nikech pok mokwongo nomigi.
Ne gimiyogi Kiriath Arba (tiende ni, Hebron), gi kuonde kwath, mantiere e piny manie got mar Juda. Arba ne en kwar jo-Anak.
To puothe kod gwenge molworo dala maduongʼ ne gisemiyo Kaleb wuod Jefune kaka pok mare.
Omiyo nyikwa Harun jadolo negimiyo Hebron (ma en dala maduongʼ mar tony mar ngʼama oneko), Libna,
Jatir, Eshtemoa,
Holon, Debir,
Ain, Juta kod Beth Shemesh, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo ochiko koa e dhoudi ariyogi.
To koa e dhood Benjamin ne gimiyogi Gibeon, Geba,
Anathoth kod Almon, kaachiel gi kuondegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo angʼwen.
Mier matindo duto mane omi jodolo ma nyikwa Harun, ne gin apar gadek, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath.
Anywola mar jo-Kohath mar dhood Lawi mane odongʼ nopog mier matindo koa e dhood Efraim.
E yo kama otingʼore mar Efraim nomi Shekem (ma en dala maduongʼ mar tony ne ngʼatno miparo kuome ni oneko) kod Gezer,
Kibzaim kod Beth Horon, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo angʼwen.
Bende koa e dhood Dan nomigi Elteke, Gibethon,
gi Aijalon kod Gath Rimon, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo angʼwen.
Koa e nus mar dhood Manase nomigi Tanak kod Gath Rimon, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo ariyo.
Mier matindogi apar kod legegi mag kwath nomi anywola jo-Kohath mane odongʼ.
Mier mane omi jo-Gershon maa e dhood Lawi ne gin: Koa e nus mar dhood Manase, nomigi, Golan mantiere Bashan (ma en dala maduongʼ mar pondo ne ngʼatno miparo kuome ni oneko), kod Be Eshtara, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo ariyo.
Koa e dhood Isakar, nomigi, Kishion, Daberath,
Jarmuth kod En Ganim, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo angʼwen.
Koa e dhood Asher nomigi, Mishal, Abdon,
Helkath kod Rehob, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo angʼwen.
Koa e dhood Naftali, nomigi, Kedesh man Galili (ma en dala maduongʼ mar pondo ne ngʼatno miparo kuome ni oneko), gi Hamoth Dor kod Kartan, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo adek.
Mier matindo duto mar anywola jo-Gershon ne gin apar gadek, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath.
Anywola jo-Merari (ma gin jo-Lawi mamoko) nomi: Koa e dhood Zebulun nomi: Jokneam, Karta,
Dimna kod Nahalal, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo angʼwen.
Koa e dhood Reuben nomi: Bezer, Jahaz,
Kedemoth kod Mefath, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo angʼwen.
Koa e dhood Gad nomi: Ramoth mantiere Gilead (ma en dala maduongʼ mar pondo ne ngʼatno miparo kuome ni oneko), gi Mahanaim,
Heshbon kod Jazer, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath. Giduto ne gin mier matindo angʼwen.
Mier matindo duto mane opog ni anywola jo-Merari mane gin jo-Lawi modongʼ, ne gin apar gariyo.
Mier matindo mag jo-Lawi e piny mane jo-Israel okawo ne gin piero angʼwen gaboro giduto, kaachiel gi legegi mag kwath.
Mier matindogi moro ka moro ne nigi legegi mag kwath e alworagi, kendo ma ne en adiera ne mier matindogi duto.
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo jo-Israel pinje duto mane osingore ni enomi kweregi, kendo ne gikawogi mi gidakie.
Jehova Nyasaye nomiyogi kwe, mana kaka ne osesingore ni enomi kweregi. Onge wasikgi moro amora mane omonjogi; kendo Jehova Nyasaye nochiwo wasikgi duto e lwetgi.
Onge singruok moro amora mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo jo-Israel mane ok otimonegi; moro ka moro nochopo kaka nowacho.
Eka Joshua noluongo jo-Reuben, jo-Gad kod nus mar dhood Manase
mowachonegi niya, “Usetimo gigo duto mane Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye ochiko, kendo bende useluora e gigo duto mane achikou.
Kuom kinde mangʼeny nyaka kawuononi, pok ujwangʼo oweteu, to usetimo tich mane Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu omiyou.
Ka koro Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyo oweteu kwe kaka ne osesingo, doguru e miechu e piny mane Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye nomiyou e bath aora Jordan kocha.
To beduru motangʼ kurito puonj kod chike mane Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye omiyou kama: heruru Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, wuothuru e yorene duto, luoruru chikene, padreuru kuome kendo tineuru gi ngimau duto.”
Bangʼe Joshua nogwedhogi mi oorogi, kendo negidok e miechgi.
To ne nus mar dhood Manase, Musa nomiyogi piny mantiere Bashan, to nus machielo mar dhoodno, Joshua nomiyogi piny mantiere yo podho chiengʼ mar aora Jordan kaachiel gi owetene. Kane Joshua osegologi mondo gidog e miechgi, nogwedhogi kowacho niya,
“Ero udok e miechu gi mwandu mangʼeny kaka kweth mar jamni mathoth, fedha, dhahabu, mula gi nyinyo, kod lewni mangʼeny kendo neuru ni upogone oweteu gigo mane upeyo kuom wasiku.”
Omiyo jo-Reuben, jo-Gad kod nus mar dhood Manase noweyo jo-Israel Shilo mantiere Kanaan, mondo gidogi Gilead, pinygi giwegi, mane giyudo kaluwore gi chik Jehova Nyasaye kokalo kuom Musa.
Kane gibiro Geliloth but aora Jordan e piny Kanaan, jo-Reuben, jo-Gad kod nus mar dhood Manase nogero kendo mar misango machiegni gi aora Jordan.
To ka jo-Israel nowinjo ni negisegero kendo mar misango e tongʼ Kanaan kama iluongo ni Geliloth but aora Jordan yo kor jo-Israel,
oganda duto mar Israel nochokore Shilo mondo gidhi giked kodgi.
Omiyo jo-Israel nooro Finehas wuod Eliazar jadolo, e piny Gilead, ir jo-Reuben, jo-Gad kod nus mar dhood Manase,
mi nodhi gi jotelo apar mag dhout Israel kamoro ka moro ochungʼ ne dhoot ka dhoot.
Kane gidhi Gilead, ir dhood Reuben, Gad kod nus mar dhood Manase, negiwachonegi niya,
“Oganda duto mar Jehova Nyasaye wacho kama: Ere gima omiyo uketho winjruok maru gi Nyasach Israel? Ere gima omiyo ungʼanyo ni Jehova Nyasaye mi ugero kendo mar misango ni un uwegi e yor wangʼ teko?
Donge richo mane watimo Peor oromo? Nyaka chil kawuono kum mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyowa pok orumo!
Uparo ni kumno ne yot ma pod udhi nyime mana ne ngʼanyo ni Jehova Nyasaye? “ ‘Ka dipo ni pod ukwedo Jehova Nyasaye kawuono, to kiny iye biro wangʼ gi jo-Israel duto.
Ka piny ma ukawoni odwanyore, to biuru e piny Jehova Nyasaye, kama ogurie hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye, kendo mondo udag kodwa e pinyni. To kik ukwed Jehova Nyasaye kata mana wan bende ka ugero kendo mar misango ne un uwegi, makmana kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kende.
Donge uparo kaka Akan wuod Zera notimo richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, momiyo oganda jo-Israel duto okum? Ok en kende ema notho nikech richone.’ ”
Jo-Reuben, Gad kod nus mar dhood Manase nodwoko jotend anywola mag jo-Israel niya,
“Jehova Nyasaye en Nyasaye Maratego! Jehova Nyasaye en Nyasaye Maratego! Ongʼeyo gik moko duto! Israel mondo ongʼe! Ka dipo ni ma notim e yor ngʼanyo, kata bedo maonge gi luor ne Jehova Nyasaye, to kik ingʼwon-nwa kawuono.
Ka dipo ni wagero kendowa mar misango owuon mondo waa ir Jehova Nyasaye kendo mondo wachiw misango miwangʼo pep kod chiwo mar cham, kata ni wachiw misango mar lalruok kuome, to mad Jehova Nyasaye kumwa kaka joma osetimo richo.
“Ooyo! Ne watimo kamano nikech chiengʼ moro nyikwawa nyalo wachone nyikwau ni, ‘En angʼo ma wanyalo timo gi Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel?
Jehova Nyasaye oseketo aora Jordan mondo opog kindwa kodu, un joka Reuben kod joka Gad! Uonge kod pok moro kuom Jehova Nyasaye.’ Omiyo nyikwau nyalo miyo nyikwawa weyo luoro Jehova Nyasaye.
“Mano emomiyo nwawacho ni, ‘Waikreuru kendo wager kendo mar misango, to ok mar misango miwangʼo pep, kata ni sewni mamoko.’
To kata kamano, ma onego obed ranyisi e kindwa kodu to gi tiengʼ mabiro bangʼwa, ni wabiro lamo Jehova Nyasaye e kare maler mar lemo ka wachiwone misango miwangʼo pep, misengini mamoko kod misango mar lalruok. Bangʼe ndalo mabiro nyikwau ok nowach ne nyikwawa ni, ‘Uonge gi pok kuom Jehova Nyasaye.’
“To ne wawacho niya, ‘Ka dipo ni giwachonwa ma, kata ne nyikwawa to wabiro dwoko kama: Neuru kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye, mane kwerewa ogero, mondo obed kaka ranyisi e kindwa kodu, to ok ni chiwo misango miwangʼo pep.’
“Mad wabed mabor gi ngʼanyone Jehova Nyasaye, mi walokre waa kuome kawuono ka wagero kendo mar misango miwangʼo pep, chiwo mar cham kod misengini mamoko moloyo kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa mochungʼ e nyim kare maler.”
Kane Finehas jadolo kod jotend gwengʼ, ma gin jotend anywola mar jo-Israel, nowinjo gima Reuben, Gad kod Manase nowacho, negibedo gi mor.
Kendo Finehas wuod Eliazar ma jadolo, nowachone Reuben, Gad kod Manase niya, “Kawuono wangʼeyo ni Jehova Nyasaye nikodwa, nikech ok usetimo gima Jehova Nyasaye okwero. Kuom mano usereso jo-Israel kuom kum mar Jehova Nyasaye.”
Bangʼe Finehas wuod Eliazar ma jadolo, kod jotelo noduogo Kanaan koa e romogi gi jo-Reuben kod jo-Gad mane nitiere Gilead kendo ne gidwokone jo-Israel wach.
Negimor kuom winjo wachni kendo negipako Nyasaye. Ne ok gichako giwuoyo kendo kuom dhi kedo kodgi mondo giketh piny ma dhood Reuben kod Gad odakie.
Dhood Reuben kod Gad nomiyo kendo mar misangono nying machalo kama: Ranyisi e Kindwa ni Jehova Nyasaye en Nyasaye.
Bangʼ kinde moko ka Jehova Nyasaye nosemiyo jo-Israel kwe e kindgi gi wasikgi duto, noyudo ka koro Joshua oseti kendo ne en gi higni moniangʼ,
omiyo noluongo jo-Israel duto kaachiel gi jodong-gi, jotelo, jongʼad bura kod jotelo mamoko kendo mi owachonegi niya, “Aseti kendo hika oseniangʼ.
Un uwegi useneno gigo ma Jehova Nyasaye osetimo ni ogendinigi duto nikech un; ne en Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ema nokedonu.
Paruru kaka asepogo ni dhoutu pinje duto mag ogendini mane odongʼ kaka girkeni, ogendini mane aloyo, modak e kind aora Jordan kod Nam Maduongʼ mantiere yo podho chiengʼ.
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu owuon biro riembo wasiku e nyimu. Omiyo riembgiuru gia e nyimu, kendo unukaw pinygi, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nosingonu.
“Beduru motegno ahinya; beduru motangʼ mondo ulu mago duto mondikie Kitabu mar Chik mar Musa, ma ok udok yo korachwich kata koracham.
Kik uriwru gi ogendini modongʼ e dieru, kik uluong nying nyisechegi kata kik ukwongʼru gi nying-gi. Kik utinegi kata kik ukulrunegi.
To nyaka umak Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu motegno, mana kaka usebedo ka utimo.”
“Jehova Nyasaye oseriembo e nyimu oganda maduongʼ kendo maratego; kendo nyaka odiechiengni onge ngʼama oseloyou.
Ngʼato achiel biro lawo ji alufu achiel, nikech Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kedonu, mana kaka ne osingonu.
Omiyo beduru motangʼ mondo uher Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
“To ka ungʼanyo mi uriworu kod jogo motony manie pinyni modongʼ e dieru kendo unywomoru kodgi,
to ngʼeuru ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ok nochak oriemb ogendini e dieru kendo. Jogo nobednu obadho gi ramaki, boka mi chwadogo ngʼeu, kendo kudho e wengeu, nyaka chop ulal nono uae pinyni, ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyou.
“Koro sani adwaro dhi kuma ji duto manie piny dhiyoe. Ungʼeyo malongʼo gi chunyu duto ni onge singo moro amora ma Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nomiyou ma pod ok otimo. Singo duto osetimo maonge modongʼ.
Mana kaka singo duto maber mar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osebedo adiera, omiyo Jehova Nyasaye biro kelo kuomu gigo maricho duto mobwogou godo, nyaka one ni otiekou pep e piny maberni ma osemiyou.
Ka uketho singruok mane kindu gi Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mane ochikou, kendo mi udhi ma utiyo ne nyiseche manono kukulorunegi, to mirimb Nyasaye biro olore kuomu, kendo ubiro lal nono piyo e piny maber ma osemiyouni.”
Bangʼe Joshua nochoko dhout Israel duto kama iluongo ni Shekem. Noluongo jodongo, jotelo, jongʼad bura kod jotelo mamoko mag Israel mi gidhi e nyim Nyasaye.
Joshua nowachone ji duto niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel wacho, Chon gi lala kwereu, motingʼo nyaka Tera ma wuon Ibrahim kod Nahor, nodak but Aora Yufrate kendo negilamo nyiseche manono.
Makmana nagolo wuonu Ibrahim oa e pinyno machiegni gi Aora Yufrate mi atelone e piny Kanaan duto kendo amiye nyikwayo mathoth. Ne amiye Isaka,
to Isaka namiyo Jakobo kod Esau. Ne awalo piny Seir manie got ne Esau, to Jakobo gi nyithinde nodhi Misri.
“ ‘Bangʼe ne aoro Musa gi Harun, kendo ne agoyo jo-Misri gi tuoche kanyo, bangʼe agolou oko.
Kane agolo wuoneu Misri, ne uchopo e nam, kendo jo-Misri nolawou gi geche kod jogo mariambo farese nyaka e Nam Makwar.
To ne giywakne Jehova Nyasaye mondo okonygi, omiyo ne oketo mudho e kindu gi jo-Misri; mi nam oimogi. Ne uneno gima ne atimone jo-Misri. Bangʼ mano nudak e thim kuom ndalo marabora.
“ ‘Ne akelou nyaka e piny jo-Amor manodak yo wuok chiengʼ mar aora Jordan. Negikedo kodu, to naketogi e lwetu. Ne atiekogi chuth e nyimu, mi ukawo pinygi.
Kane Balak wuod Zipor, ma ruodh Moab, ne ikore mondo oked gi Israel, nooro Balaam wuod Beor mondo okwongʼu.
To ne ok anyal chiko ita ne Balaam, omiyo nogwedhou mogundho, mi nagolou oko e lwete.
“ ‘Bangʼe ne ungʼado aora Jordan mi ubiro Jeriko. Joma odak Jeriko, kaka jo-Amor, jo-Perizi, jo-Kanaan, jo-Hiti, jo-Girgash, jo-Hivi, gi jo-Jebus nokedo kodu, to ne achiwogi duto e lwetu.
Ne amiyo kibaji omakogi ma giringo e nyimu, kaachiel gi ruodhi jo-Amor ariyo. Ne ok utimo ma gi liganglau uwegi kod atungʼ.
Omiyo ne amiyou piny mane ok utiyone kod mier madongo mane ok ugero; mi udak kanyo kendo uchamo olemb mzabibu kod zeituni ma bende ne ok upidho.’
“Omiyo koro luoruru Jehova Nyasaye kendo beduru joratiro kinde duto kutiyone. Wituru oko nyiseche manono mag kwereu mane gilamo yo Aora Yufrate kod e piny Misri, mondo uti ne Jehova Nyasaye.
To ka dipo ni tiyone Jehova Nyasaye ok miu mor, to kawuononi yier aneuru ngʼama ubiro tiyone, kata ka en nyiseche manono mane kwereu tiyone e Aora Yufrate, kata en nyiseche manono mag jo-Amor, modak e pinygi. Makmana an gi jooda duto, wabiro tiyone Jehova Nyasaye.”
Eka ji nodwoko niya, “Mad gima chal kamano kik timrenwa ka wajwangʼo Jehova Nyasaye, mondo watine nyiseche manono!
En Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa owuon mane ogolowa gi kwerewa e piny Misri, e piny mane wan wasumbini, kendo motimo ranyisi madongo-go ka waneno. Ne oritowa e wuodhwa duto kendo e kind ogendini duto mane wakalo eigi.
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye ne oriembo ogendini duto e nyimwa, kaachiel gi jo-Amor, mane odak e pinyno. Wan bende wabiro tiyone Jehova Nyasaye, nikech en e Nyasachwa.”
Joshua nowachone ji niya, “Ok unyal tiyone Jehova Nyasaye. En Nyasaye maler, en Nyasaye ma janyiego. Ok obi wenu kuom wich teko maru kod richo mutimo.
Ka ungʼanyo uweyo Jehova Nyasaye mi utiyo ne nyiseche manono, to obiro lokore mi okelnu thagruok kendo enotieku duto, kata obedo ni ne osedoko jakoru kamano.”
To jo-Israel nodwoko Joshua niya, “Ooyo! Wabiro tiyone Jehova Nyasaye.”
Bangʼe Joshua nowacho niya, “Un uwegi usebedo joneno magu kuom yiero mondo uti ne Jehova Nyasaye.” Negidwoko niya, “Ee, wan joneno.”
Joshua nowacho niya, “Koro wituru nyiseche manono manie dieru mondo uchiw chunyu ni tiyo ne Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel.”
To jogo nowachone Joshua niya, “Wabiro tiyone Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kendo wanamiye luor.”
E odiechiengno Joshua noketo singruok ne jogo, kendo kane gin Shekem nomiyogi chike monego gilu.
Joshua nondiko gigo duto piny e Kitabu mar Chik mar Nyasaye. Bangʼe nokawo kidi maduongʼ mi okete maber e tiend yiend ober but kama ler mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Nowachone jogo niya, “Neuru! Kidini biro bedo janeno kuomu. Osewinjo weche duto ma Jehova Nyasaye osewachonwa. Obiro bedo janeno kuomu ka ubedo jo-miriambo ne Nyasachu.”
Bangʼe Joshua nogolo ji duto mondo odhi kuondegi mane opognigi.
Bangʼ mago duto, Joshua wuod Nun, jatich Jehova Nyasaye, notho ka en gi higni mia achiel gapar.
Kendo ne giike e lope mane opogne, mantiere Timnath Sera e piny gode mag Efraim, mantiere yo nyandwat mar Gash.
Jo-Israel notiyone Jehova Nyasaye e ndalo duto mag ngima Joshua kod jodongo mane osedak higni moloye, kendo mane nigi lony kuom gik moko duto mane Jehova Nyasaye osetimo ni jo-Israel.
To choke Josef, mane jo-Israel nobiro godo koa Misri, noiki Shekem e pinyno mane Jakobo ongʼiewo fedha mia achiel koa kuom yawuot Hamor, ma wuon Shekem. Ma nobedo kaka pok mar nyikwa Josef.
Eliazar wuod Harun bende notho kendo noyike Gibea, kama nopogne wuode Finehas e piny gode mag Efraim.
Bangʼ tho Joshua, jo-Israel nopenjo Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Ere ngʼama biro dhi mokwongo mondo okednwa gi jo-Kanaan?”
Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko niya, “Dhood Juda ema biro dhi mokwongo; nimar asechiwo pinyno e lwetgi.”
Eka jo-Juda nowachone jo-Simeon mowetegi niya, “Biuru kodwa e gwengʼ mosepogwa, mondo waked gi jo-Kanaan. Wan bende wabiro dhi kodu e maru.” Omiyo jo-Simeon nodhi kodgi.
Kane jo-Juda omonjogi, Jehova Nyasaye nochiwo jo-Kanaan kod jo-Perizi e lwetgi kendo neginego ji alufu apar Bezek.
Kanyo ema ne giyudoe Adoni-Bezek kendo negikedo kode, mi giloyo jo-Kanaan gi jo-Perizi.
Adoni-Bezek noringo mondo oyombgi, to ne gilawe ma gimake kendo gingʼado lith lwetene mathuon kod lith tiendene mathuon.
Eka Adoni-Bezek nowacho niya, “Ruodhi piero abiriyo ma lith lwetegi mathuon kod lith tiendegi mathuon osengʼad oko osebedo ka chamo ngʼinjo e bwo mesana. Koro Nyasaye osechula kuom gigo mane atimonegi.” Negikele Jerusalem, kendo notho kanyo.
Jo-Juda bende nomonjo Jerusalem kendo ne gikawe. Negimonjo dala maduongʼno gi ligangla kendo gimoko mach kuome.
Bangʼ mano, jo-Juda nodhi mondo giked gi jo-Kanaan modak e piny manie got Negev kod tiend gode mantiere yo podho chiengʼ.
Negidhi nyime kendo gikedo gi jo-Kanaan modak Hebron (machon ne iluongo ni Kiriath Arba) kendo negiloyo Sheshai, Ahiman kod Talmai.
Koa kanyo negisudo nyime kendo gimonjo joma odak Debir (machon ne iluongo ni Kiriath Sefa).
To Kaleb nowacho niya, “Anachiw nyara Aksa mondo okendi gi ngʼatno manoked ma kaw Kiriath Sefa.”
Othniel wuod Kenaz, ma owadgi Kaleb matin, noloyo pinyno, omiyo Kaleb nomiye nyare Aksa mondo okendi.
Chiengʼ moro achiel kane obiro ir Othniel, nojiwe mondo okwa wuon mare puodho. Kane olor oa e pundane, Kaleb nopenje niya, “En angʼo midwaro ni mondo atimni?”
Nodwoko niya, “Timna ngʼwono makende. Nimar isemiya puodho man Negev, miya bende thidhna mar pi.” Omiyo Kaleb nomiye thidhna ma malo kod mamwalo.
Nyikwa jo-Keni ma jaduongʼ Musa, nodhi koa e Dala Maduongʼ mar Jeriko ka en gi jo-Juda mondo gidag e dier jogo mantiere e thim mar Juda man Negev but Arad.
Eka jo-Juda nodhi gi jo-Simeon mowetegi mi gimonjo jo-Kanaan modak Zefath, kendo negiketho dala maduongʼno chuth. Emomiyo noluonge ni Horma.
Jo-Juda bende nokawo Gaza, Ashkelon kod Ekron, ka dala maduongʼ moro ka moro nigi gwengʼe.
Jehova Nyasaye ne nigi jo-Juda. Negikawo piny gode, to ne ok ginyal riembo joma ne odak e piny pewe, nikech ne gin-gi geche mag chuma.
Kaka Musa ne osesingo, Hebron nomi Kaleb, mane oriembo yawuot Anak adek.
Jo-Benjamin, kata kamano, ne ok nyal loyo jo-Jebus, mane odak Jerusalem; nyaka kawuononi jo-Jebus pod odak kanyo gi jo-Benjamin.
Koro od Josef nomonjo Bethel, kendo Jehova Nyasaye ne ni kode.
Kane gioro ji mondo onon Bethel (machon yande iluongo ni Luz),
jonon pinygo noneno ngʼato ka wuok e dala maduongʼ kendo negiwachone niya, “Kinyiswa e yo midonjogo e dala cha to ok wabi yie mondo gimoro otimi.”
Omiyo nonyisogi, kendo neginego ji duto mane ni e dala maduongʼno gi ligangla makmana ngʼat cha gi joge duto ema notony.
Eka nodhi e piny jo-Hiti, kama nogeroe dala maduongʼ mi ochake ni Luz, ma mano e nyinge nyaka chil kawuono.
To Manase ne ok oriembo jo-Beth Shan kata Tanak kata Dor kata Ibleam kata Megido kod alwora mar kuonde dak-gi, nimar jo-Kanaan noramo ni nyaka gidag e pinyno.
Kane jo-Israel osebedo motegno, negiloko jo-Kanaan wasumbinigi kendo ne ok giriembogi kata matin.
Kata jo-Efraim bende ne ok oriembo jo-Kanaan modak Gezer, to jo-Kanaan ne odhi nyime gidak e diergi.
Jo-Zebulun bende ne ok oriembo jo-Kanaan mane odak Kitron kata Nahahol, mane odongʼ e diergi; to ne gilokogi wasumbinigi.
Jo-Asher bende ne ok oriembo joma ne odak Ako, Sidon, Alab, Akzib, Helba, Afek, kod Rehob,
kamano jo-Asher nodhi nyime mana gidak gi jo-Kanaan kendo ne ok giriembogi.
Jo-Naftali bende ne ok oriembo jogo mane odak Beth Shemesh kod Beth Anath, to negidak e dier jo-Kanaan mane weg pinyno kendo negiloko jogo mane odak Beth Shemesh kod Beth Anath wasumbinigi.
Jo-Amor nochoko jo-Dan kamoro achiel e piny gode, mane ok oyienigi mondo gibi mwalo e piny pewe.
Kendo jo-Amor noramo ni nyaka gidag e Got Heres, Aijalon kod Shalbim, to ka teko mar od Josef nomedore, gin bende nolokgi wasumbini.
Tongʼ mar jo-Amor nochakore Akrabim nyaka Sela kendo mokalo kanyo.
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nodhi koa Gilgal nyaka Bokim kendo nowacho niya, “Ne agolou e piny Misri mi aterou nyaka e piny mane asingo ni anami kwereu, ka awachonegi ni ok anaketh singruokna kodu,
kendo ok unulos winjruok moro gi jopinyni, to unumuk kendegi mag misango. Kata kamano, ok useluora. En angʼo momiyo usetimo ma?
Emomiyo koro anyisou ni ok anariembgi oko e nyimu; ginibed kuthe e ringreu kendo nyisechegi nobed tembe ne un.”
Kane malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nosewacho wechegi ne jo-Israel duto, ji noywak matek,
kendo negiluongo kanyo ni Bokim. Kanyo ne gichiwoe misengini ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Bangʼ ka Joshua nosegolo jo-Israel, negidhi mondo gikaw pinyno, ka ngʼato ka ngʼato yudo pokne.
Ji notiyone Jehova Nyasaye e ndalo duto mag ngima Joshua kod jodongo mane osedak higni moloye kendo mane oseneno gigo madongo ma Jehova Nyasaye osetimo ni Israel.
Joshua wuod Nun, jatich Jehova Nyasaye, notho ka en ja-higni mia achiel gapar.
Kendo ne giike e lope mane opogne mantiere Timnath Sera e piny gode mag Efraim, mantiere yo nyandwat mar Got Gash.
Bangʼ ka tiengʼno duto noseyweyo kod kweregi, tiengʼ machielo nochako dongo, mane ok ongʼeyo Jehova Nyasaye kata gima nosetimone jo-Israel.
Eka jo-Israel notimo timbe mamono e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo gitiyone Baal.
Negijwangʼo Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach kweregi, mane ogologi e piny Misri. Negilamo nyiseche mopogore opogore mag ogendini mane odak e pinyno. Negimiyo Jehova Nyasaye mirima,
nikech ne gijwangʼe kendo gitiyone Baal kod jo-Ashtoreth.
Jehova Nyasaye nobedo gi mirima gi jo-Israel mochiwogi e lwet wasikgi mondo omonjgi. Ne ochiwogi e lwet wasikgi kuonde duto mane ok ginyal tony.
Kinde duto mane jo-Israel odhi kedo, lwet Jehova Nyasaye ne kelonegi chandruok, mana kaka ne osekwongʼorenigi, kendo ne gin e chandruok maduongʼ.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowalo jongʼad bura, mane okonyogi e lwet joma sandogi.
Kata kamano ne ok ginyal winjo jongʼad bura mag-gi, to negidhi nyime gitimo timbe dwanyruok kendo lamo nyiseche manono. Piyo piyo nono ne gibaro mi giweyo rito chike mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo kweregi kendo ne ok gimiye luor.
Kinde ka kinde ma Jehova Nyasaye nokelonegi jangʼad bura, nokonyo jangʼad burano kendo noresogi e lwet wasikgi ndalo duto mane jangʼad burano pod ngima; nimar Jehova Nyasaye ne kechogi nikech wasikgi ne thirogi kendo hinyogi malit.
To ka jangʼad bura notho, ji noduogo e timbe mangʼeny mag anjawo moloyo kata mago mag kweregi, ka giluwo bangʼ nyiseche mamoko kendo tiyonegi kendo ka gilamogi. Negitamore weyo timbegi mamono kod timbegi mag wich teko.
Kuom mano, mirima nomako Jehova Nyasaye gi jo-Israel kendo nowacho niya, “Nikech ogandani osejwangʼo singruok mane aketo gi kweregi kendo ok gisewinja,
ok anariemb oganda mane Joshua otho oweyo mondo oa e nyimgi.
Anati kodgi kuom temo Israel mondo ane ka ginyalo rito yo Jehova Nyasaye kendo wuothoe yorno kaka kweregi notimo.”
Jehova Nyasaye noyiene ogandago mondo odongʼ, kendo ne ok oriembogi kata chiwogi e lwet Joshua.
Magi e oganda mane Jehova Nyasaye oweyo mondo otem jo-Israel duto mane ok osekalo e lweny moro amora e piny Kanaan.
Mano notimo mana mondo opuonjgo nyikwa jo-Israel lweny, mago mane onge gi lony e kedo.
Ogendinigo ne gin: ruodhi abich mag jo-Filistia, jo-Kanaan duto, jo-Sidon, kod jo-Hivi mane odak e gode mag Lebanon kochakore got Baal Hermon nyaka got Lebo Hamath.
Jehova Nyasaye nowegi mondo otemgo jo-Israel kendo ongʼego ka ginyalo rito chike mane omiyo kweregi kokalo kuom Musa.
Jo-Israel nodak e kind jo-Kanaan, jo-Hiti, jo-Amor, jo-Perizi, jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus.
Negikendo nyi ogendinigo bangʼe negichiwo nyigi mondo okend gi yawuot pinjego kendo negilamo nyisechegi.
Jo-Israel notimo tim mamono e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye; ne wigi owil gi Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi mi gitiyone Baal kod Ashera.
Mirimb Jehova Nyasaye mager nobiro kuom jo-Israel ma nojwangʼogi e lwet jo-Kushan-Rishathaim ruodh Aram-Naharaim, ma jo-Israel nobedo wasumbinigi kuom higni aboro.
To kane giywakne Jehova Nyasaye, nochiwonegi jakony, ma en Othniel wuod Kenaz, owadgi Kaleb matin, mane oresogi.
Roho mar Jehova Nyasaye nobiro kuome, mi nobedo jangʼad bura mar jo-Israel kendo negidhi e lweny. Jehova Nyasaye nochiwo Kushan-Rishathaim ruodh Aram e lwet Othniel, mane oloye.
Omiyo piny nobedo gi kwe kuom higni piero angʼwen; nyaka Othniel wuod Kenaz notho.
Jo-Israel nochako timo timbe mamono e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye, kendo nikech timno, Jehova Nyasaye nochiwogi e lwet Eglon ruodh Moab.
Eglon kaachiel gi jo-Amon kod jo-Amalek, nobiro momonjo jo-Israel, mi gikawo Dala Maduongʼ mar Jeriko.
Jo-Israel nobedo e bwo loch Eglon ruodh Moab kuom higni apar gaboro.
Jo-Israel nochako oywak ne Jehova Nyasaye mi nomiyogi jakony, Ehud, wuod Gera ja-Benjamin, mane racham. Jo-Israel noore gi chudo ir Eglon ruodh Moab.
Ehud nothedho pand ligangla ma dhoge ariyo ma borne dirom fut achiel gi nus, mane oliere e bamne korachwich ei lepe.
Ne ochiwo chudo ne Eglon ruodh Moab, mane ngʼat machwe ahinya.
Bangʼ ka Ehud nosechiwo chudo, nooro jogo mane okelo chudo mondo odogi.
Kane oneno gigo mopa man Gilgal ne olokore en owuon kendo owacho niya, “An kodi gi wach ma lingʼ-lingʼ, yaye ruoth.” Ruoth nowacho niya, “Lingʼ thi!” Kendo joge duto mantie noa moweye.
Eka Ehud nosudo ire kama nobetie kende e agola ma malo mar ode mar yweyo, mane ojabetie ndalo oro mi owacho niya, “Nyasaye oora iri.” Ka Ruoth noa malo e kome,
Ehud norieyo bade koracham, mi owuodho ligangla koa e bamne korachwich kendo ochwoyo ii ruoth.
Ligangla nodonjo e iye molal kuno gi loge duto motuch nyaka e dier ngʼeye oko. Ehud ne ok opudho liganglano oko, kendo bor noume.
Eka Ehud nowuok gie otuchi manie wi tado; nochiego dhoudi manie agola mamalo mi olorogi.
Bangʼ kane osedhi, jotich nobiro kendo oyudo ka dhoudi manie agola mamalo olor. Negiwacho niya, “Nyaka bed ni okonyore e agola ma iye mar ot.”
Negirito ma wigi okuot, to kane ok oyawo dhout agola, negikawo kifungu kendo giyawogi. Kanyo negineno ruodhgi koriere e dier ot, kosetho.
Kane pod girito, Ehud noluchore mi owuok odhi. Ne okalo machiegni gi gik mopa mi opondo odhi Seira.
Kane ochopo kanyo, nogoyo turumbete e piny gode mag Efraim, kendo jo-Israel nolor kode piny koa e got, ka otelonegi.
Nowachonegi niya, “Luwauru, nimar Jehova Nyasaye osechiwo Moab, jasiku, e lwetu.” Omiyo ne giluwe kendo negikawo bath aora Jordan mane ochiko yo Moab, maonge ngʼama ne nyalo pondo mondo okadh aora Jordan.
E sechego neginego jo-Moab madirom alufu apar, jogo mongirore kendo maroteke; maonge ngʼama nopondo kata achiel.
Chiengʼno Moab nobedo e bwo loch Israel, kendo piny nobedo gi kwe kuom higni piero aboro.
Bangʼ Ehud, Shamgar wuod Anath nobiro, en ema ne onego jo-Filistia mia auchiel gi bidhi. En bende noreso jo-Israel.
Bangʼ ka Ehud nosetho, jo-Israel nochako otimo tim mamono e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye.
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye nousogi ne Jabin, ruodh Kanaan, ma loch mare neni Hazor. Jatend jolweny mage ne en Sisera, manodak Harosheth Hagoyim.
Nikech ne en-gi geche chuma mia ochiko kendo notiyo jo-Israel gachuna kuom higni piero ariyo, ne giywakne Jehova Nyasaye mondo oresgi.
Debora, janabi madhako, ma chi Lapidoth, notelo ne jo-Israel e kindeno.
Nobedo gi kar ngʼado bura e bwo Yadh Othith mar Debora mantiere kind Rama kod Bethel manie piny gode mar Efraim, kendo jo-Israel ne biro ire kanyo mondo ongʼadnegi bura.
Noluongo Barak wuod Abinoam moa Kedesh man Naftali kendo owachone niya, “Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, chiki ni, ‘Dhiyo, ikaw ji alufu apar mag Naftali kod Zebulun kendo itelnegi ka udhi e Got Tabor.
Abiro wuondo Sisera, jatend jolwenj Jabin, kanyakla gi gechene kod ogandage mag lweny nyaka e Aora Kishon kendo achiwe e lweti.’ ”
Barak nowachone niya, “Ka idhi koda, abiro dhi; to ka ok idhi koda, to ok abi dhi.”
Debora nowachone niya, “Mano kare, abiro dhi kodi. To nikech yo ma itimoe gini duongʼ, ok nobed mari, nimar Jehova Nyasaye nochiw Sisera ne dhako.” Omiyo Debora nodhi gi Barak nyaka Kedesh,
kama noluonge Zebulun kod Naftali. Ji alufu apar noluwo bangʼe, kendo Debora bende nodhi kode.
Koro Heber ja-Keni noseweyo jo-Keni ma nyikwa Hobab, ma en or Musa, kendo oguro hembe machiegni gi yien maduongʼ man Zananim but Kedesh.
Kane ginyiso Sisera ni Barak wuod Abinoam nosedhi Got Tabor,
Sisera nochoko kanyakla gechene mag chuma mia ochiko kod chwo duto kode, koa Harosheth Hagoyim nyaka e Aora Kishon.
Eka Debora nowachone Barak niya, “Dhiyo! Ma e odiechiengʼ ma Jehova Nyasaye osechiwo Sisera e lweti. Donge Jehova Nyasaye osedhi nyimi?” Omiyo Barak nodhi e Got Tabor, kiluwe gi ji alufu apar.
Kaka Barak ne sudo machiegni, Jehova Nyasaye nogoyo Sisera, jolweny mage kod gechene gi kihondko kendo Sisera nojwangʼo gache mi oringo gi tiende.
To Barak nodhi nyime gi lawo geche kod jolweny ma ochopo Harosheth Hagoyim. Oganda lweny duto mar Sisera noneg gi ligangla; kendo onge ngʼama notony.
Kata kamano, Sisera, noringo nyaka e hemb Jael, ma chi Heber ja-Keni, nikech ne nitie osiep e kind Jabin ruodh Hazor kod anywola Heber ja-Keni.
Jael nowuok mondo orom gi Sisera kendo owachone niya, “Bi, ruodha, donji. Kik iluor.” Omiyo nodonjo ei hembe, kendo noume.
Nowacho niya, “Awinjo riyo. Kiyie to miya pi amodhi.” Noyawo chupa mar chak, momiye omadho, bangʼe oume kendo.
Nowachone niya, “Chungʼ e dhood hema. Ka ngʼato obiro kendo openji ni, ‘Bende ngʼato nitiere ka?’ To wachne ni, ‘Ooyo.’ ”
Jael, ma chi Heber, nokawo sigingi mar hema kod nyundo kendo nodhi ire mapiyo kama nindo nogoye ngoga, kendo ool. Nopowo iye gi sigingino nyaka e lowo, mi otho.
Barak nobiro kolawo Sisera, kendo Jael nowuok mondo orom kode. Nowachone niya, “Bi, abiro nyisi ngʼat ma imanyo.” Omiyo nodhi kode, kendo kanyo Sisera nonindo gi sigingi kopowo iye kosetho.
E odiechiengno Nyasaye nomako Jabin, ruodh Kanaan, e nyim jo-Israel.
Chakre e kindeno Israel nobedo motegno mine giloyo Jabin ruodh Kanaan.
Chiengʼno Debora kod Barak wuod Abinoam nowero wendni:
“Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye nikech jotelo mag Israel okawo loch, kendo ji giwegi ochiwore mar luwogi!
“Winjuru, un ruodhi! Chikuru itu, un jotelo! Abiro pako Jehova Nyasaye ka awerne; anachuog ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel wer.
“Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, piny noyiengni, kendo polo nogingore, mi koth ochwe kane iwuok Seir e piny Edom.
Got Sinai noyiengni e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel.
“E ndalo mag Shamgar wuod Anath, kendo e ndalo Jael, yore nojwangʼ, mi jowuoth ne luwo yore matindo.
Teko mar jolweny e miech Israel norumo, manyaka an Debora nabiro, ma abedo ka min ji e piny Israel.
Kane giyiero nyiseche manyien, lweny nochakore e dhorangeye mag dala maduongʼ, kata mana okumba kod tongʼ ne ok oyudie kind jolwenj jo-Israel alufu piero angʼwen.
Opak Jehova Nyasaye nikech chunya nigi jotend jo-Israel, kaachiel gi jogo mochiwore!
“Un joma oidho punde marochere, kobedo e matandiko molos gi ongede, kendo un joma wuotho e wangʼ yo, winjuru,
dwond joma wer koa kuonde mamon umboe pi; ka giwero timbe makare mag Jehova Nyasaye, kendo ka gipako timbe makare mag jolweny mage mager man Israel. “Bangʼ mano oganda Jehova Nyasaye nodhi e dhorangeye mag dala maduongʼ.
Debora, chiew, chiew! ‘Chungi kendo ia malo mondo ichak wer! Aa malo, yaye Barak! Ter jogo miseloyo e twech, yaye wuod Abinoam.’
“Eka jogo mane owe nobiro ir ruodhi; oganda Jehova Nyasaye nobiro ira gi teko duto.
Jomoko kuomgi nowuok e gode mag Efraim, ogandagi nodak Amalek, kendo joma noa Benjamin noluwo bangʼu. Jotend lweny noa Makir nobiro, kendo joma noa Zebulun notingʼo ludh jatend lweny.
Jotend Isakar ne nigi Debora; adier, Isakar ne nigi Barak, koreto bangʼe ka gichiko holo. To e gwenge mag Reuben ne nitiere nono chuny matut.
En angʼo momiyo ne usiko ka uoyo maj jokwath mondo omi uwinj ka jokwath liyo ni rombe? To e gwenge mag Reuben ne nitiere nono chuny matut.
Gilead nodongʼ loka Jordan. To angʼo momiyo Dan nogalore but meli? Asher to nodongʼ e dho nam mi gidak e dho wedhe kuma yiedhi gowe.
Jo-Zebulun nochiwo ngimagi ne tho; kamano bende Naftali noketo mare e kuonde kedo.
“Ruodhi mag Kanaan nobiro, mokedo; Tanak machiegni gi pige mag Megido, to ne ok gidhi gi fedha, kata kawo gimoro amora moyako.
Koa e polo, sulwe nokedo, koa kama gichakore negikedo gi Sisera.
Aora Kishon noywoyogi, aora ma hike ngʼeny, aora Kishon. Dhi nyime, chunya; bed motegno!
Bangʼ mano mor mar tiende farese nowinji kachikore gi teko mangʼeny.
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni, ‘Okwongʼ Meroz kaachiel gi joge gi kwongʼ malit, nikech ne ok gibiro mondo gikony Jehova Nyasaye e lwet joma tek.’
“Jael ma chi Heber ja-Keni en dhako mogwedhi kuom mon duto, kendo ogwedhe moloyo mon duto modak e hema.
Nokwayo pi modho, to nomiye chak; nokelone chak mopwo e bakul moromo ruoth chiemoe.
Norieyo lwete mondo okaw sigingi mar hema, ka lwete korachwich nokawogo twor. Nogoyo Sisera, motoyo wiye, kendo nopowo lela wangʼe.
Nopodho e tiende, mogore piny; kendo kanyo ema nothoe. Adier, nopodho e tiende, mogore piny; kendo kama nopodhoeno, ema nogore piny motho.
“Min Sisera ne ngʼicho gie dirisa; kaywak kama: ‘Angʼo momiyo gache odeko kapok obiro? Angʼo momiyo mor mar gechene ok winjre?’
Achiel kuom jotichne ma nyiri mariek nodwoke; kawuoyo kende kama:
‘Donge gipogo gik moyaki ka ngʼato ka ngʼato yudo nyako achiel kata ariyo, kendo imiyo Sisera lewni mabeyo kaachiel gi lewni mabeyo motwangʼ mongʼith, monego arwaki?’
“Omiyo mad wasikgi duto rum, yaye Jehova Nyasaye! To mad joma oheri chal gi chiengʼ, mawuok gi teko.” Bangʼ mano piny Israel nobedo gi kwe kuom higni piero angʼwen.
Jo-Israel nochako otimo timbe mamono e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, kendo kuom higni abiriyo nochiwogi e lwet jo-Midian.
Nikech jo-Midian ne keto ji gi tich matek mar achuna, jo-Israel nogero kuonde pondo e tiend got, rogo kod kuonde moko ma ginyalo dakie.
Kinde ka kinde mane jo-Israel opidho cham mag-gi, jo-Midian, jo-Amalek kod jogo moa yo wuok chiengʼ ne monjo piny.
Negichokore e pinyno kendo negiketho cham duto nyaka Gaza kendo onge gima ngima kaka rombe kata dhok kata punde mane giweyo e piny Israel.
Negibiro gi jambgi kod hembegi machal gi kweth mar dede. Kar kwan jogo kaachiel gi ngamia mag-gi ne tek ngʼeyo, kendo negimonjo pinyno mi gikethe.
Jo-Midian nokelone jo-Israel dhier maduongʼ mane giywakne Jehova Nyasaye mondo okonygi.
Ka jo-Israel noywak ne Jehova Nyasaye nikech jo-Midian,
nooronegi janabi, mane owachonegi niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, wacho: Nagolou e piny Misri, kuma ne unie wasumbini.
Ne agolou e loch jo-Misri kendo aresou e lwet joma ne sandou. Ne ariembogi gia e nyimu kendo amiyou pinygi.
Ne awachonu niya, ‘An Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu; kik ulam nyiseche jo-Amor, makoro udak e pinygi.’ To pod ok udewo winja.”
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nobiro mobet e tiend yiend ober moro mantiere Ofra mane mar Joash ma ja-Abiezer, kama wuod Gideon ne dinoe ngano mondo kik jo-Midian yude.
Ka malaika nofwenyore ne Gideon, nowacho niya, “Jehova Nyasaye ni kodi, in jalweny maratego.”
To Gideon nodwoke niya, “Ruodha, ka Jehova Nyasaye nikodwa, to angʼo momiyo magi duto osetimorenwa? Ere honni duto mane kwerewa onyisowa kagiwacho ni, ‘Donge Jehova Nyasaye ema nogolowa e piny Misri?’ To koro Jehova Nyasaye osejwangʼowa mi oketowa e lwet jo-Midian.”
Jehova Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “Gi teko ma in-go, dhiyo kendo ires jo-Israel e lwet jo-Midian. Donge an ema aori?”
Gideon nopenje niya, “To Ruoth, ere kaka anyalo reso jo-Israel? Anywolana ema nyape mogik ei Manase, kendo an ema atin e odwa.”
Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko niya, “Anabed kodi, kendo ibiro nego jo-Midian duto.”
Gideon nodwoko niya, “Ka koro ayudo ngʼwono e nyim wangʼi, to miya ranyisi ni in ema iwuoyo koda.
Kiyie to kik iwuog ka nyaka abi kendo akel misango mara mi achiwe e nyimi.” To Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Abiro rito nyaka iduogi.”
Gideon nodhi, moyangʼo nyadiel kendo otedo, bangʼe nokawo mogo madirom kilo piero ariyo gariyo mi olosogo makati ma ok oketie thowi koketo ringʼo e adita kod kate e tawo, nokelogi oko kendo ochiwogi ne Jehova Nyasaye e tiend yiend ober.
Malaika mar Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Kaw ringʼono kod makati ma ok oketie thowi, ketgi e lwandani, kendo iol kado piny.” Kendo Gideon notimo kamano.
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nomulo ringʼo kod makati ma ok oketie thowi gi wi luth mane otingʼo e lwete. Mach nowuok e lwanda, mowangʼo ringʼo kod makati pep. Kendo malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye nolal nono e wangʼe.
Kane Gideon ofwenyo ni ne en malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye, nowacho niya, “Yaye, Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto! Aseneno malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye wangʼ gi wangʼ!”
To Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Bed gi kwe! Kik iluor. Ok nitho.”
Omiyo Gideon nogero ne Jehova Nyasaye kendo mar misango mi oluongo kanyo ni Jehova Nyasaye en Kwe. Kendono pod ni Ofra kuno e piny jo-Abiezer nyaka chil kawuono.
Otienono Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Kaw rwath mar ariyo koa e kweth wuonu, ma hike abiriyo. Muk kendo wuonu mar misango ne Baal kendo ingʼad siro mar Ashera man bute.
Eka iger kendo mar misango malongʼo ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ewi kama otingʼore maloni mondo ichiw rwath mar ariyo kaka misango miwangʼo pep, kitiyo gi yiend Ashera mane ingʼado.”
Omiyo Gideon nokawo jotijene apar kendo notimo kaka Jehova Nyasaye nowachone. Notimo tijno gotieno ma ok odiechiengʼ nikech noluoro jo-dalagi kod joodgi.
Gokinyi ka joma ni e dalano nochiewo, negiyudo ka kar wangʼo misango mar Baal omuki, ka yiend Ashera mane ni bute bende ongʼadi kendo ka rwath mar ariyo ochiw ka misango e kendo mar misango mane oger manyien!
Negipenjore kendgi niya, “En ngʼa motimo ma?” Kane ginono matut, nowachnegi niya, “Gideon wuod Joash ema osetimo ma.”
Jo-dalano nowachone Joash niya, “Gol wuodi oko. Nyaka otho nikech oseketho kendo mar misango mar Baal kendo ongʼado yiend Ashera man bute.”
To Joash nodwoko oganda mager mane ni bute niya, “Un ema uwuoyo e lo Baal? Utemo rese? Ngʼato angʼata mokedone enonege gokinyi! Ka Baal en nyasaye, to onyalo resore kende owuon kuom ngʼama muko kendone mar misango.”
Omiyo odiechiengno negichako Gideon ni Jerub-Baal, kagiwacho niya, “We Baal otiek kode,” nikech nomuko kendo mar misango mar Baal.
Koro jo-Midian duto gi jo-Amalek kod jogo moa yo wuok chiengʼ noriwore e lweny ma gingʼado aora Jordan kendo gigo kambi e Holo mar Jezreel.
Eka Roho mar Jehova Nyasaye nobiro kuom Gideon, kendo nogoyo turumbete, kowachoni jo-Abiezer mondo oluw bangʼe.
Nooro joote odhi Manase duto, koluongogi mondo gitingʼ gige lweny, kendo gidhi ir Asher, Zebulun kod Naftali, mondo gin bende gidhi girom kode.
Gideon nowachone Nyasaye niya, “Ka inires jo-Israel kokalo kuoma kaka ne isingo,
to abiro keto pien rombo kar dino cham. Kapo ni pien rombono thoo omokoe, to lowo molwore odongʼ kotwo, eka anangʼe ni ibiro reso jo-Israel gi lweta kaka ne iwacho.”
Kendo mano e gima notimore. Gideon nochiewo gokinyi mangʼich; nobiyo pien-no ma thoo owuok madirom bakul achiel.
Eka Gideon nowachone Nyasaye niya, “Kik iyi wangʼ koda. We mondo akwayi kwayo achiel makende. Yiena mana tem achiel kende gi pien. E kindeno, pien mondo obed kotwo, to lowo molwore obed gi thoo.”
Otienono Nyasaye notimo kamano. Pien kende ema ne otwo; to lowo duto molwore ne thoo omoke.
Gokinyi mangʼich, Jerub-Baal (mano en Gideon) kod joge duto nojot e soko mar Harod. Kambi jo-Midian ne nitiere yo nyandwat margi e holo man but got More.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Gideon niya, “In-gi ji mangʼeny ma ok anyal chiwo jo-Midian e lwetgi. Mondo kik jo-Israel sungrena ni tekogi ema oresogi,
go milome ne ji ni, ‘Ngʼato angʼata ma luoro omako ogom kendo oa e Got Gilead.’ ” Omiyo ji alufu piero ariyo gariyo noa, to ji alufu apar nodongʼ.
To Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko Gideon niya, “Pod nitie ji mangʼeny ahinya. Kawgi itergi e pi, kendo abiro miyogi penj kuno. Ka awacho ni, ‘Ma biro dhi kodi,’ to obiro dhi; to ka awacho ni, ‘Ma ok bi dhi kodi,’ to ok obi dhi.”
Omiyo Gideon noterogi e dho pi. Kanyo Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Pog jogo magado pi gi lewgi kaka guok kuom jogo magoyo chong-gi piny mondo omodhi.”
Ji mia adek nogado pi gi lwetgi. Jogo modongʼ nogoyo chonggi piny mondo gimodhi.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Gideon niya, “Kuom ji mia adek mane ogado pi gi lwetgi, anaresu kendo achiw jo-Midian e lwetu. We ji mamoko odhi, ka moro ka moro dok dalane.”
Omiyo Gideon nooro jo-Israel mamoko e hembegi, to ji mia adek mane odongʼ-go nokawo chiemo kod turumbete mag joma nodok e miechgi. Kambi jo-Midian ne ni e holo gi mwalo.
Otienono Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Gideon niya, “Aa malo, dhiyo imonj kambi, nikech adhi chiwe e lweti.
Kiluor mar monjogi, to dhi e kambi gi jatichni Pura
kendo ichik iti iwinj gima giwacho. Bangʼe, inibed gi mijingʼo mar monjo kambino.” Omiyo en kod Pura jatichne negidhi machiegni gi kambi.
Jo-Midian, jo-Amalek kod jogo moa yo wuok chiengʼ nojot e holo mane oyugno ka kama bonyo ochokore. Ne gin gi ngamia mangʼeny mane ok nyal kwan mana ka kwoyo manie dho nam.
Gideon nochopo mana ka ngʼat moro ne nyiso osiepene lek. Ngʼatno ne wachone osiepene niya, “Ne aleko ni makati molos gi mogo mar shairi molworore nobiro e kambi jo-Midian. Nogoyo hema gi teko ma hema olokore kendo olwar piny.”
Osiepne nodwoko niya, “Ma ok en wach moro machielo makmana ligangla mar Gideon wuod Joash, ma ja-Israel. Nyasaye osechiwo jo-Midian kod kambi duto e lwete.”
Ka Gideon nowinjo lekno kod kaka oloke, nopako Nyasaye. Nodok e kambi jo-Israel kendo owacho niya, “Chungʼuru malo! Jehova Nyasaye osechiwo jo-Midian e lwetu.”
Nopogo ji mia adekgo e migepe adek, komiyogi duto turumbete kod njagi maonge gimoro e iye e lwetgi, ka nitiere toch ei njagigo.
Nowachonegi niya, Luwauru ka ungʼiyo kendo ka achopo but hema, to timuru mana kaka atimo.
Ka agoyo turumbete kaachiel jogo duto ma an-go, eka un joma uselworo kambi bende ugo turumbete ka ukok niya, “Wakedo ni Jehova Nyasaye kod Gideon.”
Gideon kod ji mia achiel mane ni kode nochopo e bath kambi chuny otieno, mana bangʼ kane gisewilo jorito. Negigoyo turumbetegi kendo gitoyo agulni mane ni e lwetegi.
Kambi adekgi nogoyo turumbete kendo gitoyo njagi. Ka gimako toje gi lwetgi koracham kendo ka gitingʼo turumbete mane onego gi goo gi lwetgi korachwich, ne gikok niya, “Ligangla en mar Jehova Nyasaye kod Gideon!”
E sa ma ngʼato ka ngʼato nokawo kare ka gilworo kambi, jo-Midian duto noringo, kendo negiringo ka giywak.
E sa ma turumbete mia adekgo nogoo, Jehova Nyasaye noketo ji duto mane ni e kambi ochako kedo e kindgi giwegi ka ginegore gi ligangla. Jolweny noringo odhi Beth Shitta kochiko Zerera mochopo nyaka e tongʼ mar Abel Mehola man but Tabath.
Noluong jo-Israel moa Naftali, Asher kod Manase, kendo negilawo jo-Midian.
Gideon nooro joote e piny gode mag Efraim duto, kowacho, “Biuru uked kod jo-Midian kendo udhi nyimgi ma umak pige mag Jordan mochopo nyaka Beth Bara.” Omiyo jo-Efraim duto nowuok oko kendo negikawo pige mag Jordan mochopo Beth Bara.
Negimako bende jotelo ariyo mag jo-Midian, Oreb kod Zeb. Neginego Oreb e lwanda mar Oreb, kod Zeb e kar biyo divai mar Zeb. Negilawo jo-Midian kendo gikelo wiye Oreb kod Zeb ni Gideon, kama ne entie but aora Jordan.
Jo-Efraim nopenjo Gideon niya, “Angʼo ma omiyo isetimonwa kama? Angʼo ma notami luongowa kane idhi kedo gi jo-Midian?” Omiyo negidhawo kode matek.
To nodwokogi niya, “Angʼo ma asetimo kipimo gi gima usetimo? Donge mzabibu mag Efraim modongʼ ber moloyo keyo maduongʼ mar mzabibu mar Abiezer?
Nyasaye nochiwo Oreb kod Zeb, jotend jo-Midian, e lwetgi. En angʼo mane anyalo timo kipimo gi gima usetimo?” Kuom mano, ich wangʼ margi norumo.
Kata obedo ni Gideon gi joge mia adek nool kamano, negimedo lawo ruodhi mag Midian mi gingʼado aora Jordan.
Nowachone jo-Sukoth niya, “Miuru joga ma jolweny makati nikech giol, kendo pod alawo Zeba kod Zalmuna, ma gin ruodhi jo-Midian.”
To jotelo mag Sukoth nowacho niya, “Bende usemako Zeba kod Zalmuna? Ere kaka dwami jolweny magi moolgi makati?”
Eka Gideon nodwoko niya, “Nikech gima uwacho, ka Jehova Nyasaye osechiwo Zeba gi Zalmuna e lweta, to abiro yuyo ringreu gi pedo kod matata.”
Noa kanyo kodhi Peniel kendo ochiwonegi kwayo makamano, to negidwoko mana kaka jo-Sukoth nowacho.
Omiyo nowachone jo-Peniel niya, “Ka aduogo gi loch, to abiro muko bath ohinga moger motingʼore gi malo.”
Noyudo ka Zeba gi Zalmuna neni Karkor kaachiel gi jolweny mage manyalo romo ji alufu apar gabich, ne gin jolweny mane odongʼ kuom jolweny mag wuok chiengʼ, to jolweny alufu mia achiel gi piero ariyo nonegi e lweny.
Gideon nodhi koluwo yo jokwath mantiere yo wuok chiengʼ mar Noba kod Jogbeha mi nodonjo kuom jolweny mamoko apoya.
Zeba gi Zalmuna, ma ruodhi ariyo mag Midian, noringo, to nolawogi mi omakogi, kendo makogino nokelo luoro maduongʼ ne jolwenjgi.
Bangʼ mano Gideon wuod Joash noduogo koa e lweny koluwo yor Heres.
Nomako wuod Sukoth mi openje penjo, kendo wuowino nondikone nying ruodhi piero abiro gabiriyo mag Sukoth.
Eka Gideon nobiro mi owachone jo-Sukoth niya, “Eri Zeba gi Zalmuna, mane osemiyo uchaya kuwacho ni, ‘Bende usemako Zeba gi Zalmuna? Ere kaka dwami jolweny magi moolgi makati?’ ”
Nokawo jodong dalano mi okawo pedo kod matata mokumogo jo-Sukoth.
Bende nomuko kama oger motingʼore gi malo mar Peniel mi onego jo-dalano.
Eka nopenjo Zeba kod Zalmuna niya, “Ne inego ji machalo nade Tabor?” Negidwoke niya, “Ji machalo kodi, ma ngʼato ka ngʼato ne nigi kido machalo mar ruoth.”
Gideon nodwoko niya, “Mago ne owetena, yawuot minwa owuon. Akwongʼora gi nying Jehova Nyasaye mangima ni ka dine ingʼwononegi, to dine ok anegou.”
Eka nonyiso wuode maduongʼ miluongo ni Jetha niya, “Neg-gi!” To Jetha ne ok owuodho liganglane, nikech ne pod en rawera kendo noluor.
