Ruoth nobwok motetni. Noidho malo e ot man ewi rangach mi oywak. Noywak kowacho niya, “Yaye wuoda Abisalom, wuoda, wuoda Abisalom! Onego an ema ne atho kari, yaye Abisalom wuoda, wuoda!”
Nowach ne Joab niya, “Ruoth dengo malit kaywago Abisalom.”
Loch machiengʼno nolokore ywak ni jolweny, nikech migepe mag jolweny, nowinjo kiwacho niya, “Ruoth okuyo nikech tho wuode.”
Ji nodonjo lingʼ-lingʼ e dala maduongʼ chiengʼno mana kaka joma oloo e lweny duogo alucha ka wigi okuot.
To ruoth noumo wangʼe, koywak matek niya, “Yaye Abisalom wuoda! Yaye Abisalom wuoda, wuoda!”
Eka Joab nodhi ei ot ir ruoth mowacho niya, “Kawuononi isekuodo wi jogi duto, ma osereso ngimani, ngima yawuoti gi nyigi to gi ngima mondi to gi mondi mamoko.
Ihero joma ochayi to ichayo joma oheri. Kawuono inyiso ratiro ni jotend lweny gi jolwenygi ok gimoro e nyimi. Aneno ni dine imor ka Abisalom ngima kawuono to wan duto ne watho.
Koro wuogi oko mondo iho jogi. An gadiera e nying Jehova Nyasaye ni ka ok iwuok oko, to otieno ma kawuono onge kata mana ngʼato achiel ma biro bedo kodi. Mano nobedni masira maduongʼ moloyo masiche duto miseneno nyaka ia e nyathi.”
Omiyo ruoth nochungʼ modhi obet e kome e dhorangach. Eka nonyis jolweny ni, Ruoth obet e dhorangach, kendo giduto negibiro mi gichungʼ e nyime. Koro nonwangʼo ka jo-Israel noseringo odhi e miechgi.
Ji ne mino wach kendgi e dhout Israel duto kagiwacho niya, “Ruoth noresowa e lwet wasikwa; en ema noresowa e lwet jo-Filistia. To koro sani oseringo oa e pinywani nikech wach Abisalom;
kendo Abisalom mane wawiro mondo obed ruodhwa bende osetho e lweny. Mara angʼo ulingʼ alingʼa ma ok uwuo e wach mar duogo ruoth?”
Ruoth Daudi nooro wachni ne Zadok gi Abiathar, ma jodolo kama: “Penjuru jodong Juda ni, ‘Angʼo momiyo dudongʼ chien kuom dwoko ruoth dalane, nimar weche mane iwacho e Israel duto osechopo ni ruoth e kar dakne?
Un e owetena kendo une remba. Marangʼo un ema dudongʼ chien kuom duogo ruoth?’
Kendo wachne Amasa ni, ‘Donge in wadwa ma remba? Mad Nyasaye kuma malit ahinya ka dipo ni ok aketi jatend jolweny sani kar Joab.’ ”
Ne oloko pach jo-Juda duto mane gibedo gi paro achiel. Ne giorone ruoth wach niya, “Duogi gi jogi duto.”
Eka ruoth nodok mochopo nyaka Jordan. Nonwangʼo ka jo-Juda osebiro Gilgal mondo gidhi giromne ruoth kendo gingʼad kode aora Jordan.
Shimei wuod Gera, ja-Benjamin moa Bahurim, noreto kolor piny kaachiel gi jo-Juda mondo girom ni Ruoth Daudi.
Jo-Benjamin alufu achiel ne ni kode, kaachiel Ziba, ma jatend jorit mwandu mar od Saulo, to gi yawuote apar gabich kod jotije piero ariyo. Negireto ka gidhi Jordan, kuma ruoth ne nitie.
Negingʼado kar dho wath mondo gikaw ruoth gi joode mane ni loka kendo gitim gimoro amora modwaro. Kane Shimei wuod Gera nongʼado Jordan, nopodho auma e nyim ruoth
mowachone niya, “Mad ruodha kik kwana ka jaketho. Kik ipar kaka jatichni notimo marach chiengʼ ma ruodha ma en ruoth nowuok Jerusalem. Mad ruoth wiye wil.
Nimar an jatichni angʼeyo nine atimo richo, to koro asebiro kaka ngʼat mokwongo moa e dhood Josef mosebiro mwalo ka mondo aromni ruodha ma en ruoth?”
Eka Abishai wuod Zeruya nowacho niya, “Donge Shimei onego neg nikech ma? Nokwongʼo ngʼat Jehova Nyasaye mowir.”
Daudi nodwoko niya, “Angʼo machandou koda un yawuot Zeruya? Kawuono usedoko jowasika! Bende onego neg ngʼato e Israel kawuono? Donge angʼeyo ni an ruoth e Israel kawuono?”
Omiyo nowacho ni Shimei niya, “Ok ibi tho.” Kendo ruoth nosingore kokwongʼore.
Mefibosheth, nyakwar Saulo bende nodhi mondo orom ne ruoth. Ne pok olwoko tiende kata buso yie tike kendo luoko lepe chakre chiengʼ mane ruoth owuokie nyaka chiengʼ manoduogo ka ok ohinyore.
Kane obiro koa Jerusalem mondo orom ne ruoth, ruoth nopenjo Mefibosheth niya, “Angʼo mane omoni dhi koda?”
Nodwoke niya, “Ruodha ma en ruoth, nikech jatichni en rangʼol, ne awacho ni, ‘Abiro ikoni pundana mondo otingʼa adhi gi ruoth.’ To Ziba ma jatija nondhoga.
Kendo oseketho nying jatichni ni ruodha ma en ruoth. Ruodha ma en ruoth chal ka malaika mar Nyasaye; omiyo tim atima gima ineno ni berni.
Anywolana duto ne ok onego gen gimoro moa kuom ruodha ma en ruoth makmana tho, to ne imiyo jatichni obet kod jogo machiemo e mesani. En ratiro mane ma an-go madimi amed keto kwayona ni ruoth?”
Ruoth nowachone niya, “Angʼo ma dimi imed wuoyo? Asemiyou chik ni in kod Ziba upogru puothe.”
Mefibosheth nowachone ruoth niya, “Makoro ruodha ma en ruoth osedwogo dala ma ok ohinyore, weye okaw gigo duto.”
Barzilai ja-Gilead bende nobiro koa Rogelim mondo ongʼad Jordan gi ruoth kendo okowe oweye kodhi.
Koro Barzilai ne en jaduongʼ moti ahinya, ma hike ne romo piero aboro. Ne okonyo ruoth gi chiemo e kinde mane en Mahanaim, nimar ne en ngʼat ma jamoko ahinya.
Ruoth nowacho ni Barzilai niya, “Ngʼad aora koda mondo ibi idag koda Jerusalem, kendo abiro miyi gik mikonyorigo duto.”
To Barzilai nodwoko ruoth niya, “Aseti, pod abiro dak higni adi, madimi adhi gi ruoth Jerusalem?
Koro an ja-higni piero aboro. Bende anyalo pogo gima ber kod gima rach? Bende jatichni diwinj ndhath gima ochamo kod momadho? Bende pod dawinj dwond chwo gi mon ma jower? Angʼo ma dimi jatichni dimed tingʼ matin ni ruodha ma en ruoth?
Jatichni biro ngʼado Jordan modhi gi ruoth mochwalore matin, to en angʼo momiyo ruoth dimiya chiwo machal kama?
Weya adogi mondo adhi atho e dalawa but kama noyikie wuonwa gi minwa. To jatichni miluongo ni Kimham nika. Yiene mondo ongʼad odhi gi ruodha ma en ruoth loka. Timne gimoro amora mihero.”
Ruoth nowacho niya, “Kimham biro ngʼado koda nyaka loka. Kendo abiro timo ne gimoro amora mihero. Bende abiro timoni gima chunyi diher mondo atimni.”
Omiyo ji duto nongʼado Jordan, to bangʼe ruoth bende nongʼado loka. Ruoth nonyodho Barzilai kendo nogwedhe, eka Barzilai nodok dalane.
Kane ruoth ongʼado odhi loka Gilgal, Kimham nongʼado kode. Jolweny duto mag Juda gi nus mar jolweny mag Israel nokowo ruoth kuno.
Piyo piyo nono jo-Israel nobiro ir ruoth mi giwachone niya, “Angʼo manomiyo owetewa ma jo-Juda, kelo ruoth lingʼ-lingʼ gi joode loka aora Jordan, kaachiel gi joge duto?”
Jo-Juda duto nodwoko jo-Israel niya, “Ne watimo ma nikech ruoth en watwa machiegni. Angʼo momiyo iu owangʼ. Bende wasechamo gimoro moa ka ruoth? Bende wasekawoe gimoro ni wan wawegi?”
Eka jo-Israel nodwoko jo-Juda duto niya, “Wan dhoudi apar e loch Daudi, to ewi mano, wan gi ratiro maduongʼ kuom Daudi moloyou. Koro angʼo momiyo ujarowa kamano? Donge wan ema ne wakwongo paro wach mar duogo ruodhwa?” To kata kamano jo-Juda nobedo mager moloyo jo-Israel.
To koro ne nitie ja-Benjamin machach ma nyinge Sheba wuod Bikri. Nogoyo turumbete kokok kowacho niya, “Waonge wat moro gi joka Daudi, kata gima oriwowa gi wuod Jesse! Yaye, ja-Israel moro ka moro odog e hembe!”
Omiyo jo-Israel duto noweyo Daudi mondo oluw Sheba wuod Bikri. To jo-Juda to nodongʼ gi ruodhgi ka gia Jordan nyaka gichopo Jerusalem.
Kane Daudi odwogo dalane Jerusalem, nokawo monde apar mamoko mane oweyo mondo orit dalane, mine oketogi e ot moro miritogie. Nomiyogi gik ma gikonyorego, to ne ok oriwore kodgi. Nolornegi e ot nyaka ne githo, ka gidak ka mon ma chwogi otho.
Eka ruoth nowacho ni Amasa niya, “Luong jo-Juda mondo obi ira bangʼ ndalo adek, to in bende ibi ka.”
Kane Amasa odhi luongo jo-Juda nokawo ndalo mangʼeny moloyo ndalo mane ruoth omiye.
Daudi nowachone Abishai niya, “Koro Sheba wuod Bikri biro hinyowa moloyo kaka Abisalom notimo. Kaw jolwenj ruodhi mondo ilawe, ka ok kamano to onyalo yudo mier madongo mochiel mi odonjie kendo olalnwa.”
Omiyo jo-Joab gi jo-Kereth gi jo-Peleth kod jolweny mathuondi duto nowuok kotelnegi gi Abishai. Ne giwuok Jerusalem mondo gilaw Sheba wuod Bikri.
Kane pod gin e lwanda maduongʼ man Gibeon, Amasa nobiro romo kodgi. Joab norwako lepe mag lweny kendo notweyo okanda e nungone mosoyoe ligangla man e olalo. Kane osudo nyime, ligangla nolwar koa e olalo.
Joab nowachone Amasa niya, “Idhi nade owadwa?” Eka Joab nomako Amasa gi yie tike gi lwete ma korachwich ka gima odwaro mose gi nyoth.
To Amasa ne onge gi paro moro amora kuom ligangla mane ni e lwet Joab, kendo Joab nochwowo bund iye gi liganglano molal, mi nyimbiye noredhore piny. Amasa notho ma ok ochako ochwowe kendo. Eka Joab gi owadgi ma Abishai nolawo Sheba wuod Bikri.
Achiel kuom jo-Joab nochungʼ but Amasa mowacho niya, “Ngʼama jakor Joab; kendo moyie gi Daudi mondo oluw bangʼ Joab!”
Amasa noriere piny kochadhore gi rembe e dier yo, kendo ngʼatno noneno ka jolweny duto ne chungʼ kochopo kanyo. Bende ka noneno ka ji duto chungʼ kochopo kama Amasa nothoeno, noywaye oko mar yo motere e pap moume gi law.
Kane Amasa osegol e yo, ji duto nodhi gi Joab mondo gilaw Sheba wuod Bikri.
Sheba nokadho e dier dhout Israel duto mochopo nyaka Abel Beth Maaka, bende nokadho e gwenge jo-Beri duto, kendo jogo nochokore kaachiel mondo oluwe.
Migepe duto mag jolweny mane nigi Joab nobiro molworo Sheba ka en Abel Beth Maaka. Negigoyo agengʼa ne dala maduongʼno kendo ka gichungʼ e agengʼa molworo ohinga. To e kindeno mane gitwomo ohinganano mondo gimuke,
dhako moro mariek mane ni e dala maduongʼno nokok matek kowacho niya, “Winjuru! Nyisuru Joab obi ka mondo alos kode.”
Joab nodhi kama dhakono ne nitie, mi nopenjo niya, “In e Joab?” Nodwoke niya, “En an.” Nowachone niya, “Chik iti ni gima jatichni dwaro wachoni.” Joab nowacho niya, “Awinjo.”
Nomedo wuoyo kowachone niya, “Chon gi lala ji ne jawacho ni, ‘Dhi Abel mondo ngʼadnie rieko,’ kendo wachno ne rumo kamano.
Wan joma odak gi kwe kendo ma jo-adiera e piny Israel ka. In to itemo mondo iketh dala maduongʼ man Israel. Angʼo momiyo idwaro tieko oganda Jehova Nyasaye?”
Joab nodwoke niya, “Ngangʼ, ok en kamano! Mano gima ok anyal timo kendo ok anyal kethe!
Ngangʼ, ok en kamano! To gima timore en ni ngʼat moro miluongo ni Sheba wuod Bikri, moa e piny gode mag Efraim, ema piem gi ruoth Daudi. Omiyo miya ngʼatno kende, to abiro weyo dala maduongʼni.” Dhakoni nowachone Joab niya, “Wiye ibiro dirni gi ewi ohinga.”
Eka dhakono nodhi ir ji gi riekone mane ongʼadono, kendo negingʼado wi Sheba wuod Bikri mi gidiro ni Joab. Omiyo nogoyo turumbete, mi joge no-aa mi giweyo dala maduongʼno kendo moro ka moro nodok e dalane. Joab to nodok Jerusalem ir ruoth.
Joab ne jatend jolweny Israel duto; ka Benaya wuod Jehoyada to ne otelo ne jolwenj jo-Kereth kod jo-Peleth.
Adoniram to notelo ni joma tiyo tich achuna, Jehoshafat wuod Ahilud ne jandiko;
Sheva ne jagoro; to Zadok gi Abiathar ne jodolo.
To Ira ja-Jair ne jadolo mar Daudi.
E ndalo loch Daudi, ne nitie kech kuom higni adek moluwore; omiyo Daudi nolamo koywak ni Jehova Nyasaye. To Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni, “Ma ne otimore nikech remo mane Saulo gi ode ochwero, nikech nonego jo-Gibeon.”
Ruoth noluongo jo-Gibeon mowuoyo kodgi. To koro jo-Gibeon ne ok gin achiel kuom jo-Israel to ne gin jo-Amor ma notony, kendo jo-Israel nosekwongʼore ni biro weyogi ma ok onegogi, to Saulo kane dwaro gi chunye duto mondo jo-Israel gi jo-Juda ogurre motegno, notemo tiekogi.
Daudi nopenjo jo-Gibeon niya, “Atimnu angʼo? Ere kaka dalos winjruok mane okethore mondo ugwedhi oganda Jehova Nyasaye?”
Jo-Gibeon nodwoke niya, “Waonge ratiro mar dwaro fedha kata dhahabu kuom joka Saulo, to bende waonge gi teko mar nego jo-Israel.” Eka Daudi nopenjogi niya, “Angʼo mudwaro mondo atimnu?”
Ne gikwayo ruoth niya, “To kuom ngʼat mane onegowa kendo mane ochano yo mar hinyowa momiyo waserumo kendo wabedo maonge kar dak kamoro amora e Israel,
yie imiwa nyikwaye machwo abiriyo mondo onegi kendo owegi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e Gibea e dala Saulo ma en ngʼat Jehova Nyasaye moyier.” Omiyo ruoth nowacho niya, “Abiro miyougi.”
To ruoth ne ongʼwono ma ok ochiwo Mefibosheth wuod Jonathan, ma wuod Saulo, nikech singruok mane Daudi gi Jonathan wuod Saulo otimo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
To ruoth nokawo Armoni gi Mefibosheth ma yawuot Rizpa nyar Aiya mane onywolo ni Saulo, to gi yawuowi abich ma Merab nyar Saulo nonywolo ni Adriel wuod Barzilai, ma ja-Mehola.
Nochiwogi ni jo-Gibeon mano onegogi moweyogi ewi got nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Giduto ji abiriyogo notho kanyakla kane oneg-gi e kinde mokwongʼo mag keyo, mana ka ichako kayo shairi.
Rizpa nyar Aiya nokawo pien gugru mopedho ewi lwanda mondo obedie, chakre ndalo keyo nyaka koth nochako chue ka goyo ringre jogo. To noriembo winy mafuyo godiechiengʼ kod le mawuotho gotieno mondo kik cham ringregi.
Kane onyis Daudi gima Rizpa nyar Aiya mane en achiel kuom mond Saulo mamoko, nosetimo,
nodhi mokawo choke Saulo gi mag wuode Jonathan ka ogologi kuom oganda jo-Jabesh Gilead. Ne gisekawogi lingʼ-lingʼ koa e paw dala man Beth Shan, kuma jo-Filistia nolierogie bangʼ nego Saulo Gilboa.
Daudi nokelo choke Saulo gi mag wuode Jonathan koa kuno, kod choke mag joma ne oneg mowe oko nochokgi kamoro achiel.
Negiiko choke Saulo gi mag Jonathan ma wuode e liend Kish wuon Saulo, e Zela e piny Benjamin kendo negitimo gik moko duto ma ruoth nochiko. Bangʼ mano Nyasaye nodwoko lemo mane ilamo ni piny.
Lweny nochako bet kendo e kind jo-Filistia gi jo-Israel. Daudi nodhi gi joge mondo oked gi jo-Filistia, kendo nobedo mool.
To Ishbi-Benob ma en achiel kuom nyikwa Rafa, mane omanore gi tongʼ ma pek mula mane olosgo wiye ne romo kilo adek gi nus kendo ne en-gi ligangla manyien, nowacho ni obiro nego Daudi.
To Abishai wuod Zeruya nobiro moreso Daudi mi nogoyo ja-Filistia monego. Eka jolweny mag Daudi nosingorene kawacho niya, “Ok inichak iwuog kodwa kidhi e lweny, nikech dipo ka tach Israel otho.”
Bangʼ kinde manok, ne nitie lweny machielo gi jo-Filistia e piny Gob. E kindeno Sibekai ma ja-Hushath nonego Saf, achiel kuom nyikwa Rafa.
E lweny machielo gi jo-Filistia e piny Gob Elhanan wuod Jare-Oregim ma ja-Bethlehem nonego Goliath, ja-Giti ma bond tonge chalo lodi.
Lweny machielo nochako owuok Gath, kama ne nitie ngʼat marabet mane nigi lith lwedo auchiel gi lith tielo auchiel koni gi koni, lith lwetene gi mag tiendene koriw to ne romo piero ariyo gangʼwen. En bende ne en nyakwar Rafa.
En bende kane ojaro jo-Israel to Jonathan wuod Shimea ma owadgi Daudi nonege.
Ji angʼwen-gi mane nyikwa Rafa ma ja-Gath, nonegi gi Daudi kod joge.
Kane Jehova Nyasaye osereso Daudi e lwet wasike duto kod e lwet Saulo, Daudi nowerne Jehova Nyasaye kopake gi weche mag wendni.
Nowacho ni: “Jehova Nyasaye en lwandana, en ohingana kendo en e jaresna;
Nyasacha e lwandana, kuome ema apondoe, kendo en e okumbana kendo en e teko mar warruokna. En e ohingana, kar pondana, kendo jawarna en ema oresa kuom jo-mahundu.
“Aluongo Jehova Nyasaye, mowinjore pako, kendo oresa kuom wasika.
Apaka mag tho nolwora; kendo oula mar kethruok nohewa.
Tonde mag tho nondhoga morida kendo obadho mar tho nochika tir.
“E chandruokna ne aluongo Jehova Nyasaye kendo naluongo Nyasacha. Nowinjo dwonda ka en e hekalu mare kendo ywakna nochopo e ite.
Piny notetni kendo oyiengni, mise mag polo noyiengni; negitetni nikech nokecho.
Iro nowuok e ume; mach mangʼangʼni nowuokie dhoge, mirni maliel maliet bende nowuok kuome.
Nobaro polo mobiro e piny; rumbi molil ti nonyono gi tiende.
Noidho kerubi mi ofuyogo ka kalausi.
Noloso mudho obedo ka hema molwore, ma en rumbi motwere mar koth manie polo.
Ler nowuok kama entie mamil ka mil polo.
Jehova Nyasaye nomor gie polo; dwond Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo nowuo.
Nodiro aserni mokeyo wasigu, mor polo gi mil polo noriembogi.
Kude mag nam kod mise mag piny noelore, kane Jehova Nyasaye okwerogi kokudho gi much ume.
“Norieyo bade ka en malo momaka, nogola ei pige matut.
Noresa e lwet jasika maratego, kuom jowasika, mane tek moloya.
Negimonja e kinde mane an gi masira, to Jehova Nyasaye ema nokonya.
Nokela kama ni thuolo; noresa nikech nomor koda.
“Jehova Nyasaye osetimona mana maromre gi timna makare; osechula kaluwore gi tich lweta maler.
Nimar aserito yore Jehova Nyasaye; ok asetimo marach kuom weyo Nyasacha.
Chikene duto ni e nyima; pok alokora aweyo buchene.
Asebedo maonge ketho e nyime, kendo aseritora mondo kik atim richo.
Jehova Nyasaye osemiya pokna mowinjore gi timna makare, mana machal gi kaka aler e wangʼe.
“Ne jo-adiera, ibedonegi ja-adiera, to ni joma onge ketho, to ibedonegi maonge ketho,
ne jomaler, inyisori kaka ngʼama ler, to ne joma yoregi obam, inyisori kaka ngʼama rach.
Ireso joma muol, to wangʼi rango josunga mondo idwokgi piny.
In e tacha, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Jehova Nyasaye loko mudho momaka bedo ler.
Ka ikonya to anyalo loyo jolweny momonja; ka an gi Nyasacha to anyalo lwenyo ohinga.
“Yor Nyasaye en yo malongʼo; wach Jehova Nyasaye onge ketho. En okumba ni jogo duto mopondo kuome.
Ere Nyasaye moro makmana Jehova Nyasaye? Kendo en ngʼatno ma en Lwanda makmana Nyasachwa?
Nyasaye ema miya teko kendo omiyo yora bedo mokwe.
Omiyo tiendena bedo mayot ka tiende mwanda; kendo en ema omiyo achungʼ kuonde man malo maboyo.
Otiego lwetena ne lweny; bedena nyalo ywayo atungʼ mar nyinyo.
Imiya okumbani mar loch; ikulori piny mondo imi abed maduongʼ.
Imiyo yo mawuothoe bedo malach, mondo tiendena kik ba yo.
“Ne alawo wasika mi atiekogi; ne ok aweyogi nyaka negirumo.
Ne atiekogi chuth, mane ok ginyal chungʼ; negipodho e tienda.
Ne imiya teko mar kedo lweny; ne imiyo jomamon koda kulore e nyima.
Ne imiyo wasika oringo kadhi, mine atieko joma ok dwara.
Ne giywak mondo okonygi, to ne onge ngʼama ne nyalo resogi; ne giywakne Jehova Nyasaye, to ne ok odwokogi.
Ne agoyogi ma giregore ka buru mayom mar lowo; nanyonogi mawuotho kuomgi ka chwodho man e yo.
“Iseresa e lwet jowa mane monja; iserita kaka jatelo mar ogendini. Joma ne ok angʼeyo nobet e bwo lochna,
kendo jopinje mamoko biro ira kobolore, ka awuoyo to giwinja kendo gitimo gima adwaro.
Negibiro ka gitetni; kendo ka chunygi ool, ka gia kuondegi mag pondo.
“Jehova Nyasaye ngima! Pak obed ne Lwandana! Duongʼ obed ni Nyasaye, ma Lwanda kendo ma Jawarna.
En e Nyasaye ma chulona kuor, maketo ogendini e bwoya,
ma gonya e lwet wasika. Nitingʼa malo moloyo wasika; ne iresa e lwet jo-mahundu.
Emomiyo anapaki e kind ogendini, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo anawer wende mapako nyingi.
“Jehova Nyasaye kelo resruok maduongʼ ne ruoth moketo; onyiso ngʼwonone mogundho ma ok rum ne ngʼate mowir, ni Daudi gi nyikwaye nyaka chiengʼ.”
Magi e weche Daudi mogik: Weche mag Daudi wuod Jesse, weche ngʼat motingʼ malo gi Ngʼat Mamalo Mogik, ngʼat mowir gi Nyasach Jakobo, jawer wende mag Israel.
Roho mar Jehova Nyasaye nowuoyo kotiyo koda, wechene ne ni e dhoga.
Nyasach Israel nowuoyo; Lwanda mar Israel nowachona ni: Ka ngʼato otelo ni ji e yo makare, kendo ka olocho koluoro Nyasaye,
to ochalo gi ler mar okinyi ka chiengʼ wuok, okinyi maonge boche polo, machalo gi ler polo bangʼ chue koth mamiyo lum loth.
Donge oda nikare e nyim Nyasaye? Donge Osesingore koda gi singruok mochwere, mochan kendo morit chuth? Donge obiro kelo olemb warruokna kendo miya gik ma chunya dwaro duto?
To joma richo ibiro wit tenge ka kuthe ma ok nyal chok gi lwedo.
Ngʼama choko kuthe konyore gi gima olos gi nyinyo kata gi ragwar, kendo wangʼogi kama ochokgie.
Magi e nyinge thuondi mag Daudi: Josheb-Bashebeth ja-Takemon, ne thuon kuom thuondi adek; nokawo tongʼe monegogo ji mia aboro e lweny dichiel.
Ngʼat maluwe ne en Eliazar wuod Dodai ma ja-Ahohi. Kaka achiel kuom thuondi adek, ne en gi Daudi kane gijaro jo-Filistia mano chokore Pas Damim ne lweny. Eka jolwenj Israel noringo,
to en nochungʼ kar tiende mi nonego jo-Filistia nyaka bade nojony ma lwete omoko e ligangla. Jehova Nyasaye nokelo loch maduongʼ chiengʼno, jolweny noduogo ir Eliazar to mana ni yako gige joma otho.
Maluwe ne en Shama wuod Agee ma ja-Harar. Kane jo-Filistia ochokore kama ne nitie puoth ngʼor, jo-Israel noringogi.
To Shama nochungʼ kar tiende e dier puodhono. Norite monego jo-Filistia, kendo Jehova Nyasaye nokelo loch maduongʼ.
E kinde mag keyo, adek kuom thuondi piero adek madongo nobiro ir Daudi e rogo man Adulam, ka jolweny mag jo-Filistia to nojot e Holo mar Refaim.
E kindeno Daudi nopondo e rogo kendo jo-Filistia to nochokore Bethlehem.
Daudi riyo noloyo mowacho niya, “Yaye mad ne ngʼato kelnae pi soko man but ranga Bethlehem mondo amodhi!”
Eka thuondi adekgo nomwomo kama jolwenj jo-Filistia nochanore mi gitwomo pi e soko mane nitie but ranga Bethlehem kendo giterone Daudi. To notamore modho pigno, to kar modhe to noologo piny e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Nowacho niya, “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ok datim ma ngangʼ! Donge ma en remb joma nodhi ka ok odewo ngimagi?” Kendo Daudi ne ok omodho pigno. Mago e gik mane thuondi adekgo otimo.
Abishai owadgi Joab wuod Zeruya ne en thuon moloyo thuondi adekgo. Nokawo tongʼe monego ji mia adek, kendo nomiyo obedo gi huma mana kaka thuondi adek ka.
Donge noyudo pak mathoth moloyo thuondi adekgo? Nobedo jatendgi kata obedo nine ok en achiel kuomgi.
Benaya wuod Jehoyada ne jalweny mathuon moa Kabzel, notimo timbe madongo. Nonego ji ariyo mag Moab mane ger ka sibuor. Chiengʼ moro nodonjo e bur ka piny otimo pe mi onego sibuor.
Bende en ema nonego ja-Misri marabet. Kata nobedo ni ja-Misrino ne nigi tongʼ e lwete, Benaya nodhi kedo kode kotingʼo arungu. Noyudho tongʼ e lwet ja-Misrino monege gi tonge owuon.
Mago e timbe mag thuon mane Benaya wuod Jehoyada otimo, en bende ne en rahuma ka thuondi adek ka.
Nomiye luor maduongʼ moloyo thuondi piero adekgo, to kata kamano ne ok en achiel kuom thuondi adekgo madongo. Daudi nokete jatend jolweny mane rite.
Ji duto mane ni e kwan mar jolweny mathuondi piero adek ne gin: Asahel owadgi Joab, Elhanan wuod Dodo ma ja-Bethlehem,
Shama ja-Harod, gi Elika ja-Harod.
Helez ja-Palti, gi Ira wuod Ikesh ma ja-Tekoa,
Abiezer ma ja-Anathoth, Sibekai ma ja-Hushath,
Zalmon ma ja-Ahohi, Maharai ma ja-Netofath,
Heled wuod Baana ma ja-Netofath, Ithai wuod Ribai mawuok Gibea e piny Benjamin,
Benaya ja-Pirathon, gi Hidai moa e holo man Gash,
Abi-Albon ja-Arbath, gi Azmaveth ja-Barhum,
Eliaba ja-Shalbon, gi yawuot Jashen, Jonathan
wuod Shama ja-Harar, gi Ahiam wuod Sharar ma ja-Harar,
Elifelet wuod Ahasbai ja-Maaka gi Eliam wuod Ahithofel ja-Gilon,
Hezro ja-Karmel gi Parai ja-Arbi.
Igal wuod Nathan moa Zoba, gi Bani wuod Hagri,
Zelek ja-Amon, Naharai ja-Beeroth mane jatingʼ gige lweny mag Joab wuod Zeruya,
Ira ja-Ithri gi Gareb ma ja-Ithri,
kod Uria ja-Hiti. Giduto ne gin ji piero adek gabiriyo.
Mirima nochako omako Jehova Nyasaye kod Israel omiyo nochwalo Daudi motimo gimoro madihinygi, kowachone niya, “Dhiyo mondo ikwan jo-Israel gi jo-Juda.”
Omiyo ruoth nowachone Joab kod jotend jolweny mane ni kode niya, “Dhiuru e dhoudi duto mag Israel kochakore Dan nyaka Bersheba mondo ukwan jolweny, eka angʼe ni gin ji adi.”
To Joab nodwoko ruoth niya, “Mad Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi med jolweny nyadi mia achiel ka ruodha ma en ruoth neno gi wangʼe. To en angʼo momiyo ruoth ma en ruodha didwar timo gima chal kama?”
Kata kamano ruoth notamo Joab gi jotelo mag lweny; kuom mano ne giwuok e nyim ruoth mondo gidhi gikwan jolweny e Israel.
Bangʼ kane gisengʼado aora Jordan, negibuoro machiegni gi Aroer, man yo milambo mar dala manie geng holo, eka negikadho Gad ma gidhi nyaka Jazer.
Negidhi Gilead kod gwenge mag Tatim Hodshi, mi gikadho nyaka Dan Jaan kendo negigomo ka gichiko Sidon.
Bangʼe negichiko dala mochiel gohinga mar Turo kod dala duto mag jo-Hivi kod mago mag jo-Kanaan. Mogik, negidhi Bersheba man Negev e piny Juda.
Bangʼ dweche ochiko gi ndalo piero ariyo kane gisewuotho e piny duto, negidwogo Jerusalem.
Joab nokelo ne ruoth kar kwan jolweny kama: Kuom jo-Israel ne nitie ji alufu mia aboro maroteke mane nyalo kedo gi ligangla to kuom jo-Juda ne nitie ji alufu mia abich.
Daudi chunye nochandore bangʼ kane osekwano jolweny, mi nowachone Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Asetimo richo maduongʼ kuom gima asetimoni. Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, akwayi mondo igol richoni kuom jatichni, nimar asetimo gima ofuwo.”
Kane Daudi pok ochiewo kinyne gokinyi, wach Jehova Nyasaye nosebiro ne Gad janabi, mane en jakor wach mar Daudi:
“Dhiyo iwach ni Daudi ni, ‘Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho: Aketo weche adek e nyimi, yier achiel kuomgi monego atimni.’ ”
Omiyo Gad nodhi ir Daudi mowachone niya, “Diyier mondo kech omak piny kuom higni adek? Koso diyier dweche adek kiringo wasiki malawi? Koso diyier ndalo adek mag masira? Koro par ane mondo imiya dwoko matero ni ngʼama ne oora.”
Daudi nodwoko Gad niya, “An-gi chuny lit ahinya. Ber mondo alwar e lwet Jehova Nyasaye, nikech ngʼwonone duongʼ, to kik iweya alwar e lwet ji.”
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye nokelo masira kuom jo-Israel chakre okinyino nyaka kinde mane oketi norumo, kendo ji alufu piero abiriyo notho chakre Dan nyaka Bersheba.
To kane malaika orieyo bade mondo oketh Jerusalem, chuny Jehova Nyasaye ne lit nikech masirano mi nowacho ni malaika mane nego ji niya, “Oromo! Dwok lweti piny.” Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye noyudo ochungʼ e kar dino cham mar Arauna ja-Jebus.
Kane Daudi oneno malaika mane nego ji, nowachone Jehova Nyasaye niya, “An ema asetimo richo kendo aseketho. Magi to mana rombe, angʼo magiseketho? Akwayi ni an ema ikuma kaachiel gi joga to kik iwe masira odongʼ kuom jogi.”
Chiengʼno Gad nodhi ir Daudi mowachone niya, “Dhi malo mondo iger kendo mar misango ni Jehova Nyasaye e laru mar dino mar Arauna ja-Jebus.”
Omiyo Daudi nodhi malo mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechike kokadho kuom Gad.
Kane Arauna ogoyo wangʼe moneno ruoth gi joge kabiro ire, nowuok mokulore e nyim ruoth nyaka e lowo.
Arauna nopenje niya, “Angʼo mokelo ruodha ma en ruoth ir jatichne?” Daudi nodwoke niya, “Abiro ngʼiewo laru mar dino cham, mondo agerie kendo mar misango ni Jehova Nyasaye, eka tho manego ji orum.”
Arauna nowacho ne Daudi niya, “We ruodha ma en ruoth okawe kendo otim kode gima chunye dwaro mondo otimgo misango. Rwedhi mag timo misango miwangʼo pep kod yiend dino kaachiel gi jok minyalo tigo kaka yien nika.
Gigi duto, yaye ruoth, Arauna ema osechiwo ne ruoth.” Arauna nomedo wachone niya, “Mad Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi yie kodi.”
To ruoth nodwoko Arauna niya, “Ooyo, nyaka achuli. Ok abi timo ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha misango miwangʼo pep gi gik mayudo nono.” Omiyo Daudi nochulo fedha madirom nus kilo kongʼiewogo laru mar dino kaachiel gi rwedhi.
Daudi nogero kendo mar misango ni Jehova Nyasaye kanyo kendo nochiwo misengini miwangʼo pep kaachiel misengini mag lalruok. Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowinjo lamo mane olemogo ni piny, kendo nogengʼo masira mane ni e piny Israel.
Kane Ruoth Daudi oseti kendo hike ne ngʼeny, kata ne oume gi lep nindo to ne ok onyal yudo liet.
Omiyo wasumbinige nowachone niya, “Yie iwe wadwar nyako matin ma pod ok oriwore gi dichwo mondo orit ruoth kendo otine, bende onyalo nindo e bath Ruoth mondo ruodhwa obed maliet.”
Eka negimanyo ei piny Israel duto nyako ma jaber mine giyudo Abishag nyar Shunam mine gikele ni ruoth.
Nyakono ne ber ahinya kendo norito ruoth kotiyone to kata kamano ruoth ne ok oriwore kode kaka dhako.
Koro Adonija ma min-gi niluongo ni Hagith noyiedhore mowacho niya, “Abiro bedo ruoth.” Omiyo noiko geche kod farese kod joidh farese piero abich mondo oring e nyime.
Wuon mare ne pok otale kata penje niya, “En angʼo momiyo itimo kamano?” Bende ne en gi chia kendo nonywole koluwo bangʼ Abisalom.
Adonija noloso gi Joab wuod Zeruya kod Abiathar jadolo mine gimiye lwedo.
To Zadok jadolo gi Benaya wuod Jehoyada gi Nathan janabi gi Shimei gi Rei gi jarit Daudi ne ok oriwore gi Adonija.
Eka Adonija nochiwo misengini mag rombe gi dhok kod nyiroye machwe ewi kidi mar Zoheleth machiegni gi En Rogel. Nogwelo owetene duto, ma yawuot ruoth kod jodong Juda duto,
to ne ok ogwelo Nathan janabi, Benaya jarit ruoth kata Solomon owadgi.
Eka Nathan nopenjo Bathsheba min Solomon niya, “Bende isewinjo ni Adonija wuod Hagith osedoko Ruoth ka Daudi ruodhwa ok ongʼeyo?
Omiyo koro we angʼadni rieko kaka inyalo konyo ngimani kod ngima Solomon wuodi.”
Dhi ir Ruoth Daudi kendo penje niya, “Ruodha, donge nisingorina an jatichni kiwacho ni, ‘Adier Solomon wuodi biro bedo ruoth bangʼa kendo obiro bedo e kom duongʼ mara? Ka en kamano, to ere kaka koro Adonija osebedo ruoth?’
Kapod in kanyo iwuoyo gi ruoth, abiro donjo kanyo kendo siro weche duto misewacho.”
Omiyo Bathsheba nodhi neno ruoth makoro hike ne ngʼeny e agola mare mar nindo kama Abishag nyar Shunam ne rite.
Bathsheba nokulore piny mi ogoyo chonge e nyim ruoth. Ruoth nopenje niya, “En angʼo midwaro?”
En to nowacho niya, “Ruodha, in iwuon ema ne isingorina an jatichni e nying Jehova Nyasaye Nyasachi ni, ‘Solomon wuodi enobed ruoth bangʼa kendo enobed e kom duongʼ mara.’
To koro Adonija osebedo ruoth, kendo in, ruodha ok ingʼeyo.
Osetimo misengini mathoth mag dhok gi nyiroye machwe gi rombe kendo oseluongo yawuot ruoth duto gi Abiathar jadolo gi jatend jolweny to ok oseluongo Solomon jatichni.
Ruodha, jo-Israel duto ngʼiyi mondo gingʼe kuomini en ngʼa mabiro bedo e kom duongʼ ruodha bangʼe.
Ka ok kamano, to ka ruodha osenindo gi kwerene, to an gi wuoda Solomon ibiro kaw kaka joketho.”
Kapod nowuoyo gi ruoth, Nathan janabi nochopo.
Kendo neginyiso ruoth niya, “Nathan janabi ni ka.” Kuom mano nodhi e nyim ruoth mi okulore piny auma.
Nathan nowachone niya, “Bende in ruodha isechiko ni Adonija biro bedo ruoth bangʼi kendo ni obiro bedo e kom duongʼ?
Kawuono osedhi mi ochiwo misengini mathoth mag dhok gi nyiroye machwe kod rombe. Oseluongo yawuot ruoth duto gi jotend lweny kod Abiathar jadolo. E seche ma wawuoyoeni koro gichiemo kendo gimetho kode bende giwacho kama, ‘Ruoth Adonija mondo odag amingʼa!’
To an jatichni gi Zadok jadolo gi Benaya wuod Jehoyada gi jatichni Solomon ne ok ogwelo.
Bende ma dibed gimoro malingʼ-lingʼ ma ruodha osetimo ka ok onyiso jotichne ngʼama onego bed e kom loch mar ruodha bangʼe?”
Eka Ruoth Daudi nowacho niya, “Luongna Bathsheba.” Kuom mano nobiro mochungʼ e nyime.
Bangʼ mano ruoth nokwongʼore kowacho niya, “Adier akwongʼora gi nying Jehova Nyasaye mangima ma oseresa e chandruok duto,
ni kawuono abiro timo gima ne akwongʼorani gi nying Jehova Nyasaye, Nyasach Israel ni anatim: Kamano Solomon wuodi biro bedo ruoth bangʼa kendo obiro bedo e kom lochna.”
Eka Bathsheba nokulore piny auma nyaka e lowo ka ogoyo chonge piny e nyim ruoth kowacho niya, “Mad ruodha Daudi Jaloch dag amingʼa!”
Ruoth Daudi nowacho niya, “Luonguru Zadok jadolo gi Nathan janabi kod Benaya wuod Jehoyada.” Kane gibiro e nyim ruoth,
nowachonegi niya, “Kauru jotich ruoth kodu kendo keturu Solomon wuoda e punda awuon kendo tereuru Gihon.
Kanyo ema inyis Zadok jadolo gi Nathan janabi ni gibiro wire obed Ruoth ewi Israel duto. Gouru atungʼ turumbete kukok ni, ‘Ruoth Solomon obed mangima amingʼa!’
Eka unudhi kode kendo enobi mi obedi e kom lochna mondo olochi kara. Asekete jatelo kuom jo-Israel kod jo-Juda.”
Benaya wuod Jehoyada nodwoko ruoth niya, “Amin! Mad Jehova Nyasaye, Nyasach ruodha ma jaloch otime kamano.
Kaka Jehova Nyasaye ne nigi ruodha ma jaloch, mad obed gi Solomon koketo lochne obedo maduongʼ moloyo loch ruodha Daudi Jaloch!”
Omiyo Zadok jadolo gi Nathan janabi gi Benaya wuod Jehoyada ja-Kereth kod jo-Peleth nodhi mi oketo Solomon e punda Daudi ruoth mi gikowe nyaka Gihon.
Zadok jadolo nokawo tungʼ mar mo e Hema Maler mi nowiro Solomon. Eka negigoyo turumbete kendo ji duto nogoyo koko niya, “Ruoth Solomon mondo odag amingʼa!”
Kendo ji duto nowuotho kaluwo bangʼe ka gigoyo asili kendo gimor mathoth mi piny noyiengni.
Adonija gi welo duto mane ni kode nowinjo kokono kane gitieko nyasigi. Kane giwinjo ywak mar turumbete Joab nopenjo niya, “Tiend koko magore e dalano to en angʼo?”
To kane pod owuoyo kamano, Jonathan wuod Abiathar jadolo nochopo. Adonija nowachone niya, “Donji, ngʼat mowinjore kaka in nyaka bed ni okelo wach maber.”
Jonathan nodwoke niya, “Ok kamano ngangʼ! Ruodhwa Daudi oseketo Solomon ruoth.
Ruoth oseoro Zadok jadolo, Nathan janabi, Benaya wuod Jehoyada, gi jo-Kereth kod jo-Peleth mi gikete obedo e punda ruoth,
kendo Zadok jadolo kod Nathan janabi osewire obedo ruoth e Gihon. Ka gia kanyo gisebedo ka gigoyo koko kendo dala duto mor. Mano e koko ma uwinjo.
Moloyo mano, Solomon osebedo e kome mar ruoth.
Bende jodong ruoth duto osebiro mondo opwo ruodhwa Daudi kagiwacho ni, ‘Mad Nyasachi ket nying Solomon bed gi huma moloyo mari kendo kom ruodhe dok maduongʼ moloyo mari!’ Kendo ruoth nokulore e kitandane kamiye duongʼ
kowacho ni, ‘Pak obed ne Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel mosemiyo wangʼa oneno ngʼama okawo lochna kawuono.’ ”
Gikanyono wend Adonija duto nochungʼ malo gi bwok kendo ne gike.
Luoro nomako Adonija nikech Solomon, omiyo nodhi momako tunge mag kendo mar misango.
Eka Solomon nonyisi niya, “Adonija oluoro ruoth Solomon kendo omako tunge mag kendo mar misango. Owacho ni, ‘Ruoth Solomon mondo okwongʼrena kawuono ni ok enoneg jatichne gi ligangla.’ ”
Solomon to nodwoko niya, “Ka timbene onyisore ni en ngʼat makare kata mana yie wiye ok enolwar e lowo; to ka richo oyudi kuome to enotho.”
Eka Ruoth Solomon nooro ji mi gikele koa e kendo mar misango. Adonija nobiro mokulore piny e nyim Ruoth Solomon kendo Solomon nowachone niya, “Dhi dalani.”
Kane kinde ochopo machiegni mondo Daudi otho, nosiemo Solomon wuode.
Kowacho niya, “Achiegni dhi kuma ji duto manie piny dhiye.” Omiyo bed motegno kendo jiwri ka dichwo,
kendo irit gima Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi dwaro: Kiwuotho e yorene kendo irit puonjne gi chikene kod gik moko duto modwaro kaka ondiki e chik Musa mondo idhi nyime maber e gik moko duto mitimo, kendo kamoro amora midhiye,
eka Jehova Nyasaye nyalo rito singruokne mane omiya ni, Ka nyikwayi onono kaka gidak kendo ka giwuotho gi adiera e nyima gi chunygi duto kod parogi duto to ok nibedi maonge ngʼat manyalo bedo e kom duongʼ e Israel.
Koro in iwuon ingʼeyo gima Joab wuod Zeruya notimona, gima notimo ni jotend lweny ariyo mag Israel, Abner wuod Ner gi Amasa wuod Jetha. Ne onegogi, kochwero rembgi e ndalo kwe mana ka ndalo mag lweny kendo remono nomienogo okandane mane otweyo e nungone kod wuochene manie tiendene.
Ti kode kaluwore gi riekoni, to kik iwe lwar mantie e wiye dhi e bur gi kwe.
To bed mangʼwon ni yawuot Barzilai ja-Gilead kendo we gibed achiel kuom joma chiemo e mesani. Negidok jokora kane aringo e nyim Abisalom owadu.
Bende par, ni nitie Shimei wuod Gera, ja-Benjamin moa Bahurim mane okwongʼa malit kane adhi Mahanaim. Kane obiro romona e dho Jordan, ne akwongʼorane gi nying Jehova Nyasaye niya, Ok ananegi gi ligangla.
To koro kik ikwane ka ngʼama onge ketho. In ngʼama riek; iningʼe gima nitimne. Kik iwe lwar mantie e wiye dhi e bur gi kwe.
Eka Daudi notho gi wuonene kendo noyike e Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi.
Daudi noyudo osetelo ne Israel kuom higni piero angʼwen, ka higni abiriyo ne en Hebron to higni piero adek gadek ka en Jerusalem.
Omiyo Solomon nobet e kom loch wuon mare Daudi, kendo lochne nogurore.
Koro Adonija wuod Hagith nodhi ir Bathsheba min Solomon. Bathsheba nopenje niya, “Ibiro gi kwe?” Eka nodwoko niya, “Ee abiro gi kwe.”
Eka nomedo wacho niya, “An gi wach moro madwaro wachoni.” Nodwoko niya, “Inyalo wacho.”
Eka nowacho niya, “Kaka ingʼeyo, pinyruoth ne mara. Jo-Israel duto nongʼiya kaka ruodhgi. To gik moko nolokore ma pinyruoth nodok ni owadwa; nimar Jehova Nyasaye ema osemiyego.
Koro an gi kwayo achiel madwaro kwayo. Ka iyie to kik itama.” Bathsheba nowachone niya, “Wachi.”
Eka Adonija nomedo wacho niya, “Yie ikwa ruoth Solomon omiya Abishag nyar Shunam obed jaoda nikech angʼeyo ni ok obi tami.”
Bathsheba to ne odwoke niya, “Mano ber, abiro wuoyoni gi ruoth.”
Kane Bathsheba odhi ir Ruoth Solomon mondo owuo kuom Adonija, ruoth nochungʼ malo mokulorene eka nobet e kome mar duongʼ. Nokwayo mondo okel ni min-gi kom duongʼ eka nobet e bade korachwich.
Bathsheba nowachone niya, “An-gi kwayo matin madwaro kwayo to yie kik itama.” Ruoth to nodwoke niya, “Kwaye akwaya minwa nimar ok anatami.”
Omiyo nowacho niya, “Yie iwe Abishag nyar Shunam mondo okend gi owadu Adonija.”
Ruoth Solomon nodwoko min niya, “Angʼo momiyo ikwayo Abishag nyar Shunam ni Adonija? Inyalo anyala kata mana kwayone pinyruoth nimar en owadwa maduongʼ, bende inyalo kwaye ni Abiathar jadolo kod Joab wuod Zeruya!”
Eka Ruoth Solomon nokwongʼore gi nying Jehova Nyasaye niya, “Mad Nyasaye kweda ka Adonija ok otho nikech kwayoni.
Akwongʼora gi nying Jehova Nyasaye mangima ni en mosegura e kom loch mar Daudi wuora kendo mosesingo ni nyikwaya pinyruoth ni Adonija nyaka negi kawuono!”
Omiyo Ruoth Solomon nochiwo chik ne Benaya wuod Jehoyada, mi nonego Adonija.
To kuom Abiathar jadolo, ruoth nowacho niya, “Dog e puotheni mantie Anathoth. Iwinjori gi tho, to ok ananegi sani, nikech nitingʼo Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto e nyim Daudi wuonwa kendo nineno chandruok duto mane wuonwa oneno.”
Omiyo Solomon nogolo Abiathar e tich dolo mar Jehova Nyasaye kochopogo wach mane Jehova Nyasaye owacho Shilo kuom od Eli.
Kane wechego olandore mochopo ni Joab mane joriwore gi Adonija kata obedo ni ne ok oriwore gi Abisalom, ne oringo modhi e Hemb Jehova Nyasaye mi nomako tunge kendo mar misango.
Ruoth Solomon nowachne ni Joab oseringo modhi e hemb Jehova Nyasaye kendo ni ne en but kendo mar misango. Eka Solomon nochiko Benaya wuod Jehoyada niya, “Dhiyo mondo inege.”
Omiyo Benaya nodonjo e Hemb Jehova Nyasaye kendo nowacho ni Joab niya, “Ruoth wacho ni, ‘Wuog oko!’ ” To nodwoke niya, “Ooyo, abiro mana tho ka.” Benaya nodwoko wach Joab ni ruoth.
Eka ruoth nochiko Benaya niya, “Tim kaka osewacho. Nege kendo yike mondo ipwodha kod od wuonwa kuom richo mar remo makare mane Joab ochwero.
Jehova Nyasaye enochule kuom remo mane ochwero, nikech nonego ji ariyo gi ligangla ka wuonwa Daudi kia. Nonego Abner wuod Ner jatend lweny mar Israel kod Amasa wuod Jetha jatend lweny mar Juda mane gin joma ber kendo mobidhore moloye.
Mad rembgi obedi ewi Joab gi nyikwaye nyaka chiengʼ. To kuom Daudi gi nyikwaye gi ode kod kuom lochne, mad kwe Jehova Nyasaye obedie nyaka chiengʼ.”
Omiyo Benaya wuod Jehoyada nodhi monego Joab kendo noyike mana e lope e thim.
Ruoth noketo Benaya wuod Jehoyada jatend lweny kar Joab mi noketo Zadok jadolo kar Abiathar jadolo.
Eka ruoth noluongo Shimei ire, mowachone niya, ger ot Jerusalem mondo idagie to kik iwuogi ni idhi kamoro amora.
Chiengʼ ma iniwuogi ma ingʼadi Holo mar Kidron, to bed gadiera ni initho; kendo rembi enobed e wiyi.
To Shimei nodwoko ruoth niya, “Gima iwacho ber, jatichni biro timo kaka ruodhe osewacho.” Shimei nodak Jerusalem kuom ndalo mangʼeny.
To bangʼ higni adek jotich Shimei ariyo noringo modhi ir Akish wuod Maaka, ruodh Gath kendo nowach ne Shimei niya, “Wasumbinigi ni Gath.”
Gikanyono noidho pundane kendo nodhi ir Akish kane en Gath komanyo wasumbinige, omiyo Shimei nodhi moduogogi.
Kane onyis Solomon ni Shimei nowuok Jerusalem modhi nyaka Gath kendo odwogo,
ruoth noluongo Shimei mowachone niya, “Donge ne akwongʼora gi nying Jehova Nyasaye ka asiemi ni chiengʼ ma iniwuogi mondo idhi kamoro amora to ibed kingʼeyo ni initho? To e kindeno niwachona niya, ‘Gima iwacho ber, abiro luwo.’
Angʼo momiyo ne ok irito singruokni ni Jehova Nyasaye kendo rito chik mane amiyi?”
Ruoth nomedo wachone Shimei niya, “Ingʼeyo e chunyi richo duto mane itimone wuonwa Daudi. Koro Jehova Nyasaye biro chuli kuom richo duto mane itimo.
To Ruoth Solomon ibiro gwedhi kendo kom loch mar Daudi biro siko kogurore e nyim Jehova Nyasaye nyaka chiengʼ.”
Eka ruoth nogolo chik ni Benaya wuod Jehoyada, mi nowuok modhi mogoyo Shimei monege. Pinyruoth koro nogurore e lwet Solomon.
Solomon notimo winjruok gi Farao ruodh Misri mi nokendo nyare. Nokele e Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi nyaka notieko gero ode owuon mar loch kod od Jehova Nyasaye mar lemo gi ohinga molworo Jerusalem.
Ji to pod ne timo misengini e kuonde motingʼore nikech od lemo ne pok oger ni nying Jehova Nyasaye.
Solomon nonyiso herane ni Jehova Nyasaye kowuotho moluwore gi yore mag Daudi wuon-gi makmana ni notimo misengini kendo nowangʼo ubani kuonde motingʼore.
Ruoth nodhi Gibeon mondo ochiw misengini nimar kanyo e kama notingʼore malo moloyo ahinya kendo Solomon nochiwo misengini miwangʼo pep alufu achiel e kendo mar misangono.
E Gibeon kanyo ema Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyore ni Solomon gotieno e lek kendo Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Kwa gimoro amora midwaro ni mondo amiyi.”
Solomon nodwoko niya, “Isenyiso ngʼwono maduongʼ ni jatichni Daudi wuonwa nikech ne en ja-adiera kuomi kendo ne en ngʼama kare ma chunye odimbore. Bende pod inyise ngʼwono maduongʼno nyaka chil kawuono kendo isemiye wuowi mondo obedi e kome kawuononi.
“Koro, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasacha, iseketo jatichni ruoth kar wuonwa Daudi. To an mana rawera kendo ok angʼeyo kaka onego atim tichna.
Jatichni nitie ka e kind oganda miseyiero, oganda maduongʼ kendo mathoth mokalo akwana.
Omiyo mi jatichni chuny mariek mondo otel ne jogi kendo mar pogo ber gi rach. Nimar en ngʼa manyalo telo ni oganda maduongʼ machalo kama?”
Jehova Nyasaye ne mor ni Solomon nokwayo mano.
Omiyo Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Nikech isekwayo mana ma to ok ikwayo ngima mathoth kata mwandu ni in iwuon, bende ok isekwayo tho mar wasiki to isekwayo mana rieko kuom ngʼado bura kare,
Abiro timo gima isekwayo. Abiro miyi chuny mar rieko kod mar ngʼeyo mondo kik bedie ngʼama chalo kodi kendo nyaka chiengʼ.
Moloyo mano abiro miyi nyaka mago ma ok ikwayo kaka mwandu kod duongʼ mondo e kinde mag ngimani ok inibed gi ngʼat maromo kodi e kind ruodhi.
To kiwuotho e yorena kendo rito buchena kod chikena kaka Daudi wuonu notimo bende anamiyi idak amingʼa.”
Bangʼe Solomon nochiewo moyudo ni ne en mana lek. Nodok Jerusalem mochungʼ e nyim Sandug Muma mar Singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo nochiwo misango miwangʼo pep kod misango mag lalruok. Eka notimo nyasi ni joge duto manie dala mar ruoth.
Chiengʼ moro mon ariyo ma jochode nobiro ir ruoth mochungʼ e nyime.
Achiel kuomgi nowacho niya, “Ruodha, dhakoni gi an wadak e ot chiel. Ne ayudo nyathi kane en koda e ot.
Chiengʼ mar adek kasenywolo nyathina, dhakoni bende noyudo nyathi. To ne onge ngʼato moro amora e ot makmana wan kendwa.
“Gotieno wuod dhakoni notho nikech nonindo kuome.
Omiyo nochungʼ malo chuny otieno kendo okaw wuoda e batha ka jatichni ne nindo. Nokete e kore to okawo wuode mothono oketo e kora.
Kinyne gokinyi nachungʼ mondo adhodh wuoda to nayudo kotho! To kane anone gi ler mar okinyi ne aneno ni ok en wuowi mane anywolo.”
Dhako machielono nokwer kawacho niya, “Ooyo! Mangimani e wuoda; to mothono e mari.” To dhako mokwongono notwoyo dhoge kawacho niya, “Ooyo! Wuowi mothono e mari; to mangimano to mara.” Omiyo ne gimino wach e nyim ruoth.
Eka ruoth nowacho niya, “Iwacho ni, ‘Wuoda ngima kendo mari otho,’ kendo machielo wacho ni, ‘Ooyo, wuodi otho to mara ngima.’ ”
Eka ruoth nowacho niya, “Kelna ligangla.” Omiyo negikelone ruoth ligangla.
Bangʼe nochiwo chik kowacho niya, “Ngʼaduru nyathi mangimano e diere ariyo eka umi ngʼato ka ngʼato nus.”
Eka dhako mane wuode ngima nokecho wuode mowacho ni ruoth niya, “Kiyie ruodha, miye nyathino mangimano! Kik inege!” To dhako machielo nowacho niya, “An kata in ok noyud nyathino. Ngʼade nyadiriyo!”
Eka ruoth nongʼado bura kama, “Miuru dhako mokwongono nyathi mangima, kik unege nimar en e min-gi.”
Kane jo-Israel owinjo bura mane ruoth ongʼado, negimiyo ruoth duongʼ nikech negineno ne en-gi rieko moa kuom Nyasaye.
Kamano ruoth Solomon nobedo ruodh Israel duto.
Magi ema ne jodonge madongo: Azaria wuod Zadok jadolo;
Elihoref kod Ahija yawuot Shisha jogoro; Jehoshafat wuod Ahilud jachan weche.
Benaya wuod Jehoyada jatend jolweny. Zadok kod Abiathar ma jodolo;
Azaria wuod Nathan ma jatend jodong gwengʼ, Zabud wuod Nathan jadolo kendo jangʼad ni ruoth rieko;
Ahishar ma jatend od ruoth; Adoniram wuod Abda ma jatend tij achune.
Solomon bende ne nigi jotelo apar gariyo mane orito pinje manie Israel duto kendo ne choko gik moko ne ruoth kod joge. Moro ka moro kuomgi ne kelo chiemo kuom dwe achiel e higa.
Magi e nying-gi: Ben-Hur norito pinje mag gode mag Efraim:
Ben-Deker norito Makaz; Shalbim, Beth Shemesh kod Elon Bethhanan;
Ben-Hesed norito Aruboth (Soko kod pinje duto mag Hefer).
Ben-Abinadab norito Nafoth Dor (kendo nokendo Tafath ma nyar Solomon).
Baana wuod Ahilud norito Tanak, gi Megido nyaka Beth Shan duto machiegni gi Zarethan man mwalo mar Jezreel, koa Beth Shan nyaka Abel Mehola man loka mar Jokmeam.
Ben-Geber norito Ramoth Gilead (kod kuonde dak mag Jair wuod Manase man Gilead kaachiel gi piny mar Argob manie Bashan kod mieche madongo piero auchiel molwor gi ohinga motegno kendo nigi lodi mag rangeye mag mula);
Ahinadab wuod Ido norito Mahanaim;
Ahimaz norito Naftali (kendo nokendo Basemath nyar Solomon);
Baana wuod Hushai norito Asher kod Aloth.
Jehoshafat wuod Parua norito Isakar;
Shimei wuod Ela norito Benjamin;
Geber wuod Uri norito Gilead (enie piny mane Sihon ruoth jo-Amor kod Og ruodh Bashan ne rito chon). En kende ema ne en jaduongʼ motelone gwengʼno.
Oganda jo-Juda gi jo-Israel ne ngʼeny machalo ka kuoyo manie e dho nam; negichiemo, mi negimetho kendo negimor.
Kendo Solomon nobedo ruodh pinyno duto chakre Aora maduongʼ mar Yufrate nyaka e piny jo-Filistia mochweyo nyaka giko piny Misri. Pinjegi duto ne kelo osuru ni Solomon bende ne gin e bwo lochne ndalo duto.
Chiemo mane Solomon nwangʼo odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ ne romo gunde piero auchiel mag mogo mayom kod gunde mia achiel gi piero ariyo ariyo mag mogo amoga;
rwedhi apar machwe mopongʼ, rwedhi piero ariyo machwe kod rombe gi diek mia achiel kaachiel gi mwanda; ogunde, ring ngawo kod awendo machwe.
Nimar nobedo gi loch kuom pinjeruodhi duto man yo podho chiengʼ mar Aora maduongʼ chakre Tifsa nyaka Gaza kendo ne en gi kwe gi joma olwore duto.
E ndalo mag ngima mar Solomon Juda gi Israel chakre Dan nyaka Bersheba nodak gi kwe ka ngʼato ka ngʼato tiyo e puothe mar mzabibu kod ngʼope.
Solomon ne nigi udi alufu piero angʼwen moger ni Farese kod Farese alufu apar gariyo.
Jodong gwengʼno, moro ka moro e dweye ne chiwo ni ruoth Solomon gi welo duto mane oluongo, maonge gimoro amora morem.
Bende ngʼato ka ngʼato nokelo Shairi gi lum e kuondegi mag keno ne farese maywa geche kod farese mamoko.
Nyasaye nomiyo Solomon rieko gi ngʼeyo matut moloyo kod winjo ma ok nyalo pimore mana ka kwoyo manie dho nam.
Rieko Solomon ne duongʼ moloyo jorieko duto manie yo wuok chiengʼ, bende noduongʼ moloyo rieko duto mag Misri.
Noriek moloyo ngʼato angʼata moriwo kata mana Ethan ja-Ezra kendo riek moloyo Heman gi Kalkol kod Darda yawuot Mahol. Kendo humbe nolandore e pinje molwore duto.
Nogoyo ngeche alufu adek kendo wende mane owero noromo alufu achiel gi abich.
Nowuoyo kuom kit yien kochako gi yiende Sida mag Lebanon nyaka owino magawore e kor udi. Bende nopuonjo ji kuom le kod winy gi le mamol kod rech.
Ji moa e pinje duto nobiro mondo owinji rieko Solomon koorgi gi ruodhi mag piny mane osewinjo humb riekone.
Kane Hiram ruodh Turo owinjo ni Solomon osewir mondo obed ruoth kar Daudi wuon-gi, nooro joote ire nikech nosebedo ka en osiepe kod Daudi.
Solomon nooro wachne Hiram kowacho niya,
“Ingʼeyo ni nikech lwenje duto mane Daudi wuora kedogo koni gi koni mane miyo ok onyal gero hekalu moluongo Nying Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasache nyaka chop Jehova Nyasaye ket wasike duto e bwo tiende.
To koro Jehova Nyasaye Nyasacha osemiya yweyo kuom pinje duto molwora bende onge Jawasigu kata masira moro amora.
Omiyo achano gero hekalu ni Nying Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko Daudi wuonwa kowacho ni, ‘Wuodi ma anaketi e kom loch kari biro gero hekalu ni Nyinga.’
“Kuom mano gol chik mondo ongʼadna Sida mag Lebanon. Jotichna biro tiyo kaachiel gi jotichni, bende abiro chulo jogi chudo moro amora miketo. Ingʼeyo ni waonge gi ngʼat ma olony e goyo yien piny kaka jo-Sidon.”
Kane Hiram owinjo ote Solomon ne omor ahinya mine owacho niya, “Pak obed ni Jehova Nyasaye kawuono nikech osemiyo Daudi wuowi mariek mondo olochi kuom oganda maduongʼni.”
Omiyo Hiram nodwoko Solomon kawacho niya, “Aseyudo wach mane iorona kendo abiro timo duto midwaro kuom chiwo yiend Sida gi bao.
Joga biro ywayogi kagologi Lebanon nyaka e nam, kendo abiro kwangʼogi gi yie e nam nyaka kama iniwachi. Kanyo abiro pogogi kendo inyalo kawogi. To nyaka itim dwarona ka ichiwo chiemo moromo jooda ma joka ruoth duto.”
Mano e kaka Hiram nochiwo ni Solomon gi yien duto mag Sida gi bao mane odwaro,
kendo Solomon nochiwo ni Hiram gunde alufu mia achiel gi piero ariyo gabich mag ngano mondo obed chiemb joode kod mo madirom lita mia angʼwen gi piero aboro. Solomon nomedo dhi nyime katimo maa ne Hiram higa ka higa.
Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo Solomon rieko mana kaka nosesingorene. Ne nitie winjruok mar kwe e kind Hiram kod Solomon kendo gin ji ariyogo negitimo singruok e kindgi.
Ruoth Solomon nondiko jotich lwedo mar achuna e piny Israel duto maromo joma chwo alufu piero adek (30,000).
Noorogi mondo gi dhi Lebanon dwe ka dwe ka gitiyo e migawo mar ji alufu apar (10,000) e dwe, omiyo negitieko dwe achiel Lebanon to dweche ariyo gitieko dala. Adoniram ema ne otelo e tich lwedo matek mar achunano.
Solomon ne nigi jotingʼo alufu piero abiriyo (70,000) kod jopa kidi ewi got ji alufu piero aboro (80,000),
kaachiel gi nyipeche alufu adek gi mia adek (3,300) mane ochungʼ ne tich.
Kane ruoth oketonegi chik negimuko kite madongo ma nengogi tek mag mise mag kite mopa mag hekalu.
Kamano jogedo molony mag Solomon gi Hiram kod jo-Gibal nongʼado yien kendo oloso bepe kod kite mag gero hekalu.
E higa mar mia angʼwen gi piero aboro bangʼ ka jo-Israel osewuok Misri, e higa mar angʼwen mar loch Solomon kuom Israel e dwe mar Ziv, dwe mar ariyo nochako gero hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Hekalu mane ruoth Solomon ogero ni Jehova Nyasaye borne noromo fut piero aboro gochiko kendo lachne ne romo fut piero adek to borne madhi malo ne romo fut piero angʼwen gangʼwen.
Bor mar agola mane nitie e nyim hekalu noywayo lach hekalu, moromo fut piero adek kendo notingʼore malo maromo fut apar gabich.
Noloso ni hekaluno dirise mogaji modiyore matindo.
Bende nogero udi moko momakore gi kor kama ler mar lemo gi oko. Udigo nolworo kama ler mar lemo.
Dier ot mapiny lachne ne en fut apar, dier ot madiere ne en fut aboro, to dier ot mar adek lachne ne en fut apar. Kendo ne giweyo thuolo e kind kor ot ma oko mondo kik yien moriw pow kor ot.
Noger hekalu gi kite mopa mana kuma okuny but kendo kata ywak nyundo kata mar le kata mar gir tich moro amora ne ok owinji e kar gedo mar hekalu.
Dhoot midonjogo e ot mapiny ne nitie yo milambo mar hekalu to raidhi nochopo e ot madiere nyaka gorofa mar adek.
Omiyo nogero hekalu motieko koume gi yiende kod bepe Sida.
Kendo nogero udi molworo hekalu duto. Bor moro ka moro ne nyalo romo fut aboro bende ne gichomore gi hekalu gi bepe mag yiend sida.
Wach Jehova Nyasaye nobiro ne Solomon kowacho niya,
“Kaluwore gi hekaluni migero, kiluwo puonjna kendo itimo weche mamiyi kendo kirito chikena, to abiro chopo singo mane amiyo Daudi wuonu.
Kendo abiro dak e kind jo-Israel bende ok anajwangʼ joga Israel.”
Omiyo Solomon nogero hekalu motieke.
Nochwado kor ot yo ka iye gi bepe sida chakre tiend ot nyaka yiend tado, bende noloso dier ot gi yiend bap Saipras.
Nongʼado iye gi bap sida ka bor mopog gigo romo fut piero adek kochomo yo ka tok hekalu chakre tiend ot nyaka wi tado mondo olos kama ler mar lemo maiye miluongo ni Kama Ler Moloyo.
Ot maduongʼ mane nitie e nyim ot matin-no ne romo fut piero abich gochiko e borne.
Ei hekaluno noketie bap sida mopa ka budho kod thiepene. Gik moko duto nolos gi yiend sida ma kata mana kidi ne ok nyal ne.
Noloso kama ler mar lemo ei hekalu mondo oketie Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Bor mar kama ler mar lemo ne romo fut piero adek to lachne ne romo fut piero adek kendo borne madhi malo ne romo fut piero adek. Ne obawo ot maiye gi dhahabu lilo, bende noloso kendo mar misango gi bap sida.
Solomon nobawo ii hekalu gi dhahabu lilo kendo nomedo thiwni mag dhahabu e nyim kama ler mar lemo.
Kamano nobawo yo ka ii ot duto gi dhahabu, bende nobawo kendo mar misango mar kama ler mar lemo gi dhahabu.
Ei kama ler mar lemo noloso malaika mar kerubi ariyo gi bap Zeituni ka moro ka moro borne madhi malo romo fut apar gabich.
Bwomb kerubi achiel mokwongo ne romo fut aboro kendo bwombe machielo ne romo fut aboro kamano bende bwombene duto ne romo fut apar gauchiel.
Kerubi mar ariyo bende bwombene ne romo fut apar gauchiel, nimar kerubi ariyogi ne chalre e romgi kendo losogi.
Bor kerubi ka kerubi madhi malo ne romo fut apar gauchiel.
Noketo kerubigo ei ot matin mar hekalu maiye ka bwombegi oyarore. Bwomb kerubi achiel nomulo kor ot konchiel, ka bwombe machielo nemulo kor ot komachielo, kendo bwombegi nemulore e chuny ot.
Nobawo kerubigo gi dhahabu.
E kor ot molworo hekalu, e udi ma iye gi udi ma oko, nopayoe kido mar kerubi, gi mag yiend othidhe kod thiepe maupe.
Bende nobawo dier udi maiye gi ma oko gi dhahabu.
To dhoot midonjogo ei kama ler mar lemo noloso gi yiend zeituni ma lachne dirom fut auchiel.
E dhoudi ariyogo mag yiend zeituni nopayoe kerubi, gi yiend othidhe kod thiepe maupe, kendo nobawo kerubi kod yiend othidhego gi dhahabu moleny.
Kamano bende noloso thike angʼwen mag yiend zeituni molosogo dhoot mar ot maduongʼ.
Bende noloso dhoudi ariyo gi yiend saipras kamoro ka moro nigi pata ariyo.
Nopayo kerubi gi yiend othith kod maupe moyarore kuomgi mobawogi gi dhahabu mothedhi maromre duto.
Kendo nogero laru maiye gi kite mopa molwore nyadidek kaachiel gi laini achiel mar bap yiend sida.
Mise mar hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye noketi e higa mar angʼwen e dwe mar Zif.
E higa mar apar gachiel e dwe mar Bul, dwe mar aboro hekalu notieki chutho kaka nochan ni onego gere. Notieko higni abiriyo kigere.
To Solomon nokawo higni apar gadek mondo otiek gero ode.
Nogero ode gi Bungu mar Lebanon ma borne romo fut mia achiel gi piero abich gachiel to lachne romo fut piero abiriyo gabich gi nus kendo borne madhi malo romo fut piero angʼwen gangʼwen. Nogure ewi laini angʼwen mag sirni mag sida moriwie bape mag sida.
Noumo wiye gi bap sida mokadho e sirni piero angʼwen gabich, e laini ka laini apar gabich.
Dirise noketi adek adek modhi malo momanyore moro gi moro.
Sirni mag dhoudi ma bethene ariyo momanyore romre; noketi adek adek nyime ka gimanyore.
Bende nogero od sirni ma borne romo fut piero aboro gariyo to lachne romo fut piero angʼwen gochiko. Ne en gi agola man-gi sirni e nyime.
Nogero od kom duongʼ, Od ngʼado Bura kama ne ongʼadoe bura kendo noume gi sida koa piny nyaka e tado.
Bende od ruoth mane obiro dakie nogero e laru machielo e tok od bura to nogere mana machal gi od bura, Solomon bende noloso od dak machal kamano ni nyar Farao mane okendo.
Udigo duto chakre oko nyaka laru maduongʼ kendo chakre mise nyaka yiendambewa noger gi kite ma nengogi tek mopa iye gi oko kendo nongʼadgi mowinjore kaka idwaro.
Mise ne oger gi kite madongo kendo ma nengogi tek maromo fut apar gabich kod fut apar gachiel gi nus.
To e wiye malo nokete kite ma nengogi tek mopa kaka owinjore kendo noriwie bape sida.
Laru maduongʼ noluor gi ohinga mar kite mopa ma lachne en kite adek gi laini achiel mar bap sida mobar machal mana gi laru maiye mar hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye gi agolane.
Ruoth Solomon nooro jaote Turo ma oomo Huram,
ma min-gi ne en dhako ma chwore otho, nyar dhood Naftali kendo wuon-gi ne ja-Turo kendo ngʼat molony e loso mula. Huram ne en ngʼat mariek, ngʼat man-gi ngʼeyo kendo molony ahinya e kit tije duto mag mula. Nobiro ir ruoth Solomon motimo tije duto mane omiye.
Noloso sirni madongo ariyo mag mula moro ka moro borne madhi malo romo fut piero ariyo gauchiel to alworane romo fut apar gauchiel.
Bende noloso gik moko ariyo machalo agulni mag mula mondo oketi ewi sirni. Bor mar moro ka moro ne romo fut apar gauchiel.
Bende noloso thiwni mogaji mane omako gik machalo agulnigo ewi sirnigo, thiwnigo noketi abiriyo abiriyo ewi gik machalo agulnigo.
Noloso gik mongʼinore e laini ariyo molworo thiwnigo mongʼawogi kuom gik machalo agulni manie ewi siro. Notimo mano ewi moro ka moro.
To gik machalo agulni mane ni ewi sirni mag agola nolosi e kido mag ondanyo ka borgi romo fut auchiel gi nus.
Ewi gik machalo agulni manie wi sirni ariyogo, ewi kama olosi ka tawo but thiwni, noketie gik mongʼinore mia ariyo e laini molwore.
Nochungo sirnigo e agola mar hekalu. Siro ma yo milambo nomiyo nying ni Jakin (tiende ni osegurore), to siro ma yo nyandwat nomiyo nying ni Boaz (tiende ni teko nitie kuome).
Gik machalo agulni mane ni e wiye nolosi kaka ondanyo. Kamano tich sirnigo norumo.
Eka noloso Nam mar mula moleny, molworore kaka karaya, ma lachne romo fut apar gabich to tutne romo fut aboro. Alworane duto ne romo fut piero angʼwen gangʼwen.
E bwo dhoge nolwore gi pugni ma kindgi romo fut achiel gi nus, pugni nochan e laini ariyo ka gimakore gi Namno.
Karaya mar Namno norenji e ngʼe rwedhi apar gariyo, ka adek ngʼiyo yo nyandwat, to adek ngʼiyo yo podho chiengʼ, to adek ngʼiyo yo milambo bende adek ngʼiyo yo wuok chiengʼ. Karaya mar Namno noyiere kuomgi kendo tiendegi machien nochomo ka iye.
Lachne ne romo bat achiel morie to dhoge ne chalo gi dho kikombe, mana ka ondanyo mathiewo. Notingʼo pi manyalo romo lita alufu adek.
Bende noloso rachungi apar mag mula minyalo dhir; ka moro ka moro romo fut auchiel gi nus e bor madhi malo to lachne to romo fut abich.
Ma e kaka rachungigo nolosi: Nosirgi gi bao koa piny nyaka malo.
E bethe bepe mosirogigo ne nitie kido mar sibuoche, kido mar rwedhi kod kido mar kerubi kendo ewi sirnigo bende. E wigi malo kendo e bwo sibuoche gi rwedhigo ne nitie gik machalo maua mothedhi.
Rachungi ka rachungi ne nigi tiende angʼwen mag mula, man kod chumbe mag mula molworore kendo moro ka moro ewi rachungi angʼwen-go nokete karaya molosi e kido mar maua koni gi kocha.
Yo ka iye mag rachungigo ne nitie hoho molworore ma tutne nyalo romo fut achiel gi nus. Hohoni nolwore, kendo bwoye ne oloyo fut achiel gi nus matin. To alwora mar dhoge nolosie kido. Bepe momako sirnigo ne ok olworore to ne gin Skweya.
Tiende angʼwen-go ne nitie e bwo bepego kendo kama tielogo ne lworore notudi e rachungi.
Tiendego nolos kaka tiende gach faras; chumbe ma tiende lworore, tiende molworore, weche momake kod dag waya nolos gi mula moleny.
Rachungi ka rachungi ne nigi ramaki angʼwen e kona ka kona molos koa e rachungi.
Ewi rachungino ne nitie gima olworore, ma tutne ne ok oromo kata mana nus fut. Rachungi gi bepe nomako siro koago malo.
Noketo kido mar kerubi gi sibuor kod yiend othidhe e bethe rachungi kod bepe kamoro amora mane ni thuolo, gi kido mar maua e alworane duto.
Ma e kaka noloso rachungi apargo. Giduto nolenygi machalre e gimoro achiel bende ne gichalre e romgi kod losogi.
Eka noloso kareche mag mula apar ka moro ka moro tingʼo pi maromo lita mia aboro gi piero aboro, kendo ma lachne nyalo romo fut auchiel gi nus, ka karaya ka karaya noketo ewi rachungi apargo moro ka moro.
Noketo rachungi abich yo milambo mar hekalu kendo abich noketo yo nyandwat. Noketo Nam yo milambo, e kona ma yo milambo mar wuok chiengʼ mar hekalu.
Bende noloso agulni gi opewni kod tewni mag kiro remo. Kamano Huram notieko tich duto mane otimo ne ruoth Solomon e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye:
Sirni ariyo, agulni ariyo machalo tawo moketi ewi sirni; thiwni ariyo mane okedgo gik machalo agulni ariyo machalo tawo moketi ewi sirni;
gik mongʼinore mia angʼwen mag thiwni laini ariyo, moluwore (laini ariyo mag thiwni oketi e laini ariyo mag gik mongʼinore mane okedgo gik machalo agulni molos kaka tawo ewi sirni);
rachungi apargo kod karechegi apar;
Karaya mar Nam gi rwedhi apar gariyo manie e bwoye;
Agulni gi opewni kod tewni mag kiro remo. Gigi duto mane Huram oloso ni ruoth Solomon ni hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye nolos gi mula moleny.
Ruoth nomiyo giwangʼo lowo mane gisechweyo e paw Jordan man e kind Sukoth gi Zarethan.
Solomon noweyo gigi duto ma ok opimo nikech negingʼeny ahinya, pek mar mulano ne ok ongʼere.
Kendo Solomon noloso gik mitiyogo manie ei hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye: Kendo mar misango mar dhahabu; mesa mar dhahabu nikete makati e nyim Ruoth;
rachungi teyni molos gi dhahabu mopwodhi (abich korachwich kendo abich koracham e nyim kama ler mar lemo); maupe molosi mag dhahabu gi teyni gi ramaki;
gi karache mag dhahabu mopwodhi, gi makas mingʼadogo otambi, tewni mag kiro remo, dise, gi tawo mar ubani; gi dhoudi molos gi dhahabu mag udi mar ot maiye gi Kama Ler Moloyo, kaachiel gi dhoudi mar laru mar hekalu.
Ka tije duto mane ruoth Solomon osetimo e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye noserumo, nokelo gik mane Daudi wuon-gi osewalo kaka fedha gi dhahabu kod gik mitimogo lemo kendo noketogi e od keno mar hekalu Jehova Nyasaye.
Bangʼe Ruoth Solomon noluongo jodong jo-Israel mondo odhi ire Jerusalem gi jodong dhoudi duto gi jotend anywola mag Israel mondo gikel Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye koa Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi miluongo ni Sayun.
Jo-Israel duto nochokore kanyakla ir Ruoth Solomon e kinde mag nyasi e dwe mar Ethanim, ma en dwe mar abiriyo.
Kane jodong Israel duto osechopo, jodolo nokawo Sandug Muma,
kendo negikelo Sandug Muma mar Jehova Nyasaye gi Hemb Romo kod gik moko duto maler mane ni e iye. Jodolo kod jo-Lawi notingʼogi,
kendo Ruoth Solomon kod oganda jo-Israel duto mane ochokore molwore nochopo e nyim Sandug Muma; kendo negichiwo rombe kod dhok mangʼeny mane kwan-gi ok nyal ndiki kata kwan kaka misango.
Eka jodolo nokelo Sandug Muma mar singruok mar Jehova Nyasaye kama ne olosne ei kama ler mar lemo mar hekalu ma en Kama Ler Moloyo mi gikete e bwomb kerubi.
Kerubigo noyaro bwombegi ewi kama noketie Sandug Muma kendo ne giumo Sandug Muma gi ludhe mitingʼego.
Ludhegi ne boyo ahinya ma gikogi ne inyalo ne koa e nyim Kama Ler e nyim kama ler mar lemo, to ne ok ginen gi oko mar Kama Ler kendo pod gin kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
Ne onge gimoro ei Sandug Muma makmana kite ariyo mopa mane Musa oketo e iye kane en Horeb kama Jehova Nyasaye ne otimoe singruok kod jo-Israel kane gisewuok Misri.
Kane jodolo osewuok ei Kama Ler, bor polo noimo hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye,
kendo jodolo ne ok nyal tiyo tijegi nikech bor polo nimar duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye nopongʼo hekalu.
Eka Solomon nowacho niya, “Jehova Nyasaye osewacho ni enodag ei bor polo motimo mudho;
adier asegeroni hekalu marahuma kama inidagie nyaka chiengʼ.”
Kane oganda jo-Israel duto ochungʼ kanyo, ruoth nolokore mogwedhogi.
Eka nowacho niya, “Pak obed ne Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, mosetimo gi lwete gima ne osingo gi dhoge owuon ni Daudi wuonwa.
Nimar nowacho ni, ‘Chakre ndalo mane agolo joga koa Misri, pok ayiero dala maduongʼ e dhoot moro amora mar Israel mondo oger hekalu kanyo ni Nyinga, to aseyiero Daudi mondo otel ni joga Israel.’
“Daudi wuora noketo e chunye mondo oger hekalu moluongo nying Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel.
To Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni Daudi wuora ni, ‘Nitimo maber mondo ibed gi wach gero hekalu ni nyinga e chunyi.
Kata kamano, in ok niger hekalu, to wuodi, ma en ringri gi rembi iwuon, en ema noger hekalu ni Nyinga.’
“Jehova Nyasaye oserito singruok mane otimo: Asekawo loch wuora Daudi kendo asebet e kom loch mar Israel, mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosingo, kendo asegero hekalu ni Nying Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel.
Aseloso kar Sandug Muma, moketie singruok mane Jehova Nyasaye otimo kod kwerewa kane ogologi Misri.”
Eka Solomon nochungʼ e nyim kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye e nyim oganda duto mar jo-Israel, kendo norieyo bedene kochomo polo
kowacho kama: “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, onge Nyasaye moro amora machal kodi e polo malo kata e piny mwalo, in e Nyasaye marito singruok mar herane ni jotichne maluwo yoreni gi chunygi duto.
Iserito singruokni mane itimo gi jatichni Daudi wuora ne isingori gi dhogi kendo isechopo singruokno gi lweti mana kaka en kawuononi.
“Koro Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel rit singruok mane itimo gi jatichni Daudi wuora kiwachone niya, ‘Ok inibed maonge gi ngʼato mobedo e kom loch e nyima e piny Israel, to mana ka yawuoti otimo tim makare e nyima mana kaka isetimo.’
To koro, yaye Nyasach Israel, yie wach mane isingo ni jatichni Daudi wuora otimre mana kaka ne isingo.
“To bende Nyasaye nyalo dak e piny? Kata polo malo kata polo mabor moloyo ok nyal romi. To koro hekalu mageroni, to diromi nade!
Kata kamano chik iti ni lamo jatichni gi kwayone mar ngʼwono, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Nyasacha. Winji ywak gi lemo ma jatichni lamo e nyimi kawuono.
Mad wangʼi rang hekaluni otieno kod odiechiengʼ, kama niwacho niya, ‘Nyinga nobed kanyo,’ mondo iwinji lemo ma jatichni lamo kochomo odni.
Winji lamo mar jatichni kaachiel gi jogi Israel ka gilamo ka gichomo odni. Winji gi e polo kar dakni, kendo kiwinjo, to iwenwa richowa.
“Ka ngʼato oketho ni wadgi kendo dwarore ni mondo okwongʼre kendo obiro mokwongʼore e nyim kendo mar misango manie hekaluni,
to iwinji gi e polo kendo itim kaka owinjore. Ngʼad bura e kind jotichni, kikumo joketho kendo iket richogi e wigi bende joma onge ketho iket kare kaluwore gi timgi makare.
“Ka jogi Israel olo e lweny gi jowasikgi nikech gisekethoni, to bangʼe gilokore mi gipako nyingi, ka gilamo kendo gikwayo e hekaluni,
to iwinjgi gi e polo kendo iwe richo jogi Israel kendo iduog-gi e piny mane imiyo kweregi.
“Ka polo olor kendo koth onge nikech jogi osekethoni to ka gilemo kaeni ka gipako nyingi kendo ka gilokore giweyo richogi nikech isekelonegi chandruok,
to yie mondo iwinjgi gie polo kendo iwene jotichni ma jo-Israel richogi. Puonjgi yo makare mar dak kendo iornegi koth e piny mane imiyo jogi kaka girkeni margi.
“Ka kech kata dera omako piny, kata ka abach omako cham ewi dongo kata ka bonyo kata kungu kata ka jowasigu olworo miechgi madongo kata ka midekre kata tuo omakogi,
to ka ngʼato kuom jogi ma jo-Israel olemo kata okwayi, ka gingʼeyo gima chando chunygi kendo ka girieyo bedegi kochomo hekaluni,
to yie iwinji gie polo, kama idakie. Wenegi richogi kendo tim ne ngʼato ka ngʼato gima owinjore gi gik motimo nikech ingʼeyo chunygi (nikech in kendi ema ingʼeyo chuny dhano),
mondo omi gilwori ndalogi duto ma gin-go e piny mane imiyo kwerewa.
“To kuom jadak ma ok achiel kuom jogi Israel moa e piny mabor nikech nyingi,
nimar ji biro winjo humb nyingi maduongʼ gi mar lweti maratego kod badi marabora moriere, ka gibiro ma gilemo ka gichomo hekaluni
to yie mondo iwinji gie polo kama idakie kendo tim gimoro amora ma jadakno okwayi, mondo ogendini duto mag piny ongʼe nyingi kendo oluori mana kaka jogi Israel, kendo mondo gingʼe ni ot ma asegeroni luongo nyingi.
“Ka jogi odhi kedo gi jowasikgi, kamoro amora ma ibiro orogie, ka gilamo Jehova Nyasaye ka gichomo dalani miseyiero kendo hekalu masegero maluongo nyingi;
to yie iwinji gie polo lamogi kod kwayogi kendo konygi.
“To ka giketho e nyimi, nimar onge ngʼato kata achiel ma ok jaketho mi ikecho kodgi, kendo ichiwogi e lwet wasikgi mondo otergi e twech e piny wasikgigo, kuma bor kata machiegni;
to eka bangʼe giloko pachgi e piny motwegieno mi chunygi olokore giweyo richo, kendo gikwayi ka gin e piny wasikgi niya, ‘Wasetimo richo kendo waseketho bende wasetimo tim mamono.’
Kendo ka gidwogo iri gi chunygi duto kod ngimagi duto, e piny wasikgi mane otweyogieno, kendo gilami ka gichomo pinygi mane imiyo kweregi, kod dala mane iyiero, gi hekalu ma asegero ni nyingi;
to yie mondo iwinj lemogi gi kwayogi gie polo kama idakie kendo ikonygi.
Yie iwe ni jogi mosetimo richo e nyimi, wenegi kethogi duto magisetimo e nyimi kendo mi joma ne omakogi okechgi.
Nimar gin jogi kendo mwanduni mane igolo e piny Misri, kigologi kama mae kakni ka kama ithedhe nyinyo.
“Yie wangʼi one kwayo jatichni kod kwayo mag jogi Israel, bende yie iwinjgi kinde moro amora ma giywaknie.
Nimar niyierogi e kind ogendini duto mag piny mondo gibed girkeni, mana kaka ninyiso jatichni Musa kane igolo kwerewa e piny Misri; yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto.”
Kane Solomon osetieko lamogi duto kod kwayogi ni Jehova Nyasaye, nochungʼ oa e nyim kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye, kama nogoyoe chonge kotingʼo bade kochomo polo.
Nochungʼ mogwedho chokruok duto mar Israel gi dwol maduongʼ kowacho niya,
“Pak obed ni Jehova Nyasaye mosemiyo joge Israel kwe mana kaka nosingo. Onge kata mana wach achiel ma ok osechopo kuom gik moko duto mabeyo mane ochiwo kuom jatichne Musa.
Mad Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa obed kodwa mana kaka nobedo gi kwerewa, mad kik owewa kata jwangʼowa.
Mad olok chunywa ire, mondo wawuoth e yorene duto kendo wamak chikene gi puonjne kod buchene mane omiyo kwerewa.
Kendo mad wechenagi maselamo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, obed machiegni gi Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa odiechiengʼ gotieno, mondo okony jatichne kendo okony joge Israel kaluwore gi dwaro mar odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ;
mondo ji duto manie piny ongʼe ni Jehova Nyasaye e Nyasaye kendo ni onge moro.
To chunyu nyaka chiwre chuth ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kudak moluwore gi yorene kendo kurito chikene kaka e kindeni.”
Eka ruoth kod jo-Israel duto mane ni kode nochiwo misengini e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Solomon nochiwo misango mag lalruok ni Jehova Nyasaye: kwan-gi ne romo dhok alufu piero ariyo gi ariyo kod rombe gi diek maromo alufu mia achiel gi piero ariyo. Kamano ruoth kod jo-Israel duto nowalo hekalu ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Chiengʼono ruoth nopwodho dier laru mane nitie e nyim hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo kanyo nochiwoe misengini miwangʼo pep gi cham michiwo kod bor misango mar lalruok, nikech kendo mar misango mar mula mantie e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ne tin ahinya mane ok nyal tingʼo misangogo duto, kaka misango miwangʼo pep gi mag cham kod mag sawo.
Kamano Solomon notimo sawo e kindeno kaachiel gi jo-Israel duto mane ni kode chokruok maduongʼ miwuoro kotingʼo joma oa Lebo Hamath nyaka Wadi man Misri. Negitimo nyasino e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kuom ndalo abiriyo kendo gichak gimedo ndalo abiriyo mamoko duto ne gin ndalo apar gangʼwen.
Kinyne nomiyo ji thuolo mar ke. Negigwedho ruoth mi gidhi e miechgi, ka gimor kendo giil e chunygi nikech gik moko duto mabeyo mane Jehova Nyasaye osetimo ni jatichne Daudi kod joge Israel.
Kane Solomon osetieko gero hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kod dala maduongʼ ma ruoth dakie kendo nosetimo duto mane chunye dwaro,
Jehova Nyasaye nochako ofwenyorene kendo mar ariyo mana kaka nosefwenyorene Gibeon.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone niya, “Asewinjo lamo kod kwayo mitimo e nyima; asewalo hekalu misegero, mondo Nyinga obedie nyaka chiengʼ. Wangʼa kod chunya nobed kanyo kinde duto.
“To in, kiwuotho e nyima gi chuny makare kod bidhruok, kaka Daudi wuonu notimo, kendo timo mago duto machiki kendo kimako puonjna kod buchena,
to abiro guro kom lochni kuom Israel nyaka chiengʼ mana kaka nasingo ni Daudi wuonu kane awachone ni, ‘Kinde duto ok inichand ngʼama nyalo bedo e kom loch mar Israel.’
“To ka in iwuon kata yawuoti olokore moweya kendo ok oluwo chikena kod buchena ma asemiyi mi odhi olamo nyiseche moko kendo otiyonigi,
to anangʼad Israel oko e piny ma asemiyogi kendo anakwed hekaluni ma asewalo ni Nyinga. Israel koro nobed mana wach ngero kendo gir achaya e kind ogendini duto.
Kata obedo ni hekaluni koro nigi duongʼ, ji duto mabiro kadho bute nowuor kendo nohum ka gipenjo ni, ‘Angʼo momiyo Jehova Nyasaye osetimo gima chalo kama ni pinyni kod hekaluni?’
Ji biro dwoko kawacho ni, ‘Nikech gisejwangʼo Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi mane ogolo kweregi oa Misri, kendo giseluwo bangʼ nyiseche mamoko, ka gilamogi kendo gitiyo nigi, kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye nokelo chandruok duto kuomgi.’ ”
E giko higni piero ariyo e kinde mane Solomon ogeroe udi ariyogi ma gin hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kod dala maduongʼ mar ruoth,
Ruoth Solomon nochiwo ni Hiram ruoth Turo mier piero ariyo manie piny Galili, nikech Hiram nomiye yiend sida gi saipras kod dhahabu mane odwaro.
To kane Hiram owuok Turo modhi mondo one mier mane Solomon osemiye ne ok omor kodgi.
Omiyo nowachone niya, “Owadwa, magi to mier machal nadi misemiya?” Kendo nochako kanyo ni Piny Kabul, nying ma pod iluongego nyaka chil kawuono.
Koro Hiram noseoro ni ruoth dhahabu maromo kilo alufu angʼwen.
Magi e chenro mar tich achuna mane Ruoth Solomon ondiko mondo ogergo hekalu ni Jehova Nyasaye, gi dala ruoth, gi kuonde ohula, kod ohinga mar Jerusalem, gi mier madongo mag Hazor gi Megido kod Gezer.
(Noyudo ka Farao ruodh Misri nosekedo mokawo Gezer. Nowangʼe monego jo-Kanaan mane odakie momiye kaka mich mar arus ni nyare mane chi Solomon.
Kendo Solomon nochako ogero Gezer). Nogero Beth Horon ma yo ka mwalo,
gi Baalath kod Tadmor manie thim e pinye,
kaachiel gi mier madongo mag kuonde kenone kod mier matindo mag gechene gi faresege kod gimoro amora mane chunye nyalo dwaro mondo oger e Jerusalem, kata e Lebanon, kendo e pinje duto mane enie gi loch.
Ji duto mane odongʼ e pinyno koa kuom jo-Amor gi jo-Hiti kod jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus (ogendinigi ne ok jo-Israel),
tiende ni, nyikwagi mane odongʼ e piny, ma jo-Israel ne ok otieko; Solomon nolokogi wasumbini michuno mondo oti githuon, kaka obet nyaka chil kawuono.
To Solomon ne ok oketo ja-Israel moro amora obedo kaka misumbane, to noketogi kaka jolwenje, gi nyipechene kod jodonge mag pinygi gi jotend lweny, jotelo mag geche lweny kod joriemb gechene.
Bende gin ema negidoko jodongo mane otelo ni tije duto mag Solomon, duto jodongo mia abich gi piero abich kaka nyipeche mag joma ne tiyo.
Bangʼ kane nyar Farao osewuok e Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi modhi e dala mane Solomon ogerone, eka Solomon nogero ohinga molworo ode.
Solomon ne timo misango miwangʼo pep gi misango mar lalruok nyadidek e higa ewi kendo mar misango mane ogero ni Jehova Nyasaye bende nowangʼo ubani e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mi nochopo dwaro mar hekalu.
Ruoth Solomon bende nohondho yiedhi kama iluongo ni Ezion Geber machiegni gi Elath e piny Edom e dho Nam Makwar.
Omiyo Hiram nooro joge ma jokwangʼ mane ongʼeyo nam mondo oti e yiedhi mag Solomon kaachiel gi joge Solomon.
Negikwangʼ nyaka Ofir kendo negikelo dhahabu maromo kilo alufu apar gangʼwen mine gikelo ne ruoth Solomon.
Kane ruoth madhako mar Sheba owinjo humb Solomon kod winjruok manie kinde gi nying Jehova Nyasaye, nobiro mondo oteme gi penjo matek.
Kane ochopo Jerusalem gi oganda maduongʼ, ngamia motingʼo gik mangʼwe ngʼar, dhahabu mogundho kod kite mabeyo ma nengogi tek nobiro ir Solomon kendo owuoyo kode kuom gik moko duto mane nitie e pache.
Solomon nodwoko penjone duto; nimar onge gima ne tek mane ruoth ok nyal lerone.
Kane ruoth madhako mar Sheba oneno rieko duto mag Solomon kod ode mar dak, manosegero,
gi chiemo mane ni e mesane, gi bet mar jodonge, gi rwakruok mar jotije mapogo chiemo, gi rwakruok mar jotije machiwo divai kod misango miwangʼo pep mane otimo e hekalu Jehova Nyasaye, dhoge nomoko.
Nowachone ruoth niya, “Kare humb timbeni kod riekoni mane awinjo e pinya awuon en adier.
To ne ok ayie gigo mane giwacho nyaka nabiro maneno gi wangʼa awuon. Adier kata mana nus wechego ne ok onyisa; kuom rieko gi mwandu iloyo weche ma asewinjo.
Mano kaka jogi mor manade! En mor manade ne jotendi mosiko kachungʼ e nyimi kendo winjo riekoni!
Pak odogne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi mosebedo mamor kodi moketi e kom loch mar Israel. Nikech hera mosiko mar Jehova Nyasaye ni jo-Israel oseketi ruoth mondo irit bura kendo ingʼade gadiera kod tim makare.”
Eka nomiyo ruoth dhahabu ma pekne romo kilo alufu angʼwen mia abich, gi gik mangʼeny mangʼwe ngʼar kaachiel gi kite ma nengogi tek. Ne ok ochak okel kendo gik mangʼeny mangʼwe ngʼar marom gi mago mane ruoth madhako mar Sheba nomiyo Ruoth Solomon.
Yiedhi mag Hiram nokelo dhahabu moa Ofir kendo negikelo koa kuro yiedhi madongo mag yiend almugo mangʼeny gi kite ma nengogi tek.
Ruoth notiyo gi yiend almugo mondo olosgo sirni mag hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kod od ruoth kendo mondo olosgo thumbe nyatiti gi orutu ni jower. Nyaka chakre ndalono ok osekelie kata nenoe yiend almugo mangʼeny marom gi mago.
Ruoth Solomon nomiyo ruoth madhako mar Sheba gik moko duto mane chunye dwaro kendo mane okwayo, ewi gigo duto mane osemiye mag keno mar ruoth. Eka nowuok mi odok e pinye kaachiel gi jotije.
Pek dhahabu mane Solomon yudo higa ka higa ne nyalo romo kilo alufu piero ariyo gabich,
ka ok okwan osuru misolo kuom jo-ohala kod joyiedhi madongo mag ruodhi duto mag Arabia kod jotend piny.
Ruoth Solomon nochwogo kuodi madongo mia ariyo mag dhahabu kendo kuot ka kuot nochwog gi dhahabu ma pekne romo kilo adek gi nus.
Bende nochwogo okumbni matindo mia adek mobaw gi dhahabu, okumba ka okumba nobaw gi dhahabu ma pekne romo kilo ariyo. Magi duto ruoth noketo e ode manogero e Bungu mag Lebanon.
Eka ruoth noloso kom loch maduongʼ ma iye obaw gi lak liech kendo ngʼeye obaw gi dhahabu mopwodhi.
Kom duongʼno ne nigi raidhi mag kuonde minyono auchiel kendo yo kangʼeye ne nigi wich molworore. Bethene ariyo ne nigi bede miyienge bat, ka kido mar sibuor molosi ochungʼ e bath moro ka moro.
Kido mar sibuoche apar gariyo nochungi e kuonde auchiel minyono kiidho kidhi e kom duongʼ ka moro ka moro ochungi e giko raidh auchiel koni gi koni. Onge pinyruoth moro amora manoseloso kom ruoth machalo kama.
Kikombe duto mag Ruoth Solomon nolos gi dhahabu, kod gige ot duto mokonyorego e ode mane ni e Bungu mag Lebanon nolos gi dhahabu mopwodhi. Onge gima nolos gi fedha nikech fedha nokaw ni nengone yot e kinde Solomon.
Ruoth ne nigi yiedhi mangʼeny mag ohala e nam kaachiel gi yiedhi mag jo-Hiram. Dichiel bangʼ higni adek ka higni adek negidwogo ka gitingʼo dhahabu gi fedha gi leke liech gi ongʼeche kod bimbe.
Ruoth Solomon ne nigi mwandu mangʼeny kod rieko moloyo ruodhi mamoko duto mag piny.
Pinje duto ne biro ir Solomon mondo oyud rieko mane Nyasaye oketo e chunye.
Higa ka higa ngʼato ka ngʼato manobiro nokelo mich kaka gik molos gi fedha kod dhahabu, kandho, gige lweny, gik mangʼwe ngʼar, farese kod punde.
Solomon nongʼiewo geche mag lweny kod farese; ne en gi geche mag lweny alufu achiel mia angʼwen kod farese alufu apar gariyo mane oketo e mier madongo mag geche lweny to moko bende noketo Jerusalem kama nodake.
Ruoth nomiyo fedha obedo manwangʼo yot ka kidi akida Jerusalem kendo yiend sida ne ngʼeny mana ka yiend ngʼowu ma otwi e got.
Solomon nokelo farese koa Misri kod e piny miluongo ni Kue, johala mag ruoth nongʼiewogi e piny Kue.
Negingʼiewo gach lweny koa Misri e nengo mar kilo abiriyo mar fedha kendo Faras achiel e nengo maromo kilo ariyo mar fedha. Bende ne giusogi ni ruodhi duto mag jo-Hiti gi jo-Aram.
Kata kamano Ruoth Solomon nohero nyi pinje mamoko mangʼeny; mane omedo bangʼ nyar Farao kaka nyi jo-Moab gi jo-Amon gi jo-Edom gi jo-Sidon kod nyi jo-Hiti.
Negia e ogendini mane Jehova Nyasaye okwero jo-Israel kawacho niya, “Kik ukendru kodgi, nikech adier ginilok chunyu ma uluw nyisechegi.” Kata kamano, Solomon nomoko kuomgi gihera.
Ne en-gi mon mia abiriyo monywol e ut ruodhi kod mon moketo mia adek, kendo mondego nowite.
Kaka Solomon ne medo bedo moti, monde noloko chunye moluwo nyiseche mamoko kendo chunye ne ok ochiwore chuth ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasache, kaka chuny Daudi wuon-gi ne en.
Noluwo nyasaye madhako mar jo-Sidon miluongo ni Ashtoreth kod nyasach dwanyruok mar jo-Amon miluongo ni Molek.
Omiyo Solomon notimo richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, ne ok oluwo Jehova Nyasaye gi chunye duto kaka Daudi wuon-gi notimo.
Ewi got moro yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jerusalem, Solomon nogero kama otingʼore gi malo ni nyasach dwanyruok mar Moab miluongo ni Kemosh kod nyasach dwanyruok mar jo-Amon miluongo ni Molek.
Notimo kamano ni monde mag pinje mamoko mane wangʼo ubani kendo ne chiwo misango ni nyisechegigo.
Jehova Nyasaye iye nowangʼ gi Solomon nikech chunye noselokore moa kuom Jehova Nyasaye Nyasach Israel mane osefwenyorene nyadiriyo.
Kata obedo ni notamo Solomon e luwo nyiseche mamoko Solomon ne ok orito chik Jehova Nyasaye.
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye nowacho ni Solomon niya, “Nikech ma en pachi kendo ok iserito singruokna gi buchena mane achiki, chutho abiro pogo lochni kendo abiro miyo achiel kuom jotichni.
Kata kamano, ok abi time e kindeni, nikech Daudi wuonu. To abiro poge e kinde wuodi.
To ok anamaye pinyruoth duto, to abiro miye dhoot achiel nikech Daudi jatichna kendo nikech Jerusalem, ma aseyiero.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo Solomon obedo gi jasigu ma ne en Hadad ja-Edom mane owuok e dhood joka ruoth mar Edom.
E kinde motelo kane Daudi kedo gi Edom, Joab mane jatend lweny mane odhi mondo oyik joma otho, nonego chwo duto mantie e Edom.
Joab kod jo-Israel duto nobedo kuno kuom dweche auchiel, nyaka negitieko chwo duto Edom.
To Hadad, mane pod rawera matin, noringo odhi Misri gi jodong Edom moko, mane osetiyo ni wuon-gi.
Ne giwuok Midian kendo negidhi Paran. Bangʼ kawo chwo mag Paran kodgi negidhi Misri, ir Farao ruodh Misri, mane omiyo Hadad ot gi lowo kod chiemo.
Farao ne mor ahinya gi Hadad, omiyo nokawo nyamin Tapenes ma en ruoth madhako kendo ma jaod Farao mondo obed chiege.
