Negilworo dalano amingʼa ma kech maduongʼ mane omako Samaria nomedore ma wi punda ne ingʼiewo gi fedha ma pekne romo kilo achiel, to ondongʼ mar owuoch akuru ningʼiewo gi fedha ma pekne romo achiel kuom apar mar kilo.
Kane ruodh Israel kalo machiegni gi ohinga mar dala maduongʼno, dhako moro noywak malit kawacho niya, “Konya, ruodha!”
Ruoth nodwoke niya, “Ka Jehova Nyasaye ok konyi, ere kama dayudnie konyruok.” Dobed kar dino cham, koso kar biyo divai?
Eka nopenje niya, “Angʼo marach?” To nodwoke niya, “Dhakoni nowachona mondo agol wuoda mondo wacham kawuono to kiny en bende nogol wuode mondo wacham.”
Omiyo ne watedo wuoda kendo wachamo. Kinyne ne awachone niya, In bende gol wuodi mi wacham, kare en to nosepando wuode.
Kane ruoth owinjo weche dhakono noyiecho lepe. Wachni notimore ka ruoth ne wuotho ewi ohinga, mi ji nongʼiye, moneno korwako pien gugru ei lepe.
Nowacho niya, “Mad Nyasaye chwada malit ka dipo kawuono ok angʼado wi Elisha wuod Shafat oko!”
Koro noyudo Elisha obet e ode ka en gi jodonge. Ruoth nooro jootene motelo e nyime, to kane pok ochopo, Elisha nowachone jodonge niya, “Donge uneno ka koro janekni oro ngʼato mondo obi onega? Winjuru, ka jaote ochopo, to ulor dhoot matek ma kik odonji, nimar ruodhe luwo bangʼe machiegni.”
Kane pod owuoyonegi, jaote nochopo ire. Kendo ruoth nowachone niya, “Masirani oa mana kuom Jehova Nyasaye, omiyo onge tiende medo geno kuom Jehova Nyasaye.”
Elisha nowacho niya, “Winjuru wach ma Jehova Nyasaye. Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho: Kiny kar sa maka ma, nengo gorogoro achiel mar mogo ibiro ngʼiewo silingʼ achiel, kendo gorogoro ariyo mar mogo mar shairi bende nongʼiew silingʼ ariyo e dhoranga Samaria.”
Jatelo ma ruoth ne yiengore e goke nowachone ngʼat Nyasaye niya, “Winji, kata ka Jehova Nyasaye nyalo yawo dhorangeye mag polo, bende manyalo timore adier?” Elisha nodwoke niya, “Ibiro neno ma gi wengeni iwuon, to ok inicham gimoro amora kuomgi!”
Koro ne nitie ji angʼwen ma jodhoho, mane bet e dhoranga dala maduongʼ. Negiwacho e kindgi giwegi niya, “Angʼo momiyo dwabed ka nyaka watho?
Ka wawacho ni wabiro dhi e dala maduongʼ, to kech ni kuno kendo wabiro tho. To bende ka wabet ka, pod wabiro mana tho. Kuom mano wadhiuru e kambi jo-Aram mondo wachiwre e lwetgi. Ka giweyowa to wanabed mangima, to ka ginegowa to wanatho.”
Kar kogwen negiwuok ma gidhi e kambi jo-Aram. Kane gichopo e dho kambi, kata mana ngʼat achiel ne onge kanyo,
nikech Ruoth Nyasaye nosekelo luoro e chuny jo-Aram ma giwinjo geche, farese kod jolweny mangʼeny, mani nomiyo giwacho e kindgi giwegi niya, “Neyeuru kaka ruodh Israel osengʼiewo pinje mag jo-Hiti gi ruodhi mag Misri mondo omonjwa!”
Kuom mano negia malo kar kogwen ma giringo ka giweyo hembegi, farese kod punde. Negiweyo kambigi gi mwandu duto mondo gitony gires ngimagi.
Jodhohogo nodhi nyaka dho kambi ma gidonjo e achiel kuom hembego. Negichamo chiemo kendo gimetho bangʼe gitingʼo fedha, dhahabu kod lewni mine gidhi gipandogi. Negidwogo kendo mi gidonjo e hema machielo, ma gikawo gik moko kanyo kendo gidok gipando.
Eka negiwacho kendgi giwegi niya, “Ok watim gima kare. Ma en odiechiengʼ mar wach maber, to eka walingʼ-go mana kendwa. Ka warito ma piny oyawore, to wabiro yudo kum. Kuom mano wadhiuru sani sani mondo water wachni ni joka ruoth.”
Omiyo negidhi magiluongo jorit rangeye mag dala maduongʼ kendo giwachonegi niya, “Ne wadhi e kambi jo-Aram to ok wayudo kata ngʼato achiel kata dwond ngʼato ne ok wawinjo to mana farese motwe gi punde kod hembe mowe mana kaka ne gin.”
Jorit rangeye nogoyo koko kowinjo wach maberno mi wachno notundo ne joka ruoth.
Ruoth nochungʼ malo otienono mowachone jodonge niya “Abiro nyisou gima jo-Aram osetimonwa. Gingʼeyo ni kech omakowa, omiyo giringo gia e kambigi ka gidhi pondo e bungu, ka giparo ni, ‘Jogi biro wuok oko kendo wabiro dhi ma wakawgi duto ka gingima miwadonji e dala maduongʼ.’ ”
Achiel kuom jodonge nodwoko niya, “Yier jomoko odhi e dala maduongʼ mondo okaw farese abich modongʼ kanyo. Ngima joidh faresego biro chalo mana gi ngima jo-Israel mowe ka; adier, gibiro chalo mana gi jo-Israel ma kech kayogi. Kuom mano waorgi mondo gidhi ginon gima timore.”
Eka ne giyiero geche lweny ariyo gi faresegi kendo ruoth noorogi luwo bangʼ jolweny mag Aram. Nowachone joriemb gechego niya, “Dhiuru mondo unon-ane gima osetimore.”
Negiluwo bangʼ-gi nyaka aora Jordan mine giyudo ka yo opongʼ gi lewni kod gik moko mane lwar ka jo-Aram ringo ka kihondko ogoyogi. Bangʼ mano jootego noduogo monyiso ruoth gima gisetimo.
Eka ji nowuok modhi oyako kambi jo-Aram. Kuom mano nengo gorogoro achiel mar mogo ne en silingʼ achiel to mogo mar shairi gorogoro ariyo nongʼiew silingʼ achiel mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosewacho.
Ruoth noketo jatend lweny mane oyiengore goke cha mondo orit dhorangach, to ji nonyone ka gimwomore e dhorangach motho mana kaka ngʼat Nyasaye ne osekoro e kinde mane ruoth obiro neno janabino e ode.
Notimore mana kaka ngʼat Nyasaye ne osewacho ni ruoth niya, “Kiny e sa maka ma, nengo mar mogo gorogoro achiel nongʼiew silingʼ achiel to mogo mar shairi gorogoro ariyo nongʼiew silingʼ achiel e dhoranga Samaria.”
To jateloni nowachone ngʼat Nyasaye niya, “Winji, kata ka Jehova Nyasaye nyalo yawo dhorangeye mag polo, bende manyalo timore adier?” Ngʼat Nyasaye nodwoke niya, “Ibiro nene gi wangʼi, to ok inicham gimoro amora kuome!”
Kendo mano e gima ne otimorene, nimar ji nomwomore gie dhorangach monyone mi otho.
Koro Elisha nowachone dhako mane ochiero wuode niya, “Wuogi idhi mabor gi joodi kuma inyalo dake bangʼ ndalo moko, nimar Jehova Nyasaye osekelo kech ma biro tieko higni abiriyo.”
Dhakono nodhi motimo kaka ngʼat Nyasaye nowacho, en kod joode ne giwuok ma gidhi mabor e piny jo-Filistia ma gidakie higni abiriyo.
Ka higni abiriyo norumo noduogo koa e piny jo-Filistia modhi kwayo ruoth mondo odwokne ode kod lope.
Ruoth ne wuoyo gi Gehazi jatich ngʼat Nyasaye, kowachone niya, “Nyisa e honni madongo ma Elisha osetimo.”
Kane oyudo Gehazi nyiso ruoth kaka ne Elisha ochiero ngʼato motho, to dhako mane Elisha ochiero wuode cha nochopo kanyo mondo okwa ruoth odwokne ode kod lope. Eka Gehazi nowachone ruoth niya, “Ruodha, ma e dhakono, kendo ma e wuode mane Elisha odwogone ngimane.”
Eka ruoth nopenjo dhakono kuom wach nyathineno kendo nowachone ni en kamano. Eka ruoth nogolo chik ne jatelo kuom dhakono kowacho niya, “Dwokne dhakono gige duto, kaachiel gi ohala duto mosewuok e puotheno chakre chiengʼ mane oa e pinyni nyaka chiengʼ mane oduogoe.”
Chiengʼ moro Elisha nodhi Damaski moyudo ka Ben-Hadad ruodh Aram tuo. Kane onyis ruoth ni ngʼat Nyasaye osebiro mochopo ka,
nowachone Hazael niya, “Kaw mich mondo idhi iromnego ngʼat Nyasaye. Kone openj Jehova Nyasaye ni, ‘Bende abiro chango kuom tuoni?’ ”
Hazael nodhi romo kod Elisha kotingʼo mich mar mwandu motingʼ gi ngamia piero angʼwen ma gin gik mabeyo mag piny Damaski. Nodhi ir Elisha mochungʼ e nyime mowachone niya, “Wuodi ma Ben-Hadad ruodh Aram oora mondo apenji ka bende obiro chango kuom tuoni.”
Elisha nodwoke niya, “Dhi iwachne ni, ‘Kuom adier obiro chango.’ To kata kamano Jehova Nyasaye osenyisa ni obiro tho bangʼe.”
Elisha nochomo wangʼe tir kuom Hazael, mi Hazael wiye nokuot. Bangʼe ngʼat Nyasaye nochako ywak.
Hazael nopenjo Elisha niya, “Ruodha, iywago angʼo?” To nodwoke niya, “Aywak nikech angʼeyo masira ma ibiro kelone jo-Israel. Ibiro wangʼo kuondegi mochiel motegno, ibiro nego yawuotgi matindo gi ligangla, ibiro nyono nyithindgi matindo kendo ibiro baro iye mon ma yach.”
Hazael nopenjo niya, “Ere kaka jatichni marom gi guok aguoka nyalo timo gik ma kama?” Elisha nodwoko niya, “Jehova Nyasaye osenyisa ni ibiro bedo ruodh jo-Aram.”
Eka Hazael noa ir Elisha modok ir ruodhe. To kane Ben-Hadad openje niya, “Angʼo mane Elisha owachoni.” Hazael nodwoke niya, “Nowachona ni kuom adier ibiro chango.”
To kinyne nokawo nanga mapek mobudo e pi, mi oumo wangʼ ruoth mothungʼe nyaka otho. Eka Hazael nobedo ruoth kare.
E higa mar abich mar Joram wuod Ahab ruodh Israel, kane Jehoshafat ne ruodh Juda, Jehoram wuod Jehoshafat nochako tich kaka ruodh Juda.
Ne en ja-higni piero adek gariyo kane obedo ruodh Juda, kendo norito Jerusalem kuom higni aboro.
Noluwo timbe mag ruodhi Israel, mana kaka jood Ahab notimo, nimar nokendo nyar Ahab. Notimo timbe mamono e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Kata kamano, Jehova Nyasaye ne ok otieko jo-Juda nikech noparo Daudi jatichne. Nosesingore ne Daudi gi ogandane ni ginibed e loch nyaka chiengʼ.
E ndalo loch Jehoram, Edom nongʼanyo ne Juda mi gibedo gi ruodhgi giwegi.
Omiyo Jehoram nodhi Zair gi gechene duto mag lweny. Jo-Edom nolwore kaachiel gi gechene mag lweny, to nochiewo gotieno momwomogi; ka jolweny mage to noringo modok dala.
Nyaka chil kawuono jo-Edom pod ongʼanyo ne jo-Juda. Jo-Libna bende nongʼanyo e ndalono.
To kuom weche moko mane otimore e ndalo loch Jehoram, kod gik moko duto mane otimo, ondiki e kitepe motingʼo weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi Juda.
Jehoram notho moyweyo gi kwerene e Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi, kendo wuode ma Ahazia nobedo ruoth bangʼe.
E higa mar apar gariyo mar loch Joram wuod Ahab ma ruodh Israel, Ahazia wuod Jehoram ruodh Juda nobedo e loch.
Ahazia ne ja-higni piero ariyo gariyo kane obedo ruoth, kendo norito piny kuom achiel kodak Jerusalem. Min mare ne nyinge Athalia, ma nyakwar Omri ruodh Israel.
Noluwo timbe mag od Ahab kendo notimo timbe mamono e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mana kaka od Ahab nosetimo, nimar ne gin wede e kendgi gi jood Ahab.
Ahazia gi Joram wuod Ahab nodhi kedo gi Hazael ruodh Aram e piny Ramoth Gilead. Jo-Aram nohinyo Joram;
omiyo ruoth Joram nodok Jezreel mondo ochangi kuom hinyruok mane jo-Aram ohinyego e piny Ramoth ka nokedo gi Hazael ruodh Aram. Eka Ahazia wuod Jehoram ruodh Juda nodhi Jezreel mondo one Joram wuod Ahab nikech nosehinye.
Elisha janabi noluongo achiel kuom jonabi mowachone niya, “Ngʼwan lawi e nungoni, kendo ikaw morni idhigo e piny Ramoth Gilead.
Ka ichopo kanyo, to imany Jehu wuod Jehoshafat, ma wuod Nimshi. Dhi ire igole oko e kind ji kendo itere nyaka ei ot kar kende.
Bangʼ mano, kaw puga motingʼo mo iol e wiye kiwacho niya, ‘Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho: Asewali bedo ruodh Israel.’ Bangʼ timo ma to iyaw dhoot; kendo ring piyo, kik ideki!”
Eka wuowi matin ma janabi nodhi Ramoth Gilead.
Kane ochopo noyudo ka jotend lweny obet kanyakla. Nowachone jatend lweny niya, “An-gi wach moro madwaro wachoni.” Jehu nopenje niya, “En ngʼa kuomwa ka midwaro losogo?” Nodwoke niya, “En mana in, jatend lweny.”
Jehu nochungʼ malo modhi kode ei ot. Bangʼ mano janabino noolo mo ewi Jehu kowachone niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel wacho: ‘Asewali mondo ibed ruodh Israel ma gin jo-Jehova Nyasaye.
Nyaka itiek od Ahab ma ruodhi, kendo abiro chulo kuor nikech remb jotichna ma jonabi kendo nikech remb jotich Jehova Nyasaye mane ochwer gi Jezebel.
Abiro tieko od Ahab duto. Abiro tieko chwo manie od Ahab e piny Israel bedni gin wasumbini kata joma ni thuolo.
Abiro keto od Ahab chal gi od Jeroboam wuod Nebat kendo ochal kaka od Baasha wuod Ahija.
To ne Jezebel guogi ema nocham ringre e puodho manie paw Jezreel kendo onge ngʼama noyike.’ ” Bangʼ mano noyawo dhoot moringo odhi.
Kane Jehu odok ir jotend lweny wetene achiel kuomgi nopenje niya, “Bende weche duto beyo? To angʼo mane janekono obirone iri?” Jehu nodwokogi niya, “Ungʼeyo ngʼatno, to gi gik ma onyalo wacho.”
Negikwere niya, “Mano en miriambo, wachnwa adier.” Jehu nodwokogi niya, “Ma e gima nonyisa: ‘Ni Jehova Nyasaye owacho: Asewiri mondo ibed ruodh Israel.’ ”
Negigolo lepgi piyo piyo ma gipedho ewi raidhi mondo Jehu owuothie. Eka negigoyo turumbete ka gigoyo koko niya, “Jehu en ruoth!”
Eka Jehu wuod Jehoshafat ma wuod Nimshi nochano lingʼ-lingʼ mondo omonj Joram. (Koro Joram gi jo-Israel duto nosebedo kakedo mondo gisir Ramoth Gilead kuom monj moa kuom Hazael ruodh Aram,
to ruoth Joram noduogo Jezreel mondo ochangi kuom adhonde mane oyudo kuom lweny mane ni e kinde gi Hazael ruodh jo-Aram). Jehu mowachone niya, “Ka ma e kaka uparo, to kik iyie ngʼato angʼata wuogi e dala maduongʼ ka mondo odhi ohul wachni e piny Jezreel.”
Eka nodhi moidho gache mar lweny moringo odhi Jezreel nikech Joram ne ni kuno kendo Ahazia ruodh Juda bende noyudo ni kuno kaka wendone.
Ka jangʼicho mane ni ewi ohinga man Jezreel noneno jolweny Jehu kabiro, nogoyo koko niya, “Aneno ka jolweny biro.” Joram nokone niya, “Or ngʼato gi faras mondo odhi openjgi ka gibiro e yor kwe.”
Jariemb faras noringo moromo gi Jehu mowachone niya, “Ruodha penjo kama: ‘Bende ubiro e yor kwe?’ ” Jehu nodwoke niya, “Kwe to obadhi angʼo? Luw bangʼa.” Jangʼicho nodwoko wach ni Joram ni, “Jaote osechopo irgi, to ok ane koduogo.”
Kuom mano ruoth nooro jariemb faras mar ariyo. Kane ochopo irgi nowachonegi niya, “Ruodha penjo kama: ‘Bende ubiro e yor kwe?’ ” Jehu nodwoke niya, “Kwe to obadhi e angʼo? Luw bangʼa.”
Jangʼicho noduogo wach ne Joram niya, “Osechopo irgi, to ok ane koduogo. Jariemb gari cha chalo mana gi Jehu wuod Nimshi, kendo oriembo mana ka janeko.”
Joram nogolo chik niya, “Ikna gacha.” To kane giseikone gache, Joram ruodh Israel kod Ahazia ruodh Juda noriembo gechegi, ka ngʼato ka ngʼato ni e gache owuon mondo girom gi Jehu. Negiromo kode e puodho mane mar Naboth ja-Jezreel.
Kane Joram oneno Jehu nopenje niya, “Ibiro e yor kwe koso?” Jehu nodwoke niya, “Ere kaka kwe nyalo betie kapod Jezebel minu dhi nyime gi lamo nyiseche manono kod timo timbe jwok?”
Joram nolokore moa gi ngʼwech kokok ne Ahazia niya, “Ja-andhoga Ahazia!”
Eka Jehu noywayo atungʼ modiro asere kendo ochwoyo kind ngʼede Joram. Asere nopowo dho chunye molwar piny oa ewi gache.
Jehu nowachone Bidkar jatend gechene mag lweny niya, “Kawe ibole e puodho mane mar Naboth ja-Jezreel. Par kaka in kod an ne wariembo gechewa kanyachiel bangʼ Ahab ma wuon-gi kane Jehova Nyasaye okoro wachni kuome kama:
‘Nyoro ne aneno remb Naboth gi remb yawuote kendo adiera abiro miyo gichul kuom chwero remo e puodho manie pap,’ Jehova Nyasaye owacho. Kaweuru kendo ubole e puodhono kaluwore gi wach Jehova Nyasaye.”
Kane Ahazia ruodh Juda oneno gima otimore noringo kotony gi yor Beth-Hagan. Jehu nolawe kakok niya, “En bende negeuru!” Ne gihinye ewi gache mar lweny koringo ochomo Gur man but Ibleam, to notony kodhi Megido kuma nothoe.
Jotichne nokawe gi gach lweny nyaka Jerusalem moike kod kwerene e bure mantiere e Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi.
E higa mar apar gachiel mar Joram wuod Ahab, Ahazia nobedo ruoth e piny Juda.
Kane Jehu odhi Jezreel, Jezebel nowinjo birone kanyo, mi obuko wangʼe kendo oloso wiye kongʼicho gie dirisa.
Kane Jehu odonjo e dhorangach nopenjo niya, “Ibiro e yor kwe, in Zimri ma janek ruodheni?”
Nongʼiyo malo e dirisa mopenjo niya, “En ngʼa ma jakora? En ngʼa?” Eka ji ariyo kata adek mabwoch nongʼiye gi kwinyo.
Jehu nowachonegi niya, “Diruru dhakono piny!” Omiyo negidire piny ma rembe moko okirore e kor ohinga ka farase nyone piny.
Jehu nodonjo e dalano mochiemo kendo ometho. Eka nowachonegi niya, “Kawuru dhako mokwongʼno udhi uyiki, nimar ne en nyar ruoth.”
To kane gidhi yike onge gima negiyudo makmana hanga wiye, tiendene gi lwetene.
Negidok ma giwachone Jehu wachno, mane owacho niya, “Ma e wach mane Jehova Nyasaye owacho kokadho kuom jatichne Elija ja-Tishbi: E puodho manie paw Jezreel guogi nokidh ringre Jezebel.
Ringre Jezebel nochal ka owuoyo moyar e pewe mag Jezreel, maonge ngʼama nyalo wacho ni ma Jezebel.”
E piny Samaria ne nitie yawuowi piero abiriyo mawuok e dhood Ahab. Kuom mano Jehu nondiko barupe mooro Samaria ne jotend Jezreel, ne jodonge kod jorit mag nyithind Ahab kowachonegi niya,
“E sa ma baruwani nochopnue, nikech un gi yawuot ruodhu kod geche lweny gi farese, gi dala maduongʼ mochiel motegno kod gige lweny,
yieruru achiel kuom yawuot ruoth mowinjore kendo ukete obed e loch wuon-gi. Bangʼ mano ikreuru mondo uked ne dhood ruodhu.”
To kihondko ne ogoyogi magiwacho niya, “Ka ruodhi pinje ariyo ne ok nyal sire, wan to bende dwasire?”
Eka jatend dala ruoth, jatend dala maduongʼ, jodongo kod jorit mag nyithind Ahab nooro wachni ne Jehu kama: “Wan mana jotichni omiyo wabiro timo gimoro amora miwacho. Ok wabi yiero ngʼato e dierwa mondo obed ruoth, tim gima chunyi oneno ni ber.”
Eka Jehu nondikonegi baruwa mar ariyo mawacho niya, “Ka un jokora kendo ubiro winjo wachna, to ngʼaduru wiye yawuot ruodhu kendo kiny kochopo sa maka ma to ubi ira Jezreel.” E kindeno yawuot ruoth piero abiriyo ne ni kod jorit mag-gi mane gin jotend dala maduongʼno.
Kane baruwa ochopo jogi nokawo yawuot ruoth piero abiriyogo ma ginego. Negikawo wiyegi ma giketogi ei okapu kendo giterone Jehu e piny Jezreel.
Kane jaote ochopo ne owacho ne Jehu niya, “Gisekelo wiye yawuot ruoth.” Eka Jehu nogolo chik niya, “Dhurgiuru pidhe ariyo e dhoranga dala maduongʼ nyaka piny yawre.”
Kinyne gokinyi machielono Jehu nowuok modhi ochungʼ e nyim oganda mowachonegi niya, “Un to uonge ketho makmana ni an ema ne ariwora gi ji ma andhogo ruodha kendo anege, to koro joma othogi duto, to ngʼama onego?
Koro ngʼeuru ni onge wach ma Jehova Nyasaye osewacho ewi od Ahab ma ok nochop kare. Jehova Nyasaye osetimo gima ne osingo kokalo kuom jatichne Elija.”
Omiyo Jehu nonego ji duto man Jezreel mane odongʼ e od Ahab, kaachiel gi jotende duto, osiepene kod jodolo mage duto, maonge ngʼama noweyo kangima.
Eka Jehu ne owuok kochomo yo Samaria. Kane ochopo kar jokwath miluongo ni Beth Eked,
ne oromo gi wede Ahazia ruodh Juda moko mopenjogi niya, “Un ngʼa gini.” To negidwoko niya, “Wan wede Ahazia kendo ne walor mondo wamos joka ruoth kod min ruoth.”
Eka nogolo chik niya, “Makgiuru” Omiyo negimako ji piero angʼwen gariyogo ma gidhi kodgi e bath soko man Beth Eked ma ginegogi, kendo onge moro amora mane otony.
Kane osea kanyo noyudo Jehonadab wuod Rekab, mane dhi romone. Jehu nomose mopenje niya, “Bende in koda e winjruok kaka an kodini?” Jehonadab nodwoke niya, Ee an kodi. Jehu nowachone niya, “Ka en kamano, to miya lweti.” Omiyo notimo kamano kendo nomako lwete moidho gach lweny.
Jehu nowachone niya, “Bi mondo idhi koda mondo ineye kaka achiwora tiyone Jehova Nyasaye.” Eka negidhi kode koidho gache.
Kane Jehu ochopo Samaria, nonego jood Ahab duto mane odongʼ, notiekogi kaluwore gi wach mane Jehova Nyasaye owachone Elija.
Eka Jehu nochoko ji duto kanyakla mowachonegi niya, “Ahab ne otiyone Baal mana matin, to Jehu biro tiyone mangʼeny.
Koro luong jonabi duto mag Baal, jodonge duto kod jodolone duto. Kik yudi ni ngʼato kuomgi onge nikech adhi timo nyasi mar misango maduongʼ ne Baal. Ngʼato angʼata ma ok ochopo e nyasino to ok nobed mangima.” To Jehu ne wuondore nimar ne odwaro kaka doneg jodong Baal duto.
Jehu nowacho niya, “Timuru chokruok maduongʼ mar Baal.” Omiyo negilando wachno.
Eka nooro wach e piny Israel duto mi jodong Baal duto nobiro; kendo onge kata mana ngʼato achiel mane odongʼ. Negipongʼo ii hekaluno duto koni gi koni.
Kendo Jehu nowachone jarit kar keno mar lewni niya, “Keluru kandhe moromo jodong Baal duto.” Omiyo nokelo kandhe moromogi duto.
Bangʼ mano Jehu gi Jehonadab wuod Rekab nodhi ei hekalu mar Baal. Jehu nowachone jodong Baal duto niya, “Neuru ni onge jatich Jehova Nyasaye moro amora kodu ka makmana jodong Baal.”
Eka negidonjo ei hekaluno mondo gichiw misengini miwangʼo pep kod liswa. Noyudo Jehu oseketo ji piero aboro oko momiyogi siem kama: “Kapo ni ngʼato moro kuomu oweyo achiel kuom jogi otony, to ngimani nokaw kar ngimane.”
Sa mane Jehu osetieko misango miwangʼo pep, ne ogolo chikne jorit gi jotelo kama: “Donjuru kendo uneg-gi, kendo kik uwe moro otony.” Omiyo neginegogi gi ligangla. Jorit kod jotelogo nowito ringregi oko kendo negidonjo nyaka ei agola mar hekalu mar Baal.
Bangʼe negigolo oko kido milamo e hekalu mar Baal mi giwangʼe.
Negitoyo kidi milamo kendo gimuko hekalu mar Baal kendo kanyo ji osebedo katiyogo kaka choo nyaka chil kawuono.
Omiyo Jehu noketho lamo Baal e piny Israel.
Kata kamano ne ok olokore oweyo richo mar Jeroboam wuod Nebat, mane omiyo jo-Israel odonje richo mar lamo nyaroya mar mula mochwe e Bethel kod Dan.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Jehu niya, “Nikech isetimo maber mondo ichop gima nikare e wangʼa kendo isetimo ne od Ahab gik mane ni e pacha, ogandani nobed e loch mar Israel nyaka tiengʼ mar angʼwen.”
Kata kamano Jehu ne ok oritore kuom mako chike Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel gi chunye duto. Bende ne ok olokore e richo Jeroboam, mane omiyo jo-Israel otimo.
E kindeno Jehova Nyasaye nochako dwoko kwan mar jo-Israel piny, Hazael noloyo jo-Israel e pinjegi duto,
chakre aora Jordan kochomo yo wuok chiengʼ kaachiel gi pinje duto mag Gilead (ma gin gwenge mag Gad, Reuben kod Manase), kendo chakre Aroer manie bath aora Arnon kokadho Gilead nyaka Bashan.
To kuom weche moko mondiki e sigand loch Jehu, gik mane otimo, gima ne ochopo kare, donge ondikgi e kitabu motingʼo weche mag ruodhi jo-Israel?
Jehu notho moyweyo gi kwerene kendo ne oike e piny Samaria mi Jehoahaz wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
Ndalo mane Jehu obedo gi loch e piny Israel ka en Samaria noromo higni piero ariyo gaboro.
Kane Athalia min Ahazia noneno ni wuode osetho, nodhi mondo otiek dala ruoth duto.
To Jehosheba nyar ruoth Jehoram ma nyamin Ahazia, nokawo Joash wuod Ahazia mopande lingʼ-lingʼ mabor kod yawuot ruoth mane koro ochiegni negi. Nyakono nokawe kaachiel gi japite mopandogi e od Athalia mar nindo, omiyo ne ok onege.
Nodongʼ kopande kaachiel gi japite ei hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kuom higni auchiel e kinde loch Athalia.
E higa mar abiriyo Jehoyada nooro jotend lweny mag migepe mag ji mia achiel, jo-Kari kod jorit, mokelgi ire ei hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye. Ne otimo singruok kodgi mi oketogi gikwongʼore e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye. Bangʼ mano nokelo wuod ruoth mondo gingʼeye.
Nochikogi kowacho niya, “Ma e gima nyaka utim: Achiel kuom adek maru matiyo chiengʼ Sabato nyaka rit kar dak ruoth.
Achiel kuom adek machielo maru nyaka rit dhoranga Sur. Kendo achiel kuom adek modongʼ nyaka rit alwora mar hekalu. Joritgo duto nyaka rit kar dak ruoth.
Migepe ariyo mamoko modongʼ ma ok ti chiengʼ Sabato nyaka rit ruoth e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Rituru ruoth ka ulwore ka ngʼato ka ngʼato otingʼo gige lweny e lwete. Ngʼato angʼata mosudo machiegni kodu nyaka negi. Beduru machiegni gi ruoth kamoro amora modhiye.”
Jotend ji mia achiel mane ni e migepe adekgo notimo mana kaka Jehoyada jadolo nochikogi. Jatend migawo ka migawo nokawo joge mane dhi tich chiengʼ Sabato to gi mago mane onego oywe, mi giduto negidhi ir Jehoyada jadolo.
Eka nomiyo jotend migepe mag jolweny tonge kod kuodi, mane mag ruoth Daudi kendo mane okan e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Joritgo, ka moro ka moro nigi gire mar lweny e lwete, chakre yo milambo nyaka yo nyandwat mar hekalu ka gilworo kendo mar misango kod hekalu.
Jehoyada nogolo wuod ruoth oko mi osidhone osimbo mar loch; eka nomiye kitap chik mi okete ruoth. Ne giwire ka ji pamo lwetgi ka gigoyo koko niya, “Ruoth mondo odag amingʼa!”
Kane Athalia owinjo koko mane jorito kod ji goyo, nodhi ir jogo mane ni e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Nongʼicho moneno ruoth kochungʼ e bath siro kaka chik jo-Israel ne dwaro. Jotelo gi jogo turumbete nochungʼ e bath ruoth kendo ji duto mag pinyno ne mor kendo negigoyo turumbete. Eka Athalia noyiecho lepe kakok niya, “Andhoga! Andhoga!”
Jehoyada jadolo nogolo chik ne jotend lweny morito migepe mag jolweny mia achiel-ka, ma bende ne gin jotend jolweny kowachonegi niya, “Keleuru e dierwa ka kendo neguru ngʼato angʼata maluwe.” Nimar jadolo nosewacho niya, “Dhakono ok onego negi ei hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.”
Omiyo negimake kane ochopo kama farese donjogo e dala ruoth kendo kanyo ema ne onege.
Eka Jehoyada nomiyo ruoth kod jo-Israel osingore ne Jehova Nyasaye ni ginibed jo-Jehova Nyasaye. Nomiyo ruoth gi ji otimo singruok e kindgi giwegi.
Jopinyno nodhi e hekalu mar Baal kendo negimuke piny. Negitoyo matindo tindo kendo mar misango kod nyiseche manono mi ginego Matan jadolo mar Baal e nyim kende mag misango. Bangʼ mano Jehoyada jadolo noketo joma rito hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Nokawo jotend migepe mag jolweny mia achiel-ka, jo-Kari, jorito kod jopinyno duto kendo giduto kanyakla negikelo ruoth koa e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye mi gikowe nyaka kare mar dak, ka giluwo dhoranga jorito. Bangʼ mano Joash nobedo e kome mar loch.
Jopinyno duto nobedo gi mor kendo dala maduongʼ nobedo gi kwe nikech Athalia nosenegi gi ligangla e kar dak ruoth.
Joash ne ja-higni abiriyo kane ochako bedo e loch.
E higa mar abiriyo mar loch Jehu, Joash nobedo ruoth kendo nobedo e loch Jerusalem kuom higni piero angʼwen. Min mare ne iluongo ni Zibia; mane aa Bersheba.
Joash notimo gima ber e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye e higni duto mane Jehoyada jadolo ne ngʼadone rieko.
Kata kamano kuonde motingʼore gi malo mag wangʼo misengini ne ok omuki kendo ji nodhi nyime mana gi chiwo misengini kod wangʼo ubani mangʼwe ngʼar kanyo.
Joash nowachone jodolo niya, “Chokuru pesa duto mokel kaka chiwo mag pwodhruok e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye; pesa moyudi e kwano ji, pesa moyudi e singruok mar ngʼato e ngimane kod pesa ma ngʼato ochiwo kuom hero mare owuon.
Weuru jadolo ka jadolo oyud pesa koa kuom achiel kuom jokan pesa; pesano onego olosgo kamoro amora ma okethore ei hekalu.”
Bangʼ higni piero ariyo gadek ka ruoth Joash osebedo e loch; jodolo ne pok oloso kuonde momukore ei hekalu.
Kuom mano ruoth Joash noluongo Jehoyada jadolo kod jonabi mamoko, mopenjogi niya, “Angʼo momiyo ok ulos kuonde mane okethore e hekalu? Kik uchak ukaw pesa ir jokenou, to utergi ne joma onego olos kuonde momukore e hekalu.”
Jodolo noyie ni ok gibi choko pesa kendo kuom ji kendo gin giwegi bende ok gibi loso kuonde mokethore mag hekalu.
Jehoyada jadolo nokawo sanduku moro, motucho raumne kendo nokete e bat korachwich mar kendo mar misango kama ochomore gi dhood hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye. Pesa duto mane donjo e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye, jodolo ma jorit dhoot ne ketogi e sandukuno.
Kinde duto mane gineno ka pesa opongʼo sanduku, jagoro maka ruoth kod jadolo maduongʼ ne biro kwano pesa mane okel e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo ketogi e mifuke.
Ka pesago ne osengʼe kwan-gi, ne gimiyogi nyipeche mane ochungʼ ne tich loso hekalu. Kanyo bende ema ne gigoloe pesa ma ichulo joma tiyo ei hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye ma gin jogo randa, jogedo kod jopa kite.
Negingʼiewo bepe kendo gipayo kite mondo olosgo kuonde mokethore e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye, kendo chulo gik moko duto mane dwarore mondo hekalu oduog kare.
Pesa mane okel e hekalu ne ok otigo kuom loso tewni mag fedha gi gik mingʼadogo otambi mar teyni, kod tewni, kod bakunde mag kiro remo, kaachiel gi turumbete kod gik moko duto mag dhahabu gi fedha mar hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye,
to pesano notigo kuom chulo jotich mane loso kuonde mane omukore e hekalu.
Ne ok gidwar ni mondo olernegi kaka pesa otiyo e lwet joma ne omi mondo ochul jotich, nimar ne gin joma ogen.
To pesa mane ogol kuom misango mar pwodhruok e ketho gi mag chiwo migolo kuom richo motim ok ne kel ei hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye, mago ne iwene jodolo.
E ndalono ema Hazael ruodh Aram ne odhi momonjo Gath mi omake. Eka ne odhi mondo omonj Jerusalem bende.
To Joash ruodh Juda nokawo gik moko duto mowal mane kwerene kaka Jehoshafat, Jehoram kod Ahazia mane gin ruodhi mag Juda osechiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye. Gigo duto Joash noorone Hazael ruodh Aram, kaachiel gi gik moko duto mane en owuon osechiwo ne Jehova Nyasaye; kaachiel gi dhahabu duto mane ni e kar keno mar hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kod kar keno mar od ruoth kendo Hazael ne ok omonjo Jerusalem.
To kuom weche moko mondiki e ndalo loch Joash gi gik moko duto mane otimo donge gin e kitabu mondikie weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi Juda?
Jodonge nowinjore mondo ondhoge mi onege e Beth Milo, e yo madhi mwalo Sila.
Jodonge mane onege ne gin Jozabad wuod Shimeath kod Jehozabad wuod Shomer. Notho moike kod kwerene e Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi kendo Amazia wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
E higa mar piero ariyo gadek mar loch Joash wuod Ahazia ruodh Juda, Jehoahaz wuod Jehu nobedo ruodh Israel ka en Samaria kendo nobedo e ruoth kuom higni apar gabiriyo.
Notimo gik mamono e nyim wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye, kane oluwo timbe maricho mag Jeroboam wuod Nebat, mane omiyo jo-Israel odonje kendo ne ok olokore weyo gigo.
Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye nokecho gi jo-Israel kendo kuom ndalo mangʼeny noweyogi e bwo loch Hazael ruodh Aram kod Ben-Hadad wuode.
Eka Jehoahaz nokwayo Jehova Nyasaye kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowinje, nimar noneno kaka ruodh Aram ne sando jo-Israel malit.
Jehova Nyasaye nochiwo ne jo-Israel jares, mi gitony gia e loch jo-Aram. Eka jo-Israel nochako odok modak e miechgi mana kaka ne gisebetie mokwongo.
To kata kamano ne ok gilokore giweyo richo mane ni e od Jeroboam, mane omiyo jo-Israel otimo, to negidhi nyime mana gi timbegi. Kendo siro mar nyasaye madhako miluongo ni Ashera nosiko kochungʼ Samaria.
Jolweny mag Jehoahaz notieki makmana joidh farese piero abich, geche mag lweny apar kod jolweny mawuotho gi tiendgi alufu apar ema ne odongʼ, nikech ruodh Aram nosetieko mamoko duto kendo nomiyo gichalo mihudhwe.
To kuom gik mamoko duto mane ondiki e ndalo loch Jehoahaz gi gik moko duto mane otimo, donge ondikgi e kitepe mag weche ruodhi mag Israel?
Jehoahaz nonindo moyweyo gi kwerene mi noyike Samaria kendo wuode ma Jehoash nobedo ruoth kare.
E higa mar piero adek gabiriyo mar loch Joash ruodh Juda, Jehoash wuod Jehoahaz nobedo ruodh Israel ka en piny Samaria kendo nobedo ruoth kuom higni apar gauchiel.
Notimo timbe mamono e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye kendo ne ok oweyo timbe mag richo mar Jeroboam wuod Nebat, mane omiyo jo-Israel otimo; nodhi nyime kotimogi.
To kuom weche duto mane ondiki e ndalo loch Jehoash; gi gik moko duto mane otimo, kod teko mane okedogo gi Amazia ruodh Juda, donge ondikgi e kitepe mag weche ruodhi mag Israel?
Jehoash nonindo moyweyo gi kwerene kendo Jeroboam nobedo ruoth kare. Jehoash noiki e piny Samaria gi ruodhi mag Israel.
Kane Elisha tuo gi tuo mane biro nege, Jehoash ruodh Israel nodhi nene moywage niya, “Wuora! Wuora isebedonwa kaka geche lweny kod joidh farese mag Israel!”
Eka Elisha nowachone niya, “Kaw atungʼ kod aserni moko,” kendo notimo kamano.
Eka nowachone ruodh Israel niya, “Kaw atungʼ e lweti.” Kane osekawo atungʼno, Elisha noketo lwetene kuom lwete ruoth.
Elisha nokone niya, “Yaw dirisa mochomo yo wuok chiengʼ,” minoyawe. Bangʼ mano nokone niya, “Dir asere.” Kane osediro asere, Elisha nokone niya, “Mano asech loch Jehova Nyasaye kendo onyiso adier ni ibiro loyo jo-Aram modak Afek.”
Eka nowachone niya, “Kaw aserni kendo ruoth nokawo asernigo.” Elisha nokone niya, “Chwo asernigo piny, mine otimo kamano nyadidek bangʼe oweyo.”
Elisha ngʼat Nyasaye nokecho kode mowacho niya, “Nonego ichwogi piny nyadibich kata nyadiuchiel; eka dine iloyo jo-Aram mitiekogi chuth, to sani to ibiro loyogi mana nyadidek kende.”
Elisha notho moike. E ndalogo jolwenj Moab nohero monjo pinyno e ndalo mag chwiri.
Chiengʼ moro kane jo-Israel yiko ngʼato, negipo ka gineno wasigu kabiro, mi negibolo ringre ngʼatno e bur mane oike Elisha. Kane ringre ngʼatno olwar e choke Elisha, nopo ka chunye odwogo mochungʼ gi tiendene.
Hazael ruodh Aram ne osando jo-Israel ndalo duto mag loch Jehoahaz.
To Jehova Nyasaye notimonegi ngʼwono, kech kod miwafu koparo singruok mane otimo gi Ibrahim, Isaka kod Jakobo. To nyaka chil kawuono Jehova Nyasaye pok obedo gi paro mar tiekogi kata riembogi e wangʼe.
Hazael ruodh Aram notho kendo Ben-Hadad wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
Eka Jehoash wuod Jehoahaz noduogo mier mane oyudo Ben-Hadad wuod Hazael nosemayo Jehoahaz wuon mare e lweny. Jehoash noloyo Ben-Hadad nyadidek e lweny mine odwoko miergo duto e lwet jo-Israel.
E higa mar ariyo mar loch Jehoash wuod Jehoahaz ruodh Israel, Amazia wuod Joash ruodh Juda nobedo ruoth.
Ne en ja-higni piero ariyo gabich kane obedo ruoth kendo norito Jerusalem kuom higni piero ariyo gochiko. Min mare ne nyinge Jehoadin, nyar Jerusalem.
Notimo gima kare e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, to ok kaka Daudi kwar mare notimo. Noluwo tim wuon mare Joash e gik moko duto.
Kata kamano kuonde motingʼore gi malo mag wangʼo misengini ne ok omuki, kendo ji nodhi nyime mana gi chiwo misengini kod wangʼo ubani mangʼwe ngʼar kanyo.
Bangʼ ka pinyruodhe nosegurore maber, nonego jotelo mane onego wuon mare mane ruoth.
Kata kamano ne ok onego yawuot jonekgo koluwo gima ondikie Kitap Chik mar Musa mane Jehova Nyasaye oketo mawacho niya, “Wuone ok nonegi nikech ketho mag nyithindgi, bende nyithindo kik negi nikech ketho mag wuonegi; to ngʼato ka ngʼato nonegi nikech richone owuon.”
Amazia ema ne oloyo jolweny jo-Edom alufu apar e holo mar Chumbi kendo nomako Sela e lweny, moloko nyinge ni Jokthel, kendo pod iluonge kamano nyaka chil kawuono.
Bangʼ mano Amazia nooro joote ir Jehoash wuod Jehoahaz, ma wuod Jehu ruodh Israel, kosieme niya, “Bi warom wangʼ gi wangʼ.”
To Jehoash ruodh Israel nodwoko Amazia ruodh Juda gi ngero niya, “Kuth alii man Lebanon nooro wach ne yiend sida man Lebanon ni, ‘Yie ichiw nyari ne wuoda mondo okendi.’ To le moro mar bungu mowuok Lebanon nokadho kanyo monyono kuth aliino gi tiende.
En adier ni iseloyo jo-Edom kendo koro iwuoyo marach. Bed mamor kuom lochnino, to kik iwuogi e dala! Angʼo momiyo imanyo lweny mabiro tieki kaachiel gi jo-Juda duto?”
Kata kamano Amazia ne ok odewo, omiyo Jehoash ruodh Israel nomonje. Jehoash kod Amazia ruodh Juda ne joromo e lweny e dala mar Beth Shemesh man Juda.
Jo-Israel noloyo jo-Juda kendo ngʼato ka ngʼato noringo kochomo dalane.
Jehoash ruodh Israel nomako Amazia ruodh Juda, ma wuod Joash, ma wuod Ahazia e Beth Shemesh. Bangʼe Jehoash nodhi Jerusalem kendo nomuko ohinga mar Jerusalem chakre e dhoranga Efraim nyaka kama ohinga ogomogo; bor kama ne omuko ne romo fut mia abich gi piero ochiko gachiel.
Nokawo dhahabu gi fedha duto kod gik moko duto mane oyudo e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kod mwandu duto mane ni e od ruoth, bende nokawo. Ji moko mano mako e lweny, bangʼe nodok e piny Samaria.
To kuom gik mamoko duto mane otimore e ndalo loch Jehoash, gi gik moko duto mane otimo kod teko mane okedogi Amazia ruodh Juda, donge ondikgi e kitepe mag weche ruodhi mag Israel?
Jehoash notho moyweyo gi kwerene kendo noyike Samaria gi ruodhi Israel kendo Jeroboam wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
Amazia wuod Joash ruodh Juda nodak higni apar gabich bangʼ tho Jehoash wuod Jehoahaz ruodh Israel.
To weche mamoko mag loch Amazia, donge ondikgi e kitap weche ruodhi mag Juda?
Negichikone obadho e Jerusalem mi oringo odhi Lakish, to negioro ji bangʼe Lakish ma onege kuno.
Noduog ringre kotingʼ gi faras kendo noyike Jerusalem but kwerene e Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi.
Eka jo-Juda duto nokawo Azaria mane hike apar gi auchiel mokete ruoth kar wuon mare Amazia.
En ema ne ogero kuonde mane omukore mag Elath, mi odwoke ne Juda bangʼ ka ruoth Amazia nosetho moike gi kwerene.
E higa mar apar gabich mar Amazia wuod Joash ruodh Juda, Jeroboam wuod Jehoash ruodh Israel nobedo ruodh Samaria kendo nobedo ruoth kuom higni piero angʼwen gachiel.
Timbene ne richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo ne ok olokore weyo yore mag richo mar Jeroboam wuod Nebat, mane omiyo jo-Israel otimo.
En ema ne odwoko tongʼ mag Israel chakre Lebo Hamath nyaka chop Nam mar Araba, kaluwore gi wach Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, mane owacho koa e dho jatichne Jona wuod Amitai, mane janabi moa Gath Hefer.
Jehova Nyasaye noneno kaka joma ni Israel ne sandore malit, bedni ne gin wasumbini kata ok gin wasumbini; maonge ngʼama ne nyalo resogi.
To nikech Jehova Nyasaye ne pok owacho ni obiro golo nying jo-Israel e piny, nomiyo Jeroboam wuod Jehoash oresogi.
To kuom gik mamoko duto mane otimore e ndalo loch Jeroboam kod lochne e lwenje duto, kaachiel gi kaka noduogo Damaski kod Hamath mane ni e lwet Juda ne Israel; donge ondikgi e kitepe mag weche ruodhi mag Israel.
Jeroboam notho moyweyo gi kwerene, mane ruodhi mag Israel kendo Zekaria wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
E higa mar piero ariyo gabiriyo mar loch Jeroboam ruodh Israel, Azaria wuod Amazia ruodh Juda nobedo e loch.
Ne en ja-higni apar gauchiel kane odoko ruoth, kendo nobedo ruoth kodak Jerusalem kuom higni piero abich gariyo. Min mare ne nyinge Jekolia, ma nyar Jerusalem.
Notimo gima kare e nyim wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye, mana kaka wuon-gi Amazia nosetimo.
Kuonde motingʼore gi malo kata kamano ne ok omuki kendo ji nodhi nyime mana gi chiwo misengini kendo wangʼo ubani mangʼwe ngʼar kanyo.
Jehova Nyasaye nogoyo ruoth gi dhoho nyaka chiengʼ thone, kendo nodak e ot kar kende. Jotham wuod ruoth ema ne rito dala ruoth kendo norito piny.
To kuom weche moko mag loch Azaria to gi mane otimo e ndalone donge ondikgi e kitepe mag ruodhi Juda.
Azaria notho moyweyo gi kwerene kendo noyike machiegni kodgi e Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi, kendo Jotham wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
E higa mar piero adek gaboro mar Azaria ruodh Juda, Zekaria wuod Jeroboam nobedo ruodh Israel ei Samaria kendo nobedo ruoth kuom dweche auchiel.
Timbene ne richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mana kaka kwerene notimo, kendo ne ok oweyo richo mag Jeroboam wuod Nebat mane omiyo jo-Israel otimo.
Shalum wuod Jabesh nochano mar nego Zekaria. Nomonje e kind ji mi onege kendo nobedo ruoth kare.
Weche mamoko mag loch Zekaria ondiki e kitepe weche mag ruodhi Israel.
Omiyo wach Jehova Nyasaye mane ohul kowuok kuom Jehu nochopo kare mawacho niya, “Nyikwayi nobedi e loch mar Israel nyaka tiengʼ mar angʼwen.”
Shalum wuod Jabesh nobedo ruoth e higa mar piero adek gochiko mar loch Uzia ruodh Juda, kendo nobedo ruoth Samaria kuom dwe achiel.
Eka Menahem wuod Gadi nowuok koa Tirza modhi nyaka Samaria. Nomonjo Shalum wuod Jabesh ei Samaria monege kendo nobedo ruoth kare.
Weche moko duto mag loch Shalum, kendo kaka nojamo Zekaria, ondiki e kitepe mag weche ruodhi Israel.
E ndalono Menahem nowuok koa Tirza mondo modhi monjo Tifsa gi ji duto mane nitie e dala maduongʼ gi mier mokiewo kode nimar nodagi yawo rangeyene. Noriembo Tifsa mobaro iye mon ma yach duto.
E higa mar piero adek gochiko mar loch Azaria ruodh Juda, Menahem wuod Gadi nobedo ruoth Israel, kendo nobedo ruoth Samaria kuom higni apar.
Timbene ne richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye. Ndalo lochne duto ne ok oweyo timbe maricho mar Jeroboam wuod Nebat, mane omiyo jo-Israel otimo.
Eka Pul ruodh Asuria nomonjo pinyno, mi Menahem nomiye fedha ma pekne romo kilo alufu mia adek mondo Pul okonyego jiwo lochne obed motegno.
Menahem nochuno joma ne nigi mwandu e Israel mondo ogol pesano. Ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomgi nyaka ne chiw pesa ma pekne romo nus kilo mar fedha mondo mi ruodh Asuria. Omiyo ruodh Asuria noa e pinyno modok thurgi.
To kuom gik mamoko duto mag ndalo loch Menahem, gi gik moko duto mane otimo, donge odikgi e kitepe weche mag ruodhi Israel.
Menahem notho moyweyo gi kwerene kendo Pekahia wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
E higa mar apar gabich mar loch Azaria ruodh Juda, Pekahia wuod Menahem nobedo ruodh Israel ka en Samaria kuom higni ariyo.
Pekahia notimo richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, ne ok olokore moweyo richo mag Jeroboam wuod Nebat, mane omiyo jo-Israel otimo.
Achiel kuom jodonge, ma en Peka wuod Remalia nojame mondo otimne marach. Nokawo ji piero abich moa Gilead odhigo monego Pekahia kaachiel gi Argob kod Arie, e kind siro mar kar od ruoth man Samaria. Omiyo Peka nonego Pekahia mobedo ruoth kare.
Gik mamoko duto mag ndalo loch Pekahia, to gi weche duto mane otimo, ondiki e kitepe weche mag ruodhi Israel.
E higa mar piero abich gariyo mar loch Azaria ruodh Juda, Peka wuod Remalia nobedo ruodh Israel ka en Samaria, kendo nobedo ruoth kuom higni piero ariyo.
Timbene ne richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kendo ne ok olokore oweyo timbe maricho mag Jeroboam wuod Nebat, mane omiyo jo-Israel otimo.
E ndalo loch Peka ruodh Israel, Tiglath-Pilesa ruodh Asuria nobiro mokawo Ijon, Abel Beth Maaka, Janoa, Kedesh kod Hazor. Noloyo Gilead kod Galili kaachiel gi piny Naftali duto, kendo oterogi e twech e piny Asuria.
E higa mar piero ariyo mar loch Jotham wuod Uzia; Hoshea wuod Ela nojamo Peka wuod Remalia monege kendo nobedo ruoth kare.
To gik mamoko duto mag loch Peka, gi gik moko duto mane otimo, donge ondikgi e kitepe mag weche ruodhi Israel?
E higa mar ariyo mar loch Peka wuod Remalia ruodh Israel, Jotham wuod Uzia ruodh Juda nochako betie loch.
Ne en ja-higni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth kendo norito piny kuom higni apar gauchiel kodak Jerusalem. Min mare ne nyinge Jerusha nyar Zadok.
Notimo gima kare e nyim wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye mana kaka Uzia wuon mare nosetimo.
Kata kamano kuonde motingʼore gi malo, ne ok omuki kendo ji nodhi nyime mana gi chiwo misengini kendo wangʼo ubani mangʼwe ngʼar kanyo. Jotham nogero kendo Rangach Mamalo mar hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
To kuom weche mamoko duto mag ndalo loch Jotham, gi gik moko duto mane otimo, donge ondikgi e kitap weche ruodhi mag Juda?
(E kindeno Jehova Nyasaye nochako oro Rezin ruodh Aram to gi Peka wuod Remalia mondo omonj jo-Juda.)
Jotham nonindo moyweyo gi kwerene kendo noyike kodgi e Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi, ma en dala maduongʼ mar wuon mare. Kendo Ahaz ma wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
E higa mar apar gabiriyo mar loch Peka wuod Remalia, Ahaz wuod Jotham ruodh Juda nobedo ruoth.
Ahaz ne ja-higni piero ariyo kane obedo ruoth kendo nobedo e loch kodak Jerusalem kuom higni apar gauchiel. To timbene ne ok longʼo e nyim wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye kaka timbe Daudi kwar mare ne chalo.
Noluwo timbe ruodhi mag Israel kendo nochiwo wuode mondo otimgo liswa kaka misango miwangʼo pep koluwo timbe mamono mag ogendini mane Jehova Nyasaye oriembo e nyim jo-Israel.
Notimo misengini kendo owangʼo ubani mangʼwe ngʼar e kuonde motingʼore malo mag lemo, ewi gode matindo kendo e bwo yiende motimo otiep.
Eka Rezin ruodh Aram kod Peka wuod Remalia ruodh Israel nowuok dhi gore gi Jerusalem mi omako Ahaz, to ne ok ginyal loye.
E kindeno Rezin ruodh Aram ne odwogo Elath e lwet Aram koriembo jo-Juda. Bangʼe jo-Edom nodonjo Elath kendo gidak kuno nyaka chil kawuono.
Ahaz nooro joote mondo okone Tiglath-Pilesa ruodh Asuria kowacho niya, “An jatichni kendo anie e bwo lochni. Bi mondo iresa e lwet ruodh Aram kendo e lwet ruodh Israel mosemonja.”
Kendo Ahaz nokawo fedha kod dhahabu mane oyudi e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kod kar keno mar od ruoth mine oorogi kaka mich ne ruodh Asuria.
Ruodh Asuria noyie momonjo Damaski kendo okawe. Nodaro joma odak Damaski motero e twech Kir, Rezin to ne onego.
Eka ruoth Ahaz nodhi Damaski mondo orom gi Tiglath-Pilesa ruodh Asuria. Noneno kendo mar misango man Damaski mi ooro ni Uria jadolo goro kaka oger kendono, kondiko maler gik moko duto mogerego.
Omiyo Uria jadolo nogero kendo mar misango kaluwore gi rieko duto mane ruoth Ahaz noorone koa Damaski mi notieko gere kapok ruoth Ahaz odwogo.
Kane ruoth odwogo koa Damaski mi oneno kendo mar misangono, to ne odhi mochiwo misango e wiye.
Ne ochiwo misango miwangʼo pep kod misango mar cham, kaachiel gi misango miolo piny kendo nokiro remo mar lalruok ewi kendo mar misango.
To kendo mar misango mar mula mane ni e nyim Jehova Nyasaye nogolo e kind kendone manyien gi hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye mokete yo nyandwat mar kendo manyien-no.
Eka ruoth Ahaz nogolo chik ne Uria jadolo niya, “E kendo manyien maduongʼni ema nyaka itimie misango miwangʼo pep mar okinyi, misango mar cham mar odhiambo, misango miwangʼo pep mar ruoth, kod misango mar cham mar ruoth kaachiel gi misango pep mar ji duto modak e pinyno, kod misangogi mag cham kod misango miolo piny. Kir remo mag misengini duto miwangʼo pep kod misengini mamoko ewi kendo mar misangono. To abiro tiyo gi kendo mar misango molos gi mula mondo angʼe gima kare monego atim.”
Kendo Uria jadolo notimo mana kaka ruoth Ahaz nochiko.
Ruoth Ahaz nogolo gik moko michungogo besen kogolo kuom mago minyalo gol kuondegi. Bende nogolo gima ne iluongo ni Nam kuom mula molos ka rwath mane osire, mokete kar kende e kidi.
Bende nomuko agola mane otiyogo chiengʼ Sabato kod rangach ma oko mane odonjogo e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye, nikech winjruok marach e kindgi gi ruodh Asuria.
To kuom gik mamoko duto mane Ahaz otimo e ndalo lochne, donge ondikgi e kitap weche ruodhi Juda?
Ahaz notho moyweyo gi kwerene kendo noyike kodgi e Dala Maduongʼ mar Daudi. Kendo Hezekia ma wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
E higa mar apar gariyo mar loch Ahaz ruodh Juda, Hoshea wuod Ela nobedo ruoth e piny Israel kodak Samaria kendo norito pinyno kuom higni ochiko.
Timbene ne richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye to ok kaka ruodhi Israel mane otelone notimo.
Shalmaneser ruodh Asuria nokedo gi Hoshea moloye kendo nobedo e bwo lochne kogolone osuru.
To ruodh Asuria nofwenyo ni Hoshea ne en andhoga, nimar nooro ji ir Osorkon ruodh Misri, bende ne ok ochiw osuru ne ruodh Asuria kaka ne osebedo kotimo higa ka higa. Kuom mano Shalmaneser nomake mokete e od twech.
Ruodh Asuria nomonjo pinyno duto, mochopo nyaka Samaria kendo nogoyone agengʼa kuom higni adek.
E higa mar ochiko mar loch Hoshea, ruodh Asuria nokawo Samaria kendo nomako jo-Israel motero e twech Asuria. Nomiyogi kar dak Hala kod Gozan man but Aora Habor kaachiel gi mier mag Medes.
Magi duto notimore nikech jo-Israel notimo richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi, mane ogologi e piny Misri e bwo loch Farao ruodh Misri. Negilamo nyiseche mamoko
ka giluwo timbe mag ogendini mane Jehova Nyasaye osedaro oa kuomgi, to gi timbe moko mane ruodhi mag Israel noketo.
Jo-Israel notimo gik maricho lingʼ-lingʼ ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi. Chakre kuonde mingʼichogo gi malo nyaka kuonde mochiel motegno mag dala maduongʼ, negigero kuondegi motingʼore gi malo e miechgi duto.
Negichungo kite moyiedhi kod sirni mag Ashera ewi gode maboyo duto, kendo e tiend yiende duto motimo tipo.
Kamoro amora motingʼore gi malo ne giwangʼoe ubani mangʼwe ngʼar, mana kaka pinjeruodhi mane Jehova Nyasaye oseriembo kuomgi ne timo. Negitimo timbe maricho mane omiyo Jehova Nyasaye mirima.
Negilamo nyiseche manono, kata obedo ni Jehova Nyasaye nowachonegi niya, “Kik utim kamano.”
Jehova Nyasaye nosiemo Israel kod Juda kokalo kuom jonabi mage kod jokor, kawacho niya, “Lokri iwe yoreni maricho, luw wechena, kod yorena kaluwore gi chikena duto mane amiyo kwereu mondo oriti kendo mane amiyou kowuok kuom jotichna ma jonabi.”
To ne ok ginyal dewo kendo tokgi ne tek mana kaka kweregi mane ok oketo genogi kuom Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi.
Ne gidagi winjo buchene kod chikene mane otimo gi kweregi to gi siem mane omiyogi, negiluwo nyiseche maonge tich, ma gin bende gibedo ji manono. Negidonjo e kit timbe ogendini mane odak e diergi, kata obedo ni Jehova Nyasaye nosekwerogi ni kik gitim kaka gitimo kendo negitimo gik mane Jehova Nyasaye nokwerogi mondo kik gitim.
Negiweyo chike duto mag Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi magiloso nyiseche ariyo molos e kido mar nyaroya kendo machalo gi siro mar Ashera. Negikulore ne nyisechegi giwegi ma gilamo Baal.
Negichiwo yawuotgi kod nyigi kaka misango e mach. Negitimo timbe ajuoke kod mag nyakalondo ma gichiwore mar timo gik mamono e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, ma gimiye mirima.
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye iye nowangʼ gi jo-Israel mi nogologi e nyime. Dhood joka Juda kende ema ne odongʼ,
to kata kamano jo-Juda bende ne ok orito chike Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi. Negiluwo mana timbe mane jo-Israel osiekogo.
Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye ne odagi jo-Israel duto; nokumogi mi oketegi e lwet joyeko nyaka ne ogologi chutho e wangʼe.
Kane ogolo jo-Israel owuok e dhood Daudi negikawo Jeroboam wuod Nebat obedo ruodhgi. Jeroboam nowuondo jo-Israel mowuok oweyo luwo Jehova Nyasaye, momiyo gitimo richo mamono.
Jo-Israel nomedo timo richo duto mag Jeroboam kendo ne ok giweyo timogi,
nyaka Jehova Nyasaye nogologi kuome mana kaka ne osesiemogi kokadho kuom jotichne duto ma jonabi. Omiyo jo-Israel nogol oa e pinygi modhi e twech e piny Asuria kendo pod gin kuno nyaka chil kawuono.
Ruodh Asuria nokelo ji koa Babulon, Kutha, Ava, Hamath kod Sefarvaim moketogi gidak e miech Samaria mondo gikaw kar jo-Israel. Negikawo Samaria ma gidak e mieche duto.
E kinde mane gidak kuno mokwongo ne ok gilamo Jehova Nyasaye; omiyo Jehova Nyasaye nooro sibuoche e diergi monego jogi moko.
Wach nochopo ne ruodh Asuria niya, “Ji mane idaro midwoko e miech Samaria, ok ongʼeyo gima nyasaye mar pinyno dwaro. Kuom mano, oseoro sibuoche e diergi mondo oneg-gi nikech ji ok ongʼeyo gima nyasachgino dwaro.”
Eka ruodh Asuria nomiyogi chik kama: “Kaw achiel kuom jodolo mane igolo itero e twech Samaria mondo odog odag kuno kendo opuonj jogo gima nyasach pinyno dwaro.”
Eka achiel kuom jodolo mane oter twech Samaria nobiro modak Bethel kendo opuonjogi kaka ilamo Jehova Nyasaye.
Kata kamano, oganda koganda noloso nyisechegi giwegi e miechgi mopogore opogore, kuonde mane gidakie, mi giketo nyiseche manono kuonde motingʼore mag lemo mane jo-Samaria oseloso.
Nyiseche mane gilamo e magi: Ji mane oa Babulon noloso Sukoth-Benoth, ji mane oa Kutha noloso Nergal to ji mane oa Hamath noloso Ashima;
Jo-Avi to noloso Nibhaz kod Tartak, to jo-Sefarvi nochiwo nyithindgi kaka misango ne Adramelek kod Anamelek mane gin nyiseche mag Sefarvaim.
Negilamo Jehova Nyasaye, to bende negiyiero jogi giwegi mopogore opogore mondo obednegi jodolo e kuonde lemo motingʼore gi malo.
Negilamo Jehova Nyasaye to bende negilamo nyisechegi giwegi kaluwore gi timbe pinje manogolgie.
Pod gitamore weyo timbegigo nyaka chil kawuono. Ok gilam Jehova Nyasaye kata rito buchene, wechene, chikene kod puonj ma Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo nyikwa Jakobo, ma bangʼe noloko nyinge ni Israel.
Kane Jehova Nyasaye otimo singruok gi jo-Israel, to nochikogi kama: “Kik ulam nyiseche mamoko kata kulorunegi, tiyonegi kata timonegi misango.
To Jehova Nyasaye mane ogolou Misri gi teko mangʼongo korieyo lwete, en ema nyaka ulame. En ema onego ukulrune kendo en ema uchiwne misengini.
Nyaka ubed motangʼ kurito buche, weche, chike kod puonj duto mane omiyou. Kik ulam nyiseche mamoko.
Kik wiu owil gi singruok mane atimo kodu bende kik ulam nyiseche mamoko.
To onego ulam Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, en ema obiro resou e lwet wasiku duto.”
To kata kamano, ne ok gidewo chikego, to negisiko mana ka gitimo timbegi machon.
Kata e kinde mane ogendini ne lamo Jehova Nyasaye, to negisiko mana ka gitiyone nyisechegi manono. Nyithindgi kod nyikwagi pod osiko katimo timbe mane kweregi timo nyaka chil kawuono.
E higa mar adek mar loch Hoshea wuod Ela ruodh Israel, Hezekia wuod Ahaz ruodh Juda nodoko ruoth.
Ne en ja-higni piero ariyo gabich kane obedo ruoth, kendo norito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gochiko, kodak Jerusalem. Min mare ne nyinge Abija nyar Zekaria.
Notimo gima kare e nyim wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye, mana kaka kwar mare Daudi notimo.
Nomuko kuonde motingʼore malo mag lemo, mi otoyo kite milamo kendo ongʼado sirni milamo mag Ashera. Ne otoyo matindo tindo thuond mula mane Musa oloso, nikech nyaka chop ndalono jo-Israel nosebedo kawangʼo ne ubani (ne iluonge ni Nehushtan).
Hezekia ne ogeno kuom Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel. Ne onge ngʼama osechalo kode e dier ruodhi duto mag Juda, bedni negisebedo e loch chon kata bangʼe.
Ne osiko kogeno kuom Jehova Nyasaye mi ok noweyo luwe; kendo ne orito chike mane Jehova Nyasaye omiyo Musa.
Jehova Nyasaye ne ni kode, kendo ne odhi maber e gik moko duto mane otimo. Nongʼanyone ruodh Asuria kendo ne ok otiyone.
Noloyo jo-Filistia chakre kuonde ngʼicho motingʼore gi malo nyaka dala maduongʼ mochiel motegno, mochopo nyaka Gaza gi mier mokiewo kode.
E higa mar angʼwen mar loch Hezekia, ma en higa mar abiriyo mar Hoshea wuod Ela ruodh Israel, Shalmaneser ruodh Asuria nomonjo Samaria kendo jolweny nolwore.
Bangʼ higni adek, jo-Asuria nokaw Samaria. Omiyo Samaria nokaw e higa mar auchiel mar loch Hezekia mane en higa mar ochiko mar Hoshea ruodh Israel.
Ruodh Asuria nodaro jo-Israel motero e twech e piny Asuria kendo noketogi gidak Hala, Gozan man e bath Aora Habor kaachiel gi mier mag Medes.
Ma notimore nikech ne ok girito chike Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi, to negiketho singruok mane Musa jatich Jehova Nyasaye ochikogi. Kata kamano ne ok girito chikene kata timo dwarone.
E higa mar apar gangʼwen mar loch Ruoth Hezekia, Senakerib ruodh Asuria nomonjo mier madongo duto mochiel motegno mag Juda mokawogi.
Omiyo Hezekia ruodh Juda nooro wach ne ruodh Asuria ka en Lakish kowacho kama: “Aseketho, koro yie iwe kedo koda nikech abiro chulo gimoro amora midwaro.” Ruodh Asuria nokawo kuom Hezekia ruodh Juda fedha ma pekne romo kilo alufu apar gi dhahabu ma pekne romo kilo alufu achiel.
Omiyo Hezekia nomiye fedha duto mane oyud e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye to gi ute keno duto mag od ruoth.
E sa onogo ema ne Hezekia ruodh Juda ne ogolo oko dhahabu mane obawogo dhoudi kod sirni mag hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo nomiyogi ruodh Asuria.
Ruodh Asuria nooro jatend jolweny mare maduongʼ, jatend jolweny maluwe to gi jatend lweny motelo e kar kedo kaachiel gi jolweny mangʼeny ir Hezekia Jerusalem ka gia Lakish. Negidhi nyaka Jerusalem ma gichopo e bath Soko man malo nyaka e puoth jaluoko.
Kane giluongo ruoth, to Eliakim wuod Hilkia jatend od ruoth, Shebna jagoro kendo Joa wuod Asaf mane jachan weche nodhi irgi.
Jatend lweny nowachonegi niya, “Wachneuru Hezekia kama: “ ‘Ma e gima ruoth maduongʼ ma ruodh Asuria wacho: En kama nade miketoe genoni momiyo in-gi chir kama?
Uwacho ni un gi rieko kod teko mangʼeny mar lweny, to gik ma uwacho onge tiendgi. En ngʼa ma uketo genou kuome, mamiyo ungʼanyo uweya?
Neuru, sani koro uketo genou kuom Misri, machalo odundu mobarore ma ka ngʼato orere to opilore mochwo ngʼatno kendo kelo adhola! Mano e kaka Farao ruodh Misri chalo ne joma ogeno kuome.
To ka uwachona niya, “Wan waketo genowa kuom Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa,” to donge en ema kuondene motingʼore malo kod kendene mag misango Hezekia nogolo kowachone jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem niya, “Nyaka ulam mana e nyim kendoni e Jerusalem?”
“ ‘Biuru sani mondo uwinjru gi ruodha, ma en ruodh Asuria: Abiro miyou farese alufu ariyo, ka unyalo yudo joma riembogi!
Ere kaka uparo ni unyalo loyo achiel kuom jotend jolweny matinie moloyo mag ruodha ka uketo genou mana kuom jolwenj Misri gi faresegi?
To moloyo, bende dibed ni asebiro monjo kendo ketho dalani ka ok en kuom wach Jehova Nyasaye? Jehova Nyasaye owuon ema osenyisa mondo abi amonj pinyni kendo akethe.’ ”
Eka Eliakim wuod Hilkia, Shebna kod Joa nowachone Rabshake jatend lweny niya, “Yie iwuo gi jotichni gi dho jo-Aram, nimar wawinjo dhokno. We wuoyo kodwa gi dho jo-Hibrania nikech joma ni e ohinga nyalo winjo gik miwachonwa.”
To Rabshake jatend lweny nodwokogi niya, “Uparo ni un kod ruodhu kendu ema ne ruodha oora iru mondo awachnu wechegi, to ok ne joma obedo ei ohinga; bende ungʼeyo ni jogo kaachiel gi un biro bangʼo chiethgi kendo madho lachgi?”
Eka jatend lweny nochungʼ moluongo matek gi dho jo-Hibrania niya, “Winjuru wach moa kuom ruoth maduongʼ, ma en ruodh Asuria!
Ma e gima ruoth wacho: Kik uyie Hezekia wuondu nikech ok onyal resou e lweta.
Kik uwe Hezekia hou mondo ugen kuom Jehova Nyasaye kowachonu ni, ‘Jehova Nyasaye biro resowa adier, kendo dala maduongʼni ok nochiw e lwet ruodh Asuria.’
“Kik uwinj wach Hezekia. Ma e gima ruodh Asuria wacho: Winjreuru koda kendo biuru ira oko. Bangʼe ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomu nocham mzabibu kod ngʼowu kendo nomodh pi moa e sokone owuon,
nyaka chop abi mi ateru e piny machal gi pinyu, ma en piny machiego cham gi divai manyien, piny mopongʼ gi makati kod mzabibu, piny man-gi yiende zeituni kod mor kich. Yieruru ngima, to kik uyier tho! “Kik uwinj wach Hezekia, nimar owuondou kowacho ni, ‘Jehova Nyasaye biro resowa.’
Bende nyaka nene nyasach piny moro amora osereso ogandane e lwet ruodh Asuria?
Ere nyiseche mag Hamath gi Arpad? Ere nyiseche mag Sefarvaim, Hena kod Iva? Bende ne gireso Samaria e lweta?
Kuom nyiseche duto mag pinjegi, en mane mosereso pinye e lweta? To koro ere kaka Jehova Nyasaye nyalo reso Jerusalem e lweta?”
To ji duto nolingʼ thi maonge ngʼama dwoko nimar ruoth Hezekia nosegolo chik niya, “Kik udwoke.”
Eka Eliakim wuod Hilkia jatend od ruoth, gi Shebna jagoro kod Joa wuod Asaf jachan weche mag piny nodhi ir Hezekia, ka lepgi oyiech kendo negiwachone gima jatend lwenyno osewacho.
Kane ruoth Hezekia owinjo wachno, noyiecho lepe morwako pien gugru mi odhi e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Ne ooro Eliakim ma jatend od ruoth, gi Shebna jagoro kod jodolo madongo ir janabi Isaya wuod Amoz ka giduto girwako piende gugru.
Negiwachone niya, “Ma e gima Hezekia wacho: Odiechiengni en odiechieng kuyo, siem kod wichkuot machalo gi nyithindo ma ndalogi mar nywol osechopo to onge teko minywologigo.
Nyalo bedo ni Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi biro winjo weche duto mag Rabshake jatend lweny, ma jatende ma ruodh Asuria oseoro mondo oyany Nyasaye mangima, kendo obiro kwere kuom weche mane Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osewinjo kowacho. Kuom mano, in Isaya, lamne ji mane otony ma pod ngima.”
Kane jodong Ruoth Hezekia nobiro ir Isaya,
Isaya nowachonegi niya, “Nyisuru ruodhu ni, ‘Jehova Nyasaye wacho kama: Kik ibed maluor kuom weche misewinjo, wechego ma ruodh Asuria oseyanyago.
Winji! Abiro goyo chunye gi kihondko ma kowinjo wach moro to noring odog e pinygi, to kuno ema nachiwe mondo onege gi ligangla.’ ”
Kane Rabshake jatend lweny owinjo ni ruodh Asuria osewuok Lakish, ne oringo oa kanyo moyudo ka ruoth kedo gi jo-Libna.
Senakerib noyudo wach ni Tirhaka, ja-Kush ruodh Misri obiro monje. Kuom mano, nooro joote ir Hezekia kowacho kama:
“Wachne Hezekia ruodh Juda kama: Kik iyie nyasaye migeno kuomeno wuondi kowacho ni, ‘Jerusalem ok nochiw e lwet ruodh Asuria.’
Adier isewinjo gik ma ruodhi mag Asuria osetimo ni pinjeruodhi duto kotiekogi chuth. In to iparo ni ibiro tony?
Bende nyiseche mag ogendini mane kwerena oketho pinygi kaka nyiseche mag Gozan, Haran, Rezef kod jo-Eden man Tel Assar nokonyogi?
Tinde ere ruodh Hamath, ruodh Arpad, gi ruodh dala maduongʼ mar Sefarvaim, kata ruodh Hena kod Iva?”
Hezekia noyudo baruwano mane joote okelone mosome. Bangʼe nodhi e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye moyaro baruwano e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Kendo Hezekia nolamo Jehova Nyasaye kowacho kama: “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, modak e kind kerubi, in kendi e Nyasaye mar pinjeruodhi duto manie piny, kendo in ema ne ichweyo polo gi piny.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, chik iti mondo iwinji, yaw wangʼi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye mondo ine, kendo winjie weche duto ma Senakerib oseoro joge kayanyigo in Nyasaye mangima.
“En adier, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ni ruodhi mag Asuria osetieko ogendini mangʼenygi ma giweyo pinjegi gunda.
Gisewito nyisechegi e mach mi gitiekogi, nikech ne ok gin nyiseche to ne gin mana yien kod kidi molos gi lwet dhano.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, koro reswa e lwet Senakerib mondo pinjeruodhi duto manie piny ongʼe ni in kendi e Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasaye.”
Eka Isaya wuod Amoz ne ooro wach ne Hezekia kama: “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel wacho: Asewinjo lamoni kuom Senakerib ruodh Asuria.
Ma e wach ma Jehova Nyasaye osewacho kuom Senakerib: “ ‘Nyar Sayun Mangili ochayi kendo jari. Nyar Jerusalem kino wiye koneni kiringo.
En ngʼa misejaro kendo yanyo? Koso en ngʼa ma isegone koko kijowo wangʼi, gi sunga. Donge en mana Jal Maler mar Israel!
Kokalo kuom jooteni usegango weche mag ayany kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. Bende usewacho niya, “Gi gechena mangʼeny mag lweny aseidho gode maboyo mag Lebanon mi achopo ewi got mabor moloyo. Asetongʼo yiendene mag sida maboyo kendo mabeyo. Asechopo nyaka e chuny bungu ma iye mogik kuma yien odiche.
Asekunyo sokni e pinje mamoko, mi amodho pige man kuno. Asemiyo aore duto mag Misri bende oduono ka anyonogi gi tienda.”
“ ‘Donge usewinjo ni an ema ne achano chon mondo gigo otimre? An ema ne achanogi chon, to koro amiyo gitimore; kendo an ema ne achanogi chon mondo imuk mier madongo mochiel motegno mondo olokre pidhe mag kite.
Joge teko orumonegi mi gibuok kendo gidongʼ gi wichkuot. Gichalo gi cham manie puodho kata ka maua mangʼich mathiewo, kata ka lum madongo ewi tado, to ner kapok odongo.
“ ‘To angʼeyo kama idakie, bende angʼeyo sa ma idonjo kata sa ma iwuok, kata kaka iwuoyo marach kuoma.
Nikech iwuoyo kuoma marach, kendo wechegi maricho osechopo e ita, abiro keto chuma e umi kod mbedona e dhogi kendo abiro miyo idog gi yo mane ibirogo.’
“Ma ema nobedni ranyisi, yaye Hezekia: “E higa mokwongoni, unucham gik matwi kendgi, kendo e higa mar ariyo unucham orowe moloth bangʼ keyo e higa mokwongono. To e higa mar adek unuchwo kodhi kendo unuka cham, bende unupidh mzabibu mi ucham olembegi.
Jo-Juda modongʼ biro chalo gi yath matero tiendene piny kendo nyago olemo e bedene.
Nimar joma nok modongʼ nowuog Jerusalem kendo oganda mar joma otony nowuogi koa e Got Sayun. Jehova Nyasaye Maratego notim ma kuom tekone owuon.
“Kuom mano ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho ewi ruodh Asuria: “ ‘Ok nodonji e dala maduongʼni kata diro asere. Ok nomonj dalano kotingʼo kuot kata lwore gi jolweny mondo omonje.
Enodogi mana gi yo mane obirogo; kendo ok enodonj e dala maduongʼni, Jehova Nyasaye ema owacho.
Abiro kedone dala maduongʼni, kendo rese; nikech nyinga kod nying Daudi jatichna.’ ”
Otienono malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye ne owuok mi odhi onego ji alufu mia achiel gi piero aboro gabich e kambi mar jo-Asuria. Kane ji ochiewo gokinyi negiyudo mana ringre joma otho.
Omiyo Senakerib ruodh Asuria noweyo lweny moloro kambi kendo nodok Nineve kuma nodakie.
Chiengʼ moro achiel kane olemo e hekalu mar Nisrok nyasache, yawuote miluongo ni Adramelek gi Shareza nonege gi ligangla, bangʼe negiringo gidhi e piny Ararat. Kendo Esarhadon wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
E ndalogo Hezekia nobedo matuo kendo nohewore. Janabi Isaya wuod Amoz nodhi ire mowachone niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho: Los weche mag dalani maber nikech ndaloni mar tho ochopo kendo ok inichangi.”
Hezekia nolokore kongʼiyo kor ot mi olamo Jehova Nyasaye kama.
“Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, parie kaka asewuotho e nyimi gi adiera kod chuny modimbore kendo asetimo gigo makare e nyim wangʼi.” Bangʼe Hezekia noywak malit.
Kane pok Isaya owuok e laru madiere wach Jehova Nyasaye nobirone mawacho niya,
“Dhi mondo inyis Hezekia ma jatend joga ni, ‘Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Daudi kwaru wacho: Asewinjo lemoni kendo aseneno pi wangʼi omiyo abiro changi. E odiechiengʼ mar adek kochakore sani, ibiro dhi e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Abiro medi ngima moromo higni apar gabich kendo abiro resi kaachiel gi dala maduongʼni e lwet ruodh Asuria. Abiro rito dala maduongʼni nikech nyinga kod nying Daudi jatichna.’ ”
Eka Isaya nowacho niya, “Swag ngʼowu.” Negitimo kamano mi gimuone kama ne bur okuodono, bangʼe nochango.
Hezekia noyudo osepenjo Isaya niya, “Ere gima biro bedona ranyisi ni Jehova Nyasaye biro changa kendo ni abiro dhi e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye e odiechiengʼ mar adek kochakore kawuono?”
Isaya nodwoke niya, “Ranyisi ma Jehova Nyasaye biro timoni kuom chopo singruokne ema: Diher mondo tipo odhi nyime ondamo apar kata odog chien ondamo apar?”
Hezekia nodwoke niya, “En gima yot ahinya mondo tipo odhi nyime tielo apar, maloyo duogo chien tielo apar.”
Eka janabi Isaya noluongo Jehova Nyasaye kendo Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo tipo odok chien ondamo apar e kar raidhi mar Ahaz.
E kindeno Marduk-Baladan wuod Baladan ruodh Babulon nooro joote ir Hezekia gi barupe kod mich nikech ne osewinjo tuone.
Hezekia norwako joote mi onyisogi gik moko duto mane nitiere utege mag keno kaka fedha, dhahabu, gik mangʼwe ngʼar kod modhi ma nengogi tek kaachiel gi kar kenone mar gige lweny duto kod gik moko duto mane yudore kuom mwandune. Onge gimoro amora mane odongʼ e ode kata e pinye mane ok onyisogi.
Eka Isaya janabi nodhi ir ruoth Hezekia mopenje niya, “Angʼo mane jogo owacho kendo negia kanye?” Hezekia nodwoke niya, “Negia e piny mabor miluongo ni Babulon.”
Janabi nopenjo niya, “Angʼo mane gineno e odi?” Hezekia nodwoke niya, “Giseneno gik moko duto manie oda. Onge gimoro amora modongʼ e mwanduna mane ok anyisogi.”
Eka Isaya nowachone Hezekia niya, “Wach Jehova Nyasaye wacho kama:
Ndalo biro chopo adier ma gik moko duto manie odi kod gik moko duto mane kwereni osekano nyaka chil kawuono, noter Babulon. Onge gimoro amora mane odongʼ, Jehova Nyasaye owacho.
Kendo nyikwayi moko mowuok e ringri kendo rembi iwuon, noter e twech mi nolokgi wasumbini mabwoch e od ruoth mar ruodh Babulon.”
Hezekia nodwoke niya, “Wach Jehova Nyasaye misewacho ber.” Nodwoke kamano koparo niya, “Bende kwe kod rit makare nobedi e ndalo mar ngimana?”
To kuom gik mamoko duto mag ndalo loch Hezekia, gi gik moko duto mane otimo kod kaka ne oloso soko kod kuonde pi mokelo e dala maduongʼ, donge ondikgi e kitepe mag weche ruodhi mag Juda?
Hezekia notho moyweyo kaka kwerene kendo Manase wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
Manase ne ja-higni apar gariyo kane odoko ruoth, kendo nobedo e loch kodak Jerusalem kuom higni piero abich gabich. Min mare ne nyinge Hefziba.
Notimo richo e nyim wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye koluwo timbe mamono mag ogendini mane Jehova Nyasaye oseriembo e dier jo-Israel.
Ne ochako ogero kuonde motingʼore gi malo mag lemo ma wuon mare Hezekia nomuko; to bende nogero kende mag misengini miwangʼoe liswa ne Baal kendo oloso siro milamo mar Ashera, mana kaka Ahab ruodh Israel notimo; bende nokulore kolamo gik moko duto mochwe man e kor polo.
Ne ogero kende mag misengini e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye, kata obedo ni Jehova Nyasaye nosewacho niya, “Ei Jerusalem ka ema naketie nyinga.”
Nogero kende mag misengini miwangʼoe liswa ne gik mochwe mae kor polo e laru ariyo mag hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Notimo misango kochiwo wuode mondo owangʼ e mach, kotimo timbe mag ajuoke gi nyakalondo, kopenjo jomeny wach kod chunje jo-mirieri, notimo timbe maricho e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye momiye ich wangʼ.
Nokawo siro milamo mar Ashera mane oseloso mochungo ei hekalu, to Jehova Nyasaye noyudo osewuoyoe ne Daudi kod wuode Solomon niya, “Aseyiero hekaluni gi Jerusalem e kind ogendini duto mag Israel kendo, abiro keto nyinga kanyo nyaka chiengʼ.
Ka jo-Israel orito chike duto mane amiyogi kendo rito buche duto mane Musa jatichna omiyogi, to ok anachak awe gia e piny mane amiyo kweregi.”
To ji ne ok odewo kendo Manase ne obaro kodgi mane gimedo timo timbe maricho moloyo ogendini mane Jehova Nyasaye otieko e nyim jo-Israel.
Jehova Nyasaye nowacho kokalo kuom jotichne ma jonabi niya,
“Manase ruodh Juda osetimo timbe makwero. Osetimo richo moloyo jo-Amor mane otelo nyime mi omiyo jo-Juda odonjo e richo mag nyisechene.
Kuom mano ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel wacho: Abiro kelo masira maduongʼ Jerusalem kod Juda, ma it ji duto mowinjo biro sakni.
Abiro ngʼadone Jerusalem bura machal mana gi mane angʼadone Samaria kendo machal bende mana gi bura mane angʼadone dhood Ahab. Abiro yweyo Jerusalem matieki ka ngʼama yweyo dis moluoki mamoye oko e chiengʼ kuome piny mondo otwo.
Abiro jwangʼo jogo modongʼ ma gin girkeni mag tich lweta kendo chiwogi e lwet wasikgi. Ibiro kwalgi mi yakgi gi wasikgi duto,
nikech gisetimo richo e wangʼa kendo gisechwanya chakre chiengʼ mane kweregi oa Misri nyaka chil kawuono.”
To kata kamano Manase nochwero remb joma onge ketho mi remb jogo nopongʼo Jerusalem duto, kiweyo richo mane omiyo jo-Juda otimo, mine gitimo richo e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye.
To kuom gik moko duto mag loch Manase, to gi mago duto mane otimo, koriwo nyaka richo mane otimo, donge ondikgi e kitepe mag weche mag ruodhi Juda?
Manase notho moyweyo gi kwerene kendo ne oike e puoth joka ruoth, ma en puoth Uza, kendo Amon wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
Amon ne ja-higni piero ariyo gariyo kane obedo ruoth, kendo norito piny kodak Jerusalem kuom higni ariyo. Min mare ne nyinge Meshulemeth ma nyar Haruz, kendo noa Jotba.
Notimo timbe maricho e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye, mana kaka wuon mare Manase nosetimo.
Ne otimo timbe duto mane wuon mare otimo, kendo nolamo kido duto mane wuon mare olamo kendo okulorenegi.
Ne oweyo Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach kwerene kendo ok ne owuotho e yore Jehova Nyasaye.
Jodongo mag Amon nowinjore monego ruoth e kar dakne.
Eka jopinyno noriwore monego jogo duto mane onego ruoth Amon kendo negiketo Josia wuode obedo ruoth kare.
To kuom gik moko duto mag loch Amon gi gik mane otimo, donge ondikgi e kitepe mag ruodhi Juda?
Ne oike e liende mane ni e puodho mar Uza kendo Josia ma wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
Josia ne ja-higni aboro kane obedo ruoth kendo norito pinyno kodak Jerusalem kuom higni piero adek gachiel. Min mare ne nyinge Jedida nyar Adaya, mane aa Bozkath.
Timbe Josia ne longʼo e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye kendo nowuotho e yore duto mag Daudi kwar-gi, ma ok olokore kongʼiyo korachwich kata koracham.
E higa mar apar gaboro mar lochne, ruoth Josia nooro jagoro ma en Shafan wuod Azalia, ma wuod Meshulam, e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kowacho niya,
“Dhiyo ir Hilkia jadolo maduongʼ kendo oik pesa mosekel e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye, mane jorit dhoot nosechoko kuom ji.
We mondo giketgi e lwet joma otelo ne gedo mar hekalu, kendo mondo jogi ochul joma loso kuonde momukore mar hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Joma onego chul gin jopa bepe, jogedo kod jopa kidi. Bende konegi gingʼiew bao kod kite mopa milosogo kuonde mokethore ei hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
To kik penjgi kaka gitiyo gi pesa momigi nikech gin joma ogen.”
Hilkia jadolo maduongʼ nowachone Shafan ma jagoro niya, “Aseyudo kitap chike e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.” Nomiye mosome.
Eka Shafan ma jagoro nodhi ir ruoth mowachone niya, “Jodongi osechulo pesa mane nitiere e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo gisechiwogi e lwet jotich kod jotend hekalu.”
Eka Shafan jagoro nonyiso ruoth niya, “Hilkia janabi osemiya kitabu.” Kendo Shafan nosomo kitabuno e nyim ruoth.
Kane ruoth owinjo weche manie Kitap Chik, noyiecho lepe.
Nochiwo chikegi ne Hilkia jadolo, Ahikam wuod Shafan, Akbor wuod Mikaya, Shafan jagoro kod Asaya jarit mar ruoth kowachonegi niya,
“Dhiuru upenj Jehova Nyasaye gima biro timorena, kendo ni oganda kod jo-Juda duto kaluwore gi gik mondiki e kitabu mwaseyudoni. Mirimb Jehova Nyasaye maliel ka mach osechomowa nikech kwerewa ok oseluoro weche mawuok e kitabuni; kendo ok gisetimo timbe moluwore gi gik moko duto mondiki kuomwa.”
Hilkia jadolo, Ahikam, Akbor, Shafan kod Asaya nodhi wuoyo gi Hulda janabi madhako, mane chi Shalum wuod Tikva, ma wuod Harhas, jarit kar keno mar lep lemo. Nodak Jerusalem, e gwengʼ mar ariyo.
Hulda jadolo madhako nowachonegi niya, “Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach jo-Israel wacho: Nyisuru ngʼatno mane oorou ira niya,
‘Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho: Abiro kelo masira e pinyni kendo kuom joma odakie, kaluwore gi gik moko duto ma ruodh Juda osesomo mondiki e kitabuni.
Mirimba nosik kuom pinyni kendo ok norum nikech gisejwangʼa ka giwangʼo ubani ne nyiseche manono kendo ka gimiya mirima kuom lamo nyiseche mopa gi lwedo.’
Wachneuru ruodh Juda, mane oorou mondo upenja gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho ni, ‘Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach jo-Israel wacho kaluwore gi weche musewinjo.
Nikech ne uwinjo wach kendo uboloru e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kane uwinjo weche mane owacho kuom Jerusalem kod joma odakie ni gibiro yudo kwongʼ mi gidongʼ kama ojwangʼ, kendo nikech ne uyiecho lepu kuywak e nyima, omiyo asewinjo ywaku, Jehova Nyasaye owacho.
Kuom mano, anami iywe gi kwereni kendo noiki gi kwe. Ok inine masiche mabiro kelone pinyni.’ ” Omiyo negidwoko wach ne ruoth.
Eka ruoth noluongo jodongo duto mag Juda kod Jerusalem.
Nodhi nyaka e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye ka en gi jo-Juda, jo-Jerusalem, jodolo, jonabi kaachiel gi ji duto momewo kod ma jochan. Nosomonegi weche duto mane ondiki e Kitabu mar Singruok, mane osenwangʼ e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye ka giwinjo.
Ruoth nochungʼ e bath siro kendo noketo winjruok mane oselal obedo kare e nyim Jehova Nyasaye kosingore ni enoluw Jehova Nyasaye kendo norit chikene gi wechene kod buchene gi chunye duto, mondo omi oritgo weche mag singruok mondiki e kitabuni. Omiyo ji duto noyie gi singruogno.
Ruoth nogolo chik ne Hilkia jadolo maduongʼ, gi jodolo maluwe kod jorit dhoot mondo ogol oko gik moko duto mopa milamogo Baal gi siro mar Ashera kod kit gik moko manie kor polo e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye. Ne owangʼogi e bath Jerusalem e paw aora Kidron mi otero buchgi Bethel.
Ne oriembo jodolo mag nyiseche manono mane ruodhi mag Juda oketo mondo owangʼ ubani kuonde motingʼore gi malo mag miech Juda kod mago molworo Jerusalem kendo noriemb joma ne wangʼo ubani ne Baal, gi chiengʼ, dwe kod sulwe.
Ne ogolo siro mar Ashera e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye mi otere e bath Jerusalem e holo mar aora Kidron kendo nowangʼe kanyo. Norege molokore buru mi okiro burugo ewi liete joma odhier.
Bende nomuko ut jochode machwo mane ni e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo ma en kama mon ne chweyoe pasia mag Ashera.
Josia nokelo jodolo duto moa e miech Juda kendo noketho kuonde motingʼore gi malo mane jodologo wangʼoe ubani chakre Geba nyaka Bersheba. Ne omuko gik mochwe mag lemo e dhorangeye kaachiel gi mago mane ni e dhoranga Joshua, jatend dala maduongʼ, mane nitie e bat koracham kidonjo e dala.
Kata obedo ni jodolo mag kuonde lemo motingʼore gi malo ne ok ti e kendo mar misango mar Jehova Nyasaye man Jerusalem, to ne oyienegi mana chamo makati ma ok oketie thowi gi jodolo wetegi mamoko.
Ne oketho Tofeth mane ni e holo man Ben Hinom, mondo omi kik ngʼato ne ti kode kuom timo misango mar wuode kata nyare e mach ne Molek.
Nogolo kido mar farese mane ruodhi mag Juda oseketone wangʼ chiengʼ e dhoranga hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye. Ne gin e laru mantie machiegni gi od jatelo ma nyinge Nathan-Melek. Bangʼ mano Josia nowangʼo geche mane itiyogo kuom lamo wangʼ chiengʼ.
Nomuko kende mag misango mane ruodhi mag Juda ogero ewi tat od Ahaz, bende nomuko kende mag misango mane Manase ogero e laru ariyo mar hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye. Nogologi kanyo, motoyogi matindo tindo kendo opuko ngʼinjogo e holo mar Kidron.
Ruoth nomuko kuonde motingʼore gi malo mane ni yo wuok chiengʼ mar Jerusalem koma ochomo yo milambo mar Got Kethruok, mane Solomon ruodh Israel ogero ne Ashtoreth, nyasach makwero mar jo-Sidon, gi Kemosh nyasach jo-Moab kod Molek nyasaye manono mar jo-Amon.
Josia notoyo kite milamo kendo ongʼado siro mar Ashera mi oumo kuondego gi choke ji.
Kata mana kendo mar misango man Bethel, ma en kar lemo motingʼore gi malo mane olosgi Jeroboam wuod Nebat, mane omiyo Israel otimo richo bende nomuko. Ne owangʼo kama otingʼore gi malono mi olokore buru bende nowangʼo siro mar Ashera.
Bangʼ mano Josia nongʼiyo koni gi koni kendo kane oneno liete mane ni e kor godno, nogolo chik mondo ogol choke e lietego kendo owangʼ-gi e kendo mar misango kikethego kaluwore gi wach Jehova Nyasaye mane ngʼat Nyasaye okoro chon.
Ruoth nopenjo niya, “En kidi mane manie dho liel maneno cha?” Jo-dala maduongʼno nodwoke niya, “Onyiso kar liend ngʼat Nyasaye mane oa Juda mane okoro gik mane itimo e kendo mar misango man Bethel.”
Ne owacho niya, “Weyeuru, kendo kik ngʼato mul chokene.” Eka ne giweyo chokene to gi mag janabi mane oa Samaria.
Josia nomuko kendo oketho kuonde duto motingʼore gi malo mitimoe misengini mane ruodhi mag Israel ogero e miech Samaria mane omiyo Jehova Nyasaye mirima mana kaka notimo Bethel.
Josia nonego jodolo duto mag nyiseche milamo kuonde motingʼore gi malo mowangʼogi e kende mag misengini. Bangʼ mano nodok Jerusalem.
Ruoth nogolo chik ni ji duto kama: “Losuru chokruok mar Pasaka ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mana kaka ondiki e Kitap Singruokni.”
Koa e ndalo mag jongʼad bura mane otelo ne Israel, kata e ndalo duto mag ruodhi mag Israel gi Juda, pok ne otim chokruok mar Pasaka ma kama.
To e higa mar apar gaboro mar ruoth Josia, Pasaka machalo kama notimne Jehova Nyasaye e Jerusalem.
Bende Josia notieko jomeny, jo-nyakalondo, nyiseche manono mag udi gi kido milamo kaachiel gi gik moko duto mamono mane oyud Juda kod Jerusalem. Ma ne otimo mondo ochop chik mondiki e kitabu mane Hilkia jadolo ofwenyo e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Onge ruoth moro kata achiel mane odwogo ir Jehova Nyasaye kaluwore gi chike duto mag Musa gi chunye duto gi ngimane duto kod tekone duto machalo gi Josia.
Kata Kamano, Jehova Nyasaye ne ok oweyo mirimbe mager, mane liel kochomo Juda nikech mago duto mane Manase otimo komiyo mirimbe jimbore.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowacho niya, “Abiro riembo jo-Juda e nyima mana kaka ne ariembo jo-Israel kendo abiro kwedo Jerusalem dala maduongʼ mane ayiero kaachiel gi hekaluni, mane awuoyoe ni, ‘Kanyo ema Nyinga nobedie.’ ”
To kuom gik mamoko duto mag loch Josia kod mago duto mane otimo, donge ondikgi e kitabu mag weche mag ruodhi Juda?
E ndalo loch Josia, Farao Neko ruodh Misri nodhi nyaka Aora Yufrate mondo okony ruodh Asuria kedo. Ruoth Josia nowuok mondo oked kode e paw lweny, to ruoth Neko norado kode monege e paw Megido.
Jotije Josia nokelo ringre gi geche lweny koa Megido nyaka Jerusalem mine giike e liende owuon kendo jopinyno nokawo Jehoahaz wuod Josia mi giwire kendo mokete obedo ruoth kar wuon mare.
Jehoahaz ne ja-higni piero ariyo gadek kane odoko ruoth kendo nobedo e loch kuom dweche adek kodak Jerusalem. Min mare nyinge ne Hamutal nyar Jeremia; mane aa Libna.
Ne otimo richo e wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye mana kaka kwerene notimo.
Farao Neko noterogi e twech Ribla e piny Hamath mondo kik obed ruoth kodak Jerusalem kendo nochuno jo-Juda mondo ochiw osuru mar fedha ma pekne romo kilo alufu adek gi mia angʼwen kod dhahabu ma pekne romo kilo piero adek gangʼwen.
Farao Neko noketo Eliakim wuod Josia ruoth kar wuon mare Josia kendo noloko nying Eliakim ni Jehoyakim. To nokawo Jehoahaz mi otero e twech Misri kuma nothoe.
Jehoyakim nochulo Farao Neko fedha kod dhahabu mane odwaro. Notimo kamano kogolo osuru kuom jopinyno kuom fedha gi dhahabu kaluwore gi yuto mar ngʼato ka ngʼato.
Jehoyakim ne ja-higni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth kendo nobedo e loch kodak Jerusalem kuom higni apar gachiel. Min mare ne nyinge Zebida nyar Pedaya; mane aa Ruma.
Kendo notimo gik maricho e nyim wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye, mana kaka kwerene notimo.
E ndalo loch Jehoyakim, Nebukadneza ruodh Babulon nomonjo piny kendo Jehoyakim nobedo e bwo lochne kuom higni adek. To bangʼe noloko pache mokwedo Nebukadneza.
Jehova Nyasaye nooro jo-Babulon, jo-Aram, jo-Moab kod jo-Amon mondo omonj ruoth Jehoyakim. Ne oorogi mondo otiek Juda, kaluwore gi wach mane Jehova Nyasaye owacho kokalo kuom jotichne ma jonabi.
Kuom adier gigi notimore ne Juda mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nochiko, mondo mi ogolgi e nyime nikech richo mar Manase kod gik moko duto mane osetimo,
kaachiel gichwero remo maonge ketho. Jehova Nyasaye ne ok oikore mar weyone richone nikech nosechwero remo maonge ketho mopongʼogo Jerusalem.
Kuom gik mamoko duto mag ndalo loch Jehoyakim kod gik moko duto mane otimo, donge ondikgi e kitepe mag weche ruodhi mag Juda?
Jehoyakim notho moyweyo gi kwerene, kendo Jehoyakin wuode nobedo ruoth kare.
Ruodh Misri ne ok owuok kendo e pinye nikech ruodh Babulon nokawo tongʼ mage duto chakre Wadi manie piny Misri nyaka e Aora Yufrate.
Jehoyakin ne ja-higni apar gaboro kane odoko ruoth, kendo nobedo e loch kuom dweche adek kodak Jerusalem. Min mare ne nyinge Nehushta nyar Elnathan, ma aa Jerusalem.
Notimo timbe maricho e nyim wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye, mana kaka wuon mare notimo.
E kindeno jodong Nebukadneza ruoth Babulon nodonjo e Jerusalem mokawe,
kendo Nebukadneza owuon nobiro nyaka dala maduongʼ ka jodonge olworo dala maduongʼno.
Jehoyakin ruodh Juda, min mare, jotende jodonge kod jongʼadne rieko duto nochiwore e lwet ruodh Babulon. Jehoyakin noket e twech e higa mar aboro mar Loch ruodh Babulon.
Mana kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosewacho, Nebukadneza nogolo mwandu duto mane ni e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo e kar dak ruoth, mi okawo gik molos gi dhahabu duto mane ruoth Solomon ruodh Israel olosone hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye.
Ruoth Nebukadneza notero jo-Jerusalem alufu apar e twech mane gin jodongo duto kod jolweny, gi joma olony e tich lwedo kod jogoro. Onge ngʼato mane odongʼ makmana joma odhier.
Nebukadneza notero Jehoyakin e twech Babulon, kaachiel gi min ruoth, monde, jodonge kod jodong gwengʼ kogologi Jerusalem.
Bende ruodh Babulon notero e twech jolweny duto madirom ji alufu abiriyo, kaachiel gi joma olony kuom tich lwedo kod jogoro alufu achiel; giduto ne gin roteke moromo kedo.
Ne oketo Matania, ma owadgi Jehoyakin mondo obed ruoth kare kendo noloko nyinge ni Zedekia.
Zedekia ne ja-higni piero ariyo gachiel kane obedo ruoth, kendo nobedo e loch kodak Jerusalem kuom higni apar gachiel. Min mare ne nyinge Hamutal nyar Jeremia; ma aa Libna.
Ne otimo richo e nyim Jehova Nyasaye mana kaka Jehoyakim notimo.
Magi duto notimore ne Jerusalem kod Juda nikech mirimb Jehova Nyasaye kendo giko to ne oriembogi oko e nyime. Koro Zedekia nongʼanyone ruodh Babulon modagi lochne.
