Donge kethruok en mar joma timbegi mono, kendo masira mar joricho?
Donge oneno yorena kendo okwano okangena?
“Kapo ni asewuotho e yor miriambo kata ka tienda osereto kadhi wuondo ngʼato,
to Nyasaye mondo opima e ratil madier kendo obiro yudo ni aonge ketho,
kendo kapo ni tienda osebaro moweyo yo, kata wengena osewuondo chunya, kata ka gimoro osechido lwetena,
to kara joma moko ema ocham gik mochiek e puotha, kendo chamba mondo opudh oko.
“Kapo ni chunya osegombo dhako moro, kata kapo ni asebuto karito chi ngʼato,
to kara chiega otine dichwo machielo, kendo chwo mamoko oterre kode.
Nikech mano en tim wichkuot maduongʼ kendo en richo marach manyaka kum,
nimar ochalo mach marach mawengʼo manyalo tieko giga duto ma an-go.
“Kapo ni asetamo jotichna machwo gi mamon e adieragi kane gin koda gi wach,
to angʼo ma datim ka Nyasaye ochoma tir? En angʼo ma dadwoki ka Nyasaye obiro yala?
Donge Jal mane ochweya e ich ema nochweyogi bende? Donge en onogo ema ne ochweyowa duto ei minewa?
“Kapo ni asetuono jodhier gik magidwaro kata asemiyo wangʼ dhako ma chwore otho chandruok ojonyo,
kata kapo ni asechamo kuona kenda, ma ok apoge ne nyithind kiye,
to nyaka aa e tin-na asekonyo nyithind kiye mana kaka akonyo nyithinda awuon, kendo chakre tin-na asebedo ka atayo mon ma chwogi otho.
Kapo ni ne aneno ngʼato angʼata ka koyo nego, kata ka jachan moro onge gi law,
to donge ne ogwedha gi chunye nikech ne atwangʼone lewni maliet gi yie rombena.
Kapo ni asesando nyithind kiye moko, nikech an gi teko kama ingʼadoe bura,
to kara bada ochodi olwar piny oa e goka, kendo mad ochodi olwar piny koa kama ochomoree.
Nikech ne aluoro kethruok ma Nyasaye nyalo kelona nikech luoro mane aluorogo duongʼne, omiyo ne ok anyal timo gik ma kamago.
“Kapo ni aseketo genona e dhahabu kata asewachone dhahabu maler ni in e kar pondona,
kata kapo ni chunya osetingʼore nikech mwandu mangʼeny ma an-go, kata ka asemor kuom mwandu mathoth ma lweta osechoko,
kapo ni ne achomo wangʼa e ler mar wangʼ chiengʼ kata ka dwe ringo e tekone mos,
mi dipo chunya nogombo lingʼ-lingʼ kendo ne atingʼonegi bada ka agombo lamogi,
to mago bende gin richo manyaka bi kum, nikech ginyiso ni ok asebedo ja-ratiro ne Nyasaye man malo.
“Kapo ni asebedo mamor ka jasika ni e chandruok kata ka asenyiere ka masira obirone,
to chutho pod ok ayiene dhoga mondo otim richo ka aluongo kwongʼ e ngimane.
Kapo ni jooda ne pok owacho nyaka nene ni, ‘Ere ngʼama pok Ayub omiyo chiemo moyiengʼ?’
to adier, onge ngʼama wendo mosenindo oko e laru, nikech dho oda nosiko koyaw ne jawuoth.
Kapo ni asepando richona kaka dhano ohero timoga, kata ka akuot gi kethona e chunya,
nikech ne aluoro ogandana ahinya kendo ne aluor ni anywolana ne nyalo sin koda mine alingʼ, kendo ne ok anyal wuok oko.
“Yaye, mad dine ngʼato bedie manyalo winja, nikech koro e akwongʼora ni weche ma awachogi gin adier mondo Jehova Nyasaye Maratego obed janeno mara; to ka ok kamano, to ngʼat modonjona oket wechegego e ndiko.
Adier, dine arwake e goka, dine asidhe ka osimbo.
Dine anyise sigand ngimana kaka chalo; kendo dine adhi e nyime kaka ruoth.
“Kapo ni asemayo ngʼato puothe mi apuro,
kata kapo ni asechamo cham monyakie puothe ka ok achulo, to eka jopur mane opure to kech nego,
to ber mondo kuthe odongi kar ngano kendo buya odongi e puothano kar shairi.” Weche Ayub orumo gi ka.
Omiyo ji adekgi noweyo dwokore gi Ayub, nikech noparo ni en ngʼama kare.
To Elihu wuod Barakel ja-Buz, mane wuok e anywola mar Ram ne iye owangʼ gi Ayub nikech nopwoyore kende owuon kaka ngʼat makare, ka ok oweyo Nyasaye ema mondo opwoye.
Iye nowangʼ bende gi osiepe Ayub adek nikech negisiko mana ka gingʼado ne Ayub bura, to kata obedo nine oonge ketho.
Elihu norito mondi eka oloso gi Ayub nikech ne en ngʼama tin e diergi.
To kane oneno ka ji adekgo osewuoyo mi wechegi orumo, to mirima nomake.
Eka Elihu wuod Barakel ja-Buz nowacho kama: “An atin kuom higni, kendo un joma dongona; mano emomiyo naluor, kendo ne ok an gichir mar nyisou gima angʼeyo.
Naparo e chunya ni, ‘Higa ema mondo owuo; kendo dak amingʼa e piny ema mondo opuonj rieko!’
To ngʼeuru ni chuny manie i dhano, ma en much Jehova Nyasaye Maratego, ema miyo dhano winjo tiend weche.
Jomadongo kende ok ema nigi rieko, kata ok ni joma hikgi ngʼeny ema nigi ongʼeyo gima kare.
“Kuom mano, awacho kama: Winjauru; an bende koro adwaro nyisou gima angʼeyo.
Uwinjo, ne arito mondi kane uwuoyo, ne achiko ita ne wecheu mukwano ni nigi rieko; kinde mane umanyo weche monego uwachi,
ne achikonu ita adimba kinde mane uwuoyo, to onge ngʼato kuomu moseyudo Ayub gi ketho; kendo onge ngʼato kuomu mosedwoko weche Ayub.
Kik uwach ni, ‘Ngʼatni riek motamo wangʼwa, Nyasaye ema mondo okwere, to ok dhano!’
To Ayub pod ok omino koda wach, omiyo ok abi dwoke kaka usebedo ka uduokeno.
“Jogi dhogi omoko, gionge gima ginyalo dwoko; weche orumonegi.
Gichungʼ achungʼa maonge gima giwachi, koro pod arit arita kata obedo ni gilingʼ kamano?
An bende koro abiro wacho makora; kendo abiro nyisi gima angʼeyo.
Nikech weche opongʼo chunya, kendo gichuna nyaka anyisigi;
bende achalo gi chupa ma divai opongʼo iye kendo ka pien divai manyien madwaro barore.
Nyaka awuo eka abed gi kwe; omiyo nyaka adwoki.
Ok abi dewo wangʼ ngʼato bende ok abi wuondo ngʼato;
nikech ka dine bed ni alony e wuondo ji to Jachwechna ditieka piyo nono.
“To koro, Ayub winj wechena; chik iti maber ne gik ma awacho duto.
Achiegni chako wuoyo; kendo weche duto manie chunya abiro wacho.
Abiro wachoni weche mawuok e chunya kendo wechenago gin adiera.
Roho mar Nyasaye ema nochweya, kendo Roho mar Jehova Nyasaye Maratego ema miya ngima.
Omiyo koro dwoka ane kinyalo; kendo iikri maber mar choma tir.
E nyim Nyasaye achal achala kodi nikech an bende nochweya mana gi lowo.
Kik agoyi gi mbi mi iluora, kiparo ni aloyi e yo moro amora.
“To weche duto misewacho asewinjo maber.
Isewacho ni, ‘Aler kendo aonge richo; ngimana ler kendo aonge ketho moro amora.
To eka Nyasaye to okawa ni an jaketho; kendo okwana kaka jasike.
Otweyo tiendena gi nyororo; kendo obedo korango yorena duto.’
“To anyisi ni pachino obam, nikech Nyasaye duongʼ moloyo dhano.
Angʼo momiyo iywagorine kiwacho ni ok odew weche ma dhano ywaknego?
Nikech, kiwacho adier, to Nyasaye owuoyo gi ji pile e yore mopogore opogore, kata obedo ni dhano sa moro ok nyal winjo tiend wechene.
Owuoyo gi ji e lek, kata e fweny gotieno seche ma dhano ni e nindo matut, ka giyweyo e otendnigi;
onyalo wuoyo e tie itgi mi obwog-gi gi siem mayoreyore,
otimo kamano mondo olok dhano owe timbene maricho kendo ogengʼ dhano kik sungre,
mondo orese e lak tho, kendo kik tiek ngimane gi ligangla.
“Okelone dhano tuo kendo opongʼo dende gi rem mondo rieyego.
Ngʼat matuono dhoge bedo marach, ma kata chiemo mamit manade koro dungʼne mana marach.
Dende dhiyo adhiya, mi chokene ma yande opondo koro nenore oko.
Chunye sudo machiegni gi bur matut, kendo ngimane yware machiegni gi joma osetho.
“Kamoro dipo ka achiel kuom malaike gana gi gana mag Nyasaye ma paro ni ngʼato tich monego oti nyalo konye,
mi ngʼwon-ne kowacho ni, ‘Weyeuru kik utere e kar tho, nikech oseyudo yor resruok.’
Bangʼ mano ngʼatno nyalo chango mi pien dende chak dog ka pien dend nyathi matin mana kaka nochal kotin.
Koro olamo Nyasaye mitimne ngʼwono, opongʼ gi mor koneno Nyasaye, kendo Nyasaye tingʼe malo kuom tim makare.
Koro ngʼatno nyalo biro e nyim ji mi owachnegi ni, Ne atimo richo mi aloko ber obedo rach, to Nyasaye ne ok ochula gi gima owinjore gi kethona.
Ne oreso ngimana mondo kik adhi e piny joma otho, omiyo koro abiro medo bedo mangima, mi ane ler.
“Nyasaye nyalo timo gigi duto ne ngʼato angʼata nyadiriyo kata nyadidek,
mondo omi olok chuny ngʼatno kik dhi e piny joma otho, eka ler mar ngima omed rieny kuome.
“Chik iti maber, Ayub, kendo winj gik manyisi; lingʼ mos, nimar abiro medo wuoyo.
Ka in gi gimoro amora minyalo wacho, to dwoka; wuo awuoya, nikech adwaro lero kori,
to ka ok kamano, to chik iti iwinja; kendo lingʼ mos nimar abiro puonji rieko.”
Eka Elihu nowacho kama:
“Winjuru wechena, un joma riek; chiknauru itu, un joma osomo.
Nikech it temo weche mana kaka lep bilo chiemo.
Wayieruru kendwa gima nikare; wapuonjreuru kaachiel kuom gima ber.
“Ayub wacho ni, ‘Aonge ketho, to Nyasaye otamore timona maber.
Kata obedo ni an kare, to pod ikwana mana ni an ja-miriambo; kata obedo ni aonge ketho, to asere mare osechwoya, moweya gi adhola ma ok thiedhre!’
To en ngʼa machalo gi Ayub; mamodho ajara kaka pi?
En e achiel gi joma timbegi richo; kendo oriwore gi joricho.
Nikech osebedo kowacho ni, ‘Onge ohala ma dhano yudo, ka otemo matek mondo otim gima ber ne Nyasaye!’
“Omiyo lingʼuru uwinja, un joma nigi winjo. Nyasaye ok nyal timo gima rach kata dichiel, Jehova Nyasaye Maratego ok tim gima ok owinjore.
Ochulo dhano kaluwore gi timbene okelone mana gima owinjore gi timbene.
En gima kwero mondo Nyasaye otim gima ok owinjore; kendo mondo Jehova Nyasaye Maratego ongʼad bura ma ok nikare.
En ngʼa mane okete jarit piny? En ngʼa mane oketo piny duto e bwo tekone?
Ka dabed ni Nyasaye ogolo muche makelo ngima kuom dhano,
to ji duto ditho dichiel kendo dhano didogi e lowo.
“Ka un gi winjo adier to winjuru wachni; kendo chikuru itu ne gima awacho.
Ngʼama ochayo adiera bende nyalo rito loch adier? Ere gimomiyo iketo bura kuom ngʼama ja-ratiro kendo Jal Maratego?
Donge Nyasaye ema wacho ne ruodhi ni, ‘Un joma nono,’ kendo owacho ne jo-mwandu ni, ‘Timbeu richo,’
Nyasaye ok odewo kata mana wangʼ ruodhi kendo ok otim maber ne jo-mwandu to jochan to oweyo, nikech gin duto gin chwech lwete?
Joma roteke tho apoya e dier otieno; inegogi mi gilal nono, kendo igologi e dier ji, to ok gi lwet dhano.
“Wangʼe osiko karango timbe ji; oneno okangʼ kokangʼ ma gigoyo.
Onge kama otimo mudho kata kama olil gi tipo ma joricho nyalo pondoe.
Onge gima ochuno ni Nyasaye nyaka non dhano amingʼa eka okelgi e nyime mondo oyalgi.
Oketho telo mar joma roteke ma ok oyalogi kendo oketo joma moko e telo kargi.
Nikech ongʼeyo timbegi oloko loch mag-gi gotieno mi otiekgi chuth.
Okumo joricho e lela nikech timbegi maricho kama ji duto nyalo nenogie,
nikech negilokore giweyo luwe kendo ne ok gidewo yorene kata achiel.
Negimiyo ywak joma odhier ochopo malo e nyime, mine owinjo ywak jochan.
Kata ka nenore ni olingʼ, to en ngʼa ma dingʼadne bura? Koso kopando wangʼe, to en ngʼa ma dinene? To kata kamano en ema orito ogendini
mondo kik gibed e bwo loch ngʼat mokia Nyasaye, kendo machiko ni ji obadho.
“Ka dipo ngʼato nyalo wachone Nyasaye ni, ‘Aseketho to ok anachak atimne ngʼato marach.
Puonja mondo ane gik mopondona; kapo asetimo gimoro marach, to ok abi achak atim kamano kendo!’
Ere kaka idwaro ni Nyasaye otimni maber, to in to idagi lokori? In ema nyaka ingʼad e pachi iwuon, ok an, omiyo koro nyisane gima ingʼeyo.
“Joma nigi winjo nyiso pachgi joma riek mawinja wachona ni,
‘Ayub osewuoyo maonge rieko; osewacho weche ma ok oparo maber.’
Yaye, mad med ameda temo Ayub nyaka giko nikech aduokane chalo aduoka ngʼama timbene richo.
Omedo dhi nyime gi timo richo koyanyo Nyasaye e nyim ogandane, kendo omedo wuoyo marach kuom Nyasaye.”
Eka Elihu nowacho kama:
“Bende iparo ni itimo gima ber kiwacho ni, ‘In kare e nyim Nyasaye?’
To e iyeno bende ipenjo ni, ‘Mano to konya gangʼo, koso ohala mane ma ayudo ka ok atimo richo?’
“Daher mondo adwoki in kaachiel gi osiepenigo.
Ngʼiuru polo malo mondo unee boche polo kaka ni kuma bor.
Ka umedo timo richo, to obadhe gangʼo? Kata ka richou ngʼeny to mano nyalo timone angʼo?
Ka un joma kare to bedou makare miye angʼo, koso en angʼo muchiwone?
Timbeu maricho hinyo mana dhano machal kodu, kendo timbeu makare bedo konyruok mana ne yawuot ji.
“Ji ywak malit nikech tingʼ mapek moyie kuomgi; giywak mana ni mondo ogolgi e bwo loch joma thirogi.
To onge ngʼato kuomgi mawachoe ni, ‘Nyasaye mane ochweya nikanye, Nyasaye mamiyo ji wende gotieno,
mapuonjowa gik mathoth moloyo kaka opuonjo le manie piny kendo mamiyo wabedo mariek moloyo winy mafuyo e kor polo?’
Ok odwok ji ka giywakne nikech wich teko mar joricho.
Adier, Nyasaye ok chik ite ne ywakgi maonge tiendgi Jehova Nyasaye Maratego ok dewgi.
Iwacho ni Nyasaye ok winj wecheni ka iwacho ni ok inene, kata obedo ni isetero kwayoni e nyime, kendo pod irite mondo odwoki.
Bende imedo wacho ni kata ji ok okum gi mirimbe mager kendo kata mana richo ma ji timo ok obadhe.
Omiyo Ayub wuoyo ka ngʼama ofuwo; maonge rieko.”
Elihu nomedo wuoyo kawacho niya:
“Wena thuolo matin mondi to abiro nyisi ni nitie mathoth manyalo wacho kuom Nyasaye.
Ngʼeyo ma an-go agolo kuma bor; kendo koro adwaro nyiso kaka Jachwechna timo gik makare.
Bed kingʼeyo ni wechena ok gin miriambo; ngʼeni ngʼama ongʼeyo gik moko malongʼo chuth ema ni kodi.
“Nyasaye nyalo duto, to kata kamano ok ochayo ji; onyalo duto kendo chenro mage ok lokre.
Ok owe joricho kangima, to omiyo joma ithiro ratiro margi.
Ok ogol wangʼe oko kuom joma kare; oketogi e loch kaachiel gi ruodhi kendo otingʼogi malo nyaka chiengʼ.
Ka otwe ji gi nyiroro, kendo ka oridgi matek gi tonde mag masiche,
to onyisogi gik magisetimo; kendo ni giseketho ka ok gidewo.
Omiyo giwinje korieyogi kendo ochikogi ni gilokre giwe timbegi maricho.
Ka giwinjo wachne mi gitiyone, to gibiro dak e mwandu ndalogi mabiro, kendo gibiro dak ka gin gi gimoro amora e higni mabiro.
To ka gitamore winje, to ligangla biro tiekogi, kendo gibiro tho ka gionge rieko.
“Joma okia Nyasaye chunygi opongʼ gi mirima ma kata ka okumgi to ok giywagre mondo oresgi.
Omiyo githo ka kapod gitindo ka ngima marach otieko tekregi.
To joma ni e chandruok oreso e chandruokgi; owuoyo kodgi e kinde ma gin gi chandruok.
“Ogoli e masiche kendo oteri kama onge chandruok mondo omiyi kwe gi chiemo mogundho.
Sani to koro eri iyudo kum maromre gi joricho; nimar kum kod adiera oketi diere.
Bed motangʼ kik ngʼato wuondi gi mwandu, kendo kik iyie ngʼato omiyi asoya mathoth mi iwe Nyasaye.
Koso iparo ni mwanduni mathoth kata nyagruok minyagori, gi tekri iwuon nyalo siri mi goli e chandruok?
Kik igomb mondo piny oyusi, mondo otim timbe mahundu.
Tangʼ mondo chandruok kik dwoki e richo.
“Parie kaka teko Nyasaye duongʼ en e japuonj maberie moloyo?
En ngʼa manyalo nyiso Nyasaye yore monego oluw, kata manyalo kwere ni, ‘Isetimo marach’?
Kik wiyi wil mak ipako tijene ma gin tijene ma ji osepako gi wer.
Ji duto modak e piny osenene adier gisenene gi kuma bor.
Mano kaka Nyasaye duongʼ, adier oduongʼ mokalo ngʼeyo kendo kata hike ok wanyal kwano.
“Ochoko ngʼich mar pi kogolo ewi pige, kendo olokogi koth mi gichak gichue gipongʼ aore;
omiyo koth chue ne ji koa e boche polo.
En ngʼa mongʼeyo kaka boche polo ringo, kata kaka polo mor?
Neye kaka omiyo mil polo menyo kor polo duto, ka chuny nam to dongʼ kotimo mudho.
Kamano e kaka orito ogendini kendo omiyogi chiemo mogundho.
Omako mil polo gi lwete kendo otimogo gima odwaro.
Mor polo miyo wangʼeyo ni koth maduongʼ chiegni chue, kendo koda ka jamni ongʼeyo ni koth ma kamano biro chue.
“An bende mor ma kamano miyo chunya bwok kendo ridore.
Lingʼuru kendo uwinj dwond Nyasaye kaka mor ka polo, kendo winjuru weche mawuok e dhoge.
En emomiyo mil polo menyo kor polo duto, chakre tungʼ piny konchiel nyaka komachielo.
Bangʼ mano iwinjo dwonde ka mor matek kendo omor gi dwol mar duongʼne. Ka dwonde ochako mor, to onge gima nyalo gengʼe.
Dwond Nyasaye mor e yo miwuoro; otimo gik madongo moyombo parowa.
Owacho ne pe ni, ‘Lwar piny,’ kendo ne nyidho matin ni, ‘Lokri koth maduongʼ.’
Otimo kamano mondo ji duto mane ochweyo, ongʼe kaka tichne chalo mi ji duto bed gi luoro nikech teko mare.
Le ringo pondo; gisiko e buchegi.
Ahiti biro koa kuma opandee, kendo koyo mangʼich bende yamo riembo mi ke.
Much Nyasaye kelo pe kendo pige mopongʼo wi lowo poto mabed matek ka lwanda.
Opongʼo boche polo gi ngʼich mar pi kendo okeyo mil polo mare ei bochego.
Gilwore mana kaka Nyasaye dwaro, ka gidhi e wangʼ piny duto ka gitimo gima ochikogi.
Ndalo moko Nyasaye kelo rumbi e piny mondo okumgo ji, to ndalo moko okelo koth mondo onyisgo herane.
“Winjie wachni, Ayub; bed mos ipar gik miwuoro mag Nyasaye.
Bende ingʼeyo kaka Nyasaye chiko boche polo kendo kaka omiyo polo mil?
Bende ingʼeyo kaka boche oliero e kor polo, gik miwuoro mag Jal ma riekone tut mogik?
To in ma kinde ma yamb milambo kudho mi two piny, to isiko mana ka luya chami ei lewni mirwakogi,
bende inyalo konye yaro polo, mi obed matek ka mula mothedhi?
“Nyiswa ane gima dwanyis Nyasaye machalo kamano ka kata mana pek ma wan-go ok wanyal ketone e yo mayot.
Bende en gima owinjore mondo onyise ka adwaro wuoyo? Donge ngʼama ohedhore timo kamano dotieki?
Koro onge ngʼama nyalo rango wangʼ chiengʼ tir, nikech polo olendo kendo orieny makech; yamo oseriembo boche duto moweyo kor polo nono.
Nyasaye wuok koa yo nyandwat ka en gi duongʼ malich machalo gi lich mar dhahabu.
Jehova Nyasaye Maratego oyombowa mabor kendo en gi teko maduongʼ ok otim marach ne ji, nikech en ja-adiera kendo opongʼ gi tim makare.
Mano emomiyo ji miye luor, nikech ok opak joma pachgi wuondo ni riek.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko Ayub gi ei yamo maduongʼ. Nowacho kama:
“Ma to en ngʼa ma umo riekona gi weche mofuwo?
Koro aa malo ka dichwo; mondo idwoka weche, madwaro penjigi.
“Ne in kune chiengʼ mane achungo mise mag piny? Nyisa ane, bende ingʼeyo wachni!
En ngʼa mane opimo borne gi lachne? Ero iwacho ni ingʼeyo! En ngʼa mane orieyo tol kane ipime?
Mise mage noyie e angʼo? Koso en ngʼa mane oketo kidi momake motegno?
Chiengʼ mane sulwe mokinyi wer kanyakla kendo mane malaike duto kok gimor?
“En ngʼa mane ochoko nam kanyachiel moloro kuonde monyalo wuokgo kane obubni kowuok e bwo lowo?
En ngʼa mane otimo kamano kane aume gi boche kaka nangane kendo kane aboye ei mudho mandiwa;
kane aketone tongʼ mage kendo achungone dhorangeye ka keto sirni mage kuonde mowinjore?
Kane awacho ni, ‘Ka ema onego ichopie ma ok ikalo; ka e kama apaka magi nyalo dhwolore mi gike’?
“Bende nitiere chik misegolo mondo piny oyawre, kata nyiso kogwen mondo obedie?
Bende isechiko piny mondo oyawre maler mamiyo joricho wuok kuonde ma gipondoe?
Ka piny yawore to gik moko duto nenore maler; mana ka kido mogor e nanga.
Joma timbegi richo itamoe ler, kendo lwetegi ma gitingʼo malo jony ma ok nyal timo gimoro.
“Bende isewuotho michopo nyaka e sokni manie bwo nam kata wuotho ei kude kuonde mogajore?
Bende osenyisi dhorangaye mag tho? Koso bende iseneno dhorangeye mag tipo mag tho?
Bende ingʼeyo chuth ni piny duongʼ maromo nade? Nyisa ane ka ingʼeyo gigi duto?
“Yo miluwo kidhi dala ler en mane? Mudho to odak kanye?
Bende inyalo kawogi mi idwokgi kuondegi? Bende ingʼeyo yo midhigo miechgi?
Nenore ni ingʼeyo, nikech ne gichakore kosenywoli! Isedak amingʼa miwuoro!
“Bende isedonjo e dere mokanie pe madongo kata neno dere mag pe matindo,
ma akano ne kinde mag chandruok, ne odiechienge mag lweny gi kedo?
Bende ingʼeyo yo midhigo kuma mil polo riadore, kata yo ma yembe mag wuok chiengʼ wuokie kikeyo e piny?
En ngʼa mane osiemo ni koth maduongʼ kod mor polo kama onego giluw,
mondo okel ngʼich kama onge dhano modakie ma en piny motimo ongoro maonge dhano kata achiel,
mondo oduog chuny piny motwo kendo omi lum mangʼich twi?
Koth bende nigi wuon mare? Wuon thoo mamoko e lum en ngʼa?
Min pe to en ngʼa? Min koyo maa e polo to en ngʼa,
mamiyo nam doko matek ka kidi, kendo mamiyo nam doko matek ka lwanda?
“Bende inyalo choko sulwe mag yugni mitue? Bende inyalo keyo yugni mochokore kanyachiel?
Bende inyalo miyo sulwe maratego mondo owuogi e kindene mowinjore kata chiko sulwe mar olworo budho yo monego oluw?
Bende ingʼeyo chike mag polo? Bende inyalo keto chike Nyasaye mondo orit piny?
“Bende inyalo golo chik ne boche polo mondo okel koth maduongʼ?
Bende ioro mor polo e yoregi ma giluwo? Bende digiduoki kagiwacho ni, ‘Eri wan ka’?
En ngʼa mane oketo rieko e obwongo dhano kata mane oketo winjo e pache?
En ngʼa mariek manyalo kwano boche polo? Koso en ngʼa manyalo lengʼogi mondo koth ochwe,
milok buru bed matek malos gogni?
“Bende dinyal dwaro chiemo ni sibuor madhako kendo ipidh sibuoche modenyo,
e kinde ma gibuto e gondgi kata ka gibuto e bungu?
En ngʼa mamiyo agak chiemo ka nyithinde ywagore ne Nyasaye, kendo bayo koni gi koni ka dwaro chiemo?
“Bende ingʼeyo kinde ma diek manie got nywolie? Bende iseneno gi wangʼi ka ngao nywolo nyathine?
Bende inyalo ngʼeyo dweche ma igi pongʼie? Bende ingʼeyo sa ma ginywolie?
Gigoyo chonggi piny ka ginywol, kendo muoch makayogi rumo bangʼ mano.
Nyithindgi dongo motegno kendo mopugno ka gin e thim; kendo giwuok to ok giduogi.
“En ngʼa mane ogonyo kanyna e bungu? En ngʼa mane ogonyo tonde mane otweyego?
Ne amiye thim motwo kaka dalane, kendo namiye kuonde motimo chumbi mondo odagie.
Gidak mabor gi mier, omiyo ok giwinj koko ma ji goyo; kendo ok owinj koko mar jariembo.
Okwayo ewi gode eka oyud lum mochamo kendo omanyo gimoro amora mangʼich.
“Bende jowi ma e thim yie tiyoni? Bende inyalo kete mobed mos e kund jambi gotieno?
Bende inyalo boye moluni opara tir? Bende onyalo puroni kuonde modongʼ bangʼi ma ok opurore maber?
Bende diket genoni kuom tekone mangʼenygo? Bende inyalo weye ne tiji matek mondo otimni?
Bende in-gi adiera ni onyalo tingʼoni cham misekayo mokelni dala mi okelgi kar dino?
“Udo kwadho bwombene gi mor, to ok onyal huyo moloyo magungu kod nyamnaha.
Onywolo tonge piny e lowo kendo oweyogi ewi kuoyo mondo giyud liet,
kendo ok odew ni gimoro kata le mar bungu nyalo nyonogi mi gitore.
Ojwangʼo nyithinde ma pod yom, ka gima ok gin mage owuon; to bende ok odew rem mane owinjo konywologi;
nikech Nyasaye ne ok omiye rieko kata paro mar pogo gima ber.
Kata kamano ka oyaro bwombene mondo oringi, to oyombo kata mana faras maringo matek moloyo ma jaithne riembo.
“In ema imiyo faras teko ma en-go koso in ema ne irwakone pien man-gi yier maboyo e ngʼute?
In ema imiyo ochikore ka bonyo, kobwogo ji gi giro mar sunga?
Ogwetho piny gi mirima gi tekre duto, kendo ogiro gi tekre duto kochomo kar lweny.
Ok oluor kendo onge gima goye kibaji, kendo kata mana ligangla ok obadhrene.
Pien motingʼie asere tuomore e bathe kama oliere, kaachiel gi tongʼ mamil kod bidhi.
Ogwetho koikore ne lweny; nikech ok onyal lingʼ mos ka turumbete oseywak.
Ochur seche duto mowinjo ka turumbete ywak! Owinjo tik lweny gi kuma bor, kendo koko mar jochik lweny kod mano mar lweny owinjo chon.
“Riekoni bende nyalo miyo ongo ringi mi oyar bwombene kochomo yo milambo?
Bende inyalo chiko ongo mi fu kochomo polo, kata miyo oger ode ewi yien?
Odak ewi lwendni maboyo kendo odak kuno nyaka otieno; kendo kind lwendni e kare mar pondo.
Kanyo ema omanye chiembe kendo wengene nyalo nene gi kuma bor.
Nyithinde matindo to remo e chiembgi, kendo kama gima otho nitie, ema iyudogie.”
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Ayub kama:
“Bende nitiere ngʼat mapiem gi Jehova Nyasaye Maratego manyalo kwere? Mad koro ngʼat mamino wach gi Nyasaye oduokeane!”
Eka Ayub nodwoko Jehova Nyasaye kama:
“Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ok aromo dwokora kodi omiyo mano ema omiyo alingʼ.
Asewuoyo moromo, to ok ayudo dwoko omiyo koro ok abi wuoyo kendo.”
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko Ayub gi ei yamo maduongʼ. Nowacho kama:
“Chungʼ ane ka dichwo; mondo idwoka weche, ma adwaro penjigi.
“Angʼo momiyo iketho adiera mara? Angʼo momiyo iketo rach kuoma mondo in inenri ka ngʼama ber?
Bende in gi teko machalo gi mar Nyasaye koso dwondi bende nyalo mor kaka mare?
Ka kamano, to kare bidhriane, kirwakori gi duongʼ, luor kod ber.
Bangʼ mano rang jogo ma sungore, kendo iol mirimbi mager kuomgi mondo omi gibolre.
Ee, rang joma sungore duto kendo, ikumgi kama gichungoeno mondo omi gibolre.
Ikgi duto e lowo; mondo ji kik negi kendo.
Kinyalo timo kamano to an owuon ema anakuong paki ni tekri iwuon ema omiyo iloyo.
“Parane rawo, mane achweyo kaka ne achweyi kendo machamo lum kaka rwadh pur chamo.
Parie teko mangʼeny ma en-go, kendo parie teko maduongʼ manie leche mag dende!
Iwe yamo tero ka yiend sida; kendo leche manie bembene omoko kuome maber.
Chokene otegno ka mula, kendo tiendene otegno ka chuma.
Ikwane kaka chwech maberie moloyo mar Nyasaye e kind le duto, kendo en mana Jachwechne kende ema nyalo chome gi ligangla.
Ochamo lumbe motwi ewi got, kuonde ma le mager ema kwayoe.
Onindo piny ei saka kendo opondo e dier odundu motwi e thidhna.
Saka oime gi tipone; kendo omburi motwi e tie aora olwore.
Kata ka aora opongʼ moo oko, to ok bwoge; chunye ngʼich angʼicha kata ka aora Jordan opongʼ kendo mwomore marach.
En ngʼa manyalo dino wangʼe mi make, kata madi duode mi tuch ume?
“Bende inyalo mako nyangʼ miluongo ni Leviathan gi olowu kata tweyo lewe gi tol?
Bende inyalo tucho ume mi isoe chuma kata tucho dhoge gi olowu?
Bende nosik kokwayi ngʼwono? Bende onyalo wuoyo kodi kobolore?
Bende dotim kodi winjruok mondo ikawe obed misumbani nyaka chiengʼ?
Bende inyalo tugo kode ka winyo manie sigol, kata ka gimoro miywayo gi tol, ma digalgo nyiri matiyoni?
Bende jo-ohala nyalo goyo nengone kata yangʼe mondo ji ongʼiew ringe?
Bende inyalo tucho piene kod wiye gi bidhi michwoyogo rech?
Kapo ni imake gi lweti to nisik kiparo amendno kendo ok nichak itim kamano kendo!
Bedo gi adiera ni inyalo loye en miriambo; nikech nene kende ema nyalo miyi luoro migori piny.
Onge ngʼato angʼata manyalo hedhore mar kwinye. Koro en ngʼa madihedhre chungʼ e nyima?
En ngʼa manyalo bandha gope moro ni nyaka achule? Gik moko duto manie bwo polo gin maga.
“Ok abi weyo mak awuoyo kuom tiende nyangʼni, tekre kendo kaka oduongʼ.
En ngʼa manyalo dangʼo piende ma oko? Koso en ngʼa manyalo hoye mondo oket chuma e ume?
En ngʼa manyalo hedhore yawo dhoge, dhoge ma lekene mabitho kendo lich oridoe?
Dier ngʼe nyangʼno nigi okumba mar kalagakla ma ok pogre;
ka moro ka moro kochom kuom nyawadgi ma kata mana muya ok nyal kadho e kindgi.
Ochomgi motegno moro gi moro; kendo gimoko ma ok nyal pog-gi.
Kogir to ler pilore e dhoge to wengene ler ka wangʼ chiengʼ ma thinyore kogwen.
Mach makakni kaachiel gi pilni mach wuok e dhoge.
Iro dhwolore kawuok e ume mana ka iro mawuok e bethe agulu michwako gi ma tiangʼ.
Muche moko mach maliel, kendo legek mach makakni wuok e dhoge.
Ngʼute opongʼ gi teko mathoth; kama okadhe, to luoro omako gik moko.
Pien dende oriw motegno gimoko matek ma ok gingʼingʼni.
Kore tek ka lwanda, kendo otek mana ka pongʼ rego.
Nyasaye kochungʼ malo to joma roteke luoro mako; gitony kata kapok omulogi.
Ligangla mochwoego ok time gimoro, bedni en tongʼ mabor, tongʼ machiek, kata bidhi.
Chuma chalone lum kendo nyinyo chalone yien mosetop.
Aserni ok mi oringi; orujre chalone mana ka chungʼ bel.
Arungu oneno mana ka lum moro matin nono; kendo kobaye gi tongʼ to onge gima bwoge.
Laini manie bund iye bitho ka balatago motore, kendo koluwo kama otimo chwodho to dongʼ ka kar dino ngano.
Omiyo kut matut papni ka pi machwakore e dak kendo ouko nam ka mo machiek ei agulu.
Oweyo yo moluwo karieny, kendo kama oluwono lokore buoyo.
Onge gimoro amora e piny ngima minyalo pimo kode, kendo onge gima oluoro.
Ochayo le duto mokawore ni lich; en ruodh le duto ma ji oluoro.”
Eka Ayub nodwoko Jehova Nyasaye kama:
“Angʼeyo ni inyalo gik moko duto; onge chenroni ma ngʼato nyalo gengʼo.
Ne ipenjo ni, ‘En ngʼa ma umo riekona gi weche mofuwogi?’ Adier asewacho gik ma ok angʼeyo tiendgi, gik miwuoro modhiera ngʼeyo.
“Ne iwachona ni, ‘Koro chik iti mondo iwinj gima awacho; abiro penji penjo, kendo ibiro dwoka.’
Asewinjo mana gi ita gima joma moko osewacho kuomi kende to sani koro aseneni gi wengena awuon.
Kuom mano, achayora ahinya kendo ahulo richona ka bet piny kendo abukora gi buru.”
Kane Jehova Nyasaye osewacho ne Ayub wechegi, nowachone Elifaz ja-Teman niya, “Iya owangʼ kodi kaachiel gi osiepegi ariyo, nikech ok usewacho weche ma adieri kuoma, kaka jatichna Ayub osewacho.
Kuom mano, kaw rwedhi abiriyo gi imbe abiriyo mondo idhigo ir jatichna Ayub kendo utim misango miwangʼo pep ne un uwegi. Jatichna Ayub biro lamonu, kendo anawinj lemone ma ok anatimnu gima owinjore gi timbeu mofuwogi. Ok usewacho kuoma gik ma adier, kaka jatichna Ayub.”
Kuom mano Elifaz ja-Teman, Bildad ja-Shua kod Zofar ja-Namath notimo gimane Jehova Nyasaye okonegi; kendo Jehova Nyasaye norwako lamb Ayub.
Kane Ayub oselamo ne osiepene, Jehova Nyasaye nochako ogwedhe gi mwandu, kendo nomiye mwandu mathoth moloyo mane en-go mokwongo nyadiriyo.
Owetene gi nyiminene kod ji duto mane ongʼeye mokwongo nobiro mochiemo kode e ode. Ne gihoye kendo gidwogo chunye kuom chandruok duto mane Jehova Nyasaye osekelone, kendo moro ka moro kuomgi nomiye pesa moko kod tere mar dhahabu.
Jehova Nyasaye nogwedho higni machien mag ngima Ayub moloyo kaka nogwedhe mokwongo. Ne en gi rombe alufu apar gangʼwen, ngamia alufu auchiel, rweth pur alufu achiel, kod punde alufu achiel.
Bende ne en gi yawuowi abiriyo gi nyiri adek.
Nyare mokwongo nochako ni Jemima, mar ariyo Kezia, to mar adek ne en Keren-Hapuk.
Onge nyiri mane ber e piny ngima ka nyi Ayub, kendo wuon-gi nopogonegi girkeni mage maromre gi owetegi.
Bangʼ temni, Ayub nodak higni mia achiel gi piero angʼwen; noneno nyithinde gi nyikwaye nyaka tiengʼ mar angʼwen.
Bangʼe Ayub notho, ka en jaduongʼ moti ma hike oniangʼ.
Nyasaye gwedho ngʼat ma ok lu pach joma richo, kata luwo yor joricho kata bedo e kom jojaro.
To chik Jehova Nyasaye ema more, kendo osiko oparo kuom chikene odiechiengʼ gotieno.
Ochalo gi yien mopidhi e bath aora, manyago olembe e kinde molemo chieke, kendo ma bedene ok ner. Gimoro amora motimo dhi maber.
Joma timbegi richo to ok chal kamano kata matin! Gin gichalo gi mihudhi, ma yamo tero.
Kuom mano joma timbegi richo ok nolo bura, adier, joricho ok nobedi e kanyakla mar joma kare,
nikech Jehova Nyasaye rango yor joma kare, to yor joma richo to biro kethore.
Angʼo momiyo ogendini chano timo marach kendo ji chano jiemo kayiem nono?
Ruodhi mag piny osebiro kanyakla kendo jotelo pimo wach kaachiel, mondo giked gi Jehova Nyasaye kendo giked gi ngʼate mowir.
“Giwacho ni, wachoduru nyorochegi; kendo wawit ratekegi kucha.”
To Jal mobet e kom loch e polo to nyierogi anyiera, Ruoth goyonegi siboi.
Eka okwerogi kokecho kendo obwogogi kopongʼ gi mirima mager, kowacho niya,
“Aseketo Ruoth ma adwaro e Sayun, goda maler.”
Abiro hulo chenro mag Jehova Nyasaye ma ok lokre: Nowachona niya, “In wuoda; kawuono asedoko wuonu.
Omiyo kwaya gima idwaro mondo aket ogendini duto obed girkeni mari, mondo piny ngima obed mwanduni.
Initelnigi kod ludhi mar nyinyo; kendo initogi matindo tindo ka agulu.”
Kuom mano, un ruodhi, beduru mariek; tangʼuru un joloch mag piny.
Tiuru ne Jehova Nyasaye gi luoro kendo moruru e nyime gi luoro.
Bolreuru e nyim Wuowi, nono to dipo kokecho kodu mi dongʼad ndalou, motieku, nimar iye nyalo wangʼ kodu kadiemo wangʼ. Ji duto mogeno kuome gin joma ogwedhi.

Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mano kaka wasika thoth! Mano kaka joma lawa ngʼeny!
Ji mangʼeny wuoyo kuoma, kagiwacho ni, “Nyasaye ok bi rese.” Sela
To In e okumbana mogengʼa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; In ema imiyo alocho, kendo isetingʼo wiya malo.
Aywak matek ka alemo ni Jehova Nyasaye, kendo odwoka gie gode maler. Sela
Ariera piny mondo anindi; kendo achako aa malo, nikech Jehova Nyasaye orita.
Ok abi luoro ji gana gi gana molwora mondo otimna marach.
Aa malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye! Resa, yaye Nyasacha! Tur chok lemb wasika duto; Muk leke joma timbegi richo.
Resruok aa mana kuom Jehova Nyasaye. Mad igweth jogi. Sela

Ka aluongi to yie idwoka, yaye Nyasacha makare. Konya e lit momako chunya; yie ikecha kendo iwinj lamona.
Yaye, ubiro chayo duongʼ ka ukuodo wiya nyaka karangʼo? Ubiro hero gik manono kendo luwo nyiseche manono nyaka karangʼo? Sela
Ngʼeuru ni Jehova Nyasaye oseyiera mondo abed mare owuon; kendo Jehova Nyasaye winja, ka aluonge.
Ka iu owangʼ to kik utim richo; seche ma uyweyo mos e kitandau, to nonuru chunyu ka ulingʼ mos, keturu chunyu mos ka unindo e kitandau. Sela
Chiwuru misengini mowinjore kendo genuru kuom Jehova Nyasaye.
Ji mangʼeny penjo niya, “En ngʼa manyalo timonwa gimoro maber?” Mad ler moa e lela wangʼi rieny kuomwa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Isepongʼo chunya gi mor maduongʼ moloyo mor ma gin-go e kinde ma gin-gi cham kod divai mangʼeny.
Abiro riera piny mi anind gi kwe, nikech in kendi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, in ema imiyo adak gi kwe.

Chik iti mondo iwinj wechena, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, para kuom pek manie chunya.
Winj ywakna mar dwaro kony, Yaye Ruodha kendo Nyasacha, nikech in ema alami.
Yie iwinj dwonda gokinyi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; aketo kwayona e nyimi gokinyi, kendo arito dwoko ka an gi geno.
Ok in Nyasaye mamor gi timbe maricho. Joma richo ok nyal dak kodi kanyachiel.
Josunga ok nyal chungʼ e nyimi; imon gi ji duto matimo gik maricho.
Itieko joma wacho miriambo; Jehova Nyasaye ok mor gi joma dwaro chwero remo, kod jo-miriambo.
An to, nikech kechni maduongʼ, abiro donjo e odi; abiro kulora gi luor ka achomo hekalu mari maler.
Telna, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kuom adiera mari, nikech wasigu molwora, yie iriena yori tir e nyima.
Kata wach achiel mowuok e dho jogi ok nyal gen; chunygi opongʼ gi kethruok. Dwondgi chalo gi liel mapok oum; lewgi olony e wacho miriambo.
Kwan-gi kaka joketho, yaye Nyasaye! Ket obadho ma giketo ne ji ogajgi gin giwegi. Riembgi nikech richogi mathoth, nimar gisengʼanyoni.
We ji duto moketi kar pondo margi obed mamor; we gisiki ka giwer gimor. Umgi gi rit mari, mondo joma ohero nyingi omor kodi.
Nikech igwedho joma kare adier, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; igengʼogi gi hapi mana ka okumba.

Kik ikwera, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ka iyi owangʼ kata kum kik ikuma ka mirima omaki.
Kecha, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech aol; changa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech chokena rama malit.
Chunya winjo malit. Nyaka karangʼo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nyaka karangʼo?
Lokri, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mondo iresa; resa nikech herani ma ok rum.
Onge ngʼama nyalo pari ka osetho. En ngʼa madi paki gi ei liel?
Chur ma achurgo ojonya otieno duto abudo kitandana gi ywak, kendo pi wangʼa olwoko piendena.
Wengena ool nikech lit ma an-go; ok ginen maber nikech wasika duto.
Ayiuru buta, un duto ji matimo richo, nikech Jehova Nyasaye osewinjo ywakna.
Jehova Nyasaye osewinjo ywak mar kwayo kech; Jehova Nyasaye orwako lamo mara.
Wasika duto wigi biro kuot kendo gibiro hum nono; gibiro dok chien apoya nono gi wichkuot.

Yaye Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha, in e kar pondona; Resa kendo igola e lwet joma lawa duto,
nono to gibiro kidha kaka sibuor kidho gik moko. Kendo gibiro yiecha matindo tindo maonge ngʼama diresa e lwetgi.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Nyasacha, kapo ni asetimo gima kamano adieri kendo lweta osetimo gima rach,
kaponi asetimo marach ni ngʼama onge koda gi wach kata kapo ni asemayo wasika kaonge gima omiyo,
to yie ni wasikano mondo olawa mi juka; we ginyon ngimana piny e lowo, mi gimi anind e buru mar lowo. Sela
Aa malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ka in gi mirima aa malo irad gi gero mar wasika. Chiew, Nyasacha; chiew inyis adierana.
We chokruoge mag ogendini olwori koni gi koni. Ngʼad negi bura gie kom loch mari man malo;
Jehova Nyasaye mondo ongʼad bura ne ogendini. Ngʼadna bura, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kaluwore gi ngimana makare, ngʼadna bura, yaye Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo, kaluwore gi ngimana moriere tir.
Yaye Nyasaye makare, In ema inono pach ji gi chunje ji, tiek timbe mamono mag joma richo mondo imi joma kare odag gi kwe.
Okumbana en Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo, ma reso joma chunygi oriere tir.
Nyasaye en jangʼad bura makare; en e Nyasaye matoyo mirimbe pile ka pile.
Ka ok oloko pache to obiro piago liganglane; obiro dolo okumbane mi otwe tondene.
Oseiko gige mag lweny mager; oiko asernige makakni ka mach.
Ngʼama iye okuot gi gik maricho kendo ma yach gi chandruok nywolo yamo nono.
Ngʼama loso bur kendo kunye maber podho e bure mokunyono.
Chandruok mokelo gaje en owuon; timbene mag mahundu dwogone e wiye owuon.
Abiro goyo erokamano ne Jehova Nyasaye nikech en ngʼama kare kendo abiro wero wend pak ne nying Jehova Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo.

Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma Ruodhwa, mano kaka nyingi nigi duongʼ e piny duto! Iseketo duongʼni maler milamo, moyombo polo.
Ne isechano mondo nyithindo kod nyithindo mayom omiyi pak, nikech wasiki, mondo jawasigu kod jachul kuor olingʼ kawuoro timni.
Kaparo polo mari ma gin tich lweti, kaparo dwe gi sulwe miseketo kargi,
to dhano adhana to en angʼo momiyo ipare, wuod dhano to en angʼo momiyo iketo pachi kuome?
Ne ichweye mapiny ne malaike kendo isesidhone osimbo mar duongʼ kod luor.
Isekete jatelo ewi tich lweti duto; iseketo gik moko duto e bwo tiende:
Jamni gi kweth duto kod le mager mag bungu,
Winy duto mafuyo e kor polo, kod rech manie nam, gi le duto mamol kaluwo yore manie nembe iketo e bwo lochne.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma Ruodhwa, mano kaka nyingi nigi duongʼ e piny duto!

Abiro paki gi chunya duto, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; abiro nyiso timbegi madongo duto.
Abiro bedo mamor kendo abiro bedo moil kodi; abiro pako nyingi gi wer, yaye Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo.
Wasika dok chien; gichwanyore kendo gilal e nyimi.
Nikech isechungʼna matek ka ichwaka isebet e kom duongʼ mari, kiyalo bura kare.
Isekwero ogendini kendo isetieko joma richo; iserucho nying-gi oko manyaka chiengʼ.
Kethruok mosiko osejuko jasigu, isemuko miechgi madongo; kendo wi ji osewil kodgi.
Jehova Nyasaye olocho nyaka chiengʼ, oseguro kom loch mare mar ngʼado bura.
Obiro ngʼado bura ne piny gi tim makare; obiro rito ogendini gi adiera.
Jehova Nyasaye en kar pondo ne joma idiyo, en e kar pondo e kinde mag chandruok.
Joma ongʼeyo nyingi biro geno kuomi, nikech in, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ne pok ijwangʼo joma manyi.
Wer wende pak ne Jehova Nyasaye, mobet e kom lochne e Sayun; hul ni ogendini gik mosetimo.
Nikech ngʼat machulo kuor kuom remo mochwer siko kaparo; ok owe mak odewo ywak joma hinyore.
Neye kaka wasika sanda, yaye Jehova Nyasaye! Kecha kendo tingʼa igola e dhorangeye mag tho,
mondo anyis pakni e dhorangeye mag Nyi Sayun, kendo abed mamor kuno nikech warruokni.
Ogendini oselutore e buche ma gikunyo; tiendegi ogajore e tondegi ma gichokogo ji.
Jehova Nyasaye ongʼere nikech adier mare; joma timbegi richo omoko e gik ma giloso gi lwetgi giwegi. Higaion. Sela
Joma timbegi richo dok e bur matut, nyaka ogendini duto ma wigi wil gi Nyasaye.
To jochan wiyi ok nowilgo ngangʼ kendo geno mar joma hinyore ok rum.
Aa malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kik iyie mondo dhano olochi; ne ni ogendini ongʼadnegi bura e nyimi.
Gogi gi luoro, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; mi ogendini ongʼe ni gin mana dhano. Sela
Angʼo momiyo ichungʼ gichien, yaye Jehova Nyasaye? Angʼo momiyo ipondo ne ji e ndalo mag chandruok?
Ngʼat ma timbene richo goyo apedha ni joma onge nyalo kendo omakogi e otegu mage mosechiko.
Dwache maricho mopando e chunye omiyo osungore; jowuoche ema ogwedho to Jehova Nyasaye to ochayo.
Sunga omake ma ok onyal manye; onge thuolo kata matin mochiwo ne Nyasaye e chunye.
Yorene dhi maber kinde duto, okawore omiyo chikeni ni mabor moyombe; ojaro wasike duto.
Owacho ne en owuon niya, “Onge gima nyalo yienga; abiro dak gi kwe kinde duto kaonge gima thaga.”
Dhoge opongʼ gi miriambo kod weche mag kwongʼ; chandruok gi weche maricho ni e bwo lewe.
Okiyo ji e bath yore mag gwengʼ, onego ji apoya koa kuonde moponde, osiko ongʼicho mondo wangʼe omaki joma onge ketho mondo ohiny.
Okiyo ji kokichore ka sibuor mopondo; okichore mar mako joma ok nyal mondo ohinygi, omako joma ok nyal kendo oywayogi oko gi tonde mar meko.
Joma hapgi rach momako otieko kendo podho chuth, gipodho e bwo tekone.
Owachone en owuon niya, “Nyasaye wiye osewil; opando wangʼe kendo onge gima oneno.”
Aa malo yaye Jehova Nyasaye! Tingʼ badi malo, yaye Nyasaye. Kik wiyi wil gi joma ok nyal.
Angʼo momiyo ngʼama timbene richo jaro Nyasaye? Angʼo momiyo owacho e chunye ni, “Ok obi keta piny mopenja gima asetimo?”
To in, yaye Nyasaye, ineno chandruok gi kuyo, ikawogi kaka mari kendo itingʼogi e lweti. Ngʼat ma ok nyal; chiwore ne in; in e jakony mar joma onge wuonegi.
Tur bad ngʼama rach ma timbene richo; luonge mondo onyis ji gik maricho mosetimo lingʼ-lingʼ, ma ji ok nyal fwenyo mi ngʼe.
Jehova Nyasaye en Ruoth mochwere manyaka chiengʼ; ogendini biro lal nono e pinye.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, in iwinjo kwayo mar joma chandore; ijiwogi, kendo ichiko iti ni ywakgi,
Ichwako nyithi kiye kod joma isando, mondo dhano ma ochwe gi lowo, kik dhi nyime gi bwogo ji.
Jehova Nyasaye ema ageno kuome. Koro ere kaka duwachna ni: “Ringi ka winyo nyaka ewi got mari.
Nikech joma timbegi richo osechako ywayo atungegi; gisechano asernigi e tonde mag atungʼ, mondo gichielgo joma jo-adiera e chunygi.
Ka mise iketho, to en angʼo ma joma kare ditim?”
Jehova Nyasaye ni e hekalu mare maler; Jehova Nyasaye ni e kom duongʼ mare manie polo. Orango timbe yawuot ji; wengene nonogi matut.
Jehova Nyasaye nono joma kare, to joma timbegi richo kod joma ohero mahundu, to chunye ochayo.
Obiro chwero mach maliel mager kod salfa kuom joma timbegi richo; yamo maliet ha matwoyo gik moko, biro kudhogi.
Nikech Jehova Nyasaye en Ngʼama Kare, kendo ohero adiera; joma timbegi oriere biro neno wangʼe.

Kony ji yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech joma oluoro Nyasaye koro onge; joma jo-adiera oserumo e dier ji.
Ngʼato ka ngʼato riambo ne nyawadgi; dhogi mohero jaro ji wuoyo gi wuond.
Mad Jehova Nyasaye ongʼad oko lep duto ma jaro ji kod lep duto masungore;
mawacho niya, “Wabiro wuoyo kaka wahero; kendo onge ngʼama biro tamowa. Koso en ngʼa ma ruodhwa manyalo tamowa timo kamano?”
“Nikech dich modigo joma ok nyal kod chur ma joma ochando churgo, koro abiro aa malo,” Jehova Nyasaye owacho. “Abiro ritogi e lwet joma sandogi.”
Weche Jehova Nyasaye liw, giliw ka fedha moleny e lowo mowangʼ maliet ha, mopwodhi ndalo abiriyo.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, yie iritwa maber kik gimoro ohinywa kendo reswa e lwet joma kamago nyaka chiengʼ.
Joma timbegi richo wuotho koni gi koni kendo gima rach ema ji puoyo.

Nyaka karangʼo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye? Wiyi biro wil koda nyaka chiengʼ koso? Ibiro pandona wangʼi nyaka karangʼo?
Abiro dhi nyime ka an gi pek manie pacha kod kuyo manie chunya odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ nyaka karangʼo? Wasika biro locho kuoma nyaka karangʼo?
Para kendo idwoka, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Nyasacha. Chiw ler ne wengena, nono to dipo ka nindo otera mi atho;
nikech mano nyalo miyo jasika wach niya, “Aseloye,” kendo wasika biro bedo mamor ka apodho.
Anto ageno kuom herani mosiko; chunya oil kuom warruok mari. Abiro wer ne Jehova Nyasaye, nikech osebedo ka otimona maber.
Ngʼat mofuwo wacho e chunye niya, “Nyasaye onge.” Gin joma okethore, timbegi richo mokalo tongʼ, onge kata ngʼato achiel matimo maber.
Jehova Nyasaye ngʼiyo ji duto gie polo, mondo oneye ka bende nitie moro kuomgi ma nigi winjo, kata ka bende nitie moro kuomgi mamanyo Nyasaye.
Ji duto osebaro, giduto kaachiel gisedoko joma okethore; onge ngʼama timo maber, onge kata achiel.
Bende joma timo timbe maricho dipuonjre adier? Gin joma kidho joga kaka ji chamo kuon; kendo gin joma ok luong Jehova Nyasaye mondo okonygi.
Negie kaka luoro dwaro negogi, nikech Nyasaye nitie e chokruok mar joma kare.
Un joma timo gik maricho, uketho chenro joma odhier, to Jehova Nyasaye e kar pondo margi.
Yaye, mad warruok mar Israel obi koa Sayun! Kinde ma Jehova Nyasaye duogo ne joge mwandugi, onego joka Jakobo obed moil kendo Israel obed mamor!
Jehova Nyasaye, en ngʼa manyalo siko kari maler milamie? En ngʼa manyalo dak e godi maler?
En ngʼat ma wuodhe obidhore kendo matimo gima kare, ngʼat mawacho adiera gi e chunye
kendo maonge gi miriambo e dhoge, kendo ma ok tim ne wadgi gimoro amora marach kendo ok dir weche makwodo wi dhano wadgi,
Ngʼat machayo ngʼama timbene richo mokalo tongʼ, to miyo joma oluoro Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ, Ngʼat marito singruok motimo kata bed ni timo kamano hinye,
Ngʼat ma holo ji pesane ma ok odwaro ni odwokne gi gimoro e wiye kendo ma ok yie kaw asoya kuom joma onge ketho. Ngʼat matimo gik makamagi gimoro amora ok nyal yiengo.
Rita maber, yaye Nyasaye nikech in e kar pondona.
Ne awacho ne Jehova Nyasaye niya, “In e Ruodha; onge gima ber machielo ma an-go makmana in.”
To jomaler manie piny, to gin kaka joma nigi duongʼ ma ahero gi chunya duto.
Joma lawo nyiseche mamoko kuyo margi biro medore. Misengini magi mag remo ok abi olo oko kendo kata nying-gi ok abi hulo gi dhoga.
Jehova Nyasaye, isemiya pok makora kod okombena; iserita maber gi giga duto.
Kiepena duto ochopo kuonde mabeyo; adier, girkeni maga duto moro wangʼ adier.
Abiro pako Jehova Nyasaye mangʼadona rieko; kata gotieno chunya puonja.
Asiko aketo Jehova Nyasaye e nyima ndalo duto. Nikech ka entie e lweta korachwich, to onge gima nyalo yienga.
Emomiyo chunya mor kendo lewa yot; ringra bende biro yweyo gi kwe,
nikech ok inijwangʼa ei liel, to bende ok niyie Ngʼati Maler tow.
Isenyisa yor ngima; inipongʼa gi mor mogundho ka an e nyimi, kendo gi mor mosiko e badi korachwich.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, yie iwinj kwayona makare; chik iti ne ywakna, chik iti ne lemona, lamona ok aa e dhok mawuondo ji.
Mad chwak michwakago oa kuomi; mad wengeni nee gima kare.
Kata obedo ni inono chunya kendo itema gotieno, kata ka itema to ok ibi yudo gimoro kuoma; asengʼado e chunya ni dhoga ok bi timo richo.
To kuom gik ma joma moko timo, kaluwore gi wach mowuok e dhogi, an awuon asepogora gi yore jo-mahundu.
Tienda osesiko e yoreni; tiendena pok okier.
Aluongi, yaye Nyasaye, nikech ibiro dwoka; chik iti kendo winj lamona.
Nyisie teko mar herani maduongʼ, in ma ireso ji gi lweti ma korachwich, joma pondo ne wasikgi kuomi.
Rita adimba kaka tong wangʼi, panda e bwo tipo mar bwombi,
mondo atony e lwet joma richo ma lawa, mondo atony e lwet wasika ma dhano molwora.
Chunjegi odinore matek, kendo dhogi wuoyo gi wich teko.
Giselawa kuonde duto, mi koro gilwora, ka wengegi ochiek, mondo gidira piny.
Gichalo sibuor ma nigi kech mar mako le, mana ka sibuor maduongʼ mopondo kokichore.
Aa malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, chomgi tir, mi igogi piny; resa e lwet joma richo gi liganglani.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, resa e lwet joma kamago gi lweti, resa e lwet jopinyni ma pokgi ni e pinyni. Itieko kech ma joma ihero nigo; yawuotgi nigi chiemo mangʼeny, kendo gikano mwandu ne nyithindgi.
To anane wangʼi ka ngimana nikare; ka achiewo, abiro romo ka aneno kiti kaka ichal.

Aheri, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, in e tekra.
Jehova Nyasaye en lwandana, en kar pondo mara kendo en jawarna; Nyasacha en lwandana ma apondo kuome. En okumbana, en tungʼ mar warruokna, kendo en ohingana.
Aluongo Jehova Nyasaye, en mowinjore gi pak, kendo oresa e lwet wasika.
Tonde mag tho ne orida matek; kendo ohula mangʼongo mar tho nouma.
Tonde mag liel ne orida kendo odhoga matek; obadho mag tho ne ochoma tir.
E chandruok ne aluongo Jehova Nyasaye; ne aywak ne Nyasaye mondo okonya. Ne owinjo dwonda gie hekalu mare; ywakna nochopo e nyime, modonjo e ite.
Piny notetni kendo oyiengni; kendo mise mag gode notetni; ne gikirni nikech ne okecho.
Iro nodum koa e otuchi mag ume; mach mangʼangʼni nodhuolore kawuok e dhoge, kendo makaa maliel mager nobebni kawuok kuome.
Nobaro polo mobiro e piny; rumbi molil ti nonyono gi tiende.
Noidho kerubi eka ofuyo; ne ofuyo matek komoko e bwomb yamo.
Noloko mudho kaka raum mare, mudhono nobedo hema molwore, kendo nokawo rumbi mar koth moloko raumne.
Boche nowuok e ler marieny mane aa kuome, kaachiel gi pe madongo dongo kod mil polo ma tiarore.
Jehova Nyasaye nomor gie polo; dwond Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo nowinjore.
Nodiro asernige mokeyo wasigu, mor polo gi mil polo noriembogi.
Holni manie bwo nembe noelore kendo mise mag piny nowe nono, kane ikwerogi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kane teko mar muya mowuok e otuchi mag umi ogoyogi.
Nochopo ira piny koa malo mi okawa; ne ogola oko e kude mag pi matut.
Noresa e lwet jasika maratego, kuom jowasika, mane tek moloya.
Negimonja e kinde mane an gi masira, to Jehova Nyasaye ema nokonya.
Ne okela moketa kama lach; ne oresa nikech chunye ne mor koda.
Jehova Nyasaye osetimona maber ka oluwore gi timna makare; osechiwona ka oluwore gi ler mar lwetena.
Nikech aserito yore Jehova Nyasaye; pok atimo marach kuom lokora weyo Nyasacha.
Chikene duto ni e nyima; pok alokora aweyo buchene.
Asebedo ka aonge ketho e nyime kendo aseritora mondo kik atim richo.
Jehova Nyasaye osechiwona kaluwore gi timna makare, osechiwona kaluwore gi ler mar lwetena e nyime.
Ne joma jo-adiera, inyisori kaka ja-adiera, kendo ne joma longʼo, inyisori kaka ngʼama longʼo,
ne jomaler, inyisori kaka ngʼama ler, to ne joma yoregi obam, inyisori kaka ngʼama rach.
Ireso joma muol to joma wengegi tek idwoko piny.
In ema imiyo tacha siko kaliel, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; Nyasacha loko mudho mouma doko ler.
Ka ikonya to anyalo loyo jolweny momonja; ka an gi Nyasacha to anyalo lwenyo ohinga.
Nyasaye to yore longʼo chuth; wach Jehova Nyasaye onge rem moro amora. En okumba ne ji duto ma pondo kuome.
Nikech en Nyasaye mane minyalo pimo gi Jehova Nyasaye? Koso en ngʼa ma en Lwanda, ka ok Nyasachwa?
Nyasaye ema miya teko kendo omiyo yora bedo mokwe.
Omiyo tiendena bedo mayot ka tiende mwanda; kendo en ema omiyo achungʼ kuonde man malo maboyo.
Otiego lwetena ne lweny; momiyo bedena nyalo dolo atung nyinyo.
Isemiya okumba mar warruokni, kendo lweti korachwich osesira; kony mari osemiyo abedo gi duongʼ.
Imiyo yo mawuothoe bedo malach, mondo tiendena kik ba yo.
Ne alawo wasika mi ajukogi; kendo ne ok alokora aweyogi nyaka ne atiekogi pep.
Ne atiekogi, mane ok ginyal chungʼ; negipodho e tienda.
Ne imiya teko mar kedo lweny; ne imiyo jomamon koda kulore e nyima.
Ne imiyo wasika oringo kadhi, mine atieko joma ok dwara.
Ne giywak mondo okonygi to onge ngʼama ne nyalo resogi; ne giywakne Jehova Nyasaye to ne ok odwokogi.
Ne agoyogi adunya ka buru ma yamo tero, ne achodhogi oko ka chwodho mag yore mag dala.
Ne iresa e ywaruok gi ji. Ne iketa jatend ogendini; joma ne ok angʼeyo chon notiyona.
Kane giwinjo humba, ne giwinja; jopinje mamoko nobiro motwere kuoma.
Negibiro ka gitetni; kendo ka chunygi ool, ka gia kuondegi mag pondo.
Jehova Nyasaye ngima! Lwandana mondo ogwedhi. Kendo Nyasaye mar Warruokna mondo otingʼ malo!
Nyasaye mane ochulo kuor kara kendo oloyo ogendini e bwoya;
mane oresa e lwet wasika; ne itingʼa malo e kind wasika ne iresa e lwet jo-mahundu.
Emomiyo anapaki e kind ogendini, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo anawer wende mapako nyingi.
Jehova Nyasaye kelo resruok maduongʼ ne ruoth moketo, onyiso hera mogundho ma ok rum ne ngʼate mowir, ni Daudi gi nyikwaye nyaka chiengʼ.

Polo hulo duongʼ mar Nyasaye; kor polo nyiso tich mar lwete.
Odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ gilando wach; otieno kotieno ginyiso rieko.
Gionge dhok kata weche kata dwondgi ok winji.
Kata kamano dwondgi chopo kuonde duto e piny, wechegi osechopo nyaka e tunge piny. Osechungo hema e kor polo ne wangʼ chiengʼ,
machalo gi wuon kisera mothinyore oko kawuok e ode mar mor, kendo mana ka jangʼwech mongirore moil moikore ni chako ngʼwech.
Owuok gie tungʼ polo konchiel, kendo olworore nyaka komachielo; onge gima opondo ne liet mare.
Chik Jehova Nyasaye longʼo chuth, odwogo chuny. Buche mag Jehova Nyasaye gin adiera, gimiyo joma riekogi tin bedo mariek.
Chike mag Jehova Nyasaye nikare, gichiwo mor ne chuny. Chike mag Jehova Nyasaye rieny, gichiwo ler ne wangʼ.
Luoro Jehova Nyasaye en gima ber, mosiko nyaka chiengʼ. Buche mag Jehova Nyasaye gin adier kendo gin kare kargi giduto.
Gibeyo moloyo dhahabu, moloyo dhahabu malerie moloyo; gimit moloyo mor kich moa e pedni.
Gin ema gimiyo jatichni bedo motangʼ; kendo bedogi kanyo kelo pok maduongʼ.
En ngʼa manyalo ngʼeyo kethone mopondo? Wena kethoga mopondo.
Bende gengʼ jatichni kuom richo mag wich teko; mad kik gibed gi loch kuoma. Eka anabed maonge ketho, anabed ka aonge gi ketho chik moro maduongʼ.
Mad weche mawuok e dhoga, kod paro manie chunya, obed malongʼo e nyimi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, Lwandana kendo Jawarna.

Mad Jehova Nyasaye dwoki ka in e chandruok; mad nying Nyasach Jakobo riti.
Mad oorni kony moa kare maler mar lemo kendo omiyi kony moa Sayun.
Mad opar misengni magi duto kendo oyie gi misengini miwangʼo pep magi. Sela
Mad omiyi gima chunyi gombo kendo omi chenro magi duto odhi maber.
Wabiro kok gimor ka ilocho kendo wabiro tingʼo bendechwa malo e nying Nyasachwa. Mad Jehova Nyasaye chiw gik moko duto mikwaye.
Koro angʼeyo ni Jehova Nyasaye reso ngʼate mowir; odwoke gie kare maler mar lemo manie polo, gi teko ma waro ji mar lwete ma korachwich.
Jomoko ogeno kuom gechegi to jomoko kuom faresegi, to wan to wageno kuom nying Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasachwa.
Gibiro lwar e chonggi mi gipodhi, to wan wabiro aa malo mi wachungʼ motegno.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, reswa ruoth! Dwokwa ka waluongi!

Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ruoth oil nikech teko ma imiye. Mano kaka en gi mor maduongʼ nikech isemiyo olocho!
Isemiye gima chunye gombo kendo pok idagi timone kwayone. Sela
Ne irwake gi gweth momew kendo nisidho osimbo mar dhahabu maler e wiye.
Ne okwayi ngima kendo ne imiye; ne imede ndalo mochwere manyaka chiengʼ.
Kuom loch mane ichiwo, duongʼ mare duongʼ; isemiye huma gi luor.
Adier, isemiye gweth mochwere kendo isemiyo obedo mamor gi mor moa kuomi.
Nikech ruoth ogeno kuom Jehova Nyasaye; kuom hera ma ok rum mar Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo, ok obi yiengni.
Lweti biro mako wasiki duto; lweti ma korachwich biro ndhiyo joma kedo kodi.
E sa ma ibiro chopoe, to ibiro miyo gichal gi kendo mar mach mager. Jehova Nyasaye biro mwonyogi kuom mirimbe mager, kendo mach mare biro tiekogi.
Ibiro tieko kothgi mi rum e piny, kendo nyithindgi biro rumo e dier ji.
Kata obedo ni gichano timoni marach kendo giloso chenro maricho, to ok ginyal loyo;
nikech ibiro miyo gilok dier ngʼegi ka ibiro dimbogi gi atungʼ moywa.
Yud duongʼ, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kuom tekoni maduongʼ; wabiro wer kendo pako nyalo mari.

Nyasacha, Nyasacha, iweya nangʼo? Angʼo momiyo in mabor koda ma ok inyal resa? In mabor ma ok inyal winjo weche mag churna mondo iresa?
Yaye Nyasacha, aywagora odiechiengʼ duto to ok idwoka, aywagora gotieno bende ma ok alingʼ.
To eka ibet e kom duongʼ kaka Ngʼama Ler; in e pak mar jo-Israel.
Kuomi ema wuonewa noketoe genogi; ne gigeni kendo ne iresogi.
Ne giywakni kendo ne iwarogi; negigeno kuomi mine ok gineno wichkuot.
An to an mana kudni ma ok dhano, ngʼama ji duto jaro kendo ma ji ochayo.
Ji duto monena jara; gidiro ayany ka gikino wigi.
“Ogeno kuom Jehova Nyasaye; koro mondo Jehova Nyasaye okonye ane. Koro mondo orese ane, nikech chunye mor kode.”
To in ema ne igola e ich; ne ichweya mondo agen kuomi kata kane pod adhodho thund minwa.
Ne oriwa kodi chakre chiengʼ mane onywolae; isebedo Nyasacha aa kinde mane an ei minwa.
Kik ibed mabor koda, nikech chandruok ni koda machiegni, kendo onge ngʼama nyalo konya.
Rwedhi mangʼeny olwora; rwedhi maroteke moa Bashan olwora koni gi koni.
Sibuoche maruto makidho le ma gisemako ongʼamo dhogi malach ka dwaro kidha.
Ipuka oko ka pi, kendo chokena duto osewil. Chunya olokore odok; oseleny morumo e iya.
Tekona osetwo ka balatago, kendo lewa omoko e danda; isepiela e lop tho.
Guogi oselwora; oganda mar joma richo oseketa diere, gisetucho lwetena gi tiendena.
Anyalo kwano chokena duto; ji ranga amingʼa kendo jara.
Ne gipogore lepa e kindgi giwegi kendo gigoyo ombulu ne nangana.
To in, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kik ibed mabor koda. In e tekra, bi piyo mondo ikonya.
Res ngimana kuom ligangla, res ngimana e teko guogi.
Resa e dho sibuoche; resa e tunge jowi mager.
Abiro hulo nyingi ne owetena; abiro paki e nyim chokruok.
Un muluoro Jehova Nyasaye, pakeuru! Un nyikwa Jakobo duto, miyeuru duongʼ. Luoreuru, un koth jo-Israel duto!
Nikech pok ochayo kata ojaro sandruok mar joma winjo malit; pok opandone wangʼe to osewinjo ywakne mar dwaro kony.
Kuomi ema thoro mara mar pak e chokruok maduongʼ aye; abiro chopo singruok maga e nyim joma oluori.
Joma odhier biro chiemo mi yiengʼ; joma manyo Jehova Nyasaye biro pake, mad chunjeu bed mangima nyaka chiengʼ!
Tunge piny duto biro paro miduog ir Jehova Nyasaye, kendo dhout ogendini duto biro kulore e nyime,
Nikech loch en mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo en ema olocho ewi ogendini.
Jo-mwandu duto manie piny biro chiemo kendo lemo; ji duto madhi piny e lowo biro kulore e nyime, jogo ma ok nyal siko kangima.
Tienge mabiro noti ne Jehova Nyasaye, kendo nonyis ogendini mabiro wachne.
Gibiro hulo timne makare, ne ji mapok onywol niya: “Jehova Nyasaye osewaro joge.”
Jehova Nyasaye e jakwadha, ok anachand gimoro.
Omiyo ayweyo e lum mangʼich, otelona e aore mokwe,
odwogo chunya. Otaya e yore mag tim makare mondo nyinge oyud duongʼ.
Kata ka obedo ni awuotho e hoho mar tipo mar tho, to ok analuor gimoro marach, nimar in koda; ludhi gi odungani ema hoya.
Iloso mesa e nyima ka wasika neno. Iwiro wiya gi mo; kikombena opongʼ moo oko.
Adier, ber gihera biro luwa ndalo duto mag ngimana, kendo abiro dak e od Jehova Nyasaye nyaka chiengʼ.
Piny kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye gin mag Jehova Nyasaye, bende ji duto modakie piny gin mage;
nikech ne omiyo piny obet ewi nembe kendo noguro misene ewi pige.
En ngʼa manyalo idho wi got mar Jehova Nyasaye? En ngʼa manyalo chungʼ e ode maler?
En mana ngʼat ma lwete ler kendo chunye bende ler, ngʼat ma ok lam nyiseche ma dhano oloso, kata kwongʼre gi miriambo.
Ngʼat ma kamano Jehova Nyasaye biro gwedho kendo obiro yudo ber moa kuom Nyasaye ma Jawarne.
Kamano e kaka tiengʼ mar joma dware chalo, mamanyo wangʼi, yaye Nyasach Jakobo. Sela
tingʼuru lodiu malo, yaye dhorangeye; tingʼreuru malo, yaye rangeye machon, mondo Ruodh duongʼ odonji.
Ruoth man-gi duongʼni to en ngʼa? En Jehova Nyasaye Maratego kendo manyalo duto, En Jehova Nyasaye maloyo lweny.
Tingʼuru lodiu malo, yaye un dhorangeye; tingʼ-giuru malo, un dhorangeye machon, mondo Ruodh duongʼ odonji.
Ruodh duongʼni en ngʼa? Jehova Nyasaye Maratego, En e Ruodh Duongʼ. Sela
Achiwoni chunya, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
In ema aketo genona kuomi, yaye Nyasacha. Kik iwe ane wichkuot, bende kik iwe wasika loya.
Onge ngʼama oketo genone kuomi manyalo neno wichkuot, to joma timo timbe maricho ema biro neno wichkuot.
Nyisa yoreni, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, puonja mondo aluwgi;
telna gi adierani, kendo puonja, nikech in Nyasaye ma Jawarna, kendo genona ni kuomi odiechiengʼ duto.
Par kechni maduongʼ gi herani, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech gisebedo ka gintie nyaka aa chon.
Kik ipar richo mane atimo kapod an rawere kod yorena mobam; para kaluwore gi herani, nikech iber, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Jehova Nyasaye ber kendo yorene oriere tir; mano emomiyo opuonjo joricho yorene.
Otelo ni joma muol kuom gima nikare kendo opuonjogi yore.
Yore duto mag Jehova Nyasaye opongʼ gihera kod adiera ni joma rito gik moko duto ma singruokne dwaro.
Wena richona nikech nyingi kata obedo ni richona duongʼ ahinya, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Koro ere ngʼat ma oluoro Jehova Nyasaye? Obiro puonje luwo yo moyierne.
Obiro dak e ngima momew, kendo nyikwaye nokaw piny kaka girkeni margi.
Jehova Nyasaye en osiep joma miye luor; omiyo gingʼeyo singruok mage.
Achomo wangʼa kuom Jehova Nyasaye ndalo duto, nikech en kende ema obiro golo tiendena mobadho omako.
Duog ira kendo bedna mangʼwon, nikech adongʼ kenda kendo an gi kuyo.
Chandruok manie chunya osemedore; resa kuom rem ma an-go.
Neye kuyo manie chunya kod rem ma an-go, kendo gol richona duto.
Neye kaka wasika osemedore kendo kaka gichaya gi chunygi duto!
Rit ngimana kendo iresa; kik iwe ane wichkuot, nikech in ema apondo kuomi.
Mad bidhruok gi ngima moriere rita nikech genona ni kuomi.
Res Israel, yaye Nyasaye, kuom chandruok mage duto!
Ngʼadna bura makare, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech e ngimana duto asedak ka aonge ketho; aseketo genona kuom Jehova Nyasaye ma ok adigni.
Nona kendo itema, yaye Jehova Nyasaye nonie chunya gi pacha;
nikech herani osiko kanie chunya kinde duto, kendo asiko kawuotho e adierani.
Ok abed piny gi joma wuondore bende ok ariwra gi jo-miriambo.
Achayo chokruok mar joma timo gik maricho kendo ok ayie bet piny gi joricho.
Aluoko lwetena kanyisogo ni aonge ketho, kendo aluoro kendoni mar misango, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
ka alando pakni gi dwol maduongʼ, kendo anyiso timbeni duto miwuoro.
Ahero hekalu kama idakie, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kama duongʼni nitie.
Kik ikaw chunya kaachiel gi joricho, kik ikaw ngimana kod joma ohero chwero remo,
joma lwetegi otingʼo chenro maricho ma lwetegi ma korachwich asoya opongʼo.
An to ngimana onge ketho; yie iwara kendo ikecha.
Tiendena onyono kama opie; e chokruok mangʼongo abiro pako Jehova Nyasaye.
Jehova Nyasaye e lerna kendo e warruokna; en ngʼa ma daluor? Jehova Nyasaye e kama ngimana opondoe. En ngʼa ma dibwoga?
Ka joma richo lawa mondo oketh ngimana, ka wasika kod joma kedo koda monja, to gibiro kier mi gipodhi.
Kata ka jolweny ogoyona agengʼa koni gi koni, to chunya ok bi luor; kata ka lweny otugorena, to pod abiro mana bedo gi chir.
Gimoro achiel kende ema akwayo Jehova Nyasaye, ma e gima adwaro moloyo; ni mondo adag e od Jehova Nyasaye ndalo duto mag ngimana, mondo achom wangʼa kuom ber mar Jehova Nyasaye kendo amanye e hekalu mare.
Nikech chiengʼ ma chandruok omaka obiro panda maber e kar dakne; obiro panda e kar pondo mar hembe maler kendo obiro keta malo ewi lwanda.
Eka abiro bedo jaloch ka aloyo wasigu duto molwora; abiro timo misango mar pak ka akok gimor e hembe maler. Abiro wer kendo abiro loso wende mamit ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Winj dwonda ka aluongo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; kecha kendo idwoka.
Chunya wuoyo kuomi kawacho niya, “Many wangʼ Nyasaye ka ilemo!” Wangʼi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ema abiro manyo.
Kik ipandna wangʼi, kik iriemb jatichni ka mirima omaki, in ema isebedo jakonyna. Kik ikweda bende kik ijwangʼa, yaye Nyasaye Jawarna.
Kata obedo ni wuonwa gi minwa ojwangʼa to Jehova Nyasaye biro rwaka.
Puonja yoreni, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; telna e yo moriere tir, nikech joma sanda.
Kik ijwangʼa ne dwach wasika, nikech joneno mag miriambo oramona matek, ka gichano mar hinya.
To an gi ratiro kuom wachni: ni pod abiro neno ber Jehova Nyasaye, e piny joma ngima.
Gen kuom Jehova Nyasaye; bed motegno ka in gi chir, kendo rit kuom Jehova Nyasaye.
In ema aluongi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Lwandana; kik itamri winjo ywakna. Nikech ka isiko ilingʼ alingʼa, to abiro chalo gi joma osedhi e bur.
Winj ywakna mondo ikecha e sa ma aluongi mondo ikonya, e sa ma atingʼo bedena malo kochomo Kari Maler Moloyo.
Kik iywaya oko gi joricho, kod joma timo gik maricho, joma wuoyo gi jowetegi maber to opando sigu e chunygi.
Chulgi kuom timbegi maricho kendo kuom tijegi maricho; chulgi kuom gik ma lwetgi osetimo kendo dwok kuomgi gik mowinjore gi timbegi.
Nikech ok gidew tije mag Jehova Nyasaye kod gik ma lwetene osetimo, obiro mukogi mi ogogi piny kendo ok nochak ogergi mi gichungʼ kendo.
Opak Jehova Nyasaye nikech osewinjo ywakna ma akwayogo kony.
Jehova Nyasaye e tekona kendo okumbana; chunya ogeno kuome kendo en e konyruokna. Chunya nigi mor kendo abiro goyone erokamano gi wer.
Jehova Nyasaye e teko mar joge, en e ohinga mar resruok ni joge moyiero.
Res jogi kendo gwedh jogi moyier bed Jakwadh jogi kendo telnegi nyaka chiengʼ.
Chiwneuru Jehova Nyasaye, yaye un malaike, chiwneuru Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ kod teko.
Chiwneuru Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ mowinjore gi nyinge; lamuru Jehova Nyasaye e dier lerne maduongʼ.
Dwond Jehova Nyasaye mor ewi pige; Nyasaye mar duongʼ mor ka polo, Jehova Nyasaye mor ewi pige madongo.
Dwond Jehova Nyasaye nigi teko, dwond Jehova Nyasaye nigi duongʼ.
Dwond Jehova Nyasaye muko yiende mag sida, Jehova Nyasaye turo yiende sida mag Lebanon matindo tindo.
Omiyo Lebanon chikore ka nyaroya, Sirion lengʼore ka jowi ma pod tin.
Dwond Jehova Nyasaye mor, omor ka mil polo.
Dwond Jehova Nyasaye yiengo piny motimo ongoro; Jehova Nyasaye yiengo ongoro mar Kadesh.
Dwond Jehova Nyasaye ma dolo yiend bungu miyo mwanda nywol kendo omiyo yiend bungu dongʼ kolwerore. Ji duto kok ei hekalu mare kagiwacho niya, “Duongʼ odog ni Jehova Nyasaye!”
Jehova Nyasaye obet e kom loch mare ewi ataro; Jehova Nyasaye obet e kom loch kaka Ruoth nyaka chiengʼ.
Jehova Nyasaye miyo joge teko; Jehova Nyasaye gwedho joge gi kwe.

Abiro tingʼi malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech ne igola e bur matut, kendo ne ok iyiene wasika mondo obed mamor kuoma.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Nyasacha, ne aluongi mondo ikonya kendo ne ichanga.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ne igola oko e liel, ne iresa kane oyudo aridora piny e bur matut mar joma otho.
Werneuru Jehova Nyasaye, un joge maler; pakuru nyinge maler.
Nikech mirimbe bedo mana kuom kinde matin kende, to ngʼwonone osiko nyaka chiengʼ; ywak nyalo bedo gotieno to mor biro mana gokinyi.
Kane aparo ni adhi maber, ne awacho niya, “Onge gima biro bwoga.”
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kane itimona ngʼwono, ne imiyo achungʼ motegno kaka got; to kane ipando wangʼi, to piny nochama.
In ema ne aluongi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; Ruoth Nyasaye ema ne aywakne mondo okecha.
“Ere ohala ma thona biro kelo, ere gima dhina e liel biro konyigo? Buru bende nyalo paki adier? Bende dohul adierani kasetho?
Winja, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo kecha; yaye Jehova Nyasaye bed konyruok mara.”
Ne iloko ywakna modoko miel; ne igolo lawa mar kuyo mi irwakona law mor,
mondo chunya owerni kendo kik olingʼ. Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Nyasacha, abiro goyoni erokamano nyaka chiengʼ.

Kuomi ema aseponde, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kik iwe ayud wichkuot; gola e chandruok nikech timni makare.
Winj ywakna, kendo bi piyo mondo iresa; bed lwandana mar pondo, kendo ohinga motegno manyalo resa.
Kaka in lwandana kendo ohingana, telna kendo itaya nikech nyingi.
Gola oko e obadho mopondo mochikna nikech in e kar pondona.
Aketo chunya e lweti; resa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasaye mar adiera.
Asin gi joma lamo nyiseche manono ma dhano oloso; an to aketo genona kuom Jehova Nyasaye.
Abiro bedo mamor kendo moil kuom herani, nikech ne ineno chandruokna, kendo ne ingʼeyo lit mar chunya.
Ok iseketa e lwet jawasigu to iseguro tiendena kama lach.
Kecha, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech an e chandruok; wengena ojony nikech ywak, kendo chunya gi ringra bende nigi lit.
Ngimana rem chamo kendo higni maga opongʼ gi chur; tekona rumo nikech lit ma an-go kendo chokena doko mayom yom.
Nikech wasigu olwora mangʼeny, joma odak koda koro ochaya gi chunygi; alich kata mana ni osiepena kendo joma onena e wangʼ yo ringa.
Wigi owil koda mana ka gima ne asetho chon bende koro achalo mana gi agulu motore.
Nikech awinjo ayany mangʼeny ma ji yanyago, kihondko olwora koni gi koni; gikuodho kaka digitimna marach kendo gichano mar kawo ngimana.
To an aketo mana genona kuomi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; kendo awacho niya, “In e Nyasacha.”
Ndalona ni e lweti; resa e lwet wasika, kendo kuom joma lawa.
Mad ibed mamor gi jatichni; resa gi herani ma ok rum.
Kik iwe wiya kuodi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech aseywakni ka alemo; to we joma timbegi richo oyud wichkuot kendo ginindi ka gilingʼ thi ei liel.
Mi dhogi mawacho miriambo mondo olingʼ; nikech sungagi kod chuny marach ma gin-go, omiyo giwuoyo gi wich teko kuom joma kare.
Mano kaka berni duongʼ, ber mikano ne joma oluori, mimiyo joma opondo kuomi ka ji duto neno.
Ipandogi e bwombi iwuon mondo joma richo kik hinygi; iritogi maber e kar dak mari kuom lew joma hangonigi wach.
Pak obed ni Jehova Nyasaye, nikech ne onyisa herane maduongʼ, kane an e dala ma wasigu ogoyona agengʼa.
Kane chandruok omaka to ne awacho ni, “Opoga kodi!” Kata kamano ne iwinja ka aywakni mondo ikecha kane aluongi mondo ikonya.
Heruru Jehova Nyasaye un joge maler duto! Jehova Nyasaye rito ngima joma jo-adiera, to josunga to ochulo moromo chuth.
Beduru motegno kendo jiwuru chunyu, un duto mugeno kuom Jehova Nyasaye.
Ogwedh ngʼat ma kethone owene, kendo ma richone oseruchi.
Ogwedh ngʼatno ma Jehova Nyasaye ok kwan-ne richone, kendo ma wuondruok onge e chunye.
Kane alingʼ to chokena ne ochiyore, kane achur odiechiengʼ duto ma ok aywe.
Nikech odiechiengʼ gotieno lweti ne pek kuoma; tekrena ne oduono mana kaka timore e liet mar ndalo oro. Sela
Eka ne ahulo richona kendo ne ok apando timbena mag ketho. Ne awacho niya, “Abiro hulo ketho chik maga ne Jehova Nyasaye.” Omiyo ne iweyona ketho mane richona okelo. Sela
Kuom mano, owinjore ji duto moluoro Nyasaye olami kapod inyalo yudi; adier ka pige madongo otugore, to ok gibi chopo ire,
In e kar pondona; ibiro rita e chandruok, kendo ibiro lwora gi wende mag loch. Sela
Abiro chiki kendo abiro puonji e yo monego ilu; adier abiro ngʼadoni rieko kendo abiro rangi maber.
Kik ichal gi farese kata gi punda, maonge gi rieko, manyaka chiki mana ka otwe dhoge kendo iywayo gi kamba, nono to ok gibi buti.
Lit mochomo joma timbegi richo ngʼeny, to hera ma ok rum mar Jehova Nyasaye, olworo ngʼat mogeno kuome.
Beduru moil kuom Jehova Nyasaye, kendo beduru mamor, un joma kare; weruru, un duto ma urieru tir gie chunyu!
Weruru gimor ni Jehova Nyasaye, un joma kare; en gima owinjore mondo joma kare opake.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye gi nyatiti; werneuru wer mamit gi nyatiti.
Werneuru wer manyien; werneuru kugoyone nyiduonge kendo weruru gi ilo.
Wach Jehova Nyasaye nikare kendo en adier; en ja-adiera e gik moko duto motimo.
Jehova Nyasaye ohero tim makare kod ratiro; piny duto opongʼ gi herane ma ok rem.
Polo ne ochwe kuom wach Jehova Nyasaye, i dwe gi nyinyo duto nochweyo gi much dhoge.
Ochoko pige mag nembe madongo e tawo; oketo kut e dere.
Piny duto mondo oluor Jehova Nyasaye; ji duto manie e piny mondo okulrene.
Nikech ne owuoyo mi piny nobetie, nogolo chik mi ochungʼ mongirore.
Jehova Nyasaye ketho chenro duto mag pinje; othiro dwaro ma ogendini nigo.
To chenro duto mag Jehova Nyasaye to siko kochungʼ nyaka chiengʼ; ochopo dwaro duto manie chunye e tienge duto.
Piny ma ogeno Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasache ogwedhi, nikech gin oganda mane oyiero kaka girkeni mare.
Jehova Nyasaye rango piny gie polo kendo oneno dhano duto;
ongʼiyo ji duto modak e piny gie kar dakne e polo,
en ema ne ochweyo chunje ji duto, kendo onono gik moko duto ma gitimo.
Onge ruoth minyalo reso nikech en gi jolweny mangʼeny; bende onge jakedo manyalo tony nikech tekone ngʼeny.
Geno yudo resruok kuom faras en gima nono kata obedo ni en giteko mangʼeny to ok onyal reso ngʼato.
To wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye neno jogo momiye luor, orango joma geno margi ni kuom herane ma ok rem,
mondo oresgi e tho kendo oritgi gibed mangima e ndalo mag kech.
Warito Jehova Nyasaye gi geno; en e konyruokwa kendo okumbawa.
Chunywa mor kuome, nikech wageno kuom nyinge maler.
Mad herani ma ok rum osik kuomwa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mana kaka waketo genowa kuomi.

Abiro miyo Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ kinde duto; dhoga biro siko kapake.
Chunya biro sungore kuom Jehova Nyasaye, joma nigi rem mondo owinji kendo obed mamor.
Miuru Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ kaachiel koda; watingʼuru nyinge malo kaachiel.
Ne amanyo Jehova Nyasaye ka alamo, kendo nodwoka; ne oresa e luoro duto ma an-go.
Joma oketo genogi kuome rieny; ok gi bi neno wichkuot.
Ngʼat ma odhierni noluongo Jehova Nyasaye, kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowinje; ne orese mogole e chandruokne duto.
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye oumo alwora mar jogo momiye luor kendo oresogi.
Bi mondo ine ni Jehova Nyasaye ber; ngʼat ma pondo kuome ogwedhi.
Luoruru Jehova Nyasaye, un joge maler, nikech joma omiye luor ok chand gimoro amora.
Sibuoche nyalo ool kendo kech nyalo kayogi, to joma manyo Jehova Nyasaye ok ochando gima ber moro amora.
Biuru nyithinda kendo winjauru. Abiro puonjou luoro Jehova Nyasaye.
Ngʼato angʼata kuomu mohero ngima kendo nigi geno kuom ndalo mabiro mangʼeny mabeyo,
nyaka ogengʼ lewe kik wuo marach kendo ogengʼ dhoge kuom wacho miriambo.
Lokri iwe timbe maricho kendo itim tim maber; many kwe kendo iluwe.
Wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye ni kuom joma kare kendo ite winjo ywakgi;
to Jehova Nyasaye mon gi joma timo gik maricho, kendo omiyo wich wil kodgi e piny.
Joma kare koywak to Jehova Nyasaye winjogi; oresogi e chandruokgi duto.
Jehova Nyasaye chiegni gi joma chunygi otur kendo oreso joma chunygi muol.
Ngʼat makare nyalo bedo gi chandruok mangʼeny, to Jehova Nyasaye rese kuomgi duto;
orito chokene duto, ma kata achiel kuomgi ok notur.
Timbe maricho biro nego ngʼama timbene rach, to jowasik joma kare, bura biro loyo.
Jehova Nyasaye reso jotichne; onge ngʼato kata achiel mopondo kuome ma bura biro loyo.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye kedi gi joma kedo koda; ked gi joma lawa.
Kaw kuodi gi okumbani; aa malo mondo ibi ikonya.
Chom tongʼ ma dhoge bith mar kedo ibwog-go joma lawa. Wuo gi chunya kiwachone niya, “An e warruokni.”
Mad joma dwaro ketho ngimana, ne wichkuot gi achaya. Mad joma chanona hinyruok, chunygi nyosre mi giweya.
Mad gichal gi mihudhi ma yamo tero, ka malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye riembogi mabor;
mad yore ma giluwo bed gi mudho bende yoregigo obed makierogi ka malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye lawogi.
Nikech gichikona obadhogi kayiem nono kendo gikunyona bur kayiem mondo alwarie;
mad kethruok jukgi apoya ka gikia mad obadhogi ma gisechikona makgi; mad gilwar ei bur ma kargi lal nono.
Eka chunya nobed mamor kuom Jehova Nyasaye kendo anabed gimor kuom warruokne.
Ringra gi chunya duto, biro hulo kawacho niya, “En ngʼa machalo kodi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.” Ireso joma odhier e lwet joma nigi teko moloyogi, Adier, ikonyo joma odhier gi jochan kuom joma mayogi.
Joma timo neno ma wengegi tek sudo nyime; gipenja gik ma ok angʼeyo gimoro amora kuomgi.
Gichula rach kar ber, kendo giweyo chunya kochwanyore.
To kane gituo magihewore to ne arwako law ywagruok kendo ne abolora katweyo chiemo. Kane lamona ok odwoki,
ne awuotho koni gi koni ka chunya lit, mana ka gima aywago osiepna kata owadwa. Ne akulo wiya ka an gi kuyo maduongʼ mana ka gima aywago minwa.
To kane achwanyora, negichokore kaachiel gi mor; joma ne monja nochokorena sa ma ok angʼeyo, negisiko ka giketho nyinga.
Kaka joma ok oluoro Nyasaye chayo ji, ne gijara ka gichano timona marach, ne gikayona lekegi.
Yaye Ruoth, ibiro siko kirango gigi katimore nyaka karangʼo? Res ngimana kuom kethruok duto mag-gi. Akwayi ni ires ngimana ma nengone tek e lwet sibuochegi.
Abiro goyoni erokamano e chokruok maduongʼ; abiro paki e dier oganda maduongʼ mochokore kaachiel.
Kik iyie ni jogo osungre ni gisenyala, joma obedo wasika maonge gima omiyo; iyie joma ochaya maonge gimoro sigre gi wengegi mar timona marach.
Ok giwuo gi kwe, to gichano wacho miriambo, kuom joma odak mos e piny.
Giyawona dhogi maduongʼ kendo nyiera ka giwachona giwacho niya, “Haa! Haa! Wasenene gi wengewa wawegi.”
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, iseneno timgini; kik ilingʼ. Kik ibed koda mabor, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye.
Aa malo, kendo chungi mondo ikonya! Kedna, yaye Nyasacha kendo Ruodha.
Yala kichwaka kuom timni makare, yaye Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha; kik iyienegi gisungre ni gisenyala.
Kik iwe giwach e chunygi niya, “Ero, otimorene mana kaka ne wadwaro.” Kata giwach niya, “Koro wasemuonye ngili.”
Mad ji duto mamor nikech chandruokna oyud wichkuot kendo pachgi olal; mad joma kaworena oyud wichkuot gi achaya.
Mad joma mor kuom loch ma imiya okog gi ilo kod mor; mad gisiki kagiwacho kinde duto niya, “Jehova Nyasaye mondo otingʼ malo nikech omiyo jatichne locho.”
Abiro pako timni makare kendo kuom pakni duto odiechiengʼ duto.

An-gi wach e chunya mowuok kuom Nyasaye, kuom gima joricho timo: Ok giluoro Nyasaye kata matin.
Nikech chunye wuonde kendo owuondore kende, chunye wuonde ma ok onyal neno richone mosin-go.
Weche mawuok e dhoge richo kendo gin miriambo; oseweyo bedo mariek kod timo maber.
Kata konindo e kitandane, to ochano timo gima rach; oseketo chunye mar luwo yor richo, kendo ok otamre gima rach.
Herani ochopo nyaka e polo malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; adierani chopo nyaka e polo,
Timni makare chalo gi gode madongo, ratiro mari chalo gi kut matut. Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, in ema irito ngima dhano gi le.
Mano kaka herani ma ok rum nengone tek, yaye Nyasaye! Joma idewo kaachiel gi joma ni piny yudo kar pondo margi e bwo tipo mar bwombeni.
Gichamo chiemo mangʼeny e hekalu mari ka gimor; imiyogi math moa e aorani mar mor.
Nimar in ema in gi soko mar pi mar ngima; kuom lerni ema wanenoe ler.
Med nyiso herani ni joma ongʼeyi, med nyiso timni makare ne joma gie chunygi ni kare.
Mad tiend joma sungore kik nyona, kata lwet joma timbegi richo gola kama antie.
Neye kaka joma timo gik maricho oriere piny kopodho osedirgi piny ma ok ginyal aa malo!
Kik chunyi chandre nikech joma richo bende chunyi kik gomb gige joma timo gik maricho;
nikech gibiro ner mapiyo mana kaka lum ner; gibiro tho mi gilal nono mapiyo mana kaka yiende mangʼich.
Gen kuom Jehova Nyasaye kendo tim maber. Eka inidag e piny kendo inichiem gi mor e lek maber.
Bed mamor kuom Jehova Nyasaye eka obiro miyi gik moko duto ma chunyi dwaro.
Ket yoreni kuom Jehova Nyasaye; ket genoni kuome eka obiro timo kama:
Obiro miyo timni makare rieny ka ler mar okinyi, kendo obiro miyo ratiro mari bed machalo gi wangʼ chiengʼ marieny odiechiengʼ tir.
Bed mos e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, kendo rite kihori mos; kik chunyi chandre ka joma moko dhi nyime maber, ka gitimo chenrogi maricho.
Ritri kik ibed gi mirima kendo lokri iwe ich wangʼ kik ibed gi ich wangʼ nikech okelo mana rach.
Nikech joma richo ibiro ngʼad kargi oko, to joma oketo genogi kuom Jehova Nyasaye piny biro bedo margi.
Kinde matin nono to joma timbegi richo ok nobedie; kata obedo ni unumanygi to ok unuyudgi.
To joma muol piny biro bedo margi kendo gibiro winjo maber ka gin gi kwe maduongʼ.
Joma timbegi richo chano timo marach ni joma kare kendo gimwodo lekegi ka gin gi mirima;
to Ruoth Nyasaye nyiero joma timbegi richo, nimar ongʼeyo ni odiechieng-gi biro.
Joma timbegi richo wuodho liganglagi kendo gidolo atungegi, mondo gichiel joma odhier gi jochan piny, mondo gineg joma yoregi oriere tir.
To ligengligi biro chwoyo adundogi giwegi, kendo atungegi biro tur.
Gima tin ma ngʼat makare nigo ber moloyo mwandu mathoth mag joma timbegi richo;
nikech teko mar joma timbegi richo ibiro kethi, to Jehova Nyasaye tingʼo ngʼat makare malo.
Ndalo mag joma kare ongʼere ni Jehova Nyasaye, kendo girkeni margi biro siko nyaka chiengʼ.
E kinde mag masira mopore ok ginibed moner, bende gibiro bedo gi chiemo mathoth ndalo kech.
To joma timbegi richo biro lal nono: Wasik Jehova Nyasaye biro chalo gi ber mar thiepe manie pap, gibiro lal nono, adier gibiro lal nono kaka iro.
Joma timbegi richo holo ji gik moko to ok chul, to joma kare to chiwo gi ngʼwono;
piny biro bedo girkeni mar joma Jehova Nyasaye ogwedho, to joma okwongʼo ibiro ngʼad kargi oko.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye mor gi yor ngʼato, to omiyo yorene bedo mopie;
kata ka ochwanyore to ok obi podho; nikech Jehova Nyasaye omako lwete.
Nyaka aa e tin-na mi koro adoko ngʼama duongʼ pok aneno ka joma kare ojwangʼ, kata ka nyithindgi kwayo chiemo.
Kinde duto gingʼwon kendo giholo ji gigegi nono; nyithindgi ibiro gwedhi.
Lokri iwe timo marach mondo itim maber; eka inidag e piny nyaka chiengʼ.
Nikech Jehova Nyasaye ohero joma joratiro, kendo ok obi jwangʼo joge ma jo-adiera. Ibiro ritgi maber nyaka chiengʼ, to koth joma timbegi richo, ibiro ngʼad kargi oko;
joma kare piny biro bedo margi kendo gibiro dak e piny nyaka chiengʼ.
Dho ngʼat makare hulo rieko kendo lewe wacho gima ratiro.
Chik mar Nyasache ni e chunye; omiyo tiendene ok kier.
Joma timbegi richo pondo karito joma kare ka gidwaro tieko ngimagi;
to Jehova Nyasaye ok bi weyogi e lwetgi kata yie bura logi sa ma iyalogi.
Bed gi geno kuom Jehova Nyasaye kendo luw yore. Obiro tingʼi malo mi omi piny bed mari; ka joma richo ongʼad kargi oko to ibiro neno gi wangʼi.
Aseneno ngʼama timbene richo kendo makwiny kadhi maber mana ka yien mangʼich moti e lowo mowinjore kode.
To ne okalo kamano piyo piyo nono kendo ne ok ochak onene, kata ne omanye to ne ok nyal yude.
Ne kit ngima joma onge ketho, non chal joma ngimagi oriere tir, ngʼama ohero kwe nigi geno mar dak amingʼa.
To joricho duto ibiro tieki, joma timbegi richo ibiro ngʼad ndalogi oko.
Warruok mar joma kare aa mana kuom Jehova Nyasaye; En e kar pondo margi e ndalo mar chandruok.
Jehova Nyasaye konyogi kendo resogi oresogi e lwet joma timbegi richo, kendo owarogi, nikech gipondo kuome.

Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kik ikwera ka in gi mirima bende kik ikuma ka mirima mager omaki.
Nikech aserni magi osechwoya, kendo lweti osebet kuoma.
Mirimbi mager osemiyo ringra obedo maonge ngima maber; chokena ok winj maber nikech richona.
Ketho ma asekethogo oima mana ka lodi mapek mohinga tingʼo.
Adhondena otimo tutu kendo dungʼ marach nikech fupa mar timo richo.
Adolora kendo akulora piny chuth odiechiengʼ duto, awuotho koni gi koni, ka akuyo.
Ondingʼa rama gi rem malich; ringra onge gi ngima maber.
Denda ool kendo tekra orumo chuth; achur nikech chunya lit.
Gik ma chunya dwaro duto ongʼereni maber, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; chur ma achurgo ok opondoni.
Chunya gwecho, tekra orumo; wengena otimo mudho.
Osiepena gi anywolana ok dwar nena nikech adhondena; joma odak buta otangʼ koda.
Joma dwaro kawo ngimana ochiko obadhogi, joma dwaro hinya chano kaka ginyalo tieka chuth. Gichano miriambo odiechiengʼ duto.
Achalo ngʼama ite odino, ma ok nyal winjo wach, mana ka momo ma ok nyal yawo dhoge;
