Achalo gi ngʼat ma ok winj wach, ma dhoge ok nyal dwoko wach.
To in ema ariti, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo angʼeyo ni ibiro dwoka, yaye Ruoth Nyasacha.
Nimar ne awacho niya, “Kik iyie mondo gisungrena, kata gigona siboi ni tienda okier.”
Nimar achiegni podho, kendo rem ma an-go osiko koda.
Ahulo kethona; richona chando chunya.
Wasika molwora ngʼeny; joma ochaya maonge gima omiyo thoth mokalo akwana.
Joma chulo rach kuom ber ma asetimonegi kuodho nyinga ka an to alawo gima ber.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kik ijwangʼa; kik ibed mabor koda, yaye Nyasacha.
Bi piyo mondo ikonya, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye kendo Jawarna.

Ne awacho niya, “Abiro ritora e yorena, kendo abiro rito lewa kik wach richo; abiro tweyo dhoga gi tol kinde duto ma joma timbegi richo ni buta.”
To e seche mane ok awuo kendo alingʼ mos, kane ok awach gimoro amora maber, pek manie chunya nomedore.
Chunya nodoko maliet e iya kendo kane amedo paro matut, to nomedo bedo malit; eka ne atingʼo dhoga mi awuoyo:
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nyisa giko mar ngimana bende nyisa kar romb ndalona; mondo abed ka angʼeyo ni ndalona kadho piyo.
Iseketo ndalona obedo machiek ka bad dhano; kar romb higni maga ok gimoro e nyimi, ngima dhano ka dhano en mana muya nono. Sela
Dhano en mana tipo makadho kata ka owuotho koni gi koni, orikni gi tijene mapile kayiem; ochoko mwandu mathoth ka ok ongʼeyo ngʼama obiro weyonegi.
To koro, yaye Ruoth, en angʼo ma amanyo? Genona aketo kuomi.
Resa kuom ketho maga duto; kik imi abedi ngʼama joma ofuwo jaro.
Ne alingʼ alingʼa, kendo ne ok anyal yawo dhoga mondo awuo, nikech in ema isetimo ma.
Gol chwat ma isechwadago oko; goch ma lweti goyago ohinga.
Ikwero ji kikumogi nikech richogi; itieko mwandugi mana kaka thuth tieko oduma, dhano ka dhano en mana muya nono. Sela
Winj lamona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, chik iti ni lamona ma adwarogo kony; kik idin iti ne ywakna, nikech adak kodi mana ka japiny moro, an mana wendo kaka kwerena duto ne gin.
We ngʼiya, mondo achak abed moil kendo kapok adar aweyo pinyni mi alal e wangʼ ji.

Ne arito Jehova Nyasaye ka ahora mos; ne odwogo ira mi owinjo ywakna.
Ne oywaya oko e bur motimo otodo, ne ogola e chwodho gi thidhna. Ne oketo tiendena e lwanda kendo nomiya kama otegno mondo achungie.
Ne oketo wer manyien e dhoga, en wer mipakogo Nyasachwa. Ji mangʼeny biro neno mi gibed maluor kendo gibiro keto genogi kuom Jehova Nyasaye.
Ngʼat moketo Jehova Nyasaye kaka kar geno mare en ngʼat mogwedhi, ngʼat ma ok many kony kuom josunga, bende ok omany kony kuom joma lokore mondo olam nyiseche mag miriambo.
Ranyisi misetimo thoth, yaye Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha. Gigo mane ichanonwa onge ngʼama nyalo kwanoni; ka dine bed ni wanyalo wuoyo kuomgi; to dine gibedo mangʼeny ma ok wanyal wacho.
Misengini kod chiwo ok ema ne idwaro to ita ema iseyawo; misengini miwangʼo pep kod chiwo mag golo richo ne ok idwaro.
Eka nawacho niya, “Eri an ka, asebiro mana kaka ondiki kuoma e Muma.
Chunya dwaro timo dwaroni, yaye Nyasacha; chikni ni ei chunya.”
Alando tim makare e chokruok maduongʼ; ok aumo dhoga, mana kaka ingʼeyo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Ok apando timni makare e chunya; to awuoyo kuom adierani gi warruokni. Ok apando herani gi adierani ni chokruok maduongʼ.
Kik itamri kecha, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; mad herani gi adierani osik ka rita.
Nikech chandruok mokalo akwana olwora; richona osejuka kendo ok anyal neno. Gingʼeny moloyo yie wiya, kendo chunya onyosore gie iya.
Bed mamor, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mondo iresa. Bi piyo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mondo ikonya.
Mad ji duto madwaro ketho ngimana wigi kuodi kendo pachgi olal; mad ji duto ma chunygi gombona tho oriemb kadok gi wich okuot.
Mad joma nyiera niya, “Haa! Haa!” Ngʼengʼ ka gineno wichkuot.
To mad ji duto madwari bed moil kendo mamor kuomi; mad joma ohero warruok mari osik kawacho niya, “Jehova Nyasaye mondo oyud duongʼ!”
Anto adhier kendo achando, mad Ruoth Nyasaye parae. In e jakonyna kendo jawarna; in e Nyasacha, kik ideki.

Ngʼama paro joma ok nyal en jahawi; Jehova Nyasaye rese ka chandruok omake.
Jehova Nyasaye biro rite kendo biro miyo obed mangima; Jehova Nyasaye biro gwedhe e piny, kendo ok obi jwangʼe e lwet wasike.
Jehova Nyasaye biro rite e kitandane mar tuo midekre kendo obiro miyo oa malo e kitandane ka ohewore.
Ne awacho niya, “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kecha; changa, nikech aseketho e nyimi.”
Wasika wuoyo kuoma ka chunygi rach koda, kagiwacho niya, “Obiro tho karangʼo mondo nyinge olal chuth?”
Sa asaya ma ngʼato obiro nena, to owuondore ni owuoyo kuoma maber, to ei chunye to ofwambo weche, mondo okethgo nyinga eka oa odhi kendo okeyo wechego ne ji.
Wasika duto kuodho wach kuoma kaachiel kaka ginyalo hinya, chunygi paro gik maricho mogik mondo ohinya, kagiwacho niya,
“Tuo marach osekete piny; ok obi aa malo kama oninde.”
Koda ka osiepna mane ageno kuome, ngʼat mane chiemo koda, bende osendhoga.
To in, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, yie ikecha; chunga malo, mondo achulgi.
Angʼeyo ni chunyi mor koda, nimar jowasika ok loya.
Itingʼa malo nikech timna makare kendo ichunga e nyimi nyaka chiengʼ.
Pak ne Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, nyaka chiengʼ kendo nyaka chiengʼ. Amin kendo Amin.

Mana kaka mwanda gamo yweyo kamanyo kuonde ma pi nitie, e kaka chunya dwari, yaye Nyasaye.
Chunya riyo oloyo mar dwaro Nyasaye. En riyo mar dwaro Nyasaye mangima. Abiro dhi romo kod Nyasaye karangʼo?
Aseywak mi pi wangʼa osechalo chiemba odiechiengʼ gotieno, ka ji to wachona odiechiengʼ duto niya, “Koro ere Nyasachino?”
Aparo gigi duto ka chunya opongʼ giywak: aparo kaka ne adhi gi oganda maduongʼ ka atelo ni ji madhi e od Nyasaye, Ka akok gimor kendo agoyo erokamano E dier oganda maduongʼ matimo nyasi gi mor.
Angʼo momiyo ikuyo, yaye chunya? Angʼo momiyo inyosori yaye chunya? Ket genoni kuom Nyasaye, nikech pod abiro pake, kaka Jawarna kendo Nyasacha.
Chunya lit; omiyo abiro pari, ka an e piny mar Jordan, gi kuonde motingʼore mar Hermon kod e got Mizar.
Kut luongore gi kut ei abururu mar pi; apaka magi duto gi ahiti mager oseywera motera.
Jehova Nyasaye chiko herane godiechiengʼ, to gotieno to wende ni e chunya; ma e lamo ma alamogo Nyasach ngimana.
Awacho ni Nyasaye ma lwandana niya, “Angʼo momiyo wiyi osewil koda? Angʼo momiyo asiko gi kuyo ka jawasigu sanda?”
Chokena tho omako kendo rama malit seche ma joma kedo koda yanya kochaya, ka giwachona odiechiengʼ duto niya, “Koro ere Nyasachino?”
Angʼo momiyo ikuyo, yaye chunya? Angʼo momiyo inyosori, yaye chunya? Ket genoni kuom Nyasaye, nikech pod abiro pake, en e Jawarna kendo Nyasacha.
Ngʼadna bura makare, yaye Nyasaye, kendo chwaka e kind joma ok ongʼeyo Nyasaye; resa e lwet joma wuondore gi joma timbegi richo.
In Nyasaye ma apondo kuome. Koro to ijwangʼa nangʼo? Angʼo momiyo nyaka asik ka akuyo, ka jawasigu sanda?
Or lerni kod adierani, orgi mondo gitelna; yie mondo gikela nyaka godi maler, nyaka kama idakie.
Eka anadhi e kendo mar misango mar Nyasaye, nyaka achopi e nyim Nyasaye, Nyasaye ma kelona mor kendo ilo. Abiro paki gi nyatiti, yaye Nyasaye kendo Nyasacha.
Angʼo momiyo ikuyo, yaye chunya? Angʼo momiyo inyosori, yaye chunya? Ket genoni kuom Nyasaye, nikech pod abiro pake, en e Jawarna kendo Nyasacha.

Yaye Nyasaye, wasewinjo gi itwa; kendo kwerewa osenyisowa, gik mane itimo e ndalogi, ndalo machon gi lala.
Ne iriembo ogendini mamoko gi lweti iwuon kendo ne iguro kwerewa kargi; ne itieko ogendinigo mi imiyo kwerewa okar.
Ne ok giloyo pinyno gi liganglagi kendo kata bedegi bende ne ok okelonigi loch; to mana badi iwuon ma korachwich, kod ler mar wangʼi ema nomiyo gilocho nimar ne iherogi.
In e Ruodha kendo Nyasacha, magolo chik mondo Jakobo olochi.
Wasiro wasikwa nikech in, waloyo joma kedo kodwa kuom nyingi.
Atungʼ mara ok ageno kuome, liganglana bende ok mi alochi;
to in ema imiyowa loch ewi wasikwa, imiyo joma kedo kodwa neno wichkuot.
Sungawa ni kuom Nyasaye odiechiengʼ duto, kendo wabiro pako nyingi nyaka chiengʼ. Sela
To koro isedagiwa kendo isedwokowa piny; tinde ok idhi e kedo gi jolwenjwa.
Ne imiyo waringo e nyim wasigu kendo joma kedo kodwa oseyakowa.
Ne ijwangʼowa mondo ongamwa ka rombe kendo isekeyowa e dier pinje.
Ne iuso jogi nono maonge ohala mane iyudo kuom usogi.
Isemiyo wadoko joma iyanyo e dier joma odak butwa, wan joma inyiero kendo ma ocha gi joma olworowa.
Isemiyo olokwa ngero e dier ogendini; kendo ogendini kino wigi konenowa.
Wichkuot mara osiko neno e wangʼa odiechiengʼ duto, kendo lela wangʼa wichkuot oumo.
Seche ma joma ochaya kendo yanya dirona weche, nikech jasigu oramo ni nyaka ochul kuor.
Magi duto notimorena, kata obedo ni wiwa ne pok owil kodi, kata riambo ne singruok mari.
Chunywa ne pok oa moweyi; kendo tiendewa ne pok okier moweyo yori.
To pod ne igoyowa agoya mimiyo ondiegi olawowa; kendo ne iumowa gi mudho mandiwa.
Ka dipo ni wiwa nosewil gi Nyasachwa kata ni ne waseyaro lwetwa ne nyasaye moro ma wendo,
donge Nyasaye dine ofwenyo wachno, nikech ongʼeyo gik malingʼ-lingʼ manie chuny?
To nikech in, tho ochomowa odiechiengʼ duto; ikwanowa kaka rombo mitero kar yengʼo.
Chiew, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye! Inindo nangʼo? Yaw wangʼi inen! Kik ikwedwa nyaka chiengʼ.
Ere gima omiyo ipandonwa wangʼi momiyo wiyi owil kod pek ma wan-go kod chandruokwa?
Osedwokwa piny nyaka e buru, dendwa omoko piny e lowo.
Aa malo mondo ikonywa; reswa nikech herani ma ok rem.

Chunya bedo mamor gi wer mamit e kinde mawero Zaburi maga ne Ruoth; kendo lewa chalo kalamb jandiko mongʼith.
In ema iber moloyo chwo mamoko kendo dhogi owir gi ngʼwono, nikech Nyasaye osegwedhi nyaka chiengʼ.
Twe liganglani e bathi, yaye ngʼat maratego; rwakri gi ler kod duongʼ.
E duongʼni nyisri ayanga kaka jalocho mochungʼ ni adiera gi muolo kod tim makare; lweti ma korachwich mondo onyis timbeni miwuoro.
Aserni mabitho mondo ochwo chunje mag wasik ruoth; ogendini mondo opodh piny e bwoyi.
Lochni nosik nyaka chiengʼ, yaye Nyasaye; kendo tim makare ema nobed kaka ludh loch e pinyruodhi.
Ihero tim makare to imon gi timbe maricho; emomiyo Nyasaye, ma Nyasachi, osetingʼi malo moyombo jowadu nikech osewiri gi mo mamiyi mor.
Lepi maboyo duto dungʼ tik mane-mane gi poda kod kasia; moa e ute ruodhi molichi gi lak liech. Wende mindito gi gig wer miyi mor.
Nyi ruodhi ni e kanyakla mag mondi moluor; mikach ruoth ni e bathi korachwich korwakore gi dhahabu mogol Ofir.
Winji nyara, bed mos, kendo chik iti: Gol pachi kuom jou kaachiel gi jood wuonu monywoli.
Berni otoyo ruoth; miye duongʼ, nikech en ruodhi.
Nyar Turo biro biro gi mich, joma nigi mwandu biro dwaro kony kuomi.
Duongʼ olworo ruoth madhako koni gi koni e kar dakne; law abola mare oton-oton gi dhahabu.
Omake itere ne ruoth gi law mochwe gi usi; nyiri masilili man kode luwo bangʼe kendo ikelonegi.
Irwakogi e ot gi ilo kod mor maduongʼ; gidonjo e dala ruoth.
Yawuoti biro kawo kar wuonegi; ibiro ketogi ruodhi e piny duto koni gi koni.
Abiro miyo ji pari e tienge duto nyaka chiengʼ; kuom mano ogendini biro paki mochwere manyaka chiengʼ.

Nyasaye e kar pondowa kendo tekowa, en e kar konyruok man kodwa seche duto.
Emomiyo ok wabi luor, kata bed ni piny okethore kendo gode mukore e chuny nam,
Kata obedoni pige manie nam wuo kendo golo buoyo kata obedo ni gode yiengni kendo dhwolore. Sela
Nitie aora moro ma pige kelo mor e dala Nyasaye, e dala maler kama Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo odakie.
Nyasaye odak e iye omiyo ok obi podho; Nyasaye biro konye ka piny oyawore.
Ogendini nigi chandruok, kendo pinjeruodhi podho; otingʼo dwonde mi piny leny nono.
Jehova Nyasaye Maratego ni kodwa; Nyasach Jakobo e ohingawa. Sela
Biuru uneye tije Jehova Nyasaye, bi uneye kethruok mosekelo e piny.
Omiyo lwenje rumo e tungʼ piny koni gi koni; oturo atungʼ kendo ochodo tongʼ matindo tindo, bende owangʼo kuodi gi mach.
“Bed mos, kendo ngʼe ni an Nyasaye; ogendini biro miya duongʼ; piny duto biro miya duongʼ.”
Jehova Nyasaye Maratego ni kodwa; Nyasach Jakobo e ohingawa. Sela

Pamuru lweteu, un ogendini duto; Pakuru Nyasaye ka ukok matek gi mor.
Mano kaka Jehova Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo lich, en Ruoth Maduongʼ man-gi loch e piny duto!
Ne oloyonwa ogendini mi gibet e bwowa, ji nopodho piny e tiendewa.
Ne oyieronwa girkeni marwa, gik mabeyo mogik ne Jakobo mane ohero. Sela
Nyasaye oseidho malo ka ji pake gi mor. Jehova Nyasaye osetingʼ malo ka dwond turumbete ywak.
Weruru wende pak ne Nyasaye, weruru wende pak; weruru wende pak ne Ruodhwa, weruru wende pak.
Nikech Nyasaye en Ruodh piny duto, werneuru zaburi mar pak.
Nyasaye nigi loch ewi ogendini; Nyasaye obet piny e kom lochne maler.
Jotend ogendini ochokore kaachiel kaka jo-Nyasach Ibrahim, nikech ruodhi mag piny gin mag Nyasaye; omiyo Nyasaye oyud duongʼ.

Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ adier, kendo owinjore chuth gi pak, e dala maduongʼ mar Nyasachwa, ma en gode maler.
E dala motingʼore malo kendo ober neno omiyo piny duto bedo mamor. Got Sayun chalo gi kama otingʼore malo mar Zafon, ma en dala maduongʼ mar Ruoth Maduongʼ.
Nyasaye nitiere e dalane mochiel motegno kendo osenyisore ni en e ohingane.
Ka ruodhi noriwo teko kanyakla, kane giwuokne oko kaachiel,
negineno mi gibuok; kendo negiringo gia ka luoro omakogi.
Dendgi nochako tetni kanyo kendo negibedo gi rem machalo gi muoch ma kayo dhako.
Ne iturogi matindo tindo ka meli mag Tarshish ma yamb wuok chiengʼ ongʼinjo.
Mana kaka wasewinjo e kaka waseneno gi wengewa, e dala maduongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye Maratego, e dala mar Nyasachwa: Nyasaye oselose kama dak berie nyaka chiengʼ. Sela
Ei hekalu mari, yaye Nyasaye, ema wabetie ka waparo kuom herani ma ok rem.
Mana kaka nyingi, yaye Nyasaye, e kaka pakni bende chopo nyaka tungʼ piny; lweti ma korachwich opongʼ gi tim makare.
Got Sayun oil, kendo mier mag Juda nigi mor, nikech iyalo ji maber.
Wuothi ei Sayun, luorri e iye koni gi koni, kwan osuche duto,
par maber kuom ohinga mage, nee udi mag ruodhine, mondo ibi inyis tienge mabiro.
Nikech Nyasaye en Nyasachwa manyaka chiengʼ obiro bedo jaritwa nyaka chop giko ndalowa e piny.

Winjuru wachni, un ji duto: chikuru itu, un duto mudak e pinyni,
un joma odhier kod joma idew, jo-mwandu gi jodhier machalre:
Dhoga biro wacho weche mag rieko, weche moa e chunya biro miyo ji winjo tiend weche.
Abiro chiko ita ne ngero moro; abiro nyiso tiend midhiero mara ka agoyo nyatitina:
En ngʼa monego aluor ka ndalo mag richo obiro, ka jo-miriambo ma timbegi richo olwora.
Joma oketo genogi kuom mwandu kendo masungore kuom mwandugi mathoth?
Onge ngʼama nyalo waro ngima nyawadgi kata manyalo chulo Nyasaye nengo moromo ware.
Nikech yor waro dhano tek ahinya, maonge nengo madichul marom,
ma dimi odag nyaka chiengʼ kendo kik odhi e liel.
Nikech ongʼere ne ji duto ni joma riek tho, mana kaka joma ofuwo gi joma omingʼ, bende tho mi giwe mwandu ne joma moko.
Lietegi ema biro siko kaka utegi nyaka chiengʼ kendo ema gibiro dakie higni gi higni ma ok rum, kata obedo ni negimako lope mathoth koni gi koni.
To ongʼere ni dhano ok siki e piny, kata obed gi mwandu mathoth machal nade, to otho mana kaka le bende tho.
Mano e gima biro timore ne joma ogenore kendgi giwegi, kendo ne joma luwogi, moluwo wechegi. Sela
Gichomo liete mokuny nigi mana kaka rombe kendo tho biro lokogi chiembe. Joma ngimagi oriere tir biro loyogi ka piny oru, to dendgi biro towo e liete, ka gin mabor gi utegi madongo machalo ute ruodhi.
Anto Nyasaye biro reso chunya mi ogola e liel adier, obiro kawa mi odhi koda ire. Sela
Kik chunyi thagre ka ngʼato mwandune medore, kata ka duongʼ mar ode medore;
nikech onge gima obiro kawo odhigo ka otho, duongʼ ma en-go ok bi dhi kode e liel,
kata obedo ni ne okawore kaka ngʼama ogwedhi kane pod ongima nikech ji nyaka paki ka mwanduni medore,
to obiro dhi mi oriwre gi tiengʼ machon mar kwerene, ma ok nyal neno ler mar wangʼ chiengʼ kendo.
Ngʼat man-gi mwandu mathoth to onge winjo, chalo gi le ma otho.
Jal Manyalo Duto, Nyasaye ma en Jehova Nyasaye, wuoyo kendo luongo ji duto modak e piny mondo ochokrene kaachiel, chakre wuok chiengʼ nyaka podho chiengʼ.
Nyasaye rieny gie Sayun, dala ma berne longʼo chuth.
Nyasachwa biro kendo ok obi lingʼ mach ni e nyime mawangʼo gik moko pep, kendo ahiti mager olwore.
Oluongo joma odak e polo malo kaachiel gi joma odak e piny, mondo oyal joge:
“Choknauru joga maler, mane otimo koda singruok e yor misango.”
Kendo polo hulo timne makare, nikech Nyasaye owuon e jangʼad bura. Sela
“Winjuru, yaye joga, mondo awuo kodu, yaye jo-Israel, chiknauru itu mondo atim neno ma akwedougo: An Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Ok akweru nikech wach misengini mutimona, kata nikech misango miwangʼo pep, mosiko ka nitie e nyima.
Ok agomb rwath moro amora moa e kundeu kata diek moa e abilni magu,
nikech le moro amora manie bungu en mara, kaachiel gi jamni makwayo ewi gode gana achiel.
Angʼeyo nying winyo ka winyo manie wi gode, kendo gik mochwe duto manie pewe gin maga.
Ka dine bed ni kech kaya to ok dak anyisu, nikech piny en mara, kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye.
Uparo ni achamo ring rwedhi kata ni amadho remb diek?
Chiwuru misango mar goyo erokamano ni Nyasaye, chopuru singruok mau ne Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo,
kendo luongauru e kinde ma un e chandruok; to abiro resou e chandruokugo, eka ubiro miya duongʼ.”
Joma timbegi richo to Nyasaye wachonegi ni: “Ngʼa momiyou thuolo mar olo chikena kata mondo ukaw singruok maga kaka mau?
Ere kaka dutim kamano to uchayo puonjna kendo udiro wechena katoku!
Ka uneno jakuo to uriworu kode kendo uchodo mana kaka joma moko timo.
Utiyo gi dhou kuom timo richo kendo lewu oikore ne wuond.
Usiko uwuoyo marach kuom joweteu kendo ukuotho koda ka oweteu mahie ma uago e ich achiel.
Gigi duto usetimo ka an to alingʼ; useparo ni an bende achalo kodu. To koro akwerou kendo anyisou e wangʼu ni useketho kuom timo gigo duto.
“Paruru matut kuom wachni, un joma wigi wil gi Nyasaye, nono to abiro kidhou matindo tindo, maonge ngʼama diresu:
Ngʼat ma timona misango mar erokamano miya duongʼ mondo olos yo moriere tir, kendo anyise kaka warruok mar Nyasaye chalo.”


Kecha, yaye Nyasaye, kaluwore gi herani ma ok rem; gol kethona duto oko kuom ngʼwononi maduongʼ.
Luok rochruokna duto oko kendo pwodha kuom richona.
Nikech angʼeyo kethona duto kendo richona osiko e nyima.
In iwuon ema asekethoni kendo asetimo richo e nyim wangʼi, mano omiyo in kare ka iwuoyo kendo iwacho adiera ka ingʼadona bura.
En adier chutho ni nonywola e richo asebedo ka an jaricho chakre chiengʼ mane minwa omake ichna.
Adier, idwaro ni dhano obed ja-adiera gie chunye iye emomiyo ipuonja rieko gie chunya maiye mogik.
Lwoka maler gi owino eka abiro bedo maler; lwoka mondo abed marachar moloyo pe.
We awinjie mor kod ilo; mi chokena misetoyo ochak obedie mamor.
Pand wangʼi mondo kik ine richona kendo gol kethona duto oko.
Chwe chuny maler e iya, yaye Nyasaye, kendo los chuny motegno mosiko koluori iket e iya.
Kik iriemba buti bende kik igol Roho Maler mari kuoma.
Duogna mor ma warruokni kelo kendo mi abed gi chuny mohero timo dwaroni, mondo chuny makamano orita.
Eka abiro puonjo joketho yoreni kendo joricho biro lokore duogo iri.
Resa e ketho mar chwero remo, yaye Nyasaye, tim kamano, yaye Nyasaye ma wara, eka lewa biro wer kuom timni makare.
Yaye Ruoth yaw pien dhoga, eka dhoga biro hulo pakni.
Ok imor gi misango mitimoni, nikech dine achiwonigo; misango miwangʼo pep ok miyi mor.
Misango mar Nyasaye en chuny motur, chuny motur kendo mamuol, ok itamri, yaye Nyasaye.
Mi Sayun odhi maber kuom herani; chak iger ohinga mag Jerusalem kendo.
Eka ibiro yudo mor kuom misengni mag joma kare, kuom misango miwangʼo pep mochiw duto, kendo ibiro chiw rwedhi e kendoni mar misango.


Angʼo momiyo isungori kuom tim marach, yaye ngʼat maratego? Angʼo momiyo isungori odiechiengʼ duto, in ma in gir wichkuot e nyim Nyasaye?
Ichano timbe midwaro wuondogo ji, lewi bende chano gik modwaro hinyogo ji; kendo lewino chalo gi wembe mabith.
Ihero rach moloyo ber, miriambo mitni moloyo wacho adiera. Sela
Ihero weche duto machwanyo ji, yaye in lep mohero wuondni!
To Nyasaye biro tieli piny matieki chuth nyaka chiengʼ; obiro yudhi mi oyiechi oko e hembi; obiro pudhi mi ogoli e piny joma ngima. Sela
Joma kare biro neno mano mi gibed maluor; gibiro nyiere kagiwacho ni,
“Koro neyeuru ngʼatno, mane ok okawo Nyasaye obedo kar pondo mare, to nogeno mana kuom mwandune mathoth kendo notieko joma moko mondo eka omed bedo gi teko!”
An to achalo yiend zeituni madongo maber e od Nyasaye; ageno kuom hera ma ok rem mar Nyasaye manyaka chiengʼ.
Abiro paki nyaka chiengʼ kuom gima isetimo; abiro paki e nyim jogi maler. Abiro keto geno mara kuom nyingi, nikech nyingi ber.

Ngʼat mofuwo wacho e chunye niya, “Nyasaye onge.” Gin joma okethore, kendo yoregi obam; onge kata ngʼato achiel matimo maber.
Nyasaye ngʼiyo ji duto gie polo; mondo oneye ka bende nitie moro kuomgi ma nigi winjo, kata ka bende nitie moro kuomgi mamanyo Nyasaye.
Giduto gisebaro giweyo yo; giduto gisekethore; onge ngʼama timo maber, onge kata achiel.
Bende joma timo timbe maricho dipuonjre adier? Gin joma kidho joga kaka ji chamo kuon; kendo gin joma ok luong Nyasaye mondo okonygi.
To koro gin ka, ka kihondko maduongʼ omakogi, kata obedo ni onge gima kelo kihondko. Nyasaye osekeyo choke joma nomonji; isemiyogi wichkuot, nikech Nyasaye nodagigi.
Yaye, mad warruok mar Israel obi koa Sayun! Kinde ma Nyasaye duogo ne joge mwandugi, onego joka Jakobo obed moil kendo Israel obed mamor!


Resa gi nyingi, yaye Nyasaye; ngʼadna bura kare gi tekoni.
Winj lamona, yaye Nyasaye; chik iti ne weche mawuok e dhoga.
Jopinje moko monja; acheje kawo ngimana, gin joma ok dew Nyasaye. Sela
Adier, Nyasaye e jakonyna; Ruoth owuon ema rita.
Mad chandruok lwor joma ketho nyinga mi ketgi diere; tiekgi, nikech in ja-adiera.
Abiro timoni misango gi chiwo mar hera; abiro pako nyingi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech nyingi ber.
Nikech oseresa kuom gik mathaga duto, mi omiyo wengena ongʼiyo wasika tir bangʼ loyogi.

Winj lamona, yaye Nyasaye, kik itamri winjo ywakna;
Winja kendo idwoka. Pacha chanda kendo chunya onge gi kwe
Ka awinjo dwond wasika, kendo ka joma timbegi richo okwarona wengegi, nikech gimiyo abedo gi thagruok kendo giyanya ka gin gi mirima.
Chunya winjo malit e iya kendo luoro mar tho osemaka.
Aluor kendo denda tetni; kibaji ogoya matek.
Ne awacho niya, “Yaye mad ne bed ni an gi bwombe ka akuru! Dine afuyo aa ka mi ayudo yweyo.
Dine aringo adhi mabor mi adhi adak e piny ongoro; Sela
dine areto adhi nyaka kara mar pondo, kuma ni mabor gi apaka kod ahiti.”
Lal pach joma timbegi richo, yaye Ruoth, mi lewgi moki e dandgi, nikech aneno ka mahundu gi dhawo opongʼo dala maduongʼ.
Odiechiengʼ gotieno gilwenyo kor ohinga mare; himruok gi ayany ni e iye.
Teko mar kethruok chopo tijgi ei dala maduongʼ, mecho gi wuond osiko e yorene.
Ka dine ok obedo malichna ka dine ngʼat ma ok dwara ema ogarna, to dine apondone.
To en mana in, dichwo kaka an in jawuodha kendo osiepna,
mane wan-go gi lalruok matut chon kane wawuotho e dier oganda maduongʼ e od Nyasaye.
Mad tho neg wasika apoya, mad liel mwonygi ngili kapod gingima, nikech richo olokogi kar dakne.
An to aluongo Nyasaye, kendo Jehova Nyasaye resa.
Odhiambo gi okinyi kod odiechiengʼ aywagora ka chunya lit, kendo owinjo dwonda.
Owara kapok gimoro ohinya kuom lweny ma ji goyago, kata obedo ni ji mangʼeny kweda.
Nyasaye mobet e kom loch nyaka chiengʼ, biro winjogi kendo biro goyogi: Sela jogo motamore loko yoregi kendo ma ok mi Nyasaye luor.
Jawuodha monjo osiepene; oseketho singruok mane otimo kodgi.
Weche mowacho to yom ka mo mabuo, to lweny to ni e chunye; wechege yomo del moloyo mor wirruok, to kara gin mana ligangla mosewuodh oko.
Ket pek manie chunyi ne Jehova Nyasaye to obiro riti; ok obi weyo ngʼat makare podhi.
To in, yaye Nyasaye, ibiro dwoko joma timbegi richo piny nyaka ei bur ma gitow; joma joricho machwero remo ok bi bet mangima kata moromo nus ndalogi. An to ageno kuomi.

Kecha, yaye Nyasacha, nikech wasika dwaro monja; odiechiengʼ duto gidiya ma ok aywe.
Joketh nyinga lawa odiechiengʼ duto; ji mangʼeny monja ka sunga omakogi.
Ka luoro omaka to abiro geno kuomi.
Kuom Nyasaye ma apako wachne, in Nyasaye ema aketo genona kuomi omiyo ok abi bedo maluor. Dhano adhana to nyalo timona angʼo?
Odiechiengʼ duto gimino koda wach; kinde duto gichano kaka digihinya.
Gikuotho kendo gijimbo wach, ginono okangʼ ka okangʼ ma agoyo, ka gidwaro kawo ngimana.
Kik iyie gitony kata matin nikech richo mag-gi, dwok ogendini piny, yaye Nyasaye, gi mirimbi;
Ndik ywak ma aywakgo kwan pi wangʼa machwer e kitapi, donge iketogi e kitabu mari?
Eka wasika biro gomo dok ka aluongo kony moa kuomi. Mano ema abiro ngʼeyogo ni Nyasaye en jakora.
Kuom Nyasaye ma apako wachne, in Jehova Nyasaye ema apako wachne,
kendo Nyasaye ema aketo genona kuome; omiyo ok abi bedo maluor. Dhano adhana to nyalo timona angʼo?
Asetimo kodi singruok, yaye Nyasaye; abiro chiwoni chiwo maga mag erokamano.
Nikech iseresa e tho kendo isegengʼo tienda mi ok ochwanyore, mondo mi awuothi e nyim Nyasaye ma en e ler makelo ngima.

Kecha, yaye Nyasaye, yie ikecha nikech kuomi ema chunya yudoe kar pondo. Abiro pondo e bwo tipo mar bwombeni nyaka chop apaka mager rum.
Aywagora ne Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo, Nyasaye machopona chenroge ema aywakne.
Ooro wach gie polo kendo oresa, kokwero joma lawa gi tekregi duto; Sela Nyasaye oro herane gi adiera mare.
An e dier sibuoche; anindo e dier le mager mangemo, joma lekegi chalo tonge gi aserni, ma lewgi chalo ligangla mabitho.
Nyingi mondo otingʼ malo moyombo polo, yaye Nyasaye; mad duongʼ mari opongʼ piny duto.
Ne giyaro jogo mondo omak tiendena, kane chuny lit odola. Ne gikunyo bugo e yora, to kata kamano gin giwegi ema giselutore e iye. Sela
Chunya otegno, yaye Nyasaye, chunya otegno; abiro paki gi wer kendo abiro loso wer mamit.
Chiew, in chunya! Chiewuru un orutu gi nyatiti! Abiro chiewo kogwen.
Abiro paki e dier ogendini, yaye Jehova Nyasaye. Abiro werni e dier ogendini.
Nikech herani maduongʼ chopo nyaka e polo; kendo adiera mari chopo nyaka ewi lwasi.
Nyingi mondo otingʼ malo moyombo polo, yaye Nyasaye; mad duongʼ mari opongʼ piny duto.

Un jotelo, bende uwuoyo gi adiera? Bende ungʼado bura moriere tir e dier ji?
Ooyo, uchano mayo ji ratiro magi e chunyu, kendo lwetu chano kelo dhawo e piny.
Joma timbegi richo chako lal ae nywolgi; gin jo-jendeke kendo gin jo-miriambo aa nywolgi.
Kwiri margi chalo gi kwich thuol, chalo gi kwich thuond rachier ma tege oyienyo,
ma kata ja-bochne wuone to ok owinji, kata bed ni ja-bochneno olony machal nadi.
Muk lekegi ei dhogi, yaye Nyasaye, yiech kwiri mag sibuoche oko, yaye Jehova Nyasaye!
Mi gilal nono ka pi mamol; ka giywayo atungegi to mi asernigi obed madik.
Mana kaka ndach kamnie maleny nono, kendo mana kaka nyathi monywol kosetho, mad kik gine wangʼ chiengʼ.
Kapok agulni magi ochako winjo liet mach, bed ni en mach mabebni kata maliel mos, to joma timbegi richo ibiro ywe oko.
Joma kare biro bedo mamor kichulonigi kuor, ka giniluok tiendegi e remb joma timbegi richo.
Eka ji nowach niya, “Kara en adier ni joma kare pod yudo pok; kara nitie Nyasaye mangʼado bura ne piny.”

Resa e lwet wasika, yaye Nyasaye; Rit ngimana kuom joma ogar koda.
Gola e lwet joma timo gik maricho kendo resa kuom joma riyo mar chwero remo omako.
Neye kaka gibutona ka girita e yo! Joma kwiny chano kaka digihinya, to an onge gima rach kata richo masetimo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Onge gima asetimo marach, to kata kamano gin to giikore monja. Aa malo ikonya; ne chandruokna.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasaye Maratego, in Nyasach Israel, aa malo ikum ogendini duto; kik ikech andhoke ma timbegi richo. Sela
Gidwogo ka piny imore, ka gingʼur ka guogi, kendo giwuotho koni gi koni e dala ka gingʼanjo.
Neye gik ma gingʼudho koa e dhogi, gingʼudho ligengni gi dhogi, kendo giwacho niya, “En ngʼa manyalo winjowa?”
To in nyiergi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, go siboi ne ogendinigo duto.
Yaye tekona, in ema angʼiyi, in e kar pondona, yaye Nyasaye,
Yaye Nyasacha ma jahera. Nyasaye biro telona kendo obiro miyo asungra ne joma ketho nyinga.
To kik uneg-gi, yaye Ruoth ma okumbana nikech joga dipoka wigi owil. Mi giba abaya koni gi koni gi tekoni, kendo mi gidog piny.
Nikech richo ma gitimo gi dhogi kuom wuoyo, nikech weche mawuok e dhogi, wegi mondo sungagi ogajgi. Nikech gikwongʼo ji kendo gi wuondo ji,
tiekgi gi mirimbi mager, tiekgi mi kargi lal nono, eka biro ngʼere e tungʼ piny koni gi koni ni Nyasaye nigi loch kuom joka Jakobo. Sela
Gidwogo ka piny imore ka gingʼur ka guogi, kendo giwuotho koni gi koni e dala ka gingʼanjo.
Gibayo koni gi koni ka gidwaro chiemo kendo ka ok giyiengʼ to gingʼur.
Anto abiro wer kuom tekoni abiro wero herani gokinyi; nikech in e ohingana, in e kar pondona e kinde mag thagruok.
In e tekona, omiyo abiro weroni wend pak; in e ohingana, yaye Nyasaye, in e Nyasacha ma jahera.


Yaye Nyasaye, isedagiwa mi imuomori kuomwa; isebedo ka ikecho kodwa, to koro loswa!
Iseyiengo piny mi ibare diere ariyo, Los kuondene mosebarore, nikech oyiengni.
Isenyiso jogi kinde mag chandruok mapek; isemiyowa kongʼo mamiyo wakwangʼ.
To isechungo bandech loch ni joma oluori mondo oumgi ka oywanegi atungʼ. Sela
Reswa kendo konywa gi lweti ma korachwich mondo joma ihero ogol e chandruok.
Nyasaye osewuoyo gie kare maler kowacho niya, “Abiro pogo Shekem ne ji, kendo abiro pimo ne ji Holo mar Sukoth.
Gilead en mara, Manase bende mara; Efraim en oguta mar lweny, to Juda en osimbona mar loch.
Moab en besen mara mar luok, to Edom e kama amoe wuochena; Filistia ema akoke ka aseloyo lweny.”
En ngʼa mabiro kela e dala maduongʼ mochiel motegno? Ngʼa mabiro telona nyaka Edom?
Donge in ema isedagiwa, yaye Nyasaye, kendo tinde ok idhi gi jolwenjwa e lweny?
Miwa kony mondo walo wasikwa, nikech kony mar dhano onge tich.
Wabiro loyo lweny ka Nyasaye nikodwa, kendo obiro nyono wasikwa piny.

Winj ywakna, yaye Nyasaye; chik iti ne lamona.
Aluongi gie tungʼ piny, aluongi ka chunya ool; telna nyaka lwanda mohinga gi bor.
Nikech in ema isebedo kar pondona, isebedona ohinga motegno maponde ne jasigu.
Agombo dak e hembi nyaka chiengʼ mondo apondie e raum mar bwombeni. Sela
Nikech isewinjo singruokna kodi, yaye Nyasaye; isemiya gweth mikano ne joma oluoro nyingi.
Med ndalo mar ngima ruoth, mede higni e tienge mangʼeny.
Mi obed e kom loch e nyim Nyasaye nyaka chiengʼ; ket herani kod adierani mondo orite.
Eka anasik ka apako nyingi gi wer kendo abiro chopo singruokna kodi odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ.

Chunya yudo yweyo kuom Nyasaye kende; warruok aa kuome.
En kende ema en lwandana kendo warruokna; en e ohingana, onge gima biro bwoga.
Ubiro siko kumonjo ngʼat achielni nyaka karangʼo? Angʼo momiyo uduto unywakone mondo ugoye piny? En ngʼat machalo mana gi chiel mayiengni madwaro mukore.
Giramo ni nyaka to gigole oko kama entie e duongʼne; miriambo ema morogi. Dhogi gigwedhogo ji, to gi ei chunygi to gikwongʼo ji. Sela
Yud yweyo, yaye chunya, kuom Nyasaye kende; genona aa mana kuome.
En kende ema en lwandana kendo warruokna; en e ohingana; onge gima biro bwoga.
Warruok mara gi luor ma ayudo aa kuom Nyasaye; en e lwandana manyalo duto, en e kar pondona.
Un ji, genuru kuome kinde duto; olneuru oko gik manie chunyu, nikech Nyasaye e kar pondo marwa. Sela
Joma nipiny gin mana muya nono; joma ni malo gin mana miriambo; ka opimgi e ratil, to gin nono; gin duto gin mana muya nono.
Kik igen kuom mwandu moma ji kata isungri kuom gik mokwal; kata bed ni mwandugi medore to kik iket chunyi kuomgi.
Nitie gimoro achiel ma Nyasaye osewacho, chutho nitie gik moko ariyo ma asewinjo gi ita: ni in, yaye Nyasaye, in ratego,
kendo ni in, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye, ihero ji. Kuom adier, ibiro chiwo pok ne ngʼato ka ngʼato kaluwore gi gima osetimo.

Yaye Nyasaye, in e Nyasacha, adwari gi tekra duto; chunya riyo oloyo mar neni kendo denda duto dwari, e piny motwo kendo maliet, maonge pi modho.
Aseneni ei kari maler kendo asengʼeyo tekoni gi duongʼni.
Nikech herani ber moloyo ngima, dhoga biro miyi duongʼ.
Abiro paki kapod angima, kendo abiro tingʼo bedena malo e nyingi.
Chunya biro romo mana ka ngʼama oromo gi chiemo mabeyo mogik; abiro yawo dwonda ka apaki gi wer.
Ka an e kitandana to apari; pacha osiko pari seche duto mag otieno.
Nikech in e konyruokna, awer ka an e bwo tipo mar bwombeni.
Chunya omoko kuomi; lweti ma korachwich orita.
Joma dwaro kawo ngimana ibiro tieki; gibiro dhi piny nyaka ei bur kama tut.
Ibiro chiwgi ne ligangla kendo gibiro doko chiemb ondiegi.
To ruoth to biro bedo moil kuom Nyasaye; ji duto masingore e nying Nyasaye biro pake, to dho jo-miriambo ibiro um mi lingʼ.

Winja, Yaye Nyasaye e kinde manyisi chandruokna; rit ngimana kuom jasigu ma bwoga.
Panda ne chenro maricho mag joma richo, panda ne koko ma oganda matimo marach goyo.
Gipiago lewgi ka ligangla kendo gichimo wechegi ka asere motimo sum.
Gidiro asere kama giponde mondo gichwogo ngʼama onge ketho; gibaye gi asere apoya ka gionge luoro.
Gijiwore ngʼato gi ngʼato kuom chenrogi maricho, giwuoyo kaka ginyalo pando obadhogi, kagiwacho niya, “En ngʼa mabiro nenogi?”
Gichano timo ne ji marach kagiwacho niya, “Waseloso chenro malongʼo chuth!” Kuom adier, pach dhano gi chunye opando riekni maricho miwuoro.
To Nyasaye biro bayogi gi aserni; apoya nono, ibiro puodgi piny.
Obiro loko lewgi mi gogi gin giwegi mi otiekgi chuth; ji duto monenogi biro kino wigi gi wuoro.
Ji duto biro bedo maluor, gibiro hulo tije Nyasaye, kendo gibiro paro mos kuom gima osetimo.
Joma kare mondo obed moil kuom Jehova Nyasaye kendo gipondo kuome; ji duto moriere tir gie chunygi mondo opake!

Pak riti e dala mar Sayun, yaye Nyasaye, wabiro rito singruokwa duto.
Yaye in miwinjo lamo, in ema ji duto biro biro iri.
Kane richowa turowa, iweyonwa kethowa.
Joma iyiero gin joma ogwedhi, jogo ma ikelo machiegni mondo odag e hekalu mari! Gik mabeyo mowuok e odi oromowa chuth, mana gigo moa e hekalu mari maler.
Idwokowa gi timbe madongo makare, yaye Nyasaye ma Jawarwa, yaye geno mar piny koni gi koni kendo mar nembe man maboyo mogik,
in mane iloso gode gi tekoni iwuon kane imanori gi teko,
in mane imiyo nembe olingʼ, wuo mar apaka margi, kod koko mag ogendini.
Joma odak kuonde maboyo oluoro timbeni miwuoro, imiyo ji werni gimor, kuma okinyi yaworee kendo odhiambo rumoe.
Irito piny kendo iolone pi, imiyo obedo momew moromo chuth. Aore mag Nyasaye opongʼ gi pi mamiyo ji bedo gi cham, nimar kamano e kaka ne ichano chon.
Ipuro puothene kendo iloso oparane duto. Imiyo puothene bedo mangʼich, kendo igwedhe gi cham.
Igwedho higa gi cham mogundho, kendo gechegi mwandu opongʼo.
Pewe motimo lum mag piny ongoro ngʼich oromo; kendo gode opongʼ gi mor.
Lek duto jamni kwaye ka giwinjo maber kendo holni cham mochiek odhure; gikok gimor kendo giwer.
Go koko gi mor ne Nyasaye, in piny duto!
Wer kipako duongʼ mar nyinge; mi pakne obed gi duongʼ!
Wachne Nyasaye niya, “Mano kaka timbe mitimo dongo! Tekoni duongʼ manade, mamiyo wasiki duto leny nono koneni.
Piny duto kuloreni; giweroni wende pak; giwero wende pak ka gipako nyingi.” Sela
Biuru uneye gik ma Nyasaye osetimo; bi uneye kaka gik motimo ne dhano dongo!
Ne oloko nam lo motwo, mine gikalo pige ka giwuotho gi tiendegi, Biuru mondo wabed moil kuome.
Olocho nyaka chiengʼ gi teko ne, wengene ema rito ogendini. Omiyo kik jongʼanyo hedhre mar kedo kode. Sela
Pakuru Nyasachwa, yaye ogendini, neuru ni pak mipakego ji duto owinjo;
oserito ngimawa kendo osegengʼo tiendewa ni kik kier.
Yaye Nyasaye ne itemowa ni in iwuon; ne ipwodhowa ka fedha.
Ne iterowa e od twech kendo ne iketo lodi mapek e dier ngʼewa.
Ne imiyo ji onyono wiyewa; kendo ne wakalo mach gi pi, kata kamano ne ikelowa nyaka kama omew.
Abiro biro e hekalu mari gi misango miwangʼo pep kendo abiro chopo kwongʼruok masetimo kodi.
Kwongʼruok mane asingoni e chunya kendo awacho gi dhoga kane an e thagruok.
Abiro timoni misango gi jamni machwe kendo abiro miyi chiwo mar imbe; bende abiro chiwoni rwedhi gi diek. Sela
Biuru uchik itu, un duto muluoro Nyasaye; we anyisue gik ma osetimona.
Ne aywakne gi dhoga; pakne ne ni e lewa.
Ka dine bed ni amor gi richo manie chunya, to Ruoth dine ok ochikona ite,
to kuom adier, Nyasaye osechikona ite kendo osewinjo dwonda ka alame.
Pak obed ne Nyasaye, ma ok osedagi lamona, kata golo herane kuoma.

Mad Nyasaye timnwa ngʼwono kendo owinjwa; mad omi wangʼe rienynwa maber, Sela
mondo yoreni ongʼere e piny, kendo ogendini duto oyud warruokne.
Mad ji paki, yaye Nyasaye; mad ji duto opaki.
Mad ogendini obed mamor kendo ower gi ilo, nikech irito ji gi ratiro, kendo itayo ogendini mag piny. Sela
Mad ji paki, yaye Nyasaye; mad ji duto opaki.
Eka piny biro chiego cham kaka owinjore kendo Nyasaye, ma Nyasachwa, biro gwedhowa.
Nyasaye biro gwedhowa, kendo piny duto koni gi koni biro luore.

Mad Nyasaye aa malo, mad wasike ke; mad joma kedo kode ring konene.
Mad iriembgi gi dhi mabor, mana kaka yamo riembo iro tero mabor; mad joma timbegi richo lal nono e nyim Nyasaye mana kaka odok leny kowinjo mach.
To joma kare to mad bed mamor kendo moil e nyim Nyasaye; mad gibed mamor kendo gibed mamor chuth.
Weruru ne Nyasaye, weruru wende pak ne nyinge, miyeuru duongʼ, En moriembo gechene e boche polo, nyinge en Jehova Nyasaye, beduru moil e nyime.
Nyasaye modak kare kama ler. En wuoro ne joma onge gi wuonegi kendo en jachwak mon ma chwogi otho.
Nyasaye keto joma odongʼ kendgi e udi kendo otelo ne joma otwe kower; to joma ohero ngʼanyo to dak e piny ma chiengʼ otwoyo kururu.
Kane iwuok idhi kitelo ne jogi, yaye Nyasaye, kane iwuotho e piny mokethore maonge tich, Sela
piny noyiengni kendo polo noolo koth e piny, e nyim Nyasaye, Jal man Sinai, e nyim Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel.
Ne ichiwo koth mogundho, yaye Nyasaye; ne idwogo chuny girkeni mari mane ojony.
Jogi nokawo pinyno modakie kendo nichiwo ne joma odhier gik ma gilando, kigolo kuom mwanduni mogundho, yaye Nyasaye.
Ruoth nolando wach kendo oganda mane okawo wachno mi okeye ne duongʼ mokalo:
“Ruodhi gi jolweny dar gi ngʼwech; ji pogo gik moyaki e kambi.
Kata mana sa ma inindo but mach kama liet, to bwombe mag akuchena oum gi dhahabu, kendo yierene oum gi fedha maleny.”
Kane Jal Maratego okeyo ruodhi manie piny, to ne ochal mana gi pe molwar koa e kama otingʼore gi malo mar Zalmon.
Gode mag Bashan gin gode madongo miwuoro; godego mag Bashan ojuothore adier.
Angʼo momiyo ungʼicho gi nyiego, yaye gode mojuothore, angʼo momiyo nyiego omakou gi got kama Nyasaye oyiero mondo ogurie lochne, kama Jehova Nyasaye owuon biro dakie nyaka chiengʼ?
Geche mag lweny mag Nyasaye gin tara gi tara; gingʼeny mokalo akwana; Ruoth osebiro koa Sinai mondo odonji kare maler.
Kane iidho idhi malo to ne itelone joma nimako e lweny; kendo ne ikawo mich mane ji omiyi, nyaka mich mane jongʼanyo omiyi, mondo in Jehova Nyasaye, idag kanyo.
Pak odog ne Ruoth, ma en Nyasaye ma Jawarwa, Nyasaye matingʼonwa pekwa ndalo duto. Sela
Nyasachwa en Nyasaye ma waro ji; tony e tho aa kuom Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ma Wuon Loch.
Kuom adier, Nyasaye biro toyo wiye wasike, obiro mayo joma dhi nyime gi timo richo osimbo motimo yier ma girwako.
Ruoth wacho niya, “Abiro gologi oko Bashan; abiro gologi oko kama tut mar nam,
mondo unyum tiendeu e remb joma kedo kodu, seche ma guogi magu olodho lewgi ka gichamo makorgi.”
Wuodhi koro nenore maler, yaye Nyasaye, wuodh Nyasacha ma Ruodha nenore maler kodonjo kare maler.
Joma wer gi dhogi otelo eka joma wer ka goyo thumbe luwogi, nyiri magoyo oyieke bende ni kodgi machiegni.
Pakuru Nyasaye e dier chokruok maduongʼ; pakuru Jehova Nyasaye e dier chokruok mar jo-Israel.
Dhoot matin mar joka Benjamin otelonegi, oganda maduongʼ mar ruodhi moa e dhood Juda bende ni kodgi, eka nitie ruodhi moa e dhout Zebulun gi Naftali.
Chok tekoni kaachiel, yaye Nyasaye; nyiswa tekoni, yaye Nyasaye; kaka isebedo kitimo nyaka aa chon.
Nikech hekalu mari man Jerusalem ruodhi biro keloni mich.
Kwer ondiek manie dier togo, kwer kweth mag rwedhi manie dier nyiroye mag ogendini. Mi okel sirni mangʼeny mag fedha ka wiye okuot. Ke ogendini mohero lweny.
Joote biro biro koa Misri; Kush bende biro bolore ne Nyasaye.
Weruru ne Nyasaye, yaye pinjeruodhi mag piny, weruru wende pak ne Ruoth Nyasaye, Sela
werneuru ne Jal mariembo gechene e kor polo malo manyaka nene, Jal mamor gi dwol maduongʼ.
Landuru teko mar Nyasaye ma nigi duongʼ kuom Israel, kendo ma nigi teko e kor polo.
Ilich miwuoro ka in kari maler, yaye Nyasaye, Nyasach Israel chiwo teko gi nyalo ne joge. Pak mondo obed ne Nyasaye!

Resa, yaye Nyasaye, nikech pi oseima nyaka e ngʼuta.
Asechako nimo e chwodho matut, kama onge lowo motegno ma ngʼato nyalo chungʼie. Asechopo e chuny pi kama tut, kendo apaka olwora oketa diere.
Koro aseywak mondo okonya mi aol; dwonda rewni. Wengena pek, ka amanyo Nyasacha.
Joma ochaya maonge gima omiyo ngʼeny moloyo yie wiya; joma olokore wasika kayiem thoth adier, jogogo madwaro mondo otieka. Ichuna mondo adwok gima ne ok akwalo.
Ingʼeyo fupa, yaye Nyasaye; kethona ok opondoni.
Mad joma ogeno kuomi kik ne wichkuot nikech an, yaye Ruoth, Jehova Nyasaye Maratego; mad joma manyi kik ne wichkuot nikech an, yaye Nyasach Israel.
Nimar ji yanya to alingʼ alingʼa nikech in, kendo wichkuot obako lela wangʼa.
Achalo wendo ne owetena an kaka jamwa ne yawuot minwa;
nikech hera matut ma aherogo odi tieka, kendo ayenje mag joma yanyi lwar kuoma.
Ka aywak kendo atweyo chiemo to pod nyaka ayud ayany;
ka arwako law ywak, to ji oloka ngero.
Joma obet e rangach jara, kendo alokora wer ma jokongʼo wero.
To alami, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, e kinde ma iikori mar konya; kuom herani maduongʼ, yaye Nyasaye, dwoka gi resruok mari mar adier.
Gola oko e chwodho, kik iyie anim; resa e lwet joma ochaya, gola e chuny pi kama tut.
Kik iwe ohula ywera mi tera kata kut mwonya duto, kata bur matut um dhoge ka an e iye.
Dwoka, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, dwoka, nikech herani ber; lokri ira kuom kechni maduongʼ.
Kik ipand wangʼi ne jatichni; dwoka piyo, nikech anie chandruok.
Bi machiegni mondo ikonya, resa nikech joma kedo koda.
Ingʼeyo kaka ijara, kaka ikuodo wiya kendo kaka aneno wichkuot; wasika duto ochoma tir.
Ajara osechodo chunya kendo aonge gi kar kony. Ne amanyo joma hoya, to ne ok ayudo kata achiel.
Negiketo kedhno e chiemba kendo negimiya kong andwayo mondo otiekna riyo.
Mad mesa mochan e nyimgi lokre obadho; kendo mad olokrenegi gir chulo kuor kod otegu.
Mad wengegi dinre mondo kik ginen kendo oguchgi odolre nyaka chiengʼ.
Ol mirimbi kuomgi; we mirimbi mager omakgi.
Mad miechgi dongʼ gundni; kendo kik iyie ne ngʼato angʼata dag e hembgi.
Nimar gisando joma ihinyo kendo giwuoyo kuom lit mag joma ihinyo.
Ket ketho e wigi kuom ketho ka ketho ma gitimo; kendo kik iyie giyud warruok mari.
Mad ruch kargi oko e kitap joma ngima kendo kik kwan-gi kaachiel gi joma kare.
An-gi rem kendo awinjo marach e chunya; mad warruokni rita, yaye Nyasaye.
Abiro pako nying Nyasaye gi wer kendo abiro miyo nyinge duongʼ gi erokamano.
Mano biro miyo Jehova Nyasaye mor moloyo rwadh pur, moloyo rwath mabwoch man-gi tungene kod ombongʼne.
Joma odhier biro neno mi gibed mamor, un ma udwaro Nyasaye mad chunyu bed mangima!
Jehova Nyasaye winjo joma ochando kendo ok olok ngʼeye ne joge motwe.
Piny gi polo mondo opake, kaachiel gi nembe kod gik moko duto mawuothoe igi,
nikech Nyasaye biro reso Sayun kendo obiro gero dala mag Juda kendo. Eka ji nodag kanyo kendo ginikawe kaka margi;
enobed girkeni mar koth jotichne, kendo joma ohero nyinge nodag kanyo.

Ret piyo mondo iresa, yaye Nyasaye; bi piyo mondo ikonya, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Mad joma dwaro ngimana yud wichkuot kendo pachgi lal; mad ji duto ma gombona hinyruok dog kuma giaye ka giyudo achaya.
Mad joma wachona niya, “Haa! Haa!” Dog kuma giaye ka wichkuot omakogi.
To mad ji duto madwari bed moil kendo mamor kuomi; mad joma ohero warruok mari osik kawacho niya, “Jehova Nyasaye mondo oyud duongʼ!”
Adhier kendo achando; bi ira piyo, yaye Nyasaye. In e konyruokna kendo jaresna; kik ideki, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Kuomi ema aseponde, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; kik iwe ayud wichkuot.
Konya kendo gola e chandruok, nikech timni makare; winja kendo iresa.
Bedna lwanda mar pondo, ma anyalo ringo adhiye seche duto; gol chik mondo iresa, nimar in e lwandana kendo ohingana.
Resa e lwet joma timbegi richo, yaye Nyasacha, gola kuom richo gi joma kwiny momaka matek.
Nimar in ema isebedo genona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, in ema isebedo kimiya chir nyaka ae tin-na.
Asebedo ka ayiengora kuomi nyaka ne nywola; in ema ne igola ei minwa. Abiro apaki nyaka chiengʼ.
Alokora gima bwogo ji mangʼeny to kata kamano in e kar pondo mara motegno.
Dhoga opongʼ gi pakni, kendo asiko ahulo duongʼni maler odiechiengʼ duto.
Kik ijog koda ka koro ati; kik ijwangʼa ka tekra orumo.
Nimar wasika wuoyo marach kuoma; jogo marita mondo onega loso wach kaachiel.
Giwacho niya, “Nyasaye oseweye; laweuru mondo umake, nikech onge ngʼama biro rese.”
Kik ibed mabor koda, yaye Nyasaye; bi piyo mondo ikonya, yaye Nyasacha.
Mad joma donjona lal nono ka wigi okuot; mad joma dwaro hinya, obed gi achaya kod wichkuot koni gi koni.
Anto abiro siko ka an gi geno; abiro paki kendo abiro medo paki.
Dhoga biro hulo timni makare, kod warruokni odiechiengʼ duto, kata obedo ni gingʼeny mohinga ngʼeyo.
Abiro biro mondo anyis ji timbeni madongo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto; abiro nyiso ji timni makare, timni makare in kendi.
Isepuonja nyaka aa e nyathi, yaye Nyasaye, kendo nyaka kawuono pod ahulo timbe miwuoro.
Kata ka ochopo kinde ma ati kendo wiya oselokore lwar, to kik iweya, yaye Nyasaye, nyaka ahul tekoni ni tienge mabiro, kendo ahul timbeni madongo ni tienge duto mabiro.
Timni makare ochopo nyaka ei kor polo, yaye Nyasaye, in misetimo gik madongo. En ngʼa ma dipim kodi, yaye Nyasaye?
Kata obedo ni isemiyo aneno chandruok mathoth kendo malit, to pod ibiro miyo abed mangima kendo. Ibiro gola e bur matut mi achak abed gi duongʼ.
Ibiro miyo duongʼ ma an-go medore kendo ibiro chako ihoya kendo.
Abiro paki gi nyatiti nikech adiera mari, yaye Nyasaye; abiro weroni wend pak gi orutu, yaye Nyasaye Maler mar Israel.
Abiro kok gi mor ka aweroni wend pak, nikech an ngʼat misewaro.
Dhoga biro nyiso ji kuom timbeni makare odiechiengʼ duto, nimar joma ne dwaro hinya oseneno wichkuot kendo osengʼengʼ.
Sidh ne ruoth adiera mari, yaye Nyasaye, sidh ne wuod ruoth timni makare.
Obiro ngʼado ne jou bura makare, obiro kelo adiera ne jou masandore.
Gode biro kelo mwandu ne ji, kendo thuche biro kelo olemb tim makare.
Obiro chwako joma odhier manie dier ji kendo obiro reso nyithind joma ochando; to thiro ji, to obiro tieko pep.
Obiro siko ka wangʼ chiengʼ, obiro siko ka dwe e tienge duto.
Obiro chalo gi koth machwe e lum mongʼadi maber kendo gi kodh ajiki mamiyo piny ngʼich.
E ndalone joma kare biro dhi maber, kendo kwe biro bedo mogundho nyaka chop dwe lal nono.
Obiro bedo gi loch chakre nam nyaka nam kendo kochakore Aora maduongʼ nyaka kuma piny ogikie.
Ogendini modak e piny ongoro biro kulorene kendo wasike biro nangʼo lowo gi dhogi.
Ruodhi mag Tarshish kod mag dho nembe man maboyo biro miye gik moko, kendo ruodhi mag Sheba gi mag Seba biro kelone mich.
Ruodhi duto biro kulorene kendo ogendini duto biro tiyone.
Nimar obiro konyo joma ochando maywagore, jogo modhier maonge gi jakony.
Obiro kecho joma ok nyal gi joma ochando kendo obiro reso ngima joma ochando.
Obiro gologi e dich modigigo kendo e timbe mahundu, nimar okwano rembgi ka gima nengone tek.
Mad odag amingʼa! Mad kelne dhahabu moa Sheba. Mad ji duto sik ka lamone kendo ka gwedhe odiechiengʼ duto.
Mad cham bed mangʼeny e piny duto, bende gikwak nyaka wi godo matindo duto. Mad olembene ol mathoth ka Lebanon, kendo mad onyagi ka lum manie pap.
Mad nyinge sik nyaka chiengʼ kendo mad odhi nyime ka wangʼ chiengʼ. Ogendini duto ibiro gwedhi gi gweth moa kuomi kendo gibiro luongi ni ngʼat mogwedhi.
Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, mondo oyud opak, en kende ema otimo gik miwuoro.
Nyinge man-gi duongʼ mondo opaki nyaka chiengʼ kendo mad piny duto pongʼ gi duongʼne. Amin kendo Amin.
Ma e giko mag lamo mag Daudi Wuod Jesse.
Adier Nyasaye timo maber ni jo-Israel, otimo maber ne jogo maler ei chunygi.
Anto tiendena nodwaro kier. Ne achiegni aa kama ne anyono.
Nimar ne agombo timbe joma ochayo ji kane aneno kaka joma timbegi richo dhi maber.
Gionge gi pek moro amora kendo dendgi ber kendo otegno.
Chandruok mamako ji gin ok yudgi kendo ok githagre kaka ji mamoko thagore.
Emomiyo sunga chalonegi thiwni mar ngʼut, kendo girwako mahundu ka law.
Wengegi onyiedhore gi bor kendo miriambo maricho mopongʼo pachgi onge gikogi.
Gijaro ji kendo giwuoyo ka gihimo ji, nikech gichayo ji gisiko gibwogo ji ni ji biro wuoro.
Giwacho weche polo gi dhogi to lewgi to gimakogo mwandu mag piny.
Emomiyo jogegi doknegi kendo pakogi kendo ok giyud rach moro amora kuomgi.
Giwacho niya, “Ere kaka Nyasaye nyalo ngʼeyo? Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo to ongʼeyo angʼo?”
Kama e kaka joma timbegi richo chalo, ok gidew gimoro amora kendo mwandugi osiko medore ameda.
Kare asetemo ritora mondo chunya osik kaler kayiem, kendo asetemo gengʼo lwetena ni kik omul richo kayiem.
Nimar asiko achandora seche duto, kendo ayudo kum okinyi kokinyi.
Ka dine bed ni awacho kamano, to dine andhogo nyithindi.
To kane atemo winjo tiend gigi duto, to ne opek mohinga;
nyaka ne adonjo kama ler mar lemo mar Nyasaye; eka nawinjo kaka gikogi nobedi.
Chutho iketogi kama poth-poth, kendo idwokogi piny mi gikethre.
Mano kaka itiekogi apoya nono, mi masiche malich lal kodgi nono!
Gilal nono ka lek ma ngʼato oleko gokinyi, omiyo e kinde ma ia malo, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye, to ok ibi dewogi mana ka kido maonge.
Kane iya owangʼ, kendo chunya winjo lit,
to pacha nolal kendo ne abedo mofuwo, ne achalo le maonge rieko e nyimi.
Kata kamano an kodi ndalo duto, kendo imaka gi bada korachwich.
Itaya gi rieko mingʼadona kendo bangʼe ibiro tera kar duongʼ.
En ngʼa ma an-go e polo makmana in? Piny bende onge gi gimoro amora madwaro moloyi.
Ringra gi chunya nyalo doko manyap, to Nyasaye ema miyo chunya teko, kendo en e girkeni mara nyaka chiengʼ.
Joma ni mabor kodi biro lal nono kendo ibiro tieko ji duto ma ok jo-adiera ne in.
An to berna ka an but Nyasaye. Aseketo Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kar pondona, kendo abiro lando gik moko duto mitimo.
Angʼo momiyo isedagiwa nyaka chiengʼ, yaye Nyasaye? Angʼo momiyo mirimbi dhwolore ka iro kochomo rombe mag lek mari iwuon?
Par jogi mane ingʼiewo chon gi lala, oganda ma gin girkeni mari, kendo mane iwaro, Got Sayun, kama in iwuon idakie.
Lokri ichom kuonde mosebedo kokethore nyaka nene, lokri ichom kethruok maduongʼ ma jasigu osekelo e kari maler mar lemo.
Wasiki noruto kama iromoe kodwa; kendo negichungo bendechegi mochungʼ kar timbegi maricho.
Negitimore marach mana ka ji mangʼawo leyegi malo ka gidwaro tongʼo yiende madongo dongo modongo modhigore.
Negituro chumbe modol odol gi tindogi kod nyundogi.
Ne giwangʼo kari maler mar lemo molokore buru, kendo ne gidwanyo kama nyingi dakie.
Negiwacho e chunygi niya, “Wabiro tiekogi chuth!” Ne giwangʼo kuonde duto e piny mane ilame Nyasaye.
Tinde ok wayud honni kata ranyisi, kendo onge jonabi modongʼ kata achiel, to onge kata ngʼato achiel kuomwa mongʼeyo ni mano biro bedo kamano nyaka karangʼo.
Nyaka karangʼo ma jasigu biro jarie, yaye Nyasaye? Ibiro yiene jasigu mondo oyany nyingi nyaka chiengʼ koso?
Angʼo momiyo itamo lweti tiyo tichne, mana lweti ma korachwich? Gole oko kama isoye ei lepi mondo itiekgi!
To Nyasaye in e Ruodha nyaka chakre chon, yaye Nyasaye, kendo isebedo kikelo resruok e piny.
In ema ne ipogo nam e diere ariyo gi tekoni, kendo ne itoyo wiye ondiek marach ei pi.
In ema ne itoyo wiye Leviathan, mi ichiwe kaka chiemo ne le modak e thim.
In ema ne iyawo sokni gi aore, kendo ne imiyo aore madongo ma ok dwon otwo.
Odiechiengʼ en mari, kendo otieno bende mari, bende ne iguro wangʼ chiengʼ gi dwe keregi.
In ema ne iketo tongʼ duto mag piny kende ne iguro oro gi chwiri.
Parie kaka jasigu osejari, yaye Jehova Nyasaye. Parie kaka joma onge rieko osechayo nyingi.
Kik iyie ichiw ngima mar akuch oduglani ne le mager mag bungu; kik wiyi wil gi ngima jogi mathagore nyaka chiengʼ.
Par singruok mari nikech timbe mahundu opongʼo kuonde duto motimo mudho e piny.
Kik iyie mondo joma idiyo ringa ka wigi okuot, to mad joma odhier gi joma ochando opak nyingi.
Aa malo mondo isir tichni, yaye Nyasaye; parie kaka joma ofuwo jari odiechiengʼ duto.
Kik wiyi wil gi sibuoch wasiki, chom tir sigich wasiki mosiko medore ameda.

Wagoyoni erokamano, yaye Nyasaye, wagoyoni erokamano nimar Nyingi ni machiegni, kendo ji lando timbeni miwuoro.
Iwacho niya, “An ema ayiero ndalo mowinjore, kendo an ema angʼado bura kare.
Ka piny kaachiel gi ji duto modakie yiengni, to an ema amako sirnige motegno. Sela
Joma ochecho akwero ni, ‘Weuru sungoru,’ to joma timbegi richo to okwero niya, ‘Weuru tingʼo tungeu malo.
Weuru sungoru ni un gi teko, kendo kuwuoyo kududo ngʼutu.’ ”
Nimar duongʼ ok nyal medore ne ngʼato koa wuok chiengʼ kata podho chiengʼ kata e thim.
To Nyasaye ma jangʼad bura ema dwoko ngʼato piny, kendo tingʼo ngʼat machielo malo.
Nitiere kikombe mopongʼ gi divai mochiek e lwet Jehova Nyasaye en kikombe mopongʼ gi divai mokik gi apilo, Nyasaye ole oko, to joma timbegi richo duto manie piny madhe duto pep nyaka ngʼiende.
An to abiro siko ka alando wachni nyaka chiengʼ kendo abiro wero wende pak ne Nyasach Jakobo,
mawacho niya, “Abiro ngʼado oko tunge joma timbegi richo duto, to tunge joma kare to ibiro tingʼ malo.”

Nyasaye en rahuma e piny Juda, kendo nyinge duongʼ e piny Israel.
Hembe nitie Salem kar dakne ni Sayun.
Kanyo ema e oturoe aserni makakni, kaachiel gi okumbni gi ligengni, ma gin gig lweny. Sela
Duongʼ mari ler okwako kendo iyombo gode momew gi kit le mayoreyore.
Yawuowi madongo mojingʼ osema gik mane giyako koro ginindo nindogi mogik; kendo onge jolwenygo kata achiel, manyalo tingʼo kata mana bade.
Nikech kwer misekwerogigo, yaye Nyasach Jakobo omiyo faras gi gari moywayo ochungʼ kar tiendegi.
In kendi ema onego oluori. Koso en ngʼa manyalo chungʼ e nyimi ka mirima omaki?
Ne ingʼado bura gie polo, mi piny ne luoro omako molingʼ thi.
Kane ia malo mondo ingʼad bura, yaye Nyasaye, mondo ikony ji duto mawinjo marach e piny. Sela
Kuom adier, mirima ma in-go gi ji, keloni pak, kendo miyo joma otony ne mirimbi ritore.
Singri ne Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi, kendo chop singruokgo; bende jopinje duto mokiewo kodi, okel mich ne Jal monego ji luor.
Ochodo chuny jotelo, kendo ruodhi duto mag piny oluore.

Ne aywak ni Nyasaye mondo okonya, kendo ne aywak ni Nyasaye mondo owinja.
Kane an e chandruok, ne amanyo Ruoth Nyasaye; otieno duto ne arieyo bedena malo ma ok aol, kendo chunya nodagi hoch.
Ne apari mine ahum, yaye Nyasaye, ne aol kendo chunya nonyosore. Sela
Ne imako wengena mi ok oimore, kendo ne an gi pek ma ok anyal wuoyo.
Ne aparo kuom ndalo machon, higni machon gi lala;
ne aparo wendena mag otieno. Ne aloso gi pacha awuon, kendo chunya nopenjo kama:
“Bende Ruoth Nyasaye nyalo dagi ngʼato chuth? Bende en adier ni ok obi ochak ongʼwon kendo?
Bende herane ma ok rem dirum chuth adier? Bende singruokne nyalo bare ma ok ochopo nyaka chiengʼ?
Dibed ni Nyasaye wiye osewil gi kecho ji? Koso mirimbe mager osemiyo ok okech joge?” Sela
Eka naparo niya, “Ma e kama abiro kwayoe kony: higni ma lwet Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo ma korachwich osetieko.
Abiro siko kaparo timbe Jehova Nyasaye; ee, abiro paro kuom honni magi machon gi lala.
Abiro paro mos kuom tijeni duto, abiro paro matut kuom timbeni madongo duto.”
Yoreni ler, yaye Nyasaye. En nyasaye mane maduongʼ kaka Nyasachwa?
In e Nyasaye matimo honni, inyiso tekoni e dier ji mopogore opogore.
Ne iwaro jogi gi badi maratego, jogi ma nyikwa Jakobo gi Josef. Sela
Pige noneni, yaye Nyasaye, pige noneni mi luoro omakogi, kendo kude matut notetni.
Boche polo ne oolo pi piny, kendo polo nomor e kor polo, ka asernigi mil koni gi koni.
Mor polo mari nowinji ei yamo mager, mil polo mari nomenyo piny duto, kendo piny notetni kendo oyiengni.
Yori nongʼado dier nam, yo miluwo nokadho e dier pige maringo matek, kata obedo ni kuonde mane tiendeni onyono ne ok nyal ne gi wangʼ.
Ne itelone jogi ka rombe ka gin e lwet Musa gi Harun.
Chiknauru itu, yaye un joga, winjuru weche mawuok e dhoga.
Abiro yawo dhoga mondo awuo gi ngeche, ee, abiro hulo gik mopondo ma wuoyo kuom gik mane otimore chon gi lala.
Gik ma wasewinjo kendo ma wangʼeyo, mane wuonewa onyisowa.
Ok wabi pandogi ne nyithindgi; to wabiro hulogi ne tiengʼ mabiro timbe mipako mag Jehova Nyasaye, gi tekone kod gik miwuoro mosetimo.
Ne ogolo chike ne joka Jakobo kendo noguro chik e piny Israel, chike mane omiyo kwerewa mondo opuonj nyithindgi,
mondo tiengʼ mabiro ongʼegi, koda ka nyithindo mapok onywol, kendo gin bende ginyis nyithindgi.
Eka mondo mi giket genogi kuom Nyasaye kendo kik wigi wil gi gik mosetimo, to mondo girit chikene.
Ne ok ginyal chalo gi kweregi; mane tiengʼ ma tokgi tek kendo ma jongʼanyo, ma chunjegi ne ok ochiwore ne Nyasaye kendo ne ok luwe gi adiera.
Kata ka jo-Efraim nomanore gi gige lweny, to negiringo lweny.
Ne ok girito singruok mar Nyasaye kendo ne gidagi dak ka giluwo chik Nyasaye.
Wigi nowil gi gik mane osetimo, ranyisi mane osenyisogi.
Ne otimo honni ka wuonegi neno e gwengʼ mar Zoan, e piny Misri.
Ne omiyo nam opogore diere ariyo mi nomiyo gikadho kendo nomiyo pi ochungʼ molingʼ thi ka ohinga.
Ne otayogi kod bor polo godiechiengʼ kendo giler moa e mach otieno duto.
Ne otucho lwanda e thim kendo nomiyogi pi mogundho ka nembe;
bende nomiyo aore obubni kawuok e lwanda kama obarore mi pi nomol piny mana ka aora.
To eka pod negidhi mana nyime ka gitimo richo e nyime ka gingʼanyo e thim ne Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo.
Ne gitemo Nyasaye ka gingʼeyo, kuom kete mondo omigi chiemo mane gigombo.
Ne giwuoyo marach kuom Nyasaye kagiwacho ni, “Nyasaye bende nyalo chano mesa e nyimwa e thim ka?
Kane ogoyo lwanda to pi nothinyore oko kendo aore nochako mol mogundho. To chiemo bende domiwa adier? Ringʼo bende onyalo kelo mi opog ne joge adier?”
Kane Jehova Nyasaye owinjo gi ite, iye nowangʼ ahinya, mi mach mare notuk kuom joka Jakobo, kendo mirimbe mager nobiro kuom jo-Israel,
nimar ne ok giyie kuom Nyasaye kata geno kuom resruok mare.
To eka pod nogolo chik ne kor polo malo kendo noyawo dhoudi mag polo;
ne oolo mana piny ka koth mondo ji ocham, adier, nomiyogi chiemb polo.
Ji nochamo makati mar malaike, kendo nooronegi kit chiemo duto mane ginyalo chamo.
Ne ogonyo yamb ugwe moa e polo, kendo nogolo yamb milambo gi tekone.
Nolwaro ringʼo piny kuomgi ka buru, adier, winy mafuyo nolwar kuomgi ka kwoyo manie dho nam.
Nomiyo winyogo olwar piny nyaka ei kambi mine gilworo hembegi duto koni gi koni.
Negichiemo mi chiemo otamogi tieko, nimar nomiyogi gima ne chunygi gombo.
To kane pok gitieko chiembgi mar gombono, chutho, ka chiemo ne pod opongʼo dhogi,
mirima mager mar Nyasaye nogore kuomgi, mi nomiyo jogi maroteke otho, kendo nopielo yawuot Israel ma pod tindo piny.
To kata obedo ni magi duto nosetimore, pod negidhi mana nyime gitimo richo; pod ne ok giyie kuome, kata obedo ni ne osetimo ranyisi mathoth e diergi.
Omiyo nomiyo ngimagi orumo kaonge ber kendo higni mag-gi nopongʼ gi masiche mabwogo ji.
E kinde moro amora mane Nyasaye okumogie, to ne gimanye mine gilokore ka gidware gi siso.
Negiparo ni Nyasaye ema ne en lwanda margi, kendo ni Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo ema ne en Jawargi.
To kata kamano ne gichare achara gi dhogi, ka giwuonde gi lewgi.
Nimar chunygi ne ok omoko kuome, kendo ne ok gilu singruokne kuom adier.
To en, kaka en ngʼama kecho ji, noweyonegi kethogi, kendo ne ok otiekogi. Kinde ka kinde nogengʼo mirimbe kendo ne ok otoyo mirimbe duto kuomgi.
Noparo kaka ne gin mana dhano adhana machalo yamo makalo kendo ok chak duogi.
Mano kaka ne gingʼanyone e thim nyadi mangʼeny kendo negimiye chuny lit e piny motwo!
Ne gitemo Nyasaye kinde mangʼeny, kendo negimiyo Jal Maler mar Israel osin.
Ne ok giparo tekone, kendo ne ok giparo odiechiengʼ mane owarogi e lwet jasigu,
odiechiengʼ mane onyiso e lela honni mage e piny Misri kane otimo ranyisino e gwengʼ mar Zoan.
Noloko aoregi remo mi koro ne ok ginyal modho pi moa e aoregi.
Ne ooro bonyo mag lwangʼni mane omwonyogi, gi ogwende mane oketho pinygi.
Ne ochiwo chambgi ne ongogo, chambgi mosechiek ne bonyo.
Ne oketho olembegi mag mzabibu gi pe, kod yiendegi mag ngʼowu gi yamo mangʼich.
Ne ochiwo jambgi ne pe, kendo nomiyo dhogegi polo ogoyo.
Ne oolo kuomgi mirimbe maliet, kokecho kendo iye owangʼ kendo oger; oganda malaike ma jonek.
Ne olosone mirimbe yo maluwo, kendo ne ok okechogi e tho, to ne ojwangʼogi, mondo tho otiekgi.
Ne onego kach jo-Misri duto, mana olemo mokwongo chiek mag dhano e hembe mag Ham.
To joge to nogolo oko mana ka kweth, kendo notelonegi ka rombe koyoro kodgi thim.
Ne otayogi maber omiyo ne gionge gi luoro, to wasikgi to ne nam omwonyo.
Kamano e kaka ne okelogi nyaka e tongʼ mar pinje maler, nyaka ne gitundo e piny motimo gode, ma lwete ma korachwich nosekawo.
Ne oriembo ogendini e nyimgi kendo nomiyogi lopgi kaka girkeni margi, mi nomiyo dhout Israel odak e miechgi giwegi.
To kata kamano ne gitemo Nyasaye, mine gingʼanyone Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo; ka gidagi rito chikene.
Mana kaka wuonegi ne ok giwinje kendo ne ok gin jo-adiera kendo ne gichalo atungʼ mobam ma ok nyal gen.
Ne giwangʼo iye gi kuondegi motingʼore malo, kendo ne gichiewo nyiego mare gi nyisechegi mane giloso.
Kane Nyasaye owinjogi, iye nowangʼ ahinya, kendo nokwedo jo-Israel chuth.
Ne ojwangʼo Hemb Romo mane ni Shilo, mane en hema mane oguro owuon e dier ji.
Nooro Sandug Muma e twech, mi duongʼne maler nodhi e lwet wasigu.
Nochiwo joge ne ligangla, kendo nokecho ahinya gi girkeni mare.
Mach notieko yawuotgi matindo, kendo nyigi ne ok owernegi wende kisera;
jodologi ne onegi, kendo mondegi ne ywak otamo.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiew ka gima oa e nindo, mana kaka ngʼato chiewo, bangʼ madho divai mangʼeny.
Ne oriembo wasike gi goch, kendo nomiyo giyudo wichkuot mosiko.
Ne odagi hembe mag Josef, bende ne ok oyiero dhood joka Efraim,
to dhood joka Juda ema ne oyiero, ee, noyiero mana Got Sayun, mane ohero.
Ne ogero kare maler mar lemo, ka gode maboyo, kendo mana ka piny mane oguro nyaka chiengʼ.
Ne oyiero Daudi jatichne, kendo nogole e abich rombe;
nogole e tij rito rombe mokele mondo okwa joge ma nyikwa Jakobo, mondo okwa Israel girkeni mare.
Kuom mano Daudi nokwayogi gi chuny makare kendo notelonegi, gi lwedo mongʼith.
Yaye Nyasaye, ogendini osemonjo girkeni mari; gisedwanyo hekalu mari maler, kendo giseketho Jerusalem modongʼ pidhe pidhe.
Gisechiwo ringre jogi motho mondo obed chiemb winy manie kor polo, ring jogi maler gisechiwo ne ondiegi mag piny.
Giseolo remo e alwora mar Jerusalem ka pi, kendo koro onge ngʼama nyalo yiko joma otho.
Waselokore gima kuodo wich ne jobutwa, joma ijaro kendo inyiero gi joma olworowa.
Nyaka karangʼo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye? Ibiro kecho nyaka chiengʼ koso? Nyaka karangʼo ma nyiego mari biro lielie ka mach?
Ol mirimbi kuom pinjeruodhi, adier ol mirimbi kuom ogendini ma ok luong nyingi;
nimar gisengamo Jakobo mi giketho gwengʼe.
Kik ikwanwa kaka joketho, nikech richo mag wuonewa; mad kechni bi romnwa piyo, nimar osedwokwa piny marach.
Konywa, yaye Nyasaye ma Jawarwa, nikech duongʼ mar nyingi; reswa kendo wenwa richowa, mondo nyingi oyud duongʼ.
Angʼo momiyo ogendini onego owach ni, “Nyasachgino to ni kanye?” Mi ogendini ongʼe, ka waneno gi wangʼwa, ni ichulo kuor nikech remb jogi mosechwer.
Mad chur ma joma otwe churgo chopi e nyimi; rit ngima joma osengʼad nigi buch tho, gi teko mar badi.
Chul kuor ne jobutwa nyadibiriyo kigoyo bembegi. Kuom ayany ma gisediro kuomi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Eka jogi, ma gin rombegi mikwayo, biro paki nyaka chiengʼ, kendo wabiro nyiso pakni, koa e tiengʼ moro nyaka tiengʼ machielo.

Chiknwa iti, yaye Jakwadh jo-Israel, in mitelo ne Josef ka kweth mar dhok. In mibet e kom loch e kind kerubi, koro rieny ane
e nyim Efraim, gi Benjamin gi Manase. Nyis tekri, kendo bi mondo ireswa.
Dwogwa iri, yaye Nyasaye; mi wangʼi orienynwa, eka mondo wayud warruok.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasaye Maratego, mirimbi biro siko koyienyo, gi lamo mar jogi nyaka karangʼo?
Isemiyo gichamo pi wangʼ ka kuon kendo isemiyo gimodho pi wangʼ agwetni modhuro.
Isemiyo wadoko rachwany ne jobutwa, kendo wasikwa jarowa.
Dwogwa iri, yaye Nyasaye Maratego; mi wangʼi orienynwa, eka mondo wayud warruok.
Ne igolo mzabibu moro e piny Misri, kendo ne iriembo ogendini mi ipidhe kargi.
Ne ilosone lowo maber, kendo nochwoyo tiendene piny mi opongʼo piny.
Tipo Nyasaye noimo gode duto, mana ka yiende sida ma odongo ma bedene olak.
Noyaro bedene madongo nyaka e Nam Mediterania kendo noloth mochweyo nyaka e Aora Yufrate.
Koro angʼo momiyo isemuko ohinga mage, momiyo ji duto makadho pone ka olemo.
Mbithe moa e bungu kethe, kendo le mag bungu chame.
Duog irwa, yaye Nyasaye Maratego! Ngʼi piny gie polo mondo ine! Ngʼi mzabibu maber,
yien ma lweti ma korachwich ema nopidho gi tiende, ma en wuodi misepidho in iwuon.
Mzabibu mari osetongʼ mi owangʼ gi mach, jogi lal nono nikech isekwerogi.
Mad lweti bed kuom ngʼat mobet e bathi korachwich, ma en wuod dhano misemiyo teko in iwuon.
Eka ok wanachak walokre waweyi; konywa wabed mangima, kendo wabiro pako nyingi.
Dwogwa iri, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasaye Maratego; mi wangʼi orienynwa, eka mondo wayud warruok.

Weruru matek gi mor ne Nyasaye mamiyowa teko, gouru koko matek ne Nyasach Jakobo!
Chakuru wer, yiekuru oyieke; gweluru nyatiti gi asili mamit.
Gouru tung im ka dwe manyien ochakore, ma en ka dwe osetegno, e odiechiengʼ mar Nyasiwa mogen.
Ma en gima ochuno jo-Israel; chik ma Nyasach Jakobo nogolo.
Kane Nyasaye mirima omako gi jo-Misri, to ne ogure kaka chik ne Josef. Ne awinjo dwol ma ok angʼeyo kuma oaye kawacho kama:
“Ne agolo tingʼ mapek e gokgi, mi lwetgi nogony e tingʼo atonge.
Ne iluongo ka in e chandruok mi akonyi, ne adwoki gi ei boche polo, kendo ne atemi e tie pige mag Meriba. Sela
“Winjuru wach, yaye joga, to abiro siemou, abiro siemou ka uikoru mar winja, yaye Israel.
Kik ubed gi nyasaye ma wendo e dieru, kendo kik ukulru ne nyasaye ma ukia.
An Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasachu, mane ogolou Misri. Ngʼamuru dhou malach mondo apongʼe.
“To joga nodagi winjo dwonda kendo Israel nodagi timo kaka achikogi.
Omiyo ne aweyogi nikech chunygi ne tek, kendo negiluwo yoregi giwegi.
“Ka dine joga yie winja, ka dine Israel yie lu yorena,
mano kaka dine atieko wasikgi piyo piyo kendo dine agoyo joma kedo kodgi gi lweta!
Joma ochayo Jehova Nyasaye dine okulorene gi luoro, kendo kum margi osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
To un dine apidhou gi ngano maber mogik, kendo dine aromou gi mor kich ma athodho e lwanda.”
Nyasaye osekawo kare e dier chokruok maduongʼ, ongʼado bura e kind “nyiseche.”
Nyaka karangʼo ma ubiro dhi nyime ka udewo wangʼ joma ok timbegi nikare kendo kudewo wangʼ joma timbegi richo? Sela
Ngʼaduru bura makare ne joma ok nyal kod nyithi kiye, kendo konyuru joma odhier kod joma ok nyal konyore kendgi.
Resuru joma ok nyal kod joma ochando; golgiuru e lwet joma timbegi richo.
To gisesiko ka gimemore kendo onge gima gingʼeyo. Giwuotho koni gi koni e mudho; kendo gimiyo mise duto mag piny yiengni.
“Asenyisou ni, ‘Un “nyiseche;” kendo ni un duto un yawuot Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo.’
To ubiro tho ka ji ajia; adier ubiro podho mana kaka jatelo moro amora ma ok otangʼ.”
Aa malo, yaye Nyasaye, ngʼadni piny bura, nimar ogendini duto gin girkeni magi.

Kik ilingʼ, yaye Nyasaye; kik iywe, yaye Nyasaye, bende kik ibed mos.
Neye kaka wasiki piem kodi gi koko maduongʼ. Neye kaka joma kedo kodi ngʼanyoni.
Gichano timo ne jogi marach lingʼ-lingʼ; giloso chenro maricho ne joma chunyi ohero.
Giwacho niya, “Biuru watiekgi mi girum pep kaka oganda, mondo nying mar Israel kik chak par kendo.”
Giloso chenro ka giriwo pachgi bedo achiel, gilosoni riwruok mondo giked kodi.
Gin jo-Edom gi jo-Ishmael, jo-Moab gi jo-Hagri,
jo-Gebal, jo-Amon kod jo-Amalek, jo-Filistia kaachiel gi joma odak Turo.
Nyaka jo-Asuria bende oseriwore kodgi mondo oriw lwetgi ne nyikwa Lut. Sela
Timnegi kaka ne itimo ne Midian, mana kaka nitimo ne Sisera gi Jabin e Aora Kishon,
mane jotho Endor modoko owuoyo mar dhok e lowo.
Mi jogi momew ochal gi Oreb kod Zeb mi ruodhigi duto chal gi Zeba kod Zalmuna,
mane jowacho niya, “Wakawuru pewe mag kwath mag Nyasaye mondo obed marwa.”
Mi gichal gi buya mayot-yot, yaye Nyasacha, mi gichal gi mihudhwe ma yamo tero.
Mana kaka mach wangʼo bungu maduongʼ kata kaka mach wangʼo wi got,
e kaka in bende ilawgi gi ahiti maduongʼ kendo ibwog-gi gi yambi makudho matek.
Pongʼ wengegi gi wichkuot mondo ji omany nyingi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Mad wigi kuodi nyaka chiengʼ kendo gisiki ka luoro omakogi; mad gilal nono ka gin gi wichkuot.
Mi gingʼe ni in, ma nyingi Jehova Nyasaye; ni in kendi e Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo kendo ni iloyo piny duto.

Mano kaka hekalu mari ber miwuoro, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Maratego!
Chunya gombo kendo njawni ka agombo bedo e od Jehova Nyasaye; Chunya gi denda duto wer gi mor ne Nyasaye mangima.
Nyaka winj oyundi oseloso kar dakne, kendo opija bende osegero ode, kama onyalo nywole nyithinde, but kendoni mar misango, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Maratego, ma Ruodha kendo Nyasacha.
Ogwedh joma odak e odi; mosiko ka paki. Sela
Ogwedh joma tekregi ni kuomi jogo moketo chunygi e luwo yori maler.
Ka gikadho e Holo mar Baka to gimiyo obedo kama opongʼ gi sokni; kendo kodh opon bende pongʼe gi yewni.
Tekreni osiko medore ameda, nyaka chop moro ka moro kuomgi chop Sayun e nyim Nyasaye.
Yie iwinj lemona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasaye Maratego; chikna iti, yaye Nyasach Jakobo. Sela
Tingʼ wangʼi ine okumbawa, yaye Nyasaye; rang ngʼati miwiro gi ngʼwono.
Bet e laru mari kuom odiechiengʼ achiel ber moloyo bet kamachielo kuom higni alufu achiel; daher bedo jarit dhoot e od Nyasacha, moloyo dak e hembe joma timbegi richo.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye en chiengʼ kendo en okumba; Jehova Nyasaye chiwo ngʼwono gi duongʼ; ok otuon joma wuodhgi oriere tir gimoro amora maber.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Maratego, ngʼama ogeno kuomi ogwedhi.

Ne itimo maber ne piny, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; ne iduogone Jakobo mwandune.
Ne iweyone jogi kethogi kendo ne iumo richogi duto. Sela
Mirimbi duto ne iketo tenge, kendo ne ilokori iweyo mirimbi mager.
Dwogwa iri kendo, yaye Nyasaye Jawarwa, kendo gol kecho mikechogo kodwa iter mabor.
Ibiro kecho kodwa nyaka chiengʼ koso? Koso ibiro choro mirimbi e tienge duto?
Angʼo mamoni duogowa iri kendo, mondo eka jogi obed mamor kuomi?
Nyiswa herani ma ok rem, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo mi wayud resruok mari.
Abiro chiko ita ne gima Nyasaye, ma Jehova Nyasaye biro wacho; osingo kwe ne joge ma joratiro, to nyaka gine ni ok gidok e timbe mofuwo.
Adier, resruokne ni machiegni gi joma omiye luor, kendo duongʼne biro bet e pinywa.
Hera gi adiera biro riwore kanyakla, kendo tim makare gi kwe biro nyodhore.
Adiera biro aa piny kochomo malo, kendo tim makare biro ngʼiyo piny gie polo.
Jehova Nyasaye biro miyowa gima ber adier kendo pinywa biro chiego chambe.
Tim makare biro telo nyime kendo biro loso yo ne okangene.
Winj lamona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo dwoka, nimar adhier kendo achando.
Rit ngimana, nikech achiworani. In e Nyasacha, omiyo res ngima jatichni, mogeno kuomi.
Kecha, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar aywakni odiechiengʼ duto.
Mi jatichni obed mamor, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar in ema aketo genona kuomi.
Nikech in iber kendo iweyo richo, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye in gihera mangʼeny kuom joma luongi.
Winj lamona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; chik iti ne ywakna ma akwayigo kech.
Chiengʼ ma chandruok omaka to abiro luongi mondo ikonya, nimar ibiro dwoka.
Onge nyasaye moro amora e dier nyiseche machalo kodi, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye; onge timbe minyalo pimo gi magi.
Ogendini duto michweyo biro lami kapodho e nyimi, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye; bende gibiro miyo nyingi duongʼ.
Nimar iduongʼ kendo itimo timbe miwuoro; in e Nyasaye kende.
Puonja yoreni, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mondo eka awuothi e adierani; miya chuny ma ok ba koni gi koni, mondo omi aluor nyingi.
Abiro paki gi chunya duto, yaye Ruoth Nyasacha, abiro miyo nyingi duongʼ nyaka chiengʼ.
Nimar hera ma iherago duongʼ, kendo isegola ei chuny bur matut.
Josunga ma wengegi tek monja, yaye Nyasaye; migawo mar joma ok kech ngʼato dwaro tieko ngimana, joma ok dew kata in.
In to in Nyasaye ma kecho kendo ngʼwon, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, iyi ok wangʼ piyo, ipongʼ gihera kendo in ja-adiera.
Duog ira mondo ikecha; med jatichni tekoni, kendo res jatichni mogeni.
Miyae ranyisi mar berni, mondo wasika one mi wigi okuodi, nimar in ema isebedo ka ikonya kendo ihoya, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Oseguro mise mare ewi got maler;
Jehova Nyasaye ohero rangeye mag Sayun, moloyo kuonde dak duto mag Jakobo.
Ji wacho gik madongo kuomi, yaye dala maduongʼ mar Nyasaye: Sela
“Abiro kwano Rahab gi Babulon e kanyakla mar joma ongʼeya, nyaka Filistia bende, kod Turo, kaachiel gi Kush kendo abiro wacho ni, ‘Ngʼatni nonywol ei Sayun.’ ”
Adier, nowachi kuom Sayun niya, “En min ogendini mathoth, kendo Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo owuon biro chunge.”
Jehova Nyasaye biro ndiko e kitabu mindikoe nying ogendini kama: “Jali nonywol ei Sayun.” Sela
Sa ma giloso wer to giniwer niya, “Soknina duto ni e iyi.”

Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, in e Nyasacha ma resa, aywagora e nyimi odiechiengʼ gotieno.
Mad lamona chop e nyimi; yie ilok iti ne kwayona.
Nimar chandruok opongʼo chunya kendo ngimana sudo machiegni gi liel.
Ikwana kaachiel gi joma ridore piny ei bur matut; achalo ngʼama onge teko.
Ojwangʼa kaachiel gi joma otho, mana kaka joma onegi monindo e bur, makoro ok ipar kuomgi kendo, joma ongʼad kargi oko e ritni.
Iseketa ei bur matut mogik, ei piny mogik, kama olil ti.
Mirimbi mager ogore kuoma mapek; isetamo wangʼa gi apaka magi duto. Sela
Isemiyo osiepena mane ni machiegni koda mogik oringa, kendo isemiyo koro achalonegi mana koko. Odinna ma ok anyal tony;
wengena ok nen maber nikech kuyo ma an-go. Aluongi odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; achikoni lwetena.
Bende itimo honni magi ne joma otho? Joma otho bende nyalo chier kendo mi paki? Sela
Herani bende inyiso joma ni ei liel; adier, koso adierani bende yudore e kethruok piny?
Timbeni miwuoro bende ongʼere kama otimo mudhono, kata timbeni makare e piny ma ilalieno?
Anto aywakni mondo ikonya, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; lamona chopo e nyimi gokinyi.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, angʼo momiyo idaga kendo ipandona wangʼi?
Aseneno chandruok chakre tin-na mi adwa tho; asewinjo malit nikech thagruok misekelona, kendo chunya oseol.
Mirimbi mager oseywaya; thagruok mimiya osetieka.
Gilwora ka ataro odiechiengʼ duto; gisedinona chuth koni gi koni.
Isemaya osiepena gi joherana; mudho mandiwa ema koro odongʼ machiegni koda kaka osiepna.

Abiro wer nyaka chiengʼ kuom hera maduongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye; abiro nyiso ji gi dhoga mi gingʼe kuom adierani e tienge duto.
Abiro nyiso ratiro ni herani ogurore motegno nyaka chiengʼ; kendo ni ne iguro adierani e polo owuon.
Ne iwacho niya, “Asetimo muma gi ngʼata ma ayiero, asesingora ne Daudi jatichna ni,
‘Anachung kothi nyaka chiengʼ kendo anagur lochni motegno e tienge duto.’ ” Sela
Polo pako timbeni miwuoro kod adierani, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, e dier chokruok mar jomaler.
Koso en ngʼa e kor polo minyalo pimo gi Jehova Nyasaye? En ngʼa e dier chwech mag polo machalo gi Jehova Nyasaye?
E buch jomaler Nyasaye oluor gi luor maduongʼ; olich moloyo chwech duto molwore.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Maratego en ngʼa machalo kodi? In Jehova Nyasaye iratego kendo adierani olwori.
In giteko ewi nam magingore; ka apakane dhwolore malo, to ikweyogi.
Ne ingʼinyo Rahab mana ka kitundu, kendo ne ikeyo wasiki gi badi maratego.
Polo gin magi, kendo piny bende en mari. In ema ne imiyo piny obetie kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye.
Ne ichweyo nyandwat gi milambo; Tabor gi Hermon pako nyingi gi wer gi mor.
In-gi bat maratego, lweti bende otegno, kendo lweti ma korachwich nigi duongʼ.
Tim makare gi adiera e mise mag lochni; hera gi ber otelo e nyimi.
Ogwedh joma osepuonjore goyoni sigio mar mor, jogo mawuotho buti e lerni, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Giil odiechiengʼ duto nikech nyingi; gidhialo timni makare.
Nimar in e duongʼgi gi tekogi, kendo isedhialo tungwa kuom ngʼwononi.
Adier, kuodi marwa en mar Jehova Nyasaye, ruodhwa en mar Jal Maler mar Israel.
Kinde moko ne iwuoyo e yor fweny, mine iwacho ne jogi ma jo-adiera niya, “Asesidho teko kuom jalweny, asemiyo wuowi moro matin duongʼ e dier ji.
Aseyudo Daudi jatichna; asewire gi moya maler.
Lweta biro sire, adier, bada biro miye teko.
Onge ngʼama timbene richo moro amora mane ochune mondo ogolne osuru; onge ngʼama timbene richo moro amora ma nosande.
Abiro tieko chuth joma kedo kode koneno gi wangʼe, kendo abiro goyo wasike duto piny.
Herana mar adier nobed kode, kendo tungene nomi duongʼ nikech nyinga.
Abiro keyo lwete mi kwak nam, kendo lwete ma korachwich biro kwako aore.
Obiro luonga ni, ‘In Wuonwa kendo in Nyasacha, lwandana ma Jawarna.’
Bende abiro ketone nyathina makayo, ma en Jal motingʼ malo moloyo ruodhi duto mag piny.
Abiro siko ka ahere nyaka chiengʼ, kendo winjruok ma atimo kode ok norem mak ochopo ngangʼ.
Abiro guro kothe nyaka chiengʼ, kendo lochne nosiki mana kaka polo osiko.
“Kata ka yawuote nowe chikna ma ok giluwo yorena,
ka ok girito buchena kendo ka chikena otamogi luwo,
to anakum richogi gi luth, kendo anago kethogi gi chwat.
Kata kamano ok anagol herana kuome, bende ok anatimne gima opogore gi adierana.
Ok anawe mak achopo winjruokna kode kata loko gima asewacho gi dhoga.
Asesingora dichiel kendo mogik kuom ler mara, kendo ok abi riambo ne Daudi,
ni kothe nodhi nyime nyaka chiengʼ kendo lochne nosiki e nyima ka wangʼ chiengʼ;
nogure mi osiki nyaka chiengʼ kaka dwe, ma en ranyisi madier e kor polo.” Sela
To in isekwedo, kendo iseweya, iyi osewangʼ matek gi ngʼati mowir.
Iselokori iweyo singruok mane itimo gi jatichni, kendo isechido osimbone ei buru.
Isegoyo ohingane duto piny kendo isemuko kuondege mochiel motegno mi olokore gunda.
Ji duto makalo bute oseyake; osedoko ngʼama jobute nyiero.
Isetingʼo lwedo ma korachwich mar wasike malo; isemiyo wasike duto oil.
Bende isemiyo dho liganglane obedo madik kendo ok isekonye e kedo.
Isemiyo duongʼne orumo kendo isewito lochne piny.
Isengʼado ndalo mag tin-ne odoko machiek; isemiyo oneno wichkuot maduongʼ. Sela
Nyaka karangʼo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye? Ibiro pando wangʼi nyaka chiengʼ koso? Mirimbi biro liel ka mach nyaka karangʼo?
Parie kaka ngimana rumo piyo. Neye kaka ne ichweyo dhano duto kayiem!
En ngʼa manyalo bedo mangima nyaka chiengʼ mak oneno tho? Koso en ngʼa manyalo resore owuon e teko mar liel? Sela
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, tinde ere herani maduongʼ machon, hera mane isingori kuom adierani, ni initim ne Daudi?
Ruoth, parie kaka ji osechayo jatichni, parie kaka atingʼo e chunya ayenje mag ogendini duto,
ayenje ma wasiki osejerogo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ayenje ma gisejarogo okangʼ kokangʼ mar jatichni mowir.
Opak Jehova Nyasaye nyaka chiengʼ! Amin kendo Amin.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, isebedo kar dak marwa nyaka nene e tienge duto.
Kane pok gode obetie kata kane pok ichweyo piny gi ji modak e iye, to isebedo ka in Nyasaye nyaka nene kendo manyaka chiengʼ.
Idwoko dhano e lowo, kiwacho niya, “Doguru e lowo un koth dhano.”
Nimar higni alufu achiel e nyimi chalo gi odiechiengʼ manyoro mosekalo, kata gi sa mar otieno.
Iywoyo dhano ilalgo nono ka nindo mar tho terogi; gichalo gi lum mangʼich mar okinyi,
ma kata obedo ni loth ka ngʼich gokinyi to godhiambo to ner kendo two.
Mirimbi tiekowa kendo kecho mikechogo kodwa bwogowa.
Iseketo richowa e nyimi, ee, richowa ma watimo lingʼ-lingʼ ineno seche duto.
Ndalowa kadho piyo nikech mirimbi; hikwa rumo piyo gi chir.
Ndalowa en piero abiriyo kata piero aboro, ka ringrewa otegno; to kata kamano ndalogo duto opongʼ gi chandruok kod kuyo, nimar gikalo piyo, kendo gilal nono.
En ngʼa mongʼeyo teko mar mirimbi? Nimar gero mari nigi teko machalo gi teko ma luori kelo.
Omiyo puonjwa kwano ndalowa kare, mondo wabed gi chuny mariek.
Ibiro siko kikecho nyaka karangʼo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye? Lokri, kech jatichni.
Romwa gokinyi gi herani ma ok rem, mondo wawer gi ilo kendo wabed mamor ndalowa duto.
Mi wabed mamor amingʼa mana kaka isemiyo waneno malit, marom gi higni ma wasenene chandruok.
Mad tijeni nere gi jotichni, mad duongʼni nyisre ne nyithindi.
Mad ngʼwono mar Ruoth Nyasachwa obed kodwa; yie igurnwa tich mar lwetwa, ee gurnwa tich mar lwetwa.
Ngʼat modak ei kar pondo mar Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo biro yudo yweyo e bwo tipo mar Jehova Nyasaye Maratego.
Ngʼat ma kamano nyalo wacho kuom Jehova Nyasaye niya, “En e kar pondona kendo en e ohingana, en e Nyasacha ma ageno kuome.”
Jehova Nyasaye biro resi adier kuom gik mochikigo mondo ohinyi kendo kuom tuoche maricho maneko.
