Obiro umi gi bwombene, kendo ibiro yudo konyruok e bwo bwombene; adierane biro bedoni ka okumba kendo ka siro.
Ok iniluor masira mar otieno, kata asere machielore godiechiengʼ,
kata tuoche maricho maliwo ji e mudho, kata tho matieko ngima ji e dier odiechiengʼ tir.
Ji alufu achiel nyalo podho e bathi, ee, ji alufu apar nyalo riere e badi korachwich, to in onge moro ma nochop buti.
Iningʼigi angʼiya gi wengeni kendo inine kikumo joma timbegi richo.
Ka iwacho niya, “Jehova Nyasaye e kar pondona,” kendo iketo Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo kar dakni,
to onge gimoro amora marach ma notimreni, kendo onge masira ma nosud machiegni gi odi.
Nimar obiro miyo malaika mage chik nikech in mondo giriti e yoreni duto;
gibiro tingʼi malo e lwetgi, mondo kik ichwany tiendi e kidi.
Ininyon sibuor gi thuond fu; adier ininyon sibuor maratego gi thuol maduongʼ man-gi kwiri marach.
Jehova Nyasaye wacho niya, “Abiro rese nikech ohera; abiro rite nikech ohulo nyinga.
Enoluonga, kendo anadwoke; anabed kode e chandruok, adier, anakonye kendo anamiye duongʼ.
Anami odag amingʼa kendo ananyise warruokna.”

Pako Jehova Nyasaye en gima ber kendo wero wende mapako nyingi bende ber, yaye Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo,
hulo herani gokinyi kod adierani gotieno,
kiwer gi nyatiti matin ma tondene apar ka wer ridore gi nyatiti maduongʼ ber adier.
Nimar timbeni miya mor, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; awer gi mor nikech tije ma lweti otimo.
Mano kaka tijeni dongo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mano kaka pachi tut miwuoro!
Ngʼama omingʼ ok nyal ngʼeyo, joma ofuwo ok winj tiend wachno,
ni kata obedo ni joma timbegi richo nyalo loth kaka lum kendo joricho nyalo dhi maber, to ibiro tiekgi chuth nyaka chiengʼ.
To in, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ibiro siko kimiyi duongʼ nyaka chiengʼ.
Nimar ka kuom adier, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ka kuom adier to wasiki duto biro lal nono; joricho duto ibiro ke mel.
Isemiyo tungena odoko ma roboche ka tunge jowi; oseol kuoma modhi maliw.
Aseneno gi wengena ka iloyo wasika kendo asewinjo gi itena ka joma oramona ma timbegi richo itieko.
Joma kare biro loth maber ka yiend othith, gibiro dongo ka yiend sida mar Lebanon;
Nikech opidhgi e od Jehova Nyasaye, gibiro loth e agolni mag Nyasachwa.
Kata hikgi oniangʼ to pod gininyag mana olemo, kendo ginisik ka ginyien kendo gingʼich,
ka gilando niya “Jehova Nyasaye oriere tir; en e Lwandana, kendo onge richo moro amora kuome.”
Jehova Nyasaye olocho kendo orwakore gi duongʼ, Jehova Nyasaye orwakore gi duongʼ, kendo omanore gi teko. Piny ochungʼ mongirore; onge ngʼama nyalo yienge.
Lochni nogur chon gi lala; ionge chakruokni kata gikoni.
Nembe tingʼore malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nembe dhwolore malo ka giwuo; nembe tingʼore ka apaka gore matek.
Jehova Nyasaye nigi teko maduongʼ moloyo mor mar pige maroteke, en gi teko maduongʼ moloyo apaka ma tekregi ngʼeny, adier Jehova Nyasaye man malo nigi teko maduongʼ.
Bucheni ochungʼ mongirore; kendo ler opongʼo odi, nyaka chiengʼ, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye en Nyasaye ma jachul kuor, yaye Nyasaye ma jachul kuor, nyis lerni.
Aa malo, yaye Jangʼad bura mar piny; chul josunga gima owinjore kodgi.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nyaka karangʼo ma joma timbegi richo, nyaka karangʼo ma joma timbegi richo biro goyo siboi?
Gidiro weche mag wich teko; joma timbegi richo duto opongʼ gi sunga.
Gikidho jogi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; gidiyo girkeni mari.
Ginego dhako ma chwore otho gi jadak; gideyo ngʼama onge gi wuon.
Giwacho niya, “Jehova Nyasaye ok ne; Nyasach Jakobo ok dew gik ma watimo.”
To winjuru, un joma omingʼ e dier ji; un joma ofuwogi, ubiro bedo mariek karangʼo?
Donge ngʼama nochomo it winjo wach? Donge ngʼat manoloso wangʼ neno?
Donge ngʼat marieyo ogendini kumo ji? Bende ngʼat mapuonjo dhano dibed maonge rieko?
Jehova Nyasaye ongʼeyo pach dhano; ongʼeyo ni gionge tich.
Ogwedh ngʼat mikumo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ma en ngʼama ipuonjo koa e chikeni;
imiyo ngʼama kamano resruok e ndalo chandruok, nyaka chop kuny bur ne joma richo.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ok bi dagi joge; ok obi jwangʼo girkeni mare.
Yor adiera biro yudore kendo ne joma kare, kendo joma oriere gie chunygi biro luwe.
En ngʼa mabiro radona gi joma timbegi richo? Ngʼatno mabiro chwaka kakedo gi joricho?
Ka dine Jehova Nyasaye ok omiya kony, to dikoro asedhi dak e piny ma ji olingʼe thi.
Kane awacho niya, “Tienda kier,” to herani nojola, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka achiedh-nade nopongʼo chunya, to hochni noduogo mor e ngimana.
Loch marach bende inyalo riworigo adier, loch mamiyo ji chandore malit nikech chikene maricho?
Ginywako ne joma kare kendo gingʼadone joma onge ketho buch tho.
To Jehova Nyasaye osebedo ohingana, kendo Nyasacha en lwanda ma aponde.
Obiro chulogi nikech richogi kendo obiro tiekogi nikech timbegi maricho; Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa biro tiekogi.
Biuru wawer gimor ne Jehova Nyasaye; wagouru koko matek ne lwanda mar warruokwa.
Wabiuru e nyime gi erokamano kendo wami nyinge duongʼ ka wawer kendo wakok gi mor.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye e Nyasaye maduongʼ, en e Ruoth maduongʼ moloyo nyiseche duto.
Otingʼo kuonde matut duto mag piny e lwete, kendo wi gode ma roboche bende mage.
Nam mare, nimar en ema nolose, kendo lwetene ema noloso lowo motwo.
Biuru wakulrene ka walame, biuru wago chongwa e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Jachwechwa;
nimar en e Nyasachwa kendo wan e joge mokwayo, wan e jambe morito. Kawuono ka uwinjo dwonde,
to kik chunyu bed mapek kaka ne utimo Meriba, kata kaka ne utimo chiengʼ cha Masa manie thim,
kama kwereu noteme gi tem, kata obedo ni ne giseneno gima ne atimo.
Kuom higni piero angʼwen iya nowangʼ gi tiengʼno; kendo nawacho niya, “Gin joma chunygi ohero rwenyo, kendo pok gingʼeyo yorena.”
Omiyo mirima nomaka kodgi mi nasingora ka akwongʼora ni, “Ok ginidonji e yweyona ngangʼ.”
Weruru ne Jehova Nyasaye wer manyien; piny duto mondo ower ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Weruru ne Jehova Nyasaye, pakuru nyinge; landuru warruokne odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ.
Huluru duongʼne e kind ogendini, kendo landuru tijene miwuoro ne ji duto.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ kendo owinjore gi pak; onego omiye luor moloyo nyiseche mamoko duto.
Nikech nyiseche duto mag ogendini gin mana gik ma dhano oloso to Jehova Nyasaye ema nochweyo polo.
Duongʼ kod pak nitiere e nyime; teko kod duongʼ nitiere e kare maler mar lemo.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, yaye ogendini manie piny, wachuru ni Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ kendo en gi teko.
Miuru Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ mowinjore gi nyinge; kelneuru mich kendo biuru e laru mage.
Lamuru Jehova Nyasaye kaka Ngʼama Ler man-gi duongʼ mangʼongo; beduru maluor ahinya e nyime, un piny duto.
Wachuru e dier ogendini niya, “Jehova Nyasaye olocho.” Piny osegur motegno, ok nyal yienge; obiro ngʼado ne ji bura maonge dewo wangʼ.
Polo mondo obed moil, piny mondo obed mamor; nam mondo owuo kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye;
pewe mondo okog gi mor, kod gik moko duto manie igi. Eka yiende duto manie bungu nower gi mor;
giniwer e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, nimar obiro, adier obiro mondo ongʼad ne piny bura. Obiro ngʼado ne piny bura e yo makare, ee, obiro yalo ji gi adierane.
Jehova Nyasaye e Ruoth, omiyo piny mondo obed mamor; dho nembe man mabor mondo obed moil.
Boche polo gi mudho mandiwa oume; tim makare gi adiera e mise mar lochne.
Mach liel e nyime kendo wangʼo wasike e alworane duto.
Mil polo mare menyo piny; piny neno kendo yiengni.
Gode leny nono ka odok e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, gileny nono e nyim Ruoth piny duto.
Polo hulo timne makare, kendo ji duto neno duongʼne.
Ji duto malamo gik mokedi wigi okuot; jogo gin joma sungore kuom nyiseche mopa; nyiseche duto mondo olame!
Sayun nowinjo wachno mi obedo moil, miech Juda bende nobedo mamor, nikech bucheni, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Nimar in Jehova Nyasaye, e Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo mohewo piny duto; iduongʼ kendo iyombo nyiseche mamoko duto mabor.
Joma ohero Jehova Nyasaye mondo osin gi gik maricho nimar orito ngima joge ma jo-adiera, kendo oresogi e lwet joma richo.
Joma kare imenyonegi ler; joma oriere gie chunygi imiyo mor.
Moruru kuom Jehova Nyasaye un joma kare, kendo pakuru nyinge maler.
Weruru ne Jehova Nyasaye wer manyien, nimar osetimo gik miwuoro; lwete korachwich gi bade maler osekelone warruok.
Jehova Nyasaye osemiyo warruokne ongʼere kendo osefwenyone ogendini timne makare.
Oseparo herane kod adierane ne dhood Israel; kuonde duto ma piny ogikie oseneno warruok mar Nyasachwa.
Koguru gi mor ni Jehova Nyasaye, un piny duto, weruru kod ilo gi dwol mamit;
weruru mamit ne Jehova Nyasaye kugoyo nyatiti; werneuru mamit kugoyo nyatiti gi dwond wer molungi,
werneuru gi turumbete kod tung im maywak matek, koguru gi mor e nyim Jehova Nyasaye ma Ruoth.
Nam mondo owuo, kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye, kod piny duto, gi ji duto modak e iye.
Aore mondo opam lwetgi, gode mondo ower kaachiel ka gimor;
onego giwer e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, nimar obiro mondo ongʼad bura ne piny. Obiro ngʼado bura ne piny e yo makare kendo obiro yalo ji maonge dewo wangʼ.
Jehova Nyasaye e Ruoth, ogendini mondo okirni; obet e kom lochne e kind kerubi, piny mondo oyiengni.
Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ miwuoro e Sayun; otingʼe malo moyombo ogendini duto.
Owinjore gipak nyingi maduongʼ kendo miwuoro, nyinge ler.
Ruoth nyalo, ohero bura makare, isechungo adiera; isetimo ne joka Jakobo gima adier kendo makare.
Dhialuru Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kendo lameuru, e tiend kome mobetie nikech oler.
Musa gi Harun ne gin jodolo mage e dier jodolo mamoko, Samuel ne en achiel kuom joma ne luongo nyinge; negiluongo Jehova Nyasaye kendo nodwokogi.
Ne owuoyo kodgi e siro mar bor polo; negirito chikene gi buche mane omiyogi.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, ne idwokogi; ne in Nyasaye maweyo richo ne jo-Israel, kata obedo ni ne ikumo timbegi mobam.
Tingʼuru nying Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kendo lamuru e gode maler, nimar Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ler.
Gouru koko gi mor ne Jehova Nyasaye, un piny duto.
Lamuru Jehova Nyasaye ka umor; biuru e nyime kuwero wende mamor.
Ngʼeuru ni Jehova Nyasaye en Nyasaye. En ema nochweyowa, kendo wan mage; wan joge, kendo wan rombene mokwayo.
Donjuru e rangeyene kugoyo erokamano bende biuru e laru mare kupake. Goneuru erokamano kendo pakuru nyinge.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ber kendo herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ; adierane ochwere e tienge duto.
Abiro wer nikech herani gi berni; in ema abiro weroni wend pak, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Abiro neno ni aritora mondo ngimana obed malongʼo chuth, ibiro biro ira karangʼo? Abiro dak e oda gi chuny malongʼo chuth.
Ok abi yie neno gimoro amora mochido gi wengena. Achayo timbe joma chunygi richo; gik maricho ok adwar winjo kata gi ita.
Ok anabed gi paro mochido; bende kata paro mar timo richo ok anapar.
Ngʼato angʼata makuodho nyawadgi lingʼ-lingʼ abiro kwero mi lingʼ; ngʼato angʼata ma wangʼe tek kendo ma sungore gie chunye, ok anyal betgo amingʼa.
Joma jo-adiera ema abiro keto wengena kuomgi; gin ema abiro yie dak kodgi; ngʼat ma wuodhe oriere tir ema biro tiyona.
Ok abi yiene ngʼama ohero miriambo mondo odag e oda; ngʼat moro amora mawacho miriambo ok nochungʼ e nyima.
Okinyi kokinyi abiro tieko joma timbegi richo modak e piny. Abiro nego ngʼato angʼata matimo richo ka agologi e dala mar Jehova Nyasaye.

Winj lamona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; yie irwak lamona ma akwayigo kony.
Kik ipandna wangʼi sa ma chunya lit. Chikna iti; ka aluongi to dwoka mapiyo.
Nimar ndalona rumo piyo ka iro; chokena rewni ka kit kendo maliet.
Chunya orewore kendo oner ka lum; wiya wil kata mana gi chamo chiemba.
Chur ma achurgo matek omiyo adhero alokora choke lilo.
Achalo gi tula mar bungu, achalo gi tula modak e gunda.
Asiko aneno anena, achalo gi winyo man kende ewi osuri.
Odiechiengʼ duto wasika kinya ka gijara; joma dhawona konyore gi nyinga kaka gir kwongʼruok.
Nimar achamo buch kendo kaka chiemba kendo ariwo mathna gi pi wangʼa,
nikech mirimbi maduongʼ, nimar isekawa mi iwita gichien.
Ndalona chalo gi tipo modhiambo; aner adwaro two ka lum.
In to ibet e kom lochni nyaka chiengʼ, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; humbi osiko e tienge duto.
Ibiro aa malo mi ikech Sayun, nimar sa osechopo monego ongʼwonee; sa mochanne osechopo.
Nimar kitene beyo gi lala ne jotichni, kata mana buru madum kuome miyo ji keche.
Ogendini biro luoro nying Jehova Nyasaye, ruodhi duto mag piny biro luoro duongʼni.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye biro gero Sayun kendo obiro thinyore e lela e duongʼne.
Obiro dwoko lamo mar ngʼama ok nyal kendo ok obi chayo lamogi.
Wachni mondo ondik piny ne tiengʼ mabiro, mondo joma pok onywol opak Jehova Nyasaye:
“Jehova Nyasaye nongʼiyo piny gie kare maler man malo, nongʼiyo piny gie polo,
mondo owinj ywak joma otwe kendo ogony joma ongʼadnegi buch tho.”
Kuom mano nying Jehova Nyasaye ibiro hul e Sayun, ibiro pake e Jerusalem,
ka joma odak e pinjeruodhi ochokore mondo olam Jehova Nyasaye.
Ka noyudo ngimana dhi maber to nomiyo tekona odok chien kendo nongʼado ngimana odoko machiek.
Omiyo ne awacho niya, “Kik ikaw ngimana, yaye Nyasacha, kapod an e chuny ngima; in to isiko ingima nyaka tienge duto.
Kar chakruok ne iketo mise mag piny, kendo polo bende gin tij lweti.
Gin to ginilal nono in to isiko manyaka chiengʼ; giduto giniti mana kaka law ti. Ibiro lokogi kaka iloko law kendo ibiro witgi.
In to isiko ichalri mana kaka in, kendo hiki ok norum.
Nyithind jotichni biro dak buti machiegni; nyikwagi nodhi maber e nyimi.”
Pak Jehova Nyasaye, yaye chunya; chunya maiye duto mondo opak nyinge maler.
Pak Jehova Nyasaye, yaye chunya, kendo kik wiyi wil gi konyruok mochiwo,
en ema oweyoni richoni duto kendo ochango tuocheni duto,
oreso ngimani kogolo e bur matut kendo osidhi gihera kod kech,
oromo chunyi gi gik mabeyo momiyo tin-ni osiko nyien ka mar ongo.
Jehova Nyasaye timo gik makare kendo otimo maber ne joma isando duto.
Nonyiso Musa timbe mane ochano timo, nomiyo jo-Israel oneno timbene.
Jehova Nyasaye kecho ji kendo ongʼwon, iye ok wangʼ piyo kendo en gihera mangʼeny.
Ok osik komanyo ketho kuom ji, bende ok okan mirimbe nyaka chiengʼ;
ok otimnwa mowinjore gi richowa bende ok ochulwa kaluwore gi kethowa.
Nimar kaka polo ni malo moyombo piny, e kaka herane duongʼ ne joma omiye luor;
mana kaka wuok chiengʼ bor gi podho chiengʼ, e kaka osepogowa mabor gi kethowa.
Mana kaka wuoro kecho nyithinde, e kaka Jehova Nyasaye kecho joma omiye luor;
nimar ongʼeyo kaka ochweyowa, ongʼeyo e pache ni wan mana buch lowo.
Dhano to ndalone chalo gi lum, oloth piyo ka maua mopidhi;
to ka yamo okudhe matin nono to kare orumo, kendo ok chak pare.
Hera ma Jehova Nyasaye oherogo joma omiye luor, to osiko manyaka chiengʼ, kendo osiko otimo maber ne nyithind nyithindgi,
ma gin joma orito singruokne kendo jogo maparo mondo orit chikene.
Jehova Nyasaye osechungo lochne e polo, kendo lochne orito ji duto.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, un malaikane duto, un joge maroteke matimo kaka odwaro, kendo matimo kaka owacho.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, un jopolo duto, un jotichne matimo dwarone.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, un gik moko duto mochweyo, manie bwo lochne kuonde duto. Pak Jehova Nyasaye, yaye chunya.
Pak Jehova Nyasaye, yaye chunya. Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Nyasacha, mano kaka iduongʼ, irwakori gi luor kod duongʼ.
Oumore gi ler mana kaka nanga; oyaro polo mana kaka hema
kendo ogero ode moluore ewi pi. Oidho boche polo kaka gache mar lweny kendo yamo e ndike moriembo.
Omiyo yembe bedo kaka jootene, kendo jotichne kaka ligek mach.
Iseguro piny e mise mage; ma ok onyal yiengni kata matin.
Ne iume gi kut mana kaka nanga mi pige obiwore moyombo gode.
To kane ikwero pigego to ne gileny nono, kane giwinji kimor to ne giwalore gia;
ne gimol ewi gode, ka giridore gidhi e holni, kuonde mane ochan-negi.
Ne iketonegi tongʼ ma ok ginyal kadho; mondo kik gichak giim piny kendo.
Jehova Nyasaye miyo sokni olo pi e bugni ka gimol e kind gode.
Gichiwo pi ne le mag bungu duto; kanyna mag bungu tieko riyo ma gin-go.
Winy mafuyo e kor polo ogero utegi e bath pigego, kendo giwer ewi yiende.
Omiyo koth chue ewi gode koa e dalane manie polo; piny nyago olembe moromo nikech tijene.
Omiyo lum loth ne jamni, kod cham ma dhano doyo, mamiyo chiemo yudore e piny;
kaachiel gi divai mamoro chuny dhano, gi mo mamiyo lela wangʼe leny, kod makati molerogo chunye.
Yiende Jehova Nyasaye yudo pi moromogi, yiendego gin sida mag Lebanon mane opidho.
Kanyo ema winy geroe utegi, winj nyamnaha nigi utegi ewi yiende mag obudo.
Diek mag bungu odak e gode maboyo, to lwendni morokore gin kuonde pondo mag aidha.
Dwe pogo kinde mag chwiri gi kinde mag opon kendo wangʼ chiengʼ ongʼeyo sa monego opodhie.
Ikelo mudho mi piny lokre otieno, kendo le mag bungu duto lak oko.
Sibuoche ruto ka gimanyo chiemo; gimanyo chiembgi kuom Jehova Nyasaye.
To ka chiengʼ wuok to gidok e bungu; gidok kendo ginindo e gondegi.
Eka dhano wuok oko chako tijene, kendo nyagore gi tich nyaka odhiambo.
Mano kaka gik michweyo ngʼeny, yaye Jehova Nyasaye! Ne ichweyogi duto gi rieko miwuoro; piny opongʼ gi gik michweyo.
Isechweyo nam maduongʼ kendo malach mopongʼ gi le mamol mathoth mokalo akwana, gik mangima madongo gi matindo.
Kuno ema meli kwangʼie koni gi koni, kendo ondieg nam mane ichweyo miluongo ni Leviathan tuge.
In ema gigo duto ngʼiyi mondo imigi chiembgi e kinde mowinjore.
Ka imiyogi chiemo, to gichamo; ka iyawonegi lweti, to giyiengʼ gi gik mabeyo;
ka ipando wangʼi, to githagore; ka igolo muchi kuomgi, to githo kendo gidok e lowo.
Ka ioro Roho mari, to gibedo mangima; kendo imiyo piny bedo gi ngima manyien.
Mad duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye sik nyaka chiengʼ; mad Jehova Nyasaye bed mamor gi gik mane ochweyo.
En e ma kongʼiyo piny to piny yiengni, kendo komulo gode to gode dhwolo iro.
Abiro wer ne Jehova Nyasaye e ngimana duto, adier, abiro wero wende pak ne Nyasacha e kinde duto ma pod angima.
Mad gik ma aparo e chunya omiye mor, seche duto ma amor kuom Jehova Nyasaye.
Joricho to owinjore orum e piny; joma timbegi richo ok onego obedie piny kata achiel. Pak Jehova Nyasaye, yaye chunya. Pak Jehova Nyasaye.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, luonguru nyinge; landuru ne ogendini duto gima osetimo.
Werneuru, pakeuru gi wende; nyisuru kuom tijene duto miwuoro.
Nyinge maler nigi duongʼ; chuny joma manyo Jehova Nyasaye mondo obed mamor.
Ranguru Jehova Nyasaye gi tekone; dwaruru wangʼe kinde duto.
Paruru gik miwuoro mosetimo, honni mage kod buche mosengʼado,
yaye un nyikwa Ibrahim jatichne, yaye yawuot Jakobo joge moyiero.
En e Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa; buchene ni e piny duto.
Oparo singruokne nyaka chiengʼ, weche mane osingo e tienge tara,
singruok mane otimo gi Ibrahim, Muma mane okwongʼorego ni Isaka.
Ne ogure ne Jakobo kaka chik, kendo nogure ni Israel kaka singruok mochwere, kowacho ni,
“Anamiyi piny Kanaan kaka girkeni mari.”
Kane pod gin ji manok e kar rombgi, ne ginok ahinya kendo ne gin welo e pinyno,
ne giwuotho e kind ogendini mopogore, ka gidhi e pinyruodhi mopogore opogore.
Ne ok oyie mondo ngʼato osandgi; nokwero ruodhi kowachonegi niya,
“Kik umul joga ma awiro; kik uhiny jonabi maga.”
Ne okelo kech e piny kendo noketho yore duto mane giyudogo chiemo;
kendo nooro ngʼato otelonegi, ngʼatno ne en Josef mane oloki kaka misumba.
Ne giridho tiendene gi arungu mochuoye chuma, kendo ne giridho ngʼute gi chumbe,
nyaka nochopo kinde ma gik mane okoro notimore, nyaka wach Jehova Nyasaye nochopo kare.
Ruodh Misri nooro wach mi nogonye jatend ji nogonye thuolo.
Nokete ruodh ode, manorito gik moko duto mane en-go,
mondo en ema ne otieg jotende kaka ohero kendo opuonj jodonge.
Bangʼe Israel duto nobiro Misri; Jakobo nodoko jadak e piny Ham.
Jehova Nyasaye nomiyo joge onya ahinya; nomiyo gibedo mathoth ma wasikgi ne ok nyal nyalogi,
wasikgi ma noloko chunygi mondo ocha joge, kendo noketo chunye mar timo ne jotichne marach.
Nooro Musa jatichne, gi Harun, ngʼat mane oseyiero.
Negitimo ranyisi mag honni e diergi, ee, negitimo timbene miwuoro e piny Ham.
Nooro mudho mi nomiyo piny olil nimar donge ne gisengʼanyo ne wechene?
Noloko pigegi remo, mi nomiyo rechgi otho.
Ogwende nosieko mopongʼo pinygi, kendo negidonjo nyaka ei ute nindo mag ruodhigi.
Nowuoyo, mi pumbi mag lwangʼni nosieko, kendo kikun nopongʼo pinygi.
Nomiyo kodhi olokore pe kendo mil polo nokwako pinygi;
nogoyo yiendegi mag mzabibu gi ngʼowu piny kendo nolwero yiende mane ni e pinygi.
Nowuoyo, mi bonyo nosieko, ongogo mokalo akwana;
negichamo gimoro amora mane loth e pinygi koda ka chambgi mane gipidho e puothegi.
Bangʼe nonego nyithindo makayo duto mane ni e pinygi, kodhi mokwongo duto mane gihango nywolo.
Nogolo Israel, kogangore gi fedha kod dhahabu, kendo onge ngʼama nodongʼ chien kuom dhout Israel duto.
Misri ne mor kane giwuok, nikech mbi mar jo-Israel nosegore kuomgi.
Noumogi gi boche polo kaka raum, kendo mach nochiwonegi ler gotieno.
Kane gikwaye, to nokelonegi aluru kendo noyiengʼogi gi makati mar polo.
Noyawo lwanda, mi pi nowuok gi teko; kendo pigno nomol ka aora mamol e piny motwo.
Nimar noparo singruokne maler mane omiyo Ibrahim jatichne.
Nogolo joge gi ilo, adier, nomiyo joge moyier owuok kakok gi mor;
nomiyogi pinje mag ogendini, kendo gik ma jomoko nono nochandore ka loso nodoko girkeni magi,
mondo omi gilu yorene kendo girit chikene. Pak ne Jehova Nyasaye!
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye! Gouru erokamano ne Jehova Nyasaye, nikech ober; kendo herane osiko manyaka chiengʼ.
En ngʼa manyalo hulo gik madongo ma Jehova Nyasaye osetimo kata manyalo nyiso pakne duto?
Ogwedh joma osiko koluwo adiera, joma osiko katimo gima kare.
An bende parae, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, parae ka itimo ngʼwono ne jogi, bi ikonya ka iresogi,
mondo an bende awinjie maber gi mwandu mimiyo jogi miyiero, mondo ayudie mor mar ogandani, kendo amiyi duongʼ kaachiel gi girkeni mari.
Wasetimo richo mana kaka kwerewa bende notimo; wasetimo marach kendo wasetimo gik mamono.
Kane kwerewa ni Misri, ne ok giparo matut kuom honni magi; bende ne wigi owil gi kechni mathoth, ne gingʼanyoni e dho nam, ma en Nam Makwar.
Kata kamano noresogi nikech nyinge, mondo omi tekone maduongʼ ongʼere.
Nokwero Nam Makwar, mi Nam Makwar notwo; kendo nomiyo gikalo kama tut mana ka gima ne giwuotho kama otwo.
Noresogi e lwet joma ne kedo kodgi, adier, nowarogi e lwet wasigu.
Pi noimo wasikgi; ma kata achiel kuomgi ne ok otony.
Eka ne giyie gi singruok mage kendo ne gipake gi wer.
To ma ok wigi nowil gi gik mane osetimo kendo ne ok girite mondo ongʼadnegi rieko.
Wuoro mokalo tongʼ nomakogi e thim, kendo ne gitemo Nyasaye e piny motwo.
Omiyo ne omiyogi gima negidwaro, to kata kamano nooronegi tuo machiyo del.
Nyiego nomakogi gi Musa e kambi, kendo gi Harun, jatich mowal ni Jehova Nyasaye.
Piny ne oyawore mi nomwonyo Dathan; piny noiko oganda joka Abiram.
Mach nomuoch kuom joma luwogi; mach maliel mager nowangʼo joma timbegi richogo motiekogi pep.
Negiloso nyaroya Horeb, mine gilamo kido molos gi chuma.
Ne giwilo Duongʼ margi gi kido mar rwath machamo lum.
Wigi nowil gi Nyasaye mane oresogi, Nyasaye mane osetimo gik madongo e piny Misri,
Nyasaye mane osetimo honni e piny Ham kod timbe miwuoro e dho Nam Makwar.
Emomiyo nowacho ni nobiro tiekogi ka dine Musa, ngʼate moyiero, we chungʼ kaywagore e nyime mondo ogengʼ mirimbe kik otiekgi.
Bangʼe ne gichayo pinye ma jaber; nikech ne ok giyie singruokne ni en adier.
Ne gingʼur ei hembegi kendo ne ok gitimo gik ma Jehova Nyasaye nochikogi.
Emomiyo ne osingorenegi kosiemogi gi lwete nine obiro miyo gipodhi e thim,
nonyisogi ni ne obiro miyo nyikwagi podhi e kind ogendini, kendo ni ne obiro keyogi e pinje duto.
Ne giriwore kaachiel e lamo Baal mar jo-Peor, kendo negichamo misango michiwone nyiseche motho;
omiyo ne giwangʼo i Jehova Nyasaye gi timbegi marichogo, mi masira nomakogi.
Kata kamano Finehas nochungʼ kargi kendo noywagore ne Nyasaye, mi masirano ne ok otiekogi.
Nyasaye nokwane kaka ngʼama kare nikech timneno, kendo ibiro kwane kamano nyaka tienge mabiro.
Ne giwangʼo i Jehova Nyasaye, e dho sokni mag Meriba, mi timgino nokelone Musa chandruok;
nimar negiketho chunye mi weche maricho nowuok e dhoge.
Ne ok gitieko ogendini chutho kaka Jehova Nyasaye nosechikogi,
to ne giriwore kodgi kendo negiluwo timbegi.
Negilamo kido mag nyisechegi, ma bangʼe nolokorenegi obadho.
Negichiwo yawuotgi gi nyigi kaka misango, kendo negichiwogi ne jochiende.
Ne gichwero remo maonge ketho, remb yawuotgi gi nyigi, mane gichiwo kaka misango ne kido mag nyiseche mag Kanaan, mi piny nogak nikech rembgi.
Negidoko mogak nikech gik mane gitimo; negibedo joma odwanyore, nikech timbegigo.
Emomiyo Jehova Nyasaye nokecho gi joge kendo chunye noa kuom girkeni mare.
Nochiwogi e lwet ogendini, mine gibet e bwo loch joma ne mon kodgi.
Wasikgi nothirogi kendo negiketogi e bwo tekogi.
Ne oresogi nyadi mangʼeny to kata kamano joge noketo chunygi ne ngʼanyo, mi richogi nochiwogi mi girumo.
Kata kamano nokechogi e chandruokgi kane owinjo ywakgi;
nikech noparo singruok mane otimo kodgi kendo noloko chunye nikech herane maduongʼ.
Nochuno ji duto mane oketogi wasumbini mondo okechgi.
Reswa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, kendo chokwa igolwa e dier ogendini, mondo wadwok erokamano ne nyingi maler kendo wabed mamor kwapaki.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, mochwere manyaka chiengʼ. Ji duto mondo owach niya, “Amin!” Opak Jehova Nyasaye.
Gouru erokamano ne Jehova Nyasaye, nimar ober; herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Joma owar mag Jehova Nyasaye mondo owach kama joma ne owaro e lwet jasigu,
mane ochoko kogolo e pinje, kochakore wuok chiengʼ gi podho chiengʼ, nyaka nyandwat gi milambo.
Joge moko nobayo abaya e thim motwo nikech ne gionge yo mar chopo e dala mane ginyalo dakie gi kwe.
Ne gidenyo kendo riyo noloyogi, chunygi noa.
Eka ne giywakne Jehova Nyasaye mondo okonygi e chandruokgino mi noresogi e pekgino.
Ne otelonegi e yo moriere tir, nyaka negichopo e dala, mane ginyalo dakie.
Onego gigo ne Jehova Nyasaye erokamano kuom herane ma ok rem kendo kuom timbene miwuoro, motimo ne ji,
nimar otieko riyo mar joma riyo oloyo kendo omiyo joma odenyo yiengʼ gi gik mabeyo.
Moko kuomgi nobet e mudho, kendo e tipo mar tho, ne gin joma thagore motwe gi nyoroche mag chuma,
nimar ne gingʼanyo giweyo weche Nyasaye kendo ne gichayo rieko mar Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo.
Omiyo noketogi gi tich matek mohewogi mine gigore piny kendo onge ngʼama ne nyalo konyogi.
Eka ne giywakne Jehova Nyasaye mondo okonygi e chandruokgino, mi noresogi e pekgino.
Nogologi e mudho kendo e tipo mar tho kendo noturo nyoroche mane otuegigo.
Onego gigo ne Jehova Nyasaye erokamano kuom herane ma ok rem, kendo kuom timbene miwuoro motimo ne ji,
nimar omuko rangeye mag mula, kendo ongʼado lodi mag nyinyo.
Moko kuomgi nobedo joma ofuwo nikech yoregi mobam kendo negineno thagruok nikech timbegi mamono.
Dhogi ne rach ma ok ginyal chamo chiemo moro amora, kendo ne gichiegni tho.
Eka ne giywakne Jehova Nyasaye mondo okonygi e chandruokgino mi noresogi e pekgino.
Ne ooro wachne mi nochangogi kendo noresogi e lak tho.
Onego gigo ne Jehova Nyasaye erokamano kuom herane ma ok rem kendo kuom timbene miwuoro motimo ne ji.
Onego gichiwne misango mar goyo erokamano kendo ginyis kuom gik mosetimo ka giwer gi mor.
Moko kuomgi nodhi kwangʼ e nam gi meli; ne gin jo-ohala ma yoro nembe madongo dongo.
Negineno tije Jehova Nyasaye, negineno tijene malich miwuoro manie kude.
Nimar ne owuoyo, mi notugo ahiti mangʼongo ma nomiyo apaka ogingore.
Apaka nodirogi malo e kor yamo, kendo nonyumogi kuonde matut mogik; mi chir mane gin-go noleny nono kane ginie masira ma kamano.
Ne gipuore kendo gitagore ka joma omer; kendo pachgi nolalnegi.
Eka ne giywakne Jehova Nyasaye mondo okonygi e chandruokgino mi noresogi e pekgino;
ne okweyo ahiti mobet mos; kendo apaka nolingʼ thi.
Negidoko mamor ka nam nokwe, kendo notelonegi nyaka negichopo e dho wath maber, kama negidwaro chopoe.
Onego gigo ne Jehova Nyasaye erokamano kuom herane ma ok rem kendo kuom timbene miwuoro motimo ne ji.
Onego gitingʼ nyinge malo e chokruok mar joge kendo gidende e buch jodongo.
Ne omiyo aore olokore kuonde motwo, sokni mamol nolokore ongoro,
kendo lowo manyak maber nodoko lowo motimo chumbi, maonge tich nikech timbe mamono mag joma nodak kuondego.
To bende nomiyo piny ongoro odoko yewni mag pi, kendo lowo motwo nolokore sokni mamol;
nokelo joma odenyo mondo odag kuondego, kendo negigero dala kama neginyalo dakie.
Ne gipuro puothe kendo ne gipidho puothe mzabibu, mane ochiego cham maber;
ne ogwedhogi, kendo negidoko ji mangʼeny ahinya, bende ne ok oyie mondo jambgi odog piny.
Bangʼe achien kwan-gi nodok matin kendo ne odwokgi piny nikech sand gi masiche kod kuyo;
Jal ma olo mirimbe kuom ruodhi nomiyo gibayo koni gi koni e thim.
To jochan to noreso e thagruokgi, kendo nomiyo joutegi onya ka rombe.
Joma kare neno kendo gidoko mamor; To joma timbegi richo dhogi moko.
Ngʼama riek mondo omak wechegi maber, kendo opar matut kuom hera maduongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye.

Chunya ochungʼ mongirore, yaye Nyasaye; abiro paki gi wer kendo abiro loso mamit gi chunya duto.
Chiewuru, un orutu gi nyatiti! Abiro chiewo kogwen.
Abiro paki e dier ogendini, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, abiro werni e dier ogendini.
Nikech herani maduongʼ chopo nyaka e polo; kendo adiera mari chopo nyaka ewi lwasi.
Nyingi mondo otingʼ malo moyombo polo, yaye Nyasaye, mad duongʼ mari opongʼ piny duto.
Reswa kendo konywa gi lweti ma korachwich, mondo joma ihero ogol e chandruok.
Nyasaye osewuoyo gie kare maler kowacho niya, “Abiro pogo Shekem ne ji, kendo abiro pimo ne ji Holo mar Sukoth.
Gilead en mara, Manase bende mara, Efraim en oguta mar lweny, to Juda en osimbona mar loch.
Moab en besen mara mar luok, to Edom e kama amoe wuochena; Filistia ema akoke ka aseloyo lweny.”
En ngʼa mabiro kela e dala maduongʼ mochiel motegno? En ngʼa mabiro telona nyaka Edom?
Donge in ema isedagiwa, yaye Nyasaye, kendo tinde ok idhi gi jolwenjwa e lweny?
Miwa kony mondo walo wasikwa, nikech kony mar dhano onge tich.
Wabiro loyo lweny ka Nyasaye nikodwa, kendo obiro nyono wasikwa piny.
Yaye Nyasaye ma apako, kik ilingʼ,
nimar joma timbegi richo gi jo-miriambo osemonja gi wechegi; gisewuoyo kuomwa marach, adier gisewacho miriambo kuoma.
Gilwora koni gi koni gi weche mag achaya; gibuka maonge gima omiyo.
An aherogi to gin to gimon koda. Gitimona kamano kata obedo ni an to alemonegi.
Gichula rach kar ber, kod achaya kar osiep.
Ket ngʼat marach mondo oked kod jasika; we jadonj ne ji mondo ochungʼ kode e bura.
Kiyale to mi mondo oyude gi ketho, kendo kata lemo molamo onego onyis kethone.
Mad ngʼad ndalone dok manok; kendo mad ngʼat machielo kaw tije.
Mad nyithinde dongʼ kiye kendo chiege dongʼ dhako ma chwore otho.
Mad nyithinde lokre jokwecho mabayo abaya; mad riembgi gia koda ka e miechgi mosekethore.
Mad jagope moro mak gige duto ma en-go kendo mad joma welo oyak mwandu duto moseloso.
Onego ngʼato kik timne ngʼwono kata kecho nyithinde modongʼ kiye.
Kothe duto mondo kargi olal nono, kendo nying-gi oruchi kik bedi e tiengʼ mabiro.
Mad Jehova Nyasaye sik kaparo richo mane wuonegi otimo; kendo mad richo min kik ruchi.
Richogi mondo osiki e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, eka mondo ongʼad kargi oko chuth e piny.
Nimar kane ongima to ne ok odewo timo ngʼwono, kar timo kamano to nosando jodhier, kaachiel gi joma ochando gi joma chunygi lit; nosandogi malit nyaka ne githo.
Nohero kwongʼo ji to koro mad kwongʼneno dogne; ne ok ohero gwedho ji omiyo koro mad gweth bed mabor kode.
Ne orwako kwongʼ ka nangane; mad kwongʼno koro donji e dende ka pi, mad gibud chokene ka mo.
Mad ochal nanga moumogo dende duto, kata kamba motweyego nyaka chiengʼ.
Mano ema mondo obed chudo, ma Jehova Nyasaye chulo joma donjona; mano e kaka onego otim ne joma wuoyo marach kuoma.
To in, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, timna maber nikech nyingi; konya nikech ber mar herani.
Nimar adhier kendo achando, kendo chunya winjo marach e iya.
Ndalona rumo mos mos ka tipo mar odhiambo kendo yamo uka ka det bonyo.
Chongena onyosore nikech onge gima acham, kendo adhero alokora choke lilo.
Alokora gima ijaro ne joma donjona; ka ginena to gitwenyona umgi ka gigoyona siboi.
Konya, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Nyasacha, resa kaluwore gi herani.
Mi mondo gingʼe ni achal kama nikech lweti, mi gingʼe ni lweti ema osetime, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Gin ginyalo kwongʼa to angʼeyo ni in ibiro gwedha; ka gimonja to ibiro kuodo wigi, to jatichni to biro bedo mamor.
Wichkuot maduongʼ biro mako joma donjona kendo gibiro rwako wichkuot ka kandho.
Abiro dhialo Jehova Nyasaye malich gi dhoga; abiro pake e dier oganda maduongʼ.
Nimar ochungʼ e bat korachwich mar ngʼat mochando, mondo ores ngimane kuom joma ngʼadone buch tho.
Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Ruodha kama: “Bed e bada korachwich, nyaka chop aket wasiki e bwo tiendi.”
Jehova Nyasaye biro yaro lochni chakre Sayun; ibiro bedo gi loch e dier wasiki.
Jokedo magi biro bedo gi chuny moikore; gibiro riedo gokinyi kogwen gi duongʼ mamalo, kendo tekri nomedre odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ mana ka tho momoko e lum gokinyi.
Jehova Nyasaye osekwongʼore kendo ok nolok pache, osesingore niya, “In jadolo nyaka chiengʼ, koluwo kit dolo mar Melkizedek.”
Jehova Nyasaye ni e badi ma korachwich obiro loyo ruodhi chiengʼ ma mirimbe otuk.
Obiro ngʼado bura ne ogendini, mi opiel joma otho achana-achana kotieko jotelo duto mag piny.
Obiro modho e aora matin manie bath yo, emomiyo noyud teko mi otingʼ wiye.
Pak ne Jehova Nyasaye! Abiro miyo Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ gi chunya duto, abiro miye duongʼ e buch joma kare kendo e dier chokruok.
Tije Jehova Nyasaye dongo adier; joma mor kodgi osiko kaparo kuomgi.
Timbene nigi duongʼ kod luor, kendo timne makare osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Omiyo waparo kuom honni mage; nikech Jehova Nyasaye ngʼwon kendo okecho ji.
Ochiwo chiemo ne joma omiye luor, kendo oparo singruok mare nyaka chiengʼ.
Osenyiso joge tekre kuom gik motimo komiyogi lope mag ogendini moko.
Tije motimo gi lwetene nikare kendo beyo kendo buchene duto inyalo geno.
Gingirore kendo ok gilokre mochwere manyaka chiengʼ, nikech osetimgi gi adiera kendo moriere.
Ne ochiwo warruok ne joge, kendo ne oguro singruokne mosiko; nyinge ler kendo lich miwuoro.
Luoro Jehova Nyasaye e chakruok mar rieko; ji duto moluwo buchene nigi winjo maber. En kende ema owinjore yudo pak manyaka chiengʼ.
Pak ne Jehova Nyasaye! Ogwedh ngʼama oluoro Jehova Nyasaye, kendo marito chikene gi mor.
Nyithinde nobed joma roteke e piny; ee, koth joma ngimagi oriere tir ibiro gwedhi.
Pith gi mwandu yudore e ode, kendo timne makare osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Ngʼama ngimane oriere ler rienyne kata gotieno, ngʼat mangʼwon, ma kecho ji kendo makare.
Ngʼama ngʼwon ma holo ji gige gi chuny maler biro neno ber ngʼat matiyo tijene gi adiera.
Adier, onge gima nyalo yienge, ngʼat makare ibiro par nyaka chiengʼ.
Ok oluoro weche makelo kuyo nikech chunye otegno kendo ogeno kuom Jehova Nyasaye.
Chunye ok chandre kendo oonge gi luoro moro amora; ongʼeyo ni obiro neno ka olo wasike ka en to olocho.
Gisepogo gigegi ne joma odhier, bergi osiko nyaka chiengʼ; duongʼne gi luor ma ji oluorego, biro siko nyaka chiengʼ.
Ngʼama timbene richo biro nene mi iye wangʼ, obiro mwodo lekene kendo obiro chiyore morum; gik ma ngʼama timbene richo gombo ni otimrene ok bi timorene ngangʼ.
Opak Jehova Nyasaye! Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, yaye un jotichne, pakuru nying Jehova Nyasaye.
Nying Jehova Nyasaye mondo opaki, sani kendo nyaka chiengʼ.
Nying Jehova Nyasaye onego opaki, chakre kuma chiengʼ wuokie, nyaka kuma opodhoe.
Jehova Nyasaye nigi duongʼ moyombo ogendini duto, kendo duongʼne maler oyombo polo.
En ngʼa machalo gi Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, Jal mobet e kom loch kuma bor,
kendo makulore piny mondo ongʼi polo gi piny?
Otingʼo joma odhier malo kogolo piny e lowo; adier, ogolo joma ochando e pidh buru,
kendo oketogi gibet kaachiel gi ruodhi, mi kwan-gi kaachiel gi jotend jogi.
Omiyo dhako ma migumba bedo gi ode mi obed miyo mamor man-gi nyithinde. Opak Jehova Nyasaye!
Kane jo-Israel owuok Misri, ee, kane joka Jakobo owuok e kind joma wacho dhok mopogore,
Juda nodoko kama ler mar lemo mar Nyasaye, kendo Israel nobedo mwandune owuon.
Nam nonenogi mi oa gi ngʼwech, kendo Jordan ne odar oweyonigi piny,
gode nolengʼore ka imbe, to thuche to nochikore ka nyirombe.
Angʼo momiyo ne ia gi ngʼwech, yaye nam? Yaye Jordan, ne idar iweyonegi piny nangʼo?
To un gode to ne ulengʼoru ka imbe nangʼo? Koso thuche to nochikore ka nyirombe nikech angʼo?
Yaye piny, yiengni ka Ruoth Nyasaye ni machiegni kodi, yiengni e nyim Nyasach Jakobo,
Nyasaye mane omiyo lwanda olokore pi mogudore, kendo mane omiyo lwanda matek olokore sokni mag pi.
Ok wan, ok wan, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, to In ema nyingi oyud duongʼ, nikech herani kod adierani.
Angʼo momiyo ogendini penjo niya, “Nyasachgino ere?”
Nyasachwa ni e polo; otimo gimoro amora mohero.
To nyisechegi mopa gin fedha gi dhahabu, molos gi lwet dhano.
Gin gi dhogi, to kata kamano ok ginyal wuoyo, gin gi wenge to ok ginyal neno gimoro.
Gin gi it, to ok ginyal winjo wach, kendo gin gi um, to ok ginyal ngʼwecho.
Gin gi lwetegi, to ok ginyal mulo, kendo gin gi tiende to ok ginyal wuotho, bende ok ginyal kata temo loso gi dwondgi.
Joma losogi nobed machal kodgi, kendo joma oketo genogi kuomgi bende biro chalo kodgi.
Yaye dhood jo-Israel, genuru kuom Jehova Nyasaye, En e konyruokgi kendo okumbagi.
Yaye dhood joka Harun, genuru kuom Jehova Nyasaye, En e konyruokgi kendo okumbagi.
Un joma omiyo Jehova Nyasaye luor, keturu genou kuome, En e konyruokgi kendo okumbagi.
Jehova Nyasaye parowa kendo obiro gwedhowa; obiro gwedho dhood Israel, obiro gwedho dhood joka Harun,
obiro gwedho joma oluoro Jehova Nyasaye, ji ajia kod joma igeno.
Mad Jehova Nyasaye mi imedri, in kaachiel gi nyithindi.
Mad iyud gweth moa kuom Jehova Nyasaye, jachwech polo gi piny.
Polo malo mogik en mar Jehova Nyasaye, to piny to osechiwo ne dhano.
Joma osetho ok ema pak Jehova Nyasaye, joma oseiki molingʼ thi e bur ok pake;
en wan ema wadendo Jehova Nyasaye tinende kendo nyaka chiengʼ. Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye!
Ahero Jehova Nyasaye nikech nowinjo kwayona; nowinjo ywakna kane adwaro kech.
Nikech ne ochikona ite, abiro luonge kinde duto ma angima.
Tonde mag tho norida, lit mar liel nochopona, kendo chandruok gi chuny lit noloya.
Eka naluongo nying Jehova Nyasaye, ne aywakne niya, “Resa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye!”
Jehova Nyasaye ngʼwon kendo timo maber; Nyasachwa opongʼ gi kech.
Jehova Nyasaye rito joma chunygi obolore; kane an-gi chando maduongʼ to ne oresa.
Bed abeda mos, yaye chunya, nimar Jehova Nyasaye osebedo katimoni maber ndalo duto.
Nimar in ema isegolo chunya e tho, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, wengena bende isereso e ywak, kendo tiendena isegengʼo mondo kik okier,
isetimo kamano mondo awuothi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, e piny joma ngima.
Ne ayie; emomiyo ne awacho niya, “Sand oromo chunya.”
Kendo kane achiedh-nade omaka, to ne awacho niya, “Dhano duto riambo.”
Ere kaka dachul Jehova Nyasaye kuom berne duto mosetimona?
Abiro tingʼo okumba mar warruok malo kendo abiro luongo nying Jehova Nyasaye.
Abiro chopo singruokga ma asetimo ne Jehova Nyasaye e nyim ji duto.
Tho mar nyithind Nyasaye en gima ber miwuoro e nyim Jehova Nyasaye.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, an jatichni adier; an jatichni, ma wuod jatichni ma nyako; isegonya mi igola e nyorochena.
Abiro timoni misango mar erokamano kendo abiro luongo nying Jehova Nyasaye.
Abiro chopo singruokga ma asetimo ne Jehova Nyasaye e nyim ji duto,
abiro chopogi e lache mag od Jehova Nyasaye abiro timogi e iyi, yaye Jerusalem. Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye!
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, un ogendini duto; dendeuru, un ji duto manie piny.
Nimar hera moherowago duongʼ, kendo adierane osiko nyaka chiengʼ. Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye.
Gouru erokamano ne Jehova Nyasaye, nimar ober; kendo herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Jo-Israel mondo owach niya, “Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.”
Jo-dhood Harun mondo owach niya, “Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.”
Joma oluoro Jehova Nyasaye mondo owach niya, “Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.”
Ne aywak ne Jehova Nyasaye kane chunya lit, kendo ne odwoka mine ogonya thuolo.
Jehova Nyasaye ni koda, omiyo ok analuor. Ere gima dhano ditimna?
Jehova Nyasaye ni koda; en e Jakonyna. Abiro neno gi wangʼa ka olo wasika.
Ber pondo kuom Jehova Nyasaye moloyo geno kuom dhano.
Ber pondo kuom Jehova Nyasaye moloyo geno kuom ruodhi.
Ogendini duto nolwora koni gi koni, to ne atiekogi e nying Jehova Nyasaye.
Ne gilwora koni gi koni, to ne atiekogi e nying Jehova Nyasaye.
Ne ginur kuoma ka kich, to ne githo ka mach ma wangʼo kudho; mine atiekogi e nying Jehova Nyasaye.
Ne gidhira gichien kendo ne achiegni podho, to Jehova Nyasaye nokonya.
Jehova Nyasaye e tekra kendo en e wenda; osedoko warruok mara.
Koko mag mor gi mag loch winjore ei hembe mag joma kare kama: “Lwet Jehova Nyasaye ma korachwich osetimo gik madongo!
Lwet Jehova Nyasaye ma korachwich otingʼ malo; lwet Jehova Nyasaye ma korachwich osetimo gik madongo!”
Ok abi tho, abiro bedo mangima; abiro bedo mangima modo ahul gik ma Jehova Nyasaye osetimo.
Jehova Nyasaye osegoya modwa nega, to kata kamano pok oweyo tho onega.
Yawna rangeye mag tim makare; mondo adonji kendo ago erokamano ne Jehova Nyasaye.
Mano e dhoranga Jehova Nyasaye ma joma kare nyalo donjogo.
Abiro goyoni erokamano, nikech ne idwoka; mi idoko warruokna.
Kidi mane jogedo odagi koro osedoko kidi moriwo kor ot;
Jehova Nyasaye ema osetimo mano kendo en gima iwuoro ka waneno.
Ma en odiechiengʼ ma Jehova Nyasaye oseloso; wamoruru kendo wail e iye.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, reswa yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mi walochi.
Ogwedh ngʼat mabiro gi nying Jehova Nyasaye. Wagwedhi gie od Jehova Nyasaye.
Jehova Nyasaye en Nyasaye, kendo osemiyo lerne orieny kuomwa. Riwreuru gi oganda moriedo katimo nyasi, nyaka uchopi e tunge mag kendo mar misango.
In Nyasacha, omiyo abiro goyoni erokamano; in Nyasacha omiyo abiro miyi duongʼ.
Gouru erokamano ne Jehova Nyasaye, nimar ober; herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Ogwedh joma yoregi ler, mawuotho koluwore gi chik Jehova Nyasaye.
Ogwedh joma orito chikene kendo ma manye gi chunygi duto.
Gin joma ok tim gimoro amora marach, to gisiko ka giwuotho e yorene.
Iseguro chikeni ni nyaka lu kaka gin.
Yaye, mad ne bed ni yorena ogurore e luwo chikeni!
Dine ok aneno wichkuot nikech aketo chunya e chikeni duto.
Kaka amedo puonjora chikeni makare e kaka abiro dhi nyime gi paki gi chuny moriere tir.
Abiro rito chikeni; omiyo kik ijwangʼa chuth.
Ere kaka ngʼama pod tin nyalo rito ngimane mondo osik ka oler? Onyalo rito mana ka odak moluwore gi wachni.
Amanyi gi chunya duto; omiyo kik iwe abar awe chikeni.
Asekano wachni ei chunya mondo kik akethi e nyimi.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mad iyud pak; yie ipuonja chikeni.
Aolo gi dhoga chike duto mowuok e dhogi.
Luwo chikeni mora mana kaka ngʼato bedo mamor kuom mwandu duto.
Abiro paro matut kuom chikeni kendo abiro tego wengena e yoreni.
Amor ahinya gi chikeni; ok abi jwangʼo wachni.
Tim maber ne jatichni, eka abiro bedo mangima kendo abiro rito chikeni.
Yaw wengena mondo eka ane gik mabeyo miwuoro manie chikeni.
An mana wendo e piny omiyo kik ipandna chikeni.
Chunya opongʼ kod siso mar chikeni kinde duto.
Ikwero joma ochayo ji, ma gin joma okwongʼ, kendo gin joma osebaro oweyo chikeni.
Gol kuoma ajara gi achaya nimar arito chikeni.
Kata obedo ni jotelo chokorena kendo giyanya, to jatichni pod biro mana paro matut kuom chikeni.
Chikeni e morna; gin e jongʼad rieko maga.
Osepiela ei lowo piny; omiyo rit ngimana kaluwore gi wachni.
Kane ahulo yorena to ne idwoka; puonja chikeni.
Mi awinj tiend gik ma chikegi puonjo; eka abiro paro matut kuom timbegi miwuoro.
Kuyo onyoso chunya, omiyo meda teko kaluwore gi wachni.
Gengʼa kik adonji e yore mag miriambo, kendo ngʼwon-na ka ipuonja chikni.
Aseyiero yor adiera; kendo aseketo chunya e chikeni.
Amako chikeni matek, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, omiyo kik iwe ane wichkuot.
Yor chikeni ema aringe, nimar isegonyo chunya.
Puonja mondo alu yoreni, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, eka abiro ritogi nyaka giko.
Miya rieko mondo eka arit chikeni kendo atim kaka owacho gi chunya duto.
Taya e yo mar chikeni, nimar kanyo ema ayudoe mor.
Ket chunya mondo oher chikeni, to ok dwaro maga mag wuoro.
Gol wangʼa oko kuom gik manono; rit ngimana kaluwore gi wachni.
Chop singruok mari ne jatichni, mondo ji oluori.
Golna achaya ma aluoro, nimar chikeni beyo.
Mano kaka ahero yoreni! Rit ngimana e timni makare.
Mad herani ma ok rem bina, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mad warruokni bina kaluwore gi singruokni.
Eka abiro dwokora gi ngʼat ma timona anyali, nimar ageno kuom wachni.
Kik igol wach mar adiera e dhoga chuth, nimar aseketo genona e chikeni.
Abiro rito chikeni ndalo duto, manyaka chiengʼ.
Abiro wuotho ka an thuolo, nimar chikeni ema asebedo ka amanyo.
Abiro wuoyo kuom chikeni e nyim ruodhi kendo wiya ok bi kuot,
nimar amor gi chikeni nikech aherogi.
Atingʼo bedena malo ne chikeni ma ahero kendo asiko aparo matut kuom yoreni.
Par wachni mane iwacho ne jatichni, nimar isemiya geno.
Gima hoya e chandruokna en ma: ni singruokni rito ngimana.
Joma ochayo ji jara ma ok obadhogi to kata kamano ok alokra awe chikeni.
Asiko aparo chikeni mosebedo ka nitie nyaka nene, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo ayudo hoch kuomgi.
Mirima mager omaka nikech joma timbegi richo, mosejwangʼo chikeni.
Chikeni e thoro mar wenda, kamoro amora ma abwore.
Aparo nyingi gotieno, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo abiro rito chikni.
Ma osebedo timna, nimar asebedo ka arito yoreni.
In e pokna, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; asesingora ni abiro rito chikeni.
Asemanyo wangʼi gi chunya duto; ngʼwon-na kaluwore gi singruok mari.
Asenono yorena kendo asechiko yorena mondo oluw yoreni.
Abiro reto kendo ok abi deko mar rito chikeni.
Kata obedo ni joma timbegi richo orida gi tonde, to wiya ok bi wil gi chikeni.
Achiewo dier otieno mondo aduokni erokamano kuom chikeni makare.
An osiep ji duto moluori, jogo duto moluwo yoreni.
Piny opongʼ gi herani, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; yie ipuonja chikeni.
Tim maber ne jatichni kaluwore gi wachni, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Puonja ngʼeyo gi paro maber, nimar ayie kuom chikeni.
Kane pok ayudo masira to ne abayo yo, to sani koro atimo gima wachni owacho.
Iber, kendo gima itimo ber; omiyo puonja chikeni.
Kata obedo ni joma ochayo ji osemiena gi miriambo, to pod arito yoreni gi chunya duto.
Chunygi tek kendo ok dew gimoro amora; to an to chikni miya mor.
Ne en gima ber mondo ayud chandruok mondo eka apuonjra chikeni.
Chik moa e dhogi berna moloyo ngʼinjo gana gi gana mag fedha gi dhahabu.
Lweti ema nochweya; miya ngʼeyo mondo apuonjra chikeni.
Mad joma oluori bed mamor ka ginena, nimar aseketo genona e wachni.
Angʼeyo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ni chikeni nikare, kendo angʼeyo ni chwat misechwadago nikare.
Mad ihoya gi herani ma ok rem, kaluwore gi singruok mane imiyo jatichni.
Orna kechni mondo abed mangima, nimar chikni e morna.
Mad joma ochayo ji ne wichkuot kuom kwinya maonge gima omiyo, an to abiro paro matut kuom yoreni.
Mad joma oluori dog jokora, kaachiel gi joma ongʼeyo bucheni.
Mad chunya bed maonge ketho, kuom rito chikeni, mondo kik ane wichkuot.
Riyo mar dwaro warruokni oloyo chunya, kata kamano aseketo genona e wachni.
Wengena ool kamanyo singruokni; apenjora niya, “Ibiro hoya karangʼo?”
Kata obedo ni achalo pien tingʼo divai molier e iro, to wiya pok owil gi chikeni.
Jatichni biro rito nyaka karangʼo? Ibiro kumo joma sanda karangʼo?
Joma ochayo ji osekunyona buche mondo apodhie, gitimo gima chikni okwedo.
Chikeni duto inyalo geno; omiyo yie ikonya, nikech ji sanda maonge gima omiyo.
Ne gichiegni yweya oko e piny, to kata kamano pok aweyo chikeni.
Rit ngimana kaluwore gi herani, mondo alu chike mowuok e dhogi.
Wachni ochwere, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; ochungʼ mogurore e polo.
Adiera mari ochwere e tienge duto; mana kaka ne iguro piny mi piny osiko.
Chikeni osiko nyaka kawuono, nimar gik moko duto tiyoni.
Ka dine bed ni chikeni ok ema miya mor, to dikoro aselal nono nikech masichena.
Wiya ok bi wil gi bucheni, nimar gin ema iseritogo ngimana.
Resa nimar an mari; nikech asiko amanyo chikeni ndalo duto.
Joma timbegi richo obutona mondo gitieka, to abiro bet mos ka aparo kuom chikeni.
Angʼeyo ni koda ka gik malongʼo chuth nigi gikogi, to chikeni onge gikogi.
Yaye, mano kaka ahero chikni! Aparo kuome odiechiengʼ duto.
Chikeni miyo abedo mariek moloyo wasika, nimar gisiko gin koda seche duto.
An gi winjo moloyo jopuonjna duto, nimar arito chikeni.
Wach donjona moloyo jodongo machon nimar arito chikeni.
Asetamo tiendena ni kik wuothi e yore maricho, mondo eka atim gima wachni ochiko.
Pok abaro aweyo chikeni, nimar in iwuon ema isepuonja.
Mano kaka wechegi mit ka abilogi, gimit e dhoga moloyo mor kich!
Chikeni miyo abedo gi winjo; emomiyo achayo yo moro amora marach.
Wachni e taya mar tienda kendo en ler mamenyona yo.
Asekwongʼora mi aketo sei ni abiro siko kaluwo chikeni makare.
Asechandora moloyo; omiyo rit ngimana, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kaluwore gi wachni.
Rwak pak ma achiwoni gi dhoga ka ahero, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo puonja chikeni.
Kata obedo ni atingʼo ngimana e lweta kinde duto, to wiya ok bi wil gi chikeni.
Joma timbegi richo osechikona obadho; to kata kamano pok abaro aweyo bucheni.
Chikeni e girkeni mara manyaka chiengʼ; gin e mor mar chunya.
Aketo chunya kuom rito chikeni ma ok aweyo nyaka giko.
Achayo joma pachgi ariyo, to ahero chikni.
In e ohingana kendo okumbana; omiyo aseketo genona e wachni.
Ayiuru buta, un jorichogi, mondo arit chike mag Nyasacha!
Maka motegno kaluwore gi singruokni, eka anabed mangima; kik iwe geno ma an-go lalna.
Sira eka ananwangʼ konyruok; abiro siko ka ahero chikeni.
Idagi ji duto mabaro weyo chikeni, nimar wuondruok ma giwuondorego en kayiem.
Joma timbegi richo duto modak e piny ipuko oko ka yugi; emomiyo ahero chikeni.
Denda tetni nikech oluori, kihondko omaka nikech chikeni.
asetimo gima kare kendo madier, omiyo kik iweya e lwet joma sanda.
Ne ni jatichni dhi maber, kendo kik iyie joma ochayo ji osanda.
Wengena ool karango resruok mikelo, kendo kamanyo gima kare mane isingona.
Timne jatichni kaluwore gi herani, kendo puonja chikeni.
An jatichni, omiyo yie imiya nyalo mar ngʼeyo gik mopondo eka awinj tiend chikeni.
Sa oromo mondo koro itim gimoro, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech iketho chikni.
Nikech ahero chikeni moloyo dhahabu, kendo moloyo dhahabu maler mogik,
kendo nikech akawo bucheni duto ni nikare, omiyo achayo yo moro amora marach.
Chikeni lich miwuoro; emomiyo aritogi.
Wachni koler tiende to kelo ler, omiyo joma riekogi tin bedo gi winjo.
Ayawo dhoga kendo agamo yweyo, ka agombo chikeni.
Lokri iranga mondo ikecha, kaka ijatimo ndalo duto ne joma ohero nyingi.
Ket okangega mondo gilure gi wachni; kik iwe richo moro amora loya.
Resa e dicho ma ji diyogo jowetegi, mondo eka arit bucheni.
Ngʼi jatichni gi wangʼ maber kendo puonja chikeni.
Pi wangʼ bubni kawuok e wengena, nimar chikni ok ji orito.
In ngʼat makare, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo chikeni nikare.
Chike misendiko nikare, inyalo genogi chuth.
Hera matut ma aherogo wachni tieka, nimar wasika ok dew wachni.
Singruok magi osetem maber chuth, omiyo jatichni oherogi.
Kata obedo ni an chien kendo ji ochaya, to wiya ok nyal wil gi bucheni.
Timni makare osiko kendo chikni en adier,
Chandruok kod malit osebirona, kata kamano chikeni e morna.
Chikeni nikare nyaka chiengʼ, omiyo miya ngʼeyo mondo abed mangima.
Yie idwoka, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech aywakni gi chunya duto kendo abiro timo kaka chikni dwaro.
Aywakni, yie ikonya, eka abiro rito chikeni.
Achiewo kogwen ka piny pok oyawore kendo aywagora mondo ayud kony; aseketo genona e wachni.
Wengena neno otieno duto, mondo omi apar matut kuom singruok magi.
Winj dwonda kaluwore gi herani; rit ngimana, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kaluwore gi chikeni.
Joma chanona gik maricho ni koda machiegni, kata kamano gin mabor gi chikni.
In to in machiegni, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo chikeni duto gin adier.
Ne apuonjora kuom chikeni chon gi lala, ni ne igurogi mondo gisiki nyaka chiengʼ.
Ne chandruokna mondo ikonya, nimar pok wiya owil gi chikni.
Dog jakora mondo iresa, rit ngimana kaluwore gi singruokni.
Warruok ni mabor gi joma timbegi richo, nimar ok giket chunygi kuom dwaro chikeni.
Ngʼwononi duongʼ, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; rit ngimana kaluwore gi chikeni.
Wasigu masanda thoth adier, to kata kamano pok abaro aweyo chikeni.
Arango joma onge yie ka chunya ochido kodgi, nimar ok girit chikni.
Neye kaka ahero bucheni; omiyo rit ngimana, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kaluwore gi herani.
Wechegi duto gin adier; kendo chikegi makare duto ochwere.
Jotelo sanda maonge gima omiyo, to kata kamano chunya oluoro wachni.
Singruokni miya mor, mana ka ngʼama oyudo mwandu maduongʼ mope wasigu.
Asin kendo ajok gi miriambo, to ahero chikni.
Apaki ndalo abiriyo e odiechiengʼ achiel kuom chikegi makare.
Joma ohero chikeni nigi kwe maduongʼ kendo onge gima nyalo miyo gichwanyre.
Arito warruokni, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo aluwo chikeni.
Atimo gima chikeni dwaro, nimar aherogi gihera maduongʼ.
Arito bucheni gi chikeni, nimar yorega duto ongʼereni maber.
Mad ywakna chopi e nyimi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; mi abed gi winjo kaluwore gi wachni.
Mad kwayona chopi e nyimi, resa kaluwore gi singruokni.
Mad dhoga pongʼ gi pak, nimar isepuonja chikeni.
Mad lewa wer kuom wachni, nimar chikegi duto nikare.
Mad lweti ikre mar konya, nimar aseyiero bucheni.
Asedwaro resruok mari matek, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; kendo chikni e morna.
We amed bedo mangima mondo apaki, kendo mad chikeni okonya.
Aserwenyo ka rombo molal, omiyo yie imany jatichni, nimar wiya pok owil gi chikeni.
Ka an e chandruok to aluongo Jehova Nyasaye, kendo odwoka,
Resa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kuom dho joma riambo kendo kuom lew joma wuondore.
Bende ingʼeyo gima Nyasaye biro timoni, bende ingʼeyo gik mochomi adier, yaye lep mawuondore?
Obiro kumi gi aserni mabitho mag jakedo, ee, obiro wangʼi gi maka maliel mager, mowangʼ gi yiend adugo.
Malit ochoma adier nikech adak Meshek, hapa rach nikech adak e dier hembe mag Kedar!
Asedak amingʼa ahinya, e dier joma ok dwar kwe.
An ngʼat kwe; to ka awuoyo, to giikore ni lweny.
Atingʼo wangʼa ka arango gode, ere kuma konyruokna biro aye?
Konyruokna aa kuom Jehova Nyasaye, Jachwech polo gi piny.
Ok obi weyo tiendi kier, Jal ma riti ok bi nur;
adier, Jal marito Israel ok nur kendo ok nindi.
Jehova Nyasaye riti, Jehova Nyasaye e tipo moumi gi yo badi korachwich;
omiyo chiengʼ ok nochami godiechiengʼ kendo dwe ok notimi gimoro gotieno.
Jehova Nyasaye biro riti mondo gimoro amora kik ohinyi.
Jehova Nyasaye biro riti kidonjo kendo kiwuok, obiro timo kamano sani kendo nyaka chiengʼ.
Ne amor gi joma nowachona niya, “Wadhiuru e od Jehova Nyasaye.”
Tiendewa ochungʼ e dhorangeyeni, yaye Jerusalem.
Jerusalem oger ka dala ma ji odakie machiegni motenore.
Kanyo e kama ogendini idho dhiye, ogendini mag Jehova Nyasaye dhi kuno, mondo opak nying Jehova Nyasaye ka giluwo chike mane omi Israel.
Kanyo ema kombe loch mag ngʼado bura nitie gin kombe loch mag jood Daudi.
Lamuru mondo Jerusalem obed gi kwe. Lamuru niya, “Mad joma oheri bed gi kwe.
Mad kwe yudre ei alworani, adier kwe mondo obedi ei ohinga mochieli.”
Nikech owetena gi osiepena modak e iyi, awacho niya, “Jerusalem mondo obed gi kwe.”
Nikech wach od Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, adwaro ni idhi maber.
Atingʼo wangʼa ka arango, in ma kom lochni ni e polo.
Mana kaka wenge wasumbini rango lwet ruodhgi, kendo kaka wenge jatich ma nyako mar ot rango lwet ruodhe madhako, e kaka wengewa rango Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nyaka chop okechwa.
Yie ikechwa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, yie ikechwa, nikech osechawa gi kinda.
Josunga osejarowa moromo acheje bende osechayowa moromo.
Ka dine bed ni Jehova Nyasaye ok jakorwa, jo-Israel mondo owach kamano,
ka dine bed ni Jehova Nyasaye ok jakorwa kane ji omonjowa,
e kinde mane mirima mabebni ka mach omakogi kodwa, to dine gimwonyowa ngili;
ataro dine odinonwa, ee, kodh yamo dine oywerowa,
kendo pi maringo matek dine odhi kodwa.
Pak mondo odogne Jehova Nyasaye, ma ok oseyie mondo gikidhwa gi lekegi.
Wasetony mana ka winyo mowuok e wino mar jachik winy; wino osechodi, to wan wasetony.
Konyruokwa ni e nying Jehova Nyasaye, Jachwech polo gi piny.
Joma ogeno kuom Jehova Nyasaye chalo gi Got Sayun, ma ok nyal yiengi to osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Mana kaka gode olworo Jerusalem, e kaka Jehova Nyasaye olworo joge chakre, tinende kendo nyaka chiengʼ.
Ludh loch mar joma timbegi richo ok bi siko korito piny mopog ne joma kare, nimar ka mano otimore to joma kare nyalo tiyo gi lwetgi kuom timo marach.
Tim maber, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kendo ni jogo moriere gie chunygi.
To joma lokore luwo yore mobam Jehova Nyasaye biro kumo kaachiel gi joma timo timbe maricho. Israel mondo obed gi kwe.
Kane Jehova Nyasaye odwogo joma otwe Sayun, to ne ochalonwa mana lek.
Ne wathungʼ gi nyiero kendo dhowa nopongʼ gi wende mor. Eka nowachore e dier ogendini niya, “Jehova Nyasaye osetimonegi gik madongo.”
Adier, Jehova Nyasaye osetimonwa gik madongo, omiyo wamor mokalo.
Duognwa gigewa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mondo wachal gi aore man Negev.
Joma komo kodhi kaywak biro keyo ka wero wende mor.
Ngʼat madhi oko kaywak, kotingʼo kodhi mikomo, biro duogo ka wero wende mor, kotingʼo cham mosechiek.
Ka Jehova Nyasaye ok ema ger ot, to joma gere nyagore gi tich matek kayiem nono. Ka Jehova Nyasaye ok ema orito dala, to jorito ochungʼ karito kayiem.
In bende imondo chiewo chon kendo ineno nyaka sa molewo, kinyagori gi tich matek mondo iyud chiemo minyalo chamo; nimar Nyasaye miyo joge mohero nindo mokwe.
Yawuowi gin gweth moa kuom Jehova Nyasaye, adier, nyithindo gin mich moa kuome.
Yawuowi ma ngʼato onywolo kapod otin, chalo gi asere manie lwet jakedo.
Ngʼat ma ofukune opongʼ kodgi en ngʼama ogwedhi. Ok ginine wichkuot ka gikedo gi wasikgi e dhorangach.
Ji duto moluoro Jehova Nyasaye, kendo ngimagi oriere gie chunygi.
Ibiro chamo olemb luchi; iniyud gweth kendo inidhi maber.
Chiegi nochal gi yiend mzabibu manyak maber e odi; nyithindi nochal gi chuny zeituni maloth e kinde ma gilworo mesa ka gichiemo.
Kamano e kaka ngʼama oluoro Jehova Nyasaye ogwedhi.
Jehova Nyasaye mondo ogwedhi gie Sayun, ndalo duto mag ngimani; mad ineye gi wangʼi ka Jerusalem dhi maber,
kendo mad idag amingʼa nyaka ine nyithind nyithindi, Israel mondo obed gi kwe!
“Jogi osesanda malit nyaka aa e tin-na,” Israel mondo owach niya;
“gisesanda malit nyaka aa e tin-na, to kata kamano pok gibedo gi loch kuoma.
Jopur osepuro diengʼeya kendo gisegore opara ma roboche,
to kata kamano Jehova Nyasaye en ngʼama kare; osegola e badho mar joma timbegi richo.”
Ji duto mochayo Sayun lo mi dog chien gi wichkuot.
Mad gichal gi lum moti ewi tado maner kata kapok odongo maber.
Ok onyal nyago gimoro mapongʼo lwet jakeyo, kata ma jachoko nyalo tingʼo e bade.
Mad joma kalo bute kik wachnegi niya, “Jehova Nyasaye mondo ogwedhi, kata ni, wagwedhi e nying Jehova Nyasaye.”
Aywakni ka an e chuny bur matut, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, yie iwinj dwonda. Chik iti ne ywakna ma aywaknigo mondo ikecha.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ka dine bed ni isiko iparo richo, ma ji timo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, to en ngʼa ma dichungʼ e nyimi ka ok bura oloyo?
To kata kamano kuomi nitiere weyo richo; kuom mano watiyoni gi luor.
Arito Jehova Nyasaye, chunya rite kendo aketo genona kuom wachne.
Chunya rito Ruoth Nyasaye, moloyo kaka jorito rito ru piny, chunya riti, yaye Nyasaye, moloyo kaka jorito rito ru piny.
Yaye jo-Israel, keturu genou kuom Jehova Nyasaye, nimar Jehova Nyasaye nigi hera ma ok rem, kendo en ema owaro ji chuth.
En owuon ema obiro waro jo-Israel kuom richogi duto.
Ngʼayi onge e chunya, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, wangʼa bende ok tek; chunya ok chandre gi gik madongo, kata gi weche matek modhiera ngʼeyo.
To abet mos kendo chunya okwe; mana ka nyathi ma pod dhoth molingʼ mos e bad min, ee, kaka nyathi ma kamano lingʼ mos, e kaka chunya bende olingʼ mos e iya.
Yaye Israel, keturu genou kuom Jehova Nyasaye chakre tinende kendo nyaka chiengʼ.
Parie Daudi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, parie Daudi gi chandruok duto moseneno.
Ne okwongʼore kane osingore ne Jehova Nyasaye, kendo ne okwongʼore ne Nyasaye Maratego mar Jakobo kama:
“Ok anadonji e oda, kata dhi e kitandana,
Ok anayie nindo tera, kata ayula wangʼ lo wengena,
kapok aloso ne Jehova Nyasaye kare, kapok ayudo ne Nyasaye Maratego mar Jakobo kar dak.”
Ne wawinjo wachno Efratha, ee, ne wayude e puothe mag Jaar:
“Wadhiuru kare modakie; wadhiuru mondo walame e nyim kom duongʼne, ka wawacho niya,
‘Aa malo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, aa malo ibi kari mar yweyo, in kaachiel gi Sandug Muma ma en kido mar tekoni.
Mad jodolo magi rwakre gi tim makare, kendo mad jogi maler wer gi mor.’ ”
Nikech Daudi jatichni, kik idagi ngʼati miseyiero.
Jehova Nyasaye nokwongʼore kendo osingore ne Daudi, kendo ne en kwongʼruok ma ok enoloki ngangʼ; nokwongʼorene niya, “Abiro keto achiel kuom kothi e lochni,
ka yawuoti orito singruokna kod chike ma apuonjogi, eka yawuotgi nobedi, e lochni nyaka chiengʼ kendo nyaka chiengʼ.”
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye oseyiero Sayun, osehere kaka kar dakne, osewacho ni,
Ma e kar yweyona mochwere manyaka chiengʼ, kae ema abiro betie kom lochna, nimar asehere,
abiro gwedhe gi gik moko mogundho, kendo joge modhier abiro romo gi chiemo.
Abiro rwako jodolo mage gi warruok kendo jomaler modak e iye biro siko ka wero wende mor.
“Ka eni ema abiro miyo tung moro donge ne Daudi kendo abiro chungo taya ne ngʼata mowir.
Abiro bako wasike gi wichkuot, to en osimbo manie wiye biro medo rieny.”
Mano kaka en gima ber kendo malongʼo, ka jowete odak kanyakla gi kwe!
Dak ma kamano chalo gi mo ma nengone tek mool e wich kendo mamol piny nyaka e tik, mamol piny koluwo tik Harun kamol piny mos mos nyaka e ngʼut kandhone.
Ochalo bende gi thoo momoko e Got Hermon maridore ewi Got Sayun. Nimar kanyo ema Jehova Nyasaye chiwe gwethne, ma en ngima mochwere.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, un jotich duto mag Jehova Nyasaye, kendo matiyo gotieno e od Jehova Nyasaye.
Tingʼuru bedeu malo e kare maler mar lemo kendo upak Jehova Nyasaye.
Mad Jehova Nyasaye ma jachwech polo gi piny, ogwedhu gie Sayun.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye. Pakuru nying Jehova Nyasaye; pakeuru, un jotich mag Jehova Nyasaye,
un mutiyo e od Jehova Nyasaye, e laru mag od Nyasachwa.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, nimar Jehova Nyasaye ber; pakuru nyinge gi wende pak nimar timo kamano en gima ber.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye oseyiero Jakobo, mondo obed gire owuon; oseyiero Israel, mondo obed mwandune mogeno.
Angʼeyo ni Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ, angʼeyo adier ni Ruoth Nyasachwa duongʼ moloyo nyiseche duto.
Jehova Nyasaye timo gimoro amora mohero, e polo kendo e piny, ei nembe kendo e kudegi.
Omiyo boche wuok koa e tungʼ piny koni gi koni, kendo ooro mil polo ka koth chue, bende okelo yamo kogolo e utege mokanogie.
Ne ogoyo nyithindo makayo mag Misri, nyithindo makayo mag dhano kod le.
Ne ooro ranyisi gi honni mage e dieru, yaye Misri, noorogi kuom Farao kaachiel gi jotichne duto.
Ne ogoyo pinje mangʼeny piny, kendo ne onego ruodhi maroteke,
kaka Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, gi Og ruodh Bashan, kod ruodhi duto mag Kanaan,
kendo nomiyogi piny jogo kaka girkeni, kaka girkeni ne joge ma gin jo-Israel.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nyingi osiko nyaka chiengʼ, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, humbi ochwere e tienge duto.
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye biro chwako joge, kendo obiro kecho jotichne.
Nyiseche mopa mag ogendini gin fedha gi dhahabu, molos gi lwet dhano.
Gin gi dhogi, to kata kamano, ok ginyal wuoyo, gin gi wenge, to ok ginyal neno.
Gin gi it, to ok ginyal winjo wach, kendo kata mana muya onge e dhogi.
Joma losogi nobed machal kodgi, kendo joma oketo genogi kuomgi bende biro chalo kodgi.
Un jo-Israel, pakuru Jehova Nyasaye; un dhood joka Harun, pakuru Jehova Nyasaye;
un dhood joka Lawi, pakuru Jehova Nyasaye; pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, un ji duto moluore.
Jehova Nyasaye mondo opaki gie Sayun, Jal modak Jerusalem mondo opaki. Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye!
Gouru erokamano ne Jehova Nyasaye, nimar ober. Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Gouru erokamano ne Nyasach nyiseche: Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Gouru erokamano ne Ruodh ruodhi: Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Ne en kendo matimo honni madongo, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Jal mane oloso polo gi riekone, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Jal mane oyaro piny ewi pige, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Jal mane oloso rameny madongo dongo, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Nochweyo wangʼ chiengʼ mondo orit odiechiengʼ, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
kod dwe gi sulwe mondo orit otieno; Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
ne En mane onego nyithindo makayo mag Misri, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
kendo mane ogolo jo-Israel oko kuomgi, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
nogologi gi lwedo motegno kod bat morie; Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
ne En mane obaro Nam Makwar diere ariyo; Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
mi nogolo jo-Israel koluwo diere tir, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
to Farao gi jolwenje to nomiyo Nam Makwar oywero; Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
ne En mane otelo ne joge e thim, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
ne En mane ogoyo ruodhi madongo piny, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
kendo mane onego ruodhi maroteke; Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Kaka Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
gi Og ruodh Bashan, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
mi nochiwo pinygi kaka girkeni, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Kaka girkeni ne Israel jatichne; Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
ne En mane oparowa ka piny ochamowa, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
kendo mane ogonyowa e lwet wasikwa, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
machiwo chiemo ne chwech duto, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
Gouru erokamano ne Nyasach polo, Herane osiko nyaka chiengʼ.
E bath aore mag Babulon ne wabet piny kendo ne waywak kane waparo Sayun.
Ne wangʼawo thumbewa ewi omburi mane ni kanyo,
nimar joma ne omakowa nokwayowa wende kane wan kanyo, joma nesandowa nochunowa ni wawernegi wende mor; negiwachonwa niya, “Wernwauru achiel kuom wende Sayun!”
Ere kaka wanyalo wero wende Jehova Nyasaye kapod wan e piny ma wendo?
Ka dipo ni wiya owil kodi, yaye Jerusalem, to mad lweta ma korachwich wiye wil gi tichne.
Mad lewa moki e danda ka dipo ni ok apari, ka dipo ni ok aketo chunya kuomi, yaye Jerusalem, morna maduongʼ mogik.
Parie gima ne jo-Edom otimo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, parie gima negitimo chiengʼ mane Jerusalem opodho. Ne gikok matek niya, “Mukeuru ogoye piny. Mukeuru ogore piny gi mise mare duto!”
Yaye nyar Babulon, in mochanni kethruok, ngʼama nochuli kuom gima isetimonwa en jahawi,
ngʼat manomak nyithindi mayom mi gogi piny e lwendni en jahawi.
Abiro paki gi chunya duto, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; abiro paki gi wer e nyim nyiseche.
Abiro kulora piny ka achomo hekalu mari maler kendo abiro pako nyingi, nikech herani kod adierani, nimar isetingʼo nyingi kod Wachni malo moyombo gik moko duto.
Kane aluongo to ne idwoka, kendo ne imiyo abedo gi chir kod chuny motegno.
Mad ruodhi duto mag piny paki, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, e sa ma giwinjo weche mowuok e dhogi.
Mad giwer kuom yore mag Jehova Nyasaye, nimar duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye ngʼongo.
Jehova Nyasaye rango joma obolore kata obedo ni en malo to josunga to ongʼeyo kata kapod gin gichien.
Kata obedo ni awuotho e dier chandruok, to irito ngimana; irieyo lweti kuom mirimb joma kedo koda, kendo iresa gi lweti ma korachwich.
Jehova Nyasaye biro chopona chenroge; yaye Jehova Nyasaye, herani osiko nyaka chiengʼ: kik ijwangʼ tije ma iloso gi lweti.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, isenona kendo ingʼeya.
Ingʼeya sa ma abet piny nyaka sa ma aa malo; adier, ingʼeyo parona gi kuma bor.
Bende ingʼeyo yorega ma aluwo kod kuonde ma ayweyoe; yorena duto oyangoreni maber.
Kata kapok wach moro owuok e dhoga to ingʼeye malongʼo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye.
Ilwora koni gi koni mi iketa diere; adier, iseuma duto gi lweti.
Rieko ma kamano lichna miwuoro, kendo otutna moyombo pacha.
Dadhi kure eka apond ne Roho mari? Koso kanye ma daring adhiye mondo apondni?
Ka aidho e polo, to in kuno; ka aloso kitandana e bur matut, to in kuno.
Ka aidho yamb kogwen mondo otera e tok nam komachielo,
to kata kuno bende lweti biro telonae, kendo lweti ma korachwich biro maka motegno.
Ka awacho niya, “Mudho biro ima adier kendo ler biro lokorena otieno,”
to in mudho ok timni mudho kendo otieno rienyni ka odiechiengʼ, nimar mudho chaloni ler.
In ema ne ichweyo dhanda maiye, adier, ne ingʼina maber gi ei minwa.
Apaki nikech ne ichweya mongʼith kendo malich miwuoro; tijeni misetimo lich, kendo angʼeyo mano maber.
Fuonde mag ringra ne ok opondoni, kane ochweya ei minwa, kane ochwe ringra e kama opondo,
wangʼi ne oneno ringra ei minwa; ndalona duto e piny-ka ne ondiki chon gi lala, e kitabu mari kane pok kata achiel kuomgi obetie.
Mano kaka pachi tutna, yaye Nyasaye! Mano kaka gingʼeny mokalo akwana kargi duto!
Ka dine bed ni anyalo kwanogi, to dine giloyo kuoyo gi ngʼeny. Sa ma achiew to ayudo ni pod an mana kodi.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mad iyie ineg joma timbegi richo! Ayiuru buta, un joma rich chwero remb ji omakogi!
Giwuoyo kuomi gi paro marach; adier, wasiki tiyo gi nyingi e yo marach.
Donge amon gi jomamon kodi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, koso donge ok awinjra gi joma chungʼ mondo oked kodi?
Achayogi kendo aonge kodgi gi tich adier akwanogi kaka wasika.
Nona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mondo ingʼe chunya; tema, mondo ingʼe pacha.
Tim kamano mondo ineane ka nitie gimoro marach kuoma, mondo itera e yor ngima mochwere.

Resa, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kuom joma richo, konya e lwet jo-mahundu,
joma chano chenro maricho e chunygi kendo gitugo lweny pile pile.
Gipiago lewgi mabith ka lew thuol kendo kwiri mar thuond fu ni e lewgi. Sela
Rita, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, rita e lwet joma timbegi richo; konya e lwet jo-mahundu machano gajo tiendena.
Josunga chikona obadho; giseyarona gogo mondo amokie, kendo gisechikona otegu e yorega ma aluwo. Sela
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, awachoni niya, “In Nyasacha.” Omiyo yie iwinja, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, winj ywak ma aywaknigo mondo ikecha.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ma jakonyna motegno, in migengʼona wiya sa ma lweny ger.
Kik iyie mondo joma timbegi richo oyud gik ma chunygi gombo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; kik iyie mondo chenrogi otimre. Sela
Mi mondo chandruok ma joma olwora bwogago, odog e wiyegi.
Mi mondo makaa maliel mager oolre kuomgi, ee, ne ni odirgi e mach, kata e thidhna ma nimo ji, ma ok ginyal wuokie kendo.
Mi mondo joma ketho nying jowetegi kik dhi maber e piny, ee, ne ni masira olawo jo-mahundu mi ojukogi.
Angʼeyo ni Jehova Nyasaye miyo jodhier yudo adieragi, kendo oneno ni ongʼad bura kare ne joma ochando.
Joma kare biro pako nyingi adier kendo joma ngimagi oriere tir biro dak kangima e nyimi.
Aluongi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, yie ibi ira piyo. Yie iwinj dwonda ka aluongi.
Mad lamona osiki e nyimi mana ka ubani miwangʼo, kendo bedena osik koriere kochomo malo mana ka misango mitimoni godhiambo.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, ket jarit e dhoga; ketna jarit mondo okonya umo dhoga.
Kik iyie gimoro amora marach ywa chunya, ma dimi an bende atim timbe maricho, kaachiel gi joma timbe gi richo; rita mondo kik acham chiembgi mabeyonegi.
Onego ngʼat makare ema ogoya, nikech mano chalo tim ngʼwono motimona; onego en ema okwera, nikech mano chalo mo mool e wiya; ok anyal dagi mondo ngʼama kare otimna kamano. To kata kamano obiro kwedo timbe joma richo e lemona;
chiengʼ ma nowit ruodhigi piny koa ewi got mabor, eka joma timbegi richo nongʼe ni kare wechena ne gin adier.
Giniwach niya, “Mana kaka ngʼato puro kendo toyo lowo, e kaka chokewa osekere e dho bur liel.”
Anto atego wangʼa kuomi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto; In e kar pondona, omiyo kik iwe atho.
Kik iwe obadho ma gisechikona maka, ee, resa kuom otegu ma joma timbegi richo ochikona.
Mad joma timbegi richogo moki e gokegi giwegi ka anto akadho maber mak gimoro otima.

Aywak matek ne Jehova Nyasaye; atingʼo dwonda ne Jehova Nyasaye mondo okecha.
Ahulone gik mathaga duto; anyise chandruokna duto ka abet e nyime.
E kinde ma chunya chandore e iya, to in ema ingʼeyo yor konyruokna. E bugo matut ma awuothoe ji osechikonae obadho.
Rang batha korachwich; mondo ine kaonge ngʼama dewa. Aonge kar pondo; bende aonge ngʼama rito ngimana.
Aywakni, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; awachoni niya, “In e kar pondona, kendo in e pokna e piny joma ngima.”
Yie iwinj ywakna, nimar an-gi chandruok maduongʼ; resa e lwet joma lawa nimar gitek moloya mabor.
Gonya e twech ma antie, mondo apak nyingi. Eka joma kare biro chokore buta nikech ber misetimona.
Winj lamona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, chik iti ne ywakna mar kech; bi mondo ikonya nikech in ja-adiera kendo itimo maber.
Kik imi jatichni yud kum nimar onge kata ngʼato achiel matimo maber e nyimi.
Jasigu lawa matek, oserodha piny nyaka e lowo; ochuna ni nyaka adag kama otimo mudho mana ka joma notho chon gi lala.
Omiyo chunya chandore e iya, ee, chunya obwok.
Aparo higni machon mosekalo; aketo pacha mos kuom tijeni duto, kendo ageno gik ma lweti osetimo.
Ayaroni lwetena; chunya gombi mana kaka lowo motwo gombo koth. Sela
Dwoka piyo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nimar chunya ool. Kik ipandna wangʼi nono to dipoka achalo gi joma ridore e bur matut.
Mi mondo okinyi oromna gi herani ma ok rem, nimar aketo genona kuomi. Nyisa yo monego alu nimar aketo chunya duto kuomi.
Resa e lwet wasika, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nimar in e jaritna.
Puonja timo dwaroni, nimar in e Nyasacha; mi mondo Roho mari maber, otelna e yo mopie.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kony ngimana nikech nyingi iwuon; gola oko e chandruok nikech timni maber.
Mi wasika olingʼ thi, nikech herani ma ok rem; tiek joma kedo koda duto nimar an jatichni.
Pak obed ni Jehova Nyasaye ma en Lwandana, pakeuru en motego lwetena ne lweny, kendo en momiyo lith lwetena bedo mongʼith e kedo.
En Nyasacha ma jahera kendo en ohingana, bende en kar pondona kendo en jakonyna. En okumbana ma agengʼorago, kendo en ema oloyona joma ni e bwoya.
Dhano to en angʼo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, momiyo iketo chunyi kuome, koso wuod dhano to en angʼo, momiyo isiko ipare?
Dhano chalo gi muya nono kendo ndalone chalo gi tipo makadho piyo.
Wuogi e polo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, wuogi mondo ilor piny; lor piny imul gode, mondo gidhuol iro.
Or mil polo, mondo ike wasigu; dir aserni magi, mondo itiekgi.
Rie lweti koa e polo nyaka piny, mondo ikonya, kendo igola, e pige ma tekregi ngʼeny, kendo e lwet jopinje mamoko,
ma dhogi opongʼ gi miriambo kendo ma lwetgi ma korachwich opongʼ gi wuondruok.
Abiro weroni wer manyien, yaye Nyasaye; abiro weroni wer mamit ka agoyoni thum man-gi tonde apar,
abiro werne Jal mamiyo ruodhi locho, kendo makonyo Daudi jatichne e dho ligangla mager.
Konya kendo gola e lwet jopinje mamoko, ma dhogi opongʼ gi miriambo kendo ma lwetgi ma korachwich opongʼ gi wuondruok.
Eka yawuotwa biro chalo gi yiende mayudo pi maber, kendo nyiwa biro chalo gi sirni modol maber mondo olich dala ruoth.
Dechewa biro pongʼ gi kit mwandu duto. Rombewa biro medore gana gi gana, ee, gibiro bedo gana mathoth e lek magwa,
kendo rwedhi magwa biro ywayo misike mapek. Jokwoge ok nodonj e kundewa, bende ok noterwa e twech, kendo yoreyore ok nogo e gwengʼwa.
Ogwedh joma gigi gin adier kuomgi; kendo ogwedh jogo ma Nyasachgi en Jehova Nyasaye.
Abiro tingʼo nyingi malo, yaye Nyasacha ma Ruoth; abiro pako nyingi nyaka chiengʼ kendo nyaka chiengʼ.
Abiro paki pile ka pile kendo abiro tingʼo nyingi malo mochwere manyaka chiengʼ.
Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ miwuoro kendo owinjore gi pak, onge ngʼama nyalo yango duongʼne.
Tiengʼ achiel biro pako tijeni ne tiengʼ machielo; adier, gibiro nyiso ji kuom tijeni madongo.
Gibiro wuoyo kuom duongʼni mangʼongo kendo marieny, to an abiro paro mos kuom tijeni miwuoro.
Gibiro nyiso kuom tekoni mitimogo gik malich miwuoro, to an abiro hulo kuom tijeni madongo.
Gibiro loso nyasi mar ber ni mogundho kendo gibiro wer gi mor kuom timbeni makare.
Jehova Nyasaye ngʼwon kendo kecho ji, iye ok wangʼ piyo kendo en gihera mangʼeny.
Jehova Nyasaye timo maber ne ji duto; okecho ji duto mosechweyo.
Ji duto ma isechweyo biro paki, yaye Jehova Nyasaye; jogi maler duto biro dhiali.
Gibiro nyiso ji kuom duongʼ mar pinyruodhi kendo gibiro wuoyo kuom tekoni,
mondo ji duto ongʼe gik madongo mitimo kod duongʼ mangʼongo mar pinyruodhi.
Pinyruodhi en pinyruoth mochwere, kendo lochni osiko nyaka tienge duto. Jehova Nyasaye chopo singruok mage duto kendo ohero ji duto mosechweyo.
Jehova Nyasaye chungo ji duto mopodho kendo omiyo joma piny otaro aa malo.
In ema wenge ji duto ngʼiyi, kendo imiyogi chiembgi e kinde mowinjore.
Ka iyawo lweti to gik mangima duto yudo konyruokgi duto.
Jehova Nyasaye nikare e yorene duto kendo ohero ji duto mosechweyo.
Jehova Nyasaye ni machiegni gi ji duto maluongo nyinge, to mana joma luongo nyinge e adiera.
Ochopo dwaro mag joma omiye luor; adier, owinjo ywakgi kendo oresogi.
Jehova Nyasaye rito maber ji duto mohere, to ji duto ma timbegi richo obiro tieko.
Dhoga biro wacho pak ne Jehova Nyasaye. Gik mangima duto mondo opak nyinge maler, nyaka chiengʼ kendo nyaka chiengʼ.
Pak ne Jehova Nyasaye! Yaye chunya, pak Jehova Nyasaye.
Abiro pako Jehova Nyasaye e ngimana duto; abiro wero wende pak ne Nyasacha kinde duto ma angima.
Kik iket genoni kuom ruodhi mag piny, kata kuom dhano matho ma ok nyal waro ngʼato,
nikech ka chunygi ochot to gidok e lowo; kendo chiengʼono chenrogi ogik gikanyono.
Ogwedh ngʼat ma konyruokne en Nyasach Jakobo, ngʼat ma genone ni kuom Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasache.
En jachwech mar polo gi piny, gi nam kod gik moko duto manie igi, osiko ka en ja-adiera nyaka chiengʼ.
Ochwako ngʼat misando kendo ochiwo chiemo ne joma odenyo. Jehova Nyasaye gonyo joma otwe mi gibed thuolo,
kendo Jehova Nyasaye miyo muofni neno. Jehova Nyasaye miyo joma piny otaro aa malo, kendo ohero joma kare.
Jehova Nyasaye rito jadak kendo okonyo nyathi kich gi dhako ma chwore otho, to yore mag ngʼama timbene richo to orocho.
Jehova Nyasaye olocho nyaka chiengʼ yaye Sayun, Nyasachi olocho nyaka tienge duto mabiro. Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye!
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye! Mano kaka en gima ber wero wende pak ne Nyasachwa, mano kaka en gima longʼo kendo mowinjore mondo ji opake!
Jehova Nyasaye gero Jerusalem kendo; ochoko jo-Israel mane otwe.
Ochango joma chunygi tuo kendo othiedho adhondegi.
Osekwano kendo ongʼeyo kar romb sulwe duto kendo oluongo moro ka moro kuomgi gi nyinge.
Ruodhwa duongʼ kendo en gi teko kendo nyalo; ngʼeyone onge gikone.
Jehova Nyasaye tingʼo joma obolore malo to joma timbegi richo to ochwado piny e lowo.
Weruru ne Jehova Nyasaye kugoyone erokamano, weruru wer mamit ne Nyasachwa kugoyo nyatiti.
Oumo kor polo gi boche polo, kendo oromo piny gi koth, bende omiyo lum twi ewi thuche.
Ochiwo chiemo ne dhok kendo ne agege ka giywakne.
Morne ok ni kuom teko farase kata kuom ogwand dhano;
to Jehova Nyasaye mor gi joma omiye luor; joma oketo genogi kuom herane ma ok rem.
Dhial Jehova Nyasaye, yaye Jerusalem; pak Nyasachi, yaye Sayun.
Omedo sirni manie dhorangeyeni teko, kendo ogwedho jogi modak e iyi.
Omiyo kwe bedo e tongʼ pinyu kendo oromou gi ngano mabeyoe mogik.
Ooro chikne e piny, kendo wachne ringo matek ka diemo wangʼ.
Oyaro pe ka yie rombo kendo okeyo ongʼwengʼo ka buru.
Odiro pe mage e piny ka kit ombo. En ngʼa manyalo ngino sa ma odiro pe kamano?
Ooro wachne kendo pego leny nono; ee, otugo yembene mi pego lokre pi mamol.
Osenyiso Jakobo wachne, ee, osenyiso Israel chikene gi buchene.
Onge oganda moro machielo mosetimone kamano kendo gin ok gingʼeyo chikene. Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye!
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye! Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye gie polo, ee, pakeuru gi malo kuma bor.
Pakeuru, un malaikane duto, pakeuru, un jopolo duto.
Wangʼ chiengʼ gi dwe bende opake, kaachiel gi sulwe duto marieny.
Un polo man malo mogik, pakeuru, kaachiel gi un, pige manie bwo polo.
Onego gipak nying Jehova Nyasaye kargi duto nimar nogolo chik mine gibetie.
Ne ogurogi kuondegi nyaka chiengʼ kendo nyaka chiengʼ kaluwore gi chikne mochwere.
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye gie piny, un gik madongo mag nam kod kude matut duto mag ataro,
kaachiel gi mil polo gi pe gi theluji gi boche, kod yembe maringo matek mawinjo wachne;
kod un gode gi thuche gi yiende manyago olembe gi yiende mag sida duto;
kod le mager gi jamni duto gi le matindo gi winy mafuyo,
kod ruodhi mag piny gi ogendini duto; kod un jotelo gi joloch duto mag piny,
kod un yawuowi matindo gi nyiri matindo, gi jodongo kod nyithindo.
Onego gipak nying Jehova Nyasaye gin duto, nimar nyinge kende ema nigi duongʼ; kendo duongʼne maler oyombo piny gi polo.
Osechungo tung ne joge, tung mosekelo pak ne joge maler duto, joge ma jo-Israel, ma gin joma ni machiegni gi chunye. Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye!
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye! Werneuru Jehova Nyasaye wer manyien, kendo dendeuru e chokruok mar jomaler.
Jo-Israel mondo obed mamor gi jachwechgi; ee, jo-Sayun mondo obed mamor gi Ruodhgi.
Onego gi pak nyinge gi miel kendo giwerne mamit ka gigoyo oyieke gi nyatiti.
Nimar chuny Jehova Nyasaye mor gi joge kendo osidho joma obolore gi warruok.
Jomaler mondo oil kamiye duongʼ kendo giwer gimor ka gibet e kitandagi.
Onego pak mar Nyasaye obed e dhogi kendo gitingʼ ligangla ma dhoge ariyo e lwetgi,
mondo gichulgo kuor ni ogendini kendo gikum ogendini mamoko,
