Ka lweti miyo idonjo e richo to ngʼade oko. Ber moloyo kidonjo e ngima ka ionge lweti moloyo kidhi gi lwetegi ariyo e gehena, [
kama “ ‘kute machamo ji ok thoe kendo mach bende ok thoe’].
To kapo ni tiendi ema teri e richo to ngʼade oko. Ber moloyo kidonjo e ngima kingʼol kar donjo e gehena gi tiende ariyo, [
kama “ ‘kute machamo ji ok thoe kendo mach bende ok thoe’].
To ka en wangʼi ema miyo itimo richo to lodhe oko. Ber moloyo kidonjo e pinyruoth Nyasaye gi wangʼ achiel kar bedo gi wenge ariyo to owiti e gehena,
kama “ ‘kute machamo ji ok thoe, kendo mach bende ok thoe.’
Ngʼato ka ngʼato ibiro pwodho gi mach.
“Chumbi ber, to ka ndhathe orumo to ere kaka dichak imi obed gi ndhathe kendo? Beduru ka ndhath chumbi un uwegi, kendo beduru gi kwe ngʼato gi ngʼato.”
Yesu noa kanyo modhi e gwengʼ mar Judea man loka aora Jordan. Oganda maduongʼ nochako obiro ire, kendo nopuonjogi kaka nojatimo kinde duto.
Jo-Farisai moko nobiro moteme kapenje niya, “Bende chik oyie mondo ngʼato oketh keny gi chiege?”
Nodwokogi niya, “Angʼo mane Musa ochikou mondo utim?”
Negiwacho niya, “Musa noyie mondo dichwo ondik barup weruok mar ketho keny eka oriembe.”
Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Musa nondikonu chikni nikech chunyu matek.
To chakre chwech piny, Nyasaye nochweyogi dichwo gi dhako.
‘Kuom mano, dichwo nowe wuon kod min kendo nopadre gi chiege,
mi ji ariyogo nobed ringruok achiel.’ Omiyo koro ok gin ji ariyo, to gin ringruok achiel.
Kuom mano, gima Nyasaye oseriwo kaachiel kik dhano moro amora pogi.”
Kane gidok e ot kendo, jopuonjre Yesu nopenje kuom wachni.
To Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Ngʼato angʼata mowere gi chiege mokendo dhako machielo odonjo e richo mar terruok nikech chiege moriembono.
To kata dhako ema owere gi chwore mokendore gi dichwo machielo to odonjo e richo mar terruok.”
Ji ne kelo nyithindo matindo ir Yesu mondo ogwedhgi, to jopuonjre nokwerogi.
Kane Yesu oneno gima jopuonjrene timo, nokecho kodgi, mi owachonegi niya, “Weuru nyithindo matindo obi ira kendo kik utamgi, nikech pinyruoth Nyasaye en mar ji machal ka magi.
Awachonu adier ni ngʼato ma ok orwako pinyruoth Nyasaye kaka nyathi matin ok nodonji ngangʼ.”
Nokawo nyithindogo motingʼo e bade, eka noketo lwete kuomgi, mi ogwedhogi.
Kane Yesu ochako wuoth dhi, ngʼat moro noringo obiro ire mogoyo chonge piny e nyime. Ngʼatni noloso kode kapenje niya, “Japuonj maber, en angʼo monego atim mondo eka ayud ngima mochwere kaka girkeni mara?”
Yesu nodwoke kapenje niya, “Angʼo momiyo iluonga ni ngʼama ber? Onge ngʼama ber makmana Nyasaye kende.
Ingʼeyo chike mawacho ni: ‘Kik ineki, kik iterri, kik ikwal, kik ihang wach, kik imechi, luor wuonu gi minu.’”
Nodwoke niya, “Japuonj, magi duto aserito nyaka aa tin-na.”
Yesu nongʼiyo wuowino mohere, eka owachone niya, “Gimoro achiel ema iremo. Wuogi idhi ilok mwanduni duto ma in-go pesa mondo ipog joma odhier, eka inibed gi mwandu mokan e polo. Bangʼ timo kamano to bi mondo iluwa.”
Ka ngʼatno nowinjo wachno, nomieno wangʼe, moa kanyo ka chunye lit, nikech ne en-gi mwandu mathoth ahinya.
To Yesu nongʼicho koni gi koni, eka owacho ni jopuonjrene niya, “Mano kaka en gima tek mondo ja-mwandu odonji e pinyruoth Nyasaye!”
Jopuonjrene nowuoro wechegego. To Yesu nomedo wuoyo kodgi kawacho niya, “Nyithindo, mano kaka en gima tek mondo ngʼato odonji e pinyruoth Nyasaye!
Yot mondo ngamia okadhi e wangʼ sandan moloyo jamoko donjo e pinyruoth Nyasaye.”
Jopuonjrene nomedo wuoro mi giwacho kendgi niya, “Kare en ngʼa manyalo kwo?”
To Yesu nongʼiyogi tir mi owachonegi niya, “Mano en gima ok nyalre kuom dhano, to ok kuom Nyasaye, nimar kuom Nyasaye to gik moko duto nyalore.”
Petro nowachone niya, “Wan waseweyo gik moko duto mondo waluwi.”
To Yesu nodwoke kawacho niya, “Awachonu adier ni onge ngʼato moseweyo dalane, kata owetene, kata nyiminene, kata min-gi, kata wuon-gi, kata nyithinde, kata puothene, nikech An kendo nikech Injili,
ma nobare mak oyudo nyadi mia: mier, owete, nyimine, mine, nyithindo, kod puothe, kaachiel gi sand bende e ndaloni, to kod ngima mochwere e piny mabiro.
To ji mangʼeny masani okwongo nobed chien mogik, kendo joma sani ni chien mogik, nobed mokwongo.”
Koro ne gin e yo gidhi Jerusalem, ka Yesu otelo nyimgi kendo jopuonjre noyudo ohum nono, to joma ne luwogi ne luoro omako. Yesu nochako okawo jopuonjre apar gariyo otero tenge monyisogi gima ne dhi timorene.
Nowachonegi niya, “Eri wadhi nyaka Jerusalem, kendo Wuod Dhano ibiro ndhogi mi chiw e lwet jodolo madongo gi jopuonj chik. Gibiro ngʼadone buch tho mi gichiwe ne joma ok jo-Yahudi,
mondo ojare, mi ngʼudh olawo kuome kendo chwade mi nyaka ginege. To bangʼ ndalo adek obiro chier.”
Bangʼe Jakobo gi Johana, mane gin yawuot Zebedi, nobiro ire mowachone niya, “Japuonj, wadwaro mondo itimnwa gimoro amora mwakwayi.”
Yesu nopenjogi niya, “Udwaro ni atimnu angʼo?”
Negidwoke niya, “Yie mondo kidwogo e duongʼni maler to iket achiel kuomwa obed e badi korachwich to machielo e badi koracham.”
Yesu nowachonegi niya, “Ok ungʼeyo gima ukwayo. Bende unyalo madho kikombe ma amadho kata yudo batiso machal gi mitisago?”
Negidwoke niya, “Wanyalo.” Yesu nowachonegi niya, “En adier ni ubiro metho e kikombe ma amethoe mi obatisu gi batiso mitisago,
to bedo e bada ma korachwich kata ma koracham ok an ema achiw. Kuondego gin mag jogo mane oiknegi chon.”
Kane jopuonjre apar mamoko nowinjo wachno, ne gisin gi Jakobo gi Johana.
To Yesu noluongogi duto kaachiel mowachonegi niya, “Ungʼeyo ni joma ikwano kaka jotelo e kind joma ok jo-Yahudi rito jogegi gi angʼenge, kendo jotendgi madongo tiyogi githuon.
Un to ok un kamano. Kar timo kamano, to ngʼato angʼata madwaro bedo maduongʼ e dieru nyaka bedi jatichu,
kendo ngʼato angʼata madwaro bedo ngʼat mokwongo nyaka bed misumba ji duto.
Nikech kata mana Wuod Dhano ne ok obiro mondo ji otine, to nobiro mondo otine ji kendo mondo ochiw ngimane obed gima iwarogo ji mangʼeny.”
Bangʼe negibiro Jeriko, to kane oyudo Yesu gi jopuonjrene kaachiel gi oganda maduongʼ aa e dalano, muofu moro miluongo ni Bartimayo (tiende ni “wuod Timayo”) nobet e bath yo ka okwecho.
Kane owinjo ni en Yesu ja-Nazareth, nochako kok niya, “Yesu, Wuod Daudi, yie ikecha!”
Thoth ji mane ni kanyo nokwere kendo nowachone ni olingʼ thi, to nomedo goyo koko niya, “Wuod Daudi, yie ikecha!”
Yesu nochungʼ mowacho niya, “Luongeuru obi ira ka.” Omiyo negiluongo muofuno ka gikone niya, “Bed gichir! Aa malo! Oluongi.”
Ngʼatno nodiro suka mane oumorego kucha, mi ochikore ochungʼ gi tiende modhi ir Yesu.
Yesu nopenjo ngʼatno niya, “Angʼo midwaro mondo atimni?” To muofuno nodwoke niya, “Japuonj, adwaro ni mondo anen.”
Eka Yesu nowachone niya, “Dhiyo, yie mari osechangi. Gikanyono ngʼatno nochako neno, kendo noluwo bangʼ Yesu kowuotho e yo.”
Kane gichiegni chopo Jerusalem, ka gin e miech Bethfage kod Bethania manie Got Zeituni, Yesu nooro jopuonjrene ariyo
kowachonegi niya, “Dhiuru e dala man nyimu cha, to ka udonjo e iye to ubiro nwangʼo nyathi kanyna mapok ngʼato oidho nyaka nene kotwe kanyo. Gonyeuru kendo ukele ka.
Kapo ngʼato openjou ni, ‘Angʼo momiyo utimo timni?’ To udwoke ni, ‘Ruoth dware, kendo obiro duoge bangʼ seche manok!’ ”
Negidhi mi giyudo nyathi kanyna kotwe oko e yo matin e dhorangach. To kane oyudo gigonye,
jomoko mane ochungʼ kanyo nopenjogi niya, “Utimo angʼono, ugonyo nyathi kanynano nangʼo?”
To negidwokogi mana kaka Yesu nonyisogi mondo gidwokgi mi jogo noweyogi gidhi.
Kane gikelo nyathi kanyna ne Yesu, ne gipedho lepgi e ngʼeye mi Yesu obetie.
Ji mangʼeny bende nopedho lepgi e yo, to jomoko nopedho oboke mag yiende mane gingʼado e puothe.
Jogo mane otelo e nyim Yesu gi jopuonjrene, kod mago mane odongʼ chien, ne goyo koko niya, “Hosana!” “Ogwedh ngʼat mabiro e nying Jehova Nyasaye.”
“Ogwedh pinyruoth mabiro mar Daudi kwarwa!” “Hosana manie polo malo!”
Yesu nodonjo Jerusalem mi odhi nyaka ei hekalu. Nowuotho e iye monono gik moko duto motimore, to nikech sa ne koro olewo, nowuok gi jopuonjrene apar gariyo mi odhi Bethania.
Kinyne kane oyudo gia Bethania, kech ne kayo Yesu.
Kane pod en gichien, noneno yadh ngʼowu moro ma ite odhukno mi odhi machiegni kode mondo oyudie olemo kuome ocham. Kane ochopo but yadhno ne ok oyudo gimoro kuome makmana ite kende, nikech ne ok en kinde ma ngʼowu chiekie.
Eka Yesu nowacho ni yadhno niya, “Ngʼato kik chak cham olemo mowuok kuomi kendo.” Jopuonjrene nowinje kowacho kamano.
Kane gichopo Jerusalem, Yesu nodonjo ei hekalu mi noriembo oko joma ne ngʼiewo kendo uso gik moko kanyo. Noloko mesni mag jowil pesa ataro kod kombe mag joma ne uso akuche,
kendo ne ok oyiene ngʼato mondo otingʼ misigo mar ohala moro amora kakalogo e dier agola mar hekalu.
Yesu nochako puonjogi kowachonegi niya, “Donge ondiki ni: ‘Oda noluongi ni od lamo mar ogendini duto’?To un useloke ‘kar chokruok mar jomecho.’”
Jodolo madongo gi jopuonj chik nowinjo wachni mochako chano yo mar nege, nimar ne giluore nikech oganda duto nowuoro puonjne.
Ka piny koro noyuso, Yesu gi jopuonjre nowuok e dala maduongʼno mi gidhi e gwenge.
Kinyne gokinyi kane oyudo giwuotho negineno yiend ngʼowu mane Yesu okwongʼo cha kosetwo, chakre tiendene.
Petro noparo mowachoni Yesu niya, “Rabi! Ne yadh ngʼowu manyo ikwongʼo osetwo!”
To Yesu nodwoko kowacho niya, “Beduru gi yie kuom Nyasaye.
Awachonu adier ni ka ngʼato owacho ne godni ni, ‘Dhiyo mondo inyumri e nam,’ ma ok obedo gi kiawa e chunye kata matin, to oyie ni gima owachono biro timore, to gima odwarono notimre kamano.
Kuom mano anyisou ni gimoro amora mukwayo kulamo, beduru gi yie ni useyude mi nobed maru adier.
To bende ka ichungʼ ilemo, to in-gi wach moro e kindi gi ngʼato, to nyaka iwene richone, eka mondo Wuonu manie polo bende oyie weyoni richoni. [
To ka ok uweyo ni ji richogi, to Wuonu manie polo bende ok nowenu richou.]”
Negichako gichopo Jerusalem kendo, to kane oyudo Yesu wuotho e laru mar hekalu, jodolo madongo gi jopuonj Chik, kaachiel gi jodongo nobiro ire.
Negipenje niya, “Itimo gigi gi teko mane, koso ngʼa momiyi teko mar timogi?”
Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Abiro penjou penjo achiel. Dwokauru, to abiro nyisou teko ma atimogo gigi.
Uparo ni batiso Johana noa e polo koso noa kuom dhano? Nyisaneuru!”
Negiwuoyo kuom wachni e kindgi giwegi kendo giwacho niya, “Ka wawacho ni, ‘Noa e polo,’ to obiro penjowa ni, ‘Ka en kamano to angʼo momiyo nutamoru yie kuome?’
To ka wawacho ni, ‘Noa kuom dhano.’ ” (Negiluoro ji, nikech ji duto nokawo ni Johana ema janabi adier.)
Omiyo negidwoko Yesu niya, “Ok wangʼeyo.” Yesu nowachonegi niya, “An bende ok abi nyisou kuma agole teko ma atimogo gigi.”
Bangʼ mano Yesu nochako wuoyo kodgi gi ngeche mopogore opogore kama: “Ngʼat moro ne opidho mzabibu e puothe. Nochiele gi ohinga, mi okunyo bugo mibiyoe olemo mochiek, kendo ogero ne osuch ngʼicho. Eka ne oketo puothe mar mzabibuno e lwet jopur moko bangʼe nowuok odhi e wuoth moro mabor.
E kinde mar keyo nooro jatichne moro ir jopur puodho mondo oomne olembe moko mane ochiek e puoth mzabibu.
To jopur puodho nomake, mogoye, moriembe gi lwete nono.
Nochako ooro jatichne machielo irgi, to en bende ne gindayo wiye kendo timone tim wichkuot.
Ngʼatno nonano, mochako ooro ngʼat machielo, to en neginege. Nomedo oro jotichne mamoko mangʼeny, mamoko kuomgi negigoyo to moko ginego.
“Ne pod odongʼ gi ngʼat achiel mane koro onyalo oro: wuode owuon mane ohero gi lala. Ne oore mogik tik koparo ni, ‘Wuoda awuon to gibiro miyo luor.’
“To ka jopur puodho nowacho e kindgi giwegi ni, ‘Ma e jacham girkeni, biuru mondo wanege mondo girkeni odongʼnwa.’
Omiyo negimake mi ginege eka bangʼe to gidire oko mar puoth mzabibu.
“Uparo ni ka wuon puoth mzabibu obiro to angʼo mobiro timo? Obiro biro moneg jopur puodhogo mi ogol puoth mzabibuno e lwetgi mi enomi joma moko.
Donge usesomo Ndiko mawacho niya, “ ‘Kidi mane jogedo odagi osedoko kidi motegno moriwo kor ot;
Jehova Nyasaye ema osetimo mano, kendo en gima iwuoro ka waneno.’”
Koro jodolo madongo gi jopuonj Chik nochako manyo yo mane ginyalo makego nikech negingʼeyo ni ogetogi kod ngeroni. To negiluoro oganda, omiyo ne giweye mi gingʼwel gia kanyo.
Bangʼe negioro jo-Farisai gi jo-Herodia ir Yesu mondo odwar wach mawuok e dhoge mondo gimakego.
Negibiro ire mi giwachone niya, “Japuonj wangʼeyo ni in ngʼama ja-ratiro. Ji ok nyal ywayi maloki nikech ok iluoro wangʼ ngʼato, to ipuonjo mana yor Nyasaye kaluwore gi adierane. Koro nyiswa ane, bende en gima kare mondo wagol osuru ne Kaisar koso ok owinjore?
Wagol koso kik wagol?” To kaka Yesu nongʼeyo wuondruokgi, nopenjogi niya, “Angʼo momiyo utema? Kelnauru ane dinari ka, mondo anone maber.”
Negikelone pesa mamingli, bangʼe nopenjogi niya, “Kido man kuomeni en mag ngʼa? To weche mondikiegi to gin mar ngʼa?” Negidwoke niya, “Gin mag Kaisar.”
Eka Yesu nowachonegi niya, “Miuru Kaisar gige Kaisar, to miuru Nyasaye gige Nyasaye.” Jogo ne dhogi omoko.
Bangʼe jo-Sadukai mawacho ni chier onge nobiro ire gi penjo moro.
Negipenje niya, “Japuonj, Musa nondikonwa ni ka ngʼato owadgi otho moweyo dhako ma pod onge gi nyithindo, to ngʼatno nyaka kend dhako ma chwore othono mondo onywolnego nyithindo.
Koro ne nitie owete moko abiriyo. Wuowi makayo nokendo to bangʼe notho ka oonge nyithindo.
Wuowi mar ariyo nokendo chi owadgi mane owadgi oweyono, to en bende notho kapok onywolo nyathi. Notimore kamano ni wuowi mar adek bende
e gikone, yawuowi abiriyogo duto notho ma ok onywol gi chigino. Bangʼe achien dhakono bende ne otho.
Koro chiengʼ chier dhakoni nobed chi ngʼa, nimar ji abiriyogo nokende?”
Yesu nodwokogi kawacho niya, “Donge uketho nikech ukia Ndiko kata teko Nyasaye?
Ka joma otho ochier to ok ginikendi kata kend ok nokendgi ngangʼ, to ginichal gi malaike manie polo.
To kuom chier mar joma otho, donge usesomo e kitap Musa kama ondikie wach bungu maliel, kaka Nyasaye nowachone niya, ‘An Nyasach Ibrahim, Nyasach Isaka kendo Nyasach Jakobo?’
Ok en Nyasach joma otho, to en Nyasach joma ngima. Urwenyo mabor!”
Achiel kuom jopuonj chik nobiro moyudo ka gimino wach. Kane owinjo ka Yesu odwokogi kare, nopenje niya, “Kuom Chike duto mag Nyasaye, en mane maduongʼ moloyo chike moko duto?”
Yesu nodwoke kawacho niya, “Chik achiel maduongʼ moloyo en ma: ‘Winjuru, yaye jo-Israel, Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa en Jehova Nyasaye achiel.
Her Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi gi chunyi duto kendo gi paroni duto, gi riekoni duto, kendo gi tekoni duto.’
Chik maduongʼ mar ariyo en ni, ‘Her wadu kaka iherori iwuon.’Onge chik maduongʼ moloyo magi.”
Ngʼatno nodwoke niya, “Iwacho kare, Japuonj. In kare kiwacho ni Nyasaye en achiel maonge moro machielo makmana En.
Ka ihero Nyasaye gi chunyi duto gi riekoni duto gi tekoni duto, kendo kihero wadu kaka iherori iwuon to mano duongʼ moloyo misango miwangʼo pep gi misengini mamoko.”
Kane Yesu oneno ni ngʼatno odwoke gi rieko, nowachone niya, “Ok in mabor gi pinyruoth Nyasaye.” Chakre kanyo onge ngʼato kata achiel manohedhore penje penjo moro kendo.
Kane Yesu pod puonjo ei hekalu, nopenjo niya, “Ere kaka Jopuonj Chik nyalo puonjo ni Kristo en wuod Daudi?
Ka Daudi owuon nowuoyo kuom teko mar Roho Maler kolero niya: “ ‘Ruoth nowachone Ruodha ni, “Bed e bada korachwich, nyaka aket wasiki e bwo tiendi.” ’
Ka Daudi owuon luonge ni ‘Ruoth.’ Koro ere kaka onyalo bedo wuode kendo?” Oganda maduongʼ mane winje nopongʼ gi mor.
Yesu nomedo puonjogi kowacho niya, “Tangʼuru ne jopuonj chik. Gihero wuotho koni gi koni ka girwako lewni maboyo mayware piny, kendo kimosogi e chirni.
Gihero bedo e kombe moyiedhi manie sinagoke, kod kuonde ma imiyoe ji duongʼ e sewni.
Giyako ute mon ma chwogi otho kendo gilamo lamo moyware mondo ginyisrego ni ji kaka gilony e lamo. Joma kamagi ibiro kum malit moloyo.”
Yesu nobedo piny kama omanyore gi kama ne ji ketoe sadakagi mi nonono kaka ji ne keto pesagi e kar keno mar hekalu. Jo-mwandu mangʼeny ne diro pesa mojuol ojuol.
To dhako moro modhier ma chwore notho nobiro moketo pesa mamingli ariyo matindo tindo, pesa matinie mogik ma en ndururu.
Yesu nogwelo jopuonjrene ire mokonegi niya, “Awachonu adier dhako ma chwore otho modhierni osegolo pesa mangʼeny e keno moloyo ji mamoko duto.
Gin gisegolo mana matin nono kuom mwandu ma gin-go, to dhakono kata obedo ni odhier, to osechiwo duto ma en-go, duto mane onego okonyrego.”
Kane oyudo Yesu oa e hekalu, achiel kuom jopuonjrene nokone niya, “Neye, Japuonj! Kitegi dongo manade! Magi gedo malich manade!”
To nodwoke niya, “Ineno ute madongo malichgi? Onge kidi kata achiel mabiro dongʼ kochungʼ ewi wadgi; gibiro redhore piny duto.”
Kane oyudo Yesu obet ewi Got Zeituni, momanyore gi hekalu, Petro gi Jakobo, gi Johana kod Andrea nopenje lingʼ-lingʼ ni,
“Wachnwa ane, gigi biro timore karangʼo, koso en ranyisi mane manotimre ma nonyis ni gigi duto chiegni chopo kare?”
Yesu nowachonegi niya, “Beduru motangʼ mondo ngʼato kik wuondu.
Ji mangʼeny nobi e nyinga ka hedhore ni, ‘An e en,’ kendo giniwuond ji mangʼeny.
Ka uwinjo ka pinje gore koni gi koni kod humbe mag lwenje to kik kibaji gou. Gik ma kamago nyaka timre, to giko piny to pod ni nyime.
Oganda noked gi oganda machielo, kendo pinyruoth noked gi pinyruoth machielo. Piny noyiengni kuonde mopogore opogore kendo kech nobedi e piny. Magi e chakruok mar rem mar muoch ma nobedie.
“Nyaka ubed motangʼ, nikech nochiwu e lwet buche mag gwengʼ kendo norodhu gi del e sinagoke. Unuchungʼ kiyalou e nyim jotelo gi ruodhi nikech An, kendo unulandnegi Injili.
To Injili nyaka kuong landi e pinje duto.
E sa asaya momakue moteru e bura, kik uparru motelo kuom gima duwachi. Wachuru awacha gima omiu mondo uwachi e sa nogono, nikech Roho Maler ema nobed kawuoyo kuomu, to ok un uwegi.
“Ngʼato nondhogi gi owadgi mondo onegi, kendo wuoro nondhog nyathine. Nyithindo nongʼany ne jonywolgi kendo nomi neg-gi.
Ji duto nochau nikech an, to ngʼat ma ochungʼ motegno nyaka giko ema noresi.
“To ka uneno ‘gima kwero makelo kethruok’kochungʼ kama ok onego obedie, to dwarore ni jasomo owinj tiend wachni maber, eka joma ni Judea oring odhi ewi gode.
Ngʼat manie wi tat ode bende kik lor piny kata donji ei ot mondo okaw gimoro amora oago.
Kata ngʼat manie puodho kik dog dala mondo okaw kode.
Mano kaka nodok malit ne mon ma yach kod mago madhodho nyithindo e ndalogo!
Lamuru Nyasaye mondo gino kik timre e ndalo chwiri,
nikech ndalogo nobed kinde mag chandruok ma ok nyal pim gi moro nyaka aa chakruok, chiengʼ mane Nyasaye ochweyoe piny, nyaka sani; kendo onge chandruok moro mibiro pimo kode kendo.
“Ka Ruoth dine ok ongʼado ndalogo machiek, onge ngʼama dine otony; to nikech joma oyier, joge owuon ma osewalo, osengʼado ndalogo odoko machiek.
E kindeno ka ngʼato owachonu ni, ‘Ne, Kristo ni ka!’ kata ni, ‘Ne, En kucha!’ to kik uyie wachno.
Nimar joma wuondore ni gin Kristo to ok gin kod joma wuondore ni gin jonabi to ok gin nothinyre mi tim ranyisi kod honni mondo giwuondgo koda ka joma oyier, ka dipo mano ditimre.
Emomiyo ritreuru un uwegi; asenyisou gik moko duto motelo kapok kindego ochopo.
“To e ndalono, bangʼ masirano maduongʼno, “ ‘Wangʼ chiengʼ noimre, kendo dwe ok norieny;
Sulwe nolwar koa e polo, kendo chwech mag polo noyiengni!’
“To gie kindeno ji none Wuod Dhano kabiro koa e boche polo gi teko mangʼongo kod duongʼ.
Kendo enoor malaikege mi ochok joge moyiero moa e tunge piny nyaka chop giko polo.
“To puonjreuru wachni kuom yiend ngʼowu. Mapiyo ka bedene chako loth kendo itgi chako wuok to ungʼeyo ni ndalo oro chiegni.
Kata kamano, ka uneno ka gigi timore to ngʼeuru ni kindeno chiegni, mana ka gima en e dhoot.
Awachonu adier ni tiengʼni ok norum ngangʼ kapok gigi duto otimore.
Polo gi piny norum to wechena ok norum ngangʼ.
“Onge ngʼato mongʼeyo odiechiengno kata sa, obed malaike manie polo kata Wuowi, makmana Wuoro kende.
Beduru motangʼ kendo ritreuru, nikech ok ungʼeyo sa manotimre.
Nobed mana machal gi ngʼat mowuok e dalane odhi wuoth moro mabor, moweyo jotichne e tich mar rito gige, kosemiyo moro ka moro kuomgi gima onego otim, kendo koseketo jarito mondo orit dhoot.
“Omiyo ritreuru nikech ok ungʼeyo sa ma wuon ot nyalo biroe: kata nobi odhiambo kata chuny otieno, kata kogwen, kata ka piny yawore.
Kaponi obiro apoya nono to kik oyudi kinindo.
Gima awachonu ema, awacho ni ji duto ni, ‘Nenuru!’ ”
Kane odongʼ ndalo ariyo mondo Sap Pasaka kod Sawo mar makati ma ok oketie thowi ochopi, jodolo madongo gi jopuonj chik ne manyo yo moro malingʼ-lingʼ mane ginyalo makogo Yesu mondo ginege.
To ne giwinjore kendgi niya, “Kik watim kamano ka Sawo pod dhi nyime, nono to ji ongʼanyonwa.”
Kane oyudo Yesu ni Bethania, kochiemo e mesa e dala ngʼat moro miluongo ni Simon ja-dhoho, dhako moro nobiro gi chupa mar alabasta mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar kendo ma nengone tek. Notoyo ngʼut chupano mi oolo morno duto ewi Yesu.
Moko kuom joma ne ni kanyo nyiego nomako mi gikuotho e kindgi giwegi niya, “Morni iketho malit kayiem nangʼo?
Ne inyalo loke pesa mangʼeny moloyo chudo mar ngʼato kuom higa achiel mi pesago pogi ne joma odhier.” Ne gikwero mamano gi dwol makwiny.
To Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Weyeuru mos. Uchande nangʼo? Osetimona gima ber miwuoro.
Joma odhier ubiro bedogo kinde duto, kendo unyalo konyogi sa asaya muhero. To an ok ubi siko ka un koda ndalo duto.
Ne otimo monyalo. Ne oolo mo mangʼwe ngʼarno e ringra chon mondo oikago ne ikna.
Awachonu adier ni kamoro amora ma noyalie Injili e kind ogendini duto mag piny, gima dhakoni otimo bende nohul, kiparego.”
Eka Judas Iskariot, mane en achiel kuom jopuonjrene apar gariyo, nodhi ir jodolo madongo mondo ondhog Yesu oket e lwetgi.
Negimor gi wachno, mi gisingore ni gibiro miye pesa. Omiyo nochako manyo kinde maber mar kete e lwetgi.
Chiengʼ mokwongo mar Sap Makati ma ok oketie Thowi, chiengʼ mane ochuno jo-Yahudi mondo oyangʼ nyarombo mar Pasaka, jopuonjre Yesu nopenje niya, “Idwaro mondo wadhi waikni kama ichame Pasaka kanye?”
Kuom mano Yesu nooro jopuonjrene ariyo kowachonegi niya, “Dhiuru ei dala maduongʼ mondo urom gi ngʼato motingʼo dapi. Luweuru nyaka ot modhiye.
Uwach ne wuon ot modonjeno ni, ‘Japuonj penjo niya, ere oda mar welo monego achamie Sap Pasaka kod jopuonjrena?’
Obiro nyisou ot malach molos malo, kama osechanie kombe kendo oseiki; maber, kanyo ema uiknwa.”
Jopuonjrego noa modhi Dala maduongʼ moyudo gik moko mana kaka Yesu nosewachonegi. Omiyo negiloso Sap Pasaka.
Kane ochopo godhiambo, Yesu nochopo, ka en kod jopuonjrene apar gariyo.
Kane oyudo gichiemo, nowachonegi niya, “Awachonu adier ni achiel kuomu biro ndhoga, en ngʼat machiemo koda.”
Chunygi nodoko malit, mi moro ka moro nochako wachone niya, “Dobed an koso?”
To Yesu nodwokogi niya, “En achiel kuomu ji apar gariyo, ngʼat machiemo koda e tawo achiel.
Wuod Dhano biro dhi adier mana kaka nondiki kuome. To ngʼat mandhogo Wuod Dhano none malit! Dine obedo maber moloyo kane ok onywole.”
Kane oyudo gichiemo, Yesu nokawo makati, kendo bangʼ goyo erokamano, nongʼinge momiyo jopuonjrene kowacho niya, “Kawuru, ma e ringra.”
Bangʼe nokawo kikombe, mi ogoyo erokamano bangʼe omiyogi eka negimetho koa e kikombeno giduto.
Nowachonegi niya, “Ma en remba mar singruok, ma ochwer ne ji mangʼeny.
Awachonu adier ni ok anamadh olemb mzabibu kendo nyaka chop odiechiengʼno ma anamadhee kendo manyien e pinyruoth Nyasaye.”
Kane gisewero wend pak, ne giwuok gidhi nyaka e Got Zeituni.
Yesu nonyisogi niya, “Un duto ubiro ringo uweya, nimar ondiki niya, “ ‘Abiro goyo jakwath mi rombe noke.’
To bangʼ ka asechier to anatelnu adhi Galili.”
To Petro nonyiso Yesu niya, “An ok abi weyi kata ka ji duto oringo oweyi.”
Yesu nodwoko Petro niya, “Awachoni adier ni otieno ma kawuononi, kapok thuon gweno okok diriyo in iwuon wangʼ inikweda nyadidek.”
To Petro nosingore koramo niya, “Kata ka ochuno ni nyaka atho kodi, to ok abi kwedi ngangʼ.” Jopuonjre mamoko duto bende nowuoyo machalre gi Petro.
Negidhi kama iluongo ni Gethsemane. Yesu nowacho ne jopuonjrene niya, “Beduru ka e kinde ma alamo.”
Nokawo Petro gi Jakobo kod Johana modhigo, eka chunye nochako chandore kopongʼ gi paro mangʼeny.
Nowachone jopuonjrene niya, “Chunya opongʼ gi lit nyaka kar tho. Beduru ka mondo uriti.”
Ne ochwalore nyime matin bangʼe to ogoyo chonge piny mi olamo ni kanyalore to sa mar masirano okadhe.
Nolemo kowacho niya, “Abba,Wuora, gik moko duto nyalore kuomi. Gol kikombeni kuoma. To ok kaka adwaro to mana kaka in ema idwaro.”
Bangʼe nodok ir jopuonjrene monwangʼo ka ginindo. Nowachone Simon Petro niya, “Inindo? Rito otami kata kuom sa achiel kende?
Beduru motangʼ kendo lamuru mondo kik udonj e tem. Chuny oikore makmana ringruok ema nyap.”
Ne ochako owuok odhi kendo molemo kaka mokwongo.
To kane odwogo, nochako oyudogi ka ginindo, nikech nindo noingogi. Ne ok gingʼeyo gima diginyise.
Kane odwogo irgi kendo mar adek, nowachonegi niya, “Pod unindo aninda kendo uyweyo? Oromo! Sa osechopo. Neyeuru kaka indhogo Wuod Dhano kendo kaka ikete e lwet joricho.
Chunguru wadhi! Jandhokna osechopo!”
Kane pod owuoyo, Judas, mane en achiel kuom jopuonjrene apar gariyo nothinyore gi oganda mane omanore gi gik lwenje kaka ligangla gi arunge. Ne oorgi koa ir Jodolo madongo, jopuonj chik kod jodong oganda.
Noyudo jandhok osechano kodgi ranyisi mobiro timo kowacho niya, “Ngʼat ma wangʼ ananyodhi e En, makeuru mondo udhi kode kurite ma ok onyal ringo otony.”
Judas nopusore piyo piyo nyaka ir Yesu, mowachone niya, “Rabi!” bangʼe to onyodhe.
Jogo ne ondhiyo Yesu kendo negimake.
To achiel kuom joma nochungʼ machiegni nowuodho liganglane kendo notongʼo jatij jadolo maduongʼ mi ochodo ite oko.
Yesu nowachone joma nobiro makego niya, “Uwuokna oko mondo umaka ka utingʼo ligengni kod arunge mana ka gima an jatend koko mar jo-jendeke nangʼo?
Pile ka pile an kodu ka apuonjo e laru mag hekalu, to ne ok umaka. To koro ndiko nyaka chop kare.”
Eka ji duto noweye moringo odhi.
Wuowi moro matin mane ni duk, mane orwako law abola, noyudo luwo bangʼ Yesu. Kane gi liwe mi gimake, nopusore nigi,
moringo otony ka en duk, moweyo nyaka sukane kanyo.
Negikawo Yesu gitero ir jadolo maduongʼ mi jodolo madongo duto gi jodongo kaachiel gi jopuonj chik nochokore kaachiel.
Petro noluwo bangʼe gichien, modonjo kode nyaka e laru mar jadolo maduongʼ. Kanyo nobetie piny kaachiel gi jorito, kooyo mach e dwol.
Jodolo madongo gi jobuch Sanhedrin duto ne manyo ketho mane ginyalo donjonego Yesu mondo gingʼadne buch tho, to ne ok giyudo ketho moro amora kuome.
Ji mangʼeny bende ne jimbone wach ka giketo ketho mag miriambo e wiye, to wechegi ne ok chalre.
Bangʼe jomoko nochungʼ modonjone gi miriambo kawacho niya,
“Ne wawinjo jali kawacho ni, ‘Abiro muko hekalu ma dhano ogeroni eka bangʼ ndalo adek to, abiro gero machielo ma ok olos gi lwet dhano.’ ”
To kata mana gin bende wechegi ne ok chalre.
Eka jadolo maduongʼ nochungʼ malo e nyimgi mopenjo Yesu niya, “Dak idwok wachno? Ma wach manade ma jogi wacho kuomini?”
To Yesu nolingʼ alingʼa thi ma ok odwoke. Jadolo maduongʼ nochako openje niya, “In e Kristo ma Wuod Nyasaye Mangima koso?”
Yesu nodwoke niya, “Ee, An. To unune Wuod Dhano kobet e bat korachwich mar Jal Maratego kendo kolor oa e boche polo.”
Jadolo maduongʼ noyiecho lepe kowacho niya, “Pod wadwaro joneno mamoko nangʼo?
Un uwegi usewinjo koyanyo Nyasaye. Uparo nade?” Giduto ne gikwede kaka ngʼat mowinjore githo.
Eka jomoko nochako ngʼulo olawo kuome. Negitweyo wangʼe mi gigoye ngum, kagiwacho niya, “Hul ane ngʼa mogoyi.” Askeche to nongʼwane ka girodhe.
Kane oyudo Petro obet oko e laru, achiel kuom nyiri matiyone jadolo maduongʼ nobiro machiegni.
Ka noneno Petro kaoyo mach, nodhi machiegni kode morange matut, bangʼe owachone niya, “In bende ne in gi ja-Nazareth miluongo ni Yesu.”
To Petro nokwere kawacho niya, “Ok angʼeyo kendo kata winjo ok awinj tiend gima iwachono.” Bangʼe noa kanyo odhi e dhorangach.
Ka nyako ma jatichno nochako onene e dhorangach, nochako owacho ne joma ochungʼ kanyo niya, “Ngʼatni en achiel kuomgi.”
To Petro nochako okwer kendo. Bangʼ kinde matin joma nochungʼ machiegni nowacho ne Petro niya, “adier in achiel kuomgi, nimar in ja-Galili.”
To en nochako kwongʼore mowachonegi koramo niya, “Ok angʼeyo ngʼat muwuoyo kuomeno.”
Gikanyono thuon gweno nokok kendo mar ariyo. Eka Petro noparo wach mane oyudo Yesu osewachone niya, “Kapok thuon gweno okok nyadiriyo to wangʼ inikweda nyadidek.” Wachno nobedone malit mi nochako ywak.
Gokinyi mangʼich, jodolo madongo gi jodong oganda gi jopuonj Chik, kaachiel gi jobuch Sanhedrin ne joriwo paro kuom gima nowinjore gitim. Negitweyo Yesu mi gitere e nyim Pilato.
Pilato nopenjo Yesu niya, “In e ruodh jo-Yahudi?” To Yesu nodwoke niya, “Ee, en kaka iwachono.”
Jodolo madongo nodonjone gi weche mathoth.
Omiyo Pilato nochako openje niya, “Dwokawa, donge ineno kaka gidonjoni gi ketho mangʼeny?”
To Yesu nolingʼ alingʼa kendo ma ok odwoke, mi Pilato nohum nono.
Ne en chik ni mondo ogony ngʼat achiel motwe e kinde mag sawo mar Pasaka kaluwore gi kwayo mar jopiny.
To e ndalono ja-kiragi moro ma nyinge Barabas, ne ni e od twech, kaachiel gi jojiemo mamoko manotwe kuom wach nek kod pingo loch.
Ogandano nobiro mokwayo Pilato mondo otimnegi kaka nojatimo higa ka higa.
To Pilato nopenjogi niya, “Duher mondo agonynu ruodh jo-Yahudi koso?”
Nimar nongʼeyo ni ich lit ema nomiyo jodolo madongo noketo Yesu e lwete.
To jodolo madongo nojiwo oganda mondo oyie gi dwarogi ni Pilato ogony mana Barabas.
Pilato nopenjogi niya, “To koro atim angʼo gi Jal muluongo ni ruodh jo-Yahudini?”
Ne gikok matek niya, “Gure!”
Pilato nopenjogi niya, “Nangʼo, en ketho mane mosetimo madimi gure?” To negimedo kok matek moloyo kagiwacho niya, “Gure!”
Nikech Pilato ne dwaro mondo omor oganda, nogonyonegi Barabas. Yesu to nogolo chik mondo ochwadi bangʼe nokete e lwetgi mondo gigure.
Askeche nokawo Yesu motero e laru mar od ruoth (tiende ni Paratori) kama ne ji romee, mine giluongo oganda mar askeche duto irgi.
Negibolo kuom Yesu kandho makwar, eka ne gikado osimbo mar kudho kendo gisidho e wiye.
Eka negichako jare niya, “Ber Ruodh jo-Yahudi.”
Kinde ka kinde negigoyo wiye gi luth, kendo ka gingʼulo kuome olawo, bende negikulore e nyime ka gigoyo chong-gi piny ka gilame.
To kane gisejare ne gilonyo kandho makwar mane girwakone mi girwakone lepe owuon. Bangʼe ne gitere oko mondo gigure.
Ngʼat moro ma ja-Kurene miluongo ni Simon, mane wuon Aleksanda gi Rufus, noyudo kadho kanyo koa e gwengʼ moro. Ne gichune mondo otingʼ msalaba.
Koro ne gitero Yesu kama iluongo ni Golgotha (tiende ni “Hanga Wich”).
Kanyo negimiye divai moru gi yath makweyo rem miluongo ni mane-mane mondo omadhi, to nodagi.
Eka negigure. Ne gipogore lepe, ka gigoyo ombulu mondo gingʼe gima ngʼato ka ngʼato onego okaw.
Negigure sa adek okinyi.
Ne nitie ndiko mondik ewi msalaba manyiso kethone niya: Ma en Ruodh Jo-Yahudi.
Jomecho ariyo bende negiguro kode, achiel e bathe korachwich to machielo e bathe koracham. [
Mano nochopo ndiko ma nondiki chon niya, “Nokwane e oganda joma richo.”]
Joma ne kadho kanyo nojare ka giyanye ka gikino wiyegi kendo giwacho niya, “Oo! In manyocha iwacho ni inyalo ketho hekalu mi ichak igere bangʼ ndalo adekni,
wuog ane e msalaba ilor piny kendo iresri kendi ane!”
Machalre kamano bende jodolo madongo gi jopuonj chik e kindgi giwegi bende nojare kagiwacho niya, “Ne oreso jomoko to en koro ok onyal resore owuon!
Kristo ma Ruodh jo-Israel koro olor ane oa ewi msalaba mondo wane, eka wayie kuome.” Jok mane ogur kode bende nodhuole gi ayany.
Kar sa auchiel mar odiechiengʼ, mudho nobiro moimo piny duto nyaka sa ochiko.
Ka sa ochiko noromo Yesu noywak gi dwol maduongʼ kowacho niya, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakthani?” (ma tiende ni, “Nyasacha, Nyasacha, iweya nangʼo?”).
Ka moko kuom joma nochungʼ machiegni nowinjo mano, negiwacho niya, “Winjuru, oluongo Elija.”
Ngʼato achiel noringo okawo siponj ma onyume e kongʼo makech, kendo nochome ewi odundu mabor bangʼe omiyo Yesu mondo omadhi. Kowacho niya, “Koro weyeuru mos, wane ka Elija biro mondo orese.”
Yesu noywak matek bangʼe chunye nochot.
Pasia mar hekalu noyiech e diere tir, chakre malo nyaka piny.
To kane jatend jolweny mane ochungʼ e nyim Yesu ne owinjo kaka oywak bangʼe oneno kaka otho, nowacho niya, “En adier chuth ni jali ne en Wuod Nyasaye!”
Ne nitie mon moko mane ngʼicho gichien. Moko kuomgi ne gin Maria ma aa Magdala gi Maria min Jakobo matin, ma bende min Joses, kod Salome.
Mon-gi ema ne luwo Yesu koa Galili ka gichiwone gik monego okonyrego. Mon mamoko mathoth ma noluwe koa kode Jerusalem bende ne ni kanyo.
Ne en Chiengʼ Ikruok (ma en odiechiengʼ motelone Sabato). Omiyo ka nochopo seche mag odhiambo,
Josef ja-Arimathaya, mane en ngʼat mogen e Buch Jodongo, kendo mane en owuon orito neno pinyruoth Nyasaye, nodhi ir Pilato gi chir mokwayo ringre Yesu.
Pilato nowuoro ka nowinjo ni Yesu osetho, omiyo noluongo jatend jolweny mopenje kapo Yesu nosetho adier.
To kane owinjo kuom jatend jolweny ni ne en kamano, nochiwo ringre Yesu ne Josef.
Eka Josef nongʼiewo nanga marep-rep, mi noloro ringre piny moboye gi nanga marep-rep eka nokete e bur mane osekunyo ariwa e kor lwanda. Bangʼe nongʼielo kidi mi oumogo dho liendno.
Maria ma aa Magdala kod Maria min Joses noneno kama nopiele Yesu.
Bangʼ ka Sabato oserumo, Maria ma aa Magdala gi Maria min Jakobo kod Salome nokelo modhi mangʼwe ngʼar mondo giwirgo ringre Yesu.
Okinyi mangʼich, odiechiengʼ mokwongo mar juma ka chiengʼ osewuok, negichako wuoth mar dhi kar liel,
kendo negipenjore ngʼato gi ngʼato niya, “En ngʼa mabiro ngʼielonwa kidi e dho liel oko?”
To kane gitingʼo wangʼ-gi, negineno ka kidi mangʼongono nosengʼiel oko.
Kane gidonjo ei bur, negineno wuowi moro matin morwako kandho marachar kobet e bath bur korachwich, kendo ne gibuok ahinya.
Wuowino nokwerogi niya, “Weuru bwok. Umanyo Yesu ja-Nazareth, mane ogur. Oonge ka, osechier! Neuru kamane gipiele.
To wuoguru udhi unyis jopuonjrene, kaachiel gi Petro ni, ‘Otelo nyimu odhi Galili. Kuno ema ubiro nenee mana kaka nosenyisou motelo.’ ”
Mon-go nowuok moringo oa e liel kanyo ka gitetni kendo dhogi omoko, ne ok giwachone ngʼato gimoro amora e yo nikech negiluor. [
Kane Yesu ochier kogwen, chiengʼ mokwongo mar juma, nofwenyore mokwongo ne Maria ma aa Magdala, mane ogolo jochiende abiriyo kuome.
Maria nodhi monyiso jogo mane ni kode, jogo mane ywak kendo jogo mane dengo.
Kane giwinjo ni Yesu ngima, kendo ni Maria nosenene ne ok giyie.
Bangʼe Yesu nofwenyore ne ji ariyo kuomgi kinde machielo, ka giwuotho e gwengʼ.
Jogi noduogo monyiso joma moko wachni; to kata kamano ne ok giyie kodgi.
Achien Yesu nofwenyore ni joote apar gachiel kane oyudo gichiemo; noseyogi nikech yie mane giongego, kendo nikech chunygi ne tek mane ok ginyal yie jogo mane osenene bangʼ kane osechier.
Nowachonegi niya, “Dhiuru e piny duto mondo uyal Injili ne chwech duto.
Ngʼato angʼata moyie kendo obatisi nokwo, to ngʼat ma ok oyie bura nolo.
To ranyisigi noluw joma oyie: E nyinga giniriemb jochiende; giniwuo gi dhok manyien;
ginimak thuonde gi lwetgi, kendo ginimodhi kwiri mager, to ok ginihinyre ngangʼ, giniket lwetgi kuom joma tuo, to jotuo nobed mangima.”
Bangʼ ka Ruoth Yesu nosewuoyo kodgi nokawe motere e polo, mobedo e bat korachwich mar Nyasaye.
Eka jopuonjre nowuok odhi oko kendo oyalo kuonde duto, to Ruoth notiyo kodgi kendo nosiro wachne gi honni mane oluwore kod yalo.]
Ji mangʼeny osebedo ka chano weche mane otimore e dierwa,
mana kaka nochiwgi ne wan kod jogo motelo mane gin joneno wangʼ gi wangʼ kendo jotich wachni.
Kuom mano, an bende kaka asenono tiend wechegi malongʼo nyaka aa chakruok, en gima ber bende mondo andikni e yo mochanore maler, in moluor Theofilo,
mondo ingʼe adier mar gik mosepuonji.
E ndalo ma Herode ne ruodh Judea, ne nitie jadolo ma nyinge Zekaria, ma ne en achiel kuom oganda jodolo mag Abija; chiege Elizabeth bende ne nyar dhood Harun.
Giduto ji ariyo ne gin joma kare e nyim Nyasaye, negirito chike Ruoth Nyasaye kod buchene, maonge ketho.
To ne gionge gi nyithindo, nikech Elizabeth ne migumba, kendo ji ariyogo ne hikgi oseniangʼ.
Chiengʼ moro kane ogandagi gi Zekaria ne ni e tich to notiyo kaka jadolo e nyim Nyasaye,
Noyiere gi ombulu kaka chik mar jodolo, mondo odonji ei hekalu mar Ruoth kendo owangʼ ubani.
To ka sa mar wangʼo ubani nochopo, jolemo duto nochokore oko kendo negilamo.
Eka malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nofwenyorene, kochungo yo korachwich mar bath kendo mar misango mar wangʼo ubani.
Kane Zekaria onene, ne obwok kendo luoro nomake.
To malaika nowachone ni: “Kik ibed maluor, Zekaria; lamoni osewinji chiegi Elizabeth biro nywoloni wuowi, kendo inichake Johana.
Obiro bedo ni mor kod ilo, to ji mangʼeny nomor nikech nywolne,
Nimar enobed ngʼat maduongʼ e nyim Ruoth. Ok nomadh kongʼo kata gimoro amora makech, to enopongʼ gi Roho Maler chakre nywolne.
Obiro kelo jo-Israel mangʼeny ir Ruoth Nyasachgi.
Kendo notel nyim Ruoth, gi chuny kod teko mar Elija, koduogo chunje wuone ir nyithindgi, kendo koloko joma wigi tek mondo oluw rieko mar ji makare, koiko oganda mowinjore ni Ruoth.”
Zekaria nopenjo malaika niya, “Ere kaka anyalo ngʼeyo ni wachni en adier? An ngʼat moti kendo chiega bende hike oniangʼ.”
Malaika nodwoko niya, “An Gabriel, achungo e nyim Nyasaye, kendo oseora mondo awuo kodi kendo nyisi wach maberni.
To koro ibiro bedo momo kendo ok iniwinj nyaka ndalo ma gini notimre, nikech ne ok iyie wechena mabiro bedo adiera e kindegi mowinjore.”
E kindeno, ji ne rito Zekaria kendo negiwuoro ni angʼo momiyo osebedo amingʼa ei hekalu.
Kane owuok oko, to ne ok onyal wuoyo kodgi. Negingʼeyo ni noseneno fweny ei hekalu, nimar nosiko konyisogi gik moko gi lwete to ne ok onyal wuoyo.
Ka kindene mar tich norumo, nodok dala.
Bangʼ mani chiege Elizabeth nomako ich to kuom dweche abich ne ok owuok oko.
Nowacho niya, “Ruoth Nyasaye osetimona ma. E ndalogi osenyiso ngʼwonone kuoma kendo ogolona wichkuot e kind ji.”
E dwe mar auchiel, Nyasaye nooro malaika Gabriel mondo odhi Nazareth, e dala mar Galili;
ir nyako ngili, mane oseketo winjruok mar kend gi ngʼato ma nyinge Josef ma nyakwar Daudi. Nying nyakono mapok ongʼeyo dichwo ne en Maria.
Malaika nodhi ire momose niya, “Amosi, in nyako mogwedhi moloyo! Ruoth ni kodi.”
Wechego nochando chuny Maria ahinya, to nowuoro mos mane omosegono, ni tiende angʼo.
To malaika nowachone niya, “Kik iluor Maria, nikech Nyasaye osetimoni ngʼwono.
Ibiro mako ich kendo ininywol wuowi, to inimiye nying ni Yesu.
Obiro bedo maduongʼ kendo noluonge ni Wuod Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo, Ruoth Nyasaye biro miye kom loch mar kwar mare, Daudi.
To enobed gi loch kuom od Jakobo nyaka chiengʼ, pinyruodhe ok norum ngangʼ.”
Maria nopenjo malaika niya, “Mani biro bedo nadi, to pod an nyako mapok ongʼeyo dichwo?”
Malaika nodwoko niya, “Roho Maler biro biro kuomi, kendo teko mar Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo biro umi. Kuom mano jal maler monego nywol ibiro luongo ni Wuod Nyasaye.
Bende ngʼeni Elizabeth ma watni biro bedo gi nyathi kata e hike moniangʼno, to dhako mane iluongo ni migumbano, koro en gi ich mar dweche auchiel.
Nimar onge gima nyalo tamo Nyasaye.”
Maria nodwoko niya, “An jatich Ruoth, onego timre kaka iwacho.” Eka malaika noweye.
E kindeno Maria noikore mowuok mapiyo kodhi e piny motimo gode mar Judea,
kama nodonjo e dala Zekaria kendo nomoso Elizabeth.
Ka Elizabeth nowinjo mos mar Maria nyathi notugo e iye kendo Elizabeth nopongʼ gi Roho Maler.
Gi dwol maduongʼ nomor kowacho niya, “In dhako mogwedhi kuom mon, kendo nyathi ma ibiro nywolo bende ogwedhi!
To angʼo momiyo obedo mangʼwon koda momiyo min Ruodha dibi ira?
Piyo piyo nono ka mosni nochopo e ita, nyathi manie iya notugo gi mor.
Ogwedhi in dhako moseyie ni gima Ruoth osewachone biro timore.”
To Maria nowacho niya, “Chunya opako Ruoth
kendo chunya oil kuom Nyasaye Jawarna,
nimar oseparo dhier mar jatichne. Chakre kawuononi tienge duto biro luonga ni ngʼat mogwedhi,
nimar Jal Maratego osetimona gik madongo, Nyinge ler.
Kechne chopo kuom jogo moluore chakre tiengʼ ka tiengʼ.
Osetimo timbe madongo gi bade; okeyo jogo masungore e parogi maiye.
Osegolo ruodhi e kombegi to osetingʼo malo joma muol.
Oseyiengʼo jokech gi gik mabeyo to oseriembo jo-mwandu gi lwetgi nono.
Osekonyo jatichne Israel, koparo bedo mangʼwon,
ne Ibrahim kod nyikwaye nyaka chiengʼ, mana kaka nowachone kwerewa.”
Maria nodak gi Elizabeth kuom dweche madirom adek eka nodok thurgi.
Kane en kinde mane Elizabeth onego yudie nyathi, nonywolo nyathi ma wuowi.
Jogwengʼ kod wedene nowinjo ni Ruoth Nyasaye osetimone kech maduongʼ mi gibedo kode e morne.
Chiengʼ mar aboro negibiro mondo giter nyathi nyangu kendo negidwaro chake nying wuon-gi Zekaria,
to min-gi nowuoyo kendo owacho niya, “Ooyo! Ibiro luonge ni Johana.”
Negiwachone niya, “Onge ngʼato moro kuom wedeni man-gi nyingni.”
Eka ne giwuoyo gi wuon mare gi lwetgi, mondo giyud ni en nying mane madoher luongogo nyathi.
Nokwayo bao mar ndiko kendo ji duto nowuoro ka nondiko niya, “Nyinge en Johana.”
Gikanyono dhoge noyawore kendo lewe nogonyore, mi nochako wuoyo, kopako Nyasaye.
Luoro nomako jogwengʼ duto, kendo ji duto manie piny gode Judea ne loso kuom gigi duto.
Ngʼato ka ngʼato mane owinjo wachni ne owuoro ahinya, kapenjo niya, “Nyathini biro bedo machal nade?” Nimar lwet Ruoth ne ni kode.
Wuon mare Zekaria nopongʼ gi Roho Maler kendo nokoro wach kama:
“Pak obed ne Ruoth Nyasach Israel; nikech osebiro kendo osereso joge.
Osechungonwa tungʼ mar warruok marwa, e od jatichne Daudi,
(kaka nowacho gi dho jonabige maler mag ndalo machon),
warruok ae lwet wasikwa, kendo ae lwet jogo duto mamon kodwa,
mondo onyis kech ne kwerewa, kendo opar singruokne maler,
singruok mane okwongʼorego ne kwarwa Ibrahim:
mondo oreswa e lwet wasikwa kendo omi watine maonge luoro,
e ngima maler kod tim makare e nyime ndalowa duto.
“To in, nyathina, ibiro luongi ni janabi mar Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo; nimar ibiro telo e nyim Ruoth mondo ilosne yo,
kendo imi joge ngʼeyo wach mar warruok kuom weruok mar richogi,
nikech ngʼwono mamuol mar Nyasachwa, ma chiengʼ mawuok biro kelonwa koa e polo,
mondo orieny kuom jogo modak e mudho, kendo e tipo mar tho, mondo otel ne tiendewa e yor kwe.”
To nyathino nodongo kendo nobedo motegno e chuny; bende nodak e thim nyaka nochopo chiengʼ mane onyisore ratiro e nyim Israel.
E ndalogo, Kaisar Agusto nogolo chik mondo okwan ji e piny Rumi duto.
(Ma ne en kweno mokwongo mane otimore ka Kwirinio ne en ruodh Siria.)
To ngʼato ka ngʼato nodhi e dalagi owuon mondo ondik nyinge.
Kuom mano, Josef bende noa e dala mar Nazareth, e piny Galili modhiyo Judea nyaka Bethlehem e dala mar Daudi, nikech ne en achiel kuom joodgi kendo anywola gi Daudi.
Nodhi kuno mondo okwane kod Maria, mane osingore mondo okendi, kendo nogeno yudo nyathi.
Kane gin kuno, kinde mar nywolo nyathi nochopo,
to nonywolo nyathine makayo, ma wuowi. Ne oboye gi nanga kendo nokete e sanduku mar chiemb dhok, nikech ne onge thuolo e od welo.
To ne nitie jokwadh rombe manodak oko e lek machiegni kanyo, ka girito jambgi gotieno.
Malaika mar Ruoth nobiro irgi kendo duongʼ mar Ruoth Nyasaye norieny, molworogi, mine giluor.
To malaika nowachonegi niya, “Kik uluor. Akelonu wach maber mar mor maduongʼ mabiro bedo ni ji duto.
Kawuononi e dala mar Daudi, osenywolnu Jawar; en Kristo Ruoth.
Mani nobednu ranyisi: Ubiro yudo nyathi ma obo gi nengni ka onindo ei sanduku mar chiemb dhok.”
Apoya nono oganda maduongʼ mar jopolo nothinyore kod malaika ka gipako Nyasaye kendo wacho niya,
“Duongʼ obed ni Nyasaye e polo malo kendo kwe obed e piny ne ji ma Nyasaye oyiero.”
Kane malaika noseweyo jogi kendo dhiyo e polo, jokwath nowacho kendgi niya, “Wadhiuru Bethlehem mondo wane gima osetimore, ma Ruoth osenyisowa kuome ni.”
Kuom mano negidhiyo mapiyo kendo negiyudo Maria gi Josef kod nyathi konindo e sanduku mar chiemb dhok.
Kane gisenene, negilando wach mar gima ne owachnegi kuom nyathini,
Kendo ji duto manowinjo wachni, nowuoro gima jokwath nowachonegi.
To Maria nokano wechegi duto kendo nokanogi e chunye.
Jokwath nodok, ka gipako Nyasaye kendo miyo Nyasaye duongʼ kuom gik moko duto mane gisewinjo kendo neno, mana kaka nosenyisgi.
Odiechiengʼ mar aboro kane kinde monego otere nyangu ochopo nomiye nying ni Yesu, nyingno mane malaika osemiye kapok omak ichne.
Kane kinde ochopo mar pwodhruok kaka Chik mar Musa nochopo, Josef gi Maria notere Jerusalem mondo gichiwe ne Ruoth Nyasaye
(mana kaka nondiki e chik mar Ruoth Nyasaye niya, “Nyathi ka nyathi makayo ma wuowi nyaka wal ne Ruoth”),
kendo kitimo misango koluwore gi gima owachi e Chik mar Ruoth Nyasaye ni mondo ochiw: “akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo.”
E kindeno ne nitiere ngʼato Jerusalem miluongo ni Simeon, ne en ngʼat makare kendo moluoro Nyasaye. Norito loch mar Israel, kendo Roho Maler neni kuome.
Roho Maler nofwenyone ni ok obi tho kapok oneno Kristo ma Ruoth Nyasaye biro oro.
Roho notelone motere ei hekalu. Kane jonywol okelo nyathigi ma Yesu mondo otimne gino ma Chik dwaro,
Simeon nokawe moriwe e bade kendo nopako Nyasaye, kowacho niya,
“Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, kaka ne isesingo, koro we jatichni odhi gi kwe.
Nimar wengena oseneno warruokni,
miseiko e nyim ji duto,
ler mar fweny ne joma ok jo-Yahudi, to mar duongʼ ni jogi Israel.”
Wuon gi min nyathi nowuoro wach mane owach kuome.
Eka Simeon nogwedhogi kendo nowachone Maria, min mare niya, “Nyathini oketi mondo okel podho piny gichungʼ malo mar ji mangʼeny e Israel, kendo obed ranyisi mibiro wuo kuome marach.
Kuom mano paro mag chunje mangʼeny ibiro fwenyo. To ligangla biro chwoyo chunyi in iwuon bende.”
Ne nitie janabi madhako bende, Ana, nyar Fanuel ma ja-dhood Asher. Ne oti ahinya; bende noyudo osedak gi chwore higni abiriyo bangʼ kendne,
eka nodoko dhako ma chwore otho nyaka koro ne en ja-higni piero aboro gangʼwen. Ne ok oa e hekalu to nolemo otieno gi odiechiengʼ, kotweyo chiemo kendo olamo.
Kane obiro irgi e kindeno, nogoyo erokamano ni Nyasaye kendo nowuoyo kuom nyathi ni ji duto mane ogeno kuom resruok mar Jerusalem.
Kane Josef gi Maria josetimo duto mane dwarore kaluwore gi chik mar Ruoth, negidok Galili e dala margi Nazareth.
To nyathino nodongo kendo nobedo motegno; nopongʼ kod rieko, kendo ngʼwono mar Nyasaye ne ni kuome.
Higa ka higa jonywolne ne dhiyo Jerusalem e Sawo mar Pasaka.
Kane en ja-higni apar gariyo, negidhiyo e Sawono kaluwore kod timgi.
Bangʼ ka sawono norumo, ka jonywolne nedok dala, wuowi Yesu nodongʼ chien Jerusalem, to ne ok gingʼeyo mani.
Ka giparo ni ne en ei oganda margi, negiwuotho moromo ndalo achiel eka negichako manye e dier wedegi kod osiepe.
Kane ok giyude, negidok Jerusalem mondo gimanye.
Bangʼ ndalo adek negiyude ei agolni mag hekalu, kobedo e kind jopuonj, kowinjogi kendo penjogi penjo.
Ngʼato ka ngʼato manowinje nowuoro ngʼeyone kod dwokoge.
Kane jonywolne onene, negihum. Min-gi nowachone niya, “Wuoda, angʼo momiyo isetimonwa kamano? An kod wuonu wasedwari ka wan gi parruok.”
Nopenjogi niya, “Angʼo momiyo ne umanya? Ok ungʼeyo ni onego abed e od wuora?”
To ne ok gingʼeyo gima ne owachonegi.
Eka nodhi nyaka Nazareth kodgi kendo nomiyogi luor kowinjogi. To min mare nokano wechegi duto e chunye.
To Yesu nomedo dongo kobedo gi rieko kendo e ringruok, ka en gi ngʼwono gi Nyasaye kod ji.
E higa mar apar gabich mar loch Kaisar Teberio, kane Pontio Pilato ne ruodh Judea, to Herode ne ruodh Galili, kendo Filipo owadgi ne ruodh Iturea gi Trakoniti, to Lusania ne ruodh Abilen,
e kinde ma jodolo madongo ne gin Anas gi Kaifas, wach Nyasaye ne obiro ne Johana wuod Zekaria e thim.
Nodhi e piny duto molworo Jordan, koyalo batiso mar weyo richo mondo mi owenegi richo.
Kaka nondiki e kitabu mar weche mag Isaya janabi niya: “Ngʼat moro kok e thim ni, ‘Losuru yo ne Jehova Nyasaye, losneuru yore moriere tir.
Hoho ka hoho nobugi mapongʼ, gode madongo gi matindo duto nopie. Yore mobam biro bedo moriere, yore motimo gogni nobed mayom.
Kendo ji duto biro neno warruok mar Nyasaye.’ ”
Johana nowacho ne oganda mane biro mondo obatisgi niya, “Un koth thuondegi! En ngʼa mane onyisou mondo uring utony ne mirima mager mabiro?
Nyaguru olemo manyiso ni uselokoru uweyo richo. Kendo kik upar e kindu uwegi ni, ‘Wan gi Ibrahim kaka wuonwa.’ Nimar awachonu ni kata mana kitegi Nyasaye nyalo loko nyithind Ibrahim.
Le oseketi e tiend yiende, kendo yien ka yien ma ok nyag olemo mabeyo ibiro tongʼ mi go piny kendo witi e mach.”
Oganda nopenje niya, “Kara en angʼo monego watim?”
Johana nodwoko niya, “Ngʼat man-gi sede ariyo owinjore chiw achiel okonygo nyawadgi ma ongego, kendo jalno man kod chiemo bende onego tim kamano.”
Josol osuru bende nobiro ire mondo obatisgi. Negipenje niya, “Japuonj. En angʼo mowinjore watim?”
Nonyisogi niya, “Kik usol osuru moloyo kaka idwaro ni mondo usol.”
Eka askeche moko nopenje niya, “To en angʼo mowinjore watim.” Nodwokogi niya, “Kik uma ngʼato pesa githuon kata donjo ne ji gi miriambo to misara maru muyudo mondo oromu.”
Ji ne pod rito gi geno ahinya kendo giduto ne giwuoro ka giparo e chunjegi ni nyalo bedo ni Johana e Kristo.
Johana nodwokogi duto niya, “An abatisou gi pi. To ngʼato moro biro bangʼa ma oloya gi duongʼ, ma ok awinjora gonyo tond wuochene. En obiro batisou gi Roho Maler kod mach.
Odheru mare mar piedho cham ni e lwete mondo opiedhgo cham duto maler e kar dino cham, kendo ochok cham koketo e deche, to obiro wangʼo mihudhi gi mach ma ok nyal negi.”
To gi weche moko mangʼeny Johana nojiwo ji kendo noyalo Injili ne ji.
To ka Johana nokwero Ruoth Herode nikech wach Herodia, ma chi owadgi, kendo kuom gik mamoko maricho mane osetimo,
Herode nomedo timo gima rachie moloyo kendo nomako Johana motero e od twech.
Kane ibatiso ji duto, Yesu bende ne obatisi. To kane olemo, polo noyawore
kendo Roho Maler mane obiro e kido mar akuru nolor mopiyo kuome, to dwol noa e polo mawacho niya, “In e Wuoda, ma ahero; chunya mor kodi.”
Koro ka Yesu owuon nochako tichne ka hike dirom piero adek. Ne iparo nine en wuod Josef, wuod Heli
wuod Mathat, wuod Lawi, wuod Melki, wuod Janai, wuod Josef,
wuod Matathias, wuod Amos, wuod Nahum, wuod Esli, wuod Nagai,
wuod Maath, wuod Matathias, wuod Semein, wuod Josek, wuod Joda,
wuod Joanan, wuod Resa, wuod Zerubabel, wuod Shealtiel, wuod Ner,
wuod Melki, wuod Adi, wuod Kosam, wuod Elmadam, wuod Er,
wuod Joshua, wuod Eliezer, wuod Jorim, wuod Mathat, wuod Lawi,
wuod Simeon, wuod Juda, wuod Josef, wuod Jonam, wuod Eliakim,
wuod Melea, wuod Mena, wuod Matatha, wuod Nathan, wuod Daudi,
wuod Jesse, wuod Obed, wuod Boaz, wuod Salmon, wuod Nashon,
wuod Aminadab, wuod Arni, wuod Hezron, wuod Perez, wuod Juda,
wuod Jakobo, wuod Isaka, wuod Ibrahim, wuod Tera, wuod Nahor,
wuod Serug, wuod Reu, wuod Peleg, wuod Eber, wuod Shela,
wuod Kainan, wuod Arfaksad, wuod Shem, wuod Nowa, wuod Lamek,
wuod Methusela, wuod Enoka, wuod Jared, wuod Mahalalel, wuod Kenan,
wuod Enosh, wuod Seth, wuod Adam, wuod Nyasaye.
Yesu, kopongʼ gi Roho Maler, noa Jordan, kendo notere gi Roho nyaka e thim,
kama jachien notemee kuom ndalo piero angʼwen. Kuom ndalo piero angʼwen-go ne ok ochamo gimoro e ndalogo duto, to bangʼ ka ndalogo noserumo kech nokaye.
Satan nowachone niya, “Ka in Wuod Nyasaye adier, nyis kidini olokre kuon.”
Yesu nodwoke niya, “Ondiki ni, ‘Dhano ok bed mangima nikech chiemo kende.’”
Eka Satan notere kama otingʼore malo kendo ka diemo wangʼ nono nonyise pinjeruodhi duto mag piny.
To nowachone niya, “Abiro miyi loch mag pinjegi duto gi duongʼ-gi, nimar osemiyagi, kendo anyalo chiwogi ne ngʼato angʼata, madwaro.
Omiyo ka igoyo chongi piny ma ilama, to magi duto biro bedo magi.”
Yesu nodwoko niya, “Ondiki ni, ‘Lam Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi kendo en kende ema itine.’”
Eka Satan notere Jerusalem kendo nomiyo ochungo e osuch hekalu malo mogik. Eka nowachone niya, “Ka in Wuod Nyasaye to chikri piny.
Nimar ondiki niya, “ ‘Obiro miyo malaika mage chik nikech in mondo oriti maber;
gibiro tingʼi malo e lwetgi, mondo kik ichwany tiendi e kidi.’”
Yesu nodwoko niya, “Ondiki bende ni, ‘Kik item Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasachi.’”
Kane Satan osetieko temgi duto, noweye nyaka kinde moro machielo.
Yesu nodok Galili gi teko mar Roho, kendo wachne nolandore e gwenge duto moluoro Galili.
Nopuonjo e sinagokegi, kendo ji duto nopake.
Nodhi Nazareth kuma nodonge, kendo chiengʼ Sabato nodhi e sinagogi, kaka nobedo kite kendo nochungo mondo osom.
Nomiye kitap Isaya janabi, ka oelogo, noyudo kama nondikie ni:
“Roho mar Jehova Nyasaye ni kuoma, nikech osewira moyiera, mondo ayal Injili ne joma odhier. Oseora mondo aland ne joma otwe ni gin thuolo, kendo ni muofni ni oyaw wengegi, ne joma isando ni ogonygi,
bende ni mondo aland ni ma e higa mar ngʼwono mar Jehova Nyasaye.”
Eka noumo kitabuno, mi nochiwe ni jatich, kendo nobedo piny ka wenge ji duto e sinagogi ne ngʼiye matek,
to nochako kowachonegi niya, “Kawuono ndikoni chopo kare ka uwinjo.”
Ji duto nowuoyo maber kuome kendo negiwuoro ahinya weche mag ngʼwono manowuok e dhoge. Negipenjo niya, “Donge ngʼatni en wuod Josef?”
Yesu nowachonegi niya, “Adier chutho ubiro wachona ngeroni ni, ‘Jathieth, changri iwuon! Tim e dalau ka gigo ma wasewinjo ni ne itimo Kapernaum.’ ”
Nodhi nyime kowacho niya, “Awachonu adiera, onge janabi mirwako e dalagi owuon.
Adier awachonu ni ne nitie mon ma chwogi otho mangʼeny e Israel e kinde mar Elija, kane polo olor kuom higni adek gi nus kendo ne nitie kech mager e piny kuonde duto.
To kata kamano ne ok oor Elija ir moro kata achiel kuomgi, to makmana dhako ma chwore otho e dala mar Zarefath e gwengʼ Sidon.
Bende ne nitie ji mangʼeny e Israel mane nigi dhoho e kinde mar Elisha janabi to onge kata achiel mane opwodhi makmana Naaman ja-Siria kende.”
Ji duto mane ni e sinagogi ne mirima mager omako kane giwinjo wechegi.
Negia malo mine giriembe gigole oko mar dala kendo tere e geng got kama nogerie dalano mondo gidhire olwar piny.
Kata kamano nowuotho awuotha kokadho e kind oganda modhi kuma nodhiyoe.
Eka nodhi Kapernaum, dala manie Galili, kendo chiengʼ Sabato nochako puonjo ji.
Negiwuoro puonjne, nikech wechene ne nigi teko.
To e sinagogi ne nitie ngʼat moro mane nigi jachien marach. Ngʼatni noywak kogoyo koko matek kowacho niya,
“En angʼo midwaro timo kodwa, Yesu ja-Nazareth? Isebiro mondo itiekwa koso? Angʼeyo ngʼama in, in Ngʼat Maler Mar Nyasaye!”
Yesu nokwere matek niya, “Lingʼ thi! Wuogi ia kuome!” Eka jachien nogoyo ngʼatno piny e nyimgi duto kendo nowuok ma ok ohinye.
Jogo duto nowuoro kendo negipenjore niya, “Ma puonj manade? Kuom teko maduongʼ kod loch, ochiko koda ka jochiende kendo giwuok.”
To humb Yesu ne olandore e alwora duto kuonde mokiewo gi gwengʼ mane entie.
Yesu noa e sinagogi kendo nodhi e dala Simon. Koro min chi Simon ne nigi tuo midhusi matek, kendo ne gikwayo Yesu mondo okonye.
Omiyo nodhi mokulore bute kendo nochiko midhusi mondo oa kendo midhusi noweye. Nochungo oa malo mapiyo kendo nochako miyogi chiemo.
Kane chiengʼ podho, ji nokelo ne Yesu ji duto mane nigi tuoche mopogore opogore, kendo noketo lwetene kuom moro ka moro, mochangogi.
Moloyo mano, jochiende nowuok oa kuom ji mangʼeny, ka goyo koko niya, “In e Wuod Nyasaye!” To nokwerogi kendo ne ok oyiene jochiendego mondo owuo nikech negingʼeyo ni en e Kristo.
Kane piny oru, Yesu nodhi kar kende. Ji ne manye to kane gibiro kama ne entie, negitemo tame mondo kik owegi.
To nowacho niya, “Nyaka ayal Injilini mar pinyruoth Nyasaye e mier moko bende, nikech ma emomiyo noora.”
To nodhi nyime koyalo e sinagoke mag Judea.
Chiengʼ moro achiel, ka Yesu nochungo but nam mar Genesaret, kendo ji kochokore molwore ka giwinjo wach Nyasaye.
Noneno yiedhi ariyo e dho wath, mane owe kanyo gi jolupo mane luoko tondegi.
Nodonjo ei achiel kuom yiedhigo, mane mar Simon, mi nokwaye mondo osiane yie matin oa e dho wath. Eka nobedo piny kendo puonjo ji ka enie yie.
Kane osetieko wuoyo, nowachone Simon niya, “Kiew yie odhi e chuny pi kama tut, mondo uchik tondeu omak rech.”
Simon nodwoke niya, “Ruoth, wasetiyo matek otieno duto to ok wasemako gimoro. To nikech iwacho kamano, abiro chiko tonde.”
Kane gisetimo kamano, negimako rech mangʼeny makoro tonde ne chako yiech.
Kuom mano, ne gigwelo jowetegi mane ni e yie machielo mondo obi okonygi, to kane gibiro to negipongʼo yiedhi ariyogo ma gichako nimo.
Kane Simon Petro oneno mani, nopodho e tiend Yesu, mowacho niya, “Dhiyo ia ira Ruoth, an ngʼat ma jaricho!”
Nimar en kaachiel gi joma ne en-go duto nowuoro nikech rech mane gimako.
Kamano, Jakobo gi Johana ma yawuot Zebedi mane jotiyo gi Simon bende nowuoro. Eka Yesu nowachone Simon niya, “Kik iluor; chakre tinendeni ibiro bedo jaywa ji.”
Kuom mano negiketo yiedhigi oko e dho wath, negiweyo gik moko duto kendo ne giluwe.
Kane Yesu ne nitie e achiel kuom mier, ngʼat moro ma dhoho omako dende duto nobiro ire, kane oneno Yesu, nopodho piny ka okulore e lowo kendo nosaye niya, “Ruoth, kiyie, to inyalo pwodha.”
Yesu norieyo bade momulo ngʼatno. Nowachone niya, “Ayie. Pwodhri!” Gikanyono dhoho noa kuome.
Eka Yesu nochike niya, “Kik inyis ngʼato wachni to dhiyo, mondo inyisri ne jadolo kendo ichiw misengini ma Musa nochiko nikech pwodhruokni, mondo obed ranyisi ne gin.”
To kata kamano humbe nomedo landore moloyo, momiyo oganda mag ji nobiro winje kendo mondo ochang tuochegi.
To Yesu ne thoro dhiyo kuonde thim ma enie kende mondo olem.
Chiengʼ moro kane opuonjo, jo-Farisai gi jopuonj chik, mane oa e mier duto mag Galili gi Judea kod Jerusalem, nobedo kanyono, to teko mar Ruoth ne ni kode mondo ochang jotuo.
Jomoko nobiro kotingʼo ja-athany e par kendo negitemo mondo gitere ei ot mondo gikele e nyim Yesu.
To kane ok ginyal yudo yo mar timo kamano nikech oganda mane ni kode, negiidho ewi tado kendo powo wi tado, eka negilore gi par e dier oganda e nyim Yesu.
Kane Yesu oneno yie ma jogo ne nigo, nowacho niya, “Osiepa, richoni oweni.”
Jo-Farisai gi jopuonj Chik nochako paro kendgi giwegi niya, “Mae to en ngʼa ma yanyo Nyasaye? Ere ngʼat manyalo weyone ngʼato richone makmana Nyasaye kende?”
Yesu nongʼeyo gima negiparo kendo nopenjogi niya, “Angʼo momiyo uparo gigi e chunyu?
Ere mayot wacho kuom weche ariyogi, ‘Richoni oweni,’ koso wacho ni, ‘Aa malo mondo iwuothi’?
To mondo ungʼe ni Wuod Dhano nigi teko e piny mar weyo richo.” Yesu nowachone ja-athanyno niya, “Awachoni ni aa malo, kaw pieni mondo idhi dala.”
Gikanyono nochungo ka ji duto nene modhiyo dala kopako Nyasaye.
Ji duto nowuoro kendo negichiwo pak ni Nyasaye. Negiwuoro ahinya kendo negiwacho niya, “Waseneno gik malich kawuono.”
Bangʼ mano, Yesu nowuok odhi oko kendo noneno jasol osuru ma nyinge Lawi kobet e od jasol osuru. Yesu nowachone niya, “Luwa.”
To Lawi noa malo, moweyo gik moko duto kendo noluwe.
Eka Lawi noloso nyasi maduongʼ mar rwako Yesu e ode, oganda maduongʼ mar josol osuru kaachiel gi ji mamoko nobiro ne chiemo kodgi.
To jo-Farisai gi jopuonj chik margi ne ngʼur ni jopuonjrene niya, “Angʼo momiyo uchiemo kendo metho gi josol osuru kod joricho?”
Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Joma ngima ok ema dwar jathieth makmana joma tuo.
Ok ne abiro mondo aluong joma kare, to nabiro mondo aluong joricho mondo gilokre giwe richo.”
Negiwachone niya, “Jopuonjre Johana ne thoro tweyo chiemo kendo lamo, to bende jopuonjre mag jo-Farisai timo kamano, to jopuonjreni dhiyo mana nyime gi chiemo kendo metho.”
To Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Bende inyalo miyo wend wuon kisera otwe chiemo ka pod en kodgi?
To ndalo biro ma wuon kisera nogol e kindgi, e ndalogo ginitwe chiemo.”
Eka nogoyonegi ngero machalo kama: “Onge ngʼama nyalo yiecho dir law manyien mondo obawgo mano moti. Ka otimo kamano, to obiro bedo ni oyiecho law manyien, kendo dir law manyien mobawgo law moti ok bi winjore gi moti.
Bende onge ngʼama olo divai manyien e piende moti mag tingʼo divai. Ka otimo kamano, divai manyien nyalo yiecho piend divaino mi divai pukre kendo piend divai biro kethore.
Ooyo, divai manyien nyaka ol mana e piende mag tingʼo divai manyien.
To onge ngʼama bangʼ madho divai machon dwaro divai manyien, nimar giwacho ni, ‘Divai machon ber moloyo.’ ”
Chiengʼ Sabato moro, Yesu noyudo kadho e kind puothe mag ngano mochiek, kendo jopuonjrene nochako jako wi ngano moko mochiek, negidunyogi e lwetegi mi, gichamo ngano.
Jo-Farisai moko nopenjo niya, “Angʼo momiyo utimo gima chik ok oyiego chiengʼ Sabato?”
Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Pok ne usomo gima Daudi notimo kaachiel gi jogo mane ni kode ka kech ne kayogi?
Donge nodonjo e od Nyasaye, kendo nokawo makati ma nosepwodhi moket tenge ma chik ok oyiene ngʼato angʼata mondo ocham makmana jodolo. Kendo nochiwo moko ne jogo mane ni kode.”
Eka Yesu nowachonegi niya, “Wuod Dhano en Ruodh Sabato.”
Chiengʼ Sabato machielo nodhi ei sinagogi kendo nopuonjo, to ngʼato ne ni kanyo ma lwete korachwich notal.
Jo-Farisai kod jopuonj chik ne dwaro yo ma digiyudgo ketho kuom Yesu. Kuom mano ne gingʼiyogo machiegni, mondo gine ka dochang ngʼatno chiengʼ Sabato.
To Yesu nongʼeyo gima negiparo eka nowacho ni ngʼatno mane lwete otal niya,“Aa malo kendo chungi e nyim ji duto.” Kamano noa malo mi ochungo kanyono.
Eka Yesu nowachonegi niya, “Apenjou, ere gima chikwa oyie mondo otim chiengʼ Sabato, timo maber koso timo marach, reso ngima koso ketho ngima ngʼato?”
Norangogi duto, to eka nowachone ngʼatno niya, “Rie lweti.” Notimo kamano, kendo lwete nochango chuth.
To negikecho kendo negichako wuoyo ngʼato gi ngʼato kuom gino ma digitim ni Yesu.
Chiengʼ moro achiel Yesu nowuok modhi e bath got moro mondo olem kendo nobedo otieno duto kolamo Nyasaye.
Kane okinyi ochopo, noluongo jopuonjre ire kendo noyiero apar gariyo kuomgi, mane owalo obedo joote:
Simon (mane omiyo nying ni Petro); gi owadgi Andrea, Jakobo, Johana, Filipo, Bartholomayo,
Mathayo, Thoma, Jakobo wuod Alfayo, Simon mane iluongo ni ja-Zilote,
Juda wuod Jakobo, gi Judas Iskariot, mane olokore obedo jandhok.
Nolor kodgi piny kendo nochungo kama opie. Oganda maduongʼ mar jopuonjrene ne ni kanyo kod ji mangʼeny moa kuonde duto mag Judea, moa Jerusalem, kendo moa e dho nam mar Turo gi Sidon,
mane obiro mondo giwinje kendo ochang midekregi. Jogo mane jochiende thago nochangi,
to ji duto notemo mondo omule, nikech teko ne aa kuome mochangogi duto.
Kane ongʼiyo jopuonjrene, nowacho niya, “Ogwedhu un jogo modhier, nimar pinyruoth Nyasaye en maru.
Ogwedhu un joma kech kayo sani, nimar unuyiengʼ. Ogwedhu un muywak sani, nimar ununyier.
Un joma ogwedhi ka ji mon kodu, ka gikwedou kendo giyanyou, kendo giketho nyingu, nikech Wuod Dhano.
“Beduru mamor e ndalono kendo chikreuru ka uil, nikech poku duongʼ e polo. Nimar mano e kaka kweregi notimo ne jonabi.
“To okwongʼu un jo-mwandu, nimar useyudo poku.
Okwongʼu un joma yiengʼ maber e kindeni, nimar unudeny. Okwongʼu un jogo manyiero sani, nimar ubiro kuyo kendo ywak.
Okwongʼu ka ji duto wuoyo maber kuomu, nimar mano e kaka kweregi notimone jonabi ma jo-miriambo.
“Anto awachonu un joma winja kama: Heruru wasiku, timuru maber ni jomamon kodu.
Gwedhuru joma kwongʼou lamuru ni joma sandou.
Ka ngʼato othalo lembi konchiel, to lokne komachielo bende. Ka ngʼato okawo kotini, kik itame kawo lawi mar akor.
Miuru ji duto makwayou, to ka ngʼato okawo giri moro, to kik idwar ni mondo oduoknigo.
Timuru ne ji mamoko mana kaka duher mondo gin bende gitimnu.
“Ka uhero joma oherou kende, to en ohala mane muyudo? Kata mana joricho bende ohero mana joma oherogi.
To ka utimo maber ni joma timonu maber, to en ohala mane ma uyudo? Kata mana joricho timo kamano.
To ka uholo mana joma un gi adier ni biro dwokonu, en ohala manade ma uyudo? Kata mana joricho holo mana joricho ka gigeno ni ibiro chulogi duto.
To heruru wasiku, timnegiuru maber, kendo holgiuru ka ok ugeno ni ubiro yudo gimoro bangʼe. Eka poku biro bedo maduongʼ kendo ubiro bedo yawuot Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo, nikech ongʼwon gi jogo ma ok dewe kendo jomaricho.
Beduru mangʼwon, mana kaka Wuonu ngʼwon.
“Kik ungʼad ne ji bura, eka ok nongʼadnu bura. Kik uwuo kuom ngʼato marach, to ok bi wuo kuomu. Weuru ne ji richogi, to ibiro weyonu richou.
Chiwuru, to ibiro chiwonu. Ubiro yudo rapim maber, moiki kendo motiel mapongʼ thich, kendo oo oko. Nimar rapim mupimogo ema ibiro pimnugo un bende.”
Nogoyonegi ngeroni niya, “Ngʼat ma muofu bende nyalo telo ni ngʼama muofu machielo? Donge giduto ji ariyogo di gilingʼre ei bugo?
Japuonjre ok duongʼ moloyo japuonjne, to ngʼato ka ngʼato motiegi chuth biro bedo machal gi japuonjne.
“Angʼo momiyo ineno ngʼinjo mar buch yath manie wangʼ wadu to pilni maduongʼ mar yath manie wangʼi iwuon to ok idew?
Ere kaka diwach ne owadu ni; owadwa, yie mondo agolni ngʼinjo mar buch yath manie wangʼi, ka in iwuon ok inyal neno pilni maduongʼ mar yath manie wangʼi iwuon? In ngʼat mawuondoreni, mokwongo gol pilni maduongʼ mar yath manie wangʼi iwuon oko, eka ibiro neno maler mar golo ngʼinjo mar buch yath manie wangʼ wadu oko.
“Onge yath maber manyago olemo maricho, kata yath marach manyago olemo maber.
Yath ka yath ingʼeyo kod olembe owuon. Ji ok pon olemb ngʼowu kuom yiende mag kudho, kata olemb mzabibu bende ok pon kuom otanglo.
Ngʼat maber golo gik mabeyo mawuok kuom ber mokano e chunye, to ngʼat marach golo gik maricho mawuok kuom rach mokano e chunye. Nimar gik mopongʼo chuny ngʼato ema wuok e dho ngʼato.
“Angʼo momiyo uluonga ni, ‘Ruoth, Ruoth,’ to ok utim gima awacho?
Abiro nyisou kaka ngʼat mabiro ira, mawinjo wachna kendo timo chalo.
Ochalo gi ngʼat manogero ot, mane okunyo bur matut nyaka e lwanda kendo noketoe mise, kane koth ochwe ma pi opongʼo piny, apaka mogingore nogoyo odno to ne ok onyal yienge, nikech nogere motegno.
To jal mawinjo wechena to ok otimgi chalo gi ngʼat mane ogero ot ewi lowo maonge gi mise. E kindeno ma apaka mogingore nogoyo odno, nogore piny kendo nokethore chuth.”
Kane Yesu osetieko wacho wechegi duto ka ji winjo, nodhi modonjo Kapernaum.
Kanyo ne nitie jatich jaduongʼ lweny, mane ruodhe ogeno ahinya, notuo kendo nochiegni gi tho.
Jaduongʼ lweny nowinjo humb Yesu, omiyo nooro jodongo mag jo-Yahudi ire, mondo gikwaye odhi ochang jatichne.
Kane gibiro ir Yesu negisaye chutho niya, “Ngʼatni owinjore mondo itimne maber,
nikech ohero pinywa kendo osegeronwa sinagogi.”
Kuom mano, Yesu nodhi kodgi. Kane oyudo ok en mabor gi ot, jaduongʼ lweny nooro osiepene mondo owachne niya, “Ruoth, kik ichandri, nikech ok awinjora ibi idonji ei oda.
Ma emomiyo asekwanora ni ok awinjora biro iri. To wach mana wach to jatichna biro chango.
Nimar an bende an ngʼama ni e bwo loch kod jolweny manie bwoya. Ka awacho ne moro ni, ‘Dhiyo’ to odhi, kendo machielo ni ‘Bi’ to obiro. Bende ka anyiso misumbana ni, ‘Tim ma,’ to otimo kamano.”
Kane Yesu owinjo wach ngʼatno, nowuore, kendo kane olokore mongʼiyo oganda maluwe, nowacho niya, “Awachonu, pok ayudo kata ngʼat achiel ma nigi yie maduongʼ machal kama kata e Israel.”
Eka jogo mane ooro nodok e ot to negiyudo jatich kangima.
Mapiyo bangʼ mano, Yesu nodhi e dala miluongo ni Nain, to jopuonjrene gi oganda maduongʼ bende nodhi kode.
Kane osudo machiegni gi dhoranga dalano, to noromo gi joma otingʼo ngʼat motho ka igolo oko idhi yiko. Ngʼatno ne en wuowi achiel kende ma wuod dhako ma chwore otho. To oganda maduongʼ moa e dalano ne ni kode.
Kane Ruoth onene, chunye nokeche kendo nowacho niya, “Kik iywagi.”
Eka nodhi machiegni kendo nomulo sanduku mane otingʼe wuowi manotho, to jogo mane otingʼe nochungʼ. Nowachone, “Wuowi matin, awachoni, chungi aa malo!”
Ngʼat mane othono noa malo mobedo piny kendo nochako wuoyo, to Yesu nokawe momiye min-gi.
Ji duto ne luoro omako kendo negipako Nyasaye. Negiwacho niya, “Janabi maduongʼ osewuok e dierwa. Nyasaye osebiro konyo joge.”
Wach maberni mar Yesu nolandore e Judea mangima kod gwenge mokiewo kode.
Jopuonjre Johana nonyise gigi duto. Noluongo ji ariyo kuomgi,
mine oorogi ir Ruoth mondo gipenje niya, “In e jalno mane onego obi koso warit ngʼat machielo?”
Kane jogo obiro ir Yesu, negiwachone niya, “Johana ja-Batiso noorowa iri mondo wapenj ni, ‘In e jalno mane onego obi, koso warit ngʼat machielo?’ ”
E sa nogono Yesu nochango ji mangʼeny mane nigi tuoche, midekre kod chunje maricho, kendo nomiyo muofni mangʼeny oneno.
Kamano nowacho ni jogo mane oor niya, “Doguru kendo unyis Johana gik ma useneno kendo winjo: Muofni neno, rongʼonde wuotho, jogo man-gi dhoho ichango, joma itgi odinore winjo wach, joma otho ichiero, kendo Injili iyalo ne joma odhier.
En ngʼat mogwedhi jal ma ok chwanyre mabar nikech an.”
Bangʼe ka jopuonjre Johana nosea odhi, Yesu nochako wuoyo gi oganda kuom Johana kowacho niya, “Angʼo mane udhi mondo une e thim? Ne udhi neno odundu ma yamo tero koso?
Ka ok mano, to en angʼo mane udhi mondo une? Ne udhi neno ngʼat morwakore gi lewni mabeyo koso? Ooyo, jogo marwakore gi lewni ma nengogi tek kendo madhialore gi gik mabeyo ni e ute ruodhi.
To un nudhi mondo une angʼo? Janabi? Ee, awachonu, ni ne udhi neno ngʼat moloyo janabi gi duongʼ.
Ma e jal mane ondik kuome niya, “ ‘Abiro oro jaotena mondo otel e nyimi, obiro losoni yori kapok ibiro.’
Awachonu, kuom jogo duto mamon onywolo onge ngʼato maduongʼ moloyo Johana; kata kamano ngʼatno matinie moloyo e pinyruoth Nyasaye duongʼ moloye.”
(Ji duto, kata mana jasol osuru, kane giwinjo weche Yesu, ne giyie ni yor Nyasaye ni kare, nikech nosebatisgi gi Johana.
To jo-Farisai kod jogo molony e chik nodagi dwaro mar Nyasaye kuomgi giwegi, nikech ne pok obatisgi gi Johana.)
Yesu nopenjogi niya, “Koro en angʼo ma dapimgo tiengʼ ma kawuononi? Gichalo gi angʼo?
Gichalo nyithindo mobedo e chiro kendo luongore kendgi moro ka moro kagiwacho niya, “ ‘Ne wagoyonu asili, to ne ok umiel; bende ne wadengo ka wawero wend tho, to ne ok uywak.’
Nimar Johana Ja-batiso nobiro ka ok ocham makati kata madho divai, to uwacho ni, ‘En gi jachien.’
Wuod Dhano nobiro ka chiemo kendo metho, to uwacho ni, ‘Neyeuru jawuoro kendo jamer mosiep josol osuru gi joricho.’
To rieko ifwenyo adimba gi nyithinde duto.”
Chiengʼ moro ja-Farisai achiel moro noluongo Yesu mondo ochiem kode nodhi e od ja-Farisai mobedo but mesa.
Kane dhako mane osedak e ngima mar richo e dalano nowinjo ni Yesu ne chiemo e od ja-Farisai, nokelo chupa mar alabasta mopongʼ gi mo mangʼwe ngʼar,
kendo nochungʼ e toke, but tiende, pi wangʼe nolwar e tiendene ma gitimo pi eka noyweyogi gi yie wiye, monyodhogi kendo noolo mo mangʼwe ngʼar kuomgi.
Kane ja-Farisai mane oluonge oneno ma, nowacho owuon niya, “Ka dine bed ni ngʼatni en janabi, to nine ongʼeyo ni ngʼat ma muleni en ngʼat machalo nade kendo ni en dhako machalo nade nikech en jaricho.”
Yesu nodwoke niya, “Simon, an-gi gima adwaro wachoni.” Nowachone niya, “Wachna, japuonj.”
“Ji ariyo ne nigi gowi mar jahol pesa, moro. Achiel nenigigope mar silingʼ mia abich, to machielo piero abich.
Giduto ji ariyogi ne gionge gi pesa ma gichulego, omiyo noweyonegi gopegi. Koro en mane kuomgi mabiro here moloyo?”
Simon nodwoko niya, “Aparo ni ngʼat mane nigi gowi maduongʼ mowene.” Yesu nowacho niya, “Isengʼado bura makare.”
Eka nolokore mongʼiyo dhakono mowachone Simon, niya, “Ineno dhakoni? Nabiro odi. Ne ok imiya pi moro amora mondo alwokgo tiendena, to nolwoko tiendena gi pi wangʼe kendo noyweyogi gi yie wiye.
To in ne ok inyodha, to dhakoni chakre sa mane adonjo, ne ok oweyo nyodho tiendena.
Ne ok iolo mo e wiya, to oseolo mo mangʼwe ngʼar e tiendena.
Emomiyo, awachoni ni richone mathoth osewene, nikech nonyiso hera mathoth. To ngʼat mowene richo manok, herane bende tin.”
Eka Yesu nowachone niya, “Richoni oweni.”
Welo mamoko nochako penjore kendgi giwegi kawacho niya, “Mani en ngʼa maweyo ne ji richogi?”
Yesu nowachone dhakono niya, “Yieni oseresi; dhi gi kwe.”
Bangʼ mano, Yesu nowuotho kodhi e dala ka dala kod gwengʼ ka gwengʼ ka olando Injili mar pinyruoth Nyasaye. Jopuonjrene apar gariyo ne ni kode,
kaachiel gi mon moko mane osegol kuomgi jochiende kendo ochang tuochegi kaka Maria (mane iluongo ni Magdala) mane jochiende abiriyo osewuok kuome;
Joana chi Chuza, mane jatelo e od Herode gi Susana kod mon mamoko mathoth. Mon-gi nekonyogi ka gichiwonegi gigegi giwegi.
Kane oyudo oganda maduongʼ chokore kendo ji ne biro ir Yesu moa e dala ka dala nogoyonegi ngero niya,
“Japur moro nodhi chwoyo kodhi. Kane oyudo ochwoyo kodhi, moko nolwar e yo mi nonyon-gi kendo winy mafuyo e kor polo nochamogi duto.
Moko nolwar ewi lwanda mine gitwi kendo ne gitwo nikech ne gionge kod ngʼich.
Kodhi moko nolwar e kind kudho, to ka kudhogo nodongo kod cham to ne githungʼo chamgo.
Bende kothe moko nolwar e lowo maber. Ne gitwi kendo neginyago cham, nyadi mia moloyo kaka nochwoyo.” Kane owacho ma, nogoyo koko niya,“Ngʼat man-gi ite mar winjo wach mondo owinji.”
Jopuonjre nopenje tiend ngerono.
Nowacho niya, “Un osemiu rieko mar ngʼeyo gik mopondo mag pinyruoth Nyasaye, to ji mamoko awuoyonegi gi ngero, mondo omi, “ ‘kata ka obedo ni gingʼicho, to ok ginine gimoro; kendo gibiro siko ka giwinjo weche miwacho, to wach ok nodonjnegi.’
“Ma e gima ngeroni nyiso: Kodhi en wach Nyasaye.
Molwar e dir yo gin jogo mawinjo, to jachien biro kendo golo wach ei chunygi, mondo kik giyie ma wargi.
Molwar e lwanda gin jogo ma rwako wach gi mor ka giwinje, to gionge gi tiendegi. Giyie kuom kinde moromo, to e kinde mag tem gipodho giaa.
Kodhi molwar e dier kudho ochungo kar jogo mawinjo, to ka gidhiyo e yoregi, to parruok mar ngima, mwandu kod mor mar piny thungʼogi, ma ok gidong motegno.
To kodhi manie lowo maber, ochungo kar jogo man-gi chuny malongʼo kendo maber, mawinjo wach, gikane, kendo gibedo modhil ma ginyag cham.
“Onge ngʼato mamoko taya kendo umo gi atonga kata kete e bwo kitanda. Kar timo kamano, to okete ewi rachungi taya, mondo jogo madonjo one ler.
Nimar onge gimoro mopandi ma ok nofweny, to bende onge gima lingʼ-lingʼ ma ok nongʼere kata noket e lela.
Emomiyo paruru ahinya maber kaka uwinjo. Ngʼat man-go nomedne mi nobed gi gik mogundho; to ngʼat ma ongego kata mano moparo ni en-go nomaye.”
Koro min Yesu gi owetene nobiro mondo ginene, to ne ok ginyal sudo machiegni kode nikech oganda.
Ngʼat moro nowachone Yesu niya, “Minu gi oweteni ochungʼ oko, gidwaro neni.”
Nodwoko niya, “Minwa kod owetena gin jogo mawinjo wach Nyasaye kendo timo.”
Chiengʼ moro Yesu nowacho ne jopuonjrene niya, “Wadhiuru loka nam komachielo.” Omiyo negidonjo ei yie kendo giwuok gidhi.
Kane gikwangʼ, nindo notere. Eka ahiti mangʼongo notugore e nam, koro yieno ne opongʼ gi pi kendo ne gin e chandruok maduongʼ.
Jopuonjre nodhi ire mochiewe, kagiwachone niya, “Ruoth, Ruoth, wabiro nimo!” Nochungo oa malo kendo nokwero yamo gi apaka mager mi ahiti nopie kendo gik moko duto nokwe.
Nopenjo jopuonjrene niya, “Ere yie ma un-go?” Luoro nomakogi kendo negiwuoro mine gipenjore giwegi niya, “Ma en ngʼa? Ochiko nyaka yembe kod pi, mi giwinje.”
Negikwangʼ gichopo e gwengʼ miluongo ni Gerasi, man loka nam Galili.
Kane Yesu owuok oko e dho wath, ngʼat moro man-gi jochiende moa e dalano noromo kode, kuom kinde mangʼeny ngʼatni ne pok orwako law kata dak ei ot, to nodak e dier liete.
Kane oneno Yesu, noywak matek kendo nopodho piny e tiende, kogoyo koko gi dwol mamalo niya, “Yesu Wuod Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo, angʼo milaro koda? Asayi, kik isanda!”
Nimar noyudo Yesu osechiko jachien marachno mondo owuog kuom ngʼatno. Kuom kinde mangʼeny nomake, to kata nosetwe lwetene, gi tiendene gi nyororo, kendo okete e bwo jarit, nosebedo kochodo nyororo kendo jochiende ne riembe nyaka e thim.
Yesu nopenje niya, “Nyingi ngʼa?” Nodwoko niya, “Wan oganda” nikech jochiende mangʼeny nosedonjo kuome.
To negisiko gikwaye mondo kik ochikgi gidhiyo e Bur Matut Maonge Gikone.
To kweth maduongʼ mag anguro ne kwayo e bath got kanyo. Jochiendego nosayo Yesu mondo oyie gidonji eigi, mi nomiyogi thuolo.
Kane jochiendego nowuok oa ei ngʼatno, negidhiyo gidonjo ei angurogo, kendo kweth angurogo noringo matek koluwo aridiridi mochomo nam mi giduto ne githo ei pi.
Kane jogo makwayo angurogo noneno gima nosetimore, negiringo mi gidhi gitero wach ne ji duto modak e dala kendo e gwengʼno.
Mi ji nowuok mondo gine gino mosetimore. Kane gibiro ir Yesu, negiyudo ngʼatno ma yande jochiende nosewuok kuome, kobedo piny e tiend Yesu, korwakore kendo ka parone ni kare; mi luoro nomakogi.
Jogo mane oneno gima notimore nonyiso ji kaka ngʼat mane nigi jochiende nochangi
Eka ji duto manie gwengʼ Gerasi duto nokwayo Yesu mondo odar odhi owegi, nikech luoro maduongʼ nomakogi. Omiyo nodonjo ei yie kendo noa kanyo.
Ngʼat mane jochiende owuok kuome, nosaye mondo oyie odhi kode, to Yesu notame, kawachone niya,
“Dogi dala kendo inyis ji gik madongo ma Nyasaye osetimoni.” Omiyo ngʼatno nowuok odhi molando ne dala duto gik mangʼeny ma Yesu nosetimone.
Koro kane Yesu odwogo, oganda norwake nimar negirite giduto.
Eka ngʼato moro ma nyinge Jairo, jatich sinagogi, nobiro mogoyo chonge piny e tiend Yesu, kosaye mondo odhi ode,
nikech nyare achiel kende, nyako madirom ja-higni apar gariyo, ne tho. Ka Yesu ne ni e yo, oganda maduongʼ nothungʼe mane gichiegni hinye.
To dhako moro ne ni kanyo mane osebedo ka iye chwer kuom higni apar gariyo to onge ngʼat mane nyalo change.
Nobiro gi yo katoke kendo nomulo riak lawe, kendo iye machwer nochok gikanyono.
Yesu nopenjo niya, “En ngʼa momula?” Kane giduto gikwero, Petro nowacho niya, “Ruoth, ok ineye kaka ji olwori kendo othungʼi.”
To Yesu nowacho niya, “Ngʼato moro omula; angʼeyo ma nikech teko osewuok kuoma.”
Bangʼ kane dhakono oneno ni ok onyal aa ma ok ofwenyore, nobiro ka otetni kendo nopodho e tiend Yesu. Nohulo e nyim ji duto gimomiyo nomule kendo kaka nochango sano sano.
Eka nowachone niya, “Nyara, yieni osechangi. Dhi gi kwe.”
Kane oyudo Yesu pod wuoyo, ngʼato moro nobiro moa e od Jairo, ma jatend sinagogi, mowacho niya, “Nyari osetho, omiyo kik ichand japuonj kendo.”
Kane owinjo ma, Yesu nowachone Jairo niya, “Kik iluor, bed gi yie kendo obiro chango.”
Kane ochopo e od Jairo, ne ok oyie ni ngʼato moro amora mondo odonj kode makmana Petro, Johana gi Jakobo kod wuon nyathi gi min mare.
Gie kindeno, ji duto ne goyo nduru kendo Yesu nowachonegi niya, “Weuru ywak nimar ok otho to onindo aninda.”
Neginyiere, nikech negingʼeyo ni osetho.
To nomako lwet nyakono kendo nowacho niya, “Nyathina, chungi ia malo.”
Chunye noduogo, kendo nochungʼ oa malo gisano. Eka Yesu nowachonegi mondo gimiye gimoro ocham.
Jonywolne nohum, to nomiyogi chik ni kik ginyis ngʼato moro amora gima nosetimore.
Kane Yesu oseluongo ji apar gariyogo kaachiel, nomiyogi nyalo kod teko mar golo jochiende duto kendo chango tuoche,
kendo noorogi oko mondo giyal pinyruoth Nyasaye kendo chango joma tuo.
Nowachonegi niya, “Kik utingʼ gimoro ka udhi e wuoth obed luth kata ofuku kata chiemo, kata pesa, kata law machielo miloko.
Ubed e ot moro amora mudonje, nyaka ua e dalano.
Ka ji ok orwakou, to utengʼ buch tiendeu sa ma uwuok e dalagi mondo obednegi ranyisi ni bura oseloyogi.”
Kamano ne giwuok ma gidhiyo e gwengʼ ka gwengʼ, ka giyalo Injili kendo gichango ji kuonde duto.
Koro Ruoth Herode nowinjo gik moko duto matimore, to noparore, nikech ji moko ne wacho ni Johana osechier oa kuom joma otho.
Jomoko to ni Elija osefwenyore, to joma moko bende ni achiel kuom jonabi machon osebedo mangima kendo.
To Herode nowacho niya, “Johana ne asengʼado wiye, koro ma, to en ngʼa ma awinjo gik ma kamagi kuome?” Kendo notemo mondo onene.
Ka joote noduogo neginyiso Yesu gima negisetimo. Eka nokawogi modhi kodgi ka gin kendgi giwegi e dala miluongo ni Bethsaida,
to oganda nowinjo mano kendo ne giluwe. Norwakogi kendo nowuoyo kodgi kuom loch mar pinyruoth Nyasaye, kendo nochango jogo mane dwaro chang.
Kar seche moko mag odhiambo Jopuonjre apar gariyo nobiro ire kendo negiwachone niya, “We ogandani owuogi mondo gidhi e mier machiegni kod gwenge mondo giyud chiemo kod kuonde nindo, nikech wan e thim.”
Yesu nodwoko niya, “Migiuru gimoro gicham un uwegi.” Negidwoko niya, “Wan mana gi makati abich gi rech ariyo kende, makmana ka wanyalo dhi mondo wangʼiew chiemo ne ogandani duto.”
Ne nitie ji machwo kanyo ma dirom alufu abich. To nowachone jopuonjrene niya, “Nyisgiuru gibed piny e migepe mag ji madirom piero abich, moro ka moro.”
Jopuonjre notimo kamano kendo giduto negibedo piny.
Bangʼe nokawo makati abichgo gi rech ariyogo nongʼiyo polo malo, kogoyo erokamano kendo nongʼingogi. Eka nomiyogi jopuonjre mondo opog ji.
Giduto negichiemo mi giyiengʼ, kendo bangʼ chiemo jopuonjre nochoko ngʼinjo mag chiemo mane ji ochamo oweyo okepe apar gariyo mopongʼ.
Chiengʼ moro kane Yesu lemo kama opondo kendo ne en gi jopuonjrene, nopenjogi niya, “Oganda wacho ni An ngʼa?”
Negidwoke niya, “Jomoko wacho ni in Johana ja-Batiso, to jomoko wacho ni in Elija to jomoko bende wacho ni in achiel kuom jonabi machon ema osedwogo mobedo mangima kendo.”
Nopenjogi niya, “To un to uwacho ni an ngʼa?” Petro nodwoke niya, “In Kristo ma wuod Nyasaye.”
Yesu nosiemogi matek mondo kik ginyis, ngʼato angʼata wachni.
Kendo nowacho niya, “Wuod Dhano nyaka yud sand mangʼeny, kendo ibiro kwede gi jodong oganda gi jodolo madongo kod jopuonj chik, bende nyaka nonege kendo chiengʼ mar adek nochiere obed mangima.”
